Mangailangan yang misnang karakal a panaun king pamaglako pangasiksik (decompression) kesa king JPEG, at paintulutan na ing mas matas a uring pamanguldas (sophisticated progressive downloads), dapot halus pareu ing panaun da para king pamanyiksik (compression rates). Lalu yang pupulâ ing HOEG kuntoru mitatas ing pamiyanting pamaniksik (compression rates), imbes na magpalual kareng "blocking and ringing" artifacts ning JPEG, anian lalung sasákit ing diretsung pamikumpara da reng karelang bilis ning pamanyiksik (compression rate).
Mibulalag ya antimong ISO standard, ISO/IEC 15444-1:2000, ing metung a dake ning JPEG 2000. Aniang banuang 2008, e pa maleparan ing pamangamit da reng web browser king JPEG 2000, ania e pa pangkabilugan ing pamangamit kaniti king 
World Wide Web. 
Lipat ning gínawa nong paralan ba lang ibage deng miyayaliwang uri da ring meta-data, king salukuyan, ala pang matatanggap a paralan ba yang ilangkap (embed) la reng Exif data, dapot atin nang memunikalang JPEG 2000 "JpgTiffExif->JP2" UUID box bang manyalikut impormasiun, at papaliari ne ning ExifTool version 6.92 o mas bayu. 

Lossless JPEG:
Bukud kareng pikabaluan a paralan ning pamanyiksik larawan a lossy (lossy image compression techniques) ning Joint Photographic Experts Group - deng JPEG ampong JPEG 2000 - atin ya muring atlung standard para king lossless compression (nung nu atin yang uri a lossy ing JPEG-LS) iti. 
Ing lossless JPEG meyalkus (developed) ya antimong tauling dagdag king JPEG kanitang 1993. Gagamit yang tutung aliwang paralan ketang lossy JPEG standard. Gagamit yang predictive scheme (paralan ning pamanula) iti kareng atlung pekamalapit (causal) a kasiping na (babo o "upper", kaili o "left", ampong babong kaili o "upper-left"), at magagamit ing entropy coding ketang prediction error (kamalian king pamanula). E re susuportan deng standard Independent JPEG Group library, dapot ginawa yang patch i Ken Murchison ning Oceana Matrix Ltd., nung nu tutuglungan ne ing IJG library ba neng asuportan ing Lossless JPEG. Dakal la muring gagamit king Lossless JPEG king pamaglarawan a pang-medisina (medical imaging). Magagamit ya mu naman king DNG ampo kareng aliwang digital camera ba lang isiksik deng e pa meprosesung larawan (raw images), oneng liban kaniti, e maleparan ing pamangamit kaya.

Systems Plus College Foundation:
Ing Systems Plus College Foundation metung yang institusion ning matas a pamagaral a pribadu at alang sekta a makabasi king Angeles Lakanbalen, Pampanga, Filipinas. 
Amlat.
Mitátag ya ing ing Systems Plus Inc. king Balibago, Angeles Lakanbalen aniang Juniu 27, 1985 a maki limang talatátag (incorporator). Babie yang seminar iting institutsion kareng bisang kumang kursu king electronic data processing antimo deng programmer, encoder ampong systems analyst. 
Migumpisa yang miyampang tutorial program para kareng magaral ampong propesional ing eskuela aniang Juliu 7, 1985 kareng kulang king apulung (10) estudianti. Karas ning 1986, miras nong siyam a pulu't walu (98) deti. Ing petsang ita ing meging Foundation Day (Aldo ning Pamitatag) ning eskuela. 
Kanitang Juniu 1987, miyampang yang associate course king electronic service technician, computer technician, computer secretarial, ampong computer science. Makadiseniu la reng kursung deti bang pakibatan ing pamangailangan da reng industria. Uli na niti, mitas ing bilang da reng magaral manibat king anam a ralan (600) aniang 1987 angga king libu aduang dalan (1,200) aniang 1989. 
Aniang banuang 1989, mibusni la reng aduang campus: metung king Cubao, Quezon Lakanbalen ampong metung king Miranda, Angeles Lakanbalen, a mekasaup king imahen ning kumpaniang Systems Plus, Inc.
Ketang Abril 8, 1991 miyalilan ya lagyu ing eskuela king Systems Plus Institute Foundation, Inc., metung a institusion ning matas a pamagaral a makatutuk king pamagaral a makaugne kareng computer. Miyayampang yang Bachelor of Science in Computer Science king Region III. Ini ing ambag ning eskuela king pangkabilugan yatung pamangailangan kareng propesional king computer. 
Mitas ya king libu limang dalan (1,500) ing bilang da reng makalista kanitang Juniu 1991, dapot mepitna ya ini bayu ya meyari ing bulan uli ning pamamakbung ning Bunduk Pinatubu kanitang Juniu 16, 1991. Ita muring bulang ita, meko ya king Clark Air Base ing United States Airforce. Maragul ing epektu da reng aduang kapaliarian a reti king kabilian ning ekonomia ning Angeles Lakanbalen.
Antimong pamagsadia king pamanalis na king institusion ning pamagaral a apat a lebel, ampo king pamandagull ampong pamanalkus (growth and development), miyalilan ya ing lagiu na manibat king Systems Plus Computer Institute, Inc., paras king Systems Plus Computer College Foundation, Inc. Minaliwa la murin deng damla't talindo (mission and vision) ampo reng kapakayan (goals) ning institusiun. Migsilbing dalan iti ba yang miyampang karagdagang kursung batsilyer (bachelor degree program) king Computer Engineering, Computer Secretarial, Computer Education, Computer Technology, ampong Business Administration. Mika departamentu ya muring sekundaria (high school department), a maki kapakayan a magsane kareng estudianti manibat king maranun a edad king uri ning pamagaral a balansi kareng alit (arts) ampong humanidades (humanities), a maki matibeng pundasiun king teknolohiyang pang-impormasiun (information technology) kapamilatan da reng kurikulum a makapanaun (relevant) ampong makabaldugan (meaningful). 
Karas ning banuang 1995, mesalese nang mayap ing kabilian nang pangkabiayan ampong pang-sosiedad ning Angeles Lakanbalen. Bagia-bagia, mitas ing bilang da reng magaral. Bayu miyari ing banuang akademiku (school year), adua lang gusali deng miragdag king campus king Angeles. Mibusni la reng departamentung elementaria ampong pre-elementary kanitang Juniu 1996. 
Mitatag ya ing campus king Caloocan Lakanbalen, Keragulang Menila (Metro Manila) aniang Juniu 9, 1997. 
Miyalilan ne naman king Systems Plus College Foundation (SPCF), Inc. ing lagiu ning eskuela kanitang Juniu 2004. Mika bayung logo o sagisag ing eskuela, at mitatag ya ing College of Nursing.
Pigkaluban neng pamangilala antimong Center of Development in Information Technology (Sentru ning Pamanalkus king Teknolohiyang Pang-impormasiun) ning Commission on Higher Education Regional Office ing eskuela. Ala yang patugut magsaneng miyaring megaral a makatutuk king pamaniuyu (service-oriented), makibat king pamangailangan da reng industria, makudta (innovative) ampong aktibung kayantabe king pamag-moldi king paintungulan ning bansa. 

QuickTime:
Ing QuickTime metung yang multimedia framework a inalkus ning Apple Inc., a maki kagiwan a talan kareng miyayaliwang format da ring media clip, katini (sound), sulat (text), kikimut (animation), tigtigan (music) ampng miyayaliwang uri da ring interactive panoramic image. Babie yang maulagang suporta kareng software package anti ing iTunes, QuickTime Player Player (a maliari muring magsilbing helper application para kareng web browser ba lang makapagpagana kareng media file a e maliaring ibusni king aliwang paralan) ampong Safari. 

MPEG-1:
Ing MPEG-1 metung yang minunang standard a lossy a pamanyiksik (compression) ning video ampong audio. Mediseniu ya ba yang isiksik ing VHS-quality raw digital video ampo ing CD audio pababa king (26:1 a compression ration king mumuna ampong 6:1 king kadua) a alang apapansinan a pangabawas king kalidad na, bang makagawang Video CDs, digital cable/satellite TV ampong digital audio broadcasting (DAB). 
King salukuyan, ing MPEG-1 megi neng matatanggap (compatible) a format para king lossy lossy audio/video king yatu, a magagamit kareng dakal a produktu ampong teknolohiya. Mapaliaring ing MP3 audio format a pepakilala na ing pikabaluan diling dake ning standard a MPEG-1.
Lipat ning maluat ne (kumpara kareng aliwa), e ne man mas matsura o mababang uri kesa kareng mas bayung teknolohiya ing MPEG-1. Agpang kang Leonardo Chiariglione (metung kareng mitátag king MPEG): "Alang katutuan king paniwalang alang patugut a susulung ing teknolohiya ning pamanyiksik." ("the idea that compression technology keeps on improving is a myth.")
Makabulalag (published) ya ing MPEG-1 standard antimong ISO/IEC-11172.

MPEG-2:
Ing MPEG-2 metung yang standard para king generic (alang tatak) a pamag-code da reng pelikula ampo ing impormasiun a audio a makaugne keti ("the generic coding of moving pictures and associated audio information".) Lalarawan ne niti ing metung a kombinasiun da reng paralan ning lossy video compression ampong audio compression (audio data compression) a magpaintulut king pamanimpan/pamanyinup ampong pamagparla kareng pelikula kapamilatan ning bandwidth da reng paralan ning pamanyimpan ampng pamagparalang atyu na king salukuyan (currently available storage media and transmission bandwidth).
Suglung palual.
-- 14:34, 21 Juniu 2008 (UTC)

MPEG-4 Part 2:
Ing MPEG-4 Part 2 metung yang teknolohiya ning video compression a inalkus (developed) ning MPEG. Kayabe ya king MPEG-4 ISO/IEC standard (ISO/IEC 14496-2). Metung yang standard ning pamanyiksik (compression) a discrete cosine transform, kalupa da reng minunang standard antimo ing MPEG-1 ampo ing MPEG-2. Pamipaliari (implementations) na la niting standard a iti deng mapilan a sikat a codec, antimo ing DivX, Xvid ampo ing Nero Digital. Dapat a tandanan a ing MPEG-4 Part 10 mangabaldugan yang aliwang format king MPEG-4 Part 2, at e dapat pagkamalian kaniti. Keraklan, ausan deng H.264 o AVC ing MPEG-4 Part 10, at miyabe reng inalkus o gewa ning ITU-T ampo ning MPEG. 

H.120:
Ing H.120 ing mumunang standard ning pamag-encode ning digital a video. Inalkus ne ning COST 211, at bilalag ne ning CCITT aniang 1984, at misamasan (revised) ya kanitang 1988. E makaing masanting ing kalidad ning video. Ditak la mu reng pamipaliari (implementation) na niti, at alang codec para king format a iti king salukuyan. Nanupata, dakal ing impormasiun a migbunga kaniti, at megamit iti kareng katuki na, antimo ing H.261.

Francisco de Asis:
I San Francisco de Asís o Saint Francis of Assisi (king amanung Italianu, "Francesco d'Assisi"), (Assisi, Italia, 1181 o 1182 – 3 October 1226) metung yang praileng Catolicu a mitátag king w:Order of Friars Minor, a mas kilala king lagiung Franciscanu.
Ya ing patron da reng animal, ayup, ing laulta {environment), ampo ing Italia. Kaugalian kareng pisambang Catolicu ing mika seremonias para kareng animal keng piesta na neng Octubri 4.
</ref>
Deng pekamaulagang dalerayan para king bie nang San Francisco de Asis.
Para king maleparan a tala da reng pikuanan, lon ya ing [http://198.62.75.1/www1/ofm/fra/FRAmain.html].
Deng manimuna nang sinulat San Francisco.
Para king metung a kumpletung tala, lon ya ing [http://198.62.75.1/www1/ofm/fra/FRAwr02.html].

H.264/MPEG-4 AVC:
Ing H.264 metung yang standard para king pamanyiksik king video (video compression). Ausan de muring MPEG-4 Part 10, o MPEG-4 AVC (para Advanced Video Coding). Metung ya kareng pekabayung block-oriented motion-estimation-based codec a gewa ning ITU-T Video Coding Experts Group (VCEG) kayabe ya ing ISO/IEC Moving Picture Experts Group (MPEG) antimong produktu ning pamisaup a maki lagiung Joint Video Team (JVT). Ing ITU-T H.264 standard ampo ing ISO/IEC MPEG-4 Part 10 standard (a maki pormal a lagiung ISO/IEC 14496-10) miyayabe rong mamantinian, bang kanita, pareu ing karelang laman a teknikal (technical content). Miyari ing final drafting o tauling obra king pamaniulat ning purmerung bersion ning standard kanitang Mayu 2003.

St. Scholastica's College:
Ing St. Scholastica's College (SSC o karaniwan, St. Scho) metung yang Catolicu institusiun a pambabai a mitátag kanitang 1906, at palakad da reng Missionary Benedictine Sisters of Tutzing. Atyu iti king metung a loting 3.66 a ektarea king Malate king lakanbalen ning Menila. Padurutnan ne ning Dalang Estrada king pangulu, P. Ocampo king mauli, Singalong king aslagan, ampong Leon Guinto king albugan. Aniang mumuna, elementaria pamu ing kayang yampang. Migumpisa yang mika magaral a sekundaria kanitang 1907, at mibusni ya ing kayang departamentung pang-kolehiyu aniang `1920. Minuna yang miyampang pormal a pamagaral king musika king Filipinas, at bisni ne ing Conservatory of Music kanitang 1907. Lipat ning eskuela yang pambabai ing St. Scholastica's College, maliari la kareng kursung Cognate, Music, Fine Arts, ampong Interior Design. 
Kikilalanan ne ning Department of Education ampo ning Commission on Higher Education ing St. Scholastica's College, a kayanib a talatátag ning Philippine Accrediting Association of Schools, Colleges and Universities. Mekatanggap yang Level III accreditation kareng eganaganan nang departamentung ampong eskuela. Dinalan ya king kaduang accreditation aniang Febrero 2007. 
Pigmasusian ne ning St. Scholastica's College in kayang kadinalang banua (cenntenial) aniang Deciembri 3, 2006, king Quirino Grandstand king Menila. Tinagun la reng talapanibala (administrators), talaturu (faculty members), magaral ampong miyari (alumni). Miyampang yang music master classes ampong workshop ing Cultures in Harmony, a makikilala kanita anting Music for the People antimong metung a dake ning kapagmasusian ning kadinalan a banua.
Suglung palual.
Ing St. Scholastica's College (SSC o karaniwan, St. Scho) metung yang Catolicu institusiun a pambabai a mitátag kanitang 1906, at palakad da reng Missionary Benedictine Sisters of Tutzing. Atyu iti king metung a loting 3.66 a ektarea king Malate king lakanbalen ning Menila. Padurutnan ne ning Dalang Estrada king pangulu, P. Ocampo king mauli, Singalong king aslagan, ampong Leon Guinto king albugan. Aniang mumuna, elementaria pamu ing kayang yampang. Migumpisa yang mika magaral a sekundaria kanitang 1907, at mibusni ya ing kayang departamentung pang-kolehiyu aniang `1920. Minuna yang miyampang pormal a pamagaral king musika king Filipinas, at bisni ne ing Conservatory of Music kanitang 1907. Lipat ning eskuela yang pambabai ing St. Scholastica's College, maliari la kareng kursung Cognate, Music, Fine Arts, ampong Interior Design. 
Kikilalanan ne ning Department of Education ampo ning Commission on Higher Education ing St. Scholastica's College, a kayanib a talatátag ning Philippine Accrediting Association of Schools, Colleges and Universities. Mekatanggap yang Level III accreditation kareng eganaganan nang departamentung ampong eskuela. Dinalan ya king kaduang accreditation aniang Febrero 2007. 
Pigmasusian ne ning St. Scholastica's College in kayang kadinalang banua (cenntenial) aniang Deciembri 3, 2006, king Quirino Grandstand king Menila. Tinagun la reng talapanibala (administrators), talaturu (faculty members), magaral ampong miyari (alumni). Miyampang yang music master classes ampong workshop ing Cultures in Harmony, a makikilala kanita anting Music for the People antimong metung a dake ning kapagmasusian ning kadinalan a banua.

Windows Media Video:
Ing Windows Media Video (WMV) metung yang compressed video file format para kareng mapilang proprietary codec a gewa ning Microsoft. Mediseniu ya ing orihinal a codec (a ausan dang "WMV") para kareng Internet streaming application, anting metung a kakumpitensia king RealVideo. Deta namang aliwang codec (alimbawa ing "WMV Screen" ampo ing "WMV Image") para karen lang makabukud o partikular a laman. Uli ning kayang pamipara-pareu (standardization) kapamilatan ning Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE), mepili yang gamitan ing WMV para kareng pisikal a format (physical-delivery formats) anti king HD DVD ampong Blu-ray Disc.

Dong Hoi Airport:
Ing Dong Hoi Airport (DMIA), mayayaus mu rin Cảng hàng không Đồng Hới , iya ing peka airport a masilbi keng makaleleng Dong Hoi at ning makalapit a Quang Binh king Vietnam.
Deng Airlines.
Deng tutuking airlines a susuyu keng Dong Hoi Airport (agpang Eneru 2008):

Sorsogon State College:
Ing Sorsogon State College (SSC), ing sadiang Sorsogon College of Arts and Trades (SCAT), ing metung kareng pekamatuang trade school king Filipinas. Mitátag ya antimong Sorsogon Trade School kanitang 1907, Kaibat ning walumpulu’t anam (86) a banua, megi yang metung a kolehiyung pang-estadu (state college) kapamilata’ning Leyi ning Republica (Republic Act) No. 
7666, a inapruban nang Presidenti Fidel V. Ramos. Mayayakit ya ing Kolehiyu king Dalang Magsaysay, Sorsogon Lakanbalen (Magsaysay Street, Sorsogon City). 

Southern Leyte State University:
Ing Southern Leyte State University (SLSU) metung yang unibersidad a pangmaldang (public university) miyayampang miyayaliwang titulung pang-kolehiyu (college degrees). Ing sadiang Southern Leyte State College of Science and Technology, megi yang unibersidad a pang-estadu kapamilatan ning Republic Act 9261 kanitang Marzu 7, 2004. 

Southern Luzon State University:
Ing Southern Luzon State University (SLSU), a sadiang ausan dang Southern Luzon Polytechnic College (SLPC), metung yang pipagaralan pangmaldang alang sekta king Balen ning Lucban, lalawigan ning Quezon. Bibilugan de reng pitung kolehiyu: ing College of Allied Medicine College of Teacher Education [CTE, College of Engineering College of Industrial Technology [COIT, College of Arts and Sciences College of Business Administration [CBA ampo ing College of Agriculture . Atin ya muring pitung satellite campuses king Tagkawayan, Alabat, Polilio, Lucena, Tiaong, ampong Infanta. Atin yang apulung libung (10 000) ining eskuelang pikabaluan king masanting dang resulta kareng iksamin a pamanguang lisensia (licensure examination).

Technological Institute of the Philippines:
Ing Technological Institute of the Philippines o "TIP" metung yang pribadung institusiun ning matas a pipagaralan king Filipinas a pikabaluan kareng larangan ning w:engineering. Tetag de aniang Febrero 8, 1962 ning metung a grupu da reng talaturu a pamuntukan nang Engr. 
Demetrio A. Quirino Jr.. Atin yang aduang campus ing TIP king Keragulang Menila, ing TIP Manila ampo ing TIP Quezon City. 

Technological University of the Philippines:
Ing Technological University of the Philippines (TUP) metung yang unibersidad a pang-estandung bibilugan da reng apat a campus: ing TUP-Manila, ing TUP-Taguig, ing TUP-Cavite, ampo ing TUP-Visayas. Atin ya muring makabukud a dake ing unibersidad, ing Integrated Research and Training Center (Piyagum a Sentru ning Pamanyaliksik ampong Pamagsane). 

Trinity University of Asia:
The Trinity University of Asia, formerly the Trinity College of Quezon City, is an academic institution located in Quezon City, Philippines, and established in 1963. It was raised to university status on July 18, 2006 under its current administrator, Dr. Carlito S. Puno. The University goes by the dictum “dedication to knowing and doing truth.”
Ing Trinity University of Asia, a sadiang Trinity College of Quezon City, metung yang institusion ning pamagaral a mayayakit king Quezon Lakanbalen, Filipinas, at mitátag kanitang 1963. Megi yang unibersidad kanitang Julio 18, 2006 lalam ning kayang salukuyang talapanibala, i Dr. Carlito S. Puno. 

Tomas del Rosario College:
Ing Tomas del Rosario College metung yang pribadung kolehiyu king Filipinas.
Tomas del Rosario Academy ing sadia nang lagiu. Megi yang kolehiyu aniang 1994. Ibat la king Balanga Lakanbalen ampo reng kasiping a balen deng magaral keti.

University of Asia and the Pacific:
Ing University of Asia and the Pacific (pamikuyad: UA&P) metung yang privadung universidad king Filipinas. Atiyu king J. Escriva Drive king Bgy. Ugong Norte, Ortigas Center, Pasig Lakanbalen ing kayang Ortigas Campus. Bayu ya meging universidad kanitang 1995, Center for Research and Communication (CRC) ing lagiu na.
Panibalan ning Opus Dei, metung a Personal Prelature ning Pisambang Catolicu, ing pamagsane nang ispiritual ampong pang-doctrina.

Advanced Systems Format:
Ing Advanced Systems Format (sadiang Advanced Streaming Format, Active Streaming Format) ing 's proprietary digital audio/digital video container format ning Microsoft, a magagamit lalu na king mediang mamagus (streaming media). Kayabe ya king Windows Media framework o balangkas a Windows Media ing ASF.

University of Bohol:
Ing University of Bohol o U.B. metung yang pribadu, 
alang sekta, ampong w:co-educational a institusion ning matas a pamagaral king Tagbilaran Lakanbalen,Bohol, Filipinas. 
Mitátag ya king lalam ning lagiung Rafael Palma College aniang 1946. Atiyu king Dalang Maria Clara ing sentrung gusali (main building), at malapit la karin deng mapilan a departamentu. Iti ing mumunang universidad king lalawigan ning Bohol.

Tupa:
Deng matunud a tupa (domestic sheep king Ingles) animal lang maki apat a bitis, ruminant ampong mammal a sesesen da reng tau ba rong pakinabangnan. Kalupa da lang paris a taliring bitis (even-toed) deng aliwang ruminant. Mapaliaring menibat la kareng maliap (wild) a mouflon ning Europa ampong Asia deng karaniwan a matunud a tupa.
Ing tupa ing metung kareng minunang diling animal a apatunud ning tau para king agrikultura. Keraklan, sesesen do reti para king karelang bulbul ampo ing karelang karni. Ing bulbul ning tupa o wool ing pekamagamitan king sanumang animal, at keraklan, kukuanan da iti kapamilatan ning pamanurud. Maulaga pa murin ing pamangamit kareng tupa para king karelang bulbul ampong karni; neng kai, magagamit murin ing karelang balat o gatas, at gagamitan da la murin deti king pamanyaliksik at siensia. 
Sesesen do reng tupa kareng alus eganaganang lugal a maki tau, at maulaga ing papil da kareng dakal a sibilisasiun. Ngening panaun tamu, ing Australia, New Zealand, deng bansang Patagonian, ampo ing Britania deng bangsang maralas a miyuyugne king pamanyese kareng tupa.
Suglung palual.
Sese Animal

Capra (genus):
Ing genus a Capra metung yang genus da reng mammal a bibilugan da reng siam a species, kayabe no reng Ibex, West Caucasian Tur, East Caucasian Tur, Markhor, ampong Maliap a Kambing (Wild Goat). 
Ing animal a ausan dang matunud a kambing (domestic goat, "Capra aegagrus hircus") metung yang pepatunud a subspecies ning Maliap a Kambing. Deng eganaganang kayabe king genus a "Capra" bovid la (kayabe king familiang Bovidae) ampong caprin o goat antelope (deng kayabe king subfamily Caprinae). Ruminant la murin deti. Apat ya suput o dake ing karelang dungus, a maulaga king pamaglaso king pamangan. Lasawan na niti ing pengan da, potang kai isuka ("regurgitate") ra at langutan pasibayu, bayu ra yakmul iti bang lasawan pasibayu. 
Potru ing aus da king lalaking kambing, gaindu ya ing babaing maki anak, at biseru ne man ing anak a kambing.
Lipat ning kayang lagiu, e re tuturing a tutung kambing deng sientista ing Rocky Mountain Goat, uling kayabe ya king genus a "Oreamnos".

Tagak:
Ing Tagak keng English a amanu Great Egret, o "Ardea alba", neng misan mayayaus ya naman kareng lagyu keng amanung English bilang ing Great White Egret, White Heron, o kaya Common Egret, metung yang lusung-lusung a tagak, mayaykit kareng mamalimaling (tropical) at maligamgam a dake ning yatu, agiang mayayakit ya king mauling Europa at Asia. Mayayaus yang Kōtuku king New Zealand. Neng misan mababaligo la keng Great White Heron a atiu Florida, nung nu iti metung yang menaliwa keng Great Blue Heron. 
Dalerayan.
FRECELTY

Maragul a Auk:
Ing Maragul a Auk o Great Auk "Pinguinus impennis", a sadiang kayabe king genus "Alca"), metung yang ayup a mewalang laganas aniang libutad ning kalabingsiam a siglu o dilanua (19th century). Ya kabud species ibat king genus "Pinguinus", nung nu ating kayabeng higanting auk ning dayatmalat a Atlanticu, a kinabie angga king kapanaunan tamu. Ausan de muring "garefowl" (ibat king Matuang Norse a "geirfugl", a mangabaldugang "spear-bird" o "ayup a tandus"), o "penguin" (bayu la meyaus king lagiung ita deng ayup a ausan dang makanian ngeni).
Dakal lang dakal deng Maragul a Auk a mayayakit kareng islang malapit king aslagang (eastern) Canada, Iceland, Norway, Ireland ampong Gran Bretania, bayu la megisan uli ning pamangasu. Ukulan da, basi kareng butul a meyakit kareng tambakan king Florida, a pamisan-misan, miraras la angga karin king mauli (south) deng Maragul a Auk angga aniang kalabing apat a siglu o dilanua (14th century) . 

Genus:
Ing genus (ibat king ; Latin "genus" "lipi, pamilia, uri") metung yang mababang lebel o balitang a taxonomic rank (ranggu king pamitinduk-tinduk) a magagamit kareng organismung mabie ampong fossil.
Kalupa da reng halus eganaganang taxonomic unit o dake ning pamitinduk-tinduk, maliari lang pitnan deng genus kareng subgenus. Ing species ing pekamaragul a taxonomic unit king lalam ning genus.
Alang patugut a dibati nung makananu yang eksaktung masalan o dinan kabaldugan ("define") ing genus. 
Lagiung generic.
Ing lagiung generic o generic name dake ning lagiung siyentipiku o scientific name para king metung a organismu o mabibie. Iti metung yang lagiung sasalamin king klasipikasiun o pamitinduk-tinduk ning organismu kapamilatan ning pamigrupu-grupu da reng mikanlapit pamikakamaganak a organismu. Pane yang Latin ing lagiung generic (a nung wari king lagiu ning tau ya pin ing pilidu), at yang mumuna kareng aduang lagiu king lagiung siyentipiku (itang species ing kadua). Pane yang makasulat a maragul (capitalized) ing mumunang letra ning lagiung generic, kabang e re bitasang susulat a capital ing mumunang letra ning lagiu ning species. Alimbawa, "Canis lupis" ya ing lagiu nang siyentipiku ning lobu (wolf). Ing Canis, a mangabaldugang asu, ing generic name ning lobu, uling canine (kapamilia ning asu) ya ing lobu. 

Species:
King biolohia, ing species metung ya kareng pekamaugalang unit ning 
pamitinduk-tinduk da reng mabibie (biological classification), at metung yang ranggung pang-taxonomy. Ing species metung yang grupu da reng organismu a maki kagiwan a magpalipi o magparakal (breed) at mika ának a maliari muring mika anak. Keraklan, makagiu ne ining pamagmasala (definition), dapot neng kai, gagamit la pang mas eksaktu o aliwang sukad para kaniti, anti ing pamilupa ra king DNA o king itsura o pamibalangkas. Nung ating kaurian ("traits" o "characteristics") a mas partikular o makabage king metung a lugal, maliari ya pang pitnan ing species kareng subspecies. 
Neng kai, pareu la kareng species deng karaniwan a lagiu da reng tanaman o animal: alimbawa, deng leun, walrus o "tanaman a camphor" - magagamit ya king metung species ing balang metung kareng lagiung deti. Oneng dakal la mu naman deng karaniwang lagiu ("common name") a e eksaktung makaparikil king metung a species. Alimbawa, ing "usa" magagamit ya king e magkulang king atlung pulu't apat (34) a species, kayabe no reng Eld's Deer, Red Deer ampong Wapiti (Elk). Aniang purmeru, tuturing dong metung mung species deng aduang tauling mebanggit; papakit na niti nung makananung maliaring maliwa ing angganan da reng species neng miraragdagan ing beluan a sientipiku. 
Makalalam ya (ampong bibilug) king metung a genus ing balang species. Ini ibat ya king paniwalang mas mikanlapit la pamikamaganak deng species a kayabe king metung a genus kesa karetang makabili kareng aliwang genus. Atin la ngang lagiung maki aduang dake o binomial name ing eganaganang species. Iti bibilugan ne ning generic name ampo ning specific name (o specific epithet). Itang mumuna, yang peka-pilidu, at ing kadua, ya ing lagiu na mismu, nung wari king tau. Mupin, mumuna ya keti ing pilidu, at kadua ya itang sariling lagiu. Alimbawa, ing "Felis domesticus" ing lagiu nang sientipiku o "scientific name" karaniwan a pusa. 
Maulaga ya king pamituldu ampong pamaniubuk kareng teoria king biolohia, ampo king pamaniukad king pamiyaliwa-liwa ("diversity") ning bie ing metung a magamitan a kabaldugan ning katayang "species", ampo reng ayasahan a paralan para king pamangilala kareng species. Sadia, kailangan lang panigaralan deng dakal a alimbwa ning metung a species a makamunikala (proposed) ba lang makilala deng kaurian a pareu o lupa-lupa ("unifying characters") bayu ya mituring a species iti. Keraklan, masákit mamie ranggung pang-taxonomia o taxonomic ranking deng species a mewala na, at balu ra namu kareng fossil. Nung alarawan da ne deng sientipiku at adinan lagiu ing metung a species, maliari neng ausan king kayang binomial name o lagiung maki aduang dake. 
Nanupata, anti ing sinabi nang Charles Darwin, 
Uli ning pamagkasákit da king pamagmasala o depinisiun king kabaldugan ampong pamamilang king bilang da reng miyayaliwang species, tatantian dang maki atiu king pilatan ning adua (2) ampong dinalan (100) a miliung ing bilang da reng species. 

University of Caloocan City:
Ing University of Caloocan City (UCC) atiu king Sangandaan, Caloocan Lakanbalen, Filipinas.
Mayayakit ya ing UCC-Main king Sangandaan Annexes, Tandang Sora, Camarin ampong Buena Park. Megi yang University of Caloocan City ing Caloocan City Polytechnic College, a mitátag kanitang 1971, aniang 2004.
Deng Bachelor's of Science degrees in Industrial Education (BSIE) ampong B.S. Business Technology (BSBT) ing minuna nang kursu.
Aniang mumuna, atiu king metung a gusali king Caloocan High School ing eskuela. Inalis de king kasalungsungan nang lugal (king General San. Miguel St. Sangandaan, Caloocan City) aniang mesilab ya itang mumuna nang gusali.
Aniang mitikdo ya ing Caloocan City Polytechnic College (CPC) aniang 1971, miyayampang yang kursung tidua banua. Migumpisa yang mika kursung ti-apat a banua aniang 1975. Bachelor of Science degrees in Industrial Education (BSIE) ampong B.S. Business Technology (BSBT) ing minuna nang kursung apat a banua. 
Aniang Eneru 23, 2004, miapruban ya ing Ordinance 1020-2003, a minie paintulut king kapamahalan a lokal a gawan neng ganap a universidad ing Caloocan City Polytechnic College. Agpang kaniting leyi, mayaus yang University of Caloocan City iting institusion (ing mumunang pangmaldang universidad king Caloocan Lakanbalen), a dinan nang pondu ning munisipiu.

University of the Cordilleras:
Ing University of the Cordilleras, a sadiang Baguio Colleges Foundation (BCF), metung yang privadung universidad king Baguio Lakanbalen, Filipinas. Kilala re ing universidad a Sentru ning Pamagaral king Pangulu ("Center of Education in the North") uling atiu iti king Baguio Lakanbalen, metung a ciudad o lakanbalen king pangulu nang dake ning Filipinas. Malapit ya king palengki ning lakanbalen ing universidad, ampo king Our Lady of Atonement Church (Baguio Cathedral), ampo reng hotel, restoran, ampong mall.

Universidad de Manila:
Ing Universidad de Manila (pamikuyad: UDM) metung yang universidad a pangmalda king Menila, Filipinas.
Ing sentrung campus ning UDM, nung nu ya mayayakit ing Gusaling Kapanibalan (Administration Building) ning w:Division of City Schools-Manila, atiu king libutad ning Mehan Garden kasiping ning Aklatan ning Lakanbalen ning Menila (Manila City Library) ampo ing Light Rail Transit (LRT) "Central Terminal". Bukud king sentrung campus, atin yang sanga o satellite center kareng miayaliwang dake ning Menila ing UDM anti king Escolta, Recto, Del Pan, San Andres, Dapitan ampong Tayuman.

Familia (biolohia):
King klasipikasiun (o pamitinduk-tinduk) a pang-biolohia, ing familia (Castila ampong Latin: "familia") metung yang ranggung pang-taxonomia. Magdependi ing eksaktung detalle king Nomenclature Code (sistema ning pamamie lagiu) a gagamitan.
Amlat ning konseptu.
Bayu ya mung meimbentu ing familia antimong ranggu king taxonomia king pilatan ning orden ampo ning genus. 
Pikudta ne ning botanist a Frances a i botanist Pierre Magnol ing katayang "familial" ektang kayang obrang "Prodromus historiae generalis plantarum, in quo familiae plantarum per tabulas disponuntur", nung nu nala inaus "familiae" (plural ning "familia") deng pitungpulu't anam (76) a grupu da reng tanaman a kikilalanan na kareng kayang table. Aniang panaun a ita, "in statu nascendi" ya pa ing konseptu ning ranggi king taxonomia, at ketang pawaga (preface) king kayang "Prodromus", abanggit nang Magnol ing pamitipun-tipun da reng kayang familia kareng mas mangaragul a "genera" (plural o pangmarakal ning "genus"), a marayu king terminung magagamit ngeni.
Manibat aniang umpisa ning kaduang pulung siglu o dilanua (20th century), gagamitan da ne anti ngeni ing katayang iti. Makatuldu la king sistema king pamamamie lagiu kareng botanicaltanaman ampo kareng animal ing pamangamit na niti, ampo itang makaparikil a wakas da reng lagiung bibilug king kategoriang iti
Pekilagiu da la king metung a type genus (genus a pekakatawan ning familia) deng alus eganagana kareng familia: lelangan da la kapamilatan ning pamandagdag king "-idae" (kareng animal) o "-aceae" (kareng tanaman) ketang peka-tangke (stem) ning lagiu ning genus (Alimbawa, king tau, ing genus a 'Homo' kayabe ya king familiang Hominidae). Deng makatuki ila ring makaliban (exceptions) king patakaran a iti: 

Orden (biolohia):
King klasipikasiun king biolohia, ing orden (ibat king Castila; ibat king katayang Latin a "ordo") metung yang ranggu king taxonomia a atiu king pilatan ning pinduan ampo ning familia. Ing superorder atiu king pilatan ning "pinduan" ampo ning "orden". Magdependi la king Nomenclature Code deng detalle ning pormal a pormal a pamagpalagiu (formal nomenclature). Magwakas la king -iformes deng lagiu da reng order, bukud kareng mammals, invertebrates, ampong amphibians. 
Amlat ning konseptu.
Antimong metung a partikular a ranggu ning klasipikasiun king biolohia, a maki sariling lagiu (at e mu antimong "mas matas a genus" ("(genus summum)", ing orden pepakilala ne ning botanistang Aleman a i August Bachmann king kayang klasipikasiun da reng tanaman. I Carl Linné ing mumunang ginamit kaniti king king pamipitna da reng atlung kaarian ning Kalikasan (mineral, tanaman ampong animal) ketang kayang "Systema Naturae "(1735, 1st. Ed.).
Kareng milimbag a maki kaugnayan king botania king Francia, manibat ketang "Familles naturelles des plantes" (1763) nang Michel Adanson' angga aniang wakas ning kalabing siam a siglu o dilanua *29th century), gagamitan de ing "famille" antimong katumbas ning "ordo" king Latin. Deretsu deng pepalino ing pamitumbas da reti ketang "Lois de la nomenclature botanique" (1868) a sinulat nang Alphonse De Candolle, ing inalilan ning kasalungsungan a magagamit a "International Code of Botanical Nomenclature". 
Ketang mumunang internasional a "Rules" of w:botanical nomenclature of 1906 (patakaran ning pamagpalagiu da reng tanaman), ing katayang "familia" mirinan yang ranggung tutulduan ning katayang Frances a "famille", kabang ing katayang orden ("ordo") makareserba ya king mas matas a ranggung maralas dang ausang "cohors" aniang kalabingsiam a dilanua (19th century). 
King zoolohia, mas e mamaliwa ing pamangamit kareng orden king sistema nang Linnaeus. Ing burinang sabian niti, deng orden ketang dake nang pang-zoolohia ning "Systema Naturae" makaparikil la kareng natural a grupu. Magagamit la pa murin deng lagiu da reng orden a ginamit na, alimbawa ing Lepidoptera para kareng kambubulag ampong mariposa o talubang, o Diptera para king orden da reng lango, yamuk, ampong niknik (gnats).

Kamias:
Ing Kamias (Averrhoa bilimbi), bantug mu naman bilang bilimbi, (at makanyan mu rin bilang bimbiri keng Sinhala ), cucumber tree o tree sorrel metung yang malapit a kamaganak da reng carambola, ning genus Averrhoa, family Oxalidaceae.
Nu Daragul at Makakalat.
Menibatan mumuna king Moluccas, Indonesia; ing specie ini magagambul ya o mayayakit ya kareng bagya-malyap kabilugan Indonesia, ing Filipinas, Sri Lanka, Bangladesh at Myanmar. Atiu kadalasan mayayakit kareng aliwang Maulingaslagan Asiang bangsa. King India, nung nu keraklan mayayakit ya kareng mula, ing taranati o balimbing, mengaragul ya kareng lampung a mamalimaling labuad ning bangsa.

Pinduan (biolohia):
Ing pinduan (class king Ingles) metung yang ranggung pang-taxonomia king klasipikasiun king biolohia da reng organismu, a mas matas king orden at mas mababa king phylum.
Alibawa, ing Mammalia ing pinduan nung nu la makabili deng asu. Chordata (animal a maki notochord) naman ing phylum da reti, at Carnivora (animal a mamangan karni) ne man ing kayang orden. 
Amlat ning konseptu.
Antimong metung a makakawaning kategoria ning klasipikasiun king biolohia a maki sariling lagiu (at e mu kabud "mas matas a genus" "(genus summum)", ing class o pinduan pepakilala neng Joseph Pitton de Tournefort, metung a botanistang Frances, ketang kayang klasipikasiun o pamitinduk-tinduk da reng tanaman (a linto ketang "Eléments de botanique" kanitang 1694). I Carolus Linnaeus ing minunag ginamit kaniti kareng eganaganang atlung kaarian ning Kalikasan (mineral, tanaman, ampong animal) ketang kayang "Systema Naturae" (1735, 1st. Ed.). Manibat kanita, mituring yang pekamatas a ranggu ning herarkiya (sistema ning ranggu da bageng mabibie) angang mipakilala la aniang kalabingsiam a siglu, nung kapilan la linto deng "embranchement" anti reng phyla, ampo ing division. 

Phylum (biolohia):
King biolohia, ing phylum (plural: phyla) metung yang ranggung pang-taxonomia king lalam ning kaarian at king babo ning pinduan o class. Indam de ing "phylum" king Griegung "phylai", deng grupu da reng magbotung makabasi king lipi (clan) kareng lakanbalen-bangsa ("city-state") king Grecia o Greece kanitang minuna. Ing phylum ing pekamaragul a grupu da reng animal ampong aliwang mabibie a maki kaurian a pang-ebolusion, oneng den mismung phylum maliari la muring mi-grupu o mi-abeyabe "superphylum" (al., ing Ecdysozoa a maki walung phylum, kayabe la reng arthropod ampong w:roundworm; ampo ing Deuterostomia kayabe la reng echinoderm, chordate, hemichordates ampong xenoturbellae). Maliari tamung sabian a deng phylum gu-grupu na la o titipunan deng animal basi king pangkabilugan (general) a balangkas ning katawan (body plan); ini ing morphological grouping o pami-grupu-grupu basi king karelang pamibalangkas. Uli na niti, lipat ning balamu pami-aliwa-liwa da reng organismu basi king itsura dang pang-lual, pitinduk-tinduk (ka-"classify") da la reti kareng phylum basi king pamibalangkas dang pang-kilub. Alimbawa, agiang balamu aliwa lang aliwa, pareu lang kayabe king Arthropoda deng ema ampong babagua, kabang deng bulati king gabun ampo reng tapeworms, a pareu tabas, ibat la king Annelida (king mumuna) ampong Platyhelminthes (ing kadua). Lipat ning paintulutan na ning w:International Code of Botanical Nomenclature ing pamangamit ning katayang "Phylum" para kareng tanaman, ing katayang "Division" ing keraklan dang gagamitan deng botanista. 
Deng kilalang diling phylum da reng animal ila reng Mollusca, Porifera, Cnidaria, Platyhelminthes, Nematoda, Annelida, Arthropoda, Echinodermata, ampong Chordata, ing phylum nung nu la kayabe deng tau. Agiang atlu lang pulu't lima (35) deng phylum, kayabe la kareting siam deng keraklan kareng species. Bukud la mung king dayatmalat mayayakit deng dakal a phylum, at metung ya mu ing phylum a e bitasang mayayakit king kadayatmalatan: ing Onychophora o velvet worms. Ing bayung diling metuklas a phylum ya pin ing Cycliophora a metuklas mu aniang 1993; atlu la mung phylum deng mediskubri aniang milabasan a dilanua.
Ing w:Cambrian explosion metung yang tutung maragul a pamibukadkad da reng uri da reng mabibie a miliari pilatan ning mangan limang dalan atlung (530) and ampong limang dalan aduang pulung (520) miliun a banua ing milabas; during this time organisms similar to, but not strictly members of, modern phyla existed; kabang lato la reng aliwa king Ediacaran biota, e la pa mikasundu nung atiu na la baya itang maleparan a pamaniabug (explosion) king bilang da reng mabibie. King pangalabas ning panaun, mamaliwa ing papil da reng miayaliwang phylum. Alimbawa, aniang Cambrian, arthropod la reng makababong mangaragul a animal (dominant megafauna), kabang ngeni, den namang vertebrate (chordata) ing dominanti ngeni kareng mangaragul a animal. Den pa muring arthropod ing dakal dili angga ngeni nung bilang ing pisasabian.
Maralas, magmunikala lang bayung phylum o maglako la kareng sadiang phylum deng talapanialiksik ampo reng taxonomista kapamilatan ning pamisanib ra kareng aduang phylum bang maglalang metung a bayu, o pamiabe ning metung a malati ketang mas maragul. Neng misan, maglalang lang bayung phylum para king metung a bayung tuklas a organismung balamu e bage king sanu mang phylum a melalang na, dapot kreklan, e ra makaing buri ing gagawang bayung phylum. Maralas, maliari lang isingit king metung a phylum a atiu na agpang king metung a kaurian (characteristic) a e ra apansinan aniang purmeru, o kapamilatan ning pamagparagul king phylum nung nu ya pekamalapit ya ing bayung organisum. Malagad da la mung tatanggapan tambing o deng eganagana deng pamanaliling anti kaniti, at maralas maragul ing dibati kareng kasulatan a sientipiku. Uli na niti, tutung masákit ing mamie eksaktung tala o listaan da reng phylum, o angiang mung sabian ing bilang da reti. 
Suglung palual.
Etymology:

Kaarian (biolohia:
Ing taxonomiang pang-biolohia, ing metung a kaarian (kingdom king Ingles, regnum king Latin) metung yang ranggung pang-taxonomia a yang pekamatas a ranggu king malambat a panaun, o king bayung sistemang titlung sakup o three-domain system), ing ranggu king lalam ning sakup o domain. Mapipitna ya kareng mas mangalating grupung ausan dang phylum (o kareng mapilang kabilian, mayayaus lang "division" deti). King salukuyan, maki sistema lang bibilugan da reng anam a kaarian deng libru kareng eskuela king America, (deng Animalia, Plantae, Fungi, Protista, Archaea, ampong Eubacteria), kabang lima no man deng kareng libru king Britania ampong Australia (Animalia, Plantae, Fungi, Protista, ampong Prokaryota o Monera).
Adua la rang kaarian da reng mabibieng kikilalanan nang Carolus Linnaeus: Animalia para kareng animal, ampong Vegetabilia para kareng tanaman (binggitan no muring Linnaeus deng mineral, a binili na king katlung kaarian, ing Mineralia). Pinitna neng Linnaeus ing balang kingdom kareng pinduan (classes), a kaibat pitipun na kareng phylum karing animal, ampong division karing tanaman. 
King lambatan, linto ing ulaga ning pamialiwa da reng prokaryote ampong eukaryote, at pepasikat de ri Stanier ampong van Niel ing munikala nang Edouard Chatton kanitang dekadang 1960 .

Kaarian (biolohia):
Ing taxonomiang pang-biolohia, ing metung a kaarian (kingdom king Ingles, regnum king Latin) metung yang ranggung pang-taxonomia a yang pekamatas a ranggu king malambat a panaun, o king bayung sistemang titlung sakup o three-domain system), ing ranggu king lalam ning sakup o domain. Mapipitna ya kareng mas mangalating grupung ausan dang phylum (o kareng mapilang kabilian, mayayaus lang "division" deti). King salukuyan, maki sistema lang bibilugan da reng anam a kaarian deng libru kareng eskuela king America, (deng Animalia, Plantae, Fungi, Protista, Archaea, ampong Eubacteria), kabang lima no man deng kareng libru king Britania ampong Australia (Animalia, Plantae, Fungi, Protista, ampong Prokaryota o Monera).
Adua la rang kaarian da reng mabibieng kikilalanan nang Carolus Linnaeus: Animalia para kareng animal, ampong Vegetabilia para kareng tanaman (binggitan no muring Linnaeus deng mineral, a binili na king katlung kaarian, ing Mineralia). Pinitna neng Linnaeus ing balang kingdom kareng pinduan (classes), a kaibat pitipun na kareng phylum karing animal, ampong division karing tanaman. 
King lambatan, linto ing ulaga ning pamialiwa da reng prokaryote ampong eukaryote, at pepasikat de ri Stanier ampong van Niel ing munikala nang Edouard Chatton kanitang dekadang 1960 .

Sakup (biolohia):
King taxonomiang pang-biolohia, ing sakup o king Ingles, domain (a mayayaus muring superregnum, superkingdom, o empire) ing pekamataus a ranggung pang-taxonomia da reng organismu, a mas matas kesa king kaarian. Agpang king three-domain system nang Carl Woese a mipakilala aniang 1990, ing Pun ning Bie o Tree of Life bibilugan de reng makatuking sakup o domain: Archaea, Eubacteria ampong Eukaryota. Masasalamin kanitang pamanayus karing taxa ing pekamaulagang pamiyaliwa-liwang makayamut king ebolusion a mayayakit king genome. Ating mapilang alternatibu o aliwang mimunikalang klasipikasiun ning bie:
Uling keraklan makabasi la reti king pamanigaral kareng impormasiun king genetic sequence ampong cladistics, mapaliaring mika bayu pang pamanayus o sistemang mimunikala.

Carolus Linnaeus:
I Carolus Linnaeus (ing kayang lagiu king pormang Latin) o Carl Linnaeus (Carl Linné, a kilala murin aniang mibulalag yang mapia ("ennoblement") antimong , May 23 new style (12 May old style), 1707 - January 10, 1778) metung yang botanistang, talapanulu (physician) ampong zoolohistang Sueco o Swedish a mitikdo king pundasyun ning makabayung sistema ning w:Binomial nomenclature (pamipalagyung tidwa lagyu). Ya ing ibpa ning makabayung taxonomia, ampo ing metung kareng ibpa ing makabayung ekolohia (lon ya ing History of ecology). 
Mibait ya i Linnaeus king marangle ("countryside") ning Småland, king mauling (southern) Sweden. Ing tata na ing mumuna karelang mikakamaganak a ginamit permanenting pilidu. Bayu ita, itang patronymic naming system ing gagamitan da, nung nu manibat ing pilidu da reng ának king lagiu da reng karelang tata, da reng bangsa king Scandinavia. Kinua neng tata na ing lagiung pormang Latin a Linnaeus ibat ketang maragul a dutung a linden ketang gabun ning pamilia. Megaral ya keraklan king Uppsala University i Linnaeus, at migumpisa yang magdiskursu king botania karin aniang 1730. Mebie ya kareng aliwang bansa manibat 1735 anggang 1738, at megaral ya ampong linimbag king minunang edisiun ning kayang "Systema Naturae" king Olanda o Netherlands. Mibalik ya king Sweden, at megi yang profesor ning botania king Uppsala. Aniang dekadang 1740, peparala de bang lumibut king Sweden bang maintun ampong mitinduk o mag-grupu (classify) kareng animal, tanaman ampong mineral. Mekalimbag yang dakal a libru. Aniang mate ya, kikilalanan de antimong metung kareng bantug a sientista ning panaung ita. 
Peparala ne kaya ning filosofong Frances a i Jean-Jacques Rousseau: "Sabian mu kayang ala kung kilalang mas mapia pang tau king yatu." ("Tell him I know no greater man on earth.") Sinulat na naman ning talasulat a Aleman a i Johann Wolfgang von Goethe: "Liban kang Shakespeare ampo kang Spinoza, ala kung kilalang taung e na mabieng mas maragul impluensia kanaku."("With the exception of Shakespeare and Spinoza, I know no one among the no longer living who has influenced me more strongly.") Ing talasulat ibat Sweden a i August Strindberg: "Ing tutu, i Linnaeus metung yang poetang mikatagun a meging naturalista". ("Linnaeus was in reality a poet who happened to become a naturalist".)
King lagiu da reng species, ing "author abbreviation" a L. ing magagamit bang ipabalung i Linnaeus ing autoridad a minie ketang lagiu.

Taba:
Deng taba (fats king Ingles) metung lang maleparan a grupu da reng compound a keraklan malalaso ("solube") kareng paglasong organic (organic solvents) at keraklan e malalaso king danum. Basi king sangkap dang kemikal, bibilugan da lang triesters ning glycerol ampong fatty acid deng taba. Maliari lang likidu o solidu king karaniwang temperatura (room temperature) deng taba, dependi king karelang pamibalangkas (structure) ampong sangkap (composition). Lipat ning gagamitan da la reng katayang "laru" ("oils"), "taba" ("fats"), ampong "lipid" ba lang tunggen deng taba, maralas, gagamitan de ing "laru" kareng tabang likidu king karaniwang temperatura, kabang "taba" no man deng tabang solidu king karaniwang temperatura. Ita namang "lipid," magagamit ya kareng likidu o solidung taba. Gagamitan de ing katayang "laru" king sanumang sangkap ("substance") a e misasamut king danum at kasalat laru, antimo ing petroleu (o krudu) ampo ing heating oil (larung pamaling bale), nanuman ing kayang pamibalangkas a kemikal (chemical structure).
Metung lang kategoria da reng lipid deng taba, a makikilala kareng aliwang taba kapamilatan ning karelang pamibalangkas a kemikal ampong kaurian a pisikal (physical properties). Maulaga ya ining kategoria da reng molecule kareng miayaliwang uri ning bie uling magsilbi ya kareng papil a pangbalangkas (structural) ampong pang-metabolismu. Maulaga lang dake ning kakanan da ring keraklan kareng heterotroph (kayabe no reng tau) deti. Lalasawan do king katawan ding enzyme a ausan dang lipase deng taba o lipid. 
Kayabe la kareng tabang ibat kareng animal a kakanan deng w:lard (tabang babi), larung asan (fish oil), ampong mantikilia o ghee. Makukua la reti kareng taba king gatas, karni, o king lalam ning balat ning animal. Alimbawa no man kareng mapapangan a taba ibat kareng tanaman deng larung ibat king soya bean, mirasol (sunflower), sesame, ngungut, oliva ampoong aliwang vegetable oil. Gagamitan da la murin deng margarina ampong vegetable shortening, lalu na king pamag-ornu (baking). Maliaring lang pintan kareng w:saturated fat ampong w:unsaturated fat deti.

Universidad de Sta. Isabel:
Ing Universidad de Sta. Isabel (USI) metung yang privadung universidad a Catolicu ampong Vincentian a bandi ra ampong palakad deng Daughters of Charity king Naga Lakanbalen, Filipinas. Telakad de reng mumunang limang Daughters of Charity aniang miras la king bangsa kanitang Enero 1868 lalam ning Obispo ning Caceres, i Most Rev. Francisco Gainza, O.P., ing talatátag o fundador ning Colegio de Sta. Isabel kapamilatan ning metung a kautusan (royal order) ibat king Reina Isabel II (Queen Isabella II) ning Espania.
Mibusni ya kanitang Abril 12 1869 ing eskuela. Ing Colegio de Sta. Isabel ing mumunang pipagaralan a normal para kareng bábai king Filipinas ampo king Mauli Aslagang Asia (Southeast Asia).
Megi yang universidad ing sadiang Colegio de Sta. Isabel aniang Agostu 2001. 

University of Cebu:
Ing University of Cebu (UC) metung yang pipagaralan a atiu king Cebu Lakanbalen, Filipinas. Apat la reng kayang campus: ing Sentrung Campus (Main Campus) king Sanciangko St., ing Banilad Campus king Brgy. Banilad Road, ing UC-LM Campus (a mangabaldugang Lapu-Lapu/Mandaue), ampo ing UC-METC (a mangabaldugang Maritime Educational Training Center) king Alumnos St., Mambaling. Atin ya muring campus a ala na, itang sadiang UC-South Campus king Sanciangko St., a lesakan da kanitang manga 2000. Titikdo re ngeni ketang lugal a pitalarakan na ing "Elizabeth Mall" (E-Mall), ing cumpaniang kapareu na makibandi ning eskuela.
Suglung palual.
University of Cebu Official Website

University of the Assumption:
Ing University of the Assumption (U.A.) metung yang privadu ampong Catolicung universidad ning Arquidiocesis a atiu king Lakanbalen ning San Fernando, Pampanga, Filipinas. Mitátag ya kanitang Enero 12, 1963. Ya kabud a universidad a Catolicu ning metung a arquidiocesis king Filipinas ampo king Asia. 
Amlat.
Aniang minuna, "Assumption Junior College" ing lagiu ning universidad, at atiu king katlung pisu ("third floor") ning Gusaling Assumpta king kabalenan ning San Fernando. Panibalan neng Sr. Gunfrida Schneyer, O.S.B. ing eskuela, a yang Superior ning Community of Missionary Benedictine Sisters of Tutzing (Alemania). Maki 275 (aduang dalan pitumpulu't lima) yang magaral ing colegiu aniang magumpisa ya. Deng mumunang kursu yampang na ila pin deti: Bachelor of Arts, Bachelor of Science in Commerce, Bachelor of Science in Education, ampong Bachelor of Science in Elementary Education. 
Aniang 1965, minalis ya king kasalungsungan nang lugal king Unisite Subdivision king Barangay Del Pilar ing colegiu. Aniang panaun a ita, bukud mung ing Puno Hall ing gusaling makatikdo king campus. Kanita yang banuang 1965 oficial a mekilala antimong "Assumption College of Pampanga" iting institusion.
Pari ya ing tinalan king eskuela kaibat ning pamagbayu ning kapanibalan kanitang 1966. Ikit ning administasiun nang Rev. Fr. Aniceto M. Franco, a decanu ampong rector ketang panaun a ita, ing pamangailangan a mitátag escuelang secundaria ampong elementaria king campus. Sinaup la king pamanibala kareng aduang departamentu di Sr. Mary Philip Ryan, O.P. ampo reng Madreng Dominican ning Our Lady of Remedies. I Sr. Mary Philip Ryan ing superiora ning comunidad a Dominicanu, at maragul ing karelang papil da reng kayanib na niting comunidad king pamanibala ampong pamanuru king institusion. Miragdag ya kareng sadiang cursung yampang ning escuela ing Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering kantiang 1969. Mitikdo la murin deng Gusaling Ryan ampong Benedictine ampo ing gymnasium aniang panaun a manibala ya i Fr. Franco. 
I Rev. Fr. Octavio M. Ramos ing meging mumunang pamuntuk ning colegiu kanitang 1974. Aniang terminu na, penigobran na ing pamangilala da reng karagdagan a cursu, alimbawa deng Bachelor of Science in Nursing, Bachelor of Science in Nutrition and Dietetics, Bachelor of Science in Industrial Engineering, ampong Bachelor of Science in Architecture. Mitátag ya ing Escuelang Pang-graduadu (Graduate School), a maki cursung Master of Arts in Education ampong Master in Business Administration. Ba yang pakibatan ing pamangailangan kareng mangakuyad a cursu, miragdag la reng Government Accounting ampong Junior Secretarial. Pigkalubanan neng estadu antimong universidad ing institusion kanitang 1980: opisial yang meging "University of the Assumption" aniang Marzu 19, 1980. 
Aniang panaun a pamuntuk ya i Fr. Ramos, miragdagan yang mayap ing bilang da reng magaral, at meragul ya ing campus uli ning pamitikdo kareng makatuking gusali:
King lalam ning pamanibala nang Fr. Ramos, mepili ya ing universidad antimong karinan ning Regional Staff Development Center, ing Nutrition Center, ing Decentralized Learning Resource Center, ampo ing Educational Development Implementation Task Force for Region III. Miyumpisan ya murin ketang kayang terminu ing Outreach Ministry.
Aniang 1986, i Rev. Fr. Cenovio M. Lumanog, Ph.D.ing tildu nang pamuntuk ning kanita Arzobispo Oscar V. Cruz, J.C.D., D.D. Kanitang kapanaunan na, pigkalub ning Department of Education, Culture and Sports ing kapaintulutan a miyampang Doctoradu king Pamanuru (Doctorate Degree in Education), aniang Junio 13, 1988.
Tildu neng pamuntuk Arzobispo Paciano B. Aniceto D.D. i Most Rev. Jesus C. Galang, D.D., a kanita Auxiliary Bishop ning San Fernando, kanitang 1990. Aniang panaun a makalukluk ya, mitikdo ya ing gusaling Archbishop V. Cruz ampo ing Aklatan. Kanita ya murin miragdag kareng cursung yampang ning universidad ing Bachelor of Science in Accountancy.
I Rev. Fr. Msgr. Ricardo Jesus T. Serrano ing linukluk a pamuntuk aniang 1992. Aniang umpisa ning kayang terminu, mitikdo yang paniabat king lahar ampo king albug. Miragdag la reng makatuking cursu kareng kareng yampang ning univesidad: Masters degree in Public Administration; Bachelor of Science in Hotel and Restaurant Management; Bachelor of Arts in Interior Design; Bachelor of Science in Commerce a maki major king computer science; ampong Master of Education a maki majors king Early Childhood, Mathematics, ampong English.
King lalam ning pamang-giya nang Fr. Serrano, melarin ya't mibayu ing gusaling Grade School, at megi yang gusaling atlung pisu. Peparagul de ba yang mika atlung ambi ("three wings"), ing "Msgr. Lumanog Building", ing "Msgr. Ramos Building", ampo ing "Franco Building". Bang pakibatan ing pamangailangan ning daragul a bilang da reng magaral, megamit la reng kuartu king "Archdiocese of San Fernando building" (ASF) and the "Diocese of San Fernando building" (DSF) para kareng computer laboratory, modern typing, ampong lecture room. Mika maragul muring pamagbayu king Archbishop Cinense Gymnasium. Kayabe la king pamagbayu ning campus deng aduang karagdagang audio-visual room, metung a Internet Center, deng computer room ampong mapilan a multimedia classroom. Miragdag ya ing metung a tennis court ampong mini clubhouse ba lang miragdagan deng pasilidad para king pasiknangan (sports) king escuela. 
Aniang bayung milenariu, megi yang kayanib ning Philippine Association of Accredited Schools, Colleges and Universities (PAASCU) ing University of the Assumption, at aniang 2002, king pigkalubanan da lang Level 2 Accreditation deng cursung Liberal Arts, Education, Commerce, Accountancy ampong Nursing, ampo reng curriculum a elementaria ampong secundaria. 
Miyabe ya kareng matas dili ranggung pipagaralan king labuad ("region") ing Escuelang Gradua ning universidad agpang kareng resulta ning Evaluation of Graduate Education in the Philippines (EGEP) a penibalan dang miyantabe ning Commission on Higher Education (CHED) ampo ning Fund for Assistance to Private Education (FAPE) manibat kanitang Julio 2003 anggang Setiembre 2004. 
Aniang Agosto 2005, metanggap ya ing aplicaciun ning universidad a miyampang king Bachelor of Science in Biology (Pre-Med), ampong Bachelor of Science in Mathematics manibat king banuang academicung 2006-2007.
Under his administration, he was able to construct a new High School building, whose enrollment was declining at the time.
Lalam ning kayang pamanibala, mika bayung gusaling High School, a mibababa ing bilang da reng magaral aniang panaung ita.
As of May 30, 2007 Rev. Fr. Msgr. Ricardo Jesus T. Serrano, was removed as president of the university. 
Miyalilan ya i Rev. Fr. Msgr. Ricardo Jesus T. Serrano aniang Mayo 30, 2007 antimong pamuntuk ning universidad.
I Most Reverend Roberto C. Mallari, D.D., Auxiliary Bishop of San Fernando, ing menibala king universidad manibat aniang Junio 18, 2007. Ing pamibabo ning moralidad ampo reng pamipaulagang Catolicu ing babie diwa king kayang pamanibala.

Pamiagum.
Kayanib ya ing University of the Assumption kareng makatuking kikilalanan a aguman a propesional a pambangsa:

Kalam:
Iting bulung a iti milamnan ya kapamilatan nang Jason.

Átomu:
Ing atom ing malating diling dake o parting bibilug king metung a chemical element. Ing atom bibilugan ne ning electron cloud, a maki electron a negative a charge a makapadurut king masiksik (dense) a nucleus. Ining nucleus atin yang proton a maki positive a charge, ampong neutron a neutral a electrically neutral. Nung pante ing bilang da reng proton ampong neutron, electrically neutral ya ing atom. Nu namang ali, metung yang ion, a maki positive o negative a charge. Matitinduk ("classified", o mapipitna la agpang king uri) ya ing atom basi king bilang da reng kayang proton ampong neutron: ing bilang da reng proton ing magpasia king chemical element, at ing bilang da naman deng neutron ing magpasia king isotope na nitang element. 
Deng minunang filosofo king India ampong Grecia kanitang minunang panaun ing purmerung migmunikala king idea o konseptu nng atom antimong dake ning sangkap (matter) a e na maliaring pitnan. Aniang kalampitu (17th) ampo kalabingwalung siglu o dilanua (18th century), minie lang pisikal a katibayan para kanitang idea kapamilatan ning pamagpaltong e no maliaring pitnan o bangalan pa king paralan a chemical deng mapilang sangkap. Aniang wakas ning kalabingsiam (19th) a siglu ampo ing umpisa ning kaduang pulung siglu, mekatuklas lang dake ampong pangabalangkas kilub ning, at mas malati pa kesa king atom, patudeng e tutung e na maliaring pitnan ing 'atom.' Megamit la reng tuntunan ning quantum mechanics ba yang i-model ing atom.
Nung pakilupa tamu king araranasan tamu aldo-aldo, tutu lang mangalatiktik a bage deng atom, a makanian murin kalatiktik a bayat, at maliari la mung panigaralan tunggal-tunggal nung gumamit espesial a kasangkapan antimo king scanning tunneling microscope. Atiu king nucleus ing 99.9% ning timbang ning nucleus, , halus pareu la bayat deng proton ampo reng neutron. Neng masiadu yang dakal o ditak ing bilang da reng neutron nung ikumpara/pakiyanti ya king bilang da reng proton, e matatag o pilmi ing nucleus, at maliaring marapat kaya ing radioactive decay Mag-okupa la o makabili king metung a grupu da reng matatag (stable) a energy level or orbital deng electron a makapadurut king nucleus, at maliari lang malis/lumipat manibat king metung papunta king aliwang estadu o energy level kapamilatan ning pamananggap o pamagpalual photon a katumbas ning pamialiwa da enerhia deng level. Deng electron ing magpasia king kaurian dang chemical (chemical properties) ning metung a element, at maragul ing karelang impluensia king kaurian nang magneticu ning metung a atom. 

Molekula:
King chemistry, ing molecule metung yang electrically neutral a grupu da reng e kukulang kareng aduang atom a maki ustung tatag ("sufficiently stable") king partikular a pangaayus a pibubuklud da reng aduang tutung masikan a chemical bond. Maliari ya muring mangabaldugan a unit da reng adua o maigit pang atom a pibubuklud da reng covalent bond. </ref> King organic chemistry ampong biochemistry, e makanian kaigpit ing pamangamit king katayang "molecule," at magagamit ya murin iti kareng charged a organic molecule ampong biomolecule.
Makikilala la reng molecule kareng polyatomic ion king maigpit a kabaldugan a iti.
Linto ya ing kabaldugan a iti aniang miragdagan ing beluan tungkul king pangabalangkas ("structure") da reng molecule. E la makaing eksaktu deng minunang kabaldugan kareng molecule antimong pekamalating lkapirasu (particle) ning purung sangkap a chemical ("chemical substance") nung nu atiu pa murin ing komposisiun ampong kaurian a chemical. Maralas mikakaprublema king kabaldugan a iti, uling king aldo-aldong bie, dakal la reng sangkap (substance), antimo deng batu (rocks), asin (salts), ampong metal, bibilugan da lang atom o ion, oneng e la gawa kareng molecule. 
King kinetic theory da reng gases, ing katayang "molecule" maralas yang magagamit king sanumang butil a gas, nanu man ing kayang sangkap o komposisiun. Agpang king kabaldugan a iti, tuturing da la mu namang "molecule" deng noble gases, lipat ning bibilugan no ning metung a atom a alang bond.

Richard Wagner:
I Wilhelm Richard Wagner (22 May 1813, Leipzig, Germany - 13 February 1883, Venice, Italy), metung yang kompositor a compositor, conductor, teorista king musica, director ampong talasulat salese o esay, a mekilala keraklan kareng kayang opera, (o :music drama, ing lagiung megamit karela kaibat), a Aleman. E anti kareng aliwang kompositor da reng opera, pareu nong sinulat Wagner deng scenario ampong libretto da reng kayang obra.
Kilala la reng obra nang Wagner, lalu na detang mas tauli, ketang misasalungat (contrapuntal) a salat (texture), masikan a w:chromaticism, pamitugma (harmony) ampong w:orchestration, ampong komplikadung pamangamit king leitmotif: deng tema king musikang makaugne kareng partikular a tauan, karinan o lugal, o elementu/dake ning balangkas ning kuentu (“plot elements). I Wagner ing menimuna kareng paniulung king amanu ning musika, anti ing mitmung (extreme) chromaticism ampong tonal center a biglang manaliwa, bageng matalik mekaimpluensia kng pamanalkus (development) ning musikang clasicu king Europa. 
Binayu neng Wagner ing kaisipan tungkul king musika kapamilatan ning kayang idea ning "Gesamtkunstwerk" ("pangkabilugang kalalangan alit" o "total artwork"), ing pamibuklud-buklud da reng eganaganang alit (‘’arts’’) ning kawatasan o poesia, albayan (visual), tigtigan (musical) ampong lalagen (dramatic), a mirinan katuparan ketang mapia nang pamiyaliling (cycle) a "Der Ring des Nibelungen" (1876). Tinikdo neng Wagner ing sarili nang teatrong pang-opera ba lang mipalage deti nung makananu na lang apitsuran.
Suglung palual.
Kasulatan.
The complete English text in an earlier translation can be found online at Project Gutenberg 

Roald Amundsen:
I Roald Engelbregt Gravning Amundsen (), (July 16, 1872 – c. June 18, 1928) metung yang talapaglakbe (explorer) kareng polo o sepu ning yatu . Ya ing menimuna king purmerung expedition a miras king Mauling Polo pilatan ning 1910 ampong 1912. Ya murin ing mumunang taung miras king Pangulu ampong Mauling Polo (North and South Poles). Pikabaluan yang mumunang linipat o tinaglus (traversed) king Northwest Passage. Mewala ya aniang Junio 1928 kabang kayabe ya king metung a mision ning pamaniagip (rescue mission). Kayabe de ri Douglas Mawson, Robert Falcon Scott, ampo i Ernest Shackleton antimong manimunang pekapun da reng expedition aniang Mapiang Panaun ning Pamaglakbe king Antarctica (Heroic Age of Antarctic Exploration).
Pamana.

Pekilagiu do kaya deng makatuking bapor:

Suglung palual.
Deng obrang gewa nang Amundsen:

Willem Barentsz:
I Willem Barentsz (a me-Ingles ya ing kayang lagiu king William Barents or Barentz) (born c. 1550 on Terschelling – died at sea June 20, 1597) metung yang [[w:navigator|talapaglayag) ampong talapaglakbe (explorer) a Olandes o Dutch, at pekapun kareng minunang pamaglakbe king malaut a pangulu (far north).
Pekilagiu de kaya ing Dayatmalat a Barents (Barents Sea), Barentsburg ampo ing Labuad a Barents.

Jacques Cartier:
I Jacques Cartier (1491–September 1 1557), bindian ne ing lugal a ausan tamu ngening Canada para king Francia. Ya ing mumunang miglarawan ampong ginawang mapa ning Gulf of Saint Lawrence ampo kareng pampang ning Ilug Saint Lawrence, a pepalaguan nang "The Country of Canada(s)", kayabe no reng aduang mangaragul a balayán ("settlement") a Iroquoian king Stadaconna (Quebec City) ampo king Hochelaga (Montreal Island). 

James Cook:
I Capitan James Cook FRS RN (27 October 1728 (O.S.) - 14 February 1779) metung yang Ingles a talapaglakbe, talapaglayag ampong talagawang mapa, a mitas king ranggu ning Capitan king Royal Navy. I Cook ing minunang ginawang mapa ning Newfoundland bayu karing atlu nang pamaglakbe king Pacific Ocean, nung kapilan megi yang mumunang Europeung miras king pampang ning Australia ampo Isla ning Hawaii, ampo ing mumunang misulat a pamaglayag padurut king New Zealand. 
Mikiabe ya i Cook king merchant navy ning Britania aniang binatiliu ya pamu at mikiabe ya king Royal Navy aniang 1755. Mekilaban ya king Seven Years' War, at kaibat na nita, sikdan ne ampong gewang mapa ing maragul a dake ning piluluban ("entrance") ning Ilug Saint Lawrence aniang pamaglusub ning Quebec. Uli na niti, ikua nang arapat General Wolfe ing kayang kasebian a pasalikut a pamaglusub ("stealth attack") king Plains of Abraham. Ini ing migdala kaya king pansin ning Admiralty ampo ing Royal Society. Mikatagun a aniang a miliari iti aniang ustung panaun king kayang karera, ampo king pamanuclas na kareng aliwang labuad ning Britania, ining pamamansin kaya, at minuli iti king pamanuldu kaya antimong pekapun (commander) ning HM Bark "Endeavour" para king mumuna kareng atlung pamaglakbe king Pacifico. 
Mengalat yang impormasiun tungkul kareng dakal a lugal i Cook, at ginawa yang mapa da reng dakal a isla ampong bebe dayatmalat para kareng mapa da reng Europeu king mumunang pamikatagun. Ayabut nang Cook ing kayang tagumpe uling kareng dakal a bage, kayabe na ing kabiasnan na king dayatmalat ("seamanship"), pangamatenakan king pamaniukad lugal (surveying) ampong pamangawang mapa, tepangan king pamanuklas kareng mapanganib a karinan bang patutuan ing impormasiun (alimbawa, ing ulit-ulit nang pamamunta king Antarctic Circle ampong pamaglakbe padurut king Great Barrier Reef, kagiwan a manibala kareng tau lipat ning mangasákit a kabilian, ampong kapangangasan ("boldness") king leparan da reng kayang pamaglakbe ampong kaburian a lagpusan ing kautusan na kaya ning Admiralty.
Mete ya i Cook king Hawaii aniang akapate da la reng Hawaianu aniang katlu nang pamaglakbe ning pamanuklas king Pacifico kanitang 1779.

University of the East:
Ing University of the East (UE) metung yang universidad a privadu ampong alang sectang atiu king karinan a University Belt, king distrito ning Sampaloc, Menila, Filipinas. Mitátag ya ing universidad kanitang 1946 antimong institusion a maki lálaki ampong bábai. Ing UE ing mumunang universidad king Asiang maki mágaral a maigit king 60,000 (anam a pulung libu), at meaus yang "Largest University in Asia" (Pekamaragul a Universidad king Asia) basi king populasiun kanita.
King maigit nang 60 (anam a pulung banua) ning pamagsilbi, meragul ya at meging metung a privadung universidad a gagalangan da king Filipinas. 
King salukuyan, miyayampang yang cursu king comerciu (commerce) ampong pamanibala king negociu (business administration), leyi (law), dentistry, engineering, alit ampong siensia (arts and sciences), fine arts, pamanuru (education), computer technology, nursing, physical therapy, medisina (medicine) ampong pamagaral a graduadu (graduate studies). Atin yang aduang extension campus ing University of the East: ing UE Caloocan ampo ing UERM king Quezon Lakanbalen. 
Metung ya ing UE kareng walung universidad a kayanib king University Athletic Association of the Philippines (UAAP), nung nu ya kayanib manibat aniang 1952. Ing UE ing meging makiabala (‘’host’’) ketang UAAP Season 69. 
Pigkalubanan da lang Level II status ning Philippine Association of Colleges and Universities Commission on Accreditation (PACUCOA) deng mapilang colegiu ning UE - Manila. Kinilala ne ning Commission on Higher Education (CHED) ing Information Technology Department antimong "Center of Development in Information Technology Education". Den namang colegiu ning UERMMMC, dininan nong matas a level ning Philippine
Accrediting Agency of Schools, Colleges and Universities (PAASCU). Atin yang level II accreditation ing College of Medicine has level II accreditation ampong Innovative Curriculum, at mekilala yang Center of Excellence in Research (Sentru ning Kabiasnan king Pamanialiksik) ning Department of Science and Technology. Ita namang College of Nursing, atin yang level III accreditation king Commission on Higher Education as Centers of Excellence.
Amlat.
Miraras king Setiembre 1946 ing amlat ning University of the East, king metung a kuartung upahan king Dasmariñas St., Menila, nung nu la makalista kareng ) review class para king Certified Public Accountant (CPA) deng 110 a magaral. Kapakayan ning grupu da reng talaturu king comerciu, a panimunan nang Dr. Francisco T. Dalupan, Sr., Ing manimuna kareng talaturu king comerciu, ing pamaniaup king bangsa, a e pa mibangun king gera. Karetang 110 a estudianting deta, apat la reng kayabe karetang matas dili king 1947 CPA board Examinations. 
Aniang Setiembri 11, 1946, tetag de reng limang tau, di Francisco Dalupan, Sr., Herminiglio Reyes, Jose Torres, Jaime Hernandez ampo i Santiago dela Cruz, ing Philippine College of Commerce and Business Administration (PCCBA) king R. Papa St. king w:Sampaloc, Manila. Tinanggap yang 350 estudianti aniang kaleldo (summer) ning 1947. Aniang tutuking banua, mas dakal lang mágaral deng migpalista, miragdagan la reng academic unit, at minalis ya ing PCCBA ketang salukuyan nang sentrung campus ning UE king "2219 Claro M. Recto Avenue". 
Matagumpe la kareng iksamin na king accountancy ning kapamahalan deng miyari king PCCBA. Uli na niti, dininan neng paintulut ing PCCBA a mitátag aliwa pang colegiu, at mitikdo la reng Colegiu ning Liberal Arts, Business Administration, ampong Dentistry, ampo ing Esculang Pang-graduadu ning Pamanibalang Negosiu (the Graduate School of Business Administration). 
Pigkalubanan deng kabilian a universidad ing PCCBA kanitang Julio 3, 1951, at miyalilan ya lagiu king "University of the East". I Dalupan ing meging mumunang Pamuntuk (President) ning UE ampong Talapamuntuk (Chairman) ning Lupung da reng Manibala (Board of Trustees). Deng mumunang galamé ning Lupung ila pin di Herminigildo B. Reyes, metung a negosianti, scholar, ampong sadiang Kaduang Pamuntuk (Vice President) ning Universidad ning Pilipinas; i Santiago F. de la Cruz, metung a CPA ampong business executive a minalili kang Dalupan antimong Pamuntuk ning UE; i Jose L. Torres, metung a sundalus, negosianti, ampong accountant; ampo i Jaime Hernandez, a sadiang Kalihim ning Pisalapian (Secretary of Finance).
Aniang Junio 1954, memusni yang bayung campus ing UE a ausan dang UE Tech king metung a loting maki 4.86 ektarea king Dalang Samson (Samson Road), king Caloocan. Ing UE Caloocan, magsarili ne ngeni (autonomous) kareng pisasabian a academicu, at panibalan ne ning metung a Canciller (Chancellor). Makabili la reng Colleges of Arts and Sciences, Business Administration, ampong Fine Arts king bayung Tan Yan Kee Academic Building, kabang atin yang sarili nang gusali ing College of Engineering. Manibat kanitang 1986, gagamitan de ing UE Caloocan king ROTC ampong CAT. 
Sinali yang metung a ektareang loti king Aurora Boulevard king Quezon Lakanbalen ing UE kanitang 1955, at keti ne tinikdo ing Colegiu ning Medicina (College of Medicine). Aniang Mayo 17,1957, megi yang foundation ing Colegiu, at mipalaguan yang UE Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center (UERMMMC). 
Aniang 1962, mika loti yang 5,850-metru cuadradu ing Universidad king arap ning UERMMMC. Ini ing meging the Research Center for Sciences, Humanities and Culture (Sentru para king Pamanialiksik king Siensia, Humanidades ampong Cultura), a maki aduang gusali. Ketang mumuna, makabili ya ing School of Music and Arts (Escuela ning Musica ampong Alit), at ita namang metung ing lugal ning College of Dentistry ampo reng laboratoriu ning pamanialiksik (research laboratories). Minalis ya king Caloocan campus ing School of Music and Arts, a ngeni College of Fine Arts (Colegiu ning Malagung Alit), kanitang 1981. Aniang libutad ning decadang 1960, kinua neng Dr. Francisco Dalupan i Dr. Francisco Dalupan ba neng lalangan ng sagisag ning balang taga-UE ing Lualhati, ibat king modelung i Ophelia Salas, metung a mágaral ning CBA. Minalis ya ing College of Dentistry king Recto (Manila) campus aniang banuang academicung (school year) 1988-1989.
Aniang 1967, ing meangu bie Pamuntuk Diosdado Macapagal, ing tata nang Pamuntuk Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo, tinuru yang part-time king College of Business Administration, at inaus neng "People's University" ing UE. 
 
Kayagnan ning pamagparagul king universidad ing pamandagdag king bilang da reng magaral. Manibat kareng 110 a estudianti kanitang 1946, miragdagan ing populasiun da reng mágaral, at miras king 60,000 iti aniang 1960, nung kapilan ing UE ing meging mumunang universidad a maki magaral a maigit king anam a pulung libu. Disan na ing pekamatas a bilang da reng mágaral aniang mumunang semestri ning 1975-1976, nung kapilan 67,443 la reng makalista. Ngeni, atin nong 250,000 deng miyari king UE.
E milisia ing UE ketang crisis king kabiayan ampong recession a tinud king Filipinas aniang decadang 1980. Miyapektuan ya iti king pangabagsak ning pesus, taglus-taglus a inflation, matas a sueldu, ampong pamagwelga da reng talaturu, empleadu ampong estudianti. Mebawas la reng magaral, mebayat ing crisis, at digsu ne mu mipisali ing escuela king metung a grupung relihiosung ibat aliwang labuad.
Migkasákit ya uli ning prublema king kualta ampong king pamanuru aniang mabilug a decadang 1980. Aniang megi yang pamuntuk i Dr. Isidro D. Cariño aniang 1984, peparapat yang miayaliwang patakaran, kayabe na ing pamagbawas kareng empleadu, pamagpababa king gastus, ampong pamagpaupa kareng pasilidad na ampong lugal ning universidad king makuyad (short-term leases) ampong makabang (long-term leases) a panaun. Miyampang yang ladderized curriculum ing UE, espesial a cursu kareng executive, program ibat king the Institute for Computer Studies and Systems, ampong scholarship para kareng mágaral accounting ampong engineering. Uli ning pamagpaupa, e melaus ing pamagtas king matrikula (tuition fees) aniang 1986-1987 ampong 1987-1988.
Aniang mituldu yang Kalihim ning Pamanuru (Secretary of Education) ning Filipinas kanitang 1990 i Cariño, minalili ya anting Talapamuntuk ning Lupung da reng Mangasiwa (Chairman of the Board of Trustees) i Panfilo O. Domingo, former President of Philippine National Bank, Pun Talapaganap (Chief Executive Officer) ampong Pansamantalang Pamuntuk (Acting President) ning Universidad.
Kabud milukluk ya, penigobran nang Domingo ing pamaglutas king problema na king pisalapian ning Universidad kapamilatan ning pamag-retiru kareng utang nang pang-makuyad a panaun short-term ampo ing pamipaliari kareng kapanumanan o reporma king pamangastus ampong pamagpalakad. Kilub ning limang banua, maragul ing mebawas kareng utang ning universidad, at milako ya kareng libru ing maluat nang mititipun a utang king pamagpalakad (operational debt). Kayagnan na niti, inumpisan nang Domingo ing metung a pangkabilugan a pamaniamasan kareng gusali ampong pasilidad, at saka king pamanuru, ning universidad. 
Kanitang 1992, ing sadiang Talaingat Bandi (Treasurer) ning Filipinas, i Rosalina S. Cajucom, ing meging Pamuntuk ning UE. Aniang migretiru ya kanitang libutad ning 1995, i Domingo ing linukluk pasibayu king panga-pamuntuk angga king pamanuldu kang Dr. Josefina R. Cortes aniang 1997. Inalilan na ne mang G. Baltazar N. Endriga aniang migretiru ya kanitang 2003.
http://www.mb.com.ph/issues/2004/07/30/SCAU2004073015212.html|accessdate = 2006-09-20}}</ref>
Megi lang matagumpe deng programa ning UE manibat aniang migumpisa ya angga king dekadang 1980, nung kapilan deng ibat king escuela deng pekamatas (topnotcher) king CPA board exams. Den muring miyari king universidad deng pekamatas kareng iksamin king Dentistry, Engineering, Education, Medicine, Nursing ampong Physical Therapy.
Angga ngeni, dininan neng kabilian a deregulated ning Commission on Higher Education ing UE Manila, kabang mirinan lang Level II accreditation ning Philippine Association of Colleges and Universities Commission on Accreditation (PACUCOA) deng keraklan kareng kayang colegiu. Deng namang colegiu ning UERMMMC, kinilala no ning PhilippineAccrediting Agency of Schools, Colleges and Universities (PAASCU). Maki level II accreditation ya ing College of Medicine, at level III ne man ing College of Nursing.
Bayu-bayu pamu, meaus yang "One of the Most Wired Universities in the Country" ing Universidad , agpang king Computer World Magazine ampo ing Enterprise Magazine. Miyabe na naman king 2006 Computerworld Premier 100 of Computer World Magazine ing universidad antimong metung kareng labing lima (15) kareng mumunang dinalan (top 100) a corporasiun ampong cumpania king pamangamit king w:Information technology, nung nu ya kabud pipagaralan a miyabe king tala/listaan.
Minalis ya ing universidad manibat king ATM paras king Gigabit Ethernet ba nang asupportan ing daragul a pamangailangan king Aptas (online requirements), miraragdagan a kagiwan king pamagaral king Aptas, (expanding online learning capabilities), ampong sasanting a pamagpalakad ketang kayang campus king Menila kapamilatan ning metung a Ethernet networking solution ibat king Nortel Networks. Uli ning pamagpasikan kagiwan (upgrade), lalung salese ing bilis na ampong pamanupad (performance) ning pamangamit da reng talaturu ampong mágaral kareng kasangkapan king pamagaral king Aptas (online learning resources) ampong online records. Suportan na mu naman niting upgrade ing balak ning universidad a ituglung ya ing pasilidad na king Menila karetang king Caloocan ampong Quezon Lakanbalen. 
King salukuyan, tinuldu neng "Center of Development in Information Technology Education" (Sentru ning Pamanalksu king Tecnolohiang Pang-impormasiun) ing University of the East. Kinilala neng Center of Development (COD) in Information Technology Education ing Information Technology Department manibat Marzo 1, 2007 anggang Diciembre 31, 2010.
Pamanibala ning Universidad.
Lupung da reng Mangasiwa (Board of Trustees).

Lualhati.
Aniang Enero 27, 1957, kinua neng Dr. Francisco T. Dalupan i National Artist Guillermo Tolentino bang maglalang king monumentung Lualhati, metung a sagisag ning balang mágaral king UE. Ing migsilbing modelu para king Lualhati ya pin i Ophelia Salas, metung a magaral king CBA. Mayayakit ya ing monumentu king Santiago dela Cruz Building quadrangle.
Campus.
Ing UE Manila campus, a ausan da muring UE Main Campus, bibilugan de reng labing aduang gusaling atiu king busal ning karinan a University Belt, Sampaloc, Menila. Makayarap ya iti king Claro M. Recto Avenue, ing malapit a Mendiola Street ampo ing w:Legarda LRT Station.
