Pápa Píu X:
Y Papa Piu X (Juniu 2, 1835—Agostu 20, 1914), mibait Giuseppe Melchiore Sarto, iya ing pang257 a Papa ning Pisamban Romanu Katoliku, linukluk manibat 1903 anggang 1914, elilan ne y Papa Leo XIII. 

Pápa Leon XIII:
Y Papa Leo XIII (Marsu 2 1810—Juliu 20 1903), mibait Conde Vincenzo Gioacchino Raffaele Luigi Pecci, iya ing pang256 a Papa ning Pisamban Romanu Katoliku, linukluk manibat 1878 anggang 1903, elilan ne y Papa Pio IX. 

Papa Piu IX:
Y Papa Piu IX (Amanung Latin: "Pius PP IX", Mayu 13, 1792 – Pereru 7, 1878), mibait Giovanni Maria Mastai-Ferretti, iya ing [ekamaluat a makalukluk a Papa king kasalesayan ning Pisamban, a telanan ne ing Pisamban Romanu Katoliku manibat Juniu 16, 1846, anggang 1878, mga 32 banua. Inyang mumuna liberal ya, pepakawalan no reng pepasukul ning minuna kaya at kaibat meging yang conservative kaibat da reng pemate at gawang terrorista ampong inyang 1848 a aklasan. Likuan ne ing Roma inyang 1848 ketang makuyad a panaun at mewala la reng Papal states inyang 1870 at mipunta la keng Italy. Ela pane maluid ding tuntunan ning Pisamban kareng aliwang bangsa antimo ing Russia, Germany ampong France, uli ning pamanaliwa da reng secular institusiun ampong pangkilub a pamanalkus. Matas la lawe kang Papa Pio ampong kalguran de inyang panaun na. In kayang aus a pangmalda mabilug a yatu ing - " Peter's Pence " - kaibat nang meging "Makasukul king Vatican" ustu na para mika-atin yang ing papa (papacy) karing decadang daratang.

Papa Gregorio XVI:
Y Papa Gregorio XVI (Septiembri 18 1765 – Juniu 1 1846), mibait Bartolomeo Alberto Cappellari, mipalagyuan Mauro kayanib ya kareng religious order na ning Camaldolese, meging yang Papa ning Pisamban Katoliku manibat 1831 anggang 1846. Masias yang conservative ampong traditionalist, ena buri ing democratic ampong makabayung reforma kareng Papal States at mabilug Europa, king akakit na deti ila reng manimuna keng revolutionary leftism, ampong pepasikan nala reng religious ampong political a upaya na ning papacy (lawen ya ing Ultramontanism).

Hernán Cortés:
I Hernán Cortés de Monroy y Pizarro, 1st Marqués del Valle de Oaxaca (1485–December 2, 1547) metung yang "conquistador" ibat Espania a migumpia king pamaniakup king Imperiung Aztec para kang Charles V, ari ning Castilla ampong Holy Roman Emperor, aniang umpisa ning kalabing anam a siglu o dilanua. Kayabe ya i Cortés king dai o henerasiun da areng talasakup a Castilang migumpis king mumuna nang dake ning pamaniakup da king Americas deng Castila. 
Mibait ya king Medellín, Extremadura, king Castilla, king metung a pamiliang ibat kareng mababang ranggung mapia ("lesser nobility"), at pinili nang manintunan king Bayung Yatu ("New World"). Minta ya king Hispaniola at kaibat king Cuba, nung nu ya mekatanggap "encomienda", at sinaguli yang meging alcalde (mayor) ning metung a malating balen. Aniang 1519, mepili yang capitan ning katlung pamaglakbe (expedition) king kalibutnan a labuad (mainland), metung a pamaglakbe nung nu metung ya kareng migpondu. Uli ning pamipate na king gobernador ning Cuba, i Diego Velázquez de Cuéllar, a yang meging sangkan ning pamagkansela king pamaglakbe, bageng e na síkasung Cortés. Karas na king kontinenti, pepaliari neng Cortés ing metung a matagumpeng pamamaralan o taktika nign pamakikampi kareng aliwang tubung lahi laban kareng aliwa. Aniang migparala yang tubud ing Gobernador ning Cuba ba neng parakap i Cortés, lebanan na la at simbut, kapamilatan da reng karagdagang sundalus antimong pandagdag king kayang puersa. Sinulat yang diretsu king ari i Cortés ba lang makilala deng kayang tagumpe lipat ning miparusan uli ning pamagalsa (mutiny). Kaibat neng pepabagsak ing imperiung Aztec, pigkalubanan deng bansag a "Marqués del Valle de Oaxaca" i Cortés, kabang mibie ne man king matas a ranggung mapia, i Antonio de Mendoza, ing mas prestihiyosung bansag a Virrey o Viceroy. Mibalik ya king Espania i Cortés aniang 1541, nung nu ya meteng payapa dapot maki sukal a lub. 
Uling kareng kontrobersial a dapát nang Cortés ampo ing kakulangan kareng apagtiwalan a pikuanan impormasiun tungkul kaya, e malaguang sumabing bageng siguradu o malino tungkul king kayang pangatau o kapagnasan (motivation). Uling pamurian do aniang minuna deng conquistador, e re pekasuri ing tungkul kang Cortés. Aniang belikan da kaibat ing karelang ugali king kontekstu ning makabayung panamdam laban king kolonialismu ampo ing misnang meragul a pamangalang king katulirang pantau (human rights), alimbawa ketang w:Black Legend (Leyenda Negra o Matuling a Alamat, e murin miragdagan ing beluan tamu tungkul kang Cortés anting metung a tau o indibidual. Uling kareng pamagbayung deti king pamanigaral king amlat, masiadu lang simpli deng pamaglarawan kang Cortés, at papalto reng masiadung marok o masiadung mayap. 

The Tipping Point:
Ing The Tipping Point: How Little Things Can Make a Big Difference Pinandit ning Pamibakúng: Nung Makananu Lang Magdalang Maragul a Pamagbayu deng Mangalating Bage (ISBN 0-316-31696-2) libru neng Malcolm Gladwell, a minuna nang bilalag ("published") ning Little Brown aniang 2000.
Suliap.
Deng "pinandit ning pamibakúng" ("tipping point") ila reng "lebel o balitang nung nukarin e ne maliaring pigilan ing sikan a susubung ("momentum") para king pamagbayu."
Bibie neng Gladwell ing kabaldugan ning "tipping point" bilang katayang pang-sociology antimong "pinandit nung nakrin ing "critical mass", ing angganan ("threshold"), ing puntu ning pamamukal." Pagnasan ning librung isplikan ampong ilarawan la areng misnang dagul ampong "misteriosung" pamagbayu king sosiedad a panamdaman tamu king bieng pang-aldo-aldo. Anti ing sasabian nang Gladwell, "Deng idea, produktu, mensahi ampong kimut a mikakalat antimo deng virus." Kayabe ya kareng alimbawang bibie na king libru ing pangasikat da ampong matas a pamaniali kareng sapatus a Hush Puppies aniang libutad ning dekadang 1990, ampo ing makapagmulalang pangabagsak ning krimen king New York Lakanbalen aniang tauli nang bage ning dekadang 1990.

Virus:
Ing virus (ibat king Latin a "virus" a mangabaldugang "lasun"), metung yang sub-microscopic a ahenti o talapagdalang impeksiun a e maliaring dagul o magparakal king kilual ning host a cell. Ing balang kapirasu o particle, ing "virion", bibilugan ne ning material o sangkap a genetic, ing DNA o RNA, a makapalub king takap a protina (protein coat) a ausan dang capsid. Miayaliwa ya tabas ing capis, manibat king simpling balikudkud (helical form) o icosahedral (solidung dakal katalindikingan o "side" a halus mabilug anting bola), angga kareng mas komplikadung pangabalangkas a maki iki o envelope. Luluban do ngan deng virus deng anggang mabibie, at pitinduk-tinduk o pigrupu-grupu da la kareng uring makayapektu kareng animal, tanaman ampong bacteria. 
Kayabe la karaniwan a sakit ning taung daralan da reng virus deng sipun, trangkasu, bulutung, pamagbulus ampong SARS. Ausan dang pangamakamandag (virulence) ing kagiwan dang magdalang sakit deng virus. Miayaliwa ing paralan dang magdalang sakit king metung a organismu o mabibie, at magdependi la reti king uri o species. Kayabe la kareti king level na o balitang ning cell deng lysis o pamanatdas ning cell. Kareng mabibieng dakal a cell, magumpisa nang panamdaman ning mabilug a organismu ing epektu nung dakal nong cell deng mengamate. Agiang agiu rang guluan deng virus ing masaleseng homeostasis o balansi ning katawan, maliari lang mieng alus e na panamdaman ning organismu. Metung yang alimbawa niti ing kagiwan ning herpes simplex virus, a sangkan da reng lasu, a manatili king katawan a e aktibu o anting painawa. Ing aus da kaniti, latency, at metung yang kaurian ("characteristic") da reng herpes virus, kayabe ne ing Epstein-Barr virus, a panibatan ning glandular fever, ampo ing Varicella zoster virus, a yang sangkan ning bulutung danum (chicken pox). Shingles ing aus da kareng makasalikut a impeksiun a bulutung danum a mibabalik potang atiu ne king idad ing tau. 
Ating virus a magdalang impeksiun a kabang bie o chronic, nung nu la taglus-taglus a darakal deng virus lipat da reng paralan a gagawan ning host ba yang ipaglualu ("defend") ing kayang sarili. 
Mipagdebati la reng biologist nung mabie lang organismu reng virus o ali la. Agpang kareng aliwa, e la mabie, uling e la tutuki kareng batayan ("criteria") a magagamit kareng karaniwang kabaldugan ning bie. Alimbawa, e ro kalupa deng virus deng aliwang organismu uling ala lang cell deti. Nanupata, atin la mu namang gene deti, at dadalan la king ebolusion kapamilatan ning natural selection. Para naman kareng aliwa, organismu lang atiu king sepu na o angganan ning bie deti. Keraklan, neng mikaka-
impeksiun lang virus deng tau ampong animal, mamablas ya ing "immune system" da, at kaibat sasakit la. Maralas, laganas neng lalako ning immune system ing virus. Ala lang epektu kareng virus deng antibiotic, pero ating meyalkus a panulung kontra-virus ba lang uluan deng impeksiun a dilikadu king bie. Maliari lang lisian deng impeksiun da reng virus kapamilatan da reng bakunang mágdalang kabang bieng e pangatablan ("lifelong immunity"). 

Francis Drake:
Sir Francis Drake, Vice Admiral, (c. 1540 – January 27 1595), metung yang pirata, talapaglayag, negosianti kareng alipan, ampong politiku aniang panaun a Elizabethan king Inglaterra (England). Gewa neng caballerung (knight) aniang 1581 Reina Elizabeth I. Kadua yang manibala king pamanibala king flotang Ingles laban king Armada ning Espania aniang 1588, at kakadua ya mu kang Charles Howard ampo ing mismung Reina. Mete yang disintiria kaibat ning mebigu nang pamaglusub king San Juan, Puerto Rico kanitang 1595. 

Papa Piu VIII:
I Papa Piu VIII (Nobiembri 20, 1761 – Disiembri 1, 1830),mibait Francesco Saverio Castiglioni, meging yang Papa inyang 1829 anggang 1830.
Talambie.
Mibait ya king Cingoli, Marche, anak neng Conde Ottavio Castiglioni ampong ing asawa na i Sanzia Ghislieri. Megaral yang Canon law ampong, inyang 1800 meging yang Obispu ning Montalto. Kaibat nang emebisang sumpang makiabnu kang Napoleon I ning France (1804–14, 1815) dela re king France, dapot kaibat ning pangasambut ning France, inyang 1816 meging yang cardinal.
"Bilang Cardinal, Castiglione mebie yang e maluhu, ala yang kapate, agiang ing kayang bie eya alapitan, ala kang akit a censor kaya a reng aliwa atin lang paki. Megkasakit ya, dakal ya sugat keng gulut,batal at katawan, at mengaina ya a pipirma niya mu kareng documentus a papalad nang Cardinal Giuseppe Albani, nung nu iya ing menungkulan at papalakad kareng Papal States at balamu tune yang ari at susulud ne ing triple crown"[http://www.pickle-publishing.com/papers/triple-crown-pius-viii.htm].

Papa Leo XII:
I Pope Leo XII (Agusto 22, 1760 – Pebreru 10, 1829), mibait Annibale Francesco Clemente Melchiore Girolamo Nicola della Genga, meging yang Papa manibat 1823 anggang 1829. 
Bie.
I Della Genga mibait ya keng mapiang familia ibat La Genga, metung a malating balen a ngeni ausan dang ing lalawigan ning Ancona, kanita dake ning Papal States. Ing lugal ning kayang kebaitan e tiyak, deng possibilidad ilapin deng Genga, Ancona, ampong Spoleto. Megaral ya king Accademia dei Nobili Ecclesiastici king Roma, nung nu meging yang pari inyang 1783. Inyang 1790 ing kaakitakit at biasang magsalita dela re Genga aburi re kapamilatan ning orasiun ning kapagmasusian ning dating Emperador Joseph II.

Christopher Columbus:
I Christopher Columbus (pilatan ning August 25 ampong October 31, 1451 – May 20, 1506), Cristóbal Colón king Castila, at Cristoforo Colombo king orihinal a Italianu, metung yang talapaglayag, kolonialista, ampong talapaglakbe. Uli ning kayang pamaglakbe king Atlantic Ocean, akilala de reng keraklan king Europa ing Albugang Kapitnang-Yatu (Western Hemisphere) ampo reng kontinenting America. Lipat ning aliwa ya ing mumunang miras karing Americas manibat king Afro-Eurasiaaunahan neng manga limang dalang banuang Leif Ericson, at mapaliaring deng aliwainumpisan nang Columbus ing maleparan a pamiugnayan da reng Europeo ampo reng tubu kareng Americas. Inumpisan na king kayang e matagumpeng pamagtangkang mitátag tuknangan o balayán ("settlement") king isla ning Hispaniola ing prosesu ning pamaniakup da reng Castila king "Bayung Yatu" (New World). (Gagamitan de ing katayang "pre-Columbian" ba rong tulduan deng kultura ampong lahi kareng Americas bayu ing paniatang da ri Columbus ampo reng Europeong minalili kaya.)

Leif Ericson:
I Leif Ericson (king Matuang Norse: Leifr Eiríksson) (c. 970 - c. 1020), a misusulat mu namang Leif Ericsson ampong Leif Eriksson, metung yang talapaglakbeng ("explorer") Norse. Ya ing mumunang Europeong miglakbe king Pangulung America. Mibait ya i Ericson king Iceland. Tata ne i Erik the Red, a mitátag kolonia king Greenland. Sasabian dang miras ya king Pangulung America i Ericson bayu kenuman king Europa. Mapaliaring ing Newfoundland king Canada ing lugal a pintalan na. 

Vasco da Gama:
I Vasco da Gama (1460 o 1469?-December 24, 1524) metung yang marinung Portugues. Ya ing mumunang Europeong minta king India kapamilata'ning Cape of Good Hope, ing mauli nang sepu ning Africa. Mekatatlu ya minta king India kapamilata'nng bapor. I Vasco da Gama ing metung kareng matagumpeng dili aniang Panaun ning Pamaglakbe. Ya ing talapanibala (commander) da reng mumunang bapor a miglayag a deretsu manibat Europa angga king India. 

Edmund Hillary:
I Sir Edmund Percival Hillary, KG, ONZ, KBE (20 July 1919 – 11 January 2008) metung yang talaukiat bunduk ("mountaineer") ampong talapaglakbeng ibat New Zealand. Aniang 29 Mayu 1953, king edad a 33, ya ampo i Sherpa Tenzing Norgay ing meging mumunang talaukiat a miras king taluktuk ning Bunduk Everest. Kayabe la king kasiam a expedition ibat Britania king bunduk a ita, a penibalan nang John Hunt. 
Deng mibulalag.
Books written by Hillary include:

Fernando de Magallanes:
I Fernando de Magallanes o Ferdinand Magellan (1480 - April 27 1521); Portugues: Fernão de Magalhães) metung yang Portugues a talapaglakbe king dayatmalat, a kaibat miglayag murin para king Espania. Aniang magsilbi ya king Portugal, mekapaglakbe ya kareng dakal a dake ning yatu, anti king India, deng Spice Islands, Aslagang Africa, ampong Morocco. Kaibat nang milako king obra na para king Ari ning Portugal, migsilbi ya king Ari ning Espania. 
King lambatan, ya ing meging mumunang Europeong miglayag king Pacific Ocean, ampo ing mumunang menibala king pamaglayag padurut king yatu. Ya murin ing mumunang miglayag king Strait of Magellan, ania pekilagiu re kaya iti. Mete ya king Filipinas i Magallanes, bayu ya mekabalik king Europa. Labi lang walu (18) kareng kayabe na ing mekaligtas at mibalik king Espana kanitang 1522. Ini ing mumunang bapor a balu rang miglayag padurut king yatu. 

Marco Polo:
I Marco Polo (September 15 1254 – January 9 1324 ing pekamaranun dapot e mas tauli kesa king June 1325) metung yang Venetian a negosianti ampong talapaglakbeng mekilala uling king kayang pamaglakbe king yatu, a misulat king librung "Il Milione" ("Ing Miliunn" o "Deng Pamaglakbe nang Marco Polo") a ausan da muring "Oriente Poliano" (ing Aslagan da reng Polo) ampo ing "Pamilarawan ning Yatu" ("Description of the World"). 
Kayabe ning tata nang i Niccolò ampo ing bapa nang i Maffeo, i Polo ing metung kareng mumunang tau ibat king Albugan a mekadalan king Silk Road papunta king China (a inaus nang "Cathay", uling king lahing Khitan) at manapa o magbisita king Great Khan ning Imperiung Mongol, i Kublai Khan (apú nang Genghis Khan).

Abel Tasman:
I Abel Janszoon Tasman (1603 - 1659) metung yang Holandes (Dutch) a talapaglakbe king dayatmalat. Kareng kayang pamaglakbe para king VOC (Dutch East India Company), atuklasan ne ing Tasmania ampo ing New Zealand. Atuklasan na la mu naman deng mangaragul nang dake ning Australia.

Zheng He:
I Zheng He (misusulat yang 鄭和 king Isic) (1371-1433) metung yang talapaglakbe, sugu, ampong almiranti ibat king China aniang Ming Dynasty. I Zheng He ing pekapun ning metung a misnang dagul a plota (fleat) da reng bapor ibat king China a miglakbe king mabilug a Indian Ocean ampong Mauli Albugang Asia. Metung yang w:eunuch king korti ning Emperador. Atin yang 317 (atlung dalan labingpitung) mangaragul a bapor lalam ning kayang pamanibala. Adua lang pulu't walung libu (28,000) deng sundalus a makasake kareng bapor a reti. 

Archimedes:
I Archimedes (287 BC-212 BC) metung yang sientistang Griegu kanitang minuna. Metung yang imbentor, astronomer, ampong matematiku. Mibait ya king balen ning Syracuse king Sicily, a ngeni atiu king Italia. Pikabaluan ya kanitang mabie ya, at mapaliaring metung ya kareng matenakan diling taung kinabie manibat kanita angga ngeni. Sasabian da ngening metung ya kareng manimunang sientista ampong matematiku kanitang minunang panaun. 

Karl Benz:
I Karl Friedrich Benz, a misusulat muring "Carl", (November 25, 1844, Karlsruhe, Germany - April 4, 1929, Ladenburg, Germany), metung yang taladiseniung makina (engine designer) ampong inierung kotsing Aleman ("German"), a kikilalanan da reng keraklan a menimbentu king kotsing pupulai king gasolina. 
I Karl Benz ing mitátag king "Benz Company", ing penibatan ning "Daimler-Benz", "DaimlerChrysler", ampo ing "Daimler AG". 

Nicolaus Copernicus:
I Nicolaus Copernicus (a misusulat muring Mikołaj Kopernik o Nikolas Koppernigk, Toruń, Royal Prussia, Polonia (Poland), Febreru 19, 1473 - Frombork, Royal Prussia, Polonia, Mayu 24, 1543), metung yang astronomer a Polaco (Polish). Ya ing mumunang astronomer a migbalangkas king metung a sistemang heliocentric (makasentru king Aldo) a minalili king Yatu antimong sentru ning sikluban ("universe"). Ing kayang makasalesayan a libru, ing "De revolutionibus orbium coelestium" ("On the Revolutions of the Celestial Spheres", Dikil kareng Pamandurut/Rebolusion da reng Bola king Banua), ing tuturing dang umpisa ning makabayung astronomy, ampo ing pinandit ning pamangising a pigmulan ning Rebolusion king Siensia.

Marie Curie:
I Maria Skłodowska-Curie (Noviembri 7, 1867 - Juliu 4, 1934), metung yang physicist ampong chemist a Polaca-Francesa ("Polish-French"). Mibait yang Maria Skłodowska, dapot king Francia nung nu ya menuknangan king keraklan king bie na, kilala re king lagiung Marie Curie o Madame Curie. Mibait ya king Mibait ya king Warsaw king Polonia (Poland). 
Megi neng asawa i Pierre Curie, a akayabe na murin king obra. Miayabe la ketang mumunang galal a Nobel (Nobel Prize) a simbut na. Dakal ya atuklasan a maki kaugnayan king radioactivity. Y aing mumunang taung sinambut aduang Galal a Nobel, at ya pa murin ing sinambut kaniti para kareng mialiwang siensia. Ya ing mumunang babaing profesor king Sorbonne. 
Pikabaluan ya uling ya ing mekatuklas king Radium ampong Polonium, aduang elementung radioactive, at dakal a abalu king kayang pamanigaral kareti. 

Charles Darwin:
I Charles Robert Darwin (February 12, 1809 - April 19, 1882) metung yang Ingles a naturalist. Pekataniag ya uling king kayang pamagmunikala king teoria ning ebolusion. Sasabian na nang teoriang iting ing paralan nung pamanaliwa reng organismu o mabibie ya pin ing pamamili ning kalikasan ("natural selection") ning pekabage o pekaangkup ("survival of the fittest") o pekamatagumpeng organismu kesa kareng aliwang e makanian kaangkup. Sinabi na mu namang mas bage la reng aliwa uling kareng karaniwan a pamanaliwang ibat kareng mutation (pamagbayu kareng gene). Uli mapaliaring mas magamitan la o mas makasaup deng aliwang pamagbayu, mas maragul ing pamikatagun o tsansang mie ya ing organismu, at apamana no reti kareng tutuking dai o henerasiun. Samantala, nung ing pamagbayu sangkan ne ning mas mababang pamikatagun a mie ya ing organismu, mas ditak ing tsansang mipamana ya, at malagua yang mawala iti.
Ing kayang librung mibulalag aniang 1859, ing "On the Origin of Species" (Tungkul king Penibatan da reng Species Uri) ing mitikdo king ebolusion kapamilatan ning pamagmula king metung a pipumpunan anting manimunang pamagpalino ning siensia king pami-aliwa-liwa da reng mabibie king kalikasan. Siniasat na ing ebolusion ning tau ampo ing pamamiling sexual ("sexual selection") king "The Descent of Man, and Selection in Relation to Sex", (Ing Penibatan ning Tau, ampo ing Pamamiling maki Kaugnayan king Sex) at katuki na niti, ing "The Expression of the Emotions in Man and Animals" (Ing Pamipasiag da reng Tau ampo reng Animal king Karelang Panamdaman). Mibulalag ing kayang pamanialiksik kareng tanaman king metung a serie da reng libru; keta namang kayang tauling libru, penigaralan no reng bulati king gabun (earthworm) ampo ing karelang epektu king gabun. 

Pasifiko Kadayatmalatan:
Ing Pasipiku Kadayatmalatan (Kadayatmalatang Pasipiku) o Pacific Ocean keng English, (ibat keng Latin a aus "Mare Pacificum", "tajimic a dayat malat", pepalagyu neng ning Portuguese a talpaglakbe y Ferdinand Magellan) iyang peka maragul diling danuman. 
Makayatsat ya manibat keng Arctic king pangulu anggang Antarctica king mauli, makasepu king Asia ampong Australia king albugan ampong ing America king aslagan. Atin yang 169.2 yutang kilomettu kudradu (65.3 million square miles) keng lualas, iti ing pekamaragul a pangadake ning Pangkabilugan Yatung Ocean – ampong, inya iti sasakupan ne ing mga 46% ning danuman ning yatu. 

Atlantiko Kadayatmalatan:
Ing Atlantic Kadayatmalatan o Atlantaic Ocean keng English, iya ing pangaduang pekamaragul a kadayatmalatan, a sasakupan ne in mga ikalimang dake ning Yatung makapaimbabo. Ing penibatan ning kayang lagyu, ibat ya keng Greek mythologia, a ing kabaldugan na "Dayat Malat ning Atlas." Ing pekamatuang diling meyagkas o misulat atiu king "Ding Amlat" nang Herodotus mga 450 BC (I 202). Ing Atlantic bantug ya kareng dakal a miyayaliwang amlat a mengapalyari, metung na ing pangalbug ning RMS Titanic inyang Abril 14, 1912 kaibat neng tiran ing iceberg.

Indian Kadayatmalatan:
Ing Indian Kadayatmalatan o Indian Ocean keng English, iyang pangatlung pekamaragul a danuman keti yatu, a sasakup mga 20% ning danuman ning Yatu. Makasepu ya king pangulu king Mauling Asia (Kayabe ne ing Indian subcontinent, makayan yang meyaus); king albugan ing Arabian Telapulu at Africa; king aslagan ing Malay Telapulu, ding Pulu ning Sunda, at ing Australia; at king mauli ing Mauling Ocean. Makakawani ya keng Atlantic Kadyatmalatan mga 20° king aslagan meridian pupulayi king mauli manibat Cape Agulhas.
Ding kayang daungan.
Port of Somalia, Somalia
Dalerayan.
"Much of this text is based on public domain text by US Naval Oceanographer at: http://oceanographer.navy.mil/indian.html"

Richard Feynman:
I Richard Phillips Feynman (; May 11, 1918 February 15, 1988) metung yang physicist a Americanung mekilala king path integral formulation ning quantum mechanics, ing teoria ning quantum electrodynamics, ing physics ning superfluidity ning supercooled a likidung helium, ampo king particle theory. Uling karing ayambag na king pamanalkus ("development") ning quantum electrodynamics, megi yang metung kareng tinanggap king Galal a Nobel king Physics aniang 1965, kayabe ya i Julian Schwinger ampo i Shin-Ichiro Tomonaga. I Feynman ing ginawa king metung a pamaglarawan kareng mathematical expressions a dakal a gagamit ("widely-used pictorial representation scheme") para king pamangimut ("behavior") da reng pirasung subatomic ("subatomic particles"), a kaibat pepelaguan dang Feynman diagrams. 

Henry Ford:
I Henry Ford (Juliu 30, 1863 - Abril 7, 1947) metung yang inieru ampong negosianting Americanu. Migumpisa yang gagawang kotsi kanitang 1896, at tetag ne ing Ford Motor Company. Inalkus ("developed") ne ing sistema nung nukarin makatutuk ya king metung a talapagobra ing metung a malating dake ning prosesu ning pamangawa king metung a produktu. Uli na ning kayang aisip, apaliari da ing gáwang tutung dakal a kotsi. Ayasawa ne i Clara Bryant, at mika metung lang anak, i Edsel Bryant Ford. Likuan neng Ford ing kayang balen king Detroit, Michigan ba nang umpisan ing kayang karerang makaparikil kareng makina. 

Sigmund Freud:
I Sigmund Freud (Mayo 6, 1856 - Setiembre 23, 1939) metung yang neurologist (doctor a manulu kareng sakit ning sistema nerviosa) ampong bantug a psychologist. Tuturing deng "ibpa ning psychoanalysis ("the father of psychoanalysis) deng dakal a tau."

Galileo Galilei:
I Galileo Galilei (15 February 1564 – 8 January 1642) metung yang Tuscan (Italianung) physicist, matematiku, astronomer, ampong philosopher a maki maragul a papil king rebolusiung sientipiku. Kayabe kareng kayang agawa ing pamaniamasan king teloskopiu ampo reng obserbasiun king astronomiang menibat kaniti, ampo ing suporta para king Copernicanism. Inaus deng "father of modern observational astronomy" ("ibpa ning makabayung observational astronomy") i Galileo"father of modern physics" (ibpa ning makabayung physics")"father of science" (ibpa ning siensia) ampong “the Father of Modern Science” (Ibpa ning Makabayung Siensia) Ing pangimut da reng bageng para-pareu ing pamagpabilis (motion of uniformly accelerated objects), a mituturu kareng kursu king physics neng sekundaria ampo neng umpisa ning kolehiu, penigaralan neng Galileo antimo ing paksa ning kinematics. Kayabe ya kareng kayang ambag observational astronomy ing pamanuklas kareng apat a pekamaragul a bulan o "satellite" ning Jupiter, a mipalaguan w:Galilean moons anting pamangalang kaya, ampo ing pamagumasid ampong pamaniuri kareng w:sunspot. Menigobra ya murin i Galileo king siensiang miapse (applied science) ampong teknolohia, at semasan ne diseniu ing paraluman ("compass").

Christiaan Huygens:
I Christiaan Huygens ( king Ingles, king Holandes) (Abril 14, 1629 – Juliu 8, 1695) metung yang Holandes (Dutch) a physicist, matematiku ampong astronomer a mibait king The Hague. Kabalitan ya king kayang paniwalang ing salâ ("light") metung yang uri ning alun (wave). Atuklasan ne ing Titan, ing pekamaragul a bulan ning Saturn aniang 1655. Pekapanigaralan na la murin deng telasingsing ning Saturn, at aniang 1656, atuklasan nang gawa la king batu deti. Menigobra ya king pamangawa kareng eksaktung relo, at inimbentu ne ing w:pendulum clock aniang Kapaskuan ning 1656.

Edward Jenner:
I Edward Jenner, FRS, (May 17 1749 – January 26 1823) metung yang sientipikung Ingles a megaral ketang kayang paligid a likas (natural surroundings) king Berkeley, Gloucestershire, England. Pikabaluan ya antimong ing mumunang doctor a migpakilala ampong menigaral king bakunang cowpox, lipat ning minuna na neng ginamit Benjamin Jesty, metung a ortelanu, ing cowpox ba yang e miawa king bulutung tutu (smallpox). Paniwalan dang atuklasan na muring dili nang Jenner iti.

University of La Salette:
Ing University of La Salette metung yang institusion ning matas a pamagaral king Santiago Lakanbalen, Filipinas. Metung ya kareng masanting dili 
Inutusan nong Msgr. Constance Jurgens, a kanita Arzobispo ning Tuguegarao, Cagayan, deng Missionaries of Our Lady of La Salette bang mitatag pipagaralan a makibat king masipit a pamangailangan da reng memalen ning Isabela, at tinikdo de ing La Salette of Santiago, metung a escuelang secundaria, aniang 1950. Uli ning daragul a pamangailangan king matas a pamgaral, mitas ya king uring colegiu iting institusion kasaup la reng madreng Maryknoll. Aniang 1957, i Rev. Fr. Jose R. Nacu, M.S., ing mumunang misonariung Filipino ning Our Lady of La Salette, a me-ordinang pari king Fall River, Massachusetts, ing meging mumunang Rector a Filipinu ning La Salette of Santiago College. Kalabas ning panaun, aniang 1998, megi yang universidad ing La Salette of Santiago lalam ning pamanibala nang Rev. Fr. Romeo Gonzales, M.S., Ph.D. 
Kabalitan ya king charism Reconciliation o Pamikasundung Pasibayu ("Reconciliare") ing sentrung complex ning University of La Salette king Santiago Lakanbalen, a maki suglung a campus (extension campus) king Silang, Cavite. Mirarasan ya king kayang serbisiu ing maleparan a mauli (south) nang dake ning lalawigan ning Isabela, nung nu ating suglung a tanggapan (extension offices) kareng miayaliwang balen para kareng kursung pangkaleldo (summer courses).
King salukuyan, titikdo re ing University Hospital, metung a ospital a katlung balitang (tertiary hospital) a maki budget a anam a ralang miliun (600 million) a pesus, anting pakibat king daragul a pamangailangan king pamaningat king kabulasan (health care).

Papa Piu VII:
I Pope Piu VII, OSB (Agostu 14, 1740—Agostu 20, 1823), mibait Count Barnaba Niccolò Maria Luigi Chiaramonti, meging Papa manibat Marsu 14, 1800 anggang Agostu 20, 1823.
Talambie.
Y Chiaramonti mibait ya king Cesena, ing anak ning Conde Scipione Chiaramonti; ing ima na i, Giovanna Chiaramonti, anak neng babai ning marquese Ghini. Mikiabe ya kareng Benedictine order inyang 1756 king Abbey ning S.Maria del Monte ning Cesena at elilan neng Gregorio ing kayang mumunang lagiu. Meging yang talaturu king Benedictine colleges king Parma ampong Roma. Mitukituki ing kayang pangatas puestu kaibat ning pangayalal ning familiang kakaluguran, i Giovanni Angelo Braschi, bilang Papa Piu VI (1775–99). Inyang 1776 i Piu VI mirinan yang puestu ing 34-banuang Barnaba, nung nu ya tuturu king monasterio ning S. Anselmo king Roma abbot "in commendam" king kayang monasterio/ Kaibat ning kayang panga-tuldung obispo ning Tivoli, malapit Roma, i Pius VI gewa neng cardinal ampong Obispu ning Imola inyang Pebreru 1785.

Brigitte Bardot:
I Brigitte Bardot (French IPA: ) (mibait Septiembri 28, 1934) metung yang Frances a artista, modelu, talakanta, ampong aktibista king katuliran da reng animal a tuturing da kareng pekamaulagang sex symbol da reng dekadang 1950 ampong 1960. Metung ya kareng ditak mung artistang babai ibat king Europang pinsinan na ning mediang Americanu.
Aniang dekadang 1970, kaibat nang migretiru king pamag-artista, megi yang aktibista para king katuliran da reng animal, bageng gagawan na angga ngeni. Aniang dekadang 1990, migsalita ya dikil king kayang paglalawe kareng bageng anti king imigrasiun king Francia, Islam king Francia, ampong homosexuality. Mimua la reng mapilan a tau ibat kareng grupung deti uli ning kayang kritisismu kareti.

Sarah Bernhardt:
I Sarah Bernhardt (mibait king Paris, France aniang Octubri 23, 1844; mete Marzu 26, 1923) metung yang artista king teatro, a meyaus a "the most famous actress in the history of the world" (ing pekataniag a artistang babai king kasalesayan ning yatu). Sinikat ya king entabladu ning Europa aniang dekadang 1870. E migluat, lalage ne king Europa ampo king America. Mekilala ya antimong seriosung artista, at ikua ne ing palayong "The Divine Sarah" (ing mala-diosang Sarah). 

Marlon Brando:
I Marlon Brando (Abril 3, 1924 – Juliu 1, 2004) metung yang sikat a artistang Americanu. Pikabaluan yang dili kareng papil na kareng pelikulang "A Streetcar Named Desire" (1951), "The Wild One" (1953), "The Godfather" (1972), "Superman" (1978), "Apocalypse Now" (1979), ampong "The Island of Dr. Moreau" (1996). 

Charlie Chaplin:
I Charlie Chaplin ( Abril 16, 1889 – Diciembri 25, 1977) metung yang sikat a Ingles a artista ampong talagawang pelikula. Bantug ne kareta pang pelikulang “silent” o e sasabi. Lalage ya, mag-direct, gagawang script, ampong mag-produce kareti.
Alus pitu yang pulung (70) banuang lalage i Charlie Chaplin, a migumpisa aniang lima yang banua, angga aniang alus walu neng pulu (80). Ing tauan a pekamaralas nang lalagen ya pin itang ausan dang "the Tramp" (Ing Bagamundu/Taung Luyun-luyun o Kalat-kalat). Iting "Tramp" tau yang mapinu pangimut, at makasulud amerikana, maliwalas a pantalon, sapatus ampong matuling a kupia. 

Marlene Dietrich:
I Marlene Dietrich ; (December 27, 1901 – May 6, 1992) metung yang artista ampong talakantang Aleman. Ya ing tuturing dang mumunang artistang Aleman a migtagumpe king Hollywood. 
Kilub ning makaba nang karera, manibat aniang migumpisa yang talakanta king cabaret, chorus girl, ampong artista kareng pelikula king Berlin aniang dekadang 1920, sikat artista king Hollywood kanitang dekadang 1930, lalage kareng sundalus aniang Kaduang Guerrang Pang-meto Yatu, ampong internasional a artista king teatro manibat aniang dekadang 1950 anggang 1970, megi yang metung kareng pekamaulagang simbolo da reng pelikula aniang kaduang pulung dilanua/siglu. King pamag-ranggu ning American Film Institute kasiam (No. 9) ya kareng Mapiang Diling Artista king Mabilug a Panaun.

Bruce Lee:
I Bruce Jun Fan Lee (November 27, 1940 - July 20, 1973) metung martial artist ampong artistang Chinese American. Pekakilala ya uling king pamagpasikat na king martial arts king America, aniang ya ing bida kareng tuki-tuking pelikulang gawa king Hong Kong, a sinikat king mabilug a yatu. Ing pekasikat kareti yapin ing 'Enter The Dragon', a pepalage ra aniang mete ne. Misteriosu ing kayang pangamate, a miliari aniang gagawan ne itang makapangilabut lagiung 'Game of Death', aniang kayang kasikatan (alus aduang pulung banua kaibat na niti, mete ya ing kayang anak, i Brandon Lee, aniang gagawa ya muring pelikula). Tiru no mu namang martial arts Lee deng aliwang pikabaluan a tau, alimbawa deng artistang di Steve McQueen ampo i James Coburn, ampo ing talapamialung basketball a i Kareem Abdul-Jabbar. Aimpluensian no reng aliwang artistang sinikat king pamangamit kareng martial arts kareng karelang pelikula, alimbawa i Jackie Chan, i Jet Li, ampo i Chuck Norris. Atin yang malating papil i Jackie Chan king 'Enter The Dragon', at co-star ya i Chuck Norris king "Way of The Dragon". Kanitang 1993, megawa ya ing metung a pelikula tungkul king bie nang Bruce Lee. Tutu ing keraklan kaniti, oneng ating bage pikudta ra mu. 
I Bruce Lee ing linageng bida king "The Big Boss", "Fist of Fury", "The Way of the Dragon", "Enter the Dragon" ampo king "Game of Death".

Marilyn Monroe:
I Marilyn Monroe (Juniu 1, 1926 - Agostu 5, 1962) metung yang Americanang artista, talakanta, ampong modelu. Metung ya kareng pekasikat a artista king pelikula aniang dekadang 1950 ampong 1960. 

Le Corbusier:
I Charles-Edouard Jeanneret-Gris (lagiung pangabait), (Octubri 6, 1887 - Agostu 27, 1965), a mas makikilala king sikat a lagiung Le Corbusier, metung yang arkitektu ampong talasulat a mibait king Suiza (Switzerland). Aniang dekadang 1930, megi yang memalen a Frances (French). Pikabaluan ya kareng kayang teoria tungkul king Makabayung Arkitektura. Kayabe kareng kayang planu ing pamagpasanting king tuknangan da reng tau kareng lakanbalen o ciudad uling dakal lang taung mabibieng pakakalulu king kayang bangsa kanita. Mayayakit la king mabilug a yatu deng kayang diseniu. 
Pekilupa na ing pamamintura king pamag-diseniung kasangkapan bale o mueblis.

Pieter Bruegel a Matua:
I Pieter Brueghel a Matua (Pieter Brueghel the Elder) (c. 1525 – Setiembri 9, 1569) metung yang Holandes o Flemish a pintor ampong talagawang grabadu (printmaker) kanitang Renaissance. Pikabaluan ya kareng kayang landscape ampong eksena king bieng ortelanu. Inaus deng 'Peasant Bruegel' (Bruegel a Ortelanu) ba yang makilala kareng aliwang miembru ning pamiliang Brueghel. Nanupata, ya ing pekataniag karela, at keraklan, nung i "Brueghel" ing tutunggen da reng tau, ya ing amanuan da. Manibat kanitang 1559, leko ne ing 'h' king kayang lagiu, at inumpisan nong pirman Bruegel.deng kayang pipinturan. 

Batuin:
Ing batuin metung yang maragul a bola king outer space a gawa king misnang paling plasma (a balamu gas). Ibat king nuclear fusion ing enerhia da reng batuin. Uli na niting enerhia, makagawa lang sala, ania balamu masisilab la. Lupa lang mangakintab a tuldik manibat king Yatu deng batuin, uling asno karayu deti, at uli ning angin king atmosphere a makapadurut king Yatu, mas masákit la mu namang akit. Ing kekatamung Aldo ing batuin a pekamalapit kekatamu. Dudurut ya king Aldo ing Yatu king metung a dudurutan ("orbit") a maki tabas a tulungkaba ("oval"). Solar System ing asu da king Aldo ampo reng eganaganang dudurut kaniti. Dakal la pa deng aliwang batuin a maki planetang dudurut karela. Menakit na lang aliwang planetang dudurut kareng aliwang batuin, pero ala la pang ikit a planetang kalupa ning Yatu. 
Ing batuin a pekamalapit king kekatamung Solar System, ampo ing kaduang pekamalapit king Yatu, ya pin ing Proxima Centauri. Maki dayu yang triliun a kilometru, o 4.2 light years. Ing buri nang sabian niti, 4.2 banua ing milabas bayu ya miras king Yatu ing salâ manibat king Proxima Centauri. 
Ukulan da reng astronomer a dakal lang dakal deng batuin king Sikluban. Ing tantia da, maki 70 sextillion a batuin. Misusulat ya iting 70,000,000,000,000,000,000,000, a 230 billion a besis o ukdu king kantidad da reng batuin king Milky Way (ing kekatamung galaxy). 
Misna lang katua deng keraklan kareng batuin. Isipan dang maki edad lang atiu king pilatan ning metung (1) ampong apulung (10) biliung banua. King karelang tantia, 13.7 biliun a banua ing edad da reng pekamatua kareti. Agpang kareng sientista, ini kanu ing edad ning Sikluban o Universe. 
Mangalati la reng aliwang batuin, kabang mangaragul no man deng aliwa. Ing malating dili, ila pin deng neutron star (a meteng batuin), a kasindagul mung ciudad o lakanbalen. Misna ya kasiksik ing neutron star. Nung kuma kang metung a tumpak o "layer" a maki kapal a metung a micron, at binalut me iti king metung a tangki, metung yang baluti ("armor") nung nu alang maliaring lunsut. E posibli iti, uling king bayat ning tangki, lumbug ya angga king libutad ning yatu. Deng batuin a supergiant ing pekamaragul a bage king Sikluban. Maki lapad (diameter) lang metung a libung ukdu kesa king Aldo (ing dudurutan na o orbit ning Jupiter). Miras lang 1.6 biliun a kilometru kangatba ("across") deti. Kayabe ya king dane da reng supergiant a batuin ing Polaris (o North Star), ampo ing batuin a Betelgeuse, king Orion constellation. 
Ibat king nuclear fusion ing salâ, pali ampong aliwang enerhia da reng batuin - metung a prosesung manalili king metung a chemical element paras king aliwa. 
Gawa la king hydrogen ampong helium deng keraklan kareng batuin. Gagawan deng helium ing hydrogen. (Pota namang malapit ne mung "mate" ing metung a batuin, magumpisa na ne mang alilan kareng aliwang chemical element ing helium, antimo ing carbon ampo ing oxygen). Dakal ya gagawan a enerhia ing fusion. Sisinag ya padayu karela ing enerhiang gagawan da reng batuin. Electromagnetic radiation iti, a keraklan salang mayayakit o "visible light". 
Neng mayayakit la king banua neng bengi a alang teleskopiu, lalto lang mas masala deng aliwang batuin kesa kareng kalupa dang batuin. Ing aus da kaniting pamialiwa, apparent magnitude. Ating aduang sangkan kaniting pamialiwa king mayayakit a salâ. Nung mas malapit ya ing metung a batuin kesa king aliwang halus kapareu na niti, lunto yang mas masalâ iti. Alang pamialiwa iti king metung a kandilang laltong mas masala kesa king maragul a silab a marayung marayu. 
Nu namang maragul yang mayap o mapali yang mayap ing metung a batuin kesa king aliwa, at alus pareu la dayu, lunto yang mas masalâ itang mas maragul o mas mapali. Pareu ya iti kareng aduang silab a pareu dayu king manakit. Lunto yang mas masala itang mas maragul, o itang mas mapali.
Bukud king salâ, magpalual la mu namang solar wind ampong neutrino deng batuin. Misna lang lantiktik a pirasu o "particles" deti.
Panibatan na la mu naman ning gravity field deng batuin. Ini ing sangkan nung bakit mánatili lang malapit karela deng planeta. E murin malagad a mayayakit lang dudurut king metung at metung deng batuin. Maliliari iti nung mikanlapit la reti. Gravity murin ing sangkan na niti, balamu ing Yatu neng dudurut ya king Aldo. Ukulan dang maralas la deting batuin a binary (ibat king katayang binary a mangabaldugang "adua"). Atin ping grupu da reng atlu o maigit pang batuin a dudurut king metung at metung. Ing Proxima Centauri ing pekamalati king grupu da reng atlung batuin. 
E pare-pareu ing kapal ning pamikalat da reng batuin king espasiu. Makagrupu la reti kareng galaxy. Atin yang dalan-dalan a biliun a batuin ing karaniwan a galaxy.

Donatello:
I Donato di Niccolò di Betto Bardi (a ausan dang Donatello deng keraklan) (1386 - Diciembri 13, 1466) metung yang talalalang o "artist" a Italianu kanitang Renaissance. Mebie ya king Florence, at tutung taniag ya uling metung ya kareng biasang diling eskultor o taladukit kanitang panaun na. Ginamit yang metung a kaparalanan o "technique" ning pamandukit, a ausan dang 'shallow relief', nung nu balamu tutu ya itang kayang obra. 
Anak neng Niccolo di Betto Bardi, at mibait ya king Florence. Aniang meragul yang bagia, megaral ya kang Filippo Brunelleschi, itang arkitektu. Sinaup ya rin king taladukit o eskultor a i Lorenzo Ghiberti aniang gagawa yang istatua para king Battistero di San Giovanni. Kayabe ya kareng pikabaluan diling obra nang ing istatua nang "Maria Magdalena" ampo itang istatua nang David a kasindagul ning tau.

Vincent van Gogh:
I Vincent Willem van Gogh (30 Marzu 1853 – 29 Juliu 1890) metung yang talapinta o pintor a Holandes (Dutch) king estilung Post-Impressionist. Kayabe la kareng pikabaluan dili, pekasikat ampong mal dili king yatu deng kayang pinintura ampong ginulis.
Aniang bayu-bayu ya pang miras king edad i Van Gogh, megobra ya para king metung a cumpania da reng mamisaling bageng maki kaugnayan king kalalangan o "art". E ya migumpisa king karera na antimong talalalang o artist manibat kanitang 1880. Aniang mumuna, deta pamung maralumdum ("sombre") a kule ing kayang gagamitan, anggang atupan na ing Impressionism ampo ing Neo-Impressionism king Paris. Inabe na ing masiglang kule ampong paralan ning pamamintura king estilung iti ketang kayang sariling pamamintura, anggang mika sarili yang estilu nung nu ya mekilala. Ganap yang mealkus ("fully developed") ing estilung iti aniang menuknangan ya king Arles, Francia. Maigit lang aduang libu (2,000) deng kayang obra, kayabe no reng siam a ralan (900) a pinintura ampong libu dinalan (1,100) a ginulis ("drawings and sketches"), aniang tauling apulung banua ning kayang bie. Melalang la reng pikabaluan nang diling obra aniang tauling aduang banua ning kayang bie, nung kapilan pinutut ne ing metung a dake ning kayang kailing balugbug kaibat nang mesira ning kayang pamikaluguran kang Paul Gauguin. Kaibat na niti, susumpungan ne ning sakit king pamanisip, a yang sangkan ning kayang pamagpakamate. 
Aliwang website (karinan king Aptas).
[http://www.artchive.com/artchive/V/vangogh.html]

Francisco Goya:
I Francisco José de Goya y Lucientes (March 30, 1746 – April 16, 1828) metung yang talapintura ampong talagawang grabadu ("printmaker") ibat king Aragon, Espania. Metung yang talapintura king corti ning Ari ning Espania ampong talaulat king kasalesayan ("chronicler of history"). Tuturing deng tauli kareng Old Masters ampo ing mumuna king estilung makabayu. Uli ning paksa da reng kayang obra, ampo ing matatag ("bold") nang pangamat king pamamintura, migsilbi yang modelu kareng mas tauling dai o henerasiun da reng talapinta, anti i Manet ampo i Picasso. 
Suglung Palual.

Frida Kahlo:
I Magdalena Carmen Frida Kahlo y Calderón (Juliu 6, 1907 - Juliu 13, 1954), a maralas dang ausan Frida Kahlo, metung yang talapintang Mexicana. Mekilala ya kareng kayang obrang surreal ampong misnang personal. Ing asawa na yapin i Diego Rivera, a metung muring taniag a talapinta.
Aliwang website (karinan king Aptas).
Para king cumpletung talambie, letratu, pinintura, cronologia, libru ampong pelicula, lon ye ing:

Henri Matisse:
I Henri Matisse (Diciembri 31, 1869 - Noviembri 3, 1954) metung yang talalalang ("artist") ibat king Francia. Mapangamit ya king kule, at ginawa yang ginulis ("drawing"), dinukit ("sculptures") ampong pinintura ("paintings"). Metung ya kareng manimunang diling talalalang ning kaduang pulung dilanua/siglu i Matisse.

Michelangelo:
I Michelangelo di Lodovico Buonarroti Simoni (Marzu 6, 1475 - Marzu 18, 1564) metung yang taladukit (eskultor), talapinta (pintor), arkitektu ampong poeta o watas a Italianu. Metung ya kareng kabalitan nang diling obra ing "David". Mebie ya aniang panaun ning Renaissance. Agiu nang mamintura kareng adua nang gamat. Nung mapagal ne ing metung a gamat, mamalis ya ketang metung. Pinintura neng Michelangelo ing kisami ning Sistine Chapel ampo retang palamuti ketang kayang dingding. 
Deni reng mapilan kareng pikabaluan nang obra:
Lon la murin deti.
Maki kaugnayan la kang Michelangelo deng makatuking pintor ning Renaissance:

I. M. Pei:
I Ieoh Ming Pei () (b. April 26, 1917), a mas kilala antimong I. M. Pei, metung yang arkitektung Americanung mibait king China. Metung kareng sinambut king Pritzker Prize, tuturing deng tauli kareng matenakan king arkitekturang "high modernist". Mahilig ya king alkus o pormang "abstract", kapamilatan da reng materialis a batu, sementu, salamin ("glass") ampong aseru o bakal ("steel"). Mapaliaring metung ya i Pei kareng pekamatagumpeng arkitektung Asianu ning kaduang pulung dilanua/siglu, at mayayakit la king mabilug a yatu deng kayang obra. 

Pablo Picasso:
I Pablo Ruiz Picasso (Octubri 25, 1881 king Málaga, Espania - Abril 8, 1973) metung yang talapinta (pintor) ampong taladukit (eskultor) a Espaniol. Tuturing deng metung kareng manimunang talalalang ("artist") ning yatu aniang kaduang pulung dilanua o siglu. Ing kumpletu nang lagiu, Pablo Diego José Francisco de Paula Juan Nepomuceno María de los Remedios Cipriano de la Santísima Trinidad Clito Ruiz y Picasso. Pekakilala ya antimong metung kareng mitátag king Cubism. King Cubism, babangalan no o pamirasuan ning pintor deng bage-bage, at piaben-abayan nong pasibayu deti king alkus o pormang abstract. Tatantian dang miras lang 13,500 a larawan a pinintura, 100,000 a grabadu ("prints or engravings"), 34,000 a larawan king libru ampong 300 a dinukit o ("sculpture") ampong seramiku ("ceramics") deng kayang lelangan. 
Malati ya pamu i Picasso, biasa neng gumulis ampong mamintura. Ing mumuna nang katayang sinabi, yapin ing "lápiz".
Aniang siam yang pulung (90) banua, pepakit do reng aliwa nang obra king metung a "exhibition" king Louvre king Paris. Ya ing mumunang mabieng talalalang a pigsadia rang anti kaniti king Louvre. 
Apat la reng megi nang ának Picasso kareng atlung bábai. Mete ya king ataki king pusu kanitang 1973.

Wernher von Braun:
I Dr. Wernher Magnus Maximilian Freiherr "('Baron')" von Braun (Marsu 23 1912 – Juniu 16 1977), metung yang Aleman a rocket physicist ampong astronautics engineer, meging yang metung kareng manimunung anyu keng pamanalkus ning rocket technology king Aleman ampong United States. Wernher von Braun neng misan mayayaus yang dakilang rocket scientist na ning pang20 dilanua. century.

Jakob Ackeret:
I Jakob Ackeret (1898-1981) metung yang Swissang aeronautical engineer. Metung yang maleparan mayayakit bilang manimumang aeronautics experts na ning pang20 dilanua.
Kebaitan at pegaralan.
I Jakob Ackeret mibait ya inyang 1898 king Switzerland. Tinggap ne ing kayang Diploma degree keng Mechanical Engineering ibat ETH Zurich inyang 1920 lalam ning pamamalakad nang A. Stodola. Manibat 1921 anggang 1927 megobra ya king Ludwig Prandtl king "Aerodynamische Versuchsanstalt" king Göttingen, nung nu ikit na ing mayalamat a panaun ning pamnalkus ning makabayung fluid dynamics. Tinggap ne ing kayang Ph.D ibat ETH Zurich inyang 1927.

Raphael:
I Raffaello Sanzio, a maralas dang ausan king mumuna nang lagiu (Raphael king Ingles, Raffaello king orihinal a Italianu) (April 6, 1483 - April 6, 1520) metung yang talapinta (pintor) ampong arkitektu ning Renaissance. Kayabe nang Leonardo da Vinci ampo i Michelangelo, tuturing deng metung kareng manimunang pintor ning High Renaissance. 
Pikabaluan yang dili uling kareng kayang larawan a Madonna ampong Christ Child, ampo kareng pinintura na king Vatican king Roma, Italia. 
<br clear=all>

Wiesbaden:
Ing Wiesbaden iya ing tungkung lakanbalen ning federal state ning Hesse king Germany. Atiu keng Ilug ning Rhine, maulingalbugan ning Frankfurt. Iti dake ne ning Metropolitan area Rhein/Main.

Darmstadt:
Ing Darmstadt metung lakanbalen ning Hesse, Germany. Ing lakanbalen a (commune), a mika 122,24 km² at populasyun a 142,191.

Kassel:
Ing Kassel metung lakanbalen ning Hesse, Germany. Ing lakanbalen a (commune), a mika 106.79 km² at populasyun a 193,803.

Albrecht Dürer:
I Albrecht Dürer (Mayu 21, 1471 – Abil 6, 1528) metung yang Aleman a talapinta, talagawang grabadu ampong matematiku. 
Mibait ya at mete king Nuremberg, Alemania, at pikabaluan yang dili anting metung a talagawang grabadu. da reng old masters. Maralas, tuki-tuki la ("series") la reng kayang grabadu o limbag, ania ating grupu da reng miayaliwang milimbag tungkul king metung a paksa. Ing pekataniag a serie ya pin itang "Apocalypse" (1498), ampo detang aduang serie tungkul king pasiun nang Jesucristo, itang "Great Passion" (1498-1510) ampo ing "Little Passion" (1510-1511). 
Deng kilalang dili kareng tunggal ("individual") a grabadu nang Dürer ila pin detang include "Knight, Death, and the Devil" (1513), "Saint Jerome in his Study" (1514) and "Melencolia I" (1514). Deng taganang mikintal king kaisipan ning malda ila pin deng grabadung dukit king dutung, detang "Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse" (1497-1498) ibat king serieng "Apocalypse", itang "Rhinoceros", ampong dakal a sariling larawan king laru (oil). Mapaliaring aliwa mismu i Dürer ing dinukit kareng kayang dukit dutung ("woodcuts"), nun e pepagawa ya king metung a magematan a taladukit a tinuking masalese kareng kayang ginulis. Memintura yang mapilan a obrang makaugne king relihiun king laru, at memintura yang dakal a obra king acuarela ("watercolor") at dakal ya mu naman ginulis. Mapaliaring deng tauli ing pikabaluan dili kareng kayang obra ngeni uling dakal a makabayung copiang mikalalat kareti.
Mibantug ne king mingatba nang dake ning Europa i Dürer uling kareng kayang grabadu bayu ya miras trenta (30). Dakal lang sasabing ya ing pekamaulagang talalalang ("artist") king Pangulung Europa aniang Renaissance.

Agartala:

John Argyris:
I John Hadji Argyris (Greek: Ιωάννης Αργύρης; * Agostu 19 1913 i king Volos, Greece; – Abril 2 2004 king Stuttgart) iya ing metung kareng linalang keng Finite Element Method (FEM) at dati Professor king University ning Stuttgart ampong Director na ning Institute para Statics ampong Dynamics na ning Aerospace Structures. 
Ing kayang bapa Constantin Carathéodory metung yang Greek mathematician na ning Makabayung Panaun.
Scientific a obra.
I Argyris kasangkut ya keng pamanalkus ning Finite Element Method kambe nang Ray W. Clough ampong Olgierd Zienkiewicz kaibat ning maranun a mathematical minunang obra nang Richard Courant.

Tala da reng Aerospace Engineers:
Iti ing tala da reng aerospace engineers, maldang misane keng o magsaneng aerospace engineering
at bantug la para mikbit la kareng Wikipedia articulu.
Lawe n ya rin ing Tala da reng engineers - para kareng tala da reng engineers ibat ka reng aliwang disciplina.

Agra:
Ing Agra ( ) (, ) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king pampang ning Ilug Yamuna king pangulung estadu ning Uttar Pradesh, India. Babanggitan de king epikung Mahabharata nung nu ya mayayaus Agrabana, o Paraiso. Binili neng Ptolemy, ing taniag a matenakan king heograpia kanitang kaduang siglu o dilanua, ketang kayang mapa ning yatu. 
Pemuntukan neng Sultan Sikandar Lodi aniang banuang 1506. Megi yang kabalitan antimong tungku o capitoliu da reng emperador a Mughal manibat 1526 anggang 1658, at metung yang manimunang pupuntalan da reng turista uling kareng gusali nang ibat king panaun a Mughal, kayabe no reng Taj Mahal, Agra Fort ampong Fatehpur Sikri, a purus UNESCO World Heritage Sites. 
Suglung palual.
<br clear=all>

Ahmedabad:
Ing Ahmedabad metung yang maragul a lakanbalen o ciudad king Aslagang ("Western") India. Iti ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen king estadu ning Gujarat, ampo ing kapitung pekamaragul king India. Alus 5.1 miliun (5,100,000) ing kayang populasiun. Lalabas ya keti ing ilug ning Sabarmati. Kabalitan ya ing Ahmedabad ketang kayang industria ning pamangawang tela, ania ausan deng ""the Manchester of the East"." (ing Manchester ning Aslagan). 

Ahmadnagar:
Ing Ahmednagar lakanbalen (ciudad) ya king Distritu ning Ahmednagar king estadu ning Maharashtra, India, king kaili ning ilug Sina, manga 120 kilometru king pangulu aslagan ning Pune ampong 120 km manibat king Aurangabad.

Aizawl:
Ing Aizawl (populasiun 339,812) ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen/ciudad, ampo ing tungku/capitoliu, ning estadu ning Mizoram king India. 

Ajmer:
"Ining articulu tungkul ya king lakanbalen/ciudad king kalibudtang Rajasthan; para ketang labuad king kasalesayan, lon ye ing Ajmer region.
Ing Ajmer (Hindi: अजमेर ) metung yang lakanbalen/ciudad king Distritu ning Ajmer, estadu ning Rajasthan, India. Makapadurut la king lakanbalen, nung nu ya memuntukan i Prithviraj Chauhan, deng Kabundukan ning Aravali. Kapitna yang miliun (500,000) ing kayang populasiun kanitang 2001. Pekilagiu de king lakanbalen ing metung a distritu, ampo ing sadiang lalawigan ning British India, ing Ajmer-Merwara. Aniang mitimawa ya king Britania ing India, megi yang estadu ning Ajmer ing lalawigan a ita angga kanitang Noviembre 1, 1956, nung kapilan ya misanib king estadu ning Rajasthan. 

Akola:
Ing Akola (Hindi/Marathi: अकोला) metung yang municipal corporation ampong lakanbalen a mauluga king kasalesayan, kultura, pulitika, relihiun ampong agrikultura king estadu ning Maharashtra king labuad ning Vidarbha, kalibudtang India. Maki dayu yang 600 kilometru king aslagan ("east") ning tungku/capitoliu ning estadu ning Maharashtra, ing Mumbai (sadiang ""Bombay""), at 250 km king albugan ("west") ning lakanbalen ning Nagpur. Keti ing tungku ning Amravati division, a yang katumbas ning sadiang lalawigan ning Berar lalam ning Britania. 
Dalerayan.
nilesh bobade(actor)

Aligarh:
Ing Aligarh (Hindi: अलीगढ़, Urdu: علی گڑھ) lakanbalen/ciudad ya king Distritu ning Aligarh, king Uttar Pradesh, metung a estadu king pangulu ning India. Maki dayu yang 90 milia king mauli-aslagan ("south-east") ning New Delhi. Iti ing sentru ning Aligarh District, Aligarh Police Range aampong Aligarh Division, at maki populasiun yang kapitnang miliun. Pikabaluan ya antimong balen a maki universidad ("university town") nung nu ya mayayakit ing taniag a Aligarh Muslim University. 
Suglung palual.
<br clear=all>

Prayagraj:
Ing Prayagraj o Allahabad (Hindi: इलाहाबाद; Urdu: الہ آباد ) metung yang lakanbalen/ciudad king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh king pangulu ("north") ning India
Ibat ya ing lagiu ketang binie ning Mughal a Emperador Akbar kanitang 1583. Kareng amanu king India, ing keraklan dang gagamitan a lagiu ya pin ing ; Ing Allah mangabaldugan yang "Dios" king king Arabo (king kontekstung iti, king Islam), at ing "-ābād", Persian ya para king "to construct or to create" (mitikdo o maglalang, ing kabaligtaran ning "barbad", manyira). Maulaga ya ing lugal ning Allahabad maki lagiung Prayāga kanitang minuna (Sanskrit para king "lugal ning sakripisiu", at Prayāg king makabayung Hindi) king relihiun a Hindu uling atiu king lugal nung nu la misasanib deng banal a ilug a Ganga ampong Yamuna, at keti ya murin makiabe karela ing e makaltong ("invisible") ilug ning Sarasvati. 

Alwar:
Ing Alwar metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king estadu ning Rajasthan king aslagan ("west") ning India. Iti ing sentru ning pamanibala king Distritu ning Alwar, at sadia neng tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ning princely state ning Alwar or Ulwar king British India kanita. Maki dayu yang 160 km king mauli ("south") ning Delhi, at manga 150 km king pangulu ("north") ning Jaipur, ing tungku ning Rajasthan. 
Opisial a website (karinan king Aptas).
www.alwar.nic.in

Ambala:
Ing Ambala (Hindi: अम्बाला, Punjabi ਅੰਬਾਲਾ , Telugu: అంబాల) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong municipal council king distritu ning Ambala king estadu ning Haryana, India. Atiu ing lakanbalen king angganan da reng estadu ning Haryana ampong Punjab. Ating maragul a bilang da reng tauan ning Indian Army ampong Indian Air Force kilub ning Ambala Cantt (cantonment). Dakal la muring turista uling makasentru ya kabilian, at kailangan lang dumalan king Ambala deng turistang papunta king Himachal Pradesh, Punjab , Chandigarh ampong Jammu & Kashmir. 

Amravati:
Ing Amravati (a ausan da muring Amrawati o Amraoti) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king estadu ning Maharashtra king India. Paniwalan dang iti ing lakanbalen nang Ginung Indra, ing ari da reng sablang dios. Mayayakit la king lakanbalen deng makasalesayan a templu ning Diosang Amba, Ginung Shri Krishna ampong Shri Venkateshwara. 
Ing Amravati murin ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning "Amravati Division", metung kareng anam a division ning estadu ning Maharashtra (labuad ning Vidharbha). 

Amreli:
Amreli is a city and a municipality in Amreli district of the Saurashtra region in the state of Gujarat, India.
Ing Amreli metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong munisipalidad king Amreli district ning labuad ning Saurashtra, estado ning Gujarat, India.

Amritsar:
Ing Amritsar (, a mangabaldugang: "The Lake of the Holy Nectar", yapin ing tungku o sentru ning Amritsar District king estado ning Punjab, India. Agpang king 2001 census king India, 1,500,000 ing populasiun ning lakanbalen, at 3,695,077 ne man ing mabilug a distritu.
Atiu king pangulu-aslagan ("northwestern") a dake ning India, king Estado ning Punjab, king aslagan ("east") ning Lahore, Pakistan. 
Mayayakit ya keti ing Harimandir Sahib, a ausan da mu namang Golden Temple, at iti ing sentru nang ispiritual ning relihiun a Sikh. Mas dakal la pa deng bisitang pupunta keting maulagang karinan ning kasalpantayanan kesa king Taj Mahal king Agra, at ya ing manimunang pupuntalan da reng Indian a e residenti king bangsa (non-resident Indian o NRI) king mabilug a bangsa. Kabalitan ya ing lakanbalen karetang miliari king kasalesayan, anti ing Jallianwala Bagh Massacre aniang 1919, ampo ing Operation Bluestar kanitang 1984 lalam ning meangubie Pun Ministru ning India, i Indira Gandhi. 
Suglung palual.
<br clear=all>

Anand:
Anand (, ) is the administrative centre of Anand District in the state of Gujarat, India. It is administered by Anand Municipality. It is part of the region known as Charotar comprising of Anand & Kheda Districts.
Ing Anand (, ) ing sentru ning pamanibala ning Anand District king estadu ning Gujarat, India. Palakad ne ning Anand Municipality. Kayabe ya king labuad ("region") a ausan dang Charotar, a bibilugan da reng distritu ning Anand ampong Kheda.

Anklesvar:
Ing Ankleswar metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipality king distritu ning Bharuch king estado ning Gujarat, India. Manga apulung kilometru ing dayu na manibat king Bharuch.

Anuppur:
Ing Anuppur balen ya king dake nang pangulu-aslagan ("northeastern") ning estado ning Madhya Pradesh king kalibudtang ("central") India. Sentru neng kapanibalan ning Anuppur District. Sadia, kayabe ya king Shahdol district.
Dalerayan.
Indira Gandhi National Tribal University, Amarkantak, District Anuppur(Central University)
An Act was passed in Indian parliament which was published in the Gazette of India, Part II, section I, on 20 December 2007 by the virtue of which Indira Gandhi National Tribal University Act, 52, 2007. The then M.H.R.D. minister, Shri Arjun Singh laid the foundation stone on 19 April 2008 at Amarkantak. The government of India 7 July 2008, circulated the order of appointment of the founder vice-chancellor of the university. In compliance of this order, Prof. Chandra Deo Singh took the post on 08.07.2008. It is fully granted by the government of India, through University Grant Commission. Different from other universities, Indira Gandhi National Tribal University, Amarkantak will have its regional campuses in tribal-dominated states. These campuses will be in tribal areas so that tribal students can have easy access to higher education and promote themselves and their interests so that they can occupy a remarkable place in the mainstream of society. The regional campuses will preserve the tribal art, culture, and traditional medicinal knowledge of the tribes and have been entrusted with the task of using it for the benefit of all.Writing by Dr.Mohan Lal chadhar, Indira Gandhi National Tribal University, District Anuppur (M.P.)484886 The tribal people are rich in cultural heritage and skill of art and craft, but they are marginalised in respect to higher education as well as in other walks of life. Now in the present age of globalisation the world has shrunk into a village as the society has advanced in technology. But the tribes, who are the custodians of Indian culture in a real sense, are far behind in this race of advancement. To rescue them from the present plight, the university has put before itself the following aims and objectives: To provide avenues of education, especially higher education and research facilities primarily for the tribal population of India. To disseminate and advance knowledge by providing instructional and research facilities in tribal art, tradition, culture, language, medicinal systems, customs, forest based economic activities, flora, fauna and advancement in technologies relating to the natural resources of the tribal areas. To collaborate with national and international universities and organisations, especially for undertaking cultural studies and research on tribal communities. To formulate tribal centric development models, publish reports and monographs and to organised conferences and seminars on issues relating to tribes and to provide inputs to policy matters in different spheres. To take appropriate measures for promoting the members of tribal communities capable of managing, administering and looking after their own needs by access to higher education through a university of their own. To disseminate and advance knowledge by providing instructional and research facilities in such other branches of learning as it may deem fit. To take appropriate measures for promoting innovations in teaching learning process in inter-disciplinary studies and researches and to pay special attention to the improvement of social, educational and economic conditions and welfare of the scheduled tribes within the Union of India. In view of the aims and objectives the major thrust will be on providing more opportunity for the tribes. However, the university is open to all. Officers of the university are Visitor Shri Pranab Mukherjee, His Excellency, President of India; chancellor Shri S.M. Jharwal (I.E.S. retd.); vice-chancellor Prof. C.D. Singh;
University Faculty 1. Faculty of Computronics 2. Faculty of Commerce and Management 3. Faculty of Law 4. Faculty of Pharmacy 5. Faculty of Science 6. Faculty of Journalism and Mass Communication 7. Faculty of Social Science 8. Faculty of Tribal Studies 9. Faculty of Humanities and Philology 10. Faculty of Education University Existing Departments Faculty of Social Sciences 1.Department of Ancient Indian History, Culture & Archaeology 2.Department of Economics 3.Department of Sociology and Social Anthropology 4.Department of Geography and Regional Development 5.Department of History 6.Department of Political Science & Human Rights Faculty of Sciences 1. Department of Biotechnology 2. Department of Botany. 3.Department of Zoology 4.Department of Chemistry 6.Department of Environment Science Faculty of Computerronics Department of Computer Science Faculty of Commerce and Management 1.Department of Commerce 2.Department of Business Management 3.Department of Tourism, Hospitality and Hotel Management Faculty of Humanities and Philology 1.Department of English and Foreign Languages 2.Department of Philosophy 3.Department of Applied Psychology Faculty of Tribal Studies 1. Department of Folk History, Museology and Traditional Medicine 2. Department of Tribal Art, Folk Literature and Culture Faculty of Journalism and Mass Communication 1.Department of Journalism and Mass Communication
Departments for Next Session 1. Department of Education. 2. Department of Forest Management 3. Department of Geology and Mineralogy 4. Department of Home Science and Nutrition 5. Department of Information Technology. 6. Department of Law ( Five Years Integrated Course) 7. Department of Mathematics and Statistics. 8. Department of Meteorology. 9. Department of Pharmacy (D.Pharma and B. Pharma) 10. Department of Physics. 11. Department of Physical Education 12. Department of Social Work 13. Department of Tribal Languages and Comparative linguistics.

Arrah:
Ing Arrah metung yang lakanbalen ampong municipal corporation in Bhojpur district king estadu ning Bihar, India. Iti ing pun tanggapan (headquarters) ning Distritu ning Bhojpur, a atiu king pamisanib da reng ilug ning Ganges ampong Soane, manga 24 milia manibat king Danapur ampong 36 milia manibat king Patna. 

Aruppukkottai:
Ing Aruppukottai () metung yang balen ampong municipality king Virudhunagar district king estado ning Tamil Nadu, India. Mibait ya king Tiruchuli malapit king balen ning Aruppukottai i Sri w:Ramana Maharishi. Menibat ya ing lagiu king 'Arumbu Kottai' a mangabaldugang Kuta ning Jasmin (Jasmines). Pikabaluan la king pamagpatubu kareng sampagang Jasmine deng mangalating nayun ampong balen a makapadurut king Aruppukottai. 

Ashoknagar:
"Para keng Ashok Nagar king Delhi lon ya ing Ashok Nagar (Delhi)."
"Para king karinan tuknangan (residential locality) king Chennai lon ya ing Ashok Nagar, Chennai"
Ing Ashoknagar (o Ashok Nagar) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king estado ning Madhya Pradesh king kalibudtang (central) India. Iti ing pun tanggapan (headquarters) ning Ashoknagar District. sadia yang kayabe king Guna district. Kabalitan ya ing Ashoknagar kareng Chanderi silk saree, binutil a mandi (grains mandi) ampong "Sharbati Gaihu", metung a uri ning trigu.

Ashtamichira:
Ing Ashtamichira metung yang nayun king distritu ning Thrissur king estado ning Kerala king Mauling India. Atiu king salapungan dalan ning Ashtamichira (Ashtamichira junction), nung nu la mayayakit deng mangaragul a negosiu ampong kumpania. Nanupata, aluntian ya at matanaman, at padurutan deng asikan ampong pitatamnan ngungut. Mamasa ya keraklan king agrikultura aniang milabas, pero mababawas na iti kareng milabasan a banua kayabe king pamandagul ning ekonomia. 

William H. Avery (engineer):
I William H. Avery (Juliu 25, 1912 – Juniu 26, 2004) metung yang mainpluwensiyang aeronautics engineer. Atatandanan de keng kayang design keng propulsion mechanisms kebaluan bilang ramjet, at king kayang pamnimunu keng Ocean Thermal Energy Conversion programa nung nu papalual yang kuryenti ibat keng pamanaliwa ning pali pilatan ning mababo at malalam ning danum ning kadayatmalatan. 

James Tocher Bain:
I James Tocher Bain (Pebreru 26 1906 - Disiembri 5 1988) metung yang manimunang Canadian engineer. Kapamilatan ning miki panimanman a pamanibayu keng pamisanting ampong king maipit nang pamanaluki kareng mibiling tuntunan, metung yang mainpluwensiya keng pangatatag ning TCA/Air Canada's kapansinpansin a matas a tala keng engineering, pamagmantinia ampong bayuan eganagana o panalilan deng mamantinian.

Aurangabad, Bihar:
Ing Aurangabad metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipality king distritu ning Aurangabad king estado ning Bihar, India. Ing Aurangabad (pop. 118,052[http://gov.bih.nic.in/Profile/Districts/Aurangabad.htm]) ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning distritu ning Aurangabad. Atiu iti king Grand Trunk Road. Magahi ing amanu da reng tau keti. Pupupul yang dakal a pale ampong trigu ing Aurangabad, at masikan ing kalakal kareti keti. 

Aurangabad, Maharashtra:
Ing Aurangabad ( (औरंगाबाद), ibat king Persian اورنگ‌آباد a mangabaldugang "Built by the Throne" (pepatikdo ning tronu), at pekilagiu ra king Emperador a Mughal a i Aurangzeb), metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king Maharashtra, India. Sentru ne ning turismu iting lakanbalen, nung nu la makapadurut deng dakal a makasalesayan a lugal anti reng World Heritage Sites (Karinan ning Pamana ning Yatu) ning Ajanta ampong Ellora. Iti ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") king pamanibala ning Aurangabad Division, o ing labuad ("region") ning Marathwada. Metung yang 'City of Gates' (Lakanbalen da reng Pasbul Dalan) ing Aurangabad, at kapansin-pansin la reti nung dumurut ka king ciudad.

Asurbandh, Jharkhand:
Ing Asurbandh metung yang nayun king Giridh district, estado ning Jharkhand, India.

Azamgarh:
Ing Azamgarh (Hindi: आज़मगढ़, Urdu: اعظم گڑھ) ampo ing Aryamgarh (Field of Arya-Aryan) king Sanskrit metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal board king estado ning Uttar Pradesh, India. Magsilbi yang pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning Distritu ning Azamgarh. 
Kalupa da ring keraklan kareng balen king pangulung ("northern") India, atiu king pampang ning ilug ing Azamgarh; king alimbawang iti, ing Ilug Tons. Tetag ne ning metung a masikanan a makibanding gabun, i Azam Khan, ing Azamgarh kanitang 1665. 
Heograpia.
Atiu ing Azamgarh king 

Ballabhgarh:
Ing Ballabhgarh balen ya king Faridabad District king Haryana, India. I Raja Nahar Singh (1823 - 1858) metung yang Ari na niting princely state. Mitikdo lang kuta malapit karin deng pipumpunan nang Jat Raja Nahar Singh kanitang manga 1739. Adua yang pulung milia (20 mi) ing malating kaarian ning Ballabhgarh manibat king Delhi. Matas ing paglalawe da king lagiu nang Jat Raja Nahar Singh, a metung kareng martir king Gera para king katimawan ning 1857. 
Lon la murin deti.
Raja Nahar Singh

Baharampur:
Ing Baharampur () (a misusulat muring Berhampore o Berhampur) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king estado ning West Bengal king India. Iti ing pun tanggapang kapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning distritu ning Murshidabad. Maki dayu yang manibat king Kolkata (a sadiang maki lagiung Calcutta), ing tungku o capitoliu ning estadu. 

Bahadurgarh:
Ing Bahadurgarh metung yang lakanbalen ampong metung a municipal council king estadu ning Haryana, India. Ausan deng "Gateway of Haryana" (Pasbul Dalan ning Haryana), at pikabaluan ya king kayang kapangan a pakora. 

Bahraich:
Bahraich is a city and a municipal board in Bahraich district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. Located on the Saryu River, a tributary of river Ghaghra, Bahraich is 125 km north-east of Lucknow, the state capital. The towns of Barabanki, Gonda, Balrampur, Lakheempur and Sitapur share local boundaries with Bahraich. A factor which makes this town important is the international border shared with the neighboring country, Nepal.
Ing Bahraich metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal board king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh, India. Atiu iti king pampang ning Ilug Sariu, a bubugnus king ilug Ghaghra. Karulun/kasiping no ning Bahraich deng balen ning Barabanki, Gonda, Balrampur, Lakheempur ampong Sitapur. Makaragdag ya king ulaga ning balen a iti ing angganan na king aliwang bangsa, ing Nepal. 

Sapangbato:
Ing Sapangbato ing pekamaragul a barangay keng ciudad ning Angeles na ning Pampanga, keti bansang Pilipinas. Ing dagul ning sasakupan ng gabun ning barangay ayni papatak yang 187,694 sq. meters at atin yang populasyun a 9,920 anyang 2007. Malapit ya ing Barangay ayni keng Clark Air Base na ngeni mas kilala ya bilang Clark Special Economic Zone. Ing Sapangbato ing pinakamatas a barangay keng ciudad ning Angeles. 
Sikat a tau a menibatan keng Sapangbato:
Allan Pineda na ning Black Eyed Peas mas kilala ya bilang Apl D. Ap

Aceuchal:

Alange:

Alburquerque, Badajoz:
Ing Alburquerque metung yang lalawigan ning Badajoz king Espanay. Atin yang 5,600 pakmatuknang. Malapit ya keng sepu ning Portugal at metung yang matuang tuknangan da reng ari ning bangsang iti.
Ing pamansag da reng "Lord ning Alburquerque" ("de Meneses") ampong "Conde ning Alburquerque" ("de Castilla") ampong "Duke ning Alburquerque" ("de La Cueva") mayalaga la king Castile inyang Middle Ages, lawen ya antimo ing Sancho ning Alburquerque.
Ing lakanbalen a Albuquerque king New Mexico ikua ne ing kayang lagiu keng balen. (dapot lawen ya ing kayang aliwang kulitan).

Aljucén:
Ing Aljucén metung yang balen king lalawigan ning Badajoz, Extremadura, Espanya. Agpang keng 2006 census (INE), ing balen atin yang populasyun a 247 pakatuknang.
metung yang b alen ais a municipality located in the province of Badajoz, Extremadura, Spain. According to the 2006 census (INE), the municipality has a population of 247 inhabitants.

Almendral:

Balaghat:
Ing Balaghat metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipality king distritu ning Balaghat king estadu ning Madhya Pradesh, India. Iti ing pun tanggapang kapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Balaghat District. Sadia, "Burha" o "Boora" ing lagiu ning balen, oneng mialilan ya ini king "Burha" or "Boora", a lagiu na mu ning distritu aniang purmeru. Ing buri nang sabian ning Balaghat, "above the ghats or passes" (king babo da reing ghat o dalan/gasgas king bunduk). 

Balasore:
Ing Balasore (a ausan da mu namang Baleswar o Baleshwar) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king estadu ning Orissa king aslagang ("eastern") India. Pikabaluan yang dili king Chandipur, nung nu ya manalkus ("developing") miayaliwang "missiles", anti reng "Nag", Agni missile, atlwp. Ing Oriya ing amanu ning pamiugnayan ("lingua franca") keti. 

Ballia:
Ing Ballia metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal board king Ballia district king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh, India. Atu king pampang ning Ilug Ganges. Pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ne ning Ballia district king Uttar Pradesh.

Balrampur:
Ing Balrampur (Hindi:बलरामपुर, Urdu: بلرام پور) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal board king distritu ning Balrampur king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh, India. Atiu king pampang ning ilug Rapti, at pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ne ning distritu ning Balrampur. Mialal ya ing sadiang Pun Ministru ning India Atal Bihari Vajpayee king parliamentu ibat king "constituency" (distritu king alalan) ning Balrampur.

Banganapalle:
Ing Banganapalle (o Banagana Palli) metung yang balen king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. Atiu king distritu ning Kurnool, 70 km king mauli ("south") ning balen ning Kurnool. Pikabaluan ya ing Banganapalle kareng kayang mangga, at ating metung a cultivar o uring pekilagiu da kaya, ing Banganapalli. Manibat 1790 anggang 1948, tungku/capitoliu ne ning metung a princely state a kapareu na lagiu ing Banganapalle. 

Banswara:
Ing Banswara metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king Banswara District king mauling Rajasthan king India. Tetag neng Maharawal Jagmal Singh ing Banswara princely state. Ibat ya ing kayang lagiu kareng "bans" o gubat o pulu ning kuayan. Ausan de muring 'City of Hundred Islands' (Lakanbalen da reng Dinalang Isla) uling kareng dakal a isla king Ilug Mahi, a dadalan king Banswara. 

Banur:
"Para king balen king distritu ning Patiala, lon ya ing Banaur"
Ing Banur metung yang malating balen. Maki dayu yang manga 25 km manibat king Chandigarh, ing tungku o capitoliu ning estadu ning Punjab king India, king Chandigarh-Patiala National Highway. 

Bardhaman:

Granada (lalawigan):
Ing Granada metung yang lalawigan ning mauling Espanya, king aslagan nang dake ning autonomous community ning Andalusia. Atin yang sepu kareng lalawigan ning Albacete, Murcia, Almería, Jaén, Córdoba, Málaga, ampong ing Mediterranean Dayat Malat. Ing kayang tungku iyapin ing Granada.

Guadalajara (lalawigan):
Ing Guadalajara metung yang lalawigan ning central/north-central Espanya, king pangulung dake ning autonomous community ning Castile-La Mancha. Atin yang sepu kareng lalawigan ning Cuenca, Madrid, Segovia, Soria, Zaragoza, ampong Teruel.
Atin yang populasyun a 213.505 (2006). 12.190 km² ya ing kayang lualas ning lalawigan. Ing kayang tungkuiyapin ing Guadalajara, nung nu mga 35% na ning populasyun ning lalawigan makatuknag la ka rin. Atin yang 288 balen ing Guadalajara, nung nu atlung-kapat nung nu deng baranggay atin lang poupalsyun a kulang keng 200.

Albert William Baker:
I Albert William Baker (Mayu 4 1918 - Marsu 6 2008) mtung yang Canadian talapasulapo ampong aeronautical engineer. Mitalaga ya keng Canada's Aviation Hall of Fame inyang 2000.

Vladimir Barmin:
Vladimir Pavlovich Barmin (, , Moscow — Juliu 17, 1993, Moscow) metung yang Soviet scientist, designer na ning rocket launch complex.
Ing asteroid a 22254 Vladbarmin mipalagiu ya kaya bilang parangal kaya.

Bareilly:
Ing Bareilly (Hindi: बरेली, Urdu: بریلی) metung yang keragulan a lakanbalen ("metro city") king distritu ning Bareilly king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh king pangulung ("northern") India. Atiu king lele ning ilug Ramganga, tungku (capitoliu) ne ning Rohilkhand Division, at sentru ne ning pamangawang muebles o kasangkapan bale, ampong kalakal king bulak, binutil ("grain") ampong mayumu. Maki populasiun yang 699,839 kanitang 2001 iting lakanbalen

Baripada:
Ing Baripada metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a munisipalidad king 
distritu ning Mayurbhanj, king estadu ning Orissa, India. Keti ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning distritu. Mayayakit ya keti ing metung kareng pekamaulagang parkeng ilang ("wildlife parks") ning India, ing Similipal, maleparan a pulu (kagubatan/kakewan, "forest") ampong lambak ("valley"), dakal a mangatuang templu, ampong sentrung ning pamanyali ampong kalakal ning distritu. Pikabaluan ya ing Baripada king Rathyatra (Car Festival) ampo ing Mayurbhanj Chhau dance, metung a matuang uri ning terak a Hindu.

Barmer, Rajasthan:
Ing Barmer metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a munisipalidad king estadu ning Rajasthan, India. 

Barrackpore:
Ing Barrackpore () sub-division, lalam ning Distritu ning North 24 Parganas king West Bengal (Albugang Bengal), metung yang matua ampong pikabaluan a teritoriu ning India, nung nu la manuknangan deng taung ibat kareng alus eganaganang lalawigan ning India. Sentru yang pang-militar ampong pangkapanibalan (administrative) aniang kanitang panaun ning pamaniakup ning Britania, at miliari la keti deng mapilang pangimut a pamagalsa laban king talasakup a ita kanitang kalabingsiam a dilanua/siglu ("19th century"). Kayabe ya king karinan ("area") a bibilug king Kolkata Metropolitan Development Authority. 

Barwani:
Ing Barwani" (बडवानी "', o kaya Badwani o Siddh Nagar), metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a munisipalidad king Barwani District king estadu ning Madhya Pradesh, India. Atiu king kaili nang pampang ning Ilug Narmada, at sentru neng pangkapanibalan ("administrative seat") ning Distritu ning Barwani. Sadia ne muring tungku o capitoliu ning saidang princely state ning Barwani. Ding pekamalapit a pisulagpon ("airport") ampong istasiun tren atilu king Indore, a 150 km manibat king Barwani. Ing Bawangaja, nung nu la mag-"pilgrimage" deng Jain, walu yang kilometru (8 km) ibat king Barwani.
