Atiu king kabitisan da reng talimunduk ning Girnar. Mangabaldugan yang "Old Fort" (Matuang Kuta) ing Junagadh. Ausan de mu namang "Sorath", ing lagiu ning minunang princely state a panibalan da reng king Junagadh. 

Khopoli:
Ing Khopoli (Marathi: खोपोली) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king estadu ning Maharashtra, India, king kabitisan da reng kabundukan ning Sahyadri, malapit king Karjat at padurutan da reng talimunduk. Matalik yang meragul aniang milabasan a dekada uling malapit ya king Mumbai ampong Navi Mumbai, palu na kaibat ning pamanuglung ning Mumbai Suburban Railway papunta king Khopoli. Panibalan ne ning Khopoli Muncipal Council.

Kakinada:
Ing Kakinada (Telugu: కాకినాడ) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal corporation king distritu ning Aslagang Godavari king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. Iti ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning distritu ning Aslagang Godavari 
Suglung palual.
is a city and a municipal corporation in East Godavari district in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is also the headquarters of East Godavari district. 
Ing 
The city has a population of about 504,920(agglomeration 803,340) as per 2001 census. This coastal city is witnessing rapid growth thanks to the recently granted Special Economic Zone status. It is one of the largest tier-2 cities of India and the fourth largest city in A.P. The city also has a deep-water port which is expanding rapidly.
The presence of a small island called Hope Island about 5 km from Kakinada coast, makes Kakinada a natural Harbor. Prior to construction of the deep water port, the old anchorage port operated for several decades as the largest minor port in India. At present, both deep water port and older anchorage port operate side by side.
Geography.
Kakinada is located at . It has an average elevation of 2 metres (6 feet). 
The 82 1/2 degrees east longitude, with respect to which IST (Indian Standard Time) is calculated, passes through Kakinada.
Distances to other cities<br>
Demographics.
As of 2001 India census, Kakinada had a population of 504,920. Males constitute 50% of the population and females 50%. Kakinada has an average literacy rate of about 70%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 75%, and female literacy is 65%. In Kakinada, 11% of the population is under 6 years of age.
Civic administration.
The city of Kakinada is run by the Kakinada Municipal Corporation, run by elected representatives and a commissioner. The city is divided into 56 wards and each ward elects a corporator.A mayor is elected for the entire city. The commissioner who is a (IAS) officer is appointed by the state government. It has a dedicated Collector's office for Administration of State and Central Government Programmes.
Transport.
The nearest airport is located at Rajahmundry, about 65-km from the city has services to Hyderabad, Chennai and Visakhapatnam. Air Deccan and Kingfisher Airlines are the two airlines operating here. The nearest International airport is at Visakhapatnam at a distance of 145-km and has the services of all major airline operators to all big cities in the country.
Kakinada has two railway stations namely Kakinada Junction(3km) and Kakinada Port(8km). Both stations not on the Chennai-Visakhapatnam-Howrah line. One has to get down at Samalkot Junction(12km) where a few express and super fast trains stop to connect Kakinada with the important places of the country.
Good roads connect Kakinada with all the places within the state and also with major cities like Chennai and Bangalore. Transport by road from Kakinada to all the places of interest is in the form of Andhra Pradesh State Road Transport Corporation (APSRTC) buses.There are non-stop services to Visakhapatnam and Rajahmundry 365 days-a-year. City buses, Taxis, Autorickshaws are the major means of transport within the city.Private bus operators provide transport services to various parts of the country. National Highway-214 runs through the heart of the city.
Kakinada deep water port is the third largest in the state after Visakhapatnam's 2 ports(Visakhapatnam Port and Gangavaram Port) is operated by Kakinada Seaports Limited. Before the deep water port was built, the anchorage port was the largest of the forty minor-ports operating in India. It is well connected to all major sea-ports in the country. Currently both deep water port and older anchorage port operate side by side.
JSW Infrastructure and Logistics, an infrastructure and logistics company owned by the JSW group is building ship repair and shipyard facilities near kakinada port with an investment of about US$250 million.
Also, a second port is being planned to be built exclusively to serve KSEZ (Kakinada Special Economic Zone).
Industry.
In the late 1940s (around the time of Indian Independence) there was little industry in and around Kakinada and local economy mainly comprised of agricultural and fishing industry. 
Six decades later, Kakinada's economy has a diverse Industrial base.
Kakinada is often called the "Fertilizer City" of Andhra Pradesh. The city is home to two Fertilizer companies. 
Nagarjuna Fertilizers is the biggest Urea manufacturer in coastal Andhra. Another company, Godavari Fertilizers, produces DAP (Di-Ammonium Phosphate).
There are several auto and iron/steel ancillary industries in Kakinada which include Sri Ramadas Motor Transport Limited , Sri Bhavani Castings Ltd etc.
The Murugappa Group-owned EID Parry (India) Ltd and Cargill International SA have announced their plans to enter into a joint venture to set up a port-based stand-alone sugar refinery in Kakinada, Andhra Pradesh. EID Parry vice-chairman A Vellayan said the investment was estimated at Rs 325 crore. The plant was expected to be commissioned by December 2008, with an initial refining capacity of 6 lakh tonnes and ultimately 1 million tonnes. Reliance is also planning to set up a sugar mill.
There is an LPG Bottling plant set up by Shri Shakti LPG Limited
Kakinada has been in the news recently after several oil companies decided to use it as a transit point for oil and gas shipments. The economic value of these investments has increased considerably after the recent gas finds by ONGC and Natural Gas Corporation, Reliance in the KG basin. ONGC is currently working on setting up a refinery in Kakinada.
Reliance Gas Transportation Infrastructure Ltd (RGTIL), is implementing a 1,440-km pipeline project from to Baruch (Gujarat) to transport gas from KG Basin fields owned by Reliance 
In 2002 several edible oil refineries established themselves in Kakinada and the refining capacity has touched 3000 tons per day. Kakinada port is facilitating the imports of crude palm oil, crude soyabean oil. Kakinada is having an edible oil per day refining capacity of more than 3000 MTS Major refineries are Acalmar Oils & fats limited, Ruchi Infrastructure, Nikhil refineries ltd, etc. 
The Vakalapudi Industrial park in Kakinada has attracted investments worth over US$ 10 million from bio-diesel companies such as Reliance Industries, Naturol Bioenergy and Universal Bio Fuel. Andhra Pradesh has entered into a formal agreement with Reliance Industries for Jatropha planting. The company has selected 200 acres of land at Kakinada to grow jatropha for high quality bio-diesel fuel.
Kakianada is home to the an electronic components manufacturing company that started operations since 1977 called Andhra Electronics Ltd. , 
Kakinada is one of the 4 tier-II cities in Andhra Pradesh where Software Technology Parks of India (STPI) had setup a facility in 2007. About 12 companies are currently operating in Kakinada and four of them were incubated in the STPI facility.
Currently, Infotech Enterprises, a Hyderabad based multinational software company has opened a facility in the STPI, Kakinada in February, 2007 with about 120 employees. 
Apart from Infotech Enterprises, there are several small to mid-size software companies that operate in Kakinada which include Aaspire Technologies, ForeTell Technologies Private Limited, Nyros Technologies, 3One Technologies , Easty Solutions etc
Avineon Inc, an US based technology company that provides geospatial and engineering services, has announced in April, 2008 that it would set up a new facility at Kakinada that can accommodate about 100 employees.
There are about 28 landing centers and also a large fishing wharf in Kakinada. The area surrounding Kakinada is home to several aqua farms. There are also several units that process and export fish, shrimp and other marine products. Recognizing the importance of fishing and aquaculture industry to the local economy, Andhra Pradesh state government established a research and training center on fisheries in 1958 called APSIFT (Andhra Pradesh State Institute of Fisheries Technology) in Kakinada in cooperation with FAO. The CIFE (Central Institute of Fisheries education), a deemed university established by Indian government in 1961 has one of its three campuses in India in Kakinada. The CIFE is the first fisheries university in India and provides post-graduate education and training, to in-service fisheries personnel not only from India but also many African and Asian countries
Several Rice mills exist in and around Kakinada and some of the rice is exported to other countries
Spectrum Power Generation Ltd. has a 208MW Power plant at kakinada. 
Very soon, Kakinada poised to have a floating power plant (FPP) .Industry major GMR Energy will be taking over the prestigious 220 MW FPP at an estimated cost of Rs 600 crore. GMR will supply power to the State power grid as per the terms and conditions of the Government. 
Economy.
Until early 1980s (before the fertilizer companies started their operation here), local economy was mainly based on autoparts, steel industry related ancillary units, agriculture and fishery industries.
Exports consist of fish and fish related products, agricultural products like rice, corn,oilmeals etc, processed food products, chemicals, iron ore, bauxite powder , biofuel etc
Imports consist of chemicals, edible oils, agricultural products (wheat, sugar etc)
Education.
Kakinada is a major hub fulfilling the growing educational demand of people within the district. The past decade has witnessed exponential growth and many residential colleges have established themselves to offer quality secondary education. There are also several professional colleges in and around the city offering courses in Engineering, Medical, IT and Management at the graduate and post graduate level. 
The city is home to the Government College of Engineering, (currently called Kakinada campus of Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU)), is the second oldest engineering college in Andhra Pradesh (Established on 1946) and Rangaraya Medical College, one of the oldest of its kind.
A comprehensive list of educational institutions in Kakinada is available at [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Educational_Institutions_in_Kakinada]
People.
People from Kakinada can easily be identified by their characteristic Godavari Telugu accent. They have gained a reputation for being hospitable, polite and cultured in their interaction with people.
The city of kakinada is a major educational center with with several schools, colleges and Universities. A large part of the younger generation are migrating to the cities and out of the country in search of opportunities that meet their scale of ambition. However, there are significant parts of the society that ride the boom by expanding their businesses and investments. The local population is supplemented by immigrants who leave their villages to seek work and opportunity in this bustling city.
Food.
East Godavari is famous for traditional Andhra cuisine and Kakinada is no different - mouth watering pickles (Aavakaaya) made from mango, vegetables (e.g. Caulifower Aavakaaya), chicken, shrimp, mutton and even fish. Interestingly, a few people here swear by the pungent taste of dried fish (Endu Chepa) and shrimp (Endu Royya). 
One of the well known restaurants include that serve local style Andhra Cuisine is Sri Krishna Vilas popularly known as Subbiah Hotel.
This city is also famous for its unique Kakinada Kaaja which later was very popular not only in Andhra but also in far away places like Bihar and U.P.. Kotiah Sweets (founded in the year 1900) is locally the most famous and possibly the earliest known maker of Kakinada Kaaja, a sweet made from maida and dipped in sugar syrup. 
The locals frequent the innumerable carts strategically located at populous street corners to get their share of bhajis and a delightfully tasty mixture of onions, toasted rice, and sev (Pidatha Kindha Pappu).
Kakinada is also one of the few regions in the entire Andhra Pradesh where Chekkarakeli aratipandu (banana) and Kothapalli kobbari maamidipandu (mango) are available.Kakinada is also famous for its delicious pesarattu, a breakfast or brunch item formed into crepes from moong daal (pesara pappu), green chillies, ginger and cumin. These are sold in restaurants as well as street stalls.
Sports.
Cricket is the most popular game followed by football and Athletics. The city is home to a number of local cricket teams participating in various district and zonal events. Gully cricket - a form of cricket played in empty streets or maidans is a popular pastime for local school/college going kids in the evenings. Kakinada has a cricket stadium used for Ranji Trophy matches. The Sports Authority of Andhra Pradesh (SAAP) has a sports and recreation centre which is the key for the district's sports activities.

Kalimpong:
Ing Kalimpong (Nepali: कालिम्पोङ) metung yang balen talimunduk ("hill station") kareng Talimunduk a Shiwalik (o Mababang Himalaya) king estadu ning Albugang Bengal (West Bengal), India. Atiu king , at maki tas yang manga 1,247 m (4,100 pie).

Kalpetta:
Ing Kalpetta () metung yang lakanbalen ampong metung a munisipalidad king Wayanad (distritu) king estadu ning Kerala, India. Metung yang malating balen a padurutan da reng mangakapal a pitatamnan kape ampong bunduk. Itii ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ne ning Wayanad (distritu) king Kerala. 

Kalwa, Thane:
Ing Kalwa metung yang malating balen king bandang lual ("outskirts") ning lakanbalen o ciudad ning Mumbai. Atiu iti king pangulung ("northern") Thane, at karulun ("suburb") ne ning lakanbalen ning Thane. Sakup ne ning Thane Municipal Corporation ing Kalwa.

Kalyan-Dombivali:
Ing Kalyan-Dombivali metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal corporation, a maki pun tanggapan king Kalyan. Atiu iti king Thane (distritu) king estadu ning Maharashtra, India. Melalang ya kanitang 1982 ba lang panibalan deng aduang "township" ning Kalyan ampong Dombivali. 

Kannauj:
Ing Kannauj (Hindi कन्नौज, Urdu: کنوج), a misusulat muring "Kanauj", metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal board ning Nagar Palika Parishad king Kannauj (distritu) king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh, India. 

Kanchipuram:
Ing Kanchipuram, Kanchi, o Kancheepuram metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a munisipalidad king Kanchipuram (distritu) king estadu ning Tamil Nadu, India. Metung yang balen a makasentru king templu ("temple town"), at pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ne ning ditritu ning Kanchipuram. Kanitang minuna, ausan deng Kachi ampong Kachiampathi.

Kandla:
Ing Kandla metung yang sadsaran dayatmalat ("seaport") king Distritu ning Kutch king estadu ning Gujarat, aslagang ("western") India. Metung yang kareng pekamaulagang sadsaran king albugang bebe dayatmalat ("west coast") ning India. Mitikdo ya ing Kandla kanitang decadang 1950 antimong manimunang sadsaran a magsilbi king aslagang India, kaibat ning pamamitna ning India kanitang 1947, nung kapilan mikana ya king Pakistan ing sadsaran ning Karachi. 

Kangazha:
Ing Kangazha metung yang panchayath ampong metung a nayun king Changanacherry Taluk king Distritu ning Kottayam, estadu ning Kerala, India. Maki dayu yang aduang pulu't anam (26) a kilometru king aslagan ("east") ning Kottayam. 

Kannur:
Ing Kannur, (Malayalam:കണ്ണൂര്‍), metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a munisipalidad king Kannur (distritu) king estadu ning Kerala, India. Pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ne ning distritu ning Kannur. 

Racha-Lechkhumi at Kvemo Svaneti:
Ing Racha-Lechkhumi and Kvemo Svaneti (Georgian: რაჭა-ლეჩხუმი და ქვემო სვანეთი "Račʼa-Lečxumi da Kvemo Svaneti") metung yang labuad king pangulungalbugan ning Georgia nung nu kayabe ya ing maamlat a lalawigan ning Racha, Lechkhumi ampong Kvemo Svaneti (itang, Lalam Svaneti). Sasakupan ne ing lualas a 4,954 km² at atin yang populssyun a 50,969 (2002 census). Iti ing pekamaritak diling populasyun a labuad keng bangsa. Ing kayang tungku iyapin ing Ambrolauri.

Imereti:
Ing Imereti Lalawigan (Georgian: იმერეთი მხარე "Imereti Mxare") metung yang lalawigan king Georgia atiu keng libutad ampong babo na ning ayayabut ning Rioni ilug. Ding makatuki ilapin deng Georgian administratibung territoryung pangtunggal:
Ing pun lakanbalen ning lalawigan iyapin ing Kutaisi; deng aliwang pangindustriang kalibudtaran ilapin deng Samtredia, Chiatura (manganese pamipalual a kalibudtaran), Tkibuli (coal pamagmina kalibudtaran), Zestaponi (kebaluan keng pamipalual kareng bakal), Khoni, ampong Sachkhere. Ing kaugalian, ing Imereti metung yang asikan a labuad, kebaluan bilang king kayang mulberries ampong ubas.

Samtskhe-Javakheti:
Ing Samtskhe-Javakheti () (dati Meskheti ) metung yang labuad king mauling Georgia, nung nu ing Akhaltsikhe iya ing tungku. Ing Samtskhe-Javakheti atin yang anam a administratibung distritu: Akhaltsikhe, Adigeni, Aspindza, Borjomi, Akhalkalaki ampong Ninotsminda. Atin yang limang balen, 6 malating balen, 67 barriu "sakrebulos", ampong 268 villages king labuad. Atin yang sepu keng Guria ampng Imereti keng pangulu, Kartli (Shida Kartli ampong Kvemo Kartli) keng pangulung-aslagan ampong keng aslagan, Armenia ampong Turkey keng mauli, Ajara keng albugan. Ing Baku-Tbilisi-Ceyhan oil pipeline ampong South Caucasus natural gas pipeline daralan la keng labuad.

Shida Kartli:
Ing Shida Kartli () metung yang labuad ("Mkhare") king Georgia. Ding kayang distritu ilapin deng makatuki: Gori, Kaspi, Kareli, Java, Khashuri.
Ing pangulung dake ning labuad, makatungge Java, ampong pangulung territoryu ning Kareli ampong Gori, (eganaganang lualas 1,393 km²) ing makiupaya iyapin ing sariling-pepasiag a republica ning Mauling Ossetia manibat 1992.

Kakheti:
Ing Kakheti (Georgian: კახეთი) metung yang lalawigan king Aslagang Georgia. Atin yang kasepu keng malating bulubundukin a lalawigan ning Tusheti ampong bulubundukin ning Keragulang Caucasus king pangulu, Azerbaijan king asalgan ampong king mauli, at ing lalawigan ning Georgia ing Kartli king albugan. Ing Kakheti makadake ya kareng Kilub Kakheti king aslagan ning Tsiv-Gombori a bundukin at ing Kilual a Kakheti king albugan na niti. Ing pun ilug na ning aslgan dake iyapin ing Alazani, ning albugan dake - Iori. Deng Kakhetians magsalita lang Georgian.

Kvemo Kartli:
Ing Kvemo Kartli (Lalam Kartli, Georgian: ქვემო ქართლი) metung yang maamlat a lalawigan at kasalungsungan a administratibung labuad ning maulingaslagan ning Georgia. Ing lakanbalen ning Rustavi metung yang tungkung panglabuad. Ing populasyun atin yang samut a Azeris (45,1%) ampong Georgians (44%), nung nu ila reng dakal keng bilangan. 
Suglung Palual.
Result of population census 2002 in Georgia (in Georgian language)

Kanpur:
Ing Kanpur (Hindi: कानपुर, Urdu: کان پور, a misulat "Cawnpore" bayu ing 1948) ing metung kareng lakanbalen o ciudad a maragul dili populasiun king pangulu ning India, ampo ing dakal dili tau king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh. 
Suglung palual.

Kanyakumari:
Ing Kanyakumari (Tamil: கன்னியாகுமரி) metung yang balen king Kanyakumari (distritu) king estadu ning Tamil Nadu, India. Atiu iti king pekasepu na king mauli ("south") ning India, at mayayaus ya muring Cape Comorin. Neng pekamalapit a mangaragul a lakanbalen o ciudad ila ring Nagercoil, ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Kanyakumari (distritu), (22 km) ampo ing Thiruvananthapuram, ing tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ning Kerala (85 km).

Karaikal:
Ing Karaikal (a mayayaus muring Karikal o Karaikkal) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampnong metung a munisipalidad king estadu ning Puducherry, India. 

Karaikudi:
Ing Karaikudi metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a munisipalidad king Sivaganga (Distritu) king king estadu ning Tamil Nadu, India. Iti ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen king distritu ning Sivaganga, at tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ne ning labuad ("region") ning Chettinad, a bibilugan ning Karaikudi ampong 74 pang nayun. Ing Chettinad ing penibatan das reng Nattukottai Chettiars (Nagarathar), metung a mabanding komunidad da reng bangkeru ampong negosianti o talakalakal, nung nu dakal lang kayanib deng minalis tuknangan king Sri Lanka ampong Mauli-aslagang Asia (Southeast Asia), lalu na king Singapore, Malaysia, Vietnam ampong Burma, kanitang kalabing siam (19) ampong kaduang pulung (20) dilanua o siglu.

Karimnagar:
Ing Karimnagar (Telugu: కరీంనగర్), metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king Karimnagar (distritu) king pangulung ("northern") labuad ning Telangana king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. Iti ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Karimnagar (Distritu), king pampang ning ilug Manair, a mamagus paras king ilug Godavari. Katlu yang pekamaragul a lakanbalen king labuad ("region") ning Telangana.

Karjat:
Ing Karjat metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad, municipal corporation, tahsil ampong sub-district king Raigad (distritu), Mumbai, Navi Mumbai, king estadu ning Maharashtra, India. 

Karnal:
Ing Karnal (Hindi: करनाल) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong pun tanggapan ning Karnal (Distritu) king estadu ning 
Haryana, India.

Karur:
Ing Karur (Tamil : கரூர் ) metung yang balen ampong metung a munisipalidad king Karur (distritu) king estadu ning Tamil Nadu, India king pampang ning Ilug Amaravati. Iti ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Distritu ning Karur. 

Karwar:
Ing Karwar (Kannada: ಕಾರವಾರ], Konkani: Karwar, Marathi: कर्वार) ing tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ning distritu ning Uttara Kannada king estadu ning Karnataka, India. Metung yang malating balen king bebe ning dayatmalat king dake nang albugan ("west") ning subcontinent ning India. Maki dayu yang labinglimang kilometru king mauli ("south") ning angganan a Karnataka-Goa. 

Kavaratti:
Ing Kavaratti metung yang census town king Union territory ning Lakshadweep, India. Kavaratti murin ing lagiu ning isla nung nu ya makatikdo ing balen.

Khammam:
Ing Khammam (Telugu: ఖమ్మం) ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning Khammam (Distritu) ning estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Khandwa:
Ing Khandwa metung yang balen king labuad ("region") a Nimaad (a maralas dang susulat Nimar deng taung ibat karin) king estadu ning Madhya Pradesh king kalibudtang India. Iti ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning of Khandwa (Distritu), a sadia rang ausang Distritu ning Aslagang Nimar (East Nimar District).

Khamanon:
Ing Khamanon (ਪੰਜਾਬੀ: ਖਮਾਣੋਂ) metung yang balen ampong nagar panchayat king Fatehgarh Sahib (distritu) king estadu ning Punjab, India. 

Kharagpur:
Ing Kharagpur (KGP) (Bengali: খড়্গপুর) metung yang balen a industrialisadu king Midnapore Albugan (distritu), Albugang Bengal (West Bengal), India. 

Khargone:
Ing Khargone metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a munisipalidad king Khargone (distritu) king estadu ning Madhya Pradesh, India. Iti ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Khargone (Distritu). Atiu iti king Ilug Kunda. 

Kheda:
Ing Kheda metung yang balen ampong metung a munisipalidad king Kheda (distritu) king estadu ning Gujarat, India. Kilala ya murin king lagiung Kaira ing Kheda, a maki dayung 35 km manibat king Ahmedabad. Iti ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative center") ning Kheda (Distritu).

Khilchipur:
Ing Khilchipur metung yang balen ampong metung a nagar panchayat king Rajgarh (distritu) king estadu ning Madhya Pradesh, India. Ini ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning distritu ning Rajgarh.

Khuldabad:
Ing Khuldabad (a mayayaus muring Kuldabad o Khultabad) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal council king Aurangabad (distritu) king estadu ning Maharashtra, India. The dargah of Shaikh Burhan ud-din Gharib Chisti along with the tomb of the Mughal emperor Aurangzeb and his trusted general Qamar-ud-din Khan, Asaf Jah I are located in this town. Atiu king balen a iti ing dargah of Shaikh Burhan ud-din Gharib Chisti, pati ing libingan ning emperador a Mughal a i Aurangzeb , ampo ning pagtiwalan nang heneral, i Qamar-ud-din Khan, Asaf Jah I.

Kirandul:
Ing Kirandul metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a munisipalidad king estadu ning Chhattisgarh. Atin yang NMDC colony, istasiun bus ampong tren, ampong o colegiu.

Kochi, India:
Kochi (; Malayalam: ), formerly known as Cochin, is a city in the Indian state of Kerala. The city is one of the principal seaports of the country and is located in the district of Ernakulam, about north of the state capital, Thiruvananthapuram. It has an estimated population of 600,000, with an extended metropolitan population of about 1.5 million, making it the largest urban agglomeration and the second largest city in Kerala after the capital. 
Ing Kochi (; Malayalam: ), a sadia rang ausang Cochin, metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king estadu ning Kerala, India. Metung ya iti kareng manimunang sadsaran pangdayatmalat ("seaports") ning India, at atiu king Ernakulam (distritu), a maki dayung manibat king tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ning estadu, ing Thiruvananthapuram.

Kohima:
Ing Kohima (Hindi: कोहिमा) ing matalimunduk a tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ning estadu ning Nagaland, India, a a atiu king pangulu-aslagan (northeast) at ating angganan king Burma. Atiu iti king Kohima (Distritu), at metung ya kareng atlung balen king Nagaland a maki kabilian a municipal council, kayabe ya ing Dimapur ampo ing Mokokchung. 
Suglung palual.

Kokrajhar:
Ing Kokrajhar metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king Assam, metung kareng estadu king pangulu aslagan (northeast) ning India. Atiu iti king pampang ning ilug ning Gourang.

Mtskheta-Mtianeti:
Ing Mtskheta-Mtianeti (Georgian: მცხეთა-მთიანეთი) metung yang labuad king aslagan Georgia (bangsa) a kayabe ya ing balen ning Mtskheta, nung nu iti magsilbi ya bilang labuad tungku, kambe ning kayang distritu ampong makaleleng bulubundukin a karinan.

Kolhapur:
Ing Kolhapur (Marathi:कोल्हापूर) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king mauli albugan ("southwest") nang suluk ning Maharashtra, India. Atiu iti king pampang ning ilug Panchganga. Mayayakit ya keti ing Templung Mahalakshmi. 

Tbilisi:
"For the ship formerly called Tbilisi, see Admiral Kuznetsov"
Ing Tbilisi (, keng Georgian: თბილისი), iya ing tungku ampong pekamaragul diling lakanbalen ning ing Republica ning Georgia, atiu king pampang ning Mtkvari (Kura) Ilug. Ing lagiu menibat ya keng mumunang lagyung Georgian a "Tpilisi" ampong opisyal a mayayaus a Тифлис (Tiflis) king Russian, anggang 1936. Ing lakanbalen sasakup yang lualas a 726 km² (280.3 square miles) ampongatin yang 1,093,000 pakatuknang.

Kolar:
Ing Kolar o Kolara (Kannada:ಕೋಲಾರ) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king estadu ning Karnataka king mauling ("south") India. Keti ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning Kolar (Distritu). Pikabaluan ya antimong metung kareng lugal nu la magminang gintu king India. 

Kolkata:
Ing (), , sadiang , ing tungku (cabecera o capitoliu) ning estadu ning Albugang Bengal (West Bengal), India. Atiu iti king Aslagang India (East India), king aslagan nang pampang ning Ilug Hooghly. Neng ausan deng "Kolkata", keraklan kayabe la reng kayang karulun ("suburbs"), ania miras yang maigit yang labing limang miliun ing kayang populasiun, at megi yang katlung pekamaragul a lakanbalen o ciudad ampong urban agglomeration. 
Migsilbi yang tungku ning India kanitang makalalam ya makalalam ya pa king Britania ing India, anggang 1911. Ing sadiang sentru ning makabayung pamanuru, industria, siensia, kalinangan ampong pulitika king India dinalan ya ing Kolkata king masipit a biolensia king pulitika, pamipate-pate ampong kayalang kasaplalan king kabiayan, manibat aniang 1954 angga ngeni. Nanupata, magumpisa aniang banuang 2000, mika pamagbayu king kabiayan o ekonomia, ania mika pamaniulparit ("spurt") king pamandagul ning lakanbalen. Kalupa ka reng aliwang metropolitan a lakanbalen ning India, makipamuk ya pa murin ing Kolkata king urbanisasiun, kakaluluan, polusiun ampong trapiku.
Pikabaluan ya ing Kolkata king amlat nang rebolusionariu, manibat king pamakipamuk ning India para king katimawan, angga kareng pangimut a maka-kaili ampong union a pangkalakal ("trade union").

Kollam:
Ing Kollam (Malayalam:കൊല്ലം ) (a ausan dang Quilon deng Portugues at agkas yang "koy-lon") metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal corporation king municipal corporation king estadu ning Kerala. Maki dayu yang 71 kilometru king pangulu ("north") ning tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ning estadu, ing Thiruvanathapuram (Trivandrum). Pun tanggapan ne ning Kollam (Distritu), metung kareng 14 a distritu ning estadu ning Kerala. 

Sibutu:
Ing Sibutu metung yang balen king lalawigan ning Tawi-Tawi, Filipinas. Iti ing pekamauling balen king Filipinas. Atiu mga 14 a kilometru aslagan ning pampang ning Sabah, Malaysia. Agpang keng ning sensus, atin yang populasyun a a katau kareng a pamimalemale.

Konark:
Ing Konark (Sanskrit: "कोनार्क") metung yang malating balen king estadu ning Orissa, India, king Bay of Bengal, anam a pulu't limang kilometru manibat king Bhubaneswar.

Kota, Rajasthan:
Ing Kota (Hindi:कोटा "koṭa"), a sadia rang ausang "Kotah", metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king estadu ning Rajasthan king pangulung ("northern") India. Atiu king pampang ning Ilug Chambal, at sentru ne ning kalakal nung nu la magpatubung bulak, millet, trigu, kulantru, ampong oilseeds. Kayabe no man kareng industria da reng pamag-prosesu king bulak ampong oilseed, pamanabal tela, pamag-distill, pamangatas, ampong pamaglalang bageng ibat king atak o metal. Metung ya kareng manimunang sentru ning industria king pangulung India ing Kota, at dakal lang cumpaniang chemical ampong engineering a makabasi keti. 

Kotdwara:
Ing Kotdwara (कोटद्वार) (a ausan da muring Kotdwar) metung yang balen king Pauri Garhwal (distritu) king estadu ning Uttarakhand, India. 

Kothagudem:
Ing Kothagudem metung yang malating industrialisadung balen king Khammam (distritu) ning Andhra Pradesh, India, manga 270 km manibat king Hyderabad. 

Kottayam:
Ing Kottayam (king Malayalam:കോട്ടയം) metung yang lakanbalen king dake nang kalibudtan ("central") ning estadu ning Kerala king India. Iti ing tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ning Kottayam (distritu). Metung yang maulagang sentru king kalakal da reng pakalasa ("spices") ampong tanaman a maulaga king negosiu, lalu na ing goma. 

Kovilpatti:
Ing Kovilpatti (கோவில்பட்டி in Tamil) metung yang balen king Thoothukudi / Thoothukudi (Distritu) king estadu ning Tamil Nadu, India. Iti ing kaduang pekamaragul a balen ketang distritu ning Thoothukudi. 

Kulpahar:
Ing Kulpahar (Hindi: कुलपहाड़) metung yang lakanbalen king Mahoba (distritu) king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh, India. Metung yang makasalesayan a balen king labuad ("region") ning Bundelkhand. Ing Kulpahar ing pekamaragul a subdivision ning Uttar Pradesh.

Kumbakonam:
Ing Kumbakonam (Tamil: கும்பகோணம்) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a munisipalidad king Thanjavur (distritu) king estadu ning Tamil Nadu, India. 

Kumbhraj:
Ing Kumbhraj metung yang balen ampong metung a nagar panchayat king Guna (distritu) king estadu ning Madhya Pradesh, India. 

Kurnool:
Ing Kurnool metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king Kurnool (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, mauling ("southern") India. Sentru neng pangkapanibalan ning distritu ning Kurnool, at sadia neng tungku (cabecera o capitoliu) ning Estadung Andhra ("Andhra State"), a melalang manibat king Estadu ning Madras kanitang 1953.

Kuśīnagar:
Ing Kuśīnagar (Dewanágarí: कुशीनगर; Inggles: "Kushinagar") (26.45 N,83.24E) metung yang balen ampong metung a nagar panchayat king Kushinagar (distritu) king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh, India. Metung yang karinan ning peregrinasiun ("pilgrimage site") da reng Buddhist, nung nu ya mete i Gautama Buddha.

Karamsad:
Ing Karamsad metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a munisipalidad king Anand (distritu) king estadu ning Gujarat, India. Kayabe ya kareng "Chchagaam Gol" ("Circle of Six Villages").

Lalitpur, India:
Ing Lalitpur (Hindi:ललितपुर, Urdu: للت پور) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal board king Lalitpur (distritu) king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh, India. Iti ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning distritu ning Lalitpur. 

Leh:
Ing Leh () ing tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ning kaarian ning Ladakh king Himalayas, a ngeni yang Leh (Distritu) king estadu ning Jammu among Kashmir, India. Makababo ya pa murin king balen ing masisira nang Palasiung Leh, ing sadia nang tuknangan ning pamilia ning ari ning Ladakh, a balamu malating Palasiung Potala. Maki tas yang 3,500 metru (11,483 pie) ing Leh. 

Lucknow:
Ing Lucknow (, , , "") ing lakanbalen o ciudad a tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ning Uttar Pradesh, ing maragul dili populasiun kareng estadu ning India. Ing Lucknow ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Lucknow (Distritu) ampo ning Lucknow Division. 

Ludhiana:
Ing Ludhiana ( | ) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal corporation king Ludhiana (distritu) king estadu ning Punjab, India. Atiu king sadia nang pampang ning Ilug Sutlej, 13 km king mauli ("south") ning kayang daralanan ngeni.

Lamka:
Ing Lamka o Churachandpur ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning distritu ning Churachandpur king estadu ning Manipur, India. Uling migumpisa ya king kalakal, iti ing balen talimunduk ("hill town") a samut-samut dili karas kareng lahi king Manipur. 

Latur:
Ing Latur (Marathi: लातुर) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal council king Latur (distritu) king estadu ning Maharashtra, India. Pikabaluan ya king kalakal kareng binutil a kakanan ("food grain") ampo kareng pabrikang laru. 

Madanapalle:
Ing Madanapalle metung yang balen ampong metung a municipality king Chittoor (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Margao:
Ing Margao (मार्गांव) (Konkani/Marathi: मडगांव, English: Margao, Portuguese: Margão), a misusulat muring Madgaon, ing kaduang pekamaragul a a balen, ing sentru na king kalakal ning estadu, ampo ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Distritu ning Mauling Goa, ampo ning Salcete Taluka. 

Madikeri:
Ing Madikeri (Kannada:ಮಡಿಕೇರಿ) metung yang balen king estadu ning Karnataka, India. Ausan de muring "Mercara", at pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ne ning distritu ning Kodagu.

Pangulung Kabuntalan:
Ing Pangulung Kabuntalan pang1 yang klasing balen king lalawigan ning Maguindanao, Filipinas. Agpang keng ning sensus, atin yang populasyun a a katau kareng a pamimalemale.
Iti melalang ya kareng 11 a barangay na ning Kabuntalan, Maguindanao, kapamilatan ning Muslim Mindanao Autonomy Act No. 205, nung nu mipayapan ya keng plebesitu meganap inyang Disiembri 30, 2006. 
Deng Barangay.
Ing Pangulung Kabuntalan atin yang 23 barangay.

Parang, Maguindanao:
Ing Parang pang1 yang klasing balen king lalawigan ning Maguindanao, Filipinas. Agpang keng ning sensus, atin yang populasyun a a katau kareng a pamimalemale.
Deng Barangay.
Ing Parang atin yang 24 a barangay.

Sultan Kudarat, Maguindanao:
Ing Sultan Kudarat pang1 yang klasing balen king lalawigan ning Maguindanao, Filipinas. Agpang keng ning sensus, atin yang populasyun a a katau kareng a pamimalemale.
Deng Barangay.
Ing Sultan Kudarat atin yang 39 a barangay.

Upi:
Ing Upi (kebaluan mu rin bilang Pangulung Upi) pang1 yang klasing balen king lalawigan ning Maguindanao, Filipinas. Agpang keng ning sensus, atin yang populasyun a a katau kareng a pamimalemale.
Deng Barangay.
Ing Upi atin yang 23 barangay.

Madurai:
Ing Madurai (,
) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong municipal corporation king pampang ning Ilug Vaigai king Madurai (distritu), king estadu ning Tamil Nadu, India. Ausan de murin ing lakanbalen kareng lagiung Madura, a yagkas dang "Ma ju ra", ampong "Nan mada kudal", ing orihinal nang lagiu. Ing lakanbalen ning Madurai ing tungkung pangkapanibalan ("administrative capital") ning distritu ning Madurai. 
Ing Madurai ing lakanbalen a tungku da reng aring Pandya ning Mauling India. Miraras aduang libung limang dalang banua ing pamana nang pangkalinangan ning Madurai, at metung yang maulagang sentru ning kalakal kanita pang 550 C.E. 

Mahabaleshwar:
Ing Mahabaleshwar metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal council king Satara (distritu) king estadu ning Maharashtra, India. Metung yang balen talimunduk ("hill station") king kabundukan a Albugang Ghats ("Western Ghats"). Migsilbi yang tungkung pangkaleldo ("summer capital") ning lalawigan ning Bombay kanitang panaun ning pamaniakup ning Britania. 
Maki dayu yang 120 km king mauli albugan ("southwest") ning Pune, ampong 285 km manibat king Mumbai. Metung yang maleparan a matas a kapatagan ("plateau") a maki sukad a 150 km², at padurutan da reng lambak ("valley"). Maki tas yang 1438 m (4710 ft) king pekamatas nang taluktuk, a ausan dang Wilson/Sunrise Point. 

Mahbubnagar:
Ing Mahbubnagar or Mehboobnagar (محبوب نگر) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king Mahbubnagar (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. Iti ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning distritu ning Mahbubnagar. Maki dayu yang 100 km king mauli albugan ("southest") ning tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ning estadu, ing Hyderabad. 

Mahé, India:
Ing Mahé, metung yang malating balen (9 km²) king mauli ("south") ning India king Dayatmalat ning Arabia ("Arabian Sea"), at maki lagiu yang opisial a Mayyazhi (മയ്യഴി) king local a amanung Malayalam. Ing orihinal a lagiu ning Mahé, ing "Mayyazhi", mangabaldugan yang "kile ning dayatmalat" ("eyebrow of the sea"). Makapadurut ya kareng atlung gilid ing Kannur (Distritu) ning estadu ning Kerala.
Sadia yang coloniang Frances ing Mahé. Ngeni, metung yang munisipalidad king king Mahe (distritu) king Union territory ning Puducherry (a makabasi king bebe dayamalat a aslagan o "east coast"). Atin yang aduang kayanib a ausan dang (MLAs) king lehislatura ning Puducherry, ing Puducherry Legislative Assembly, a pekakatawan ning Mahé ampong Pallur. 
Suglung palual.
Mandola Temple (Kavu)

Mahoba:
Ing Mahoba (Hindi: महोबा, Urdu: مہوبا) metung yang balen king Mahoba (Distritu),
labuad ("region") ning Bundelkhand, king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh, India. Pikabaluan ya ing Mahoba uling malapit ya kareng makasalesayan a lugal anti ing Kulpahar, Charkhari, Kalinjar, Orchha, ampong Jhansi. Dadalan la king balen deng rilis tren ampong highway ning estadu. 

Mahwa:
Ing Mahwa metung yang census town king Dausa (distritu) king estadu ning Rajasthan, India. 

Malout:
Ing Malout ( ਮਲੋਟ ) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal council king Muktsar (distritu), king estadu ning Punjab, India. Atiu iti king mauling ("southern") Punjab, at metung yang pikabaluan a balen king "cotton belt" (labuad ning bulak) nung nu metung king pekamatas king mabilug a India ing production per unit area (pamaglalang balang unit ning leparan).

Mandsaur:
Ing Mandsaur or Mandsour (Hindi:मन्दसौर/मंदसौर) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king labuad ning Malwa king estadu ning Madhya Pradesh king kalibudtang India. Iti ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Mandsaur (Distritu).

Mangalagiri:
Ing Mangalagiri metung yang balen ampong metung a mandal ning Guntur (Distritu) king Andhra Pradesh, India. Kayabe ya king "urban agglomeration" ning Vijayawada ing Mangalagiri . Atiu iti king dalang Guntur-Vijayawada, king mauli-aslagan ("south-east") ning Vijayawada, at king pangulu-aslagan ("north-east") ning Guntur Lakanbalen. 

Mangalore:
Ing Mangalore (IPA:\ˈmaŋ-gə-ˌlȯr\; Kannada: ಮಂಗಳೂರು, "Mangalūru"; Tulu: "Kudla", ಕುಡ್ಲ; Konkani: "Kodial", ಕೊಡಿಯಾಲ್; Beary: "Maikala", ಮೈಕಲ) ing manimunang lakanbalen a sadsaran ("port city") ning estadu ning Karnataka, India. Padurutan ne ning Dayatmalat ning Arabia ("Arabian Sea") ampo ing kabundukan a Western Ghat. Ing Mangalore ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning distritu ning Dakshina Kannada (sadiang "Mauling Canara" o "South Canara") king mauli-aslagang ("southwestern") Karnataka. 

Mapusa:
Ing Mapusa (Konkani: म्हापसा,Mapxea; Marathi: म्हापसा), a misusulat muring Mapuca, Mhapsa o Mapsa, metung yang balen king Pangulung ("North") Goa, India. Atiu iti king 13 km pangulu ning tungku o capitoliu, ing Panaji. Ing balen ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning Bardez taluka. Atiu king pekamaulagang highway, ing NH-17, a mitutuglung king Mumbai king Trivandrum. Aniang panaun da ring Portugues, misusulat yang Mapuçá ing lagiu ning balen. 

Mormugao:
Ing Mormugao or Marmagao (sadiang Portugues a "Mormugão") metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal council king distritu ning Mauling Goa king estadu ning Goa, India. Iti ing manimuna nang sadsaran o puerto ning Goa. Mibili ya king pelikulang The Sea Wolves kanitang 1980. 

Mathura:
Ing Mathura ( (IAST "")(Hindi: मथुरा)) metung yang banal a lakanbalen o ciudad king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh, India. Maki dayu yang manga 50 km king pangulu ("north") ning Agra, ampong 150 km king mauli ("south") ning Delhi; manga adua yang pulung milia manibat king banal a Vrindavana. Sentru neng pangkapanibalan ("administrative centre") ning Mathura (Distritu) king Uttar Pradesh. 

Machilipatnam:
Ing Machilipatnam (Telugu: మచిలిపట్నం) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a "special grade municipality" king Krishna (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Mahad:
Ing Mahad metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal council king Raigad (distritu) king estadu ning Maharashtra, India. Maki dayu yang 175 km king mauli ning Mumbai (sadiang Bombay). Pikabaluan ya king Satyagraha nang Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar para kareng Dalits.

Meerut:
Ing Meerut (Hindi: मेरठ, Urdu: میرٹھ) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal corporation king Meerut (distritu) king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh, India. Metung yang matuang lakanbalen a maki dayung 72 km (44 milia) king pangulu-aslagan (north-east) ning New Delhi. Atiu king Meerut ing metung kareng manimunang garrison/cantonment ning ukbu ning India kaniting dake ning bangsa.

Mirzapur:
Ing Mirzapur (Hindi: मिर्ज़ापुर, Urdu: مرزا پور) metung yang lakanbalen king libutad ning Pangulung ("North") India, a manga 650 km king pilatan ning Delhi ampong Kolkata, at pareu murin dayu king Allahabad ampong Varanasi. Atiu iti king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh, at pikabaluan ya king kayang industria da reng alpombra (panakap lande o "carpet") ampong gamit a gawa king tangsu ("brass"). 

Moga, Punjab:
Ing Moga metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipality king Moga (distritu) king estadu ning Punjab, India. 

Mohali:
Ing Mohali (, , ') metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad a kasiping ning Chandigarh, ka-18 a Distritu king Punjab, India. Opisial deng pekilagiu king pangane nang Guru Gobind Singh, i Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar (SAS Nagar). Kayabe neng Chandigarh ampong Panchkula ketang Chandigarh Tricity. Sadia yang kayabe king Distritu ning Rupnagar. 

Moradabad:

Champaran and Kheda Satyagraha

Mumbai:
Ing Mumbai (Marathi: :mr:मुंबई, ', :), sadiang Bombay'", ing tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ning estadu ning Maharashtra ampo ing tungkung pisalapian ("financial capital") ning India. Ing Mumbai, a maki populasiun a labing atlung (13) miliun, ing lakanbalen a maki kaduang diling pekamaragul a populasiun king yatu. Nung iyabe la reng kayang karulun ("suburb") ning Navi Mumbai ampong Thane, muling labingsiam (19) a miliun ing kayang populasiun, ing kalimang pekamaragul a populasiun ning metung a metropolitan area. Atiu king albugan nang bebe dayatmalat ("west coast") ning India ing Mumbai, at atin yang malalam a sadsaran o sanlaran a natural ("deep natural harbor"). Daralan king sadsaran ning Mumbai ing maigit kapitna king kargang pangdayatmalat ning India. Ing Mumbai ing sentru nang pangkalakal ampong panglibangan ("entertainment") ning India, at manibat keti ing 5% ning GDP ning India., 25% ning produksiun ning industria, 40% ning kalakal a pangdayatmalat, ampong 70% da reng transaksiun a pang-puhunan ("capital transactions") king ekonomia ning India.

Mussoorie:
Ing Mussoorie metung yang lakanbalen ampong metung a municipal board, a maki dayung manga 34 km ibat king Dehradun king estadu ning Uttarakhand, India. Atiu king kabitisan ning kabundukan a Himalayas ining balen talimunduk ("hill station") a ausan dang "Queen of the Hills" ("Reina da reng Talimunduk"). Tuturing deng kayabe king keragulang Mussoorie ('greater Mussoorie') ing kalele nang balen ning Landour, nung nu ating "military cantonment", ampo reng balen ("townships") ning Barlowganj ampong Jharipani. 

Katni:
Ing Katni (a ausan da mu namang Murwara o Mudwara) metung yang balen king pampang ning Ilug Katni king estadu ning Madhya Pradesh king kalibudtang India. Iti ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Katni (Distritu). Atiu iti king labuad ("region") ning Mahakoshal king Kalibudtang India, at maki dayu yang 90 km king Divisional Headquarters ning labuad, ing Jabalpur. 

Murshidabad:
Ing Murshidabad () metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king Murshidabad (distritu) king estadu ning Albugang Bengal (West Bengal), India. Atiu ing lakanbalen ning Murshidabad king mauli ("southern") nang pampang ning "Bhagirathi", a mamagus papunta king Ilug Ganges.

Shariff Kabunsuan:
Ing Shariff Kabunsuan dati yang lalawigan ning Filipinas nung nu bubuu ne ing Autonomous Region in Muslim Mindanao (ARMM). Ing Muslim Mindanao Autonomy Act No. 201 binie ne ing pangalalang ning bayung Lalawigan ning Shariff Kabunsuan nung nu bubuu ro ring balen a Barira, Buldon, Datu Odin Sinsuat, Kabuntalan, Matanog, Parang, Sultan Kudarat, Sultan Mastura, ampong Upi, deti ilangan ding mumunang legislatibung distritu ning imang lalawigan ning Maguindanao. Ing lakanbalen ning Cotabato Lakanbalen nung nu iti timawa yang panibalan ampong eya magalal a opisyales panglalawigan, eya kayabe ninuman ning Maguindanao o kaya ning Shariff Kabunsuan. Nanupata, para keng sangkan ning pangkatawan congresu ing mesabing lakanbalen makalupung ya keng Shariff Kabunsuan, agpang keng Section 5 na ning MMA Act No. 201. Ing lalawigan limbug ya pangairal kapamilatan ning desisyun ning Supreme Court decision pepalual na inyang Juliu 17, 2008.
Politicang Pangadake.
Ing Shariff Kabunsuan atin yang 11 a balen kareng aduang Sangguniang distritu:

Mysore:
Ing Mysore ( king Ingles ; mialilan yang Mysuru|ಮೈಸೂರು) () ing kaduang pekamaragul a lakanbalen o ciudad king Karnataka, India. Iti ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning Mysore (distritu) ampong Mysore division, at maki dayu yang king mauli-albugan ("southwest") ning Bangalore, ing tungku (capitoliu o cabecera) ning Karnataka. Maki lapad yang ing lakanbalen at atiu king kabitisan da reng Talimunduk ning Chamundi. 

Labanan ning Sardarapat:
Ing Labanan ning Sardarabad ("Battle of Sardarabad") (; ) metung yang labanan king Caucasus Campaign ning Mumunang Gerang Meto Yatu a miliari malapit king Sardarapat, Armenia manibat kanitang Mayu 24 anggang Mayu 26, 1918. Maki dayu ya mung 40 kilometru king albugan ("west") ning lakanbalen o ciudad ning Yerevan ing Sardarapat, at akakit de king salukuyan ing labanan antimong bageng migpatuknang e mu king paniulung da ring Turku palub kareng aliwa na pang dake ning Armenia, nun e king laganas a pangagisan ning bangsang Armenian. 

Nadiad:
Ing Nadiad (Gujarati:નડીયાદ Hindi:नडीयाद) metung yang lakanbalen ampong metung a sentrung pangkapanibalan ning Kheda (distritu) king estadu ning Gujarat, India. 

Nagapattinam:
Ing Nagapattinam (Tamil:நாகப்பட்டினம்) (a sadiang misulat a Nagapatnam) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad a atiu king bebe ning dayatmalat, ampong metung a munisipalidad king Nagapattinam (Distritu) king estadu ning Tamil Nadu, India. Iti ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Distritu ning Nagapattinam, at melalang ya kaibat ning pamamangal ning distritu ning Thanjavur kanitang Octubri 18, 1991. 

Nagarkurnool:
Ing Nagarkurnool metung yang balen king Mahbubnagar (distritu), Andhra Pradesh, India. Iti ing sentru ning kalakal ampong pamanuru (edukasiun) kareng makapadurut a nayun ampong balen. Sadia yang pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning distritu. King salukuyan, metung neng MP constituency ampong Revenue division. 

Nagercoil:
Ing Nagercoil (Tamil: நாகர்கோவில்) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a munisipalidad king Kanyakumari (distritu) king estadu ning Tamil Nadu, mauling ("southern") India. Iti ing pekamauling lakanbalen king mainland INdia, ampon ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning distritu ning Kanyakumari.

Nagpur:
Ing Nāgpur (Marathi: नागपुर) ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen o ciudad king kalibudtang India (sensus ning 2001) ampo ing kaduang tungku (capital o capitoliu) ning estadu ning Maharashtra, India.. Iti ing pun tanggapan ("headquarter") ning Nagpur (distritu) ampo ning Nagpur division. Ing Nagpur ing ka-13 a pekamaragul a urban conglomeration king India

Nainital:
Ing Nainital metung yang balen king estadu ning Uttarakhand, India. Pun tanggapan ne ning Nainital (distritu) king dibision ning Kumaon, kareng talimunduk king kabitisan ding makalual a dake ning kabundukang Himalayas. Atiu iti king lambak a maki danong ("lake") katabas peras, a manga aduang milia padurut ("circumference"), at padurutan dang bunduk.

Nalgonda:
Ing Nalgonda metung yang balen ampong metung a munisipalidad king Nalgonda (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Nanded:
Ing Nanded () ing kaduang pekamaragul a lakanbalen o ciudad king labuad ("region") ning Marathwada king estadu ning Maharashtra, India. Iti ing pun tanggapan a pang-distritu ("district headquarters") ning Distritu ning Nanded ampo ning Aurangabad revenue division. Metung yang maulagang banal a lugal para king kasalpantayanan o relihiun a Sikh 

Nandyal:
Ing Nandyal metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad, ampong metung a division ning estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. Metung yang maulagang sentru ning pamituru, agrikultura, maliap a lasip ("wildlife"), ampong peregrinasiun ("pilgrimage"). Uling makapadurut yang danum kareng apat a gilid, ania keti ing metung king pekamatabang gabun king Rayalaseema. 

Nandurbar:
Ing Nandurbar metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal council king Nandurbar (distritu) king estadu ning Maharashtra, India.

Nangal:
Ing Nangal metung yang balen a maki dayung 60 km king estadu ning Punjab king pangulu-albugang ("northwest") India. Atiu king kabitisan da reng Talimunduk ning Shiwalik, at padurutan deng talimunduk, ing Ilug Satluj, ampong canal. Metung yang maulagang sentru para kareng turista.

Narasaraopet:
Ing Narasaraopet o Narasaraopeta metung yang balen, mandal ampong munisipalidad king Guntur (distritu) ning estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 
Dalerayan.
Ramachandra rao kommineni(A TALL MAN) -- Yallamanda
NALLAPATI VENKATRAMAIAH,FORMER SPEAKER OF ANDHRA PRADESH LEGISLATIVE ASSEMBLY
Sri Kolavennu Ramakoteswara rao garu who was a freedom fighter, and the founder editor of 'Triveni' magazine, to which pandit Nehru and other National leaders used to write for.

Narsinghpur:
Ing Narsinghpur o Narsimhapur metung yang balen king estadu ning Madhya Pradesh king kalibudtang India. Iti ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Narsinghpur (Distritu). 

Nashik:
Ing Nashik () () or Nasik () metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad kng estadu ning Maharashtra, India. Atiu ing Nashik king pangulu-albugan ("northwest") ning Maharashtra, 180 km manibat king Mumbai ampong 220 km manibat king Pune. Iti ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Nashik (Distritu) ampong Nashik (Dibision). 

Navi Mumbai:
Ing Navi Mumbai (Marathi: नवी मुंबई, IAST: ), a sadia rang ausang New Bombay (Bayung Bombay), metung a lakanbalen o ciudad king albugan nang bebe dayatmalat ("west coast")m ning estadu ning Maharashtra, India. Meyalkus ya kanitang 1972 antimong lakanbalen a kakambal ("twin city") ning Mumbai, at metung ya kareng pekamaragul a lakanbalen king yatu, a maki pangkabilugan a lapad ning 344 km² ampong 163 km² lalam ning Navi Mumbai Municipal Corporation (NMMC). 

Navsari:
Ing Navsari (Gujarati: નવસારી) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a munisipalidad king estadu ning Gujarat, India. Pekilagiu de keti ing Navsari administrative district 

Neemuch:
Ing Neemuch [http://neemuch.nic.in/] (Hindi:नीमच) o Nimach metung yang balen king labuad ("region") ning Malwa king estadu ning Madhya Pradesh, India. Atiu king angganan ning estadu ning Rajesthan king dane nang pangulu-aslagan ("northeast"). Iti ing pun tanggapan pangkapanibalan ("administrative headquarters") ning Neemuch (Distritu). Ing Nimach pamikuyad ne ning "North Indian Mounted Artillary & Cavalry Headquarters".

Nellore:
Ing Nellore (Telugu:నెల్లూరు) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. Iti ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning Nellore district. Maulaga ya king kalakal uling atiu king pilatan ning Vijayawada ampong Chennai. Atiu king pampang ning Ilug Pennar. 

Gil Puyat:
I Gil J. Puyat (Setiembri 1, 1907 - Marzu 23, 1980) metung yang negosianti ampong puliticung Filipinu ampong Kapampangan a migsilbing Senador ning Filipinas manibat 1951, ampong Pamuntuk ning Senadu manibat 1967 anggang 1972. 
Meging Senador at Pamuntuk ning Senadu ning Bansang Pilipinas. Metung ya naman talaturu at dakal ya inampang king parang ning pamipagaral. Matagumpe yang "industrialist", menalakad pipagauan gamit lalu na karing mueblis bale "furniture". Mibayit ya Guagua. Igpa ne i Don Gonzalo Puyat.
Pamagaral.
Uling meragul ya king negosiu, e makapagtakang carera king comerciu ing kinua nang Puyat king colehiu. Comerciu ing megi nang kursu king Universidad ning Filipinas, nung nu ya ing pekamatas king kayang clasi. Aniang magaral ya pa, makatutuk ne kareng mangalalam nang detalle ning pisalapian ("finance") ampong gastus ("expense"), puhunan ampong produksiun, pamanibala ampong pamanalan kareng talapagobra. 
Umpisa ning carera.
Megi yang kayanib ning Rotary Club ning Menila aniang panaun a megi ya namang propesor ning economics king Universidad ning Filipinas.
Miras king pansin nang Presidenti Manuel L. Quezon ing pangataniag nang Gil Puyat king negosiu ampong kabiasnan king pamanibala king negosiu ning pamilia. Aniang panaun a ita, king agricultura o pamanasik ing makababong actibidad king bangsa, at buri nang isulung ning Pamuntuk ing industrialisasiun. Pinili neng decanu i Puyat king Colegiu ning Pamanibalang Kalakal ("College of Business Administration") ning Universidad ning Filipinas aniang edad ya pamung 33. Megi yang anak diling decanu ning UP king edad a iti. Metung yang actibung kayanib kareng internasiunal a aguman king kalakal, at mekilala ya king negosiu kareng aliwang bangsa. Inalal neng "Business Leader of the Year" (Pekapun pangkalakal ning banua) aniang 1948 ning Business Writers’ Association of the Philippines, at binotu na ne mang "Civic Leader of the Year" (Pekapun a civicu ning banua) ning Association of Red Feather Agencies aniang 1949.
Kanitang 1953, mekatanggap yang plaque king Community Chest of Greater Manila para king “outstanding services as one of the founders, first president and first campaign fund chairman“ ning aguman. Dininan neng galal ning Philippine Institute of Public Opinion (PIPO) para king pamagpaltong pambansang pamanibala king kalakal, "economics", larangan a civicu ampong pampulitica, ampong makabukud a pamaniuyu kareng kayanakan. Alang patna ing pamagsilbi nang Puyat kareng miayaliwa pang aguman, nung nu meyakit ing kayang pamipasulung king obrang civicu ampong pamaniayup king balen.
Carera king pulitica.
Aniang alalan ning 1951, mialal yang Senador, at migsilbi ya king Senadu ning Filipinas anggang misara ya iti uli ning leyi militar kanitang 1972. Ya ing Pamuntuk ning Senadu manibat kanitang 1967.
King pamagsilbi na king lehislatura, megi yang pikabaluan i Puyat uling kareng kayang kapanumanan (reporma) ampong pamagbayu dikil king pamangamit kareng pondu king obrang pangmalda.
Asawa ne ing sadiang Eugenia Guidote. Pitu la reng karelang anak.
Mete ya i Puyat aniang Marzu 23, 1980.

New Delhi:
Ing New Delhi (, , ) ing lakanbalen a tungku ("capital city") ning India. Maki pangkabilugan yang lapad a 42.7 km2, a at atiu kilub ning "metropolis" ning Delhi. Magsilbi yang sentru ning Kapamahalan ning India ampo ning Kapamahalan ning w:National Capital Territory of Delhi. 
Pinlanu neng Edwin Lutyens, metung a manimunang arkitektung ibat Britania ning kaduang pulung dilanua o siglu ing New Delhi, a pikabaluan kareng kayang mangalapad a "boulevard" a maki dutung king gilid, ampo reng dakal a institusiun ampong pakatalakad a pambangsa.

New Guntur:
Ing New Guntur ing bayung labuad ("region") ning Guntur, metung a lakanbalen o ciudad king aslagan nang bebe dayatmalat ("east coast") ning India. Aniang meragul ya papuntang pangulu o norti ing lakanbalen, mika atlu yang labuad: ing Old Guntur (Matuang Guntur), Guntur ampong New Guntur (Bayung Guntur). Atin yang sariling "train transit point" o istasiun tren ing New Guntur, a kayabe king Indian Railways. 

Nizamabad, Andhra Pradesh:
Ing Nizamabad metung yang balen ampong metung a municipal corporation king Nizamabad (Distritu) ning labuad ("region") ning Telangana, estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. Iti ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning distritu. Metung ya kareng 36 a mandal king distritu ning Nizamabad ing Nizamabad.

Nizamabad, Uttar Pradesh:
Ing Nizamabad metung yang balen ampong nagar panchayat king Azamgarh (distritu) king estadu ning Uttar Pradesh. 

Nizamabad:
Ing Nizamabad maliari yang mangabaldugang:

Noida:
Ing New Okhla Industrial Development Area, a keraklan dang pepakuyad king "acronym" a NOIDA (Hindi: नोएडा - a ausan dang Noida deng keraklan) metung yang lugal king India king lalam ning pamanibala ning New Okhla Industrial Development Authority (a ausan da mu namang NOIDA). Melalang ya ing Noida kanitang 17 ya ing April 1976, at pagmasusian ne ing Abril 17 antimong "Noida Day" (Aldo ning Noida). Telakad neng Sanjay Gandhi anting metung a dake ning kayang proyectu ning urbanisasiun aniang controbersial a Emergency period (1975-1977). Atiu ing lakanbalen o ciudad king Gautam Buddha Nagar (distritu) ning Uttar Pradesh. Melalang ya king lalam ning "UP Industrial Area Development Act". Primera clasi la reng kayang pasilidad, at tuturing deng metung kareng mas makabayung karulun ("suburb") ning Delhi king National Capital Region. Atiu keti ing Noida Film City. 

Palai:
Ing Pala (a misusulat muring Palai (Malayalam : പാലാ), metung yang balen king dakeng matalimunduk king aslagan ning Kottayam (distritu) king estadu ning Kerala. Atiu king pampangan ning Ilug Meenachil, at pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ne ning Meenachil Taluk ampo ning Pala Revenue Division. Iti ing manimunang pasbul dalan ("gateway") papunta kareng mangatas a kabundukan ning mauli ("southern high ranges").

Abrera:
Ing Abrera metung yang balen king "comaerca" na ning Baix Llobregat 
king Catalonia, Spain. Atiu king saug ning Llobregat ilug, king mauling-aslagan ning 
Montserrat, king pun ning N-II dalan pilatan ning Barcelona ampong Lleida. Ing balen masusuyu ya kapamilatan ning FGC rilis a dalan manibat Martorell anggang Manresa: ing S4 ampong
R5 suyu tutuknang ya king stasiun.

Begues:
Ing Begues metung yang balen king "comaerca" na ning Baix Llobregat 
king Catalonia, Espanya. Atiu king mauling-albugan ning "comarca", at ing kayang balen territoryu sasakupan ne ing alus na ning Garraf massif kayabe no reng taluktuk ning el Montau (658 m) ampong la Morella (594 m). Metung yng maulagang kalibudtraran turismu at makataid ya keng Avinyonet del Penedès ampo keng Gavà kapamilatan ning dalan pampuruk.

Castelldefels:
Ing Castelldefels metung yang balen king Baix Llobregat comarca, king lalawigna ning Barcelona, king Catalonia, Espanya.
atiu king pangulu na ning massís del Garraf ampong pekatauling balen king pampang bayu king comarca ning Garraf.

Castellví de Rosanes:
Ing Castellví de Rosanes metung yang malating balen king catalan lalawigan ning Barcelona (Espanya). Ing balen atin yang 1,370 pakatuknang inyang 2005 ampong atin yang 17,09 kilometru kudradu, nung nu ding pakatuknang migdatun la king Els Àngels, Can Sunyer del Palau, Miralles, El Taió ampong Valldaina.
Suglung Palual.

Cervelló:
Ing Cervelló metung yang balen na ning Baix Llobregatking Catalonia, Espanya.

Collbató:
Ing Collbató metung yang balen king "comaerca" na ning Baix Llobregat 
king Catalonia, Espanya. Aitu king mauling baidbid ning Montserrat. Ing karinan pigdatunan dane manibat pa inyang 4000 BC, agpang keng papakit na ning Neolithic memanditla a mayayakit kareng lungib babao ning baranggay (a makapakit keng museum king monastery ning Montserrat). 

Corbera de Llobregat:

Cornellà de Llobregat:
Cornellà de Llobregat metung yang balen king "comaerca" na ning Baix Llobregat king Catalonia, Espanya. Atiu king kailing pasigan ning Llobregat ilug.

Esparreguera:
Ing Esparreguera ("Catalan:Esparreguera", "Spanish:Esparraguera") metung yang balen king "comaerca" na ning Baix Llobregat king Catalonia, Espanya. Atiu king comarca na ning el Baix Llobregat.

Molins de Rei:

manibat Valencia anggang La Jonquera keng pun dalan ning N-II. 

Palwal:
Ing Palwal metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal council, at ka-21 yang distritu ning estadu ning Haryana, India.

Panaji:
Ing Panaji (Konkani: पणजी ) ing tungku o capitoliu ning estadu ning Goa, India. Atiu king pampang ning Mandovi estuary, king distritu ning Pangulung Goa (North Goa). Iti ing katlung pekamaragul a lakanbalen o ciudad ning Goa, kaibat ning Vasco ampong Margao.
Suglung palual.
