Kondapuram, Kadapa (distritu):
Ing Kondapuram metung yang malating balen ampong metung a mandal king Kadapa (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Lepidoptera:
Ing Lepidoptera metung yang orden da reng insectu o ayup-ayupan nung nu la kayabe deng kambubulag ampo reng talubang o mariposa. Metung ya kareng orden a dakal dili uri o species king class Insecta, a sasaklo kareng kambubulag ampong atlung superfamily da reng talubang o mariposa, talubang a skipper, ampong talubang-kambubulag ("moth-butterflies"). Lepidopterans ing aus da kareng kayanib king orden a iti. Lepidopterist ne man ing taung manipun o manigaral king orden a iti. Atin yang 180,000 species o uri ing orden. in 128 families and 47 superfamilies. Ibat ya ing lagiu king Matuang Griegung (kaliskis) ampong (pakpak). Agpang kareng tantia, mas dakal ya species at metung ya kareng apat a pekamaragul ampong matagumpeng orden, kayabe la reng Hymenoptera, Diptera, ampong Coleoptera. 

Lipaktung:
Deng lipaktung ("cricket" king Ingles, "grillo" king Castila), familia Gryllidae, insectu lang kamaganak da reng durun, dapot mas malapit la kareng katydids or bush crickets (familia Tettigoniidae). Pitpit lang bagia deng karelang katawan, at atin lang mangakabang antenna. Ating manga 900 (siam a ralan) a species o uri da reng lipaktung. Lulual la neng bengi, at maralas dong apapagkamaliang durun uling miwawangis la pangabalangkas katawan, kayabe no reng bitis da king gulut a pagluksu. 

Durun:
Deng durun ("grasshopper" king Ingles), insectu la o ayup-ayupan ibat king suborden Caelifera king orden Orthoptera. Ba lang pakiyaliwa kareng bush cricket o katydid, neng kai ausan dong "short-horned grasshoppers" o durun a makuyad sagu king Ingles. Ausan dong "locust" king Ingles deng uri o species a manaliwa kule ampong pangimut neng misisiksikan la at daragul populasiun, dapot durun pa murin ing aus da kareti king Kapampangan. 

Kamaru:
Deng kamaru ("mole cricket" king Ingles) a bibilug king familia Gryllotalpidae, insectu la o ayup-ayupan a maki kabang 3-5 cm (1-2 pulgada). Mangaragul la ampong pakabural deng karelang mata, at maki bitis la king arap a balamu pala, a bage king pamangulkul ampong pamangawe. Agiu da muring sulagpo, at makasulagpo lang anggang deti neng panaun ning pamagpalipi. Makalual la king keraklan king banua, at matudtud ("hibernation") la neng karimlan ("winter") kareng marimlang lugal. 
Mas makuyad la pakpak deng anak a kamaru, at aliwa-liwa ing karelang itsura dependi king species o uri. Ating lupang durun, at atin namang kawangis maragul a panas o matuling a "ane" neng makuyad la pakpak.
Miayaliwa la kakanan deng kamaru, alimbawa deng ulad, bulati, yamut, ampong dikut. Kayabe no man kareng mamangan kamaru deng ayup, dagis, skunk, armadillo, raccoon ampong fox. 
Dakal la at malapad la reng lugal nung nu ating kamaru, oneng uling neng bengi la lulual deti at alus mabilug dang bie atilu lalam gabun kareng kulkul, malagad la mung mayayakit. Mabibie la kareng asikan, dikut a mula ("lawns"), ampong pipamialungan golf ("golf courses"). Ati lu king balang continenti liban king Antarctica, at maralas, tuturing dong pesti. Nanupata, king Aslagang Asia, gagawan da lang pamangan. King Filipinas, pikabaluan la reng Kapampangan king pamamangan kamaru.
Kareng aliwang lugal, diritak la reng kamaru uling king pangatibag ning gabun ampo ning pangasira ning karelang tutuknangan.
Deng uri da reng kamaru.
Ating mapilang species o uri da reng kamaru, a pikakawani da agpang king tribu:

Lee Dong Wook:

States ning Germany:
Ing Alemania (Germany) (Deutschland) metung yang Federal Republic a atin labinganam a states, kebaluan bilang German Länder (pangmetung Land). Uling ing "Land" ing kabaldugan na keng Aleman a kataya "bangsa", ing katayang Bundesländer (federal states; pangmetung Bundesland) magagamit ya bilang pangkaraniwan, agiang makatamak ya mismu, agiang eya ustu karas keng batas Aleman. 

Ining Yatu ning Meto Ketauan:
Ing Ining Yatu ning Meto Ketauan (orihinal a Indonesian, Bumi Manusia; Ingles, This Earth of Mankind) ing minunang libru king grupu da reng apat a librung sinulat ning talasulat a Indonesian, i Pramoedya Ananta Toer. Misulat ya kabang makakulung ya king islang sukulan a Buru king aslagang Indonesia. Aniang mumuna, micuentu ya kareng kalupa nang presung Pramoedya aniang 1973 uling ala yang paintulut a isulat ne. 
Miliari ya aniang tauli nang dake ning pamaniakup da reng Dutch o Holandes ing nobela. Ing manimunang tauan ampong talacuentu ning Ining Yatu ning Meto Ketauan metung yang anak a lalaking tau Java o Javanese, i Minke, a misuertian a makapagaral king metung a iscuelang Dutch uling lahi de reng ari ning Java. Linub ya king kabilian a complicadu ampong mapanganib i Minke aniang akilala ne i Annelies, a malagu nang anak Nyai Ontosoroh. King Ining Yatu ning Meto Ketauan, pepakit nang Pramoedya ing e makatuliran a bie da reng memalen ning Indonesia aniang panaun ning pamaniakup ding Dutch, nung kapilan ing basi ning kabilian king sociedad ya pin ing karakal ning dayang Europeo ning metung a tau. Ing pamipakilala nang Pramoedya kang Minke, metung a taung e tatakut magsalita, a e tatanggap king sociedad nung nu la makatas deng mapilang uri da reng tau kareng aliwa, at uli na niti, megi yang talasulat imbes na talagawang discursu (speech-maker). E malaut iti king bie nang Pramoedya, a aduang banuang mesukul uli king kayang pamagdala kareng documentu laban kareng Dutch, at kaibat, meging metung a talasulat. 
Binawal ne ning Attorney General ning Indonesia ing Ining Yatu… aniang 1981. Dakal lang copiang mesagip at mikalat, kayabe la reng edisiun a milimbag king Malaysia. Milimbag yang pasibayu king Indonesia kapamilatan ning talabulalag a Lentera Depantara aniang 2005, kaibat nang milikas kareng 33 amanu king mabilug a yatu.

Pramoedya Ananta Toer:
I Pramoedya Ananta Toer (6 Febrero 1925 – 30 Abril 2006) metung yang Indonesian a talasulat da reng novela, makuyad a salita, salese ("essay"), polemic ampong amlat ning kayang bangsa ampo ning kayang lahi. Masasaklo kareng kayang obra ing panaun ning pamaniakup, ing pamagalsa ning Indonesia para king katimawan, ing pamaglub da reng Hapones aniang Kaduang Gerang Pangyatu, ampo ing rehimen nang Sukarno ampong Suharto kaibat ning panaun ning pamaniakup, at luluban no ning kasalesayan nang pangsarili ampong pambangsa deting obra na.
Neng kai, e ra la kapad deng kapanibalan da reng talasakup ampo reng tubung kapamahalan a menalili kareti deng kasulatan nang Pramoedya. Dinalan ya king censorship i Pramoedya kabang daragul ing kayang kasikatan king kilual ning Indonesia kanitang panaun a e pa miliari ing pamagbayu ("pre-reformation era"). Aniang minalis king rehimen nang Suharto, mirasan ya king pamanaliwa king kabilian ning pulitica ampong pamipate-pate para king upaya king Indonesia. Uling king paglalawe kayang antimong mitagan ibat king sadiang rehimen (lipat ning linaban ya murin karela), dakal deng banuang nigse king isla ning Buru, nung nu ro susukul deng presung pampulitica, at nung nu ne kinuentu ing pikabaluan nang diling obra, ing Buru Quartet. King pamagsalita ya mu o kuentung mirake kareng aliwang presu ing epicung iti, bayu ya misulat at pasalikut a pepalual. Linaban ya i Toer kareng patakaran ning mumunang pamuntuk (i Sukarno) ampo ing kayang kayalili, ing rehimen nang "New Order" (o Bayung Palakad) ning Pamuntuk o Presidenti Suharto, dapot pinu at e halata ing kayang pamagpuna, dapot masikan ing kayang pamalak laban king colonialismu ampong discriminaciun basi king lahi ("racism"). Aniang dakal a banuang atiu king sukulan ampong mekulung ya king kayang bale ("house arrest"), megi yang kilalang sagisag ning katimawan ning pamipahayag ampo ning katulirang pantau. 
Karagdagang babasan.
Libru tungkul kang Pramoedya Ananta Toer

Đồng Hới:
Ing Đồng Hới iya ing tungku (kabisera) na ning Quảng Bình lalawigan, king pangulung kalibutnan a pampang ning Vietnam. 
Agpang keng 2005 sensus, atin yang populasyun a 103,005 a katau.
Atiu maga 500 km (310 mi) mauli ning Hà Nội (Hanoi), 260 km (160 mi) pangulu ning Đà Nẵng (Danang), 1,200 km (750 mi) pangulu ning Hồ Chí Minh City (Saigon). 
Deng Barangay.
Ing Dong Hoi makadake ya kareng 16 subdivisions, 10 urban wards ("phường") ampong 6 rural communes 

Dakal Pang Balita Abril 09:
Ari Ning Parnaso, sinulat ne ing keyang aklat PANINAP NING MAKAGISING, Vedasto D. Ocampo, King of Parnasus Literary Gem ketang Banwang 1994.
Mibayit ya San Pedro, Magalang, Kapampangan ketang Ka-11 nang Aldo ning Agosto, 1925. Ketang Domingu, mewala ya biye ing Ari ning Parnaso, (mayayaus Tatang Viding karing makayanak nang kabalen), nganing balita ning VP, HAU at Direktor ning DJNCKS Robby Tantingco. Makirame kami karing likwan ning Meanguabie, pamilya ampo karing kayabe na AGTAKA at AKKAP. 
Ketang pelimbag ne ing mesambitlang aklat atitimpla nane ning Ari ing maybug nang mapunding sulu anya pigsadya nane kanu ing dalan nang pauli karin Poeta ring sablang poeta, king Ginung linalang kaya. Agpang king pesulatan nang talambiye i Edwin N. Camaya, kayabe na Akademyang Kapampangan.
Akademyang Kapampangan, piyabe reng pigmalasakitan Tatang Viding ampo'y Doktora Evangelina H. Lacson, pauli ning lugud da king Indung Kapampangan ampon paulaga at galang karing pepamana king makasalesayan Akademya, ri Don Zoilo Hilario, Monico Mercado, Amado Yuzon, Amung Reverendo Quirino Canilao a tikyan da ri Jose Gallardo at aliwa pa, antimo ri Pangulung Diosdado Macapagal. Ketang Marsu Ka-14, panbanwa neng meko i Imang Neni o Doktora Lacson, (a minampang kopya king mesabing aklat nang Tang Viding king anak ku; keni ko ikit ing panga-lakambini at kadalise na pusu Imang Neni.). Miyabe la kanyan pasibayu karin Banwa dening adwa, Tang Viding at Imang Neni. Ila ding mitmung sipag at kapibabatan misadsad king lakaran ning AKKAP bangkanita e mate ing Kalinangan Kapampangan lakwas na ing Malagung Panyulat. Migaga la pa kaya? Ali nala pauli ning ala nala ding palpikasala karin.
Alang angganang lugud at legwan ing piyaben da karin ila ri Abogado Serapin Lacson at ding anggang mitalakad king Akademya. Mapoetang pamanyagana libutad ning banglu at tigtig da ring sablang angeles Ligaya Banwa, ing matas pa king taluktuk ning Parnaso, Athena. Posted by Aida T Aguas April 27, 2009 at 3:17 AM

Đồng Mỹ:

Mydukur:
Ing Mydukur (a misusulat muring Mydukuru, Mydekur o S.Mydukur) metung yang malating balen ampong metung a Mandal king Kadapa (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. Mitátag ya antimong Madhavakuru kanitang minuna. King lambatan, megi yang Mydukur lagiu.

Đồng Phú:
Ing Đồng Phú metung yang urban ward ("phường") king Đồng Hới, Quang Binh Lalawigan, king Vietnam. 3.81 km² ya ing lualas a sasakupan na at atin yang populasiun a 8016.

Nandalur:
Ing Nandalur metung yang nayun ampong metung a mandal king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Obulavaripalle:
Ing Obulavaripalle metung yang nayun ampong metung a mandal king Kadapa (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India.

Ing Peddamudium metung yang ampong metung a mandal king Kadapa (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Pendlimarri:
Ing Pendlimarri metung yang nayun ampong metung a mandal king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Porumamilla:
Ing Porumamilla metung yang malating balen king Kadapa (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh , India.
Iti ing pekamaragul a Mandal king Kadapa (distritu).

Proddatur:
Ing Proddatur ing kaduang pekamaragul a balen king Kadapa (distritu), a pikabaluan kareng kayang negosiung gintu ampong bulak. Metung yang grade 1 municipal corporation king Kadapa (distritu), king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India.

Guntur (distritu):
Ing Guntur metung yang distritu king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh king aslagan nang bebe dayatmalat ning Bay of Bengal, India. Maki kaba yang 100 kilometru ing bebe dayatmalat ning distritu. Ing Guntur lakanbalen ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen o ciudad king distritu, ampo ing sentrung pangkapanibalan ning Distritu ning Guntur. Metung yang manimunang sentru ning pamagaral ing distritu. 
Deng Mandal.
Ing distritu ning Guntur mapipitna ya kareng 62 mandal ba yang maging mayan ing pamanibala at ilapit ya ing kapamahalan kareng tau. 

Achampeta:
Ing Achampeta o Atchampet metung yang nayun ampong metung a Mandal king Guntur (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Bapatla:
Ing Bapatla, a sadia rang ausang Bhavapuri, metung ya kareng makasalesayang balen ampong mandal ning Guntur (distritu) a manga 40 milia king mauli momg Guntur Lakanbalen, king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, king aslagan nang bebe dayatmalat ning India. 

Mỹ Thủy, Lệ Thủy:
Ing Mỹ Thủy metung yang rural commune ("xã") king Lệ Thủy, Quang Binh Lalawigan, king Vietnam. 4.81 km² ya ing lualas a sasakupan na at atin yang populasiun a 5116.

Durgi:
Ing Durgi metung yang nayun ampong metung a mandal king labuado rehion ning Palnadu king Guntur (distritu), estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, Mauling India.

Edlapadu:
Ing Edlapadu metung yang nayun ampong metung a mandal king Guntur (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Gurazala:

Ing Đức Ninh Đông metung yang urban ward ("phường") king Đồng Hới, Quang Binh Lalawigan, king Vietnam. 3.13 km² ya ing lualas a sasakupan na at atin yang populasiun a 4726.

Nizampatnam:
Ing Nizampatnam, a ausan da mu namang Petapolly, metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad a sadsaran dayatmalat ("seaport") king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. Atiu king Guntur (distritu), nung nukarin metung yang mandal.

Bố Trạch Distritu:
Ing Bố Trạch metung yang districtu ("huyện") king Quang Binh Lalawigan. Ing kabisera (tungku) ning distritu iyapin ing Hoan Lao townlet. Ing Bo Trach ing sepu na iyapin ing ing tungkung Dong Hoikeng mauling-aslgan ampong Tuyen Hoa distritu ampong Quang Trach distritu keng pangulu, Quang Ninh keng mauli ampong Minh Hoa keng pangulungalbugan.
Administratibung Pangadake.
Ing distritu makadake ya kareng balen a makatuki: Hoàn Lão Nhân Trạch, Thượng Trạch, Tân Trạch, Xuân Trạch, Lâm Trạch, Phúc Trạch, Lâm Trạch, Hưng Trạch, Liên Trạch, Mỹ Trạch, Hạ Trạch, Bắc Trạch, Thanh Trạch, Hải Trạch ampong Trung Trạch.

Piduguralla:

Lệ Thủy Distritu:
Ing Lệ Thủy () metung yang distritu ning Quang Binh Lalawigan king North Central Coast ning Vietnam. Ding sepu ning distritu ilapin deng Quang Ninh Distritu keng pangulu, Vinh Linh District (Quang Tri Lalawigan) keng pangulu, Laos keng albugant (nung nu ing Annamite Range bilang sepu). Ing Le Thuy central 40 km ya mmauli ning ttungku (kabisera) lalawigan ning Dong Hoi. Ing lulukan distritung gubiernu iyapin ing Kien Giang Township. Ing distritu atin yang lualals a 141,052 km2, populasiun: 140,804 (1998).
Pangadake.
Ing distritu atin yang aduang malating balen ampng 25 communes ("xã")
Hồng Thuỷ, Ngư Hoà, Ngư Thuỷ, Thanh Thuỷ, Lộc Thuỷ, Hoa Thuỷ, Cam Thuỷ, Liên Thuỷ, Phong Thuỷ, An Thuỷ, Sơn Thuỷ, Ngân Thuỷ, Hải Thuỷ, Hưng Thuỷ, Tân Thuỷ, Xuân Thuỷ , Dương Thuỷ, Mai Thuỷ, Phú Thuỷ, Mỹ Thuỷ, Sen Thuỷ, Trường Thuỷ, Văn Thuỷ, Kim Thuỷ, Thái Thuỷ.

Minh Hóa Distritu:
Ing Minh Hóa metung yang districtu ("huyện") king Quang Binh Lalawigan, king North Central Coast ning Vietnam. Ing distritu atin yang metung a malating balen (Quy Đạt, district capital) ampong communes ("xã"): Xuân Hoá, Yên Hoá, Trung Hoá, Tân Hoá, Minh Hoá, Hồng Hoá, Hóa Tiến, Hóa Hợp, Hóa Sơn, Hóa Phúc, Hóa Thanh, Dân Hoá, Thượng Hoá, Trọng Hóa, Quy Hóa. 
Agpang inyang 2003 ing distritu atin yang popuyalsiun a 43,665. The district covers an area of 1,401 km². The district capital lies at Quy Dat. 

Pittalavanipalem:
Ing Pittalavanipalem (Pittalavani Palem/Pittalavari Palem/Pittlavani Palem) metung yang nayun ampong metung a mandal in Guntur (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Ponnur:
Ing Ponnur metung yang balen a marangle ("rural town") ampong metung a munisipalidad a 20 milia king mauli ning Guntur Lakanbalen king Guntur (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India.

Guntuk Lakanbalen:
Ing Guntur (Telugu: గుంటూరు, Urdu: گنٹور, Hindi: गुंटूर) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad ampong metung a municipal corporation king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, a king pangulu o norti ning Bay of Bengal. Maki dayu yang manga king mauli ("south") ning tungku (capitoliu), ing New Delhi.

Quang Ninh Distritu:

Ing sepu ning Quang Ninh iyapin ing tungkung lakanbalen a Dong Hoi king pangulu, ing Bo Trach keng pangulung-albugan, Lệ Thủy Distritu keng mauli ampong Mauling Tsina Dayat Malat keng aslagan. Ing Quảng Ninh atin yang lualas a 1190.89 km2, populasiun inyang 2004: 90,000 người.T

Karimnagar (distritu):
"Lon ya ing Karimnagar para king impormasiun tungkul king ciudad."
Ing Karimnagar (distritu) () atiu king labuad ning Telangana king Andhra Pradesh, Mauling India. Ing Karimnagar ing tungku o capitoliu ning distritu.

Ibrahimpatnam:
Ing Ibrahimpatnam metung yang Mandal king distritu ning Ranga Reddy ampong assembly constituency headquarter king Hyderabad, estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India.

1)Ibrahimpatnam
2)Metpally

5)Maidipally

Mallapur:
Ing Mallapur metung yang nayun ampong metung a mandal king Karimnagar (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Raikal:
Ing Raikal metung yang pun tanggapan ning mandal (sub-district) ampong malating balen king Karimnagar (distritu), king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India.

Ing Dharmapuri metung yang nayun ampong metung a pun tanggapan ning mandal king Karimnagar (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Velgatoor:
Ing Velgatoor metung yang nayun amnpong metung a mandal king Karimnagar (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Ramagundam:
Ing Ramagundam (kayabe ya ing balen ning Godavarikhani) metung yang ciudad o lakanbalen, mandal ampong municipalidad king Karimnagar (distritu) king pangulu nang dake ning estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. 

Anak ning Arenas:
Ing Anak ning Arenas metung yang Kapampangan watas.
Talambie.
Ing Anac Ning Arenas mibait ya qng Baryu Arenas, Arayat ketang Eneru 8, 1956. Ing pengari nang lalaki (Binu), 
a metung Ortelanu, taal yang tubu qng Arenas. Ing pengari na 
namang babai (Aning), a magmantining malating tindaan keng 
bale kanitang kasalungsungan nang daragul, tubu yang Magalang.
Megumpisa yang misulat poesiang Capampangan iniang sinulat ne 
ing “Corido Ning Arenas” quetang 2007, ing istorya ning 
baryung quebaitan na at ding queyang cabaryu. 
Meingganyu yang lalung sumulat caibat nang mequi-agum queng 
Academia Ning Amanung Sisuan, International (ANASI) a pinundar 
at panimunuan nang Ernesto C. Turla, quetang Marso 30, 2009, 
queng pangumbira nang Tang Ernie Turla mismu. Canita ne 
megumpisang sinulat para qng amánung Kapampángan, inspiradu queng 
kapagnasan nang abalu neng masalese ing Amanung Menan. 
Aquilala neng minuna y Tang Ernie Turla queng YouTube quetang 
Marso 15, 2009, pauli ning panintunan ne ing original a 
misulat queng "Ecu Pa Quelinguan", nung sanung guewa nang 
padrun queng sinulat nang hawig a canta, "Iniang Malati Cu". 
Nanung pangapamulala na at pangapaquirut iniang abalu nang 
ing misulat pala queng alang kamatayang canta alang aliwa 
nune ing cabaryu na at cumpari nang Tatang na - ing meangubie 
Poeta Antonio Canlas y Guevarra.
Aquilala ne mu naman ing Columnista keng diyariu, y Poeta
Felix M. Garcia, a akaluguran na at meging maganacang 
tala-payul keng makasactung sukad at rima ning pamamoesia.
Idulu nala at inspirasyun ning Anac Ning Arenas ding melapupuring
Poeta Jose M Gallardo ning Candaba at Poeta Bernardino Muldong
ning Sta. Ana, manibat pa ketang decada 60, nung nu da la alang
salang pakirandaman mitata keng Crissotan qng DZAB iniyang
panaun a'itang kasalukuyan na pang magaral keng elementarya.

Ortelánu:
Ing ortelánu metung yang táung direktung tatrabáhu king agrikultúra.
King kawatásan.
"Ing Ortelanu" (1978) ing títulu ning isa karing poema king amánung Kapampángan ning talasúlat a Filipínung ing Anak ning Arenas.
nung pacasurian me, itang Ortelanu
peca-mapalad yang lelangan ning Guinu
sariwa ya angin, pamangan cumpletu
cakbe neing panaun, uran, aldo, bagyu
abe no qng obra, ding cayang alyadu
damulag ng tapat, a e mareclamu
sarul ng mataram, gamit neng expertu
garetang pisaquen, nanu mang dala mu
ing oras ng gising, ya ing maqui-planu
maranun o ugtu, 'lang mutus mang ninu
dulung yang maranun, maranun yang ma-ugtu
ticdo ne mang ugtu, ninung magreclamu
pamag-ortelanu, macapag-mulala
itanam me ing butul mamunga yang sabla
cailangan nang danum, mumuran mung qusa
paling pamparagul, queng aldo sagana
pamangan animal cabud na tutubu
diqut ning damulag, e cailangang lutu
pati inuman da, queng bomba tutulu
o quetang talaga carin mo isaclu
dacal ing sucat a malyaring apangan
a malaguang acua at agawang ulam
queng gulut marangle, masqui lele dalan
eca caulatan nung eca maselan
anti mo ing tulud ning Bulung Apalya
dinan meng camatis saca me iguisa
sabauan meng dacal ba meng panambula
nung adua mung oras milabas na ca pa
o caya naman ing Langguk ning Camanyang
ing tulud na't sabo manyaman mu naman
iguisa meng bawang saca me bagucan
atin na cang lutung masustansyang ulam
o ita mu namang Camuting Tinalbos
manyaman yang ulam ampong pritung bangus
nung atin cang aslam, anguiang ya mung purus
tiltilan meng baguc qumabsi cang lubus
atin mu ring Kangkung careng sapa-sapa
malyaring adobu o simpli mung guisa
lalu yang manyaman nung mag-sigang ca sa
at nung gipit ca man, malyari neng laga
metung pang manyaman, itang Maligosu
tutubu lang dacal quetang lele atbu
guisa meng camatis at tumun cang bayu
potang iulam me, qumabsi cang ustu
at detang Sampaga da ring Culubasa
pucpucan mong bauang at baguc queng tasa
ibabo mo quetang nasing caibat mibua
potang menangnang na sapotian mu ne ya
aguiang itang Tulud manyaman mu naman
guisa mu o yabe queng pipagsabauan
aguiang baguc ya mu't camatis ing yagnan
dagul na ca subu at manyaman mangan
caleldo't cauran deng Kabuting are
o detang Quat duldul carin qng marangle
at Payung-payungan lalam cuayan lele
manyaman lang sabo, masustansiyang gule
panulam mu naman itang Putat mangga
bague ya queng baguc itang quekaslam na
pero siguru mas bague gamitan ya
potang gagawa cang manyamang salada
... atin ya pung casuglung

Du Fu:
Ing Du Fu (, 712–770) metung yang bantug a watas a Isik ning Tang Dynasty.
Kambe nang Li Bai (Li Po), kadalasan ausan deng pekamatenakan a watas a Isik.Ing kayang matas a tagimpan iyapin ing sumuyu keng kayang bangsa bilang matagumpeng talasuyung pangbalen, dapot eya migtagumpe. Ing kayang bie kalupa ning mabilug a bangsa malumbe ing kayang kalma pauli ning An Lushan Aklasan inyang 755, at ing kayang tauling 15 banuag bie na meging maralas ing sigalut.

Corvera de Toranzo:
Ing Corvera de Toranzo metung yang balen atiu king autonomous communidad ning Cantabria, Espania. Agpang keng 2007 sensus, ing lakanbalen atin yang populasiun a 2.221 a pakatuknang.
Ing kayang tungku (kabisera) iyapin ing San Vicente de Toranzo.

Batúng kaliús:
Ing Batúng kaliús, o "petrified wood" king Ingles (ibat kareng katayang "batú" ampong "kaliús", metung a uri ning pun dutung, ing "Streblus asper"), metung yang clasing fossil: bibilugan ne ning fossil a dutung nung nu deng eganaganang sangkap a organicu, miyalilan lang mineral (keraklan metung a silicate, antimo ing quartz), kabang manatili ing orihinal o sadiang pangabalangkas ning dutung. Maliliari king lalam ning gabun ing procesu ning pamanalili king batú o "petrifaction". Mitatambunan ya king lalam ning palák ("sediment") ing dutung, at king umpisa, e masisira iti uling king kakulangan ning oxygen. Magdalang mineral kareng cell ning tanaman ing danum a dakal melasong mineral, at kabang malalaso la reng lignin ampong cellulose ning tanaman, ating molding gawá king batúng lalto king lipat da reti. 
Keraklan, mági yang batúng kaliús ing dutung kilub ning dinalan (100) a banua. Kailangan nang ma-"petrify" ning sangkap a organicu bayu ya laganas a malaso. 
Mirinan yang miayaliwang kule ing batúng kaliús uling kareng elementung manganese, bakal ampong tangsu king danum kabang maliliari ing procesu ning "petrifaction". Ala lang kule deng purung cristal a quartz, dapot nung ating misasamut a aliwang sangkap, mikaka kule lang dilo, malutu o aliwa pa deng cristal. 
Ing makatuki lista de reng elementung misasamut ("contaminating elements") ampo deng kuleng bibie da reti:
Malalakuan king batúng kaliús ing orihinal nang pangabalangkas o istructura ning dutung, pati na ing sabla nang detalle, angga king lebel a microscopic. Maralas lang mayayakit deng dake antimo deng tree ring ampo reng miayaliwang "tissue".
Maki Mohs hardness yang 7 ing batúng kaliús, kapareu ning quartz.
Ing batúng kaliús ing batu nang panlalawigan ning Alberta, ampo ing iyas nang pang-estadu ning Washington.

Lakanbaleng Hồ Chí Minh:
Ing Lakanbaleng Hồ Chí Minh (Vietnamese: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh ) iya ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen king Vietnam. bantug ya keng lagiung Prey Nokor () bayu ya miabe keng Vietnam inyang pang17 dilanua. King alam nang lagiung Saigon (Vietnamese: Sài Gòn; ), iti ing tugnku (kabiseera) na ning French colony ning Cochinchina at kaibat iti ing timawang state ning Mauling Vietnam manibat 1954 anggang 1975. Inyang 1976, ing Saigon miabe ya keng makapaligid a lalawigan a Gia Định at meyaus yang pasibayung pangopisyal a lagiung Lakanbaleng Hồ Chí Minh (agiang ing lagiung "Sài Gòn" - dati kebaluan bilang Distritu 1 - magagamit ya pa keraklan.)

Administratibung pangake.

Khammam (distritu):
Ing Distritu ning Khammam (Telugu: ఖమ్మం జిల్లా, Hindi: खम्मम जिले) metung yang distritu king Andhra Pradesh, India. Ing balen ning Khammam ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning distritu. Lulub ya king distritu ing ilug Godavari manibat king Warangal (distritu) at mamagus yang alus 250km keti. 
Pamirake ning Khammam (distritu).
Mapipitna ya ing Khammam (distritu) kareng apat a "revenue division" ampong 46 a mandal.

Bhadrachalam:
Ing Bhadrachalam metung yang census town king Khammam (distritu) a atiu king labuad ning Telangana king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. Ing Templu ning Bhadrachalam, ing templu nang Ginung Rama, metung yang lugal ning peregrinasiun o "pilgrimage" para kareng Hindu.

Ing Bonakal () metung yang dake ning Khammam (distritu) king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India.

Marvin Raymundo:

Leon:
Ing Leon, Léon o León maliari yang mangabaldugang:
Animal.
Ing Leon (animal)

Leon (animal):
Ing leon ("Panthera leo") metung ya kareng apat a mangaragul a pusa king genus a "Panthera", a kayanib king familiang Felidae. Ating lalaking leon a maki bayat a 250 kg (550 lb) at uli na niti, iti ing kaduang pekamaragul a mabieng uri king familia da reng pusa, kaibat ning tigre. King salukuyan, ating maliap a leon king Africa king Mauli ning Sahara ampo king Asia, metung a misnang mamiligrung populasiun king pangulu-albugang India, uling mewala ne king Pangulung Africa, Kalibudtang Aslagan ("Middle East") ampong Albugang Asia king panaun a makikasalesayan ("historic times"). Angga king wakas ning panaung Pleistocene, a manga 10,000 banua ing milabas, ing leon ing pekamaleparan tutuknangan kareng mangaragul a mammal pang-mamala ("land mammal") king yatu bukud kareng tau. Mayayakit la king keraklan king Africa, maragul a dake ning Eurasia manibat king albugang Europa angga king India, ampo kareng Americas manibat king Yukon angga king Peru. 
Manga apulu anggang labing apat (10-14) lang banuang mabibie deng leon king ilang ("in the wild"), kabang nung makakulung la, miraras lang aduang pulung banua. King ilang, malagad la mu deng lálaking miraras king edad a apulung banua uling mangasugat la reti neng makipate la kareng karelang karibal. Keraklan, manuknangan la kareng :en:savanna ampong :en:grassland, dapot atin muring miraras kareng kakeuan. E la karaniwan king panga-mabásang animal ("social animals") da deng leon nung icumpara la kareng aliwang pusa. Ing metung a grupu o "pride" da reng leon, bibilugan de reng bábaing kamaganak ampo reng karelang ának, ampong malating bilang da reng lálaking atiu king edad. Keraklan, abe-abe lang mangasu deng bábaing leon, at keraklan, mangaragul lang :en:ungulate deng karelang darakpan. Metung yang apex ampong keystone predator ing leon, dapot mamulut ("scavenge") la murin nung kailangan. E ra sasarian deng keraklan kareng leon a makamate o mangan tau, dapot ating mapilang mipatunayan a mamangan tau, o mánintun kanan a tau. 
Metung yang "vulnerable species" o uring mibibili king panganib ing leon, at miliari kaya aniang milabasan a aduang decada ing mapaliaring e na mibaligtad a pangabawas ning populasiun a 30 anggang 50 porsientu. E la maliaring mantinian deng populasiun da reng leon king kilual da reng mituldung "reserve" ampong "national park". Lipat ning e re pa lubusang aintindian ing sangkan ning pangabawas a iti, ing pekamaragul a pigaganakan da, ing pangawala da reng sadia rang tutuknangan da, ampo ing pamakilaban da kareng tau. Kukulung da la deng leon kanita pang panaun da reng Romano, at metung lang manimunang uring bibili da ampong payalbe kareng zoo king mabilug a yatu manibat aniang kalabing walung dilanua o siglu ("eighteenth century"). Saup-saup la reng zoo king mabilug a yatu kareng takbang para king pamagparakal kareng mamiligrung leon a Asianu. 
Karas king itsura, kapansin-pansin ya ing lalaking leon, a makikilala king kayang kiling o "mane". Ing leon, lalu na ing lupa ning lalaki, ing metung kareng pekamalaguang akilalang sagisag a animal king cultura da reng tau. Kanita pang panaun a Upper Paleolithic, atin nang larawan da reti, kapamilatan da reng dinukit a istatua ampong pinintura kareng lukib o kueba ning Lascaux and Chauvet, pati na kareng cultura aniang minuna ampo king Edad Media nung nu la mayayakit deti. Ati lu reti king literatura o malagung paniulat, kareng dinukit, larawan a pinintura, bandera, ampo kareng pelicula. 

Ba Đồn:
Ing Ba Đồn metung yang commune king Vietnam "département" ning Quang Binh Lalawigan.

Tay Ninh Lalawigan:
Ing Tây Ninh (Hán tự: ) metung ya kareng 64 lalawigan ("tỉnh") ning Vietnam, atiu king maulingaslgan dake ning bangsa. Ing kayang tungku (kabisera) iyapin ing lakanbalen ning Tay Ninh.
Ing Tây Ninh atin yang populasiun a 989,800 ampong lualas a 4,028 km².
Distritu.
Ing lalawigan atin yang walung distritu:
Ing lakanbalen ning Tây Ninh iya mismu ing kayang ketawan bilang municipalidad.

Thai Binh Lalawigan:
Ing Thái Bình (or Thaibinh - "great peace"; Han Tu: ) metung yang pampang a aslagan lalawigan king Red River Delta labuad ning pangulung Vietnam, pelagiu da keng Vietnamese a algiu keng Pacific Kadayatmalatan: "Thái Bình Dương".
Distritu.
Ing Thái Bình atin yang metung a lakanbalen (Thái Bình city) ampong pitung distritu:

Quinoa:
Ing Quinoa ( o , king Castila "quinua," ibat king amanung Quechuang "kinwa)," a metung a uri ning goosefoot "(Chenopodium)," metung yang tanaman a keraklan tatanam da para kareng kayang butul a kakanan. Metung yang pseudocereal at e tutung cereal, o binutil, uling e ya metung a dikut iti. Uling metung yang chenopod, malapit nong kamaganak ning quinoa deng tanaman a beet, spinach ampong tumbleweed. Kakanan la murin anting gule deng kayang bulung, anti ing amaranth, pero malagad la mu king salukuyan deng pisasali rang bulung quinoa. 

Balantakan:
Ing balantakan ("Coix lacryma-jobi"), a king Ingles, ausan dang "Job's Tears", "Coixseed", "adlay", o "adlai", metung yang matas a tanaman kareng mangapaling lugal a mamungang binutil ibat king familiang Poaceae (familia da reng dikut) a tubu king Aslagang Asia ampong peninsular Malaysia. Kareng aliwang lugal, tatanam de kareng mula antimong tanaman a annual o banuahan. Megi neng karaniwan a tanaman kareng mangapaling lugal king mauling dake ning Estados Unidos ampo king Bayung Yatu o "New World". Maralas, pisasali da la reng balantakan king makabaligong lagiung "Chinese pearl barley" kareng Asian supermarket king America, lipat ning ing "C. lacryma-jobi" e ne kapareu genus ning "barley" o "Hordeum vulgare".
Adua lang "variety" ning species deng tatanam da. Ing "Coix lacryma-jobi" var. "lacryma-jobi" atin yang mangaragul a pseudocarp a masias ampong maputing anting perlas, at maki tabas a tulungkaba ("oval"), at magagamit kareng kwintas ampong rosario ampong aliwang bage. Ing "Coix lacryma-jobi" var. "ma-yuen" pupupulan de antimong binutil, at gagamitan deng panulu kareng mapilang dake ning Asia. 

Trigu:
Ing trigu ("Triticum" spp.), "wheat" king Ingles ampong "trigo" king Castila, metung yang dikut a tatanám da king mabilug a yatu, at menibat king labuad a Fertile Crescent ning Malapit a Aslagan ("Near East"). Aniang 2007, 607 miliung tonelada ing produksiun ning trigu, ania iti ing katlung pekamaulagang produksiun kareng anggang binutil o cereal, kaibat ning mais (784 miliung tonelada) ampo ning pale (651 miliung tonelada). Ing binutil a trigu metung yang manimunang pamangan ("staple food") a gagamitan king pamangawang arina para king tinape, biscuit, cake, breakfast cereal, pasta, juice, pansit, ampong couscous., ampo king fermentation king pamangawang beer, alcohol, vodka o biofuel. Atin muring mapilang tatanam king trigu antimong kanan animal, at maliaring gamitan ing kayang are antimong kumpe ("fodder") o panatap (gagawang bubungan), a balamu pinaud. 
Lipat ning maragul a dake ning protina ampong pamangan da reng tau king yatu ing ibat king trigu, miraras king metung kareng balang dinalan (100) o aduang dalan (200) a tau ing maki Celiac disease, metung a kabilian a mánibat king pakibat ning "immune system" king metung a protinang atsu king trigu: ing gluten (basi karing datos para king Estados Unidos).

Mais:
Ing mais ("Zea mays" L. ssp. "mays"; ), a ausan dang "corn" king Ingles ning America ampong Australia, "maize" king Ingles ning Inglaterra (England), ampong "maiz" king Castila, metung yang binutil a minuna dang tenam deng tau king Mesoamerica, at kaibat mikalat kareng continenti ning America. Kaibat ning pamaniakup da reng Europeo aniang tauli nang dake ning kalabing limang (15) siglu o dilanua ampong mumunang dake ning kalabing anam (16) a siglu, mikalat ya ing mais kareng aliwang dake ning yatu. 
Ing mais ing pekamaleparan pitutubuan kareng tanaman a tatanam da king Americas (332 miliung metricu tonelada banua-banua king Estados Unidos pamu). Ing hybrid o mistisung mais ing mas buri da reng ortelanu kesa kareng karaniwan a uri uling king kayang heterosis o "hybrid vigor" (sikanan da reng misasamut lahi). Lipat ning ating mais a miraras king 7 metru (23 pie) kátas, meyalkus ("developed" or "bred") la reng keraklan kareng uring mais a papatubu da bang ipisali ba lang mika tas a 2.5 metru (8 pie). Keraklan, mas makuyad ya ing sweet corn kesa kareng clasi ning mais a tatanam da.
Suglung palual.
Food  |  List of fruits  |  List of vegetables

Kragi García:

Zoilo Hilario:
I 'Zoilo Sangalang Hilario metung yang Kapampangan watas.Metung yang zarzuelista, kritiko, talasulat prosa at poeta . Malapit neng kayabe-abe Crissot .
Talambie.
Mibait ya king San Fernando, Pampanga kanitang Hunyo 27, 1892 at meangu ya bie iniang Hunyo 13, 1963. Kilala yarin keng bansag nang Don Ilung . Menari yang abogasya at iniang kelambatan meing hukum at mambabatas. Talapagtatag ya caring mapilang institusiong mitaguyod qng kultura calupa ning “Amanung Kapampangan”, a metung a akademiang misubung qng pamagbayu ning ortograpiyang Kapampangang ampon ing panga-ating pambangsang wika king bansa. 
Ding Kayang Kinudta.
Mekasulat ya king “Bayung Aldo” a metung dumingguang papel qng salitang Ingles. Maracal-dakal ya milimbag a koleksion ding keyang poesia antimo ing “Adelfas de la Lira Filipina” (Adelfang Filipinong Lira) ketang 1913, “Patria y Redencion” (Bansa at Kalayan) iniang 1914, “Himnos y Arengas” (Dalit at Pamagsalita) iniang 1968 at “Bayung Sunis” a pane ngan makasulat queng Kapampangan. Ang “Bayung Sunis” yang pamagpugue cari bayani at talasulat ning Pampanga. Kayabe murin qng aklat a ini ring pilang bilungan a makapatungkaul caring prinsipyo ning pamanyulat poesia, at pamanyaliksik tungkol qng alpabetong Kapampangang at Ortograpiya . Mekalikha ya rin mapilang dula calupa ning “Mumunang Sinta”, “Bandila Ning Filipinas” at “Ing Mapamatubu” (Ing Pating). Ing karaniwang tema ding gawa nang Zoilo ila ring tutuki: patriyotismu at kalayan, pamagtaguyod keng pambansang wika, pamagtangkilik caring lokal a industriya, kabilian da ring masa at kaulagan ding kababaihan. Iniang 1915, pepakilala ne ing “pambabaing tugma” (feminine rime) queng panulaang Kapampangan a inaus nang “Maladalit” o “sunis a sakdal” . Iti ing panga-atin nang rima caring tauling adwang silaba ning salita. Alimbawa caring keyang gawang anti-kaniti rima ya ing “Aus king Musa”.

Talambie.
FELIX MAURICIO GARCIA
Poet/Writer/Columnist
Born on January 30, 1938 to spouses Raymundo Garcia and Gregoria Mauricio 
in Tacasan, Macabebe, Pampanga (Philippines), FELIX M. GARCIA, whose father 
was a vernacular poet, is one common person who has less in life in terms of material
possession, but he was enriched by his father's precious gift - the gift of power to 
write literary works. He was an undergraduate, but his lack of education did not deter 
him from soaring high in promoting the craft he inherited from his father. He wrote 
numerous literary works that gained him prominence and distinction in the field of arts 
and culture. He was only 15 years old when he wrote his first Zarzuela play entitled "Bunga ning Dewacan" (Fruit of Evil).
Numerous awards were given him particularly the "Outstanding Playwright
-Director" in 1990, which was awarded by Lira Pampangueña (Central Luzon Writers-
Poets League) and the "Most Outstanding Kapampangan in Pampango Literature"
given in 1999 by MOKA, in conjunction with the province's 428th Foundation Day and, a three-time (3) recipient of different awards in writing competitions held by the same awarding body during the incumbency of the then Governor Bren Z. Guiao.
His works in English include "The Story of a Tree"; An Advice to a Drinker"; "A
Man's Wish"; "The Lords Prayer", (Poet's Modern Version on World Peace); "Give 
Peace a Chance" (on World Brotherhood and Peace Through Poetry); and "Give Peace a Chance in Mindanao", his entry on Anthology during the 16th World Congress of Poets of the United Poets Laureate International held on August 2 - 6, 2000 at the Mimosa Leisure Estate, Angeles City (Philippines), in which he was given a Certificate of Merit in Recognition and Appreciation of Excellence in Poetry for World Brotherhood and Peace. He is a columnist not only for one newspaper of general circulation and, at the time of this publication he is an Editor-in-Chief to a certain newsweekly in his province. 
Garcia is happily married to Milagros T. Viray-Garcia of San Simon, Pampanga
with whom he has nine (9) children, girls (Marissa, Marietta, Marianita, Mary Jane and Amapola) four of whom are boys (Marvel, Felix Jr., Marlon, Mario) and are likely to inherit
their father's love of poetry and skills in writing.
(Note: This short biographical data of Poet Laureate International FELIX M. GARCIA was published on June 2007 weeks after the 20th World Congress of Poets held in Montgomer, Alabama, United States of America).

Hernand Saban:
I Hernand Saban metung yang wátas a Kapampángan.
Talambie.
Ala yang balung salugsugan a kamaganak a poeta bista man kapilidu ne itang melapupuring Rosario (Apung Sayung) Tuazon Baluyut ning Baculud (1909-2002); iti e re bitasang kilala reng matwa nang kamaganak.
Mipangagli karing bersu ketang 1988 king amanung tagalug at ketang 1991 king amanung kapampangan, i Hernando a tau Angeles at Manibaug a mas kilala ra keng awus a ‘Hernand’ deng kapatad a poeta keng aliwang bansa, ‘Bern’ at ‘Ernie’ naman kareng kakaluguran at kamaganak, at awsan de mu namang ‘tita Bern’ deng malapit lub keya. Maranun yang meulila king ibpa, meragul king kalukan at meyari yamu keng sekundarya keng pamagaral. Ketang banwang 2007, labing-syam a banwa manibat king pangakali na karing bersu, mibayit ya keng labwad ning literatura ning Kapampangan. E ya palagamit maragul a letra pwera karing lagyu bilang simbulu ning kapagkumbaban.
Mibayit ya inyang manikwa yang “marangal a tungge” (honorable mention) keng “tagisan keng poesya” a gewa na ning KWF o Komisyon sa Wikang Filipino kapamilatan na ning UP Clark. 
Bista man king i Ernie king pangabayit na king literature kikyak yang alang rima, meragul neman iting magrimang metapora at talimagang magmartsa. Abalu ne mu naman itang kapanwalan a “gawan mu ing tuturu ku dapot e ing daraptan ku,” at uling marakal neng besis akayabe ing kasebyan a ini kapamilatan ning dilang poeta, at angga inyang e ne misukmama serya na neng kewangan ing mamapse kaniti king kayatulan na na murin ning poetang maki-bakas panas.
Makanyan man bayu ya mibayit keng literaturang Kapampangan ining Ernie malwat neng susulat at gagamitan ne ing Amanung Sisuan neng susulat ya, mupin e la poesya reng keyang pigagap nung e sulat lang kapalsintan (a ngening salukuyang pepa-bookbind na) a bibye na kanita king keyang tau a asawa na na ngeni.
Ala yang idulung lokal a poeta dapot babasan na la obra reng kilalang poeta at neng misan pagbiliban ne ing poeta uli na ning obra na at ugali dapot neng misan kareng mung obra na, ating pamitagun a ken mung ugali na at e karing obra na, atin naman pareu neng e buri obra at panugali ing poeta.
Keni ne pasibayung akilala kapamilatan da ring poeta a “ing tukil a alang laman maynge ya kalampag” at kabang lalakad ing panaun akilala na a ing tukil a mitmung danum mibubulus yang danum karing aliwang tukil bisang mikalaman, at nanu man ibulus na o ibye na karing aliwa, ala yang pautang a lub nun’e tula na namung tagana ing bageng ita. Samantang atin namang tukil a king kapatak nang bilus a e naman taganang dalise o malinis a danum, papabalikid na pa iting maragul a utang a lub a kulang namu iswat na keka ing sablang bage a kapa-kapatak a tinggap mu keya a e na naman binye uling buri nang ibye nun’e ban yamung magparangalan keka a byasa ya.

Abel Soto:
I Abel Soto metung yang Kapampangan watas.

Tec Sanchez-Tolosa:
I Tec Sanchez-Tolosa metung yang Kapampangan watas.

Amado Yuzon:
I Amado Yuzon y Magcalas metung yang wátas a Kapampángan, mibait ya qng Maquiapo, Guagua, Pampanga, Filipínas, quetang a-30 ning Agostu, 1906 caring kapiasawahang Felipe Yuzon at ing dating Isabel Magcalas. Atin yang capatad a maglagyung Felix M. Yuzon.
Talambie.
Cayabe ning bugtung na mung capatad a Felix, inari neng Amado M. Yuzon ing pamagaral primarya at elementarya caring escuelang pampublico qng queyang balen. Migyari yang segundanyu qng Pampanga High School qng capitolio ning San Fernando quetang 1925.
Caring matagumpeng caclasi qng secondaria qng clasing cuarenta'y-unung (41) estudiante ila ri Dr. Clemente Calma - Kilalang PHS Alumnus Awardee queng Medical Surgery; Nicomedes Isip, Administrador caring escuelang pampublico at propesor qng education; Prudente Punsalang, Administrador caring escuelang pampublico; Jose Tiongco, propesor queng colegio; Gregorio Fernandez, artista at director qng pelicula; at Silvestre Punsalan, abogado, poeta, talasulat, presidenti ning Philippine National Bank, acting provincial governor, at tesurero ning Partido Liberal quetang decada 60.
Bilang pamangilala caring pambihirang apirusta ning Poeta Laureado Amado M. Yuzon queng larangan ning panyulat at cawatasan, ginawad ne ing Golden Jubilee Award for Literature ning queyang escuelang secondaria, ing Pampanga High School queng carelang Golden Jubilee Celebration iniang 1962. Ing pang-academiang carera nang Diputado Amado M. Yuzon casing-galing ne ning queyang ayabut queng panyulat. Dacal ya ayaring cursu, cabilang ding Master of Arts (summa cum laude); Master of Science in Business Administration (summa cum laude); Ll.M (cum laude), at Litt. D. a queyang inari qng London, England. Meging miembru ne ning Philippine Bar manibat 1939, at meging dating propesor qng Far Eastern University at Quezon College - ing meguing Manuel L. Quezon University qng Menila.
Kilala mabilug a yatu qng queyang gelingan queng panyulat, editor ya y Amado M. Yuzon queng "Ing Catuliran" (The Right) at "La Libertad" (Freedom), pati na ning metung a magazine pampoesia - Laurel Leaves, a ating circulation mabilug a yatu.
Deng titulu ning Poeta Laureado Amado M. Yuzon papakit da ing queyang pambihirang kapirustan queng larangan ning pamamoesia queng Ingles at Kapampangan. Ya ing panimunang poeta ning Far Eastern University quetang panaun ning queyang pamag-colegio cambe ning titulung Poeta Laureado at dacal ya simbut a pang-mumunang premio qng pamag-oratorio at debate. 
Bilang anac ning Guagua, Pampanga, ing Diputado Amado M. Yuzon nipresenta ne 
ing mumunang distritu ning Pampanga qng Congresu iniang 1946-49. Misulat yang
dacal a municalang meging batas at meguing kapaki-pakinabangan caring calulu at talapagobra.
Y Congressman Amado M. Yuzon meging "First" ya caring queraclan ding dacal nang importanting apirusta:
• First President for Life ning cabud mu World Poet Laureates Association a ating miembrumanibat caring otsentang (80) bansa mabilug a yatu. 
• First and only poet ibat qng from Asia a miproclamang Honorary Continental Poet Laureate of Asia iniang 1965at qng South America iniang 1966 caring autoridad ning Republic of Bolivia. 
• Ing cabud mu mabieng poetang mesambitla bilang "Sir Galahad of Parnassus" ning World Society International qng Illinois,USA at qng India. 
• Ing cabud mu Poeta mabilug a yatu a micoronan Honorary International Poet Laureate apulung (10) beses - qng Colorado, Texas,South Dakota, New York, Liberia, Pakistan, Austria, Rome (makatadua) at England. 
• First official Poet Laureate ning Far Eastern University iniang 1934-1936. 
• First Poet Laureate of a regional language a guewa ning Provincial Board Resolution bilang Poet Laureateat King of Crissotan cabang bie. Ing Pampanga Provincial Board inapprova ne ing resolution iniang 1963. 
• First Poet Laureate of the Philippines a mengurona caring Miss Philippines titleholders.Ing Presidenti ning Philippines pinili ne bilang Cultural Envoy iniang 1965. 
• First and only verse-translator ning Iloko national epic - "Ti Panagbiag Ni Lam-Ang" queng English - 1954. 
• First National Moderator of Peasants and Labor organizations - The Philippine United Peasantsand Labor Organizations - 1948. 
• First to advocate for the appointments of Poets Laureate and/or Poets in Residence in Senatorial Regions,Congressional Districts, Provinces. Cities and Municipalities, and also by language or dialect 
- (Rotary Speech in 1964 at Malolos, Bulacan which was distributed nationwide). 
• First Acting National Commissioner of Culture - 1965-1966. 
• First Filipino delegate to the Biennales Internnationales de Poesie in Knokke-le-Zoute, Belgium in 1965. 
• First Filipino entry and member of the Editorial and Advisory Board of the British"Dictionary of International Biography, London, England, 1966. 
• First Filipino, Asian and man to create world, regional, national, state and language poet laureateships in the world. 
• The first, at cabud mung Filipino, a migrepresenta bilang Foreign Chancellor,Consul Delegado, or Foreign Representative ding pang-cabilugan-yatung academia at universidades;
- Republic of the Philippines, Spain, Mexico, Ecuador, Italy, California, Sweden, England, 
Pakistan and Hongkong. 
• The first Filipino to become Ambassador of the Orthodox Catholic Church to the Philippinesand the Orient, as appointed by Patriarch Claudius I. 
• First unseated congressman-elect who was allowed to address the Congressand defend himself for 15 minutes. 
• The first congressman a miyarap queng Magna Carta of Labor Bill after World War II, 1948. 
• The first ex-congressman to make a presidential nomination speech with Secretary Sotero Baluyutfor Senator Gil Puyat on the spot at the 1957 National Party Convention. 
• The first Filipino to introduce Shakespearean joust (Balagtasan in English),Oxford style, at the Far Eastern University in 1934. 
• The first to introduce the Philippines evening dress, black pants and "bárû", in Manila in 1934. 
• The First Filipino to conduct a world translation contest of Dr. Jose P. Rizal's poem,"Postrer Adios," in 1966. 
• First Filipino to be crowned "Poet Laureate of the World" in the Philippines,World Congress of Poets, August 30, 1969. 
• First Filipino to write poetry covering more than six hundred years of Philippine history,exalting major heroes and historical landmarks in his book, "The Citizen's Poems". 
• The first Filipino, the first Asian and first man to be recommended for the Nobel Prize awardfor Peace and Literature four times in the history of the Nobel Prizes. 
• The first Filipino to invest four presidents (Carlos P. Garcia, Diosdado P. Macapagal andFerdinand E. Marcos) with poet laureateships. 
• The first to get a National Poetry Day Proclamation from then President Diosdado Macapagal,October 15, 1965. 
• The first to get a World Poetry Week Proclamation - last week of August fromMayor Antonio J. Villegas of Manila, August 26, 1969. 
• First Filipino who has proclaimed and crowned regional poets laureate in the country,including Mayor Villegas in Tagalog, Ambassador Proceso E. Sebastian of the North, 
Fr. Dr. Isidoro D. Dino of Ilokandia, Former Congressman Mauro Verzoza of the Cagayan Valley, 
Dr. Dominador S. La Madrid in English, Hon. Belarmino P. Navarro, Sergio Navarro, Jr., 
Jose Gallardo, Armando P. Baluyut in Pampanga. 
Bilang metung a matagumpeng mangangalakal, y Atty. Amado M. Yuzon meguing General Manager ne ning Mabuhay Products, Inc. iniang 1962 at talapamala o director ding miyaliwang companiang pang-commercio at industria.
Y Congressman Amado M. Yuzon mekapaquiasawa ya queng dating Oliva A. Reyes, anac di Pablo Reyes at Teodora Almario Reyes ning San Nicolas, Floridablanca, Pampanga. Ing karelang pamiasawa mibiyayan yang atlung anac a lalaki a meging ngan prominenti caring kare-karelang propesyun. Ing peka-pangane, Amado, Jr., Certified Public Accountant ya a meging connectadu queng Foreign Department ning Central Bank of the Philippines, at caibat meging Chief Accountant ning maragul a cumpania qng Oakland, California. Ing pangadua, Benjamin, Mechanical Engineer yang maka-basi Hercules, California at tinuki caring bakas ning kilala-mabilug-a-yatung Tata bilang Poet Laureado at president cabang-bie ning World Poet Laureates Association. Ing bungsu, Romeo, migyari yang maki-honors qng University of the Philippines at qng Far Eastern University, Manila. Y Romeo metung yang talapamala qng China Banking Corporation.
Ing Congressman Amado M. Yuzon meangu ya bie quetang January 17, 1979 at milibing ya qng pam-pamilyang cutcutan da qng Guagua, Pampanga
Ding kayang kinudta.
Misulat yang colleccion a basultu (narrative verses) a mipamagatang "Salitang Paca-Versu" (1933) at linikas no ring mangaulagang obra di Shakespeare, Omar Khayyam, Tagore, Eurpides, Sophocles, Hugo, Sappho, Poe, Longfellow, Rizal at aliwa pa. Menicua yang pang-mabilug-a-yatung pangakilala queng pangayabe na queng "Who's Who in America" ketang 1956. Mipayabe ya murin qng "International Who's Who in Poetry" at "The Authors and Writers Who's Who" a pareung qng London, England. Sinulat ne ing "Citizen's Poems", inapruban ning gubyernu bilang pampublicu at pam-pribadung materiales para careng kapat-a-gradu anggang secondariang magaral. Ing "Central Luzon Affair" pemarangalan ne bilang pekamagaling a poeta ning 1957 at quinoronan neng Poeta Laureado ning Pilipinas iniang 1959. Misulat ya, migdeclama at memoesia caring apat a Pilipino at atlung Europeanung salita. Peparangalan ne bilang "Most Outstanding Man of Letters of the Philippines" quetang 1962 ning Press, Radio and Television Society of the Philippines.

Benjamín R. Yuzon:
I Dr. Benjamin R. Yuzon metung yang Kapampangan watas.

Shine We Are!:
Ing Shine We Are!, metung yang 3.5 Koreanung album nang BoA ay ating kantang tampok ya ing bandang Westlife.
Talaan da reng kantang.
Deng kantang promosyonal, makabold la.

Miracle (BoA album):
Ing Miracle metung yang album a pasibayung pepalual da reng aliwang kantang Hapones ning BoA at ni-remix king amanung Koreanu. Metung ya muring 2.5 album na.
Talaan da reng kanta.
Deng kantang promosyonal, makabold la.

Thai Nguyen Lalawigan:
Ing Thái Nguyên metung yang lakanbalen ampong municipalidad king Vietnam. Iti ing tungku ning Thái Nguyên Lalawigan,king pangulungaslagan Vietnam. 
Administratibung pangadake.
IngThai Nguyen atin yang 18 precintu ampong 8 communes.

Thanh Hoa Lalawigan:
Ing Thanh Hóa iya ing kabisera (tungkung) lakanbalen ning Thanh Hóa Lalawigan ning Vietnam. Ing populasiun ning Thanh Hóa lakanbalen mga 200,000 nung nu atun yang lualas a 57.9 kilometru kuadradu.
Ing lakanbalen aitu mauli ning Malutung Ilug (Sông Hồng) delta labuad, mga 137 km mauli ning Hanoi, keng malating (tributary) ning Ilug Ma(Sông Mã). Ing Thanh Hóa makataid ya keng Hanoi kapamilatan ning dalan ampong rilis at mabibilang yang dargul ing kayang kalakal ampo bilang kalibudtan na ning industria. 
Iniang Gerang Vietnam, ing US memomba ya keni at dakal kareng pakatalakad ampo infrastructura mengasira la, ing kabilugan a lakanbalen gewa at mitalakad yang pasibayu. 
Ing Thanh Hóa atin yang Hoang Long Antique Museum, ampong maragul a Romanu Catholicung Cathedral na ning Immaculate Conception nung nu gagamitan de pa. 

Thua Thien Hue Lalawigan:
Ing Thua Thien-Hue (keng Vietnamese "Thừa Thiên-Huế"; Hán tự: -) metung lalawigan king North Central Coast ning Vietnam, keng yang bandang libutad na ning bangsa. Ing lakanbalen tungku ning lalawigan, Huế, inyang milabasan iti ing ka-arian tungku ning Vietnam. 
Administratibung pangadake.
Ing Thua Thien-Hue atin yang walung distritu:

Benasal:
Ing Benasal metung yang balen king "comarca" ning Alt Maestrat, Castellón, Valencia, Espania.

Benicarló:
Ing Benicarló metung yang lakanbalen at municipalidad king pangulu ning Castelló de la Plana, dake ning Valencian Comunidad, Espania.

Benicasim/Benicàssim:
Ing Benicàssim (Spanish: "Benicasim", Arabic: بنو قاسم agpang keng Numismatic a ikit da ) metung yang municipalidad sasaklon ne ing pantalan a balen ampong ing beach resort atiu keng lalawigan ning Castelló, keng Costa del Azahar king Espania. 

Tien Giang Lalawigan:
Ing Tiền Giang Lalawigan (Hán tự: ) metung yang lalawigan king Mekong Delta labuad nign mauling Vietnam.
Administratibung Pangadake.
Ing lalawigan atin yang metung a lakanbalen (Mỹ Tho), metung a balen (Go Cong), ampong pitung distritu:
Website Tien Giang 
Tien Giang News 
Tien Giang Times

Tra Vinh Lalawigan:
Ing Trà Vinh,metung yang lalawigan king Mekong Delta labuad ning Vietnam. Ing kayang tungku iyapin ing Trà Vinh.
Administrabung Pangadake.
Ing Tra Vinh Lalawigan atin yang metung a balen (Trà Vinh) ampong pitung distritu:

Tuyen Quang Lalawigan:
Ing Tuyên Quang Lalawigan (Hán Tự: ) metung yang lalawigan ning Vietnam, atiu king pangulungaslagan dake ning bangsa, king kalibudtan ning Lô Ilug saug. ing kayang tungku (kabisera) iyapin ing Tuyên Quang Kabalenan. Ing lalalwigan atin yang 718,100 a pakatuknang ampong atin yang lualas a 5,868 km² (3646 mi²).
Distritu.
Ing Tuyên Quang atin yang metung a balen (Tuyên Quang, ing panglalawigan tungku (kabisera)) ampong limang distritu:

Vinh Long Lalawigan:
Ing Vĩnh Long () metung yang lalawigan atiu king Mekong River Delta ning mauling Vietnam. Ing kayang tungku (kabisera) iyapin ing Vĩnh Long. Atin yang populasiun a 1,023,400 ampong lualas a 1,475 km². 
Distritu.
Ing Vĩnh Long atin yang pitung distritu ampong metung a lakanbalen (Vĩnh Long):
Suglung Palual.
