Vinh Phuc Lalawigan:
Ing Vĩnh Phúc Lalawigan (; Hán Tự: ) metung yang lalawigan king Red River Delta ning pangulung Vietnam.
Atin yang metung a lakanbalen (Vĩnh Yên), metung a balen (Phúc Yên), ampong pitung distritu:

Yen Bai Lalawigan:
Ing Yên Bái (Hán tự: ) metung yang lalawigan atiu king pangulungaslagan Vietnam. Ing kayang danggut ilapin deng limang lalawigan a Lào Cai Lalawigan, Lai Châu Lalawigan, Sơn La Lalawigan, Tuyên Quang Lalawigan, and Phú Thọ Lalawigan. 
Distritu.
Ing Yên Bái atin yang metung a lakanbalen ("thành phố") (Yên Bái), metung a balen ("thị xã") (Nghĩa Lộ) ampong pitung distritu ("huyện"):

Bratislava:
IngBratislava — king kayang amlat Pozsony ampong Pressburg (lawen ya rin aliwang lagiu) — iay ing tugnku ning Slovak Republic ampong, atin yang populasiun a 429,000, at iti mu rin ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen ning bangsa. Ing Bratislava atiu king maukingalbugan ning Slovakia keng pampang da reng Ilug Danube. kasepu ne ing Austria ampong Hungary, at iti mu kabud ing tungku (kabisera) a atin sepu aduand bangsa. Iti at ing Vienna ila mu rin deng aduang pekamalapit a tungku king Europa a kulan keng karelang pamikawani.
Kapatad lakanbalen.
Ing Bratislava maka kambal ya kareng:

Luis Moreno-Ocampo:
I Luis Moreno-Ocampo (mibait 4 June 1952) metung yang Argentinong abugadung magsilbi antimong Prosecutor ning International Criminal Court (ICC) manibat kanitang Junio 16, 2003. Bayu ita, metung yang prosecutor king Argentina, a lalaban king corupcion ampong manusig kareng pamanabusu da king katulirang pantau deng mangatas a oficial king militar. Tinuru ne muring leying pang-criminal, at meging pribadung abugadu. 

Krishna (distritu):
Ing Krishna (distritu) (Telugu: కృష్ణా జిల్లా) metung yang distritu king estadu ning Andhra Pradesh, India. Pekilagiu de king Ilug Krishna a mamagus king distritu. 
Ing Machilipatnam ing pun tanggapan ning distritu. Ing Vijayawada naman ing sentrung pangkalakal. Deng makapadurut king distritu ila reng Khammam (distritu) king pangulu-albugan, ing West Godavari king pangulu-aslagan, ing Bay of Bengal king mauli-aslagan, ing Guntur (distritu) king mauli-albugan, ampo ing Nalgonda (distritu) king albugan.
Pamirake.
Mapipitna ya ing distritu kareng apat a "revenue division": deng Vijayawada, Nuzvid, Machilipatnam ampong Gudivada, nung nu ing balang metung tatalnan ning "sub collector".
Maki 50 mandal king Krishna (distritu)
Manimunang Lakanbalen ampong Balen: 

A.Konduru:
Ing A.Konduru metung yang nayun ampong metung a Mandal king Krishna (distritu), Andhra Pradesh, India.
Deng nayun king A.Konduru Mandal.
Ing makatuki metung yang listaan da reng nayun keting Mandal.

Agiripalli:
Ing Agiripalli or Aagiripalli metung yang nayun king Krishna (distritu), Andhra Pradesh, India. Atiu keti ing templu kang Ginung Shobanadeeswara.
Nayun king Agiripalli Mandal.
Ing makatuki metung yang listaan da reng nayun king Mandal a iti. 

Avanigadda:
Ing Avanigadda metung yang balen ampong metung a mandal king Krishna (distritu), Andhra Pradesh, India.

Rose Francine Rogombé:
I Rose Francine Rogombé ("pilidu aniang dalaga", Etomba) (mibait 20 Setiembre 1942) metung yang politicu ibat Gabon, a magsilbing Pansamantalang Pamuntuk ning Gabon kamate ning maluat nang Pamuntuk o Presidenti, i Omar Bongo aniang Junio 2009. Elilan ne i Bongo uling king kayang papil antimong Pamuntuk ning Senadu, metung a pusisiun nung nu ya miyalal kanitang Febrero 2009. Metung yang abugada agpang king profesion ampong metung a kayanib ning Gabonese Democratic Party (PDG).Kalukluk na, ya ing meging mumunang babaing pamuntuk ning Gabon.

GMA Network:
Ing GMA Network, Incorporated (), metung yang kompanyang "multimedia" ampong "television network" king Filipinas. Magdala yang balita ampong programang "entertainment" kapamilatan da reng kayang apat a pulu't pitung (47) banding "television relay station", apat a kayanib a istasyung telebisyun ("affiliate television stations") ampong atlung pulu't apat (34) a istasyung radyu king mabilug a Filipinas. Darala na la murin deng kayang palage king mabilug a yatu kapamilatan ning GMA Pinoy TV, GMA Life TV ampong telebisyong pang-Aptas ("Internet TV") myGMA.com.ph.
Atyu ing kayang pun tanggapan ("headquarters"), ing GMA Network Center, king EDSA corner Timog Ave., Diliman, Quezon Lakanbalen, Filipinas. I Atty. Felipe Gozon ing kasalungsungan nang Talapamuntuk ("Chairman") ampong CEO. King Keragulang Menila, gagamit yang terrestrial VHF Channel 7 (DZBB-TV), Channel 11 (DZOE-TV, a upahan na king ZOE Broadcasting Network, a palakad ning Q) ampo ing terrestrial UHF Channel 27 (DZRV-TV).

Lino L. Dizon:
I Lino L. Dizon metung yang Kapampangan talasulat.

Venancio Q. Samson:
I Ámung Venancio Q. Samson metung yang Kapampangan talasulat. Ia ing meglikas keng diccionario nang Fray Diego Bergaño a mipansagan Diccionario de Romance en Pampango. Linikas niya mu rin ing Biblia a mipamansagan a Ing Bayung Bibliang Capampangan

Léonie Adams:
I Léonie Fuller Adams (9 December 1899 – 27 June 1988) metung yang Americanung watas (poet). Mitulduan ya panganam a Poet Laureate Consultant in Poetry to the Library of Congress inyang 1946.

Joseph Smith Jr.:
I Joseph Smith Jr. (Disiembri 23, 1805 - Juniu 27, 1844) iya ing mitatag keng Latter Day Saint movement, kebaluan mu rin bilang Mormonism, metung a maulagang religiosung ampong politicung aske inyang dekadang 1830 ampong dekadang 1840. Inyang 1827, i Smith mekakalap yang talatuki kaibat nang sinabing atin angel a pepakita nala deng malagintung pinggan a sasabian na i Jesus inayan nala deng katutubung tau na ning America. Inyang 1830, i Smith linimbag ne nung nu sinabi na iti ing likas da reng pinggan bilang Aklat da reng Mormon, at king banuang ita tinatag ne ing Pisamban nang Kristu.

List of basic geography topics:
Ing Geografia (ibat keng Greek kataya Geo (γη) o Gaea (γαια), ing kabaldugan na "Yatu", at graphein (γραφειν) kabaldugan na "para ilarawan" o kaya "para sumulat"o "imapa") metung ayng pamanigaral keng yatu at ing kayang lupa at pangasalbag ning bie keti yatu, kayabe no ring tau at ing kayang uyab king kayang gawa.Ing kayang diretcung pamaglikas yapin ing "Isalita o igulis ya ing Yatu". Ing mumunang taung ginamit keng katayang "geografia" iyapi y Eratosthenes (275-195 BCE). Apat a keugalian a pamanyaliksik keng geografia ilapin deng spatial analysis ning natural at taung mengpalyari (geografia bilang pamanigaral ning pangasalbag), area pamanigaral (karinan at labuad), pamanigaral ning tau-gabun a pamiugne, research keng yatu sciences. [2 Nanupata ing makabayung geografia sasakupan an ngan ing disciplinang para paintunan na para aintindiyan ne ing yatu at ding tau at ding kayang aliwang mangasakit nung makananu la menaliwa at nung makanu la linual ngeni. Masasabi iti ing "indu da reng sciences" at "ing pamiunge da reng beluan." Bilang "tete ning tau at physical sciences," ing geografia pibangal da la bilang aduang sanga, taung geografia at physical geografia.

The Poet:

Jonathan Aaron:
I Jonathan Aaron metung yang Americanung watas. 

Henry Abbey:
I Henry Abbey (11 Juliu 1842 – 7 Juniu 1911) metung yang Americanung watas.

Edwin Milton Abbott:
I Edwin Milton Abbott (Juniu 4, 1877 – Nobiembri 8, 1940) metung yang Americanung abugadu ampong watas, mibait king Philadelphia. 

Sam Abrams:
I Sam Abrams (mibait Nobiembri 18, 1935) mibait ya king Brooklyn ampong metung yang Americanung watas. 
Ding kayang Dapat.
Books:<br>

Seth Abramson:
I Seth Abramson (mibait Octubri 31, 1976) metung yang Americanung watas, talasulat ning "The Suburban Ecstasies" (Ghost Road Press, 2009). 
MIbait ya king Concord, Massachusetts, i Abramson metung yang graduate ning Dartmouth College, Harvard Law School, ampo ing Iowa Writers' Workshop king University of Iowa. Kasulungsungan metung a magarala a doctoral keng English king University of Wisconsin-Madison.

Elia Abu Madi:
I Elia Abu Madi (kebaluan mu rin bilang Elia D. Madey; —) (b. 1889 or 1890—d. 23 Nobiembri 1957) metung yang Lebanese-American watas.

Kathy Acker:
I Kathy Acker (née Karen Alexander) (18 Abril 1947 – 30 Nobiembri 1997) metung yang American experimental novelist, prose stylist, playwright, essayist, postmodernist ampong sex-positive feminist talasulat. 

Diane Ackerman:
I Diane Ackerman (mibait Octubri 7 1948 king Waukegan, Illinois) metung yang Americanung talasulat, watas, ampong naturalista bantug keng kayang dapat a "A Natural History of the Senses." 

Paige Ackerson-Kiely:
I Paige Ackerson-Kiely mibait ya inyang Octubri ning 1975 king Biddeford Maine. Metung yang makabyung watas ampo magobra ya keng Poetry Journal "Handsome". Kasalungsungan makatuknang ya king Vermont kambe ning kayang familia. 
Talasulat.
I Ackerson-Kiely iya ing misulat keng "In No One's Land" (Ahsahta Press, 2007), aklat a watas a mepiling 2006 Sawtooth Poetry Prize. This book also won the award for "Poets & Writers Exhange". 

Duane Ackerson:
I Duane Ackerson (mibait 1942) metung yang Americanung talasulat ning speculative poetry ampong fiction. Kasalungsungan yang makatuknang king Salem, Oregon.
Suglung Palual.
Ackerson]

Mercedes de Acosta:
I Mercedes de Acosta (Marsu 1, 1893 – Mayu 9, 1968) metung yang Americanung watas, playwright, costume designer ampong socialite, bantung king kayang dakal a pamiugnayang kareng lesbian king Hollywood personalities kayabe no ri Marlene Dietrich, Greta Garbo, Alla Nazimova, Tamara Karsavina, Eva Le Gallienne, Isadora Duncan, Katharine Cornell, Ona Munson, Adele Astaire ampong sabi-sabi i Tallulah Bankhead.

Virginia Hamilton Adair:
I Virginia Hamilton Adair (Pebreru 28, 1913, New York Lakanbalen - Septiembri 16 2004, Claremont, California) metung yang Americanung watas meging bantug inyang tauli ning kayang bie kambe ning pamibulaglag ning "Ants on the Melon".
Dalerayan.
Virginia Hamilton Adair's works include:
Beliefs and Blasphemy's and
Ants on the Melon

Helen Adam:
I Helen Adam (b. Disiembri 2, 1909 king Glasgow, Scotland — m. Septiembri 19, 1993 king New York Lakanabalen) metung yang Americanung watas, collagist ampong talalitratu nung nu kyabe ya keng kilusan keng San Francisco Renaissance, metung a kilusan keng malgung panuyulat a ausan dang Beat Generation merapat king San Francisco, CA inyang dekadang 1950 ampong 1960. 
Ing metung a masanting a alimbwa iyapin ing Helen Adam's verse

Charles Follen Adams:
I Charles Follen Adams (1842-1918) metung yang Americanung watas.
Inyang Aklasan Bangsang Americanu, i Adams metung yang sundalus at mesugat ya keng kilusan. Mekua ya bilang sukul ning guerra. Inyang 1872, megumpisa yang sususlat a pakatula keng diariu king Pennsylvania keng Aleman a amanu.

Cyd Adams:
I Cydney W. "Cyd" Adams (1949 – 2005) metung yang Americanung watas (poet) ampong academia.

James Barton Adams:
I James Barton Adams (1843-1918) metung ya kareng dimut a cowboy poet a mkeabulaglag a aklat bayu 1900s, a mikapamsag a, "Breezy Western Verse" inyang 1889. Miyabe ya kareng a dakal a mengatanka, kayabe no reng John A. Lomax a "Songs of the Cattle Train and Cow Camp" (Macmillan Co., 1919). Kapilan pamu, deng watas nang Adams, ing "The Cowboy's Dance Song" ampong "Cowboy Goes a Courtin", miyabe la king aklat a, "Cowboy Love Poetry: Verse from the Heart of the West" (Angel City Press, 1994).

John Adams (poet):
I John Adams (1704 – Eneru 1740), metung yang Americanung watas (poet).

Betty Adcock:
I Betty Adcock (mibait 1938) metung yang Americanung watas (poet) ampong 2002–2003 Guggenheim Fellow.

Linda Addison:
I Linda D. Addison metung yang Americanung poet (watas) ampong writer (talasulat) ning makatukut, fantasia, ampongscience fiction. I Addison iya ing mumunang African-Americanung menyambut keng Bram Stoker Award, nung nu sinambut yang makatadua kareng kayang kawatasan a tangka "Consumed, Reduced to Beautiful Grey Ashes" (2001) and "Being Full of Light, Insubstantial" (2007). She is a founding member of the CITH (Circles in the Hair) writing group.

Kim Addonizio:
I Kim Addonizio (mibait Juliu 31, 1954) metung yang menyambut-galal a Americanung watas ampong novelista.
Mibait king Washington, D.C., anka neng babai ing tennis champion Pauline Betz at meragul ya king Silver Spring, Maryland. 

Chris Agee:
I Chris Agee metung yang (watas) poet, essayist ampong talapanayus (editor) makatuknang king Ireland.
Aklatan.
I Chris Agee mibait king Massachusetts inyang 1956, ampong meragul king Rhode Island ampong New York bayu megaral king Harvard University. Bilang watas bilaglag ne ing "In the New Hampshire Woods" (The Dedalus Press, 1992), ampong ing "First Light" (The Dedalus Press, 2003). 

Frank Abbott:
I Frank Abbott (Septiembri 5, 1836 – Abril 20, 1897) iya ing pamuntuk ning American Dental Association (1888), pamuntuk ning National Association of Dental Faculties (1895), bantug a dentista, talasulat kerang tungkul keng dental subjects, ampong menimbentu kareng dental instrumentu kareng miyaliwang agamit a pangdentista, nung nu magagamit la pa anggang pang21 a dilanua.

Robert Abplanalp:
I Robert Henry (Bob) Abplanalp (Abril 4, 1922 – Agostu 30, 2003) metung yang Americanung menimbentu keng aerosol valve, the founder of Precision Valve Corporation and a political activist.

Morris Abrams:
I Morris Abrams, mibait inyang 1908 iya ing mitatag keng Arrow Fastener Co., Inc. I Abrams iya ing mumunang generation ning kayang familiang mibait king United States.

Richard Adams (inventor):
I Richard Adams (mibait Disiembri 8, 1954) metung yang timawang manimbentu, engineer ampong manimuna kareng miyaliwang gamit pangelectronic.

Isaac Adams:
I Isaac Adams (Agostu 16, 1802-Juliu 19, 1883) metung yang manimbentu. Mibait ya king Rochester, New Hampshire kang Benjamin Adams ampong Elizabeth Horne Adams inyang 1802.
Inimbentu ne ing Adams Power Press inyang 1827 king saup ibat kang Everett James Ellis. 

Soren Sorensen Adams:
Talambie.
Mibait yang Søren Adam Sørensen malapit Aarhus, Denmark inyang 1879 kang Hans ampong Sofia Sorensen, at minta la king U.S.A. kambe ning kayang famili king idad a apat, at meragul ya king Perth Amboy, New Jersey nun nu ing kayang tatang iya ing mengasiwa keng saloon.
Aklatan.
Demaris, Kirk Life of The Party: A Visual History of the S.S. Adams Company Neptune, NJ, S.S. Adams Co., 2006
Rauscher, William. S.S. Adams: High Priest of Pranks and Merchant of Magic. Oxford, CT, David E. Haversat, 2002
Zolotow, Maurice. It Takes All Kinds New York, Random House, 1952

Anthony Adducci:
I Anthony J. Adducci ( Agostu 14 1937 – Septiembri 19, 2006) iya ing menimuna karas keng medical device a industria king Minnesota. Bantug ya bilang metung kareng mitatag keng Guidant Corp. minuna keng Cardiac Pacemakers, inc., ngeni dake ning Boston Scientific, ing cumpaniang ginawa keng mumunang diling debateriang lithium keti yatu a artificial pacemaker.

Alan Adler:
I Alan Adler metung yang Americanung manimbentu. Pikasadia no reng susulapong pialungan, antimo reng football a atin palekpek, sususlapong singsing ampong malapinggan, antimong Aerobie. Ing kayang Aerobie Pro a susulapong malasingsing iya ing tatalan keng world record para keng bageng pekamalaut a bageng atsa. Inyang 2005 inimbentu ne ing cafeng pampabukal a agamit at ing paralan a ausan dang AeroPress.

Robert Adler:
I Robert Adler (Disiembri 4 1913 – Pebreru 15 2007) metung yang bait Austria a Americanung manimbentu kareng dakal a miyaliwang patent.

Carl Akeley:
 
I Carl Akeley metung yang Americanung manimbentu keng taxidermy.
Mibait ya king Clarendon, New York, at meragul ya keng marangle at megaral yang atlung banua keng pipagaralan. Mebiasa ya keng taxidermy kang David Bruce king Brockport, New York.

Bruno Abakanowicz:
I Bruno Abdank-Abakanowicz (Octubri 6, 1852 - Agostu 29 1900) metung yang mathematician, manimbentu ampong electrical engineer.
Ding kayng mapilan a inimbentu ilapin deng integraph, metung a askeng integrator, nung nu mepatent ya iti inyang 1880, at kaibat peplual ne ning cumpaniang Swiss a "Coradi".

Vitaly Abalakov:
I Vitaly Mikhaylovich Abalakov () ( king Yeniseysk – Mayu 26 1986 king Moscow) metung yang Soviet/Russian mamunduk ampong manimbentu. 

Evgeny Abramyan:
I Evgeny Aramovich Abramyan (; mibait Agostu 3, 1930) — metung a Soviet/Russian physicist a atin Armenian lahi, Professor, Doctor ning Engineering Sciences, Menyambut keng USSR State a Galal, metung kareng mitatag kareng dakal a papuntang pamanyalugsug keng Soviet ampong Russian nuclear technology. Talasulat kareng maiggit a 100 imbentu ampong dakal a aklat keng applied physics.
Bilaglag.
I Evgeny Abramyan iya ing sinulat kareng maiggit 90 scientific a articulu ampong 100 imbentu.

Hovannes Adamian:
I Hovannes (Ivan) Abgari Adamian (Pebreru 5, 1879, Baku - Septiembri 12, 1932, Leningrad) metung yang Armenian engineer, ampong talasulat ning maiggit 20ng imbentu. Ing mumunang pamanyubuk a color television papakit de king London inyang 1928 agpang keng Adamian's tricolor principle, ampopng mekilala ya bilang metung kareng mitatag keng television a de color.

Georgy Adelson-Velsky:
I Georgy Maximovich Adelson-Velsky (; neng misan in lagiu na malikikas yang baligtad antimong Georgii Adelson-Velskii), (b. Eneru 8 1922) metung yang Russian mathematicu ampong computer scientist. Kambe nang E.M. Landis, inimbentu de ing AVL tree inyang 1962.
Inyang 1965, i Adelson-Velsky penimunan ne ing pamanalkus nang ning computer chess programa king Institute para keng Theoretical ampong Experimental Physics king Moscow. Ing programa simbut ne i Kotok-McCarthy king mumunang tunggali keng chess pilatan da ding computer programs, nung nu minalkus yang Kaissa, ing mumunang world computer chess champion.
Kasalungsungan makatuknang ya king Ashdod, Israel. 

Ernst Abbe:
I Ernst Karl Abbe (Eneru, 1840 – Eenru 14, 1905) metung yang Aleman physicist, optometrist, entrepreneur, ampong mapanibayu keng pangaguman. Kambe da ri Otto Schott ampong Carl Zeiss, iya ing mitatag keng makabayung optics (salamin mata). I Abbe menalkus yang dakla gamit keng salamin mata. Kayabe ya kareng mikibandi keng Carl Zeiss AG, metung a Aleman a talagawa kareng optical systems.
Ing bakung Abbe keng bulan mipalagiu ya kaya bilang karangalan.

Dolores Hart:
I Dolores Hart (mibait yang Dolores Hicks aniang October 20, 1938 king Chicago, Illinois) metung yang madreng Catolico ampong sadiang artista. Linage ya kareng apulung pelicula kilub ning limang banua, at akapareha ne i Stephen Boyd, Montgomery Clift, George Hamilton ampo i Robert Wagner. Mumuna neng pelicula ing Loving You (1957). nung nu ne akapareha i Elvis Presley. 

Elvis Presley:
I Elvis Aaron Presley metung yang Americanung talakanta, artista, ampong musikeru. Maralas, kabud na mu Elvis ing aus da kaya. Neng kai, ausan deng "The King of Rock 'n' Roll" (Ari ning Rock 'n' Roll) o "The King" (Ing Ari). 
Migumpisa ya i Presley aniang 1953 anting metung karing mumunang titigtig king rockabilly, metung a mabilis a pamiabe ning country ampong rhythm and blues a maki masikan a back beat. Sinikat ya uling king bayung bersion da reng kanta, nung na na pisasamut ing tigtig a pang-"matuling" ampong "white", bageng penibatan ning kayang panga-sikat—ampong kontrobersial— bukud king kayang e apigilan ("uninhibted") a pamagkanta ampong pangimut kareng palage. Mic-record yang kanta king uring rock and roll, a masasalamin kareng plaka anti king "Hound Dog" ampong "Jailhouse Rock". Maleparan ya abut {"versatile") ing bosis/siuala nang Presley, at migtagumpe ya king pamagkanta kareng aliwang uri ning musica, kayabe ne ing gospel, blues, country, ballads ampong pop. King salukuyan, milukluk ne kareng apat a hall of fame ning musica. 
Aniang decadang 1960, gewa nong Presley deng keraklan kareng kayang 31 a pelicula, a keraklan "musical" a e masanting datang kareng criticu dapot menakitan king takilya. Aniang 1968, belikan na ing "live" a pamagkanta kapamilatan ning metung a palage king telebision, at linage ya king mabilug a U.S., lalu na king Las Vegas. Kanitang 1973, linage ya king minunang pangyatung "live concert" kapamilatan ning satellite ("Aloha from Hawaii"), a miras kareng e magkulang king metung a biliun a manalbe, bukud pa king karagdagang 500 miliun a mas tauling limbe ("on delay").
King kabilugan ning kayang carera antimong talakanta, mitikdo yang record para king pamitagun kareng concierto, "rating" king telebisiun, ampong pamaniali kareng plaka o "recording". Metung ya kareng masaling dili ampong maimpluensiang dili kareng lalage king kasalesayan ning musica. Deng prublema king pamikakatawan, "drug addiction" ampong aliwang sangkan, ing migdala king kayang kamatayan king edad a 42. 

Rudolph Ackermann:
I Rudolph Ackermann (Abril 20 1764 – Marsu 30 1834) metung yang Anglo-Aleman a manimbentu ampong talabulaglag.
Talambie.
Mibait ya king Schneeberg, king Saxony, nung nu megaral ya keng pipagaralan Latin. Eya mekapagaral keng university pauli ning kakulangan keng pera, inya meging yang saddler kalupa ning igpa na.

Jung Eui Chul:
I Jeong Eui-chul (Koreanu: 정의철) metung yang modelu at artista king Mauling Korea.

Ottomar Anschütz:
I Ottomar Anschütz (16 Mayu 1846 – 30 Mayu 1907) metung yang menimbentu, talalarauan, ampong chronophotographer.
Talambie.
Inimbentu ne ing 1/1000th ning segundu shutter, ampo ing "electrotachyscope" inyang 1887. Ing electrotachyscope metung yang ning 24 glass diapositives, demanung gagalo, ampng sisindi kapamilatan ning kislap a spiral Geissler tube, gagamitan de reng tunggal a sisislip, o kaya makapaslag kareng malating lupung.

Georg von Arco:
I Georg Wilhelm Alexander Hans Graf von Arco (Agostu 30, 1869 – Mayu 5, 1940) metung yang Aleman a physicist, radio pioneer, ampong metung kareng mitatag keng Telefunken cumpania, nung nu meyaus yang ""Society for Wireless Telegraphy"" inyang panaun a ita. Iya ing maulaga keng pmanalkus ning alang kuryenting technogia king Europa. 
Ing balen ning Arco, Idaho, mipalagiu ya kaya inyang 1903.

Manfred von Ardenne:
I Manfred von Ardenne (Eneru 20, 1907 king Hamburg - Mayu 26, 1997 king Dresden) metung yang Aleman talasalugsug ampong magagamit (applied)physicist ampong talaimbentu. Menikua yang mga 600 patent keng marangle ning electron microscopy, medical technology, nuclear technology, plasma physics, ampong radio ampong television technologia.

Ralph H. Baer:
I Ralph H. Baer (mibait Marsu 8,1922) metung yang Aleman-bait America talaimbentu, bantug karing kayang dakal a ambag keng pialung ampong video game industry. Inyang 2006, mirinan yang galal keng National Medal of Technology para keng pamanimbentu na keng home console for video games.

Andreas Friedrich Bauer:
I Andreas Friedrich Bauer (Agostu 18, 1783 – 1860) metung yang Aleman engineer nung nu iya ing minunang menalkus keng sobrang-bilis a steam powered printing press kambe ne ing kayang kayabeng Friedrich Koenig, nung nu iya ing menimbentu at pisali ne keng "The Times" king London inyang 1814.
Mibait ya king Stuttgart, Germany, i Bauer mikiabe ya kang Koenig inyang 1817 a tetag de ing Koenig & Bauer king Oberzell monasteriu malapitWürzburg.

Eugen Baumann:
I Eugen Baumann (Disiembri 12, 1846–Nobiembri 3, 1896) metung yang Aleman chemist. Iya ing mumunang meglalang keng PVC.
Abalu na kambe nang Carl Schotten ing Schotten-Baumann reaction.
Ayasawa ne i Theresa Kopp anak nang ning chemist Emil Kopp, atin lang limang anak. 

Hans Beck:
I Hans Beck (6 Mayu 1929 – 30 Eneru 2009) metung yang Aleman tlaimbentu na ning pialungan Playmobil. Keraklan mayayaus yang "Ing Igpa ning Playmobil."

Theodor Bergmann:
I Theodor Bergmann (Mayu 21 1850 king Sailauf - Marsu 23 1931 king Gaggenau) metung yang Aleman a mangalakal ampong industrialista a matatanda bilang kareng kayang gawa kareng barila a pepalual ning kayang cumpania. 

Qin Shi Huang:
I Qin Shi Huang () (259 BCE – 210 BCE), lagiu Ying Zheng (), metung yang ari ra reng Isik keng State na ning Qin manibat 246 BCE anggang 221 BCE inyang Warring States Period. Iya ing minunang emperador ning pisanmetung a Tsina inyang 221 BCE. Menungkulan ya anggang inyang king kayang kakamtayan inyang 210 BCE king idad a 50.
I Qin Shi Huangdi kaibat neng pisanmetung ing Tsina, iya at ing kayang manimunang talausuk i Li Si pepalual lang reforma keng politica ampong pang economia. Megmandu yang magaragula projectu, kayabe ne ing mumunang dake ning Great Wall ning China, at ngeni ing bantug a sukad lakanbalen a mausoleum a nung nu deng terra cotta sundalus ial deng makabante. Para a siguradu na ing kataimikan i Qin Shi Huang binawal no reng Confucianism ampong kikut nong mabie deng scholars. Agiang maigpit ya keng kayang pamanungkulan mekilala ya i Qin Shi Huang bilang metung keng migpabayu keng Tsina.

Huang Xianfan:
Y Huang Xianfan(Chinese:黄現璠/黄现璠) mibait ya ketang (Nobiembri 13, 1899 at meangu ing bie na ketang Eneru 18, 1982. Ya ing historiador ning China(Maldang Republika ning Tsina).
Talambye.
Y Huang mibait ya king Fusui, Guangxi. Y Huang ikua ne ing kayang mababang pamagaral king kayang balen beitan a Fusui, kaibat kinua ne ing kayang kaduang pamagaral king Guangxi Provincial High School. Kaibat megaral ya king Beijing(Beijing iya ing balen tungku ning Maldang Republika ning Tsina)Normal University(1926-1935) at penakitan ne ing kayang kursu inyang 1932. Kaibat megaral ya king Tokyo(Tokyo iya ing balen tungku ning Japon) University(1935-1937). Y Huang ing historia profesor ning Guangxi University (1938-1940,1943-1953) in Guilin City, ning Sun Jatsen University (1941-1942) in Guangdong Provincial, ning Guangxi Normal University kan (1954-1982) in Guilin City.

Emile Berliner:
 I Emile Berliner (Mayu 20, 1851 – Agostu 3, 1929) metung yang aleman-bait Americanung manimbentu, mas kebaluan keng kayang pamanalkus keng disc record gramophone ("phonograph" keng American English). Iya ing mitatag keng Berliner Gramophone Company inyang 1895, Ing Gramophone Company king London, England, inyang 1897, Deutsche Grammophon king Hanover, Germany, inyang 1898 ampong Berliner Gram-o-phone Company ning Canada king Montreal inyang 1899.
Patent.
"Patent images in TIFF format"

Tala da reng lakanbalen ning Maldang Republica ning Tsina:
Pekamaragul diling lakanbalen.
Ing MRT atin yang dozenang lakanbalen, kayabe no reng 55 pangmabilug a ayatung lakanbalen.
Autonomous regions.
Guangxi Zhuang.
"Main article: Tala da reng lakanbalen king Guangxi"
Xinjiang Uighur.
Main article: List of cities in Xinjiang
Special administrative regions.
The special administrative regions have a unitary government without defined cities.
Hong Kong.
Deni reng pa=ekamaragula karinan pangbalen:
Macau.
These former "freguesia" were defined by Portugal and still used for convenience.

Saad Hariri:
I Saad-eddine Rafiq Al-Hariri (; mibait 18 Abril 1971) metung yang politiku ampong meging pansamantalang Pun Ministru ning Lebanon, kaibat ning pangabagsak ning kayang gabineti aniang 12 ya ing Enero 2011. Kadua neng anak Rafic Hariri, ing sadiang Pun Ministru ning Lebanon a pete ra aniang 2005. Makalukluk yang pun ministru manibat aniang 9 ya ing Noviembre 2009, ampong Pekapun ne ning Movement of the Future (Pangimut ning Paintungulan) manibat aniang 2005.

Michel Suleiman:
I Michel Suleiman o Sleiman (, mibait 21 Noviembre 1948) ing kasalungsungan a Pamuntuk o Presidenti ning Lebanon. Bayu ya meging Pamuntuk, migsilbi yang pekapun ("commander") ning Ukbung Maki-almas ning Lebanon ("Lebanese Armed Forces" o LAF). Kaibat nang linukluk anting pamuntuk ing pekapun ning LAF a i Émile Lahoud aniang Noviembre 1998, elilan neng Suleiman ketang sadia nang puestu aniang Diciembre. Kalabas ding mapilan a banua, mialal ya i Suleiman a Pamuntuk, at sinumpa ya kanitang Mayo 25, 2008.

Johann Bessler:
I Johann Ernst Elias Bessler (1680 - Nobiembri 30, 1745) metung yang entrepreneur nung nu pepakit na deng tukituking gamit a papakit da ing ausan dang alang anggang kimut (perpetual motion).
Bie at Carera.
I Bessler mibait ya king balen a Zittau king Saxony, Germany inyang 1680. Inyang 1712 linto ya king balen ning Gera king lalawigan ning Reuss at pepalto ne ing "pangsariling "gagalong parugang" (self-moving wheel), nung nu mga keng sukad bilug(diameter) ampong kakapal. MIsan atiu keng gagalong kabilian atin yang upayang abuat ing mapilan a bayat (pounds).

Theobald Boehm:
I Theobald Böhm (o Boehm) (Abril 9, 1794 – Nobiembri 27, 1881) metung yang Aleman talaimbentu ampong talatigtig, nung nu aganap neng alang mali ing makabayung Western concert flute ampo ing kayang mepasanting a pamanukup taliri. Kadua na nita, metung yang matenakan a flautist ampong metung yang Bavarian Court Talatigtig at metung ya naman a bantug a talakudt para keng flute. 

August von Borries:
I August Friedrich Wilhelm von Borries (1852-1906) metung yang Prussian engineer nung nu ing sikasu na mismu iyapin ing pamanalkus ning bagun a saken (steam locomotive).

Robert Bosch:
I Robert Bosch (Septiemberi 23, 1861 - Marsu 12, 1942) metung yang German industrialist, engineer aampong talaimbentu, talatatag ning Robert Bosch GmbH. 
Talambie.
I Bosch mibait ya king Albeck, metung a puruk king pangulungaslagan ning Ulm king mauling Germany. Panglabingmetung ya kareng labingaduan anak. Ding kayang pengari ibat la kareng masanting a kabliyan keng pamananam king kayang labuad. 
Malagung Panyulat.
Robert Bosch: "The prevention of future crises in the world economic system". London 1937 (German edition 1932)
Heuss, Gillespie, Kapczynski: "Robert Bosch - his life and achievements". New York 1994 (German edition 2067)
Hans-Erhard Lessing: "Robert Bosch". Reinbek 2007 (in German)

Walther Bothe:
I Walther Wilhelm Georg Bothe (Eneru 8 1891 inyang Oranienburg – Pebreru 8 1957 king Heidelberg) metung yang Aleman nuclear physicist.
Inyang 1913, mekiabe ya keng bayung lalang a Laboratory para Radioactivity king Reich Physical ampong Technical Institute (PTR), nung nu menatili ya anggang 1930, king tauling banua bilang director ning laboratoriu. Sinuyu ya keng military inyang Mumunang Pangyatung Guerra I maniabt 1914 at kilung de reng Russians, mibalik ya Germany inyang 1920. 

Karlheinz Brandenburg:
I Karlheinz Brandenburg (mibait Juniu 20, 1954, king Erlangen, Germany) metung yang audio engineer nung nu menambag ya keng audio compression format MPEG Audio Layer 3, kebaluan bilang MP3.
Talambie.
Tinggap ne ing kayang Dipl. Ing. degree ibat Erlangen University keng Electrical Engineering inyang(1980) at makanyan mu rin ing Dipl. Math. degree keng Mathematics inyang (1982). 

Karl Ferdinand Braun:
I Karl Ferdinand Braun (6 Juniu 1850 – 20 Abril 1918) metung yang Aleman a talaimbentu, physicist ampong Nobel laureate keng physics (1909). I Braun menambag yang dakal keng pamanalkus ning radiu ampong ning technolgia keng TV.

Robert Bunsen:
I Robert Wilhelm Eberhard Bunsen (31 Marsu 1811 – 16 Agostu 1899) metung yang Aleman chemist. Telingtingan ne ing emission spectra da reng mepaling bage, at kambe nang Gustav Kirchhoff adiscubri ne ing caesium(inyang 1860) ampong rubidium(inyang 1861). I Bunsen aalkus no ring dakal a gas-analytical paralan, iya ing manimuna keng photochemistry, ampong pegobra no reng mumunang gawa keng marangle ning organoarsenic chemistry. Kambe ning kayang sasaup kaya keng laboratoriu, Peter Desaga, inalkus ne ing Bunsen burner, metung a pangatas na uri ning magagamita burner kareng laboratoriu kanita. 

Gottlieb Daimler:
 
I Gottlieb Daimler (Marsu 17, 1834 - Marsu 6, 1900) metung yang engineer, industrial taladesign ampong industrialist, mibait king Schorndorf (Kaarian ning Württemberg, metung a federal state ning German Confederation), ngeni Federal Republic ning Germany. Iya ing menimuna keng internal-combustion engine ampong pamanalkus ning saken (automobile). Iya ing menimbentu keng mumunang mabilis a petrol engine ampo ing mumunang apat-parugang a saken.
I Daimler at ing kayang kayabe keng kalakal i Wilhelm Maybach ila reng menimbentu keng malating, mabilis a makina (engine) a makatumpak keng metung a saken. Bantug la bilang taladesign ning ausan relo a "Grandfather Clock" engine. 

Konrad Dannenberg:
I Konrad Dannenberg (Agostu 5, 1912 – Pebreru 16, 2009) metung yang German-American rocket manimuna ampong kaanib ya keng German Rocket Team. 

Philip Diehl (talaimbentu):
I Philip H. Diehl (29 Eneru 1847 – 7 Abril 1913) metung yang aleman-Americanung engineer ampong talaimbentu nung nu atin yang dakal a U.S. patents, kayabe no reng electric incandescent lamp, electric motors para kareng makinang panai (sewing machine) at aliwapang gamit ampong bentilador (ceiling fan). I Diehl kaygnan neng manimbentu i Thomas Edison inya i Edison mepilatan yan g ibaba no alaga deng kayang pipisaling bombilia.

Robby Tantingco:
I Robby Tantingco metung yang Kapampangan talasulat. Metung yang columnista keng SunStar Pampanga [http://www.sunstar.com.ph/pampanga/tantingco-first-filipino-priest-was-kapampangan]

Edilberto V. Santos:
I Ámung Edilberto V. Santos metung yang Kapampangan talasulat. Metung yang columnista keng SunStar Pampanga

Rafael Maniago:
I Rafael Maniago metung yang wátas a Kapampángan.

Rudolf Diesel:
I Rudolf Christian Karl Diesel (; Marsu 18, 1858 – tauli yang meyakit mabie Septiembri 29, 1913) metung yang tage Europang talaimbentu ampong mechanical engineer, bantug ya keng kayng imbentung diesel a makina (diesel engine).

Claudius Dornier:
I Claude (Claudius) Honoré Desiré Dornier mibait ya king Kempten im Allgäu (Mayu 14, 1884 - Disiembri 5, 1969) metung yang Aleman a mangawang ampong mitatag keng Dornier GmbH. Bantug ya kareng kayang mapilan a gewa nang eroplanu a kayabe ne ing Dornier Do 18 ampo ing 12-makina Dornier Do X susulapong bapor, at misan keng dekadang a pekamaragul ampong pekamasikan a eroplanu.

Farid F. Abraham:
I Farid F. Abraham (mibait Mayu 5, 1937) metung yang Americanung scientist.
I Abraham ikua ne ing kayang Bachelor of Science ampong Ph.D king University ning Arizona inyang 1959 ampong 1962, mitukituki. Kapamilatan ning pamanimuna keng makabayung paralan a gagamit modelling keng pamanyalugsug, mekaambag ya keng science keng marangle ning fracture mechanics, membrane dynamics ampong phase transformation galo da reng bage. Atlu ya sinulat a aklat (libru) ampong maiggit a 200 sulat a melimbag kareng international journals, kayabe no reng atlu articulu keng "Science". 
Menyambut yang galal a Aneesur Rahman keng computational physics,
a nung nu iti ingn pekamatas a galal a binie ning American Physical Society.

Peter Agre:
I Peter Agre (mibait Eneru 30, 1949) metung yang Americanung medical doctor, professor, ampong molecular biologist nung nu mirinan yang galal keng 2003 Nobel Prize keng Chemistry (nung nu kayabe neng menikua i Roderick MacKinnon) king kayang pangatuklas keng aquaporins. Deng aquaporins ila rang danum-taladala kareng proteina a gagalo kareng water molecules kapamilatan da reng cell membrane. Inyang Pebreru 2009, i Peter Agre mitalaga ya keng katungkulan bilang pang163 a pamuntuk ning American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS), ing pekamaragul a anibang pang scientificu.

Keiiti Aki:
I Keiiti Aki (Marsu 3 1930 – Mayu 17 2005) metung yang professor ning Geophysics king Massachusetts Institute ning Technology (MIT), seismologist, author ampong talaturu. Sinulat ne kambe i Paul G. Richards, ing "Quantitative Seismology: theory and methods".

Dan Alderson:
I Daniel John "Dan" Alderson (Octubri 31, 1941 – 1989) metung yang scientist king Jet Propulsion Laboratory king California, ampong bantug a kayabe keng science fiction fandom. 

Robert Abbott (game designer):
I Robert Abbott (mibait 1933) metung yang Americanung pialung a talaimbentu.
I Abbott metung yang maranun a computer programmer, magobra keng IBM 360 assembly language. Maburi ya kareng t-shirt atin gulis-gulis a sasabian na atin lang kaayusan. Iya ing megdesing keng chess variant Baroque chess (bantug mu naman bilang Ultima); ing pialung a baraha Eleusis; ampo ing Crossings ampo Epaminondas. Dakal kareng kayang pialung atiu la keng kayang aklat a, "Abbott's New Card Games" (Stein & Day 1963). 
Kapilan pamu minalis ing kayang pamiisip keng pamanimbentu kareng ausan dang "Logic Mazes" o "Mazes a atin tuntunan". Ding kayang bantug a logic mazes ilapin deng Theseus and the Minotaur makatakdang mazes, ampo ing Sliding Door Maze, nung nu mayakit la keng kayang website (lawen la reng suglung lalam).

Leonard Adleman:
I Leonard Max Adleman (mibait Disiembri 31, 1945) metung yang theoretical computer scientist ampong professor ning computer science aat molecular biology king University ning Southern California. Kebaluan ya bilang metung kareng talaimbentu ning RSA (Rivest-Shamir-Adleman) cryptosystem inyang 1977, na ning DNA computing. Ing RSA maleparan yang magagamit kareng securidad pangcomuter, kayabe ne ing https.
Mibait king California, i Adleman meragul ya king San Francisco, ampong megaral ya king University ning California, Berkeley, nung nu atanggap ne ing kayang BA degree keng mathematicu inyang 1968 ampo ing kayang Ph.D. degree king EECS inyang 1976.

Darin Adler:
I Darin Adler metung yang technicu menimuna para keng Apple Computer's System 7 operating system a apalual. Inyang 1985–1987 megobra ya keng ICOM Simulations bilang primerang manalkus na ning MacVenture a tukituking pialung, kayabe ne ing Shadowgate. I Adler megobra ya mu rin kaibat king General Magic ampong Eazel.
, iya ing engineering talapanibala na ning Safari web browser a koponan king Apple, nung nu iti mu rin ing manalkus keng balangkas ning WebKit. I Adler kayabe ya keng minunang kopanan a migpalual keng beta releases ampong 1.0 release ning Safari, makanyan mu rin keng Safari 3.0 beta para keng Microsoft Windows.
I Adler pane yang talapagsalita keng Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference ampong Stump the Experts panelista.

Eric Allman:
I Eric Paul Allman (mibait Septiembri 2, 1955) metung yang Americanung computer programmer a menalkus keng sendmail at ing manimuna keng delivermail inyang bandang tauli ning dekada 1970 ampong mumunana ning dekada 1980 king UC Berkeley.
Pamagaral ampong sanayan.
MIbait king El Cerrito, California, i Allman balu na ibat pa inyang malati ya na bisa yang magobra keng computing, sepilitan yang lulub kareng mainframe ning kayang pipagaralan a high school at kaibat ginamit no ring computing center na ning UC Berkeley para karing kayang pamangailangan keng computing. Inyang 1973, linub ya king UC Berkeley, inyang magumpisa ya pa ing Unix operating system kareng keng academia. Ikua ne ing kayang B.S. ampong M.S. a kursu ibat UC Berkeley inyang 1977 ampong 1980 king pamituki ra.

Ken Arnold:
I Kenneth Cutts Richard Cabot Arnold metung yang computer programmer bantug keng pamanalkus ning 1980s dungeon-crawling computer game "Rogue",king kayang ambag keng minunang Berkeley (BSD) pamamudbud ning Unix, ding kayang aklat (libru) ampong articulu tungkul keng C ampong C++ (e.g. his 1980s–90s "Unix Review" column, "Ing C Advisor"), ampo ing kayang bantug a obra keng Java platform. Atin yang aduang anak a, ila ri Jareth ampong Corwin.

William Barden, Jr.:
I William Barden, Jr. metung yang talasulat ning aklat ampong articulu keng computer programming. Deng sinulat nang Barden's keraklan tungkul la keng microcomputer, computer graphics ampong assembly language ampong BASIC programming. Sinulat ya keng bulanbulan a columna para keng Ing Pinanari (The Rainbow) magazine, nung nu pangkaraniwan makitalamitan ya keng mababang-uri ning assembly language programming keng TRS-80 Color Computer. Deng kayang aliwang libru (aklat) melimbag (mibulaglag) la keng lalam ning kayang lagiung "William T. Barden".

Daniel J. Barrett:
I Daniel J. Barrett (mibait Nobiembri 6, 1963) metung yang talasulat, software engineer, web site maintainer, talatigtig, ampong Usenet personality. Bantug ya kareng kayang aklat keng technology, ding kayang obra kambe nang progressive rock band Gentle Giant, ampo ing kayang imaginary computer game BLAZEMONGER.
Sinulat.
I Barrett mekasulat ya kareng mapilan a aklat tungkul keng technical a computer a paksa. Ing pekabantug iyapin ing "Linux Pocket Guide"and "SSH, The Secure Shell: The Definitive Guide". Ding kayang aklat melikas la keng Czech, French, Aleman, Hungarian, Japanese, Mandarin, Polish, ampong Russian.
Blazemonger.
In the 1990s, Barrett created the concept of BLAZEMONGER, an imaginary computer game that spoofed the computing industry, and wrote approximately 100 articles about it.

David Baszucki:
I David Baszucki metung yang Americanung computer game programmer, ampo iyaduate ya king Stanford University inyang 1985. Ing Roblox metung yang Free-Virtual World game. Linual yang mumuna inyang 2004.

Shawn Bayern:
I Shawn J. Bayern metung yang Americanung talaturu keng batas (law professor). Bayu keng kayang crera keng panglegal, miglalang yang dakal a magagamita computer-software systems ampong sinulat yang maleparan a magagamita a madadalerayan a aklat keng computer programming.
Aklat.
193011012X).

Doug Bell:
Douglas Andrew Bell (born February 24 1961)
is a computer game developer active in the industry from the mid-1980s to mid-1990s.
bantug ya keng kayang legeng lead designer ampong programmer para kareng classic "Dungeon Master" tukituking computer games ibat keng San Diego studio FTL Games. Iya ing manimunang manalkus ampong technical director ning FTL manibat 1984 anggang ing cumpania tinuknang ya gagawa inyang 1996.

Wayne Bell (computer specialist):
I Wayne Bell iya ing miglalang keng WWIV BBS systema. Ing mumunang WWIV BBS minta ya online king Los Angeles, CA inyang Disiembri 1984. Ing kayang BBS mipalagyuan yang Amber, node 1 na ning WWIVNet BBS network.
I Wayne sindu na ing pamibandi ampong pamanalkus ning WWIV software king maiggit a metung a dekada, a meging bantug keng labuad ning online, bayu la meging privadu ampong kaibat miglapad la reng keng Internet nung nu ing labuad ning BBS bagia bagia kinupas ya inyang libudtad ning 1990s.

Nasrallah Boutros Sfeir:
I Patriarca Mar Nasrallah Boutros Sfeir (Arabu: الكاردينال مار نصر الله بطرس صفير "") (mibait Mayo 15, 1920 king Rayfoun, Lebanon) ing patriarca ning pekamaragul a grupu da reng Cristiano king Lebanon, ing Iglesia Maronita, metung a Pisamban a Catolicong Pang-Aslagan ("Eastern Catholic Church") a kaugne ning Roma. Metung ya muring Cardinal a Catolico. Mialal yang Patriarca ning Antioch para kareng Maronita kanitang Abril 27 1986, kaibat ning pamagkalag ("resignation") nang Cardinal Anthony Peter Khoraish. Ing oficial nang titulu, "Ing Kayang Kabanalan, ing kapitung pulu't anam a Patriarca ning Antioch ampo ning Mabilug a Levant" ("His Holiness the seventy-sixth Patriarch of Antioch and the Whole Levant").

Leigh Benson:

Nathaniel Borenstein:
I Nathaniel Borenstein (mibait Septiembri 23, 1957) metung ya kareng menimunang designer na ning MIME protocolpara balangkasan ne ing multimedia Internet electronic mail.
Kasalungsungan Hepi ning Open Standards Strategist ampong Kilalang Engineer king IBM, i Borenstein iya ing mitatag keng NetPOS.com ampong ing First Virtual Holdings, a ausan dang "ing mumunang cyberbank" na ning Smithsonian Institution. Ikua ne ing kayang B.A. keng Mathematicu ampo ing kayang Pamagaral Pangkasalpantayanan (Religious Studies) ibat king Grinnell College, kabang ikua ne ing M.S. ampong Ph.D iabt king Carnegie Mellon University. Megaral ya naman king Deep Springs College, California (1975-76), Ohio State University (1974-75), ampo king Hebrew University of Jerusalem, Israel (1978-79).
Iya ing sinualt keng "Programming As If People Mattered: Friendly Programs, Software Engineering, and Other Noble Delusions" (Princeton University Press, 1994) ISBN 0691037639.

Ray E. Bornert II:
I Ray E. Bornert II metung yang Americanung computer programmer ampong game designer. Iya ing migdesign keng WinHoldEm online poker bot. Iya mu rin ing miglalang keng 512-cell three-dimensional chess variant, ausan dang 3D8L.

Richard Brodie (programmer):
I Richard Reeves "Quiet Lion" Brodie metung yang Americanung computer programmer, talapagsalitang atin pamangising, talasulat ampong professional poker a talapialung. Iya ing menimumang talasulat ning Microsoft Word ampong megobra ya mika bilang #77 king Microsoft. Iya ing talasulat karing aduang aklat: "Virus of the Mind: The New Science of the Meme", and "Getting Past OK: A Straightforward Guide To Having a Fantastic Life!".

Paul Buchheit:
I Paul Buchheit metung yang Americanung computer programmer ampong entrepreneur. Iya ing miglalang ampong manimunang manalkus ning Gmail. Inalkus ne ing menimunang prototype ning Google AdSense bilang dake ning kayang obra keng Gmail. Iya mu rin ing megmunikala keng cumpaniang a ngeni bantug a motto "Don't be evil" inyang 2000 a pamipulung ning cumpania karas keng a alagang pamiugali.

Baabda:
Ing Baabda () ing lakanbalen o ciudad a yang tungku o capitoliu ning Distritu ning Baabda, ampo ning Mount Lebanon Governorate, albugang Lebanon. Ing Baabda ing lakanbalen a tungku ning maki autonomiang Bunduk Lebanon ("Mount Lebanon") king Imperiong Ottoman. 
Ing Palacio ning Baabda, ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning Pamuntuk o Presidenti ning Lebanon, atiu murin king Baabda.

Palacio ning Baabda:
Ing Palacio ning Baabda () ing oficial nang tuknangan ning Pamuntuk ning Lebanon. Atiu king mabunduk a balen ning Baabda, nung nu ya ababation king lalam ing Beirut. Padurutan ne ning Ministry of Defence ampo reng miayaliwang pasilidad a bantayan a militar. Atin ya muring tuknangan a pangkaleldo king Beiteddine ing pamuntuk.
Kaibat dong tiknang deng pulung da reng ministru ning kapamahalan ketang lugal nung nu la sadiang mararapat deti uling king kapigaganakan king kaligtasan kanitang 2005, inumpisan dong gawan keti. Ngeni, liwas lang mararapat keti ampong king Grand Serail. 

Grand Serail:
Ing Grand Serail (; a ausan da muring Palacio ning Kapamahalan o "Government Palace") ing pun tanggapan ("headquarters") ning Pun Ministru ning Lebanon. Atiu king babo ning bunduk-bundukan o talimunduk king kabalenan ("downtown") ning Beirut, pilang bloque manibat king Parlamento ning Lebanon. 
Ing Grand Serail metung yang makasalesayan a gusali, ing pekamaulaga kareng atlung makatikdong ibat king panaun a Ottoman king talimunduk a Serail. Deng aliwa ila reng gusaling Council for Development and Reconstruction ampo ing torreng maki relo ning Hamidiyyeh. 
Megi yang maulaga ing gusaling ini uling kareng tuki-tuki nang papil king kasalesayan manibat aniang 1832 

Chyah:
Ing Chiyah (king Arabu الشياح a yagkas dang Ach-Chayyah) atiu king dake nang albugan ning Beirut, ing tungku o capitoliu ning Lebanon.
King kasalesayan, metung yang balen a Cristianu, dapot king lambatan atin muring menuknangan a Muslim a Shia. Aniang kapanaunan a Ottoman, panibalan ne ning familiang Arslan, at kaibat, Shihab dynasty.
Atiu king mauli-albugan nang karulun ("suburbs") ning tungku ning Beirut ing Chiyah, at padurutan ne ning Haret-Hreik, Ghobeiry, Hadath, Hazmieh, Furn-el-chebbak ampong Ain El Remanneh. Bayu ing 1956, mas maragul ing kayang sakup, kayabe no reng ngeni distritu ning Karm el Zeitoun, Hayy el Knissé, Bir Abed ampong Haret el Mjadlé, ampo ring Jnah, Ghobeiry, Furn-el-chebbak, Bir Hassan, ampong Ain El Remanneh.
Sadia, mitatakpan yang pitatamnan citrus a miraras king dayatmalat a Medeterraneo ing lakanbalen. Ngeni, kayabe ne kareng misnang dagul a karulun ning Beirut, at maki 60,000 memalen.

Hammana:
Ing Hammana metung yang balen king Lebanon, a maki dayung 26 km king aslagan ning Beirut.
Atiu king Mount Lebanon Governorate king distritu (o Caza) ning Baabda. 
Mapaliaring ing katayang "Hammana" ibat ya king dios ning aldo ning Fenicia, i "Hammon" o "Hamman". Ibat la reng aduang lagiung deti king katayang "Hama", a mangabaldugang pali ning aldo.
Atiu king dane nang albugan ning kabundukan a Mount Lebanon ing Hammana. Maki katas yang 1200m. Uli na niti, apat ya panaun king pabanua, ania metung yang masanting a bakasiunan, nung nukarin marimla neng kaleldo at maki yelu neng karimlan.
Dakal la reng taung mekasaup king yatu ibat king Hammana. Metung ya kareti ing doctor a Ma Haide (George Hatem), a sinaup ba yang iligtas ing China kareng makabayung sakit, at kinilala kapamilatan ning pamakilagiu kaya keng parke king arap ning plaza ning balen. 

Kfarshima:
Ing Kfarshima (a misusulat muring Kfarchima) metung yang balen king Baabda (Distritu) king Mount Lebanon Governorate, king mauli-aslagan ning Beirut. Ing Kfarshima ing lugal nang beitan ning compositor ampong musikerung i Philemon Wehbi, ampo ing talacantang i Majida El Roumi. Keti ya murin mibait ing filosofong i Shibli Shmayyel (Chibli Chemayel). 

Qarnayel:
Ing Qarnayel (Arabu: قرنايل) metung yang balen ampong municipalidad king Qadaa Baabda(Arabic:قضاء بعبدا) , Lebanon. (Baabda distritu) ning Mount Lebanon Governorate (Arabu: محافظة جبل لبنان). Maki tas yang 1100-1250 metru king babo ning dayatmalat iti, king albugan nang tibis ("slopes") ning Bunduk Lebanon o Mount Lebanon, king dake nang babo ning Matn (Al Matn al A'la) 36 km king aslagan ning Beirut. Ating 4,500 tau keti, a keraklan Druze and Maronites.
Metung yang maulagang pikuanan bukung pino ("pine nuts") iting balen uling kareng kakeuan o pulu da reng ("Pinus pinea") keti. Bukud kaniti, dakal la reng bungang dutung ampong guleng tutubu keti. 

Ras el Matn:
Ing "Ras el Matn"' o (Ra's al Matn) () metung yang balen ampong municipalidad king Qadaa Baabda (distritu ning Baabda), Mount Lebanon Governorate, Lebanon. Maki tas yang 800-1000 metru king babo ning dayatmalat ing balen, at atiu kareng mangatarik a tibis o gilid ning Bunduk Lebanon ("Mount Lebanon"), king dake nang babo ning Matn (Al Matn al A'la). 
Ing pekamakabaldugan a gusali king balen ya pin ing makasalesayan a Serail da reng principeng Lam'iyin a mitikdo kanitang 1775. Atin muring matuang arapan ning gusali king dake nang mababa ning balen.
Metung yang manimunang pikukuanan bukung pino ("pine nuts") ing balen uling kareng kakeuan o pulu ning stone pine ("Pinus pinea") keti.
King Ras el Matn ya mibait ing talasulat ning Lebanon a i Anis Freiha.

Angina pectoris:
Ing Angina pectoris, pangkaraniwan kebaluan bilang angina, metung yang matinding pamangaskup ning salu pauli ning ischemia (pamgkulang a daya ampong angin a oxygen) keng kalamnan ning pusu, keraklan uli ning pangabara o ilab o pulikat da reng coronary arteries (ing pidadalanan daya ning pusu). Coronary artery disease (sakit keng uyat pusu), iya ing pekapun a sangkan ning angina, uli ning atherosclerosis da ring cardiac arteries. Ing kataya menibat ya keng Greek "ankhon" ("pamanyakal") ampo keng Latin "pectus" ("salu"), inya maliari yang ilikas bilang "pamanyakal a pakiramdam keng salu". 
Deng sisikan a ("crescendo") sumpung keng angina, biglang-sumpung ning angina kabang makapainawa, ampong angina magluat maiggit 15 minutus ila reng palatandanan na ning "unstable angina" (keraklan makalupung la kareng milulupang kabilian bilang acute coronary syndrome). Deti mabilang la bilang myocardial infarction (a ataki keng pusu), mangailangan lang agadagad a lawe ning doctor a t keraklan mabibilang lang ataki keng pusu.

John D. Carmack:
I John D. Carmack II (mibait Agostu 20, 1970) metung yang Americanung game programmer, ampong metung kareng mitatag keng id Software. I Carmack iya ing manimunang programmer na ning id computer games "Commander Keen", "Wolfenstein 3D", "Doom", "Quake", at ding tinuki keng "Doom", "Quake" ampong "Wolfenstein".
Agiang i Carmack bantug ya keng pamangawa/pamyanting keng 3D graphics, mahilig ya naman keng rocketry ampong iya ing mitatag ampong manimumanang engineer keng Armadillo Aerospace.

Bruce Carver:
I Bruce Carver (~1948–Disiembri 28, 2005) metung ya kareng mitatag keng video game developer Access Software (kaibat mipalagiuwan Indie Built) inyang 1982. Megumpisa yang pepalual a pamansag para kareng 8-bit computers, kayabe no reng "Beach-Head", "", "Raid over Moscow" ampong dakal pang aliwa.
Kambe ning kayang kapatad a lalaki, i Roger Carver, miglalang yang makayasag a Links golf game series, magumpisa keng "Leader Board" ampong "World Class Leader Board". 

Raymond Chen:
I Raymond Chen metung yang bantug a manalkus kareng Windows Shell koponan king Microsoft. Manibat mikiabe ya king Microsoft inyang 1992, i Chen penigobran ne ing OS/2, Windows 95, DirectX, ampong ding aliwang kasapni na pa ning Windows. Kilual ning Microsoft, bantug ya keng kayang articulu keng Windows programming. and his custom of wearing suits at work.

Físika:
Ing Physics (Greek: physis – φύσις meaning "nature") metung yang likas a science (natural science); iti pamagaral yang bage (matter) ampo ing kayang galo kapamilatan ning orasalapaap (spacetime) at ding eganaganang manibat kareti, antimo ing energia ampong sikan (force). King kayang maleparan, iti ing pamitalinting na ning kalikasan (nature), magagawa para aintindiyan da nung makananu ya ing yatu ampo ing sikluban ya gagalo o kaya gagana.

Acqueville, Calvados:
Ing Acqueville metung yang commune ning Calvados "département", king Basse-Normandie "labuad" king pangulungalbugan ning France.
Mga ya kalaut ing Acqueville keng Caen, ing tungku (kabiesra) ning Basse-Normandie.

Agy:
Ing Agy metung yang commune ning Calvados "département", king Basse-Normandie "labuad" king pangulungalbugan France.

Bikfaya:
Ing Bikfaya (, a susulat da muring Bickfaya, Beckfayya, o Bekfaya) metung yang balen king Matn (Distritu) king Mount Lebanon. Uling kareng kayang bale batung maki bubungan a tisang malutu, king busal da reng kakeuan o pulung dutung a pino ampong robles ("oak"), metung ya kareng buri rang diling tuknangán a karulun ("suburb") ning Beirut, at metung kareng sikat diling bakasiunan king Lebanon. 

Ain Saadeh:
Ing Ain Saadeh (, a susulat da muring Ain Saadée ampong Ain Saade) metung yang karulun ("suburb") a atiu kareng talimunduk/bunduk-bundukan a mitatakpan kakeuan o pulung pino king pangulu-aslagan ning tungku o capitoliu ning Lebanon, ing Beirut.

Aignerville:
Ing Aignerville metung yang commune ning Calvados "département", king Basse-Normandie "labuad" king pangulungalbugan France.

Airan:
Ing '"Airan" metung yang commune ning Calvados "département", king Basse-Normandie "labuad" king pangulungalbugan France.

Amayé-sur-Orne:
Ing Amayé-sur-Orne metung yang commune ning Calvados "département", king Basse-Normandie "labuad" king pangulungalbugan France.

Amayé-sur-Seulles:
Ing Amayé-sur-Seulles metung yang commune ning Calvados "département", king Basse-Normandie "labuad" king pangulungalbugan France.

Antelias:
Ing Antelias () metung yang balen king Lebanon. Maki dayu yang 5 km king pangulu ning Beirut. Cristianu la ding keraklan kareng kayang memalen, at kayabe la keti deng Maronites, Greek Catholic, Greek Orthodox ampong Armenians (a keraklan Cristianung Apostolic). 
Ing Antelias ing centru ning Catholicos of Cilicia ning Armenian Catholicosate of the Great House of Cilicia. 
Mayayakit la murin keti deng aliwa pang gusaling pang-relihion, antimo ing St-Elie Maronite convent a maki aduang pisamban, ampo ing St. Mikhael :en:Greek Orthodox church.

Amblie:
Ing Amblie metung yang commune ning Calvados "département", king Basse-Normandie "labuad" king pangulungalbugan France.

Baabdat:
Ing Baabdat (a misusulat muring Baabdath, Arabic: بعبدات) metung yang balen king Matn )distritu) ning Mount Lebanon, 22 km manibat king Beirut at maki katas a manibat 800 anggang 1050 metru king babo ning dayatmalat. Uling kareng mangalabung nang kakeuan o pulung makapadurut king balen, metung yang sikat a bakasiunan para kareng tatakas kareng mataung lakanbalen o ciudad ning Lebanon, lalu na ing kayang tungku o capitoliu, ing Beirut. Uling malapit ya ing balen king Brummana, metung kareng lulupungan dang diling bakasiunan king Lebanon neng kaleldo, metung yang manimunang pupuntalan da reng turista ing Baabdat neng kaleldo.

Amfreville, Calvados:
Ing Amfreville metung yang commune ning Calvados "département", king Basse-Normandie "labuad" king pangulungalbugan France.

Angerville, Calvados:

Anisy:
Ing Anisy metung yang commune ning Calvados "département", king Basse-Normandie "labuad" king pangulungalbugan France.

Baskinta:
Ing Baskinta () metung yang nayun ning Lebanon a a maki katas a 1300 metru king babo ning dayatmalat. Pikabaluan ya king natural nang leguan ampo king kayang banayad a clima. Iti ing lugal a kebaitan nang Mikhail Naime.
Magi yang favoritu rang lugal deng magbicicletang amateur king mountain bike ing Baskinta. Dakal la reng dalan a pang-bicicleta keti, at atin yang organisadung comunidad da reng mag-bicicleta. 

Tony Bennett:
I Tony Bennett (born Anthony Dominick Benedetto; August 3, 1926) metung yang talakantang Americanu ning musicang pop, standards ampong jazz. 
Meragul ya king New York Lakanbalen i Bennett, at malati ya pamu, magkanta ne. Linaban ya aniang mayayari ne ing Kaduang Gerang Meto Yatu antimong infantryman king U.S. Army keng Gera king Europa. Kaibat, meyalkus ("developed") ya ing istilu na king pamagkanta, pinirma yang contrata king Columbia Records, at linual ya ing minuna nang kantang mig-"number one" aniang 1951, ing "Because of You". Mitukian ya pa iti kareng aliwang sinikat a "hit" aniang decadang 1950, antimo ing "Rags to Riches". Lalu yang meging maleparan ing saklo ning kayang pamagkanta, at liban ne murin ing pamagkantang jazz. Miras ya king metung a taluktuk ning kayang carera aniang tauli nang dake ning decadang 1950 kapamilatan da reng album antimo ing "The Beat of My Heart" and "Basie Swings, Bennett Sings." Kanitang 1962, mibulalag ya ing kayang "signature song", ing "I Left My Heart in San Francisco". Kaibat na niti, limbug yang maluat ing kayang carera ampong bieng personal aniang kasikatan ning panaun ning musicang rock 
Mika makapagmulala yang pamagbalik ing carera nang Bennett aniang tauli nang dake ning decadang 1980 ampong decadang 1990, at migpalual yang pasibayung album a "gold record" at melapad la reng kayang makiramdam kareng ibat king MTV Generation, kabang menatili ya ing kayang istilo king musica. Angga ngening kapanauanan a 2000, sikat ya pa murin at pupurian da reng criticu antimong metung a talakantang mag-"record" ampong lalage kareng conciertu. Sinambut neng labing limang Grammy Award ampong aduang Emmy Award i Benett, at mirinan yang galal antimong NEA Jazz Master ampong Kennedy Center Honoree. MIras nong 50 miliun deng apisali nang plaka king mabilug a yatu. Metung ya muring seriosu ampong biasang pintor, at maglalang yang obra lalam ning lagiung Benedetto, a makapakit kareng miayaliwang institucion. 

Bourj Hammoud:
Ing Bourj Hammoud (o Burj Hammud) (Armenian: Պուրճ Համուտ, Arabu: برج حموﺪ) metung yang karulun ("suburb") ning aslagang Beirut, Lebanon king Metn (distritu). Dakal lang Armeniang king lugal a ini uling keti la minalis deng keraklan kareng mekaligtas king Armenian Genocide. Metung yang industrialisadung lugal ing Bourj Hammoud, at metung ya kareng lugal a masiksik dili populasiun king mabilug a Kalibudtang Aslagan o "Middle East". 

Brummana:
Ing Brummana () metung yang balen king Matn (districtu) king Mount Lebanon Governorate, Lebanon. Atiu king aslagan ning Beirut, nung nu ya ababatio manibat babo iting tungku o capitoliu, ampo ing Dayatmalat a Mediterraneo. 

Bteghrine:
Ing Bteghrine (, a misusulat muring Bteghrin ampong Btighrin) metung yang municipalidad king Matn (distritu) ning Mount Lebanon Governorate king Lebanon.

Daychounieh:
Daychounieh (also Al-Daychounieh) () is a village in Mount Lebanon, Lebanon. 
Ing Daychounieh (o kaya Al-Daychounieh) () metung yang nayun king Mount Lebanon, Lebanon.

Dhour El Choueir:
Ing Dhour El Choueir () metung yang balen king kabundukan king Lebanon (ing 'dhour' mangabaldugan yang 'taluktuk o babo bunduk'). Makabanda yang bagia king pangulu ning manimunang dalan manibat Beirut papunta Damascus ("Beirut Damascus highway"). 
Metung ya kareng pekasikat a bakasiunan a pang-kaleldo king Mount Lebanon. Pikabaluan ya ing Dhour El-Choueir king carnaval banua-banua, nung nu ro kikilalanan deng tau Lebanon a minalis kareng aliwang lugal. 
Metung ya kareng karinan da reng labanan kanitang Gerang Sibil ning Lebanon.

Matn (distritu):
Ing Matn (Arabic: قضاء المتن, translit: Qada' el Matn), a misusulat muring Metn, metung yang distritu ("qadaa") king Mount Lebanon Governorate ning Lebanon, king aslagan ning Beirut, ing tungku o capitoliu ning bangsa. Ing Jdeideh ing tungku ning distritu. 
Keraklan, ausan de muring Distritu ning Pangulung Matn o "Northern Matn District" (Arabic: قضاء المتن الشماليtranslit: Qada' el Matn ash Shimali), ba reng e apagkamalian king Mauling Matn o "Southern Matn" (Arabic: المتن الجنوبيtranslit: Al Matn al Janoubi), a kayabe king Baabda (distritu). 

Jdeideh:
Ing "Jdeideh (Arabic:"جديده"), a misusulat muring Jdayde, o Jdaideh"', metung yang municipalidad king bebe dayatmalat king Lebanon a maki lapad a manga 6 km² at atiu kareng pangulu nang karulun ("suburbs") ning lakanbalen o ciudad ning Beirut. Bibilugan de reng nayun ning Jdeidet El Matn, Al Bouchrieh and Sadd Al Bouchrieh, at maki populasiun yang alus 150,000 memalen.
Metung yang maulagang lugal a industrialisadu ing Jdeideh, at dakal a negosiu ampong bancu keti.

Bréville-les-Monts:
Bréville-les-Monts is a commune in the Calvados department in the Basse-Normandie region in northwestern France.
Ing Bréville-les-Monts metung yang commune ning Calvados "département", king Basse-Normandie "labuad" king pangulungalbugan France.

Caen:
Ing Caen () metung yang commune ning Calvados "département", king Basse-Normandie "labuad" king pangulungalbugan France.
Iti ing prefecture na ning Calvados departamentu ampong tungku (kabisera) na ning Basse-Normandie labuad. Atiu king makaplub a gabun iba tkeng English Channel.
Ing Caen bantug ya kareng kayang maamlat a pakatalakad megawa inyang pamanungkulan nang William the Conqueror, nung nu keti ya mikutkut, ampo ning Pamipmauk para keng Caen (Battle for Caen)—maigpit ing labanan keti at king makapligid ning Caen inyang Labanan king Normandy inyang 1944, nung nu alus mesira ya ing mabilug a balen.

James Alan Abrahamson:
I James Alan Abrahamson (mibait Mayu 19, 1933) metung yang megretirung general, a mitulduan a astronaut, director na ning Strategic Defense Initiative Organization, ampong maluid a mangalakal a punmakaluluk na ning Oracle ampong punmakalukluk ning GeoEye inalkus ne ing cumpania bilang pekamaragul diling space imaging corporation. 

Buzz Aldrin:
I Buzz Aldrin (mibait Edwin Eugene Aldrin, Jr., Eneru 20, 1930) metung yang inyeru (engineer), megretirung United States Air Force pilotu ampong astronaut at iya ing pilotu ning Lunar Module ning "Apollo 11", ing mumunang pangatalpak keng bulan. Iya ingpangaduang tau a tinalpak keng bulan,kaibat ning kayang mission commander Neil Armstrong, nung nu iya ing minunang dili.

Camelina:
Ing Camelina metung yang genus kilub da reng maniampagang tanaman a familia Brassicaceae. Metung a species, iyapin ing "Camelina sativa", metung a maamlat ampong metung a maulagang tanaman a laru.
Biodiesel.
Ing US State a Montana kapilan pamu parakal nong parakal karelang paragulan at sisesen a camelina para agamit da bilang biofuel ampong bio-lubricant. 
I Jack Brown, metung a scientist kareng tanaman king University of Idaho, panigralan nala dening susulput a biodiesel.
Great Plains - The Camelina Company began research efforts with camelina over 10 years ago. They are currently contracting with growers throughout the U.S. and Canada to grow camelina for biodiesel production.

Camelina sativa:
Ing Camelina sativa, kebaluan keng English bilang camelina, gold-of-pleasure, o kaya false flax, neng misan wild flax, linseed dodder, German sesame, ampong Siberian oilseed, metung yang maniampagang tanaman (flowering plant) keng familiang Brassicaceae nung nu kayabe la reng mustasa, repolyu, rapeseed, broccoli, cauliflower, kale, brussels sprouts. Katutubu ya king Pangulung Europa ampo king Kalibutarang Asia, dapot dela de king Pangulung America, mapaliaring bilang weed keng flax.

Cardoon:
Ing cardoon ("Cynara cardunculus"), mayayus ya naman keng English artichoke thistle, cardone, cardoni, carduni o kaya cardi, metung yang balamu thistle a tanaman nung nu kayanib ya keng familia Aster, Asteraceae; (o archaic: Daisy familia, Compositae). Kabud nia mu daragul a kalupa da species da reng Globe artichoke, ar dakal ya mialiwang saskulan da. Katutubu ya keng Mediterranean, nung nu meging matunud ya king mumunang panaun.

Copaifera langsdorffii:
Ing pundutung a Copaifera langsdorffii kebaluan bilang diesel pundutung ampongkerosene pundutung. Dakal ya lagiu kareng katutubung amanu, kayabe no reng kupa'y, cabismo, ampong copaúva. 
Biodiesel gamit.
Iti papalual yang dakal a terpene hydrocarbon king kayang dutung ampong bulung. Metung a pundutung makapalual yang 30 anggang 53 litru a hydrocarbon balang banua, kabilugana a hectaria papalual yang 10,000 - 12,000 litru/hectaria/banua[http://www.abc.net.au/news/stories/2008/03/25/2198815.htm] nung nu iti matas yang tutu. Ing laru makakua kapamilatan ning pamagparaya kaniti. Ing pun compound atiu keng laru iyapin ing copaiba, anpomg oleoresin nung nu magagamit ya keng pamipalual da reng gamit a aantimo ing lacquer at kaibat maliari yang gamitan bilang biodiesel. Ing pundutung iya mu ring pikuanan copaene, aliwa pang terpene.
Gamit bilang dutung.
Ing dutung maliari yang silaban bilang panangab o kaya keng pamaanluagi (pangarpinteru).
Gamit Panulu.
Ing tanaman magagamit ya bilang panulu kareng dakala bage.

Garcinia acutifolia:
Ing Garcinia acutifolia metung yang a maniampagang tanaman kareng Clusiaceae familia.
Mayayakit ya iti king Mozambique ampong Tanzania.

Joseph M. Acaba:
I Joseph Michael "Joe" Acaba (mibait Mayu 17, 1967 king Inglewood, California) metung yang talturu, hydrogeologist, ampong NASA astronaut. Inyag Mayu 2004 iya ing meging mumunang tau a Puerto Rican a penibatan a meging NASA astronaut candidatu, inyang mepili ya bilang kayanib ning NASA Astronaut Training Group 19. Agampanan ne ing kayang pamagensayu inyang Pebreru 10, 2006 at mitulduan ya keng STS-119, nung nu sinulapo ya manibat Marsu 15 anggang Marsu 28, 2009 para idala na la reng tauling makatakdang solar arrays keng International Space Station.

Loren Acton:
I Loren Wilber Acton (mibait Marsu 7, 1936) metun yang Americanung physicist nung nu sinulapo ya keng Space Shuttle mission STS-51-F bilang Payload Specialist para keng Lockheed Palo Alto Research Laboratory.
I Acton mibait ya king Lewistown, Montana. Ikua ne ing kayang bachelor of science degree ibat king Montana State University inyang 1959, ampo ing Doctor of Philosophy king Solar Physics ibat king University of Colorado at Boulder inyang 1965.

William H. Dana:
I William Harvey "Bill" Dana metung yang megritirung NASA test pilotu ampong astronaut.
Carera.
I Dana mibait ya king Pasadena, California, Nobiembri 3, 1930, tinggap ne ing kayang Bachelor of Science degree ibat keng U.S. Military Academy inyang 1952 ampong sinuyu ya bilang pilotu kilub ning apat a banua keng U.S. Air Force. MIkiabe ya king NASA kaibat neng atanggap ing kayang Master of Science degree keng Aeronautical Engineering iabt keng University of Southern California inyang 1958.

Jan Davis:
I Nancy Jan Davis (mibait Nobiembri 1, 1953) dati yang Americanung astronaut. Vetranu ya kareng atlung space flights, i Dr. Davis atin yang maiggit a 673 oras a makatala king keng alapaap. I Dr. Davis ngeni retiru ne keng NASA.
Bie kayanakan.
She was born in Cocoa Beach, Florida, but considers Huntsville, Alabama, to be her hometown.

Karl Drais:
I Karl Drais (Abril 29, 1785 – Disiembri 10, 1851) metung yang Aleman talaimbentu ampong inimbentu ne ing Laufmaschine ("pupulaying makina"), at kaibat meyaus velocipede, "draisine" (English) o kaya "draisienne" (French), o kaya mirinan palayong, dandy horse. Iti meincopara ya ing aduang-parungang a prinsipiyu nung nu iti ing basehan ning bisikleta ampo ning motorciclu at iti ing meging umpisa ning de motor pamagluslus. Inimbentu niya naman ing mumunang typewriter a atin keyboard inyang 1821, at kaibat inalkus ne ing mumunang stenograph a makina, ampo ing magtipid-a-dutung a paglutu.

Johann Nikolaus von Dreyse:
I Johann Nikolaus von Dreyse (Nobiembri 20, 1787 - Disiembri 9, 1867) metung yang aleman a manimbentu kareng baril ampong iya mu rin ing gagawa kareti. Bantug ya king kayang pamipalual a "Needle gun" inyang 1836, nung nu iti imapun de ring Prussian ukbu para agamit inyang 1841 bilang Dreyse Zündnadelgewehr, o "Prussian Model 1849".

Ludwig Elsbett:
I Ludwig Elsbett (b. Nobiembri 8, 1913 king Salz, Lower Franconia/Germany - m. Marsu 28, 2003) iya ing menimbentu keng makinang Elsbett.
I Elsbett metung ya kareng siam a anak ning metung a ortelanuung i Viktor Elsbett ampo ing kayang asawang Maria. Dinagul ya keng asikan, dapot ensayu mumuna bilang talapanyus kareng kagamitan pangasikan. Kaitbat megaral ya kareng technical a pepagaralan ing Bad Frankenhausen ampong Neustrelitz para magaral mechanical engineering ampong aircraft engine at meging yang mechanical inhinyeru (engineer).

Friedrich von Esmarch:
I Johannes Friedrich August von Esmarch (Eneru 9, 1823 – Pebreru 23, 1908) metung yang aleman manopera (surgeon). Iya ing menalkus keng Esmarch bandage ampo iya ing mitatag keng "Deutscher Samariter-Verein", ing mumuna keng "Deutscher Samariter-Bund".

Adolf Eugen Fick:
I Adolf Eugen Fick (1 Abril 1828, king Kassel, Germany – 21 Agostu 1901, king Blankenberge, Flanders) metung yang Aleman a physiologist mitputung kaya ing menimbentu keng contact lenses. Ikua ne ing kayang doctorate king Marburg inyang 1851.

Friedrich Fischer:
I Friedrich Fischer (1849–1899) taga Schweinfurt, Aleman, mabibilang ya bilang Tatang ning makabayung ball bearing, uli ning pamanimbentu na keng prosesu keng milling standard bearings inyang 1883. 

Ubat:
Ing ubat ("gunpowder" o "black powder" king Ingles, "pólvora" king Castila) metung yang samut ning asupri, uling ampong salitre. Mabilis yang masisilab, at maglalang yang dakal a mapaling solidu ampong gas, a maliaring gamitan antimong propellant kareng baril ampong sangkap kareng labentador. Gagamitan de murin ing katayang "ubat" o "gunpowder" bang mangabaldugan king sanumang "propellant powder". E la gagamit king tradisiunal a ubat ("gunpowder" o "blackpowder") deng makabayung baril, nun e "smokeless powder". Den namang "antique" a baril o copia da reti, gagamit lang "black powder substitute". 
Gugrupu de o titinduk ing ubat antimong mainang pamakbung o "low explosive" uling king kayang mabagal a salusu ning pangalaso cumpara kareng aliwa, at uli na niti, mababang brisance. Mag-"deflagrate" la king salusung mas mababa king salusu ning katni ("subsonic speed") deng mainang pamakbung. Samantala, maglalang lang alun a mas masalusu king katni ("supersonic wave") deng masikan a pamakbung. Gagawa lang prisiun ("pressure") a makagiu ba yang pasulagpon ing balas, oneng e makagiu ba yang masira ing kaniun ning baril. Uli na niti, e bage ing ubat king pamagpamakbung king maragul a batu o kareng kuta, nung nukarin mas magamitan la reng mangasikan a pamakbung antimo ing deflagrateTNT.
External links.
enGunpowder

Gerhard Fischer (inventor):
I Gerhard Fisher menambag ya keng pamanalkus ning tatalnan gamat a paningutn bakal (metal detector).

Artur Fischer (inventor):
I Artur Fischer (mibati inyang Disiembri 31, 1919 king Tumlingen, Black Forest, Aleman) metung yang talaimbentu.
Peparegistru ne ing kayang mumunang patent inyang 1949 para keng Photo Flash Light, kambe ning (syncronised trigger). Manibat 1957 tinakda ne ing kayang isip kareng pamagkumpni kareng (elements). Ing kayang bantug a imbentu iyapin ing kule abung "S Plug" (Split-)Wallplug a gawang plastic a matirialis (Polyamide) at masasali ya kareng mialiwang aske ampong sukad manibat 1958 (lawen ya ing dowel). 

Paul Allen:
I Paul Gardner Allen (mibait Eneru 21, 1953) metung yang Americanung entrepreneur nung nu kambe nang Bill Gates mitatag keng Microsoft at metung ya kareng pekamakualtang tau keti yatu. 
Iya ing mitatag ampong chairman ning Vulcan Inc., nung nu iti privadu yang asset management a cumpania, ampong chairman ning Charter Communications. I Allen atin ya naman multi-billion dollar investment portfolio nung nu kayabe makataya keng Digeo, real estate holdings, ampong maiggit a 40 aliwang technology, media, ampong content a cumpania. I Allen iya mu rin ing mikibandi kareng atlung aliwang professional sports teams: ing Seattle Seahawks na ning National Football League, ing Portland Trail Blazers na ning National Basketball Association, ampo ing Seattle Sounders FC franchise keng Major League Soccer a megumpisang mamialung keng 2009 season.

Ward Christensen:
I Ward Christensen, mibait ya king West Bend, Wisconsin, U.S., iya ing mitatag keng CBBS bulletin board, ing mumunang bulletin board system (BBS) a mikabit keng online. Migumpisa yang menalkusinyang metung a blizzard king Chicago, Illinois, anmpong opisial a mitatag a CBBS kaibat ning apat a dominggu, iniang Pebreru 16, 1978.

Bram Cohen:
I Bram Cohen (mibait 1975) metung yang Americanung computer programmer, kebaluan bilang talasulat ning peer-to-peer (P2P) BitTorrent protocol, makanyan mu irn keng mumunang file sharing programa a gamitan ya ing protocol, kebaluan mu rin bilang BitTorrent. Kayabe ya kareng mitatag keng CodeCon, talapanayus keng San Francisco Bay Area P2P-hackers a pamitipun, ampong kayabe sinulat keng Codeville.

Alan Cooper:
I Alan Cooper, metung yang talapanustus ning interaction design, tatalan yang deseniung cumpania at susulat yangaklat (libru) nung makananung gawan ing software makarap talagamit (user interface) mas gamitan ya.
I Cooper neng misan mayayaus yang "tatang ning Visual Basic", agiang keraklan ning meobra keng Visual Basic gewa ne ning Microsoft a lupung da reng pangkilub a manalkus. I Cooper iya ing memuntukan o menimunu gulut ning VB 1.0 ampong menimuna keng pamangamit keng IDE para agamit ya ing GUI kapamilatan ning ausan dang makabalut a aus kareng system routines keng API (lawen ya ing Adapter pattern).
Ing mumuna nang programang Cooper meyaus lang "Tripod" at kaibat "Ruby". They were intended as more of an end-user tool, but development at Microsoft led to Visual Basic becoming a tool for programmers instead.

Abánades:

Lawen ya rin.
Tala da reng balen ning Guadalajara (Espanya)

Dakal Pang Balita Agostu 09:
Ing labuad Kapampangan mika bayu yang Ari ning Parnaso at Prinsipe ning Parnaso. Mikaalalan inyang milabasan a Agostu 8 2008 king Center for Kapampangan Studies, Holy Angel University king Lakanbalen Angeles.
Ing bayung Ari ning Parnaso iyapin ing kakamalkamalan a Aring Renato Alzadon, at ing bayung prinsipe iyapin ing makamal a Principe Romeo Rodriguez. Ding labing walung poeta laureadu mipulungpulung la para pilinan de ing karelang maging ari ampong prinsipe ning 
Parnaso. Deting poeta laureado ikua re ing karelang putung a gintung laureado kapamilatan ning pamanyambut keng ligligan keng poesia o kaya keng pamananggap da reng kalupa dang poeta laureado. Deting labing walung areti deng aliwa kayabe la keng 
Aguman ding Talasulat Kapampangan (Agtaka), deng aliwa keng Aguman Buklud Kapampangan, at deng mitagan keng Akademya ning Amanung Sisuan International (Anasi).
Detang minunang Ari ning Parnaso, Amado Yuzon ampong Jose Gallardo, mituringan lang Ari kapamilatan ning pepasiag dang pamananggap da reng poeta laureado kabang ing pangatlu I Vedasto Ocampo, kapamilatan ning ligligan.
I Josie Henson, pamuntuk ning Akademyang Kapampangan, sinuyu ya bilang Talaganap ning Seremonyas, kambe nang Lord Francis Musni ning Holy Angel University ampong Alma Luz Canlas ning Angeles University Foundation bilang Mumunang and Kaduang Talamasid, mitutuki.

Boadella d'Empordà:
Ing Boadella i les Escaules metung yang municipalidad king "comarca" ning Alt Empordà, Girona, Catalonia, Espania. Ing dating lagiung Boadella d'Empordà, miyalilan ya inyang 2004 inyang ing balen a Les Escaules miyabe ya keng Boadella d'Empordà. Atiu keng saug ning ilug Muga, at sebatan deng gabun a meging Boadella reservoir, a meging touristang pangakit, at para makapagpalual a hydroelectric power.

Atiu king East Bay labuad ning San Francisco Bay Area keng dane ning San Joaquin-Sacramento River Delta, metung yang suburb ning San Francisco ampong Oakland. Ing kayang populasiun 90,532 inyang 2000 census.

Concord, California:
Ing Concord (; dati, Drunken Indian ampong Todos Santos) iya ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen king Contra Costa County, California, USA, ampong pang202 pekamaragul diling keng U.S. Agpang keng 2000 census, ing lakanbalen atin yang populasiun a 121,780. Mumunang mitatag inyang 1869 bilang communidad ning Todos Santos neng Salvio Pacheco, ing lagiu miyalilan yang Concord kilub namu ning pilan bulan. 

Richmond, California:
Ing Richmond () metung yang lakanbalen king albugan Contra Costa County, California, United States. Atiu king East Bay, dake ning San Francisco Bay Area.

Santa Clara, California:
Ing Santa Clara, California (), mitatag ya inyang 1777 ampong meincorporate ya inyang 1852, metung yang lakanbalen king Santa Clara County, king U.S. state ning California. Ing lakanbalen iya ing karinan ning pangwalung ning 21 California missions, Mission Santa Clara de Asís, at miplagyuan ya kaibat da reng mission.

Belmont, California:
Ing Belmont metung yang lakanbalen king San Mateo County, California, United States. Atiu king San Francisco Bay Area, aitu banda king libutad ning San Francisco Telapulu pilatan ning San Mateo ampong San Carlos. Dati yang kadake ning Rancho de las Pulgas, nung nu ing metung nang pundalan, iyapin ing Alameda de las Pulgas, nu ya pilagyuan Ingkayang populasiun 25,123 ya inyang 2000 census.

Dublin, California:
Ing Dublin (dati, Amador ampong Dougherty's Station) metung yang lakanbalen king East (San Francisco) Bay region ningAlameda County, California, United States. Atiu keng pangulung dake ning Interstate 580 king salapungan ning Interstate 680, mga aslagan ning Hayward, 6 milia albugan ning Livermore ampong pangulu ning San Jose. Ing pekamalapit a maragul metropolitan a karinan iyapin ing Oakland, mga keng albugan-pangulungalbugan ning Interstate 580. Uli na niti ing Dublin kebaluan ya bilang "salapungan (crossroads)" ya keng Bay Area. Atin yang 46,000 a populasiun agpang keng tantia ning state ning California. 
Ikua ne ing lagiu na keng lakanbalen ning Dublin king Ireland.
