Ing Calpmetung yang municipalidad king 'comarca' ning Marina Alta, Valencian Communidad, Espania.

Castell de Castells:
Ing Castell de Castells metung yang malating nayun king matas a bunduk ning Marina Alta keng Costa Blanca king Mauling Aslagan Espania. Ing nayun iya ing panibatan ning Rio Jalon ampong makapadurut ya kareng mapilan a mangasanting a bunduk. Mga 12 km ya manibat keng pekamalapit a nayun ning Benigembla ampong mga 20 km keng Jalón ing pekamalapit diling maragul a balen. Mga metung yang oras a luslus kareng pampang na ning Fuentes de Algar ampong Terra Mítica theme park. Karin mu rin atilu ding lungib ning Vall d'Ebo ampong Benidoleig. 

Agoura Hills, California:
Ing Agoura Hills metung yang lakanbalen (me-incorporate iyang 1982) king Los Angeles County, California, at atin yang ZIP code 91301. Ing kayang populasiun 20,537 ya inyang 2000 census. Ing lakanbalen atiu keng Ventura Freeway (U.S. Route 101) ding kayang sepu ilapin deng county ning Los Angeles keng aslagan, albugan ampong mauli ampong keng Ventura County keng pangulu. Mga 30 milia ya pangulungalbugan ning Downtown Los Angeles ampong kulang ya keng 10 milia albugan ning Los Angeles Lakanbalen a danggut (Woodland Hills), at atiu keng aslagan ning Conejo Saug. Ing Agoura atiu mu rin siping ning Calabasas, Malibu, Oak Park, ampong Westlake Village.
<left></left>

Edward Lhuyd:
I Edward Lhuyd (; a neng kai misusulat a "Llwyd" ngening panaun tamu) (1660 – Junio 30, 1709) metung yang Welsh a naturalista, botanist, matenakan king amanu, geographer ampong antiquary.
Mibait ya king Loppington, Shropshire, at anak ne king kilual Edward Lloyd ning Llanforda, Oswestry kang Bridget Pryse ning Llan-ffraid, malapit king Talybont, Ceredigion. Megaral ya at tinuru king Oswestry Grammar School. Metung ya kareng suging familia ning mauli--albugang Gales o Wales; lipat ning matua ne karin ing familia na, e ya mabandi, at sinubuk yang linub king agricultura ampong industria i tata na, ania abalu ne ing bayung ciencia ning panaun a ita. Megaral yang grammar school king Oswestry, at sindu na iti king Jesus College, Oxford, dapot tinuknang ya bayu ya miyari. Aniang 1684, mituldu yang pakaladua ("assistant") nang Robert Plot, ing Keeper ning Ashmolean Museum, at elilan ne king puestung iti aniang 1690; menatili ya keti anggang 1709. 
Kabang magobra ya king Ashmolean, dakal ing gewa nang biahi. Uli ning pamamunta na king Snowdonia aniang 1688, abalangkas ne para kang John Ray ing "Synopsis Methodica Stirpium Britannicorum", metung a listaan da reng tanaman a tubu king labuad o rehion a ita. Kaibat ning 1697, minta ya i Lhuyd king balang county o condado king Wales, at kaibat miglakbe ya king Escocia, Irlandia, Cornwall, ampong Brittany, at saka king Isle of Man. Aniang 1699, kapamilatan ning ambag ibat king kaluguran nang i Isaac Newton, linimbag ne ing 'Lithophylacii Britannici Ichnographia", metung a catalogo da reng fossil a metipun kareng lugal padurut king Inglaterra, keraklan king Oxford, at mayayakit na ngeni king Ashmolean. 
Aniang tauli nang dake ning ka-17 a dilanua o siglu, lepitan de i Lhuyd ning metung a grupu da reng talapanigaral ("scholars"), a panimunan nang John Keigwin ning Mousehole, a gugusal para king pamanatili na ampong paniulung ning amanung Cornish, at tinggap ne ing pamanagkat bang munta king Cornwall bang manigaral king amanu. Megi neng paksa ning pamanigaral nang Lhuyd ing Early Modern Cornish, at melimbag ya ing kayang obra aniang 1702. Aliwa ya iti king amanu aniang Edad Media ("medieval") uling mas simpli ing kayang gramatica ampong pangabalangkas. 
Pigkalubanan neng MA "honoris causa" ning University of Oxford i Lhuyd aniang 1701, at meyalal yang Fellow of the Royal Society kanitang 1708. Mete ya uling king pleurisy king Oxford i Lhuyd aniang 1709.
Pekilagiu re kaya ing Snowdon lily o "Lloydia serotina", ampo ing Cymdeithas Edward Llwyd, ing National Naturalists' Society of Wales. 
Ibat ya kaya ing mumunang pamaglarawan a cientifico ampong pamamie lagiu ning ngeni balu tamung dinosaur: ing ipan ning sauropod a "Rutellum implicatum" (Delair and Sarjeant, 2002).

Newark, California:
Ing Newark metung yang lakanabalen king Alameda County, California, United States. me-incorporate ya bilang lakanbalen inyang Septiembri 1955. Ing Newark metung yang enclave, ganap yang makapadurut kareng lakanbalen ning Fremont. 42,471 ya ing kayang populasiun inyang 2000 census. Ing California State Departamentu ning Finance tatantian ne ing populasiun ning Newark a 44,035 ya inyang Eneru 2009.

Piedmont, California:
Ing Piedmont metung yang malating karinan da reng atinan a lakanbalen king Alameda County, California, United States. Makapadurut ya kareng lakanbalen ning Oakland. 10,952 ya ing kayang populasiun 2000 census. Ing Piedmont metung ya kareng "25 Matas-Panakitan a Balen" agpang keng CNN Money Magazine's list of 'The Best Places to Live inyang 2007 at milagyuan ya naman "Pekamasanting a Karinan a Tuknangnan (Best Place To Live)" keng United States inyang 2007 agapang keng Forbes.

Sunnyvale, California:
Ing Sunnyvale ( or ) metung yang lakanbalen king Santa Clara County, California, United States. Metung yang pun lakanbalen kareng bibilug keng Saug ning Silicon (Silicon Valley). Agpang keng 2000 census, ing lakanbalen atin yang populasiun a 131,760.

Vallejo, California:
Ing Vallejo ( or keng English; keng matuang amanung Espanyol) ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen king Solano County, California, United States. Ing kayang populaisun 116,760 ya agpang keng 2000 census. Atiu keng San Francisco Bay Area keng pangulungaslagan a pamapng ning San Pablo Bay. Ing Vallejo mipalagiu ya kang General Mariano Guadalupe Vallejo.

Castro Valley, California:
Ing Castro Saug (Castro Valley) metung yang census-designated place (CDP) king Alameda County, California, United States. Agpang keng 2000 census, panglima yang pekamarakal a populasiun a unincorporated karinan king California, ampong pang23 keng United States.
Ing Castro Valley atin yang mapilan a baleng gawa nang Eichler.

Benicia, California:
Ing Benicia metung yang lakanbalen a makalele keng danuman king Solano County, California, United States. Iti ing mumunang lakanbalen king California a tetag da reng Anglo-Americans, at sinuyu bilang state tungku (kabisera) kng alus labing-atlung bulan manibat 1853 anggang 1854. 26,865 ya ing kayang populasiun agpang keng 2000 census. Ing lakanbalen atiu keng San Francisco Bay Area king pangulung pampang ning Carquinez Strait. Ing Benicia atsu mu keng aslagan ning Vallejo sumangid ning matulid (strait) ibat Martinez. 

Campbell, California:
Ing Campbell () metung yang lakanbalen king Santa Clara County, California, metung a suburb ning San Jose dake ning Silicon Saug, king San Francisco Bay Area. Agpang inyang 2007 ing populasiun a tantia, ing populasiun ning Campbell 39,200 ya. Agiang eya pu keng matas-a-technology a lakanbalen kalupa da ring kayang siping, ing Campbell iya ing tal a balen ning eBay ampo ing kayang talalang i Pierre Omidyar.

Cupertino, California:
Ing Cupertino () metung yang suburb a lakanbalen king Santa Clara County, California, U.S., mismung albugan ning San Jose king albugan danggut ning Saug ning Santa Clara a atin dake mamamngga king bitis ning talimunduk na ning Santa Cruz Bulubundukin. 50,546 ya ing kayang populasiun inyang 2000 census. 

Danville, California:
Ing Balen ning Danville aitu keng San Ramon Saug king Contra Costa County, California. Metung ya iti kareng incorporated municipalidad king California a gagamit "balen" king kayang lagiu imbes na "lakanbalen". Ing kayang populasiun 41,715 ya inyang 2008. Ing Danville metung yang suburb ning Oakland ampong San Francisco kareng mabandi.

Aslagang Palo Alto:
Ing East Palo Alto (keraklan kukuyaran yang EPA) metung yang lakanbalen king San Mateo County, California, United States. 
Agpang keng 2000 census, ing populasiun ning East Palo Alto 29,506 ya (31,915: 2003 tantia). atiu keng San Francisco Telapulu, mga libutad pilatan ding lakanbalen ning San Francisco ampong San Jose. Ing East Palo Alto makadake ya kareng apat Misisiping a puruk.== Dalerayan==

Alor Setar:

George Town, Penang:

Foster City, California:
Ing Foster Lakanbalen metung yang makiagiung meayus a lakanbalen (planned city) atiu keng San Mateo County, California, 94404. Agpang keng 2000 census, ing lakanbalen atin yang populasiun a 28,803. Ing Foster Lakanbalen Foster neng misan mabibilang yang dake ning Silicon Saug (Silicon Valley) uli ning kayang industria ampo uli ning makalapit ya kareng lakanbalen ning Silicon Saug.
Deng cumpaniang atin pun-opisina king Lakanbalen ning Foster:

Gilroy, California:
Ing Gilroy () iya ing peka[ng lakanbalen keng Santa Clara County, California, United States, ampo keng San Francisco Bay Area. Ing kayang populasiun 41,464 ya apgang keng 2000 census. Ing Gilroy kebaluan ya kareng kayang bawang; ing Gilroy Garlic Festival a maliliari banua-banua a papakit do reng mialiwang gawnag bawang kayabe ne ing bawang a ice cream. Ing Gilroy papalual ya naman dakal a payungpayungan. Ing palayo ning Gilroy iyapin ing "Tungkung Bawang ning Yatu(Garlic Capital of the World)," agiang ing Gilroy aliwa ing manimuna keng pamapaglual karas keng bawang. 

Garden angelica:
Ing Garden Angelica ("Angelica archangelica"; syn. "Archangelica officinalis" Hoffm., "Archangelica officinalis" "var." "himalaica" C.B.Clarke) metung yang mataduang-banuang tanaman ibat kareng familing umbelliferous Apiaceae. Ding aliwang pang lagiu keng English ilapin deng "Holy Ghost, Wild Celery", and "Norwegian angelica" 

Basil:
Ing Basil ("Ocimum basilicum") ( o ), ning Familiang Lamiaceae (mints), metung yang mabayang mababang-daragul a herb.
Ing Basil magagamit ya kareng pamaglutu kareng Italian cuisine, ampo kareng Southeast Asian cuisine ning Thailand, Vietnam, Cambodia, ampong Laos. Ing tanaman balamu lalasa yang anise, a atin masikan, mapakla, mayumung bau. 

Ocimum tenuiflorum:
Ing Ocimum tenuiflorum (mayayaus mu rin tulsi, tulasī (तुलसी‌) keng Sanskrit,(तुलसी‌) keng Nepali, (‌তুলসী) keng Bangla, (तुळस) keng Marathi, (तुलसी‌) keng Hindi, "tulasi" (తులసి) keng Telugu, (തുളസി) keng Malayalam, (துளசி) keng Tamil, (ತುಳಸಿ) keng Kannada, Maduruthala keng Sinhalese) metung yang mabanglung tanaman keng familiang Lamiaceae. Matulid ya talakad ampong masanga yang tanaman 30-60 cm katas ampong mabulbul ya tangke ampong katamtamtaman ya sumangid a aluntiang a bulung a masikan ya bau. Deng bulung atin lang petioles, ampong paovate, anggang mga 5 cm kaba, keraklan mika balamu mgalating ipan. Ding sampaga anti la mong mebugbug a kule pakaba lang racemes king malapit a (whorls). Atin aduang pung a morphotype a masese king India—aluntiang-bulung (Sri o kaya Lakshmi tulsi) ampong bugbug kule bulung (Krishna tulsi). Atin mu rin aliwa a pinduan ning "Ocimum tenuiflorum" a magagamit keng pamaglutu kareng Thai, at madalerayan yang bilang Thai holy basil, o kha phrao (กะเพรา)—e dapat mababligo keng "Thai Basil", a pinduan ning "Ocimum basilicum".

Thai basil:
Ing Thai basil metung yang cultivar lupung (group) ning basil. Mas kapansinpansin ing kayang lasa nung lulupa me kareng aliwang mayumu lasang basil. Ing herb atin yang malating bulung, bugbug kule tanke, at atin yang lasang antimong mint. Metung a cultivar a magagamit keng United States iyapin ing 'Ari ning Siam (Queen of Siam)'.
Lawen ya rin.
List of basil cultivars

Bay leaf:
Ing Bay leaf, Laurel keng Kapampangan makarikil ya keng mabanglung bulung a Bay Laurel (Laurus nobilis, Lauraceae). Sariwa o pepalanging bulung ila reng magagamit keng pamaglutu para keng malasa ampong mabanglung pamangan da reng Mexicanu, ing metung a alimbawa iyapin ing Dalagang Bukid (Red Snapper Veracruzana). Deng bulung keraklan magagamit la keng panyabo, pangmenudu o kaya pangcalderata. Deng sariwang bulung keraklan maina lang bagia at ela masikansikan a lasa nunge mu kaibat ning marakaldakal a duminggu pang milabas kaibat lang meagtal ampong mipalangi.

Bolivian Coriander:
Ing Bolivian coriander metung yang tanaman nung nu ding kayang bulung maliari lang gamitan panyangkap a mamie karagdagan a lasa kareng pamangan. Ing kayang lasa mamilatan ka reng arugula, cilantro ampong rue." Ing tanaman keraklan daragul ya king Mexico ampong Mauling America para gamit keng salsa. Daragul ya anggang mga 5' keng katas at 3' a sukad bilug.

Chives:
Ing Chives ("Allium schoenoprasum") ila reng pekamalating species na ning sibuyas family Ing Alliaceae, katutubu ya Europa, Asia ampong Pangulung America. Iti mayayagkas ya mu keng pangmarakalan, pauli ning daragul lamu bilang punggulpunggul kesa keng tunggal a tanaman. Ing "Allium schoenoprasum" iay kabud a specie ning "Allium" katutubu kareng balang Bayu (New) ampong Matuang Yatu (Old World).

Ongsoy:
Ing ongsoy ("Coriandrum sativum"), a mayayaus cilantro king Castila, ampong cilantro, Chinese parsley o dhania king Ingles, metung yang banwahan a yerba king familia Apiaceae. Katutubu ya ing ongsoy kareng labuad a manibat king mauling Europa ampong pangulung Africa angga king mauling albugang Asia. Metung yang malambat a tanaman a daragul anggang katas. Miyayaliwa la tabas deng bulung, oneng keraklan katabas lang balugbug ("lobed") king pun ning tanaman, at payat la ampong mala-pakpak o bulbul banda kareng tangkeng manyampaga. Makabili la reng sampaga kareng mangalating umbel, a maputi o maputlang rosas, a e mitutulid tabas white or very pale pink, ("asymmetrical"), a maki petal a makaturu padayu king umbel a mas makaba (5–6 mm) kesa kareng makaturu kaniti (1–3 mm mu kakaba). Mabilug ya ing bunga, a malanging schizocarp a kalapad. Lipat ning kakanan dong dili ra deng butul, gagamitan da la ring pampalasa deti, o pamulug do kayabe da reng aliwang pamangan.

Curry Tree:
Ing Pun Dutung a Curry o kaya "Karivepaku" ,Karivepallai o Kadipatta () ("Murraya koenigii"; syn. "Bergera koenigii, Chalcas koenigii") metung yang tropical anggang sub-tropical pun dutung king familia Rutaceae, a katutubu king India. Papalual yang bulung a ausan dang bulung Curry o kaya Sweet Neem leaves. 

Dill:
Ing Dill ("Anethum graveolens") metung yang makuyad a bieng perennial herb. Iti ya kabud a specie ning genus "Anethum", agiang maka pinduan yang kareng mapilan a botanists a kasapning genus bilang "Peucedanum graveolens" (L.) C.B.Clarke.

Lavandula angustifolia:
Ing Lavandula angustifolia (mayayaus mu rin "Lavandula spica" o "Lavandula vera"; kareng amanung English bilang common lavender, true lavender, o kaya English lavender (agiang e ya katutubu king England); dati "L. officinalis") metung yang manyampagang tanaman keng familaing Lamiaceae, katutubu keng albugang Mediterranean labuad, lalunglaluna king Pyrenees ampong aliwang bunduk king pangulung Espania.
Pamandagul.
Masikan ya bau ing tanaman a iti daragul yang mga 1–2 m katas. Deng bulung ma-aluntiang lang ma-aluntiang, 2–6 cm kaba ampong 4–6 mm lapad. Deng sampaga malare-ube la kule (lavender-kule), a atin tusuktusuk 2–8 cm kaba king karelang malatingting, a alang bulung a tangke 10–30 cm kaba.

Cymbopogon:
Ing Cymbopogon (lemongrass) metung yang genus kareng mga 55 specie ning dikut, katutubu kareng katamtaman ampong mapaling labuad ning Matuang Yatu (Old World) ampong Oceania. Matas yang perennial a dikut. Ding kayang pangkaraniwan a lagiu ilapin deng lemon grass, lemongrass, barbed wire grass, silky heads, citronella grass, fever grass o Hierba Luisa at dakal pang aliwa.
Gamit.
Ing Lemon grass katutubu ya India.
Magagamit yang maralas bilang herb kareng Asian a pamaglutu. Atin yang lasang maslam anti mong kalamunding at maliari yang palangian ampong gawan anti mong pulbus o kaya gamitan sariwa o kayagtalagtal.
Ing Lemon grass pangkaraniwan yang magagamit keng tsa, sabo, ampong currie. Makabage ya kareng manuk, ampong asan danum. Magagamit yang maralas bilang tsa kareng Africanu ampong Latinu Americanung bangsa ("antinmo", Togo, Mexico, DR Congo). 
Keng pamanyalugsug ikit da ing lemon grass a agta atin yang panglaban-fungas a katangian.
Ing Citronella Grass ("Cymbopogon nardus" ampong "Cymbopogon winterianus") wawangis ya keng mesabing specie babo dapot daragul yang 2 m katas ampong atin yang malutung keng lalam ning tanke. Denig specie magagamit la keng pamipalual ning citronella laru, nung nu magagamit ya kareng sabun, bilang panapus kareng insectu kareng insect panispray ampong kandila ampo keng pampanbanglu bau, a bantug king Bintan, Indonesia. Ing pun laman a pangchemical ning citronella, geraniol ampong citronellol, pangantiseptics la, inya magagamit la keng bale bilang paglakoinfection ampong magagamit la bilang sabun. Bukud keng pamangawang laru, ing dikut citronella magagamit ya keng pamaglutu, keng tsa ampong pandagdag lasa keng pamangan.
Panglaban cancer.
Inyang 2006 a pamanyalugsug a lupung manibat keng Ben Gurion University king Israel ikit da ing Lemon grass (cymbopogon citratus) mika apoptosis (programmed cell death) kareng makamateng cancer cells. Agpang kareng talasalugsug a lupung ing citral iya ing bage a makamate kareng cancer cells para paten de ing karelang sarili. Ikit da iti ing agagawa ning citral kareng alang sirang cells ampng makamateng cancer cells a peparagul da keng petri dish. Ing dakal a midagdag keng concentrate katumbas ne ning metung a tasa a metung a gramu a lemon grass keng mapaling danum. Agiang ing citral pete no reng cancer cells, pepaburen no retang masaleseng cells a ela ninanu. Iting ikit da mengapamulala la reng talasalugsug.

Marjoram:
Ing Marjoram ("Origanum majorana", Lamiaceae) mediu masikan ya panamdam keng dimla a pilmihan a yerba ("perennial herb") at atin lasang mayumuyumung pine ampong malakalamunding a lasa. Mayayaus ya naman keng amanung English bilang Sweet Marjoram (mayumung Marjoram) o Knotted Marjoram ampong "Majorana hortensis".
Ing lagiung marjoram (Matuang French majorane, Medieval Latin majorana) eya menibat mismu keng katayang Latin a "maior" (major). Ing Marjoram katutubu ya keng Mediterranean karinan at kebaluan ya kareng Greigu ampong Romanu bilang symbulu ning kaligayan
Ing Marjoram sasakulan de uli ning kayang mabanglung bulung, aluntiang (bubut) o pepalangi man, para keng pamaglutung sangkan; ing babo tangke pupututan de kabang magumpisa yang manyampaga at saka de palangian bagabagia keng makasalilung. Magagamit yang maralas kambe da reng aliuang herbs antimo reng Herbes de Provence ampong Za'atar.

Lech Wałęsa:
I Lech Wałęsa (:; mibait 29 Septiembri 1943) metung yang Polish politicu ampong dating trade union ampong human rights activista. Metung ya kareng mitatag keng Solidarity ("Solidarność"), ing Soviet bloc's mumunang timawang trade union, sinambut a Nobel Peace Prize inyang 1983, ampong sinuyu bilang Pamuntuk ning Poland manibat 1990 anggang 1995.
Talambie.
I Wałęsa mibait ya king Popowo, Poland, inyang 29 Septiembri 1943, keng anluagi (carpinteru) ampong keng kayang asawa. Megaral yang keng mababang pipagaralan ampong keng pangvocational a pipagaralan, bayu ya linib keng Lenin Shipyard king Gdańsk ("Stocznia Gdańska im. Lenina", ngeni "Stocznia Gdańska") bilang electrical technician inyang 1970. Inyang 1969 inasawa ne i Danuta Gołoś, at ngeni deng miyasawa atin lang walung anak. Ing kayang anaka a lalaki iJarosław Wałęsa kanib ya keng Sejm ning Poland (mababang bale ning Polish parliament). I Lech Wałęsa metung yang saradung Romanu Catholicu, at masasambitla na ing kayang kasalapantayanan sinopan ne ing kayang sarili inyang panaun ning kasakitan kareng Aniban (Soldarity).

Confucius:
I Confucius (, o ), " ( Septiembri 28, 551 B.C.E. – 479 B.C.E.) metung yang Isik talaisip ampong pangaguman philosopu, nung nu ing kayang tuturung philosopu ayasag nong malalam deng Isik, Koreanu, Japon ampong Vietnamese keng pamisip ampong bie.

Deir el Qamar:
Ing Deir el Qamar (king Arabu دير القمر, a mangabaldugang ""Monasterio ning Bulan"") metung yang bariu o nayun king mauli-kalibudtang Lebanon, limang kilometru kilual ning Beiteddine, a bibilugan da reng baleng batung maki bubungan a gawa king malutung tisa. Kanitang ka-16 anggang ka-18 a dilanua o siglu, ing Deir el Qamar ing tuknangan da reng gobernador ning Lebanon. Pikabaluan ya murin king ka-15 a dilanuang Fakhreddine Mosque, Palaciong Fakhreddine II, ampong aliwang makasalesayang palacio ampong gusaling pangkapanibalan. Aniang kasikatan na, ing lakanbalen o ciudad ing centro ning tradiciong pangkasulatan (pang-malagung paniulat) ning Lebanon. Iti ing minunang nayun ning Lebanon a mika municipalidad, kanitang 1864, at keti la mibait deng dakal a sikat a tau, alimbawa kilalang artista ("artists"), talasulat, ampong politico.

Marjayoun:
Ing Marjayoun (Arabu مرجعيون, ampong Marj 'Ayoun, Marjuyun o Marjeyoun - mangabaldugang "karikutan da reng sibul") ing matuang balen a Romanu ning Caesarea Philippi. Ngeni, metung yang balen ning Lebanon ampong distritung pangkapanibalan, ing Marjeyoun (Distritu), king Nabatieh Governorate king Mauling Lebanon. 
Masanting ya katatalakaran ing Marjeyoun king metung a talimunduk a makayarap king Bunduk Hermon king Aslagan, ing Castillo ning Beaufort, ing castillo da reng Crusader a 1000 nang banua katua king babo ning Ilug Litani at babatio king babo ning Bunduk Amel (Jabal Amel) king Albugan, deng taluktuk ning Rihan ampong Niha ampo reng aliwa king kabundukan ning Bunduk Lebanon king Pangulu ampo reng matabang kapatagan ning Marjeyoun a papunta king mauli kareng kapatagan ning Galilee ampo reng Golan Heights. Mayayakit ya king Marjayoun ing Catedral nang San Pedro

Beiteddine:
Ing Beit ed-Dine (king Arabu بيت الدين, a mangabaldugang "Bale ning Relihiun") metung yang malating balen ning Lebanon king Chouf (Distrito), a manga 50 km king mauli- aslagan ning Beirut at malapit king balen ning Deir el-Qamar, nung nu ya mikakawani kapamilatan ning matarik a libis. Pikabaluan ya ing balen king kayang engrandeng Palacio ning Beiteddine, nung nu ya mararapat ing Beiteddine Festival balang kaleldo. 
Inumpisan neng tinikdo ning local a emir Bashir Shihab II, a kaibat mituldung talan king Bunduk Lebanon, aniang 1788, ketang lugal ning ermitang Druze (a yang penibatan ning lagiu ning balen, a mangabaldugang ""Bale ning Kasalpantayanan""). Atlu reng pulung banuang gagawan iti. Megobra la reng biasang diling talagawa ibat king Damascus ampong Aleppo, bukud kareng arquitectung Italianu, a miyagkat at mirinan dakal a katimawan, ania ing kayang estilo, anti yang piabeng Italianung baroque ampong Arabu. 
Kaibat ning 1840, nung kapilan de tinabi king kilual i Bashir, ginamit de reng Ottoman ing palacio antimong gusaling pangkapamahalan. Aniang panaun ning Mandato ning Francia, menatili ya ing gusali antimong upisinang pangkapanibalan. Kanitang 1934, mibulalag yang monumentong pambansa. Aniang 1943, gewa neng oficial a tuknangan nang pang-kaleldong Bechara El Khoury, ing mumunang pamuntuk ning Lebanon. Aniang gerang civil king Lebanon, mesira yang mayap. Kaibat ning 1984, aniang meritak ing labanan banda keti, inutus nang Walid Jumblatt ing kayang ing kayang pamaglarin. Makabusni la king malda deng mapilan nang dake ning palacio, kabang ing makatagan, tuknangan ne pa muring pangkaleldo ning pamuntuk. 
Atlu la pa deng palaciong tinikdo nang Bashir para kareng anak na, dapot ngeni, ing Palaciong Mir Amin mu ing mitagan, at metung yang luxury hotel ngeni.
Ating Lebanese Red Cross First Aid Center king Beiteddine.

Palacio ning Beiteddine:
Ing Palacio ning Beiteddine () metung yang palacio ning ka-19 a dilanua o siglo king Beiteddine, Lebanon. Iti ing lugal ning Beiteddine Festival ampo ning Beiteddine Palace Museum. 

Zahle:
Ing Zahlé (; a misusulat mu namang Zahlah o Zahleh) ing tungku o capitolio ning Beqaa Governorate, Lebanon. Uling king kayang 130,000 a memalen, iti katlung pekamaragul a lakanbalen o ciudad king Lebanon. Alus laganas yang Cristiano ing populasiun ning lakanbalen, and in particular Greek Catholic. Inaus deng magkasal ning Libis Bekaa ("Bekaa Valley") ing Zahle. Pikabaluan ya king kayang malinis a angin, bakasiunan ampong pamangan.
Pangkabilugan.
Maki dayu yang 55 km king Aslagan ning Beirut, ing tungku na o capitolio ning Lebanon, iting lakanbalen. Ya kabud lakanbalen a Catolico Griego ("Greek Catholic") king Kalibudtang Aslagan ("Middle East"). Pikabaluan ya kareng kayang mangatuang pisamban, restoran king kilual, alang kalupang pamangan ampong fabrica ning yelung paganan ning danum king Wadi El Arayesh. Maliaring mag-cochi manibat king Zahlé papunta king Beirut kilub ning manibat 30 anggang 60 minuto, dependi king trafico. Keraklan, maki tas yang 900 metru king babo ning dayatmalat ing Zahle. 

Beirut:
Ing Beirut (, "Bayrūt") ing tungku o capitolio ampong pekamaragul a lakanbalen ampong ciudad ning Lebanon a maki populasiun a maigit king 2.1 miliun aniang 2007. Atiu king metung a peninsula king libutad ning bebe dayatmalat ning Lebanon king dayatmalat a Medeterraneo, at magsilbi yang pekamaragul ampong manimunang sadsaran ning bangsa, at bibilugan ne murin ing Beirut Metropolitan Area, nung nu ya kayabe ing lakanbalen ampo reng kayang karulun o "suburb". Minuna yang mebanggit kareng sulat a Tell el Amarna ning Egipto kanitang minuna, a kanita pang kalibing limang dilanua BC, at taglus-taglus da neng tutuknangan ing lakanbalen manibat kanita. 
Ing Beirut ing sentru ning kapamahalan o gobiernu ning Lebanon, at makasentru ya murin keti ing economia ning Lebanon, kayabe la reng cumpania ampong bancu king Downtown, Hamra, Verdun, ampong Ashrafieh. Makasentru murin king lakanbalen ing cultura ning labuad, a pikabaluan king kareng kayang pahayagan, teatro, activivad a pangcultura, ampong "nightlife". Kaibat ning kasiran ning gerang civil ning Lebanon, misamasan yang mayap ing Beirut, at pasibayu, pupuntalan da no namang turista deng makasalesayan a sentru ning ciudad, marina, pub ampong distritu ning "nightlife".
Pinili neng number one Place to Visit in 2009 ning "The New York Times" ing Beirut. Metung ya kareng mebanggit a apulung mabie o masiglang diling lakanbalen king yatu para king 2009 agpang king Lonely Planet. . 

Lonely Planet:
Ing Lonely Planet Naruhito ing pekamaragul a maglimbag kareng giya ampong "digital media" king pamagbiahi king mabilug a yatu. Aniang mumuna, maki lagiu yang Lonely Planet Publications, oneng miyalilan ya king Lonely Planet aniang Julio 2009 bang ipalto ing maleparan nang yampang king industria ning pamagbiahi/pamaglakbe, ampo ing ulagang bibie na kareng productung "digital". Kaibat da reng Let's Go Travel Guides, metung ya kareng mumunang serie da reng libru king pamagbiahi para kareng backpacker ampong aliwang magbiahing mura. Aniang 2009, magpalual yang 500 a pamagat kareng 8 amanu, at makapisali yang maigit anam a miliun a "guidebook", bukud pa kareng programa king TV, magasin, aplicacion kareng cellphone ampong karinan king Aptas o website. 
Atin yang television production company ing Lonely Planet, ing , a mekalalang nang apat a serie: "Lonely Planet Six Degrees", "The Sport Traveller", "Going Bush", "Vintage New Zealand" ampong "Bluelist Australia". Makasentru ya ing Lonely Planet king Footscray, metung a karulun ("suburb") ning Melbourne, Australia, at atin yang makaugneng oficina king London ampong Oakland, California.
Manibat aniang 2007, ing tatalan king cumpania ya pin ing BBC Worldwide, a maki 75% a bandi, kabang deng mitátag king cumpania, di Maureen ampong Tony Wheeler, ing tatalan king mitatagan a 25%.
Aniang 2009, migumpisa yang maglimbag bulanang magasin a maki lagiung Lonely Planet Magazine ing Lonely Planet.
Ibat ya ing lagiu ning cumpania king metung a gulis a e ustu pangaramdam ibat king "Space Captain," a kanta da ri Joe Cocker ampong Leon Russell. Deng mismung kataya, "lovely planet" la, oneng "lonely planet" ing dimdam nang Tony Wheeler, at aburi ne.

http://www.singaporedice.com/budgethotels.php

L'Orient-Le Jour:
Ing "L'Orient-Le Jour" ing manimunang pahayagang pang-aldo-aldong king Lebanon king amanung frances. Minuna yang linual aniang Setiembre 1, 1970, kaibat ning pamiyabe da reng aduang pang-aldo-aldong pahayagang frances, ing Orient (tetag de king Beirut aniang 1923 di Gabriel Khabbaz ampong Georges Naccache) ampo ing Le Jour (tetag ne aniang 1935 Michel Chiha). 

Palaciong Fakhreddine:
IIng Palaciong Fakhreddine II metung yang matuang palacio ning Deir el Qamar king Lebanon. Telakad neng principe Fakhreddine II aniang umpisa ning dilanua o siglong 1600. Mayayakit ya keti ing Marie Baz Museum, metung a museo da reng istatuang gawa king pagkit o "wax".

Louis Armstrong:
I Louis I Daniel Armstrong (Agostu 4, 1901 – Juliu 6, 1971), palayo Satchmo o Pops, metung yang Americanung jazz tuturutut (trumpeter) ampong talakanta ibat New Orleans, Louisiana. 

Ludwig van Beethoven:
I Ludwig van Beethoven ( (US), (UK); ; mebiniag 17 Disiembri 1770 – 26 Marsu 1827) metung yang German talakudta ampong pianista. Metung yang maulagang tau keng panaun ning pamaglipat pialtan ding Classical ampong Romantic panaun inyang Western classical music, ampong mabibilang ya angga ngeni bilang bantug ampng mapanasag a talakudta king eganaganang panaun.

Sidon:
Ing Sidon, o Saïda, (Arabo '; Phoenician "Ṣydwn", Griego ׃יה‏ם, Hebreo צידון'" "Ṣīḏōn", ) ing katlung pekamaragul a lakanbalen o ciudad king in Lebanon. Atiu king South Governorate ning Lebanon, king bebe dayatmalat ning Mediterraneo, manga 40 km (25 mi) king pangulu ning Tyre at 40 km (25 mi) king mauli ning tungku o capitolio ning bangsa, ing Beirut. Ing lagiu na mangabaldugan yang "pipandakpan asan". Metung yang lakanbalen a maki 200,000 a memalen, a keraklan Muslim a Sunni o Shiite, ampong Cristianong Griego Catolico ampong Maronite.

Tyre, Lebanon:
Ing Tyre (Arabic: , '; Phoenician , '; , "Tzor"; Tiberian Hebrew , ""; Akkadian, '; Greek ', "T‎ros"; ) metung yang lakanbalen o ciudad king South Governorate ning Lebanon. Maki populasiun yang manga 117,000 aniang 2003, dapot tantia la mu deng datos na king populasiun a lulual da manibat kanitang 1932, ania alang sactung pamamiling a maliari ngeni. Makalual ya manibat king bebe dayatmalat ning Mediterraneo ing Tyre, at maki dayu yang 80 km (50 mi) king mauli ning Beirut. Mangabaldugan yang ""batu"" ing kayang lagiu uling king mabatung lugal nung nu ya makatuklu ing orihinal a balen.
Metung yang matuang lakanbalen a Phoencian ing Tyre, at iti ing balen nang kebaitan king alamat di Europa ampong Elissa (Dido). Ngeni, kapat yang pekamaragul a lakanbalen king Lebanon at lugal ne ning metung kareng manimunang sadsaran o "port" ning bangsa. Manimuna yang industria ing turismo. Dakal ya mangatuang karinan ing lakanbalen, kayabe ya ing Romanong Hippodrome a miragdag kareng listaan da reng World Heritage Site ning UNESCO kanitang 1979 (Resolution 459). 

Distritu ning Bint Jbeil:
Ing Distritu ning Bint Jbeil metung yang distritu king Nabatiyeh Governorate ning Lebanon. Ing Bint Jbeil ing tungku o capitoliu ning distritu.

Nabatieh Governorate:
Ing Nabatieh Governorate (, "Muhaa-fza al-Nabatiya") ing metung kareng anam a governorate ning Lebanon. Ing lualas ning governorate 1,058 km². Ing kayang tungku o capitoliu ya pin ing Nabatieh. 
Distritu.
Ing governorate mapipitna ya kareng 4 a districtu (Aqdiya, singular qadaa). Maka-bracket la reng tungku o capitoliu:
Relihiun king Nabatieh Governorate.
Deng Shia ing bibilug king keraklan, o 82% ning populasiun; Deng Cristiano ing kadua, a maki 8.7%; Katlu la reng Sunni, 6.2%; tauli la reng Druze, a bibilug king 3.1%.

Mauling Lebanon:
Ing Mauling Lebanon o Southern Lebanon ing dake ning Lebanon a bibilug king South Governorate ampo king Nabatiye Governorate. Mepitna la ibat king metung a lalawigan deng aduang lugal a reti aniang mumunang dake ning decadang 1990. Neng kai, yabe da la deng Rashaya ampong Western Beqaa ("Albugang Beqaa"), deng pekamauli nang distritu ning Beqaa Governorate, king Mauling Lebanon.
Deng manimunang lakanbalen o ciudad ning labuad ila pin deng Tyre, Sidon, Jezzine ampong Nabatiyeh a marayu king dayatmalat. Kilala la king maragul dang populasiun a Shi'a Muslim deng caza ning Bint Jbeil, Tyre, ampong Nabatieh king Mauling Lebanon a maki minoriang Cristianu. Ing Sidon (a mayayaus muring Saida) keraklan yang Sunni, kabang deng aliwa king caza ning Sidon Shi'a Muslim la keraklan, a maki maragul a minoriang Cristianu, particular Greek Catholic. Deng cazas ning Jezzine ampong Marjeyoun, Cristianu la keraklan, at atin la muring Shia Muslim. Ing caza ning Hasbaya maki mayoria yang Druze. 
Maragul ing meging papil ning Mauling Lebanon king pamipate ning Israel ampong Lebanon.

Mauling Governorate:
Ing South Governorate (; transliterated: al-Janub) metung ya kareng governorate ning Lebanon. Ing South Lebanon o Mauling Lebanon maki populasiun yang 360,000 memalen ampong lualas a 2,000 km². Ing tungku na o capitoliu ya pin ing Sidon. Kapante ne ning dayatmalat ing mababa nang diling katas; ing pekamatas, 1,000 metru. Samut-samut la reng tau: Shiite, Sunni, Orthodox, Catolicu, Armenian, ampong Protestanti. Maliaring mibagsak ing temperatura king 4 °C neng karimlan o panaun ning dimla, nung kapilan dakal ing uran ampon niebe kareng mangatas a lugal. Neng kaleldo, maliari lang mitas king 30 °C king bebe dayatmalat ing temperatura. Atin yang mapilan a ilug ing governorate: Litani, Zahrani, Naqura, Awali, Qasmiye, ampong Hasbani. Pikabaluan ya ing lugal kareng pitatamnan sagin ampong citrus. 
Deng Local a Maliliari ampong Apupuntalan.
Dakal la reng bageng managiag kareng tau king lugal, kayabe la reng bebe dayatmalat a maki maputing balas king mauli ning Tyre, ampo ing pamag-snorkle o pamanyisid kareng makalbug a ruina o mengalasak a lakanbalen/ciudad malapit kareng mangatuang lakanbalen ning Sidon ampong Tyre. Aburi do reng mahilig king cultura deng dakal taung Pazar a kanita pang panaun a Ottoman, at makapag-relax ka kaibat ning patingapun king metung a "seafood restaurant" nung nu me ababation king lalam ing dayatmalat a Mediterraneo. Mararapat murin king Mauling Lebanon ing fiestang Tyre o Tyre festival, nung nu libu-libu lang turista deng daratang banua-banua.
Relihiun king South Governorate.
Shia la reng keraklan, 45.9%;
Sunni la reng kadua, 37%;
Cristianu la reng katlu, 17%;
Druze la reng tauli, 0.1%.

Beirut Governorate:
Ing Governorate ning Beirut (Arabo: , ) ing magdili-diling governorate ning Lebanon a bibilugan na mu ning metung a distritu ampong metung a lakanbalen, ing Beirut, a ya muring kayang tungku o capitoliu, bukud king iti ing tungku ning Lebanon. 
Ing lualas na niting governorate, 19.8 km² (e la kayabe deng karulun o "suburb"); lipat ning malati nang sasakupan a lugal, iti ing pekamaulagang labuad king Lebanon uling king actividad king economia, politica, cultura ampong sociedad.

Beqaa Governorate:
Ing Beqaa () metung yang governorate king Lebanon a maki 750,000 memalen.
Geografia.
Maki lualas yang 4,429 km² ing Beqaa governorate. Ing Béqaa ing manimunang sentru ning agricultura king Lebanon. Metung yang natural a manimunang natural a labuad ning Lebanon, at atiu king pilatan ning Kabundukan ning Lebanon king a pang-Aslagan ampong pang- Albugan ("Western and Eastern Lebanese Mountain ranges"). Adua la reng ilug a dadalan king Béqaa: ing Ilug Litani ampo ing Ilug Asi. 
Bibilugan ne ning Beqaa Valley (Libis Beqaa) ing Beqaa governorate.
Clima ampong turismu.
Manaliwa ing temperatura manibat king -10 anggang 35 °C kilub ning pabanua. Dakal ya uran ampong niebe neng karimlan ing Béqaa.
Deng nayun o bariu ning Zahle, Baalbeck, Niha, Anjar, Qab Elias, Kfar Zabad, Karaon Dam, Chtaura ampong Furzul ing manimunang pupuntalan da reng turista king labuad. Atiu ing governorate ning Béqaa ing matuang rutang mitutuglung king Lebanon ampong Syria kareng aliwang dake ning yatung Arabo. Pikabaluan ya ing governorate king kayang industria ning alak, fiesta neng kaleldo ("summer festivals") ampo king kayang pamangan. 

Capdepera:
Ing Capdepera metung yang malating balen king distritu ning Raiguer king Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espanya. 

Consell:
Ing Consell metung yang malating balen king distritu ning Raiguer king Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espanya. 

Costitx:
Ing Costitx metung yang malating balen king distritu ning Raiguer king Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espanya. 

Escorca:
Ing Escorca metung yang balen king Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espanya. 

Esporles:
Ing Esporles metung yang malating balen king Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espania. 

Estellencs:
Ing Estellencs metung yang malating balen king Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espania. 
Atiu pilatan ning bunduking ning Tramuntana, keng baidbid ning Bunduk Galatzo (1,025 metres) [http://www.hotelruralnord.com/quienesin.htm], and the Mediterranean sea.

Felanitx:

Fornalutx:
Ing Fornalutx (mayayagkas [furnə'lutʃ]) meutng yang bulubundukin a balen ampong nayun king Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espanya. Ing pekamalapit diling balen iyaping ing Sóller, nung nu maliari meng dasan kapamilatan ning pamaglakad keng pamamaltang kareng puruk ning Binibassi. Ing amanung Catalan iya keraklan ing magagamit keti. Ing Fornalutx sasakupan ne ing lualas a 19.5 km² ampong atin yang 469 pakatuknang agpang inyang 2008.
Suglung Palual.

Inca, Spain:
Ing Inca metung yang balen king Kastilang pulu ning Majorca. Ing populasiun ning balen 25,900 (2004) ya at atin yang 58.4km². == Suglung Palual ==

Lloret de Vistalegre:
Ing Lloret de Vistalegre kebaluan mu ring bilang Llorito metung yang balen keng kalibudtaran ning Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espania. Ing balen sasakup yang gabun a atin lualas a 17 km² ampong atin yang populasiun a 1249 a pakatuknang agpang inyang 2008. 
Deng balen a kasepu ilapin deng: Montuïri, Sineu, Sencelles, Algaida y Sant Joan.

Lloseta:
Ing Lloseta metung yang malating balen king distritu ning Raiguer king Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espania. 

Llubí:
Ing Llubí metung yang malating balen king Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espanya. atin yang populasiun a 1,800 pakatuknang.

Llucmajor:
Ing balen ning Llucmajor () iya ing pekamaragul diling balen ning Balearic Pulu Majorca. Atin yang mga 30,000 pakatuknang(kayabe no reng 4,300 dayu, nung nu deng 1,600 Aleman la) at atin yang lualas a , nung nu 91 la reng pakatuknang balang km² (237 per mi.kd.).

Manacor:
Ing Manacor metung yang balen king Mediterranean pulu ning Majorca, dake ning Spanish autonomous communidad ning Balearic Pulu. Metung ya kareng pekamaragul diling municpalidad king Majorca. 

Mancor de la Vall:
Ing Mancor de la Vall metung yang malating balen king distritu ning Raiguer king Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espanya. 

Maria de la Salut:
Ing Maria de la Salut metung yang malating balen king distritu ning es pla king Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espanya. 

Marratxí:
Ing Marratxí metung yang malating balen king distritu ning Raiguer king Majorca, metung kareng Balearic Pulu, Espania. 
Populasiun: 28,237 
Lualas: 54 km² (2005). Iti mu rin ing stasiun ning Majorca rail network.

Los Altos, California:
Ing Los Altos () metung yang balen king mauling danggut ning San Francisco Telapulu, king San Francisco Bay Area. Ing lakanbalen atiu king Santa Clara County, California, United States. atin yang populasiun a 27,693 agpang keng 2000 census. Iti ing metung kareng pekamabanding karinan keti United States.

Los Gatos, California:
Ing Balen ning Los Gatos metung yang incorporated a balen king Santa Clara County, California, United States. Ing populasiun 28,592 ya inyang 2000 census. Atiu king San Francisco Bay Area king maulingalbugan suluk ning San Jose king bibitisan ning talimunduk ning Santa Cruz Bundukin. 
Kapatad lakanbalen.
Ing Los Gatos atin yang limang kapatad laakanbalen:

Coho salmon:
Ing Coho salmon, "Oncorhynchus kisutch", (ibat keng amanung Russian кижуч "kizhuch") metung yang specie ning anadromous asan keng familia ning salmon family. Deng Coho salmon kebaluanla naman bilang pilak salmon (silver salmon) o "pilak (silvers)". Iti ing pangstate a animal ning Chiba, Japan. 

Pink salmon:
Ing Malareng (Pink) salmon o humpback salmon, "Oncorhynchus gorbuscha", (iabt keng lagiung Russian para karening specie "gorbuša, горбуша")metung yangspecie ning anadromous asan kareng familiang salmon. Pekamalati ya ampong pekamarakal kareng Pacific salmon. 
Footnotes.
See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Footnotes for an explanation of how to generate footnotes using the tags, and the template below. 

Librung Malutu (Jung):
Ing Librung Malutu o Red Book, a balu ra murin king lagiung Liber Novus ("Ing Bayung Libru"), metung yang manuscritong 205 bulung a sinulat na ampong dininan larawan ning psiquiatra o psychiatrist a Suizong i Carl Gustav Jung aniang pilatan ning 1914 ampong 1930, a e milimbag o mipakit man king malda angga aniang 2009. Anggang 2001, e ra pepaintulutan deng talapagmana a akit de reng matenakan ("scholars") ing libru, a sinulat nang Jung kaibat ning kayang e pamikasundu kang Sigmund Freud aniang 1913.
Pamibulalag ampong pamagpakit.
Anggang 2001, e ra pepaintulutan deng talapagmana nang Jung a ibulalag ya ing libru, at e ro man dininan paintulut deng matenakan a asuri de. Lelangan de ri Sonu Shamdasani, metung a matenakan king amlat ("historian") ampong empeadu da reng talapagmana nang Jung, at karelang talausuk dikil kareng kasulatan nang Jung a e pa mibulalag, ampo i Stephen Martin, metung a talasuri kareng bageng tungkul kang Jung, ing Katatagan Philemon ("Philemon Foundation"), bang sumaup king pamibulalag da reng obra nang Jung. Mebisa ya i Ulrich Hoerni, apú nang Jung ampong talapanibala da reng simpanan ("archive") a Jung, a ibulalag ya kaibat ning atlung banuang pamangumbinsi nang Shamdasani. Magsadia yang edision ning "Red Book" king orihinal a Aleman ampong likas a Ingles ing W. W. Norton & Company ampong maleparan a pamag-"footnote". Aniang 2007, ini-scan ne ning DigitalFusion king sukad a metung a kapulu ning milimetru balang besis king metung a 10,200-pixel scanner. Ibulalag ya keng Octubre 2009. 
Ipalto ne ning Rubin Museum of Art king New York Lakanbalen ing orihinal a libru ampo reng orihinal a mangalati nang journal Jung manibat Octubre 7, 2009, anggang Enero 25, 2010.

Jeux de la Francophonie:
Deng Jeux de la Francophonie (Canadian English:"Francophonie Games"; British English:"Francophone Games") piabe lang ligligan a pang-arte ampong pang-pasiknangan ("sports") para kareng bangsang magsalitang Frances, at mararapat balang apat a banua manibat aniang 1989, a king metung a banda magsilbing pang-tulid kareng Commonwealth Games.
Pamakiabe.
Makabusni ya ing Jeux de la Francophonie kareng atleta ampong artista da reng 55 a bangsang kayabe, 2 bangsang "associate member", ampong 13 a bangsang "observer" o talaumasid ning Francophonie. Atlu ya pekakatawan ing Canada: Quebec, New Brunswick (ing bukud mung lalawigan a bilingual o adua amanu king Canada) ampong metung a team a pekakatawan ning mitatagan nang dake ning bangsa. 
Deng makiabe atiu la king pilatan ning 1,700 ampong 3,000 atleta ampong artista.

Mangatuang kasangkapan:
PAGULUNG.
(noun) Metung yang kasangkapang keng bale,minunang gamit pamag-plantsa keng malan, minuna ya pa keng plantsang uling,ken lawe ku gewa la iti panaun bayu la dintang deng Amerkanu keng balen,gawa la keng dutung. Inawus deng pagulung kasi pagulung ya keti ing malan na pisikanan a gogo bang milako ya lukut.
Dr. Anthony Rayley M. Cabigting----
Officer-In-Charge
Dr. Adelaido C. Bernardo High School
-- 18:02, 19 Agostu 2013 (UTC)
Mabalacat, Pampanga----

Menlo Park, California:
Ing Menlo Park metung yang makiagiung lakanbalen king San Mateo County, king San Francisco Bay Area ning California. Atiu king keng latitude 37°29' Pangulu, longitude 122°9' Aslagan. Ing Menlo Park atin yang 29,964 pakatuknang agpang inyang 2007 U.S. Census.
Ing Menlo Park atiu king (37.454188, -122.178579).

Milpitas, California:
Ing Milpitas () metung yang lakanbalen king Santa Clara County, California. Atiu kambe ning San Jose keng mauli ampong Fremont king kayang pangulu, king mauling danggut ning State Route 237 at keraklan pilatan ning Interstates 680 ampong 880 nung nu daralan ya mga pangulu/mauli ning lakanbalen. Ing sepu ning Alameda County keng panguu na niti. Ing Milpitas atiu mu irn keng kilub ning Silicon Valley. Iti mu rin ing karinan ding corporate headquarters ning Maxtor, LSI Logic, Solectron, Adaptec, Intersil, Cisco Systems anmpong SanDisk atiu la keng industrial zones ning Milpitas.
Lawen la rin.
Kasiping lakanbalen:

Lordi:
Deng Lordi metung lang rock a grupu ibat Helsinki, Finland mitatag inyang 1996. Keraklan di Mr. Lordi, Hella, Hiisi, Amen, Mana.

Morgan Hill, California:
Ing Morgan Hill () metung yang lakanbalen atiu king mauling dake ning Santa Clara County, California, USA. Mitataag inyang Nobiembri 10, 1906, ing lakanbalen miplagiu ya kaibat kang Hiram Morgan Hill, taga [Francisco, California|San Francisco ya nung nu mitalakad yang pipagbaksiunana na inyang 1884. Agpang inyang United States 2000 Census, ing lakanbalen atin yang populasiun a 33,556. 

Mountain View, California:
IngMountain View metung yang laaknbalen king Santa Clara County, keng U.S. state ning California. Ing lakanbalen ikua ne ing kayang lagiu keng mayayakit keng Santa Cruz Bundukin. Agpang keng 2000 census ing populasiun ning lakanbalen 70,708 ya.

Novato, California:
Ing Novato metung yang lakanbalen king North Bay labuad na ning San Francisco Bay Area, king pangulung Marin County. Ing Novato atiu mga pangulu-pangulualbugan ning San Rafael, king atin katas a 30 pie babo ning katas ning dayat malat (siam a metru). Agpang inyang 2009, ing State ning California tintia ne ing poplasiun mga 52,737 ya.. Ing mga pangulu ning San Francisco keng U.S.-101. 

Pacifica, California:
Ing Pacifica metung yang lakanbalen king San Mateo County, California, keng pampang ning Pacific Kadayatmalatan pilatan ning San Francisco ampong Half Moon Bay.
Ing Lakanbalen ning Pacifica makaatsat ya keng anam a milia (10 km) keng pangulu ning kalibudtarang California pampang ampo talimunduk, atiu kareng dakal a mgalating saug magumpisa pialtan ning Sweeney Ridge babo keng aslagan, Montara Bunduk keng mauli, ampo ing Pacific Kadayatmalatan malabalas a pampang ampo mabatung bluffs keng albugan.

Palo Alto, California:
Ing Palo Alto (, ibat keng Spanish: "palo": "taiktik" (o "asias" o "pun dutung") ampong "alto": "matas") metung yang California charter lakanbalen atiu keng pangulungalbugan a suluk ning Santa Clara County, king San Francisco Bay Area ning California, USA. Mipalagiu ya keng pun dutung a El Palo Alto. Ing lakanbalen kayabe ya ing Stanford University ampo ing puntanggapan da reng dakal a Silicon Valley high-technology compania, kayabe ne ing Hewlett-Packard, VMware ampong Facebook. Agpang keng 2000 census, ing lakanbalen atin yang populasiun a 58,598 pakatuknang.
Economia.
Ing Palo Alto ssususyu ya bilang pangkalibutarang pangecomiang tulduk keng Silicon Valley, ampo karinan de ring maiggit a 7,000 businesses papaobra kareng maiggit a 98,000 katau. Many prominent technology firms reside in the Stanford Research Park on Page Mill Road, while nearby Sand Hill Road in the adjacent city of Menlo Park is a notable haunt of venture capitalists. The city’s economy generally follows the economic trends of the rest of the Silicon Valley. Well-known companies and research facilities headquartered in Palo Alto include:

Oakley, California:
Ing Oakley metung yang lakanbalen king Contra Costa County, California, United States. Atin yang populasiun a 33,250 inyang 2006 a Demographics a Tala pepalual ning Lakanbalen. 

Petaluma, California:
Ing Petaluma metung yang lakanbalen king Sonoma County, California, king United States. Ing tantia keng kayang populasiun mga 54,660 ya agpang inyang 2006

Pittsburg, California:
Ing Pittsburg (dati, Matuling a Diamanti (Black Diamond), Lakanbalen ning New York keng Pacific, New York na ning Pacific, ampong Pittsburgh) metung yang lakanbalen king aslagan dake ning Contra Costa County, California, ing danggut a dake ning East Bay labuad ning San Francisco Bay Area.
Atin yang metung a BART stasiun, ing Pittsburg/Bay Point Stasiun atiu king Bay Point.
Ing kasalungsungan a zip code 94565 ya para keng Pittsburg ampong Bay Point, at ing kayang karinan a codiku (area code) 925 ya karas keng pamangamit keng telepanu.

Balasenas:
Ing balasenas (eggplant), aubergine, o brinjal ("Solanum melongena"), metung uang tanaman da reng familiang "Solanaceae" ampong genus "Solanum". Ing lagiu ning bunga na makanyan ya naman, keraklan magagamit bilang gule keng pamaglutu. Iti katutubu ya kareng bangsang Bangladesh, Pakistan, Sri Lanka and India. 
Larawan Galleria.
<br clear="all">

Mentha:
Ing Mentha (mint) metung yang genus da reng mga 25 species (at dakal pang mga dinalan a pinduan) a maniampagang tanaman da reng familiang Lamiaceae (Mint Familia). 

Oregano:
Ing Oregano (IPA: əˈregənoʊ, British English: ɒrɪˈgɑ:nəʊ) o gulgul ("Origanum vulgare") metung yang species ning "Origanum", da reng famili ning mint, katutubu ya king Europa, king Mediterranean labuad ampong mauli ampong Kalibudtarang Asia. Daragul yang maniabt20-80 cm katas, at ing baligtad ning bulung mga 1-4 cm ya kaba. Deng sampaga kule lang ubi, 3-4 mm kakaba, at dargul la keng makatalakad a tulus.

Monzón:
Ing Monzón metung yang balen king lalawigan ning Huesca, Aragon, Espanya. Inyang 2010 census (INE), ing balen atin yang populasyun a 17,115 pakatuknang.

Leptospirosis:
Ing Leptospirosis (a ausan da mu namang Weil's disease, Weil's syndrome, canicola fever, canefield fever, nanukayami fever, 7-day fever, "Fort Bragg fever," ampong "Pretibial fever") metung yang sakit a zoonotic a darala da reng bacteria a manibat kareng spirochaete ning genus "Leptospira" a makayapectu kareng tau ampong dakal a miayaliwang animal, kayabe la reng mammals, ayup, amphibian, ampong reptile. Minuna neng selesen Adolf Weil kanitang 1886, aniang inulat ne ing metung a "acute infectious disease with enlargement of spleen, jaundice and nephritis" (mabayat a sakit a maki pamandagul ning lape, pamanilo ning balat, ampong pamangalbag da reng batu). Minua reng ikit ing "leptospira" king megiling pirasu ning kalamnan ning batu mekua king meteng tau.
Lipat ning kikilalanan deng metung kareng pekamaleparan pangakalat kareng zoonosis, metung yang malagad mung sakit ibat kareng bacteria cumpara kareng aliwa kareng tau. Keraklan, mikakalat ya iti kapamilatan ning danum a mirinan imi da reng animal, a mitatagkil kareng e kinayap a sugat o aspak king balat, mata o mucous membrane. Kilual da reng mangapaling lugal, makapanaun la reng casu ning leptospirosis, at lalto la reti neng Agosto anggang Setiembre/Febrero anggang Marzo.

Astro Boy (tauan):
Ing metung yang tauan a pikatsa, ampo ing manimunang dake ning franquiciang/prangkisang Astro Boy. Lelangan neng Osamu Tezuka ing tauan, at pepakilala de kanitang 1951 king "Captain Atom" manga. Linto ne karang pala king telebision i Astro Boy, ampo kareng peliculang makabasi king manga a kalagiu na, ampo kareng aliwa nang obrang Tezuka.
Aniang 7 Abril 2003, rinehistru ne ning Lakanbalen ning Niiza o Ciudad ning Niiza iting tauan antimong metung a tutung residenti o manuknangan. Miyabe ya murin king Robot Hall of Fame aniang 2004.

Mickey Mouse:
I Mickey Mouse metung yang makatulang animal a tauan king cartoons a meging sagisag ning The Walt Disney Company. Lelangan de ri Walt Disney ampong Ub Iwerks i Mickey Mouse kanitang 1928 at dininan neng siwalang Walt Disney. Pagmasusian ne ning Walt Disney Company ing kayang pangabait keng Noviembre 18, 1928, ing petsa ning pamagpalual ning "Steamboat Willie". Nanupata, linto ne i Mickey anam a bulan bayu ita king Plane Crazy (Ing Steamboat Willie ing mumunang Mickey Mouse cartoon a maki katni o "sound"). Minalkus ya ing dagis a dagis a lupang tau manibat king metung a tauan king cartoons a kikimut ampo kareng comics, anggang megi yang metung kareng akikilala dang sagisag king yatu. King salukuyan, i Mickey ing manimunang tauan king serieng "Playhouse Disney" a ""Mickey Mouse Clubhouse."" I Mickey ing pekapun ning The Mickey Mouse Club. 

Bugs Bunny:
Mrs. Bugs Bunny (wife)Papa Bunny (father)Mama Bunny (mother)Rugs Bunny (cousin)George Bunny (brother)Ace Bunny (descendant)
I Bugs Bunny metung yang tauan a pikudta a lalto kareng serieng serieng pelikulang cartoons a kikimut a "Looney Tunes" ampong "Merrie Melodies" a papalual ning Leon Schlesinger Productions, a meging Warner Bros. Cartoons aniang 1945. Kanitang 2002, kinilala ne ning "TV Guide" antimong pekamaulagang tauang cartoon ning sablang panaun, metung a dangalan a pirake rang Mickey Mouse. King salukuyan, ya ing mascot nang pang-cumpania ning Warner Brothers, lalu na kareng kayang animated productions. Migbida ya kareng 163 mangakuyad a palage aniang Golden Age of American animation (Ginintuan nang panaun da reng cartoons ning America), at mika cameo ya kareng atlung aliwang palage bukud king pamaglage kareng mapilan a peliculang e "cartoons" 
Agpang king "Bugs Bunny: 50 Years and Only One Grey Hare", "mibait" ya aniang 1940 king Brooklyn, New York, at lelangan neng Tex Avery (a director ning "A Wild Hare", nung nu ya minunang linto i Bugs Bunny) ampong Robert McKimson (a miglalang king diseniung "definitive" ning tauan a Bugs Bunny), kayabe la reng dakal pang aliwa. Agpang kang Mel Blanc, ing minunang minie siwala kang Bugs Bunny, maki tonu yang Flatbush i Bugs Bunny, a pisamut da reng dialectung Bronx ampong Brooklyn. Ing kayang paburitung sasabian, ing "Eh...what's up, doc?", sasambitlan ne keraklan neng lalangut yang carrot. Kayabe la murin kareng aliwa nang sasabian deng "Of course you realize...this means war" ampong "Ain't I a stinker?" 

The Flintstones:
Ing The Flintstones metung yang sitcom a cartoons king telebision a pepalage ra manibat 1960 anggang 1966 king ABC. Ing serie ing mumunang serieng "cartoons" a "prime-time" para kareng makatua. Pepalual ne ning Hanna-Barbera Productions (H-B) ing "The Flintstones", a tungkul king bie ning metung a talapagobra kanitang Stone Age, ampo ing kayang pamilia ampong siping bale at pekamalapit a kaluguran. Manibat kanita, linual da ne king DVD ampong VHS. 
Anti ya mong "prehistoric" (bayu ing panaun ning kasalesayan) a "Honeymooners" ing palage, at sinikat ya uling binili no reng bage king pamibie-bieng modernu king panaun a Stone Age.

DVD:
Ing DVD, a ausan da muring Digital Versatile Disc o Digital Video Disc, metung yang format o paralan king pamanyinup o pamagsimpan ning data ning uring media king optical disc, a mitátag aniang 1995. Keraklan, magagamit ya king video ampong pamagsimpan data. Pareu la dagul deng DVD ampo reng compact disc (CD), oneng mas dakal a makatanam kesa kareti ing agiu rang isimpan a data. 
Deng pamiyaliwa ning terminu o katayang "DVD" lalarawan da ing paralan ning pamagsimpan king data kareng disc. Ing DVD-ROM (read only memory), atin yang datang maliari mung basan dapot e maliaring isulat; ing DVD-R ampo ing DVD+R (recordable) misan la mu makasimpan o maka-record data, at kaibat, gumanang anti mong DVD-ROM; deng DVD-RW (re-writable), DVD+RW, ampong DVD-RAM (random access memory) dakal lang ukdu/besis makapagsimpan la ampong makapamurang dakal a ukdu. Ing wavelength da reng standard DVD laser, 650 nm; ya, ania malutu ya ing kayang sulu. 
Deng DVD-Video ampong DVD-Audio disc mangabaldugan lang laman a video (alben) ampong audio (katni o "sound") a a ustu panga-format ampong pangabalangkas. Deng aliwang uring DVD, kayabe no retang maki laman a video, ausan dong DVD Data disc. 

VHS:
Ing Video Home System, a mas kilala king pamikuyad a VHS, metung yang standard king pamagsimpan o pamag-record video tape a meyalkus aniang decadang 1970. Pepalual de king malda o publicu aniang kadua nang dake ning decada. Aniang tauli nang dake ning decadang 1970 ampong mumuna nang dake ning decadang 1980, bibilug ya king kapitna king gerang gerang VHS vs Betamax, a bandang tauli ya ing sinambut. Kayabe la kareng katangian ning VHS deng mas makabang oras ning pamagpatigtig, mas mabilis a pamag-rewind ampong fast forward, ampong mas simpling paralan ning pamagdala king tape o "tape transport mechanism". Uli ning open standard king tecnologiang VHS, apaliari da ing tsarakal a pamangawa ("mass production") a alang gastus king pamag-licencia.. Bandang tauli, ing VHS ing magtagumpe kareng format a video tape, at alagpusan no reng aliwang format da reng home tape aniang decadang 1990. 
Aniang bandang tauli, mas masanting ing calidad da reng format a optical disc, at deti ing meging dominanti kareng film studio, at kaibat kareng tindahan, at bandang tauli kareng magpayarquilang video. Aniang 2006, tinuknang ne ing America king pamagpalual pelicula king format a VHS, at minalis ya kareng aliwa, alimbawa DVD ampong Blue-ray. Aniang Deciembre 31 2008, pepalual ne ning VHS tapes, Distribution Video Audio Inc. of Palm Harbor, Florida, ing tauling maragul a gagawang pre-recorded VHS tapes, ing tauli nang truck da reng productu.

Blu-ray Disc:
Ing Blu-ray Disc (BD), a ausan da mu namang "Blu-ray", metung yang paralan ning pamag-simpan data king optical disc a midiseniu pa yang alilan ing standard DVD format. Ing pekamaulaga nang gamit, para king high-definition video, PlayStation 3 games, ampong aliwang data, a anggang 25 GB balang single layered, ampong 50 GB balang dual layered disc. 
Ibat ya ing lagiung "Blu-ray Disc" king blue-violet laser a magagamit ba yang basan ing disc. Kabang ing standard DVD gagamit yang 650 nanometer a malutung laser ("red laser"), gagamit yang mas makuyad wavelength a 405 nm blue-violet laser ing Blu-ray, at magsimpan yang alus makatánam mas dakal a data kesa king DVD. 
Aniang "gera" king format da reng high-definition optical disc, makicumpitensia ya ing Blu-ray king HD DVD format. Ing Toshiba, ing manimuna kareng cumpaniang susuporta king HD DVD, minurung ya kanitang Febrero 2008, at meyari ya ing gera king format; aniang Julio 2009, pepabalu ning Toshiba ing kayang planung magpalual king sarili nang Blu-ray Disc device karas king wakas ning 2009.
Ing minalkus king Blu-ray Disc ya pin ing Blu-ray Disc Association, metung a grupung maki pekakatawan da reng gagawang consumer electronics, computer hardware, ampong pelicula. Aniang Junio 2009, maigit lang 1000 deng marcang Blu-ray disc king Australia, 2500 king Japon, 1500 king United Kingdom, ampong 2500 king America (United States) ampong Canada. 

Compact Disc:
Ing Compact Disc (a ausan da mu namang CD) metung yang optical disc a gagamitan king pamagsimpan ("storage") king digital data. Aniang mumuna, meyalkus ya bang magsimpan mu kareng makasimpan a katni o "sound recording", oneng kaibat, miliari ya mu namang magdala kareng aliwang uri ning data. Pisasali da la deng audio CD manibat pa kanitang Octubre 1982. Aniang 2009, ila pa murin deng standard a paralan ning pamagsimpan king audio.
Maki lapad ("diameter") lang 120 mm deng standard CD, at agiu dang magdalang anggang 80 minutu ning e makasiksik a katni ("uncompressed audio"). Ing Mini CD miyayaliwa ya lapad, manibat king 60 anggang 80 mm; neng kai, gagamitan da la kareng CD single o device driver, at magsimpan lang anggang 24 minutu ning audio/katni. 
Aniang kaibat, binage ("adapted") de ing tecnologia, at miragdagan ya, anggang kayabe ne kaniti ing pamagsimpan data (data storage CD-ROM), write-once audio ampong data storage CD-R, rewritable media CD-RW, Video Compact Discs (VCD), Super Video Compact Discs (SVCD), PhotoCD, PictureCD, CD-i, ampong Enhanced CD. 
Makelatan pa murin ing pamangamit kareng CD-ROMs ampong CD-R king industriang computer. Matagumpe ya ing CD ampo reng kayang kasuglung ("extensions"): aniang 2004, miras 30 biliun a disc ing misaling CD audio, CD-ROM, ampong CD-R. Aniang 2007, 200 biliun no reng misaling CD king mabilug a yatu.
Suglung palual.
General Information
History

Optical disc:
King computing ampong optical recording, ing optical disc (CD) o optical disk (WORM) metung yang patag ("flat"), keraklan mabilug, a disc a maliaring magdalang audio, video o data a maka-encode kareng microscopic (malatiktik a akakit mu king lalam ning "microscope") a busbus ("pits") o bukul ("bumps") king espesial a sangkap (keraklan aluminium) king metung kareng dake nang patag. Ing sangkap a magdalang impormasiun, o "encoding material", makatumpak ya king mas makapal a sangkap (keraklan polycarbonate) a bibilug king keraklan king disc at magsilbing "dust defocusing layer". Ing paralan ning pamag-encode taglus-taglus yang "spiral" a makatakap king mabilug a disc, manibat king pekakilub diling daralanan ("innermost track") angga ketang pekakilual ("outermost track"). Makasimpan ing data king kapamilatan ning laser o "stamping machine" (makinang panatak), at maliari yang basan nung ing lalabasan ning data suluan ya king laser diode king optical disc drive a magpadurut king disc king salusung manga 200 RPM anggang 4000 RPM o maigit pa, dependi king uri ning drive, disc format, ampo ing dayu ning read head king libutad ning disc (mas mabilis lang babasan deng daralan a pangkilub o "inner tracks"). Didisporman de reng kulkul o bukul ing sulung laser a masasalamin ("reflected laser light") ania deng keraklan kareng optical disk (liban kareng mangatuling a disc ning orihinal a PlayStation video game console) maki itsura lang iridescent a gewa da reng "grooves" o bukul ning tumpak a masasalamin ("reflective layer"). Ing sumangid ning optical disc atin yang maka-imprentang marca o etiqueta, a keraklan gawa king papil, dapot neng kai, makalimbag o makatatak king mismung disc. Atiu kaniting dane ning disc ing mismung data, at keraklan, matatakpan yang sangkap a malino, keraklan lacquer. E anti king floppy disk, ala lang makayabeng lulanan a protecciun deng keraklan kareng optical disc, ania maralas lang mikakaprublema king pamamasa king data uling kareng gasgas, bakas da reng taliri, ampong aliwang prublemang ibat king paligid. 
Keraklan, maki lapad ("diameter") lang 7.6 ampong 30 cm (3 anggang 12 pulgada) deng optical disc, nung nu ing 12 cm (4.75 pulgada) ing pekamaralas a dagul. Keraklan, maki kapal yang 1.2 mm (0.05 pulgada) ing disc, kabang ing track pitch (dayu manibat king libutad ning metung a daralanan o track angga king libutad ning tutuki) keraklan 1.6 µm (microns) ya. 
Metung kareng atlung recording type o uri ning pamagsimpan ing susuportan ning optical disk: read-only (alimbawa: CD ampong CD-ROM), recordable (write-once, alimbawa CD-R), o re-recordable (rewritable, e.g. CD-RW). Deng write-once optical disc keraklan atin lang organic dye recording layer king pilatan ning sangkap a atiu lalam o substrate ampo ing tumpak a masasalamin o reflective layer. Deng rewritable disc keraklan atin lang alloy recording layer (tumpak a gawa king samut ning metal) a bibilugan ning phase change material, a keraklan AgInSbTe, a pisamut a pilak, indium, antimony ampong tellurium
Keraklan, gagamitan la reng optical disc king pamagsimpan king tigtigan o musica (alimbawa bang patigtig king CD player), video (alimbawa bang patigtig king DVD player), o data ampong programs para kareng personal computer. Ing Optical Storage Technology Association (OSTA) susuportan no reng standardized optical storage format. Lipat ning mas matibe la reng optical disc kesa kareng minunang format a audio-visual ampong data storage (pamagsimpan data), maliari lang masira uling king aldo-aldong pamangamit ampong uling king paligid. Deng aklatan ampong simpanan ("archive") papaliari lang kaparalanan para king pamagpanatili kareng optical media ("optical media preservation procedures") bang lumuat lang maliaring basan deti kareng optical disc drive da reng computer o kareng makayagpang a disc player. 
Para king computer data backup ampong physical data transfer, miyayalilan na la deng optical disc antimo reng CD ampong DVD kareng mas mabilis, mas malati ampong mas ayasahan a gamit a solid state, lalu na deng USB flash drive. Mapaliaring taglus-taglus a marapat iti, lalu na uling daragul ing laman a daralan da reng USB flash drive, at mimumura la reti. Makanian murin, deng personal portable CD player miyayalilan lang portable solid state MP3 player, at ing MP3 music a mesali king Aptas o Internet mekabawas king bilang da reng audio CD a masasali banua-banua. 

Albendiego:

is a municipality located in the province of Guadalajara, Castile-La Mancha, Spain. According to the 2004 census (INE), the municipality has a population of 36 inhabitants.

4G:
Ing 4G makadaleraya ya keng pangapat a generasiun a cellular wireless ampo ding kayang inalilan a 3G ampong 2G iley (standards). Ing aliwa ning articulu iti tataid ne ing 4G keng "International Mobile Telecommunications-Advanced" (IMT Advanced), agiang ing 4G maleparan ya kabaldugan at mapaliaring kayabe la reng iley (standards) kilual ning IMT-Advanced. Ing 4G systema maliari nalang itas-antas deng kasalungsungan magagamit a communication networks ampo panaligan dalang mamie malaparan ampong makakambil a IP pagbatayan a solusiun nung nu deng facilidad antimo ing siuala, data ampong mamagus a multimedia mibie la kareng talagamit maski "kapilan" at "nokarin" man king mas mabilis a pulayi nung nu lalawen mo reng mengalabas a generasiun.
Paninasan.
Ing 4G ma-alkus ya para apakiabe de ing QoS ampo ing pulayi da reng kailangan a ausan dang applications (gamit) antimo deng wireless broadband access, Multimedia Messaging Service (MMS), video chat, mobile TV, HDTV kalamnan, Digital Video Broadcasting (DVB), mangalating suyu antimo deng siuala ampong data, at aliwa pang servicio a gagamit (bandwidth).
Gamit.
Keng kasulungsungan a pulaying 15-30 Mbit/s, ing 4G agiu nang mamie kareng talagamit a mamagus a high-definition television (HDTV). Keng pulaying 100 Mbit/s, ing kalamnan a DVD-5 (antimo ing metung a palage(cine) malyari yang kuananilulan (downloaded) kilub ning 5 minutu para agamit ustung eka masuglung keng linia.

Mikey Arroyo:
I Juan Miguel Macapagal Arroyo, a mas kilala king lagiung Mikey Arroyo (mibait Abril 26, 1969 king Menila) ing pekakatawan ning kaduang distritu ning Pampanga ampong metung a artistang Filipinu. Ya ing anak nang pangane ning Mumunang Ginu ("First Gentleman") Mike Arroyo ampo ning Pamuntuk ning Filipinas Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo.

Henry Kissinger:
I Henry Alfred Kissinger (mibait Mayo 27, 1923) , metung yang cientistang pampulitica, diplomaticu, ampong tinanggap king Nobel Peace Prize a Americanung mibait king Alemania. Migsilbi ya antimong National Security Advisor (Talausuk king Kapanatagang Pambansa) at kaibat, kayabe na niti, antimong Secretary of State (Kalihim ning Estado) king Kapamahalang Nixon. Kaibat ning kayang pamanungkulan, kukunan de pa murin deng pamuntuk o presidenti ing kayang pamalak. 
Metung yang talatuki ning "Realpolitik" i Kissinger, a dominanti papil king patakaran nang panlual ning America manibat 1969 anggang 1977. Aniang panaun a iti, ya ing misulung king patakaran ning "détente", at penigobran ne ing metung a pamitucnang-acbung ("ceasefire") king Gerang Vietnam. 
Angga ngeni, pupurian de i Kissinger deng kayang kayabe king profesion.. Mirinan yang galal antimong mumunang tinanggap king Ewald von Kleist Award ning Munich Conference on Security Policy (Pulung king Patakaran a Pangkapanatagan king Munich), at magsilbi ya king salukuyan antimong talapamuntuk ("chairman") ning Kissinger Associates, metung a cumpaniang internacional king pamagunsulta ("international consulting firm"). I Kissinger ing "most frequent visitor" (pekamaralas a dalo) king George W. Bush White House antimong e oficial a talausuk a pampulitica king Israel ampong Kalibudtang Aslagan ("Middle East")—kayabe ya ing pamaglusub ampong pamaniakup king Iraq.
