Aliwa 

Amine Gemayel:
I Amine Pierre Gemayel () (mibait 22 Enero 1942) ing Pamuntuk o Presidenti ning Lebanon manibat aniang 1982 anggang 1988 
Mibait ya king nayun o bariu ning Bikfaya, Lebanon i Amine Gemayel () , a anak nang Pierre Gemayel, ing talatátag ning Partido Kataeb. Inalal neng pamuntuk i Gemayel ning Parlamento ("National Assembly") aniang 21 Setiembre 1982, kayalili ning kayang kapatad, i Bachir Gemayel, a miyalal aniang milabasan a bulan dapot pete re bayu ya milukluk. 
Kabang tuturing deng radical king politica ing wali nang i Bashir, a misusulung king pamagtabi kareng guerrillang Palestinu ibat king Lebanon ampo king maragulan a pamagbayu king sistemang political, ampo ing posibling pamagkasundu king Israel, tuturing demg mas kasantingan posiciun i Amine Gemayel. Pane yang manintun king pamikasundu ("consensus"), at, lalu na aniang bayu ya meging pamuntuk, lilisian na ing akalaban na la deng politicung Muslim anti ing gewa ning kapatad na. Aniang pete re i Bashir Gemayel tuturing deng natural a mapili i Amine a magbuklud kareng talasuporta ning kayang meteng kapatad, ampo reng kayang kalaban a Muslim

Jose Miguel Arroyo:
I Jose Miguel "Mike" Tuason Arroyo (mibait Junio 27, 1946) ing Mumunang Ginu ("First Gentleman") ning Filipinas. Asawa neng Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo, ing salukuyan a Pamuntuk ning Filipinas. 
Aniang 2003, singkanan neng Senador Panfilo Lacson a mig-"money laundering" king secretung "bank account" lalam ning e tutung lagiung Jose Pidal, a kaibat bindian ning kapatad na, i Ignacio Arroyo, Jr. 
Pipumpunan na la di Ignacio Arroyo ampong Doña Maria Pidal, a maki atlung ának: ing candidatung maging santa, i Maria Beatriz Del Rosario Arroyo, i Jose Maria Arroyo ampo i Mariano Arroyo. Megi yang senador i Jose kanitang 1919, kabang migsilbi yang pun lalawigan king Iloilo i Mariano aniang 1928. Atin lang pitung ának di Senator Jose Ma. Arroyo ampo ing asawa na, i Jesusa Lacson ning Negros Occidental, at metung ya kareti i Ignacio Lacson Arroyo, a ayasawa nang Lourdes Zaragoza Tuason. Deng adua ding pengari nang Jose Miguel "Mike" Arroyo, ampo i Ignacio Arroyo, Jr.. 
Ing manimuna nang proyectu anting asawa ning Pamuntuk ya pin ing pamagpondu king pamagsane da reng atletang Filipinu para king 2005 Southeast Asian Games a merapat king Filipinas. Metung yang abogadu, at paturanan de deng lalaban king pamanibala ning kayang asawa, at uling king sasabian da reng king oposicion a kabaluan na kareng iscandalu, a misan meging sangkan ning kayang pamaglako king Filipinas at pamanuknangan king sumangid dayatmalat. 
Kabulasan.
Aniang April 9, 2007, dinalan ya king apulung oras a operacion ("open heart surgery") kaibat dang abalung atin yang aortic aneurysm (kalbag ning pekamaragul nang uyat o "artery" ning pusu).
Aduang pulu't aduang aldo kaibat ning maselan nang operacion, linual ya king ospital i G. Arroyo, a halus kinayap na.

Pamuntuk ning Filipinas:
Ing Pamuntuk ning Filipinas o Presidenti ning Filipinas ing pekapun ning estado ampo ning kapamahalan ning Republica ning Filipinas. Ing Pamuntuk ing tatalan king upayang ejecutivo, o pamagpatupad king leyi ampong pamanibala king kayapang pangmalda.
Ing salukuyan a Pamuntuk ning Filipinas ya pin i Rodrigo Duterte.

Computer:
Ing computer metung yang maquinang manibala o mag-procesu king informacion o data agpang king grupu da reng utus o instruction.
Lipat ning atin nang computer a mechanical o gawa kareng kikimut a dake king keraklan king kasalesayan ning tau, meyalkus la reng minunang computer a electronico aniang kalibudtan ning kaduang pulung (20th) dilanua o siglu (1940–1945). Kasindagul de reti ing maragul a cuartu, at ing gagamitan dang curienti, katumbas ning pilan dalang modernung personal computer (PCs). Mipagiu la king relo deng simpling computer, at maliari nong paganan ning bateria ning relo. Anti nong sagisag o "icon" ning Panaun ning Informacion deng miyayaliwang uri da reng personal computer, at ilang isipan da reng tau neng isipan de ing "computers". Nanupata, deng embedded computer kareng miyayaliwang gamit, manibat kareng MP3 player angga kareng eruplanung pang-gera, ampo kareng pialungan angga kareng robot a pang-fabrica, ilang dakal dili. 
Magamitan la ampong dakal agagawa deng computer uling king kagiwan dang manyalikut ampong papaliari kareng listaan o tala da reng utus o "instruction", a ausan dang program, at ini ing pamiyaliwa da kareng calculator. Metung yang pamipahayag o pamaniabi king amanu ning matematica ning kagiwan a iti ing Church–Turing thesis: ing balang computer a maki mituldung kagiwan, agpang king patakaran a iti, agiu nang daptan ing obrang maliari nang gawan ning aliwang computer. Uli na niti, deng computer, manibat king cellphone angga king supercomputer, agiu rong daptan deng pareu-pareung obrang pang-computer o pang-cuenta, nung mirinan lang ustung panaun ampong ustung lugal a pirinan informacion. 

Calculator:
Ing calculator metung yang kasangkapan a gagamitan para king pamanguenta o pamangarculang pang-matematica. Aliwa ya king computer uling limitadu ing kagiwan nang maglutas o munie solucion king problema. Maliari lang hardware (kasangkapan) o software ("computer program") deng calculator, at maliari lang mechanical (maquinang gawa kareng kikimut a parti o dake) o electronic, at maralas, makapalub na la o kayabe kareng gamit antimo deng PDA o cellphone.
Deng makabayung electronic calculator keraklan malati la, digital, (keraklan mipagiu la king bulsa) at keraklan mura. Bukud kareng calculator a pangkabilugan a gamit ("general purpose calculators"), ating para kareng particular a gagamit, alimbawa deng scientific calculator, a maki operation a mas complicadu kesa king kabud mu arithmetic o simpling pamanguenta, alimbawa deng pamangarculang trigonometric and statistical. Atin ping calculator a agiu rang gawang computer algebra. Deng graphing calculator, maliari lang gamitan bang mag-graph kareng function a makatuldu king real line, o mas matas dimension a Euclidean space. Nanupata, atin la pang aliwang silbi. Mas apidala-dala mu la deng calculator cumpara kareng computer, dapot deng PDA alus kasindagul do reng "handheld calculator" o calculator a tatalnan king gamat. 

Personal digital assistant:
Ing personal digital assistant (PDA) metung yang mobile device, a ausan da muring palmtop computer. Deng mas bayung PDA atin lang de color a screen ampong katni o kagiwan a audio, ania maliari lang gamitan antimong cellphone, smartphone, web browser, o portable media player. Dakal kareng PDA ing maliaring gamitan bang misuglung king Internet, intranet o extranets kapamilatan ning Wi-Fi, o Wireless Wide Area Network (WWAN). Dakal a PDA ing gagamit touchscreen technology.
Ing tuturing dang mumunang PDA ya pin ing Casio PF-15115-36 a pepalual da aniang Mayo 1983. Manimuna ya murin king larangan a ini ing GO Corp.. Minuna neng ginamit Apple Computer CEO John Sculley ing kataya aniang Enero 7, 1992 keng Consumer Electronics Show king Las Vegas, Nevada, aniang binggitan ne ing Apple Newton. Kanitang 1996, linual ne ning Nokia ing minunang cellphone a maki ganap a pamangamit a PDA, o "full PDA functionality", ing 9000 Communicator, a manibat kanita megi neng masaling diling PDA king yatu, at migumpisa king uri ding teleponung ausan dang smartphone. Ngeni, ing misna karagul a mayoria da reng PDA, smartphone la, a 150 miliun ing masasali, samantalang kareng PDA a ali teleponu, o "stand-alone", 3 miliun mu balang banua ing misasali. Deng RIM BlackBerry, Apple iPhone ampong Nokia N-Series alimbawa la kareng tipical a smartphone.

Teoriang chaos:
Ing Teoriang chaos o Chaos theory metung yang sanga ning matematica a manigaral king pangimut da reng mapilang dynamical system a mapaliaring misnang sensitivo kareng kabilian king umpisa o "initial conditions". Ining panga-sensitivo mipalaguan butterfly effect. Uli na niting panga-sensitivo, a lalto antimong daragul nang daragul a pamandagul ning pamagkamali ("exponential growth of error"), lalto yang balamu "random" (alang kapakayan o direccion) ing pangimut ning sistema. Ing buri nang sabian niti, deng mangalating pamialiwa king umpisa, magdala yang misnang dagul a pamialiwa panga-wakas, agiang king makuyad mung kapanaunan. Balamu "random" ing pangimut ning sistema, agiang deterministic ya iti, at ganap lang bunga o madi-determina da reng kabilian da potang purmeru deng maliliari keng paintungulan, a alang bitasang elementung random a maki papil. Ining pangimut, ausan dang deterministic chaos, o king makuyad a salita, "chaos". 
Maliari ya muring akit ing pangimut a chaotic o "chaotic behavior" kareng sistemang natural, alimbawa king panaun ("weather"). Maliari yang isplica iti king metung a pamaglarawan o analysis ning chaotic mathematical model a pekakatawan ning makanian a sistema. Sisiasatan ning quantum chaos ing kaugnayan ning chaos ampong . 

3G:
Ing International Mobile Telecommunications-2000 (IMT-2000), mas balu ra keng aus a 3G o ikatlung Generasiun, meutng yang famila a iley o batayan (standards) para kareng mobile telecommunications a lalarawan ning International Telecommunication Union, nung nu kayabe la reng GSM EDGE, UMTS, ampong CDMA2000 at makanyan mu rin deng DECT ampong WiMAX. Ding kayang susuyuan kayabe la reng wide-area wireless a siuala telepanu, aud pangvideo, ampong alangkuryenting data, lat(eganagana) king maski nokarin a likas (mobile environment). Nung kumpara keng 2G ampong 2.5G a suyu, Ing 3G papabustan na ing agnanagnan a pamanyalita ampong suyu keng data ampong mas matas a pulayi keng data (anggang 14.0 Mbit/s keng downlink ampong 5.8 Mbit/s keng uplink kambe ning HSPA+). Inya, deng gagamit keng 3G networks, dirinan no reng network operators mas maleparan a gamit ampong mas matas a suyu kabang akakua ra ing mas dakal a capacidad kapamilatan ning masmasanting a spectral efficiency.
Ing International Telecommunication Union (ITU) pemamasala na na ing pangatlung generasiun (3G) da ring apidaladalang telepanung iley (mobile telephony standards) – IMT-2000 – ing apabilis ing pamanadagul, irakal ing bandwidth, ampong sopan la reng masa dakal a mialiwang klasing gamitin (applications). Alimbawa, ing GSM (ing kasalungsungan pekabantug a cellular phone standard) malyari yang magdalang emu siuala, dapot ita mu rin circuit-switched data a atin download a pulayi a 14.4 kbps. Dapot para a supportan ing mobile multimedia applications, ing 3G dapat yang magdalang packet-switched data masmasanting a spectral efficiency, king mas dakal bandwidths.
Pamanalkus papuntang 4G.
Both 3GPP and 3GPP2 are currently working on further extensions to 3G standards, named Long Term Evolution and Ultra Mobile Broadband, respectively. Being based on an all-IP network infrastructure and using advanced wireless technologies such as MIMO, these specifications already display features characteristic for IMT-Advanced (4G), the successor of 3G. However, falling short of the bandwidth requirements for 4G (which is 1 Gbit/s for stationary and 100 Mbit/s for mobile operation), these standards are classified as 3.9G or Pre-4G.
3GPP plans to meet the 4G goals with LTE Advanced, whereas Qualcomm has halted development of UMB in favour of the LTE family.

Wireless modem:
Ing wireless modem alangkurienting modem, metung yang modem a makataid keng metung a network a imbes na keng systema da reng telepanu. Ustung makataid ka keng alang kurienting modem, makataid ka mismu keng alangkurienting ISP (Internet Service Provider) at kaibat maliari kang makalub keng Internet.
Talapamie Suyu (Service Providers).
Reni deng mililigligan a common carriers broadcasting signal kareng bangsa keng mabilug a yatu.
Deng mapilan kareting Cellular network ampong magdalang suyu (carrier's service) plans ilapin deng:
Account hacking.
In order to obtain completely free internet access anywhere in range of GPRS transmitters (of certain providers), some people have found several hacks.
For example there has been a known hack with an Airtel prepaid card. Also, some companies such as BSNL and Vodafone have flaws in their servers, allowing to use their GPRS network for free. Also, a special tactic involving the pinging of the servers of GPRS providers also allows the obtaining of an IP address which can then be used to use their network.

Holocaust:
Ing Holocaust (ibat king Griegong (): "holos", "mabilug" o "ngan" ampong "kaustos", "mesilab"), a ausan da muring Shoah (Hebreo: ', Latinized "ha'shoah"; Yiddish: ', Latinized "churben" or "hurban") ing katayang gagamitan da para king pamakamate kareng anam a miliung Judiong Europeo aniang Kaduang Gerang Pangyatu, metung a tangkang sistematicung pamangisan ning metung a lahi a dapat ning kapamahalan a Nazi ning Alemani, king lalam nang Adolf Hitler, deng kayang kakampi, ampo reng talausig king kalaba ("collaborators").
Agpang kareng mapilang matenakan king paksa ("scholars"), kailangang iyabe king kabaldugan ning Holocaust ing sistematicung pamakamate da reng Nazi kareng aliwang grupu, kayabe la reng Catolico, lahing Polaco, deng Romani, civilian a Soviet, Soviet a mesucul king gera, deng taung maki kapansanan, deng binabai, deng Saksi nang Jehovah, ampo reng aliwang kalaban a political ampong relihiosu da reng Nazi. Nung tukian ya iting kabaldugan, miras la king pilatan ning 11 miliun ampong 17 miliun a tau. 
Bagia-bagia, o e misanan, ing miliaring pamanalipit ampong laganas a pamacamate. Pilang banua bayu ing umpisa ning Kaduang Gerang Pangyatu, pepaliari da no reng leyi ba lang ikawani deng Judio king sociedad. Mitikdo lang concentration camp nung nu la megobrang anting alipan deng makasukul anggang mete la king pagal o sakit. Aniang mekasakup yang bayung teritoriu ing Katlung Reich king aslagang Europa, pete do reng Judio ampo reng kalaban king pulitica deng makabukud a unit a ausan dang Einsatzgruppen kapamilatan ning pang-maragul a pamamaril. Kilung do kareng ghetto deng Judio ampong Romani bayu ro dela kareng extermination camp kapamilatan da reng tren a magdalang carga, at nung kinabie la king biahi, pete da la kareng gas chamber demg keraklan. Atin yang papil ing balang sanga ning kapamahalan ning Alemaniang Nazi king pamaniapat king pangkabilugan a pamakamate, ania megi yang ausan dang "estadung mangisan lahi" ("a genocidal state") ing kapamahalan ning Alemaniang Nazi. 

Ato Agustin:
I Renato Agustin (mibait Agosto 11, 1963), a mas kilala king lagiung Ato "The Atom Bomb" Agustin, sadiang yang profesional a mamialung basketball a Filipino. Memialung ya i Agustin aniang colegio ya para king Lyceum of the Philippines, bayu ya minalis king Philippine Basketball Association bang mamialung antimong profesional. Mirinan yang galal antimong Most Valuable Player ning PBA i Agustin. Memialung ya para karing San Miguel Beermen, Sunkist/Pop Cola, the Sta. Lucia Realtors, at bandang tauli, king Batang Red Bull. Aniang 2000, gewa reng metugn kareng PBA's 25 Greatest Players i Agustin. King salukuyan, ya ing pekapun a talaturu o "head coach" ning San Sebastian Golden Stags "men's basketball team" king NCAA. 

Bsharri:
Ing Bsharri (a misusulat muring "Becharre", "Bcharre", "Bsharre"; ), metung yang balen king Lebanon a maki kátas a 1,650 m, a malapit king Libis ning Kadisha. Atiu king , king Bsharri (Distritu), king North Governorate. Atiu ya mu king lalam ning kakeua o pulu/gubat a cedro ing Bsharri. Keti ya mibait ing pikabaluan a poeta, talapinta, ampong escultor, i Khalil Gibran, a atin na ngening museo king balen a magparangal kaya. 
Ing Bsharri karinan ne ning balayan da reng tau Fenicia kanitang minunang panaun. Mika santungan la keti deng Cristianong Maronite a tatakas king pamanalipit kareng kayang kabundukan kanitang kapitung dilanua o siglo AD. Ing Libis ning Kadisha, king lalam ning balen, megi yang centrung espiritual ning Pisamban a Maronite. Balu de reng Crusader ing balen king lagiung Buissera.
King Lebanon, kilala da la reng memalen ning Bsharri a matapang ampong matapat king tribu. Particular, pikabaluan la king aliwang tonu neng magsalitang Arabu. E anti kareng aliwang dake ning Lebanon, magagamit ya pa murin ing Aramaic king Bsharri aniang malibutad na king dilanuang 1800. Uli na niti, masikan ing tonu da reng tubu king Bsharri angga pa ngeni, at pagmaragul dang mayap iti. 
Aniang Gerang civil king Lebanon (1975–1990), metung yang baluarti ning pamaglaban da reng Cristiano laban king Syria ing Bsharri. Aniang 1986, i Samir Geagea, a tubu king Bsharri, megi yang pekapun ning pangimut a Lebanese Forces (LF). Dakal a kayanib ning LF ing miagiag king balen aniang gerang civil. Maralas dong amanuan a talapamingua da reng Maronite king Lebanon deng tubu king Bsharri. 
Mipapaburen ya pa murin king kapamahalan ing balen, at ala yang ospital, universidad, o proyectung munie carera kareng kayang kayanakan, ania mamalis la kareng lakanbalen/ciudad ampo kareng aliwang bansa.
Ngeni, atiu ing balen king metung a labuad a dakal a turista. Mayayakit la keti deng lugal a pupuntalan dang turista, kayabe ne ing Libingan ampong Museong Gibran, ing Libis nign Kadisha, nung nu ya tinuknang i Antonios Torbey antimong ermitaniu king Hermitage of St. Lichaa king lalam king libis; ing Kadisha Grotto, ing kakeuan o kagubatan/pulung Cedro ning Dios, metugn a ski resort, ampo ing Bka'kafra (ing lugal nang kebaitan San Charbel). 
Atin yang Lebanese Red Cross First Aid Center ing Bsharri.. Also it is home for the "The Maronite Scouts" that started their activities early 2000. Makabasi la murin keti deng "The Maronite Scout" a migumpisa kareng karelang actividad aniang mumunang dake ning 2000.

Khalil Gibran:
I Khalil Gibran (mibait Gibran Khalil Gibran bin Mikhā'īl bin Sa'ad; Arabu , Enero 6, 1883 – Abril 10, 1931) a mayayaus muring Kahlil Gibran, metung yang talagulis, poeta, ampong talasulat a Lebanese American. Mibait ya king balen ning Bsharri a ngeni atiu king Lebanon (at kanita atiu king Ottoman Syria), minalis ya kayabe ning kayang pamilia king Estados Unidos nung nu ya megaral arte, at nung nu na inumpisan ing kayang carera king paniulat. Makikilala ya keraklan uling king kayang librung mibulalag aniang 1923, ing "The Prophet", a serie da reng salese o essay a makasulat king prosang Ingles. Metung yang maranun a alimbawa ning inspirational fiction ing libru, a matalik misali lipat ning marimla dang pamanggap deng criticu, at sinikat yang ustu king 1960s counterculture.

Aliwa:
Dalerayan.
Michael Corrigan mentions another writer's use of The Prophet in his grief memoir, A Year and a Day, published by the Idaho State University Press, 2008.

Hector Calma:
I Hector Calma (mibait Marzo 2, 1960) metung yang retiradung profesional a mamialung basketball. Maki kátas yang 5 pie ampong 8 pulgada, memialung ya bilang point guard, at kilala ya antimong kayanib king San Miguel Beer team ning Philippine Basketball Association. 

Samir Geagea:
I Samir Farid Geagea (Arabu: سمير فريد جعجع, a misusulat muring Samir Ja`ja`), mibait Octubre 25 1952, ing salukuyan a pekapun ning partido political a Lebanese Forces (LF). Metung ya muring manimunang kayanib king March 14 Alliance, kayabe ya i Saad Hariri ampo i Amine Gemayel. 
Megi yang pekapun ning Lebanese Forces aniang 1986.
Kaibat ning guerrang civil, meragul ing pamamilit ibang king Syriang tanggapan neng Gegea ing presencia ning Syria, o marap kareng casu. Bayu ya merakap, lepitan de reng politicung maki simpatia kaya, at inaluk deng ligtas a pamaglual king Lebanon. Aniang 1994, apat a banua kaibat ning pangayari ning Guerrang Civil king Lebanon, linitis de para kareng apat a pamakamateng political,kayabe ne ing pamakamate kang Pun Mininstru Rashid Karami aniang 1987, ampo ing e melaus a pamakamate kang Ministru nign Defensa/Pamaglualu Michel Murr aniang 1991. Tinanggi ya kareng eganaganang sasangkan da, dapot miyatulan yang migkasala, at mirinan yang apat a sentencia nign kamatayan, at balang metung kareti, mebawas la at miyalis king kabang bie king sukulan. Geagea was imprisoned in solitary confinement below the Lebanese Ministry of Defense building in Beirut for the next 11 years. Mekulung ya king solitary confinement i Geagea king lalam ning Ministerio ning Pamaglualu king Beirut aniang tutuking 11 a banua. Ya kabud pekapun ning militiang mekulung para kareng crimen a merapat aniang Guerrang Civil king Lebanon. 
Kaibat ning Cedar Revolution, ampo ing katuki na niting pamaglako da reng fuerza ning Syria king Lebanon, migbotu ya ing bayung alal a Parlamento ning Lebanon a pagkalubanan yang amnestia aniang Julio 18, 2005. 

Charbel Makhlouf:
I San Charbel , o Sharbel, (, Mayo 8 1828 – Diciembre 24 1898), a mibait a maki lagiung Youssef Antoun Makhlouf king Bekaa Kafra king pangulung Lebanon, metung yang mongha ampong paring Maronite a Catolico a ngeni dirinan dang kagalangan antimong metung a santo

Málaga del Fresno:
Ing Málaga del Fresno metung yang municipalidad atiu king lalawigan ning Guadalajara, Castile-La Mancha, Espania. Agpang keng 2004 census (INE), ing municipalidad atin yang populasiun a 198 a pakatuknang.

Malaguilla:
Ing Malaguilla metung yang municipalidad atiu king lalawigan ning Guadalajara, Castile-La Mancha, Espania. Agpang keng 2004 census (INE), ing municipalidad atin yang populasiun a 154 a pakatuknang.
is a municipality located in the province of Guadalajara, Castile-La Mancha, Spain. According to the 2004 census (INE), the municipality has a population of 137 inhabitants.

Mandayona:
Ing Mandayona metung yang municipalidad atiu king lalawigan ning Guadalajara, Castile-La Mancha, Espania. Agpang keng 2004 census (INE), ing municipalidad atin yang populasiun a 405 a pakatuknang.

Mantiel:
Ing Mantiel metung yang municipalidad atiu king lalawigan ning Guadalajara, Castile-La Mancha, Espania. Agpang keng 2004 census (INE), ing municipalidad atin yang populasiun a 154 a pakatuknang.
is a municipality located in the province of Guadalajara, Castile-La Mancha, Spain. According to the 2004 census (INE), the municipality has a population of 79 inhabitants.

Abtsgmünd:
Ing Abtsgmünd metung yang municipalidad king Aleman state ning Baden-Württemberg, king Ostalbkreis distritu. 
Bantug a tagakarin kayabe ya i Patrick Benedict Zimmer a mibait keng balen.

Yeng Guiao:
I Joseller "Yeng" Guiao (mibait Marzo 19, 1959) metung yang "head coach" a Filipino king profesional a basketball para karing Burger King Whoppers king Philippine Basketball Association, at ya mu namang salukuyan a "head coach" ning Philippine National Basketball Team. Sinambut neng apat a titulu king PBA i Guiao manibat aniang inumpisan na ing obra na antimong "head coach" para king Swift aniang mumunang dake ning decadang 1990. Megi yang "commissioner" ning Philippine Basketball League manibat aniang 1997 anggang 2000. Ya mu namang kasalungsungang Kaduang Pun Lalawigan ("Vice Governor") ning Lalawigan ning Pampanga. 

Philippine Basketball Association:
Ing Philippine Basketball Association (PBA) metung yang liga ning profesional a basketball king Filipinas a mitátag kanitang 1975. Ini ing pekamatuang ligang profesional a basketball king Asia. Deng kayang patakaran anti lang pisamut deng king FIBA ampong deng king NBA. 
King salukuyan, i Commissioner Sonny Barrios ing mamuntukan king liga.

Bashir Gemayel:
I Bachir Gemayel (10 Noviembre 1947 – 14 Setiembre 1982) (ing lagiu na misusulat ya mu namang Bashir at ing pilidu na, misusulat ya ring al-Jumayyil El Gemaiel, Joomayyeel) (بشير الجميّل) metung yang politicu, pekapun ning militia, ampong miyalal a pamuntuk o presidenti ning Lebanon. Metung yang matas a kayanib ning partido Phalange ampong comandante ning militiang Lebanese Forces aniang mumunang banua ning Guerrang Civil ning Lebanon (1975-90). Miyalal yang pamuntuk aniang Agosto 23, 1982 kabang misasagsag ya ing bangsa king guerrang civil at pareu deng sasakupan ding Israel ampong Syria. Mete ya aniang Setiembre 14, 1982, kayabe la ring 26 a yaliwa, aniang memakbung ya ing metung a bomba king pun tanggapan na king Beirut ning Phalange. Binili neng Habib Tanious Shartouni ing bomba. Singkanan ne ning FBI ing Syrian Social Nationalist Party. 

Kataeb (partido):
Ing Partido Democratico Social ning Lebanon — a mas kilala king Ingles antimong Phalange, at king Castila antimong Falanges — metung yang partidong political king Lebanon a "right-wing" o maka-wanan. Lipat ning oficial yang secular o alang relihiun, ing keraklan kareng susuporta kaniti, Cristianu lang Maronite. Maragul ing megi nang papil ning partidu king Guerrang Civil ning Lebanon (1975-90). Mababawas ne upaya kanitang decadang 1980 ampong 1990, dapot bagia-bagia yang mibabalik ya king ecsena manibat king umpisa ning 2000. Kayabe ne ngeni king mayoria king parlamento, ing March 14 Alliance, a kalaban ning alianzang panimunang ning Hezbollah ampo ning Free Patriotic Movement.
Lagiu.
Ing Partido Democratico Social ning Lebanon kilala ya king Frances antimong Phalanges Libanaises o Kataeb (الكتائب اللبنانية) king Arabu. Ing "Kataeb" ing plural o pang-keraklan ning "Katiba", yang pangasulat na king Arabu ning katayang Griegung Phalanx - "battalion" - a ya muring penibatan ning katayang Castilang "Falange".

Pierre Gemayel:
I Sheikh Pierre Gemayel () (Noviembre 6, 1905 – Agosto 29, 1984) (ing pilidu na misusulat ya mu namang Jmayyel, Jemayyel o al-Jumayyil, ing Sheikh titulu yang pamamie galang kareng bangsang Arabu), metung yang pekapun king politica king Lebanon. Kilala ya king kayang pamagtátag king Kataeb (partido) (a balu ra murin king lagiung Phalangist), antimong mamilatan king upaya king parlamento, ampong antimong tata da ri Bashir Gemayel ampong Amine Gemayel, a pareung miyalal a Pamuntuk ning Republica aniang mabie ya pa. Sinalungat ya king Mandato ning Francia aniang tauli nang dake ning decadang 1930 ampong mumuna nang dake ning decadang 1940, at sinuporta ya king metung a timawang estadu, a libri king pamanalan da reng aliwang bangsa. Balu re king kayang ma-abilidad a pangimut king politica, a penibatan da reng posiciun a akakit da reng kayang kakampi antimong practical, dapot para kareng kayang kalaban, misasalungat, nun e ipocritu. Lipat ning simpatia na king páglaban da reng Palestino king publicu, elilan ne ing kayang paglalawe kaibat uling king pamaniuporta da reng Palestino king Lebanese National Movement (Pambansang Pangimut ning Lebanon) ampo ing kayang kapaniausan a arian ya ing National Pact (Pambangsang Pamikasundu) at mitátag democraciang e kikilala kareng secta. 
Metung yang controversial a politicu, at kinabie ya kareng mapilang pamagtangka king bie. E la makanian kasuerti deng aliwa nang sapni. Pete re ing kayang anak, i Bashir Gemayel, aniang 14 Setiembre 1982 kaibat nang miyalal a Pamuntuk ning Lebanon. Ing kayang apú, i Pierre Amine Gemayel, metung a Ministru king Gabineti, pete re mu naman. Makanian murin ing miliari kareng aliwa nang palipi. 

Pierre Amine Gemayel:
I Pierre Amine Gemayel (Arabu: ; a maralas ausan dang Pierre Gemayel Jr., Pierre Amine o kabud namu Pierre Gemayel; Setiembre 24 1972 – Noviembre 21 2006) metung yang politicu king Lebanon king Partido Kataeb, a mas balu ra antimong Phalange Party king Ingles. Ing kaduang pekayanak a MP (miembru ning parlamento), mabilis yang mitatas kabilian king kayang partidu. Masikan yang criticu ning presencia ning militar ning Syria ampong pamag-domina king politica ning Lebanon, at activu yang kayanib king mayoria king parlamentong sasalungat king Syria at kakampi king Albugan ("pro-Western"), ing March 14 Alliance.
Magsilbi ya antimong Ministro ning Industria aniang pete re kanitang Noviembre 21 2006. Ya ing katlung miembru ning kayang familiang pete ra kilub ning aduang pulu't limang banua. Pete re ing bapa na, i Bashir Gemayel, aniang 1982, king edad a 34, at itang anak nang pabanuang Bashir, mete ya king bomba king cochi kanitang 1980, a para kanu kaya.
I Gemayel ing kalimang sikat a taung contra kareng Syrian a pete ra kilub ning aduang banua.

William Hawi:
William Amine Hawi (misusulat muring: William Haoui), — (Setiembre 5, 1908 – Julio 13, 1976), () 
Mikiabe ya i William Hawi king Partido Kataeb (() a mas kilala king Ingles antimong Phalangist party organization, metung a maka-wanan ("right wing") a partido king Lebanon, aniang 1937.
Mituldu yang Pekapun ("Head") da reng Kadua ampong Kapat a Distritu, Pamuntuk ("President") ning Recruitment Bureau, Pekapun nign Departamentu ning Seguridad ampong Movilizacion aniang Mayo May 29, 1952, ampong kayanib ning Buro Political aniang Julio July 12, 1952. Aniang Junio 16, 1958, ya ing manibala king pamag-organisa ampong pamanalan kareng activista kareng kapaliarian king Lebanon; ini ing centru da reng Regulatory Forces ning Partido. Kanitang Enero 23, 1961, leko ne ning Buro Political ing sadiang aguman da reng militanti, kayabe no reng kayanib king Partido Phalange, at lelangan neng Hawi ing Regulatory Forces. Kanitang Febrero 6, 1961, mituldu yang Pekapun da reng mesabing Fuerza i William Hawi. Aniang 1963, melalang ya ing unit a “First Commandos”, at tikian ne ning “Second Commandos” unit, at kaibat ning “P.G.” troop. Melalang ne man aniang 1973 ing "Maghaweer" platoon, at mitátag ya ing “Combat School”. Karagdagan kaniti, penibalan nang “Chef” William ing pamanikdo kareng campu, ampo ing pamanibala ampong pamanalkus ("development") ning pamagsane, a migpasulung king procesu ning regulacion. 
Kanitang 1952, linaban ne ning Phalange i William Hawi king Consejo Municipal ("Municipal Council") ning Beirut, king labuad ning Achrafieh-Rmeil, nung nukarin ya ing dakal dili ikuang botu. Aniang 1957, mikiabe ya king alalan para king parlamento, oneng mesambut ya. 
Aniang 1975, manimuna ya king pamamingua laban king pamaglusub da reng Palestino i Hawi kareng Souk ning Beirut, Karantina, Jisr el Basha, Dekwaneh, Galerie Semaan ampo ing ausan dang "Hotels fight". 
Aniang Julio 1, 1976, bilalag da reng tatalan kareng fuerzang aliadong Lebanese ing pangabagsak ning tauling baluarti king Tel el-Zaatar[http://www.liberty05.com/civilwar/civil1.html] at sinabi rang ing Pamuntuk ning Phalange War Council ing menibala kaniting operacion. 
Kanitang Julio 13, 1976, mete ya i William Hawi king libutad ning pamilaban king Tel el-Zaatar[http://www.liberty05.com/civilwar/civil1.html] a maki balas king kayang kanuan. Kamate na, mituldu yang kayalili na antimong pamuntuk ning Kataeb Military Council, a meging penibatan da ring Lebanese Forces, i Bashir Gemayel. 
Karagdagang babasan.
"William Hawi, Witness and Martyr", by Leila Hawi Zod, Mémoire DEA, Faculty of History, Université Saint Esprit, Kaslik, Lebanon, 2004.

Sethrida Geagea:
I Sethrida Tawk Geagea (), (misusulat ya mu namang "Sitrida" or "Setrida" ing kayang lagiu) metung yang politicung Lebanese a mibait aniang Mayo 31, 1967 king Kumasi, Ghana.

Reynato Puno:
I Reynato S. Puno (mibait Mayo 17, 1940) ing kasalungsungan a Pamuntuk ding Majistrado ning Kakataskatasan a Ukuman ning Filipinas. Tildu neng Pamuntuk Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo aniang Diciembre 8, 2006, at ya ing ka-23 a taung sinuyu antimong Pamuntuk ding Majistrado o "Chief Justice". Minuna yang mituldu king Kakataskatasan a Ukuman antimong Majistrado aniang Junio 28, 1993. 

Artemio Panganiban:
I Artemio V. Panganiban (mibait Diciembre 7, 1936), a mipalaguan "The Renaissance Jurist of the 21st Century" ing ka-21 a Pamuntuk ding Majistrado ning Kakataskatasan a Ukuman ning Filipinas [http://cjpanganiban.ph/bio-data]

Adelmannsfelden:
Ing Adelmannsfelden metung yang municipalidad king Aleman state ning Baden-Württemberg, king Ostalbkreis distritu. 

Bartholomä:
Ing Bartholomä metung yang municipalidad king Aleman state ning Baden-Württemberg, king Ostalbkreis distritu. 

Jimmy Wales:
I Jimmy Donal "Jimbo" Wales (; mibait Agosto 7, 1966) metung yang Americanung negosianti king Aptas ("Internet entrepreneur") ampong kayabeng talatátag at saka promoter ning Wikipedia.
Mibait ya i Wales king Huntsville, Alabama. Megaral ya king metung a malating pipagaralan a privadu, king university preparatory school, at kaibat miyari ya kareng cursung bachelor's ampong master's degrees king pisasalpian ("finance"). Kabang atiu king escuelang graduadu o "graduate school", tinuru ya kareng aduang universidad. Kaibat, megobra ya king pisalapian, at migsilbi yang pekapun king pamanialugsug ("research director") ning metung a cumpaniang futures and options king Chicago kilub ning mapilang banua. Aniang 1996, tetag ne kayabe la reng aduang ka-sosiu ing Bomis, metung a web portal o pasbung pang-Aptas a pang-lalaki, at migdala ("hosted"), ampong minie cualta aniang purmeru, king peer-reviewed encyclopedia, ing Nupedia (2000–2003) ampo ing kayang katuki, ing Wikipedia.
Aniang 2001, kayabe ya i Larry Sanger ampo reng aliwa, sinaup ya i Wales king pamibulalag king Wikipedia, metung a enciclopediang libri ampong makabusni laman ("open-content") a e migluat meragul mayap ampong meging sikat.
a b g h i "Wales, though, was a businessman. He wanted to build a free encyclopedia, and Wikipedia offered a very rapid and economically efficient means to that end. The articles flooded in, many were good, and they cost him almost nothing. [...] In 2003, Wales to diminish his own authority by transferring Wikipedia and all of its assets to the nonprofit Wikimedia Foundation, whose sole purpose is to set general policy for Wikipedia and its allied projects. [...] Wales’s benign rule has allowed Wikipedia to do what it does best: grow. The numbers are staggering."
c "Wales focused on the bottom-up strategy using Web rings, and it worked. Bomis users built hundreds of rings—on cars, computers, sports, and especially 'babes' (e.g., the Anna Kournikova Web ring), effectively creating an index of the 'laddie' Web. Instead of helping all users find all content, Bomis found itself positioned as the Playboy of the Internet, helping guys find guy stuff."
d e f "The wiki quickly gained a devoted following within the software community. And there it remained until January 2001, when Sanger had dinner with an old friend named Ben Kovitz. [... Over tacos that night, Sanger explained his concerns about Nupedia’s lack of progress, the root cause of which was its serial editorial system. [...] Kovitz brought up the wiki and sketched out 'wiki magic,' the mysterious process by which communities with common interests work to improve wiki pages by incremental contributions. If it worked for the rambunctious hacker culture of programming, Kovitz said, it could work for any online collaborative project. The wiki could break the Nupedia bottleneck by permitting volunteers to work simultaneously all over the project."</ref> Aniang makikilala ne ing Wikipedia, i Wales ing kayang meging promotor ampong talapagsalita. King kasalesayan, i Wales ing tuturing dang co-founder ning Wikipedia, dapot sasalungat ya king aus a "co-" at tuturing ne ing sarili nang "sole founder" o bukud a talatátag. Magsilbi ya king Board of Trustees ning Wikimedia Foundation, ing e magtubung aguman a paniaup ("non-profit charitable organization") a magpalakad king Wikipedia. Ya ing tatalan king puestung "community founder" a tutulduan ning lupung o board. Aniang 2004, kayabe ya kareng mitátag king Wikia, metung a privadu ampong libring "web-hosting service", kayabe ya ing kalupa nang Wikimedia trustee, i Angela Beesley.
Mekatadua ne mekiasawa i Wales, at atin yang anak a babai kang Christine, ing kadua nang asawa, nung kaninu ya kawani. Lalarawan ne ing sarili na antimong Objectivist ampong, maki kapikakunuan, metung a libertarian. Uli ning kayang papil king pamaglalang king Wikipedia, inabe ne ning "Time" kareng peka ma-influenciang tau king yatu aniang 2006. I Wales ing "de factong" pekapun ning Wikipedia; ing exactu nang puestu king proyectu pididibatian ding malda ampo kareng diariu.

Frank Herbert:
I Franklin Patrick Herbert, Jr. (Octubre 8, 1920 – Febrero 11, 1986) metung yang talasulat science fiction a Americanung pupurian da reng criticu ampong matagumpe basi kareng misaling libru. Metung yang talasulat makuyad a salita ("short story writer"), dapot pikabaluan yang dili kareng kayang novela, lalu na ing "Dune" ampo reng kayang limang sequel. Ing "Dune" saga, a mibili king marayung paintungulan at miliari kilub da reng libu-libung banua, tungkul ya kareng temang kalupa ning pamanatiling mabie ning tau ampong ebolusion, ecologia, ampo ing pamitupa ning relihion, politica ampong upaya. Ing "Dune" ing "masaling diling novelang science fiction ning sablang panaun," at tuturing deng "classic" ning uri ning paniulat a iti ing serie. 

Kaladua:
Ing kaladua ("soul" king Ingles, "alma" king Castila) a kareng dakal a relihion, tradicion a espiritual, ampong filosofia, ya pin ing dake ning metung a mabibie a espiritual, at keraklan, alang angga, a maliaring mieng makakawani king katawan, at makakawani king pisical a sangkap ning katawan. Keraklan, isipan dang bibilugan ne ning kamalayan ampong personalidad, at maliaring kalupa ne ning espiritu, kaisipan o sarili. Maralas, paniwalan dang mabie ya pa murin ing kaladua kaibat ning pisical nang pangamate ning tau, at agpang kareng aliwang relihion, maglalang yang kaladua ing Dios. Kareng mapilan a cultura, deng mabibieng e tau, at neng kai, deng bage (antimo reng ilug) atin lang kaladua, metung a paniwalang ausan dang animism.
Maralas, pililibe do reng katayang "kaladua" ampong "espiritu", dapot itang tauli mas makayatu ya ampong e makaing lalagpus ("less transcendent") cumpara ketang mumuna. Maliari la muring ituring a mipapareu deng katayang "kaladua" ampong "psyche", dapot ing "psyche" mas pisical ya kabaldugan, kabang ing "kaladua" mas makaugne ya king metafisica ampong relihion.

Ellwangen:

Atin yang 17 kilometru pangulu ning Aalen. Atin yang 25,000 pakatuknang

Essingen:
Ing Essingen (Ostalbkreis) atiu king State ning Baden-Württemberg king Aleman. Atiu mga 73 km aslagan ning Stuttgart, keng yang kilual ning lakanbalen ning Aalen. Ing Rems a ilug magumpisa ya keta mismu kilual ning Essingen, king paragus pababa keng Remstal (Rems Valley) at salupung ya king Neckar malapit Stuttgart.

Göggingen:

Heubach:

Aitu 10 km aslagan ning Schwäbisch Gmünd, ampong 13 km maulingalbugan ning Aalen. Ing balen atiu king sepu ning ilug Rems Ilug saug keng bibitisan ning Swabian Alps. 
Ing Heubach atiu king Swabian labuad ning Aleman at deng pakatuknang keraklan magsalita lang Swabian German dialect.

Thumbnail:
Deng thumbnail mangalati lang bersion da reng larawan, a gagamitan ba lang akilala ampong asamasan deti, at maki pareu lang papil para kareng larawan, anti ing normal a index o indice ning kasulatan para kareng kataya. Ngening panaun da reng digital a larawan, gagamit lang thumbnail deng program a visual search engine ampong deng program a manayus o mag-organisa kareng larawan, kalupa da reng modernung operating system o gagamitan a pang-‘’desktop’’, alimbawa ing Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X, KDE, ampong GNOME.

Nuremberg:
Ing Nuremberg ( ) metung yang lakanbalen king Aleman state ning Bavaria, king administratibung labuad ning Middle Franconia. Atiu keng ilug Pegnitz ampo king Rhine-Main-Danube Canal at iti ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen king Franconia. Atiu mga 170 kilometres pangulu ning Munich, mika karinan a 49.27° N 11.5° E. Ing kayang populasiun (agpang inyang Eneru 2006) 500,132 ya. Ing Nuremberg at ding kayang kasiping a puruk atin yang 1,020,000 (2001) pakatuknang.

Bremen:
Ing Lakanbalen Municipalidad ning Bremen (, ) metung yang Hanseatic lakanbalen king pangulung Aleman. Metung yang pantalan lakanbalen keng dane ning ilug Weser, mga mauli manibat keng alua ning Pangulung Dayatmalat, ing Bremen dake ne ning Bremen-Oldenburg metropolitan area (2.37 million people). Ing Bremen ampo ing Bremerhaven ila reng aduang lakanbalen keng state ning Bremen (official name: Freie Hansestadt Bremen - "Free Hanseatic Lakanbalen ning Bremen"). Ing Bremen iya ing pangaduang pekamarakal a populasiun a lakanbalen king Pangulung Aleman ampong pangapulu king Aleman.

Leipzig:
Ing Leipzig (, mayayaus mu rin Leipsic keng English; ), atin yang populasiun a 515,459, iti ing pekamaragul diling lakanbalen keng federal state ning Saxony, Germany.
History.
Penibatan.
Ing lagiung Leipzig meyakua ya keng amanung Slavic a katayang "Lipsk", nung nu mangabaldugan yang pituknangan nung nu deng pun dutung a dalayap pakatalakad la.

Dresden:
Ing Dresden () iya ing tungku]] na ning timawang Estadu ning Saxony king Aleman. Atiu king saug ning Ilug Elbe. Ing Dresden dake ne ning Saxon Triangle metropolitan area.

Tourism and business

Düsseldorf:
Ing Düsseldorf () iya ing tungku (kabisera) ning Aleman estadu ning North Rhine-Westphalia. Iti ing pangaduang pekamaulaga panginternational at pangeconomia kalibudtaran ning Aleman, kaibat ning lakanbalen Frankfurt, at atiu king kalibudtan ning Rhein-Ruhr karinan, metung kareng pekamarakal a populasiun ning Europa. Ing lakanbalen atiu keng Ilug Rhine, at bantug ya kareng dakal a kasiyahan at malan susulud a makausu ampo ding kayang kalakalan a biyangyang da. Balng Julio maiggit 4.5 yuta (million) katau la reng bibisita keng "Größte Kirmes am Rhein" pipagsayan king Dusseldorf. Iti mu ring ing pibalebale ra ring bantug a mapanyasag a a talatigtig a lupung Kraftwerk.

Google Street View:
Ing Google Street View metung ya kareng bageng yampang ning Google Maps ampo ning Google Earth a babie bista o pamagbationg ("views") 360° a pakera ("horizontal") ampong 290° patikdo ("vertical") a maleparan ("panoramic") ibat king dane da reng puestu king dalan (manga metung balang 10 o 20 metru) para kareng dakal a dalan king yatu, ibat king kátas a 2.5 metru. Inumpisan de aniang Mayo 25, 2007, at bagia bagia, miragdagan la reng kayabeng lakanbalen o ciudad, at kareng lakanbalen a reti, karagdagan a dalan, bukud kareng lugal a marangle. King salukuyan, ating larawan para king Estados Unidos, United Kingdom, Czech Republic, Francia, Italia, Mexico, Netherlands, Portugal, Espania, Suiza, Canada, Japan, Taiwan, Australia, ampong New Zealand. Maliari palto ing pangayabe ("coverage") kapamilatan ning pamag-drag king "pegman" ibat king kayang puestu, papunta king mapa ning sanu mang sukad. 
Ing kukua kareng papakit nang larawan ning Google Street metung yang grupu da reng coching "Chevrolet Cobalt", "Saturn Astra" o "Toyota Prius" king Pangulung America, "Opel Astra" king Europa, "Holden Astra" king Australia ampong New Zealand, "Toyota Prius" king Japan, "Fiat Stilo" king Brazil, [Vitz|Toyota Yarisking South Africa ampong "Pontiac G5" king Mexico. Mapaliaring e la kayabe deng daralanan da reng taung lalakad ("pedestrian areas"), mangakitid a dalan ampong esquinita da reng parque a e ra aluban deng cochi. Nanupata, neng kai, gagamit lang "Google Trike" (tricycle). King balang metung kareng coching deti (ampo reng tricycle) ating siam a directional camera para kareng pamagbationg 360°, GPS para king ustung pamagpuestu, atlung laser range scanner, a gewa ning SICK, para king pamaniukad angga king 50 metru 180° king arap ning saken. Atin muring 3G/GSM/Wi-Fi antenna kareng cochi para king pamag-scan 3G/GSM ampong Wi-Fi hotspot. Bayu-bayu pamu, makabasi la reng matas kalinawan a larawan ("high quality images") kareng open source hardware camera ibat king Elphel. Gagamitan na la murin ning Google book search deng camerang deti.
Nung maliari, lalto la reng larawan ning mayayakit king dalan lagpus king pekamatas a level ning pamag-zoom kareng mapa ampong letratung satellite, ampo kapamilatan ning pamg[drag king "pegman" king metung a puestu. Kapamilatan ning keyboard o mouse, maliari yang pilinan ing direccion ning pamaglaweng pakera ampong patikdo, at pati ing zoom level. Papakit ne ning matulid o maki patad ("broken") a gulis king letratu, maliari yang akit ing mitantiang delanan ning coching maki caera; ating aduang "arrow" o paslung makasuglung king tutuking letratu king balang metung a direccion. Kareng salapungan dalan ("junction") ampong lilipatan ("crossings") kareng daralanan da reng coching maki camera, mas dakal la reng paslu.
Aniang Noviembre 21, 2008, miragdag ya ing Street View king Maps application a maka-install kareng anggang Apple iPhone. Kanitang Diciembre 10, 2008, miragdag ya ing Street View king Maps application para king S60 3rd Edition. Miragdag ya murin ing Street View kareng bersion ning Google Maps para king Windows Mobile ampong BlackBerry. Miyabe ya murin ing Street View kareng anggang bersion ning Google Maps para king Android, at maliari yang gamitan ing digital compass bang lumawe king paligid da reng lugal.

Google Maps:
Ing Google Maps (a kanita maki lagiung Google Local) metung yang simpling web mapping "service application" ampong tecnologiang ibat king Google, a libri (para king pamangamit a e pang-negocio), a papalakad kareng dakal a serbiciong makabasi kareng mapa, kayabe ne ing "website" o karinan king Aptas a Google Maps, Google Ride Finder, Google Transit, ampong mapang makakutkut ("embedded") kareng "third-party website" kapamilatan ning Google Maps API. Miyayampang yang mapa da reng dalan, metung a route planner para king pamaglakbeng lalakad, maka-cochi, o makasaken a pampublico, ampong "urban business locator" para kareng dakal a bangsa king mabilug a yatu. Agpang king metung king kayang talapaglalang, i (Lars Rasmussen), ing Google Maps metung yang "paralan ning pamag-organisa ning informacion king yatu agpang king geografia".
Uling gagamit yang Mercator projection ing Google Maps, e no apakit deng lugal a malapit kareng polo o "pole". Metung yang productung kawangis na ing Google Earth, metung a program a magsarili ("stand-alone program") para king Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X, Linux, SymbianOS, ampong iPhone OS a mas dakal ampang a magpalto king mabilug a yatu, kayabe na ing labuad o lugal da reng polo.

Google Earth:
Ing Google Earth metung yang virtual globe, mapa ampong geograficong information program a aniang mumuna ausan dang EarthViewer 3D, at lelangan ning Keyhole, Inc, metung a cumpaniang asali ning Google kanitang 2004. Gagawa yang mapa ning Yatu kapamilatan ning pamitumpak-tumpak da reng larawan a mekua king satellite imagery, pamagletratu manibat kareng eruplanu ampong GIS 3D globe. Mibulalag ya kareng atlung miayaliwang licencia: ing Google Earth, metung a libreng bersion a limitadu agagawa; ing Google Earth Plus (e misundu), a maki karagdagan a yampang; ampo ing Google Earth Pro ($400 balang banua), a para king gamit a pang-negociu ("for commercial use").
Mibulalag yang pasibayu ing productu antimong Google Earth kanitang 2005, at king salukuyan, maliari yang gamitan kareng personal computer a gagamit king Windows 2000 patás, Mac OS X 10.3.9 ampong patás, Linux Kernel: 2.4 o mas bayu (pepalual da aniang Junio 12, 2006), ampong FreeBSD. Ing Google Earth magagamit ya mu naman antimong browser plugin a mipalual kanitang Mayo 28, 2008. Mibili ya mu naman king iPhone OS aniang Octubre 27, 2008, antimong libring kuldas ("free download") ibat king App Store. Bukud king pamagpalual king metung a mibayung client a basi king Keyhole, digdag no murin ning Google deng larawan ibat king karelang database king Yatu ketang karelang mapping software a makabasi king Aptas ("web based"). Mika makatapulung pamandagdag king pamanalto king media kareng virtual globe pilatan ning 2005 and 2006 uli ning pamaglual ning Google Earth king malda aniang Junio 2005, at iti, pepasikan ning interes da reng tau kareng tecnologiang geospatial ampo ing karelang gamit o aplicacion.

Katherine Mansfield:
I Kathleen Mansfield Murry (14 Octubre 1888 – 9 Enero 1923) metung yang pikabaluan a modernistang talasulat ning makuyad a paniulat a pikudta ("short fiction") a mibait at meragul king New Zealand aniang sakup ne pa ning Bretaña, at sínulat king lalam ning talipampan a Katherine Mansfield, a makuyad a porma ning kayang tutung lagiu, uling mibait yang Katherine Mansfield Beauchamp. Meko ya i Mansfield papunta king Gran Bretaña aniang 1908, at karin, akilala no reng talasulat a Modernista kalupa nang D.H. Lawrence ampong Virginia Woolf, a megi nang malapit a kaluguran. Maralas, dudurut la reng kayang makuyad a salita kareng penandit ning kaguluan ("moments of disruption"), at pane, bigla ing karelang pangabuklat. Kayabe la kareng kilalang dili kareng kayang gewa deng "The Garden Party," "The Daughters of the Late Colonel," ampong "The Fly." Aniang Mumunang Guerrang Pangyatu, mesakit yang tuberculosis i Mansfield, at uli na niti, e mekapagbalik o ne mekapagbisita king New Zealand, at yang kemate na king edad a 34. 

Bienvenido Santos:
I Bienvenido N. Santos (1911-1996) metung yang Filipino-Americanong talasulat ning paniulat a pikudta ("fiction") ampong e pikudta ("nonfiction"), ampong poeta. Mibait ya ampong meragul king Tondo, Menila. Ibat la reng kayang pipumpunan king Lubao, Pampanga, Filipinas. Maluat yang menuknangan king Estados Unidos, nung nu re tuturing metung kareng menimunang ("pioneering") talasulat a Asiano-Americano.
Obra.
Pamitipun da reng Makuyad a Salita.
COLLECTIONS OF LETTERS..(UNKNOWN)
Critical a pamanigaral.
as of March 2008:

Ángela Manalang Gloria:
I Angela Manalang Gloria (1907 - 1995) metung yang babaing poeta o watas a Filipina king Ingles.
Talambie.
Mibait ya i Ángela Caridad Manalang y Legaspi aniang Agosto 2, 1907 king Guagua, Pampanga kareng kayang pengari, i Felipe Dizon Manalang (mibait king Mexico, Pampanga) ampo i Tomasa Legaspi. Nanupata, minalis ya ing karelang pamiia king labuad a Bicol, particular king Albay. Megaral ya i Caring king St. Agnes Academy king Legaspi, nung nu ya miyaring valedictorian king elementaria. Aniang banua nang senior, minalis ya king St. Scholastica's College king Malate, Manila, nung nukarin minuna yang mepansin ing kayang pamaniulat.
Kayabe ya kareng mumunang henerasion da reng babaing talapagaral king Universidad ning Filipinas i Angela Manalang. Aniang mumuna, pepalista yang magaral king leyi o "law" i Angela, anti ing munikala nang tata na. Nanupata, agpang king usuk ning kayang professor a megi na muring migiya kaya, i C.V. Wickers, minalis ya king malagung paniulat o literatura. 
Kanita muring panaun a magaral ya king Universidad ning Filipinas megi neng karibal pang-kabang bie ing metung pang poeta, i Jose Garcia Villa. Miligligan la para king posicion ning talapatuntun a pang-literatura ("literary editor") ning "The Philippine Collegian" deng aduang poeta, a adua nang tuki-tuking banuang telan Manalang. Aniang katlu nang banua ("junior year"), mekikaburi ("engaged") ya kang Celedonio Gloria, a ayasawa na. Miyari yang summa cum laude aniang Marzo 1929 a maki titulung Ph.B.
Kayari na king colegio, megobra yang sinaguli i Manalang-Gloria para king "Philippine Herald Mid-Week Magazine". Nanupata, meputut iti aniang mesakit yang tuberculosis. Kanitang Marzo 11, 1945, selakayan deng patrol a Japon king Alitagtag, Batangas ing kayang asawang i Celedonio ampo ing kayang anak, i Ruben. Lipat ning mete ya ing asawa na, kinabie ya i Ruben, dapot makanian kagrabi ing denasan nang pangabigla ("trauma"), ania e na agiung tandanan ing pamanataqui. Melakuan yang anák a balu o viuda i Manalang-Gloria, a kailangang magparagul kareng atlung ának. Uli na niti, mepilitan yang lakuan na ing pamaniulat, at lungub king negociong abaca, a matagumpe nang penibalan. 
Mete ya i Angela Manalang-Gloria aniang 1995.
Agawa.
Ya ing sinulat king "Revolt from Hymen", metung a kawatasan a tututul king "marital rape", at uli na niti, e re pepaniambutan deng purus lalaking talayatul king Commonwealth Literary Awards aniang 1940. Ya murin ing sinulat king pamitipun da reng poesia, ing "Poems", a mumunang mibulalag kanitang 1940 (at mibayu aniang 1950). Atiu king pamitipun a iti ing masanting dili kareng minuna nang obra, ampo reng poesiang e pa mibulalag a misulat kanitang 1934-1938. Ing libru ing kayang linub king Commonwealth Literary Awards, nung nu ya mesambut king versung "Like the Molave" a sinulat nang Rafael Zulueta y da Costa.

Vicente Manansala:
I Vicente Silva Manansala (Enero 22, 1910 - Agosto 22, 1981) metung yang pintor o talapinta ampong ilustrador a cubist.
Mibait ya i Manansala king Macabebe, Pampanga. Manibat 1926 anggang 1930, megaral ya king U.P. School of Fine Arts. Aniang 1949, mekatanggap yang anam a bulang grant ibat king UNESCO bang maragal king Ecole de Beaux Arts in Banff ampong Montreal, Canada. Kanitang 1950, tinanggap yang siam a bulang scholarship bang magaral king Ecole de Beaux Arts king Paris ibat king kapamahalan ning Francia. 
Lalarawan do reng lonang ("canvas") pinintura nang Manansala antimong obra maestra nung nu mibuklud ing cultura ning barriu ampo ning ciudad o lakanbalen. King "Madonna of the Slums", papakit ne ing metung a ima ampong anak ibat king marangleng menuknangan king lugal a squatter karas da king lakanbalen. King "Jeepney", piayabe nong Manansala deng elementu ning culturang da reng malda king lalawigan kareng issue ning pamisiksikan king lakanbalen. 
Inalkus neng Manansala ing "transparent cubism", nung nu la "mitutumpak deng maselan a kule, tabas ampong diseniu da reng tau ampong animal ampo ing kapadurut" ("delicate tones, shapes, and patterns of figure and environment are masterfully superimposed"). Metung yang masanting a alimbawa ning pamangamit nang Manansala kaniting kaparalanan a malino ampong tataglusan ning sala ("transparent and translucent") ing kayang gewang "Kalabaw" (Damulag). 
Metung yang National Artist ning Filipinas king Visual Arts i Vicente Manansala, at derechu ing kayang ayambag o a-influencia kareng kalupa nang neo-realist a Filipinu: Malang, Angelito Antonio, Norma Belleza and Baldemor. Ing Honolulu Academy of Arts, ing Lopez Memorial Museum (Menila), ing Philippine Center (New York City) ampo ing Singapore Art Museum kayabe la kareng pampublicung pamitipun o coleccion a maki obra nang Vicente Manansala. 

Francisco Macabulos:
I Francisco Macabulos (Setiembre 17, 1871-Abril 30, 1922) metung yang makabalen a Filipinung menibala kareng fuerzang Katipunan aniang Revolucion laban king Espania aniang 1896. 
Mibait ya king La Paz, Tarlac kang Alejandro Macabulos ning Lubao, Pampanga ampong Gregoria Soliman. Tetag ne ing grupung Katipunan king La Paz kaibat nang metanggap king lihim a aguman kapamilatan nang Ladislao Diwa kanitang 1896. Aniang mikalabkab ing revolucion kanitang 1898, timawa ne ing Tarlac at mitikdo yang sanggunian balen kareng lugal a atimawa na.
E ne kinilalang Macabulos ing Kasunduan ning Biak-na-Bato, a mituldung pansamantalang pamituknang king labanan king kapamahalan a colonial ning Espania, at sindu na ing kayang pamanialake king Kalibudtang Luzon. Nanupata, aniang Enero 14, 1898, pepaulian no reng taung kayang tatalnan at tinggap na ing amnestia kaibat nang tinanggap P14,000 bilang "reparation" ning Espania kareng revolucionariong Filipinu. Pirake na kareng kayang tauan Macabulos ing cualta. 
Nanupata, sindu na ing kayang pamakilaban kareng Castila, at aniang Abril 17, 1898, mitipun ya ing metung a pamitagun da reng memalen a pekakatawan da reng sanggunian balen a tetag nang Macabulos, at sinulat lang pansamantalang punbatas o constitucion. Miglalang lang kapamahalan a menatili anggang mitátag ya ya ing metung a kapamahalan a revolucionario. Metung yang pangkabilugang lupung a talapagpaganap ("general executive committee") ing tinalan king kapamahalan nang Macabulos, a bibilugan ning pamuntuk, kaduang pamuntuk, kalihim pangkilub ("secretary of interior"), kalihim ning guerra, ampong kalihim ning pisalapian. 
Linaso neng Macabulos ing kayang kapamahalan kaibat nang melalang ning Mumunang Republica ning Filipinas kapamilatan ning Punbatas ning Malolos, a kaya muring pinirman. Menimuna ya murin kareng kayang tauan bang mitimawa kareng kasiping a lalawigan, antimo ing Pangasinan, nung nu ya ing menimuna king Labanan ning Dagupan. 

Hugo Borchardt:
Hugo Borchardt (Juniu 6, 1844-Mayu 8, 1924) metung yang talaimbentu kareng armas ampong metung yang, mibait king Magdeburg, Germany. Bantug ya kareng kayang inimbentung Borchardt C-93 pistol ampo ing Sharps-Borchardt Model 1878 ripli (rifle).
Inyang 1860 minta ya king United States, at inyang 1872 meging yang Superintendent ning Obra para keng Pioneer Breech-Loading Arms Co. (Trenton, Mass.). Inyang 1874 meging yang foreman para keng Singer Sewing Machine Co., kaibat meging ya empleadu keng Colt's Patent Firearms Manufacturing Co., kaibat minta ya king Winchester Repeating Arms Co., kaibat meging yang Superintendent keng Sharps Rifle Co. inyang Juniu 1, 1876.

Tala da reng talaimbentu:
Iti ing tala da reng talaimbentu.
"Lawen ya rin:" Tala da reng scientists, Tala da reng imbentu milagiu kareng tau, ampong :Category:Talaimbentu.

Joey Marquez:
I Joey Marquez ("Joey", "Tsong"), a mibait aniang Octubre 07, 1960 (tubu king Mabalacat, Pampanga), metung yang comedianti ampong politicu. Pengari na la ri Artemio Marquez, Sr. ampong Teresita Esguera Perez. Kayabe la kareng kapatad na di Via Hoffman, Melanie Marquez ampong Babes Marquez. Megi yang alcalde ning Parañaque Lakanbalen, Filipinas manibat 1995 anggang 2004, at tinagal ya para king Congreso aniang Mayo 2004 oneng mesambut ya.
Carera king television.
Joey was one of the 1986 cast of seven in Palibhasa Lalake, the longest running sitcom on Philippine Television (spanning 12 successful years), with Richard Gomez, Gloria Romero, Cynthia Patag, Amy Perez, Carmina Villaroel and Apa Ongpin. Marquez was included in the S-Files roster of hosts after he successfully pinch-hit for Paolo Bediones when Paolo went to the US to interview some famous Hollywood celebrities to be featured on the show.
Kayabe ya i Joey kareng pitung linage king Palibhasa Lalake aniang 1986, ing maluat diling pepalage rang sitcom king television king Filipinas (a miras 12 banua), kayabe ya i Richard Gomez, Gloria Romero, Cynthia Patag, Amy Perez, Carmina Villaroel ampong Apa Ongpin. Miabe ya i Marquez kareng "host" ning S-Files kaibat nang menalili kang Paolo Bediones aniang minta ya i Paolo king America ba nong i-interview deng sikat a artista king Hollywood a ipalage ra king karelang programa .
Pamagaral.
Galal.
June 18, 2000- given by Golden Father and Mother Foundation, Inc.
Given by the Philippine Jaycess, Inc. (Kalookan “Bantayog Jaycees”)
Bestowed by the National Press Club of the Philippines
Awarded by a non-government organization
Awarded by the Department of the Interior and Local Government (DILG)

Andrew Gonzalez:
I Brother Andrew Benjamin Gonzalez FSC PhD (Febrero 29, 1940 – Enero 29, 2006) metung yang linguist, talasulat, talaturu, ampong De La Salle Brother. Migsilbi yang pamuntuk o presidenti ning De La Salle University manibat 1979 anggang 1991 at manibat 1994 anggang 1998. Manibat 1998 anggang 2001, megi yang Kalihim ning Department of Education, Culture and Sports. Kayari ning kayang terminu king kapamahalan, mibalik ya king De La Salle University antimong Vice President for Academics and Research manibat 2001 anggang 2003 ampong Presidential Adviser for Academics and Research manibat 2003 anggang 2005. 
Aisip neng Gonzalez ing pangabalangkas ning De La Salle University System at sinaup ya ba yang paragulan ing leparan ning pamagaral a Lasallian king Filipinas. Aniang mumuna nang terminu, tetag neng Gonzalez ing College of Career Development of De La Salle University-Manila a meging De La Salle-College of Saint Benilde at menibala king metung a colegio ampong escuela ning medicina king Dasmariñas a meging De La Salle University-Dasmariñas ampong De La Salle Health Sciences Institute.

Pedro Abad Santos:
I Pedro Abad Santos (31 Enero 1876 – 15 Enero 1945) metung yang Filipinong doctor, abogado, Marxista ampong politicong kaibat meging pekapun ning mumuna kareng aduang pamagalsang comunista manibat king decadang1930 anggang king decadang 1950.

Tessie Aquino Oreta:
I María Teresa Aquino Oreta (mibait yang María Teresa Aquino Aquino aniang Junio 28, 1944), a mas kilala king lagiung Tessie Aquino-Oreta, metung yang sadiang senador ning Filipinas. Ya ing sadiang pamuntuk ning Lupung ning Senado king Pamanuru, Arte ampong Cultura ("Senate Committee on Education, Arts and Culture") ning Kalabingmetung a Congreso.

Benigno Aquino, Sr.:
I Benigno Simeon Aquino y Quiambao (Setiembre 3, 1894 – Diciembre 20, 1947), a mayayaus muring Benigno S. Aquino o Benigno S. Aquino, Sr., metung yang Filipinong politico a migsilbing Speaker ning National Assembly ning Kaduang Republica ning Filipinas manibat 1943 anggang 1944. 

Servillano Aquino:
I Servillano Aquino y Aguilar (Abril 20, 1874 – Febrero 2, 1959) metung yang Filipinong heneral aniang Philippine Revolution against Spain (1896-1898), ampo king Guerrang Filipino-Americano (1898-1902). Migsilbi yang delegado king Congreso king Malolos, ingkung neng Benigno S. Aquino, Jr. (Ninoy).

Agapito Aquino:
I Agapito Aquino Aquino (mibait Mayo 20, 1939), a mas kilala king lagiung Butz Aquino, metung yang sadiang Senador ning Filipinas. Anak neng senador Benigno Aquino, Sr., ampo i Aurora Aquino-Aquino. Kapatad de ri Ninoy Aquino ampong Tessie Aquino-Oreta. 

Tilápiâ (kawatásan):
Ing "Tilápiâ" (2007) metung yang poema ning talasúlat a Filipínung i Renato Alzadón.
Kompletung tekstu.
Quetang Paglautan ning Capas a pemalaguiuan dang Timbian
Y Minang ampon Y Pidung misisiping lang tucnangan;
Y Pidung baintau yang mag apat pang pulu't anam
At Y minang dalaga yang mag atlu pang pulu at syam.
pablasang ing tucnangan da atyu busal ning asican
inia ing pangabyayan da atiu queng pamananaman.
Ining Pidung, quening Minang, malsinta ya rugung lawe
cacabag ya ing salu na ustung acacasabi ne;
inya ing pamalsinta nang apulu nang banuang wewe
agya sanang pabulul mu e na man apasawawe
a memoria na no ata deng diga ring talagale
dapot e no asambitla quening cayang siping bale.
Ining Minang malambat neng bisang macapaquiasawa
dapot uling melapad ne ala nang maglolo queya,
macanano, queta caseng medyu pamilugan ya pa
alang queya macalele qng bigsican nang tatang na;
uling quening tauling byaje bisa ya pin saque sana
inia quening baintau e na balu ing gawan na.
Ining baintaung Pidung aguiang mag San Miguel yaman
talagang cacatug ya tud, e ya macapamanican;
ulinita, ining Minang ya nang mimisip paralan
ban micacatuparan ya ining sintang quetubasan,
at quetang kai-isip na cabud ne mu mipatiman
uling balu na ne ngeni nung nanung sucat nang daptan.
Panga-abac a maranun ati ne yan qng palengqui
at sinali yang tilapia a linulan na qng baldi
pangaras na qng carela agad na nong picsi deti
subali mu quetang metung a peca maragul dili;
iti, dinaing na neman, atme santing alcus iti
at bayang malare-lare pinolbuan ne pang asueti. 
Qng tulid nang awang Pidung quen ya ginawang sablayan
at layun quen ne sinabit ing tilapia nang deingan,
inia naman ining Pidung indat tando ya qng awang
yana cabud acaquit na itang tilapia nang Minang
at quetang salingalngal na ning bau nang pangayamnan
migising ya lub Y Pidung, pignasan neng buring tacman.
Cabucasan , ining Pidung lepitan ne ing dalaga
a sangcan-sangcan mamalis lele na ning sablayan na;
"O' nanung buri mu, Pidung?" Ing malambis a quitang na,
Mipaducu ya Y Pidung uling mala-marine ya,
"Ining tilapia mu Minang lupang tutung maniaman ya
aguia sanang nu mu anti, buri queng atacman sana."
"Macanian mu pala, Pidung," ngana na man tinambayan,
"quen Domingu maliari ne queni bale mu ne tacman,
balu mu na neng Domingu Y tatang cu ala ne man
aguiang ala yang pupusta e sasala queng sabungan."
"O' wa, " ngana naman Pidung, " siguradu dacang puntan
baluan cung ing tilapia mu maniaman de ding maniaman."
Linundag la ding saguli, miras ing aldo Domingu
macapiblas ya Y Pidung , macapomada yang Tansu;
capanic na cari Minang ya nang tambing nang abau
ing tilapiang sasalitsit qng cawali pipiritu;
penadit pa quetang dulang, macalucluc nong pareju
at ing tilapiang palapad maligaya deng pisulu.
Menos lang gamat qng tabu caibat dang meyaring mengan
ulina'ta ning cabsi ra e na la bisang ticdo man;
queta naman e ra balu ati ne Y Matuang Duman
magumpisa neng papanic caring balitang ning eran;
dapot mipatingangas ya qng dimdam nang sagicgican
sinigi ya quetang dingding qng banang paquiramdaman.
"Minang! Minang! Nganang Pidung, "niaman na ning tilapia mo
oyan ya ing e cu sawan aguiang yapag me aldo'ldo."
"Pidong! Pidong! Culang pin yan , inta sang e cu migsabo
map na mu, ba'yang talusad, qng titilan me susoso ."
Ining matuang maquiramdam bitasang e bisang galo
ban damdaman na na nung nanung depat ding adua qng babo.
"Pidong! Pidong ! Nganang Minang, "nanu, e mo malinamnam
itang mismung atyu quetang libutad ning pibangalan?"
" Wa, Minang , caniaman na pen! Ay! calambut na pa naman
malinamnam yang mayumu, malat-alat, maslam-aslam."
Ing maquiramdam a matua, magsalupsupan ne canyan
qng atin lang guewa deti cabang atiu qng sabungan..
"Pidung naman, ot balamu pecalpilasan me, ata
pitiltil-tiltil me pamu, at ali ca memilagua."
"inya mu meniltilan cu qng bayang mamasasa
at lalu yang lungcas lasa ing maniaman mung Tilapia."
Ining matuang maquiramdam canyan ne sulac a daya
at memirapal neng menic; ing pasbul biclat neng bigla.
"Aha...! Icayung adua quen e yu na cu paglingaran
mipaglimid cayu pala neng ati cu qng sabungan..!
Ica, Pidung, tin ca palang sisinup a camulangan
ya palang lilimiran mu ining tilapia nang Minang;
Ica, Minang, obat dugu mipacanian na ca, Inang
ining bague macarine, e mu na pequibalac man."
"Ining depatan yung licu, dapat mu qng itulid yu
qng malalaguang panaun cailangan ing casal cayu."
"Opu," ngana naman Pidung, " ala pung problema cacu
nung acu mu pu bisa cu, Y Minang pu ing cutnan yu."
"Aba! Bisa cu mu naman," nganang Minang mengamanu
basta cang Pidung mu sana ibie que pu ing tangu cu.
E na man binang melambat quinasal la dening adua
at quen taya pupututan ing istoriang mipacaba;
nung buri yeng maquibaluan lasa na nung nanu ya ta
ya nang cutnan yu Y Pidung qng tauli nang cabanata
angga na cu pamu queni ya nang balang mamalita
nung tutung maniaman ya pin itang mesabing Tilapia.

Isaac Newton:
I Sir Isaac Newton FRS (4 Eneru 1643 31 Marsu 1727 ) metung yang Inglaterru physicist, mathematicu, astronomer, natural philosopu, alchemist, ampong theologian nung nu ing panakit da ampong kikilalanan kareng dakal a matenakan ampong deng malda bilang metung kareng maimpluwensiang tau keng amlat. Ing kayang 1687 pangabulaglag ning "Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica" (keraklan mayayaus a "Principia") metung yang kikilalanan dang mainpluwensiyang aklat keng amlat ning science, memie talatag keng keraklan da reng classical mechanics. Ining kayang obra, i Newton pepasiag na ing universal gravitation ampo ring atlung laws of motion nung nu iti ing megbabo kareng scientific lawe da keng physical universe kaibat ning tutuking atlung dilanua (siglu). I Newton pepakit na deng galo da reng bage keng Yatu ampo ding celestial bage mangasiwa la kareng parepareung salansan da reng natural a batas kapamilatan ning pepakit na pane ing pamiugne ning Kepler's laws of planetary motion ampo ning kayang theoriang pami-igut (gravitation), inya leko na iti ing pamikakunu tungkul keng heliocentrism ampong sinulong na ing scientific revolution.

Luis Taruc:
I Luis Taruc (Junio 21, 1913 - Mayo 4, 2005) metung yang Filipinong pekapun king politica ampong revolucionariong comunista. Migsilbi yang pekapun ning grupung rebelding Hukbalahap pilatan ning 1942 ampong 1954. Miabe ya king pangimut kaibat nang abalu ing problema da reng maglalautang Filipino aniang magaral ya kanitang decadang 1930. Aniang Kaduang Guerrang Pangyatu, pemuntukan nong Taruc deng Hukbalahap kareng mabangis a pamanialake da reng guerilla laban kareng talasakup a Japon king Filipinas, bageng e na masiadung dininan pansing ning Estados Unidos. Kaibat ning guerra, sindu da reng Hukbalahap ing pamaglaban king kapamahalan nang Manuel Roxas, a susuportan ning America, I Taruc ampo reng pitu nang kayabe e ro pepaintulutan lukluk king Congresolipat ning pamaniambut da, ania mepilitan lang magbalik king bunduk. Sinalungat ya ing grupung Taruc king parity rights a buri rang tanggapan deng Americanu king Filipinas kaibat nang mitimawa. Aniang tutuking limang banua, tiknang nang Taruc ing pamakilaban king parlamento, at mibalik ya king bunduk. Aniang pekamasikan ya, atin yang 10,000 anggang 15,000 kataung lalaban ing fuerzang Hukbalahap. 

1794:
Year 1794 (MDCCXCIV) was a common year starting on Wednesday (link will display the full calendar) of the Gregorian calendar (or a common year starting on Saturday of the 11-day slower Julian calendar). 

Apollo Quiboloy:
I Apollo C. Quiboloy ing talatátag ampong pekapun ning sectang Kingdom of Jesus Christ, The Name Above Every Name.
Bie kayanakan.
Mibait ya i Apollo C. Quiboloy kang Jose Quiboloy ampong Maria Carreon, aniang Abril 25, 1950, king metung a malating bariu king kabitisan ning Bunduk Apo, king Tamayong, Calinan, Davao Lakanbalen, at ya ing bungsu kareng siam a ának. Pareu lang tubu king Lubao, Pampanga, king Luzon, Filipinas, deng kayang pengari, at minalis la king Davao Lakanbalen aniang decadang 1940, kaibat ning guerra, bang manintun mas manawang bie. 

Manuel V. Pangilinan:
I Manuel V. Pangilinan (mibait Julio 14, 1946 king Menila, Filipinas), a kilala murin king lagiung Manny Pangilinan, metung yang Filipinung negocianti. Ya ing Chairman ning Philippine Long Distance Telephone Company, ing pekamaragul a cumpaniang telecomunicacion king Filipinas, manibat 1990 angga ngeni. Ya murin ing Chairman ning Board of Trustees ning Ateneo de Manila University ampo ning San Beda College.
King San Beda College ya megaral elementaria ampong secundaria i Pangilinan. Miyari yang cum laude king Ateneo de Manila University king cursung Bachelor of Arts king Economics. Mekatanggap yang titulung MBA aniang 1968 king Wharton School of Finance and Commerce ning University of Pennsylvania.

Assem Qanso:
I Assem Qanso (, mibait aniang 1937 king Baalbek) metung yang politico ning Lebanon. Ing kayang relihion, Shiite Islam. Ya ing pekapun ning partidong Lebanese Baath.
Mikiabe ya king Lebanese Baath kanitang 1953. Aniang guerrang civil king Lebanon, mepitna ya ing Lebanese Baath kareng aduang grupung milalaban, metung a makakampi king Iraq, ampong metung a makakampi king Syria. Metung ya kareng makampi king Syria i Qanso. Pikabaluan ya kareng panga-brutal da reng kayang discursu. Pematacutan ne king arap ning malda i Walid Jumblat aniang misan a sesion ning parlamento, kanitang Noviembre 6, 2000. Dakal lang mituring a bala ya o capiadian a paten ya i Jumblatt ini, aniang panaun a magi yang malapit king oposicion 
Sinuporta ya king publico i Qanso king pamagpakaba king mandado nang Émile Lahoud, at masikan neng pepaturanan ing katatagan o resolucion a 1559. Inataque ne i Jumblatt king pisasabian a iti king kareng makatuking amanu: : "Mipaku ka king cruz babo ning basurahan ning kasalesayan antimong sagisag ning kekang kayalang utang a lub, ning kekang pagulut a pamaniaksak" at binalan neng "maliari ra kang ayabut deng militanti" at inaus neng "tiktik para kareng aliwang bangsa". Kaibat ning pamakamate kang Hariri, sinalungat ya king revolucion a cedro at e ya miyalal pasibayu king parlamento aniang Mayo 2005. 
Miyari ya i Assem Qanso king panga-iniero king University of Zagreb (mina ampong geologia) at kaibat miyari ya king Petroleo ampong Geologia king Romania. E dapat pagkamalian kang Ali Qanso, ing pekapun ning SSNP.

Larawan Sala:
Ing Sala ning Larawan o keng amanung English Image resolution sasabian ne ing butiltil a laman a tatalnan ning larawan. Ing kataya magagamit yang parepareu kareng digital a larawan, film a larawan, ampong aliwa pang larawan. Ustung matas ya ing resolusiun (kalamnan ning larawan) ing buri nang sabian mas dakal ing detalia keng larawan. 
Ing resolusion ning larawan maliari yang sukdan keng dakal a paralan. Deng Resolusiun a units maliari lang mitaid kareng physical a sukad. (alimbawa gulis balang mm, gulis balang pulgada) o kaya ing pangkabilugan a sukad ning litratu (gulis balang katas ning litratu, kebaluan mu rin bilang gulis mu, o kaya gulis TV). Dakal pa, deng gulis paris ila keraklan deng magagamit imbes kabud na gulis. Ing paris a gulis metung yang paris a mileleng masala ampong madalumdum a gulis, kaba naman ing masala ampong madalumdum a gulis mabibilang lang pareu. Ing resolusiun a 10 gulis ing mangabaldugan yang 10 gulis balang millimetru, mangabaldugan a 5 madalumdum a gulis at liliwas la reng 5 masalang gulis, o kaya 5 gulis a paris balang millimetru. Deng Photographic lens ampong film resolution keraklan mayayaus lang paris balang millimetru.

Dortmund:
Ing Dortmund () metung yang lakanbalen king Aleman, atiu king Bundesland ning North Rhine-Westphalia, king Ruhr karinan. 587,830 ya ing kayang populasiun (20 Juniu 2005) at iti ing pang7 pekamaragul diling lakanablen king Aleman, at pang34 a pekamaragul keng Pisanmetung a Europa.
Ing Ruhr ilug mamagus ya mauli nign lakanbalen, ampo ing malating ilug a Emscher mamagus ya keng kayang karinan. Ing Dortmund-Ems Canal ati yang sepu keng Dortmund Pantalan, nung nu iti ing pekamargul a European canal pantalan, at tataid ne ing Dortmund keng Pangulung Dayatmalat. 

Essen:
Ing Essen ()metung yang lakanbalen king kalibudtaran dake ning Ruhr Karinan king North Rhine-Westphalia, Aleman. Atiu king Ilug Ruhr, ing kayang populasiun a mga 579,000 (agpang inyang Junio 30, 2008) gagawan neng pang7 o pang8 pekamaragul diling lakanbalen king Aleman. 

Kasangkapan:
Ing metung a maleparan a kabaldugan ning kasangkapan ("tool" king Ingles, "instrumento" o "herramienta" king Castila), metung a bageng gagamitan bang mamilatan kareng aduang sakup o panig ("domains") a sasaup bang mika mas matalab a kimut o dapát ning metung a panig ketang metung. Ing pekasimpling kasangkapan, ila pin deng simpling maquina ("simple machines"). Alimbawa, ing baluat ("crowbar") gagana ya antimong "lever". Cuntoru midadayu ya king "pivot point", lalung darakal ing sikanan o fuerzang dadalan king "lever". Keraklan, martiliu ya ing atiu king pilatan ning gamat ning magobra ampo ing pakung buri nang turan.
Deng kasangkapan ing pekamaulagang bageng gagamitan da reng tau bang mukiat king babo ning food chain; kapamilatan ning pamanimbentu kareng kasangkapan, agiu rong agagawa deng bageng e ra agiung daptan deng katawan da, alimbawa ing pamangamit king tandus o pana king pamakamate kareng darakpan dang animal, uling e la makanian katilus deng karelang ipan ba lang taglus kareng balat da reng animal. 
Ing telepono metung yang kasangkapan king comunicacion a mamilatan kareng aduang taung misasabi king metung a lebel. At king pilatan ning balang talagamit ampo ing suge ning comunicacion o "communication network" king aliwang lebel. King sakup ning tecnologiang media o comunicacion minuna rang akilala deng keraklan ing metung a e karaniwan aspetu ning kekatamung pamiugnayan o relacion kareng kekatamung kasangkapan. Sikat ya i Marshall McLuhan ketang sinabi nang "We shape our tools. And then our tools shape us." Ing amanuan na, ya pin itang maliliaring deng pamakiugnayan tamu kareng aliwang tau, makibage la king kekatamung pamangamit kareng bayung kasangkapan, at ing pamaniamasan tamu kareng kasangkapan a gagamitan ta na. 
Apatunayan ning pamagumasid a dakal lang uring animal deng gagamit kasangkapan, kayabe la reng matsin, miayaliwang uring ayup, sea otter, at aliwa pa. Aniang mumuna, isipan da reng filosofo ("philosophers") a den mung tau ing maki agiung "gawang" kasangkapan, anggang apagumasdan do reng zoologist deng ayap ampo reng matsin a gagawang kasangkapan. Ngeni, ing alang kalupang kaugnayan da reng tau kareng kasangkapan ya pin itang deng tau mu kabud ing uri o species a gagamit kareng kasangkapan bang gawang "aliwang" kasangkapan.
Keraklan kareng anthropologist maniwala lang ing pamangamit kareng kasangkapan metung yang maulagang takbang king pamagbayu o evolucion ning meto ketawan. Mika opposable thumb ya ing tau — a magamitan king pamanalan kareng kasangkapan — at misnang miragdagan ing kayang kabiasnan, a sinaup king pamangamit kareng kasangkapan.

Benedicto Cabrera:
I Benedicto Reyes Cabrera, a pipirmang "BenCab" kareng kayang obra , metung yang National Artist ning Filipinas para kareng Visual Arts (Pamamintura), at sasabian deng "mapaliaring yang masaling diling talapinta ning kayang dai o generacion da reng talalalang a Filipino ("arguably the best-selling painter of his generation of Filipino artists")."

Buklo:
Ing buklo o bosio ("goitre" king BrE, "goiter" king AmE, "bocio" king Castila ampong "bosyo" king Tagalug), a ausan da muring "bronchocele" king medicina, ing aus da king kalbag ning thyroid gland, a maliari nang panibatan ning kalbag ning batal o larynx (voice box). Keraklan, lalto ing buklo nung e gaganang masalese ing thyroid gland. 

Apap:
Ing Apap ("Lates calcarifer"), a ausan dang "Barramundi" o "Asian Seabass" king Ingles, metung yang species ning catadromous a asan king familiang Latidae ampong orden Perciformes. Maleparan ya pamikalat antimong tubung uri ("native species") king labuad a Indo-West Pacific manibat king Persian Gulf, dadalan king Mauli-Aslagang Asia paras king Papua New Guinea ampong Pangulung Australia. Ausan de king Amanung Thai a "Pla Krapong" (), at sikat ya king lutung Thai.

Buntuk talibatab:
Ing Buntuk talibatab ("Mobula eregoodootenkee"), a ausan dang "Pygmy devil ray" king Ingles, metung yang uri ning Eagle ray king genus "Mobula". Katutubu ya king Kadayatmalatan a Indico ampo king Kadayatmalatan a Pacifico. Mayayakit ya manibat king South Africa king albugan angga king Filipinas king aslagan, pangulu king Vietnam, ampong mauli king pangulu nang bebe dayatmalat ning Australia. 
Maki kule yang komanggi-abu, at mamuti-muti ya king lalam. Daragul yang anggang 100 cm a lapad. Mamangan yang plankton ampong mangalating asan.
Ing buntuk talibatab ovoviviparous ya, at keraklan atin manganak yang metung king danum a mababo. Keti la maratun deng asan anggang atiu no king edad.
E re sasarian a ararakap ing buntuk talibatab kareng dakal a lugal uling miyayabe ya kareng darakpan dang aliwang asan. Pisasali re king Thailand ampo kareng aliwang lugal king mauli-aslagang Asia.

Mausang:
Ing Mausang o Sigasig ("asthma" king Ingles) metung yang sakit nung nu maralas ating pangmaluatan a pamanalbag da reng baga, nung nukarin deng daralanan ning angin (bronchi) magi lang makitid, king paralang misusubli king sadia ("reversible"). Atin la kaniting sakit deng 7% ning populasion ning Estados Unidos, 6.5% da reng tau king Bretaña, ampong 300 milion tau king mabilug a yatu. Neng ating ataquing mausang attacks, deng makinis a kalamnan ("smooth muscle cells") da reng bronchi kikitid la, lalbag ampong mikaka iritacion reng daralanan ning angin ("airways"), at maging masakit ing pamangisnawa.
Ing mausang sangkan de reng 4,000 pangamate banua-banua king Estados Unidos. Maliari lang gamitan deng panulu para kareng grabing ataqui, alimbawa ing sisingutan at malaguang inhaled tatalab a beta-2 agonists. Maliari lang lisian deng ataqui kapamilatan ning pamaglisia kareng sangkan antimo deng allergens ampo ing malaguang pamagbayu ning temperatura, ampo reng panulu antimo deng sisingutan a corticosteroid at kaibat deng maluat tatalab a beta-2 agonists nung kailangan. Deng leukotriene antagonist mas maina ing talab da kesa kareng corticosteroid, oneng ala lang e masanting a epectu ("side effects"). Neng kai, tatalab la reng monoclonal antibodies, antimo ing mepolizumab ampo ing omalizumab. Masanting ing kararasan nung paulu ya ing pacienti.
E anti king chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ampong chronic bronchitis, maliaring baligtaran ing kalbag a daralan ning mausang. E na kalupa ning emphysema, deng bronchi ing apectuan ning mausang, aliwa reng alveoli.
