Ing National Heart, Lung and Blood Institute kikilalanan ne ing mausang antimong karaniwan a pangmaluatan ("chronic") a sakit da reng daralanan ning angin a maki sintomas a pabayu-bayu ampong balik balik a pangabara ning daralanan ning angin, mitmung pangasensitibo da reng bronchi (bronchial hyperresponsiveness o bronchospasm), ampong makalalam a pamanalbag ("underlying inflammation"). 
Mibili ing pansing ning malda kareng bangsang masulung kareng mamuling mausang ("predisposition") uling king karakal da reng ating sakit a iti anggang metung a kapat da reng prevalence, ának kareng lakanbalen o ciudad.

FishBase:
Ing FishBase metung yang maleparan a database ning informacion tungkul kareng asan. Aniang Octubre 2008, atin neng pamilarawan ("description") da reng maigit 30,000 species, maigit 260,000 karaniwang lagiu kareng dalan-dalan a amanu, maigit 46,000 larawan, ampong maigit 42,000 a obrang magsilbing dalerayan king paniulat a cientifico.
Suglung palual.
Mirror sites:

Bulandu:
Ing Bulandu, Bulan o Bugsuk, a "Vitiligo" king Ingles, metung yang pangmaluatan ("chronic") a sakit a mágdalang pangalako ning kule da reng dake ning balat. Maliliari iti neng deng melanocyte, deng cell a mamie king kule ning balat a manibat king neural crest, mamamate la o e la gagana. Complicadu ing exactong sangkan ning bulandu, at e ra pa lubus a aintindian. Ating katibayan a tuturu king pamiabe-abe da reng sangkan a autoimmune, genetic o puli, ampong pangkapadurutan ("environmental"). Maralas ya muring mayayakit kareng taung ating diferencia king karelang thyroid. Kulang king metung a porciento ing pangapaliari na king king populasion king mabilug a yatu. Mas makelatan ya ing "non-segmental" a bulandu kesa kareng aliwang uri ning sakit a iti.

Bidbid:
Ing bidbid ("Elops hawaiensis"), a ausan dang "Hawaiian ladyfish" king Ingles, metung yang species ning asan king familiang Elopidae. Tubu ya king albugan-kalibudtang Kadayatmalatan a Pacifico, at agpang king salukuyan a pamitinduk-tinduk o pamag-grupu ("classification") mapaliaring bibilugan de reng pilang species.

Integrated Taxonomic Information System:

Batroun:
Ing Batroun (Griego: Βοτρύς, Arabo: البترون), a lakanbalen o ciudad king bebe dayatmalat ning pangulung Lebanon, metung ya kareng matuang diling lakanbalen king yatu. Ing Batroun karinan ne ning metung a Lebanese Red Cross First Aid Center.

Pleasant Hill, California:
Ing Pleasant Hill metung yang lakanbalen king Contra Costa County, California, United States, king East Bay na ning San Francisco Bay Area. Ing kayang populasiun 32,837 ya agpang keng 2000 census. Meincorporate ya inyang 1961. 

Oscar Wilde:
I Oscar Fingal O'Flahertie Wills Wilde (16 Octubre 1854 – 30 Noviembre 1900) metung yang Irlandes o Irish a dramaturgo, poeta, ampong talasulat da reng dakal a makuyad a salita ("short stories") ampong metung a novela. Metung ya kareng matagumpeng diling dramaturgo ning tauli nang dake ning kapanaunan a Victorian king London, ampo ing metung kareng maragul diling "celebrity" ning kayang panaun. Angga ngeni, papalage da la pa murin deng aliwa nang drama, lalu na ing "The Importance of Being Earnest". Uling kareng tuki-tuking asuntong maleparan a mibalita, mika bigla yang pangabagsak i Wilde, a mesentencia king aduang banuang masákit a pamagobra ("hard labor") kaibat nang mipatunayan a mika kaugnayan kareng kalupa nang lálaki. Kaibat nang mekalual king sukulan, miglayag ya papunta king Dieppe i Wilde, at e e ne mibalik pasibayu king Irlanda o Bretaña. 

WorldCat:
Ing WorldCat metung yang union catalog a mag-grupu-grupu o maglarawan dikil kareng dake kareng coleccion o pamitipun da reng 71,000 a aklatan kareng 112 a bangsa a kayabe king Online Computer Library Center (OCLC) a cooperativang pangyatu. Tinikdo re at mamantinian deng kayanib a aklatan. 
Melalang ya kanitang 1971, at atin yang maigit 150 milion a miayaliwang simpan ("records") a tuturu kareng 1.4 bilion a banding pisical ampong digital kareng maigit 470 amanu. Ya ing pekamaragul a bibliographic database king yatu. Ing OCLC darake neng alang bayad ing WorldCat kareng aklatan, dapat ing catalogo batayan de reng aliwang serviciong OCLC a maki bayad (anti king resource sharing ampong collection management). Ing WorldCat tetag neng Fred Kilgour kanitang l967.

Online Computer Library Center:
Ing OCLC Online Computer Library Center, Inc. metung yang "alang tubu, at kukuang kayanib a serviciong computer library ampong aguman a pamanialugsug (research organization) a makatalaga king pangmaldang parasan a pamimpasulung king pamagpayabut king informacion ning yatu ampong pamamamawas king gastus kareng aklatan". Minuna yang mitátag aniang Julio 6, 1967 antimo ing alang tubung Ohio College Library Center. 60,000 la reng aklatan kareng 112 a bangsa ampong teritoriong gagamit kareng servicio ning OCLC services bang manintun, manikua, mag-catalogo, mandam ampong mag-preserva kareng laman da reng aklatan. Tetag neng Fred Kilgour ing aguman, at atiu ing kayang pun tanggapan king Dublin, Ohio, U.S.

Dieppe, Seine-Maritime:
Ing Dieppe metung yang commune king Seine-Maritime department ning Francia. Aniang 1999, ing populasion ning mabilug a Dieppe urban area 81,419 ya.
Metung yang sadsaran ("port") king English Channel, a pikabaluan kareng kayang scallop, at atin yang regular a serviciong dalakitan ("ferry service") manibat king Gare Maritime papunta king Newhaven king Inglaterra, atin ya muring bebe dayatmalat a pipandiluan, castillong megawa kanitang ka-15 a dilanua ampo reng pisamban ning Saint Jacques ampong Saint Rémi.

Hemiramphus:
Ing Hemiramphus metung yang genus da reng asan a ausan dang balungi o balulungi king Kapampangan ampong "halfbeaks", "garfish", or " ballyhoos" king Ingles, at kayabe king familiang Hemiramphidae. Manuknangan la keraklan bandang babo da reng malisangan a temperate ampong tropical (mapaling) dayatmalat, at mamangan lumut (algae), plankton, ampong mas mangalating asan. Maliari lang kanan deng species a "Hemiramphus", oneng mas maulaga la antimong asan a kakanan da reng mas mangaragul a asan antimo reng dolphinfish ampong billfish.
Species o uri.
"Hemiramphus brasiliensis" - Ballyhoo<br>
"Hemiramphus balao" - Balao halfbeak<br>
"Hemiramphus far" - Sulwi<br>
"Hemiramphus lutkei"
"Hemiramphus marginatus" - Yellowtip halfbeak<br>
"Hemiramphus robustus" - Three-by-two garpike<br>
"Hemiramphus saltator" - Longfin halfbeak

Buntuk lagari:
Ing buntuk lagari ("Pristis microdon"), a ausan dang "largetooth sawfish" ampong "Leichhardt's sawfish" king Ingles, metung yang sawfish ning familia Pristidae, a mayayakit king kadayatmalatan a Indo-West Pacific pilatan da reng latitude a 11° N ampong 39° S. Kalupa de reng kayang kamaganak, uling pupunta ya murin king matabang a danum. Metung yang species o uring misnang mamiligru ("critically endangered"), at miraras ya king kabang anggang . King pamiparakal kayabe ya kareng ovoviviparous.

Palus:
Ing palus ("Anguilla bengalensis"), a "small fresh-water eel" king Ingles, kayabe ya king genus a "Anguilla" king familiang Anguillidae, a ating aduang sub-species.

Malamarine:
Ing malamarine o dikut malamarine ("Mimosa pudica"), a ausan dang "sensitive plant", "humble plant", "shameful plant", "sleeping grass", o "touch-me-not" king Ingles, metung yang gagapang a dikut a annual or perennial a maralas dang tatanam uling ketang pamanuklip dang palub deng kayang bulung neng matatagkil la reti, dapot mibubusni lang pasibayu kilub ning pilang minutu. Tubu ya king Mauling America ampong Kalibudtang America iting species, dapot mayayakit ne ngeni metung neng dikut a mayayakit kareng anggang lugal a mapali. 

Bulaun:
Ing bulaun ("Vitex parviflora" Juss.) metung yang species o uri ning tanaman king familia Verbenaceae. Mayayakit ya king Indonesia, Malaysia, ampong Filipinas. Mibibili ya king peligru uling mababawas la reng lugal nung nu ya mayayakit. 

Verbenaceae:
Ing familiang verbena o vervain, ing Verbenaceae, metung yang familia da reng keraklan tanaman kareng lugal a mangapali ("tropical plants"). Deti maliari lang pun dutung, palungpung o dikut a kapansin-pansin uli ning karelang buntuk ("heads"), suksuk ("spikes"), o kumpul da reng mangalating sampaga ("clusters of small flowers"), at dakal kareti masikan at mabanglu bau.
Agpang kareng bayung pamagaral ning pamikakamaganak ("phylogenetic studies") dakal kareng genus a sadia rang bibili king Verbenaceae kayabe la pala king Lamiaceae. Ing bayung familiang Verbenaceae a makitid pangabili angganan atin yang manga 35 a genus ampong 1,200 a species. Ing "Avicennia", neng kai mibibili king Verbenaceae o king sarili nang familia, ing Avicenniaceae, ala yang kapikakunuan a mibili king has rather familia Acanthaceae.

Kalamungge:
Ing kalamungge ("Moringa oleifera"), a maralas ausan dang "moringa" (ibat king Tamil: muringa ampong Malayalam: murunggi), ing pekamaleparan dili pangatanam a uri o species ning genus a "Moringa", a ya kabud genus king familia Moringaceae. Metung yang misna kasustansiang pun dutung a gule a dakal a miayaliwang gamit. Ing pun dutung mismu payat ya, a maki makadukung sangang daragul anggang manga 10 m king kátas. Neng makatanam ya, maralas pupututan de, ania manga 1 m ya mu o mas malati pa, at paburen deng dagul ba lang malaguang abutan deng kayang bunga ampong bulung. 

Mitla:
Ing mitla ("Lagerstroemia speciosa"), a ausan dang giant crape-myrtle, queen's crape-myrtle, banabá plant, o pride of India king Ingles ) metung yang species o uri ning tanaman a "Lagerstroemia" a tubu king malisangan ("tropical") nang dake ning mauling Asia. 

Pun dutung:
Ing pun dutung ("tree" king Ingles) metung yang magkaluat a marutung ("perennial woody plant"). Keraklan, ing bibie rang kabaldugan kaniti, metung a tanaman a marutung a dakal a sangang kaduang uri ("secondary branches") a daralan king babo ning gabun king metung a manimunang tangkeng malinong makababo kabilian ("having clear apical dominance"). Mamie lang pekamababang kátas deng aliwang sinulat, manibat 3 m anggang 6 m; ating sinulat a babie pekamababang kátas a 10 cm a lapad ning tangke (30 cm girth). Deng marutung a tanaman a e makapante kaniting kabaldugan uling dakal la tangke o kulang la lapad o dagul, ausan da lang palungpung ("shrubs" king Ingles). Nung pakiyanti ro kareng aliwang tanaman, makaba la bie deng pun dutung, at miraras lang pilang libung banua deng aliwa, at miraras lang anggang 115 m (379 ft) king kátas.
Maulaga lang dake ning kapadurutan deng pun dutung uling sasaup dang lisian ing pangatibag at babie lang kapadurutan a protectadu o makakambil king panaun king kilub ampong lalam da reng karelang bulung. Sasaup la murin king pamaglalang king oxygen ampong pangabawas king carbon dioxide king alapap ("atmosphere"), ampo ing pamanatili nang kasantingan ning pali o temperatura king gabun. Kayabe la murin king "landscaping" ampong agricultura, uling king karelang itsura ampo kareng tanaman kareng tamnanan ("orchard") anti reng mansanas. Ing dutung ibat kareng pun dutung gagamitan ya king pamangawang bale ampong gusali, at manimuna yang pikukuanan enerhia kareng dakal a susulung a bangsa ("developing countries"). Maki papil la murin deng pun dutung king mitolohia da reng dakal a lugal king yatu.

Palungpung:
Ing palungpung ("shrub" o "bush" king Ingles, "arbusto" king Castila) metung yang uri o categoriang mas maki kaugnayan king pamananam tanaman ("horticultural") kesa king maigpit a categoria king botanica o pamanigaral tanaman. Makikilala ya at makayaliwa king pun dutung kareng kayang dakal a tangke ("multiple stems") ampong mas mababang kátas, a keraklan mas mababa king 5–6 m (15–20 pie) kátas. Dakal la reng tanaman a maliaring sabiang palungpung o pun dutung, depende king kabilian ning karelang pangatanam. Deng mangalati ampong mababang palungpung, anti reng lavender, chichirica ampong thyme maralas dong ausang subshrub. 
Ing lugal da reng pakatanam a palungpung king parque o mula/jardin ausan deng shrubbery. Neng gugupitan do antimong topiary, makapal la bulung deng palungpung, at sigí-sigî lang tutubu deng dakal a mangalating sangang mabulung. Masanting ing epectu ning pamagbayung pamangutud o "renewal pruning" deng dakal a palungpung, nung pupututan la reti angga king tangke magpatubu ya kareng bayu ampong mangakabang tangkeng ausan dang "canes". Deng aliwang palungpung, mas buri ra ing pamamili king pamamutut bang lunto ing karelang pangabalangkas ampong kaurian ("character"). 
Keraklan, mangalapad la bulung deng palungpung a karaniwan dang gagamitan kareng mula, dapot mala-palungpung la murin pangabalangkas deng mangalating "conifer" o kamaganak da reng pino antimo reng Mountain Pine ampong Common Juniper. Maliari lang malalagas bulung ("deciduous") o maki bulung mabilug a banua ("evergreen"). 
Listaan o tala da reng palungpung.
Deng maki marcang * maliari la muring dagul at maging anting pun dutung.

Kalugus:
Ing kalugus (metung ya kareng apat a panaun o "season" kareng mangarimlang bangsa. Atiu ing kalugus ("autumn" king British English ampong "fall" in North American English) metung ya kareng apat a panaun kareng mangarimlang bangsa. Ing kalugus ing pilatan ning kaleldo o "summer" ampong karimlan o "winter", at keraklan daratang neng Marzo king mauling dake ning yatu, ampong Setiembre king pangulung dake ning yatu, neng mas maranun daratang ing sisilim. 
Maliari yang asahan ing equinox, dapot uling king pangayatrasu ning temperatura (uling king pangasalikut ning pali o "thermal latency" king gabun ampong dayatmalat) mas tauli lang daratang deng panaun kesa kareng pecha nung carculan basi king posicion ning yatu. Miayaliwa ing pangayatrasu dependi king labuad, ania kabang deng aliwang cultura, ausan deng libutad na na ning kalugus deng aliwang cultura ing autumnal equinox, umpisa ne pamu ning kalugus para kareng aliwa. 
King kapanaunan a pang Aslagang Asia, magumpisa ing kalugus neng manga 15 Setiembre at mayayari neng 20 Diciembre.

Karimlan:
Ing karimlan, o "winter" king Ingles ampong "invierno" king Castila, ing pekamarimlang panaun ning banua, a atiu king pilatan ning kalugus ampong kasibul. Iti ing maki pekamakuyad a aldo ampong pekamakabang bengi. 

Kasibul:
Ing kasibul ("spring" king Ingles, "primavera" neng Castila) metung ya kareng apat a panaun kareng mangarimlang lugal, ing pilatan ning karimlan ampo ning kaleldo. Deng kayang aldo alus labi lang aduang oras, a kakaba, uling malapit ya king panaun ning equinox. King pangulu nang dake ning yatu ("Northern Hemisphere"), manibat Marzo anggang Mayo ing kasibul, at king mauli nang dake ning yatu ("Southern Hemisphere"), manibat Setiembre ya anggang Noviembre. Ing kasibul murin ing panaun ning bagiu kareng adua nang dake ning yatu, oneng mas atrasadu ya king pangulung Dayatmalat a Atlantico kesa kareng aliwang dayatmalat. 

Samy Gemayel:
I Samy Gemayel (, mibait aniang 1980 king Lebanon) metung yang politicong ibat Lebanon ampong metung a matas a kayanib ning partido Falangista. Aniang Febrero 2009, mesabing magi yang metung kareng Falangistang tagal para king parlamento ning Lebanon king alalan a marapat keng Junio, anting pekakatawan ning distrito ning Matn. 
Limput ya i Gemayel anting metung kareng limang Falangistang sinambut king alalan king mabilug a Lebanon, at ya kabud sinambut king Distrito ning Matn.

Rutaceae:
Ing Rutaceae, a keraklan ausan dang familiang citrus, metung yang familia da reng tanaman, a keraklan bibili da king orden Sapindales. 
Deng species king familiang iti maki sampaga lang mapipitna kareng apat o limang dake, a keraklan masikan a bau. Miayaliwa la dagul, manibat kareng dikut paras kareng palungpung ampong mangalating pun dutung. 
Ing pekamaulagang genus ning familia ya pin ing "Citrus", nung nu la kayabe deng dalandan ("C. sinensis"), limon ("C." × "limon"), sua ("C. paradisi"), ampong dalayap (miayaliwa, keraklan "C. aurantifolia", ing key lime). Ing "Boronia" metung yang genus a Australiano, nung nu deng aliwa misna lang banglu sampaga a magagamit a kareng pisasali dang "essential oil". Kayanib la murin keti deng genus a "Zanthoxylum" ampong "Agathosma".

Miguel de Cervantes:
I Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra ( keng makabayung Espaniol; September 29, 1547April 23, 1616) metung yang Espaniol a novelista, watas, ampong talasulatlage. Ing kayang magnum opus, "Don Quixote", maralas kikilalanan bilang mumunang makabayung novela, metung yang classic a Western literature ampong mabibilang peka masanting diling novelang misulat. Ing kayang obra makikilala bilang pekamaulaga keng eganaganang malagungpanyulat (literature). Ing kayang impluwensiya keng Amanung Kastila (Spanish language) mabibilang bilang dakila inya ing salitang Kastila (Espaniol) mayayaus keraklan bilang "la lengua de Cervantes" (Ing amanu nang Cervantes). 
I Cervantes mibait ya king Alcalá de Henares, ing pangapat kareng pitu anak nang Rodrigo de Cervantes, metung a doctor king Alcalá de Henares, ampong Leonor de Cortinas (katutubu ibat Arganda del Rey). Ding pengari nang Cervantes kesal dala inyang 1543. 

Dante Alighieri:
I Dante Alighieri (May/June c.1265 – Septiember 14, 1321), kebaluan bilang Dante, metung yang Italianung watas (poet) ning Middle Ages. 
Ing lagiung "Dante" metung yang, agpang kareng amanu nang Jacopo Alighieri, metung a hypocorism para kang "Durante". 

Johann Wolfgang von Goethe:
I Johann Wolfgang von Goethe (, 28 Agostu 1749 22 Marsu 1832) metung yang Aleman talasulat ampong polymath. Ding obra nang Goethe sasakupan no ring marangle ning kawatasan (poetry), drama, malagung pangyulat (literature), theology, philosofia, humanism ampong science. Ing kayang "magnum opus", mekilala ya bilang iti ing taluktuk ning pangkalibilugan yatung malagung panyulat (world literature), adua yang dake keng drama "Faust". Ding aliwang bantug a malagung panyulat a obra na kayabe la reng dakal a kawatasan, ing Bildungsroman "Wilhelm Meister's Apprenticeship" ampo ing epistolary novel "The Sorrows of Young Werther".

Omeru:
I Homer (Ancient Greek: , "Hómēros") metung yang maamlat a minunang panaun a Greek epic watas (poet), king matuang kaugalian, iya ing sinulat kareng mgakabang watas (epic) a "Iliad" ampo ing "Odyssey". 

Victor Hugo:
I Victor-Marie Hugo () (26 Pebreru 1802 – 22 Mayu 1885) metung yang French watas (poet), playwright, novelista, essayist, visual artist, statesman, human rights ampong activista king France. 
King France, ing pangasikat nang Hugo karas keng malagung panyulat menibat mumuna keng kayang kawatasan at kaibat kareng kayang novela ampo karen kayang ikua keng drama. Ding kayang kawatasan ilapin deng "Les Contemplations" ampong "La Légende des siècles" matas la lawe kaya reng criticu at neng misan i Hugo mabibilang yang pekadakila kareng French a watas Kilual ning France, ding kayang bantug a novela ilapin deng "Les Misérables" ampong "Notre-Dame de Paris" (kebaluan keng English bilang "The Hunchback of Notre Dame"). 

Ankor Wat:
Ing Angkor Wat (o kaya Angkor Vat) () metung yang templu king Angkor, Cambodia, mitalakad para keng Aring Suryavarman II inyang mumuna na ning pang12 dilanua bilang state a templu ampong kabisera (tungku) ning lakanbalen. Meging yang symbulu ning Cambodia, makalto keng kayang pangbangsang bandera, ampo ning kayang pangbangsang pangakit para kareng bibisita.

Metsamor Karinan:
Ing karinan ning Metsamor castle, malapit keng Armenian balen ning Metsamor tiknangan de manibat pang5 millennium BC anggang keng pang18 dilanua AD. Deng kilkulan keng pantsun nang Metsamor castiliu megumpisa inyang 1965. Ing balen ning Arkuni bantug ya keng pamagmanman ampo ing templu salalangsang atin yang pitung santungan. Malapit keng karinan metung yang neolithic batung pabilug (stone circle) makpetsa mga 5000 BC, milikas kareng masigasig keng archaeoastronomy bilang metung a astronomical "pipagmanmanan (observatory)".
Metsamor Museo.
Ing Museo ning Amlat ampong Archaeologia (Museum of History and Archeology) king Metsamor mibuklat ya inyang 1968. Pirinan ya kareng maiggit 22,000 a bage, alus metuklas king karinan a iti.

Pyramid ning El Pueblito:
Ing Pyramid ning El Pueblito, kebaluan bilang "El Cerrito" (malating talimunduk) kareng pakatuknang kareng mismung makapalibut, metung yang archaeological karinan keng Mexican State ning Querétaro, king tuknangan a "El Pueblito", luklukan ning municipalidad ning Corregidora. 
Ining pyramid a ini, atiu keng metropolitan karinan ning Santiago de Querétaro, metung yang archaeological zona ning "El Cerrito". Ining karinan metung yang maulagang populasiun bayu la miliari ing Pamanyakup da reng Kastila king Mexico. Inyang mumunang millennia dakal la reng pituknangan king Bajío karinan, ini bilang metung kareng pekamaulagang mengatagan keng kalibudtan ning labuad ning Mexico. 

Tala da reng Pyramid king Egypt:
King kaba ning 3,500 a banua atin 118 pyramids a pepatalakad da reng Pharaohs ona ning Matuang Panaun ning Egypt. Iting talang iti papakit nala deng maulagang bilangan da reng pyramids a tukituki agpang keng salansan ning panaun. 

William Shakespeare:
I William Shakespeare (mebiniag 26 Abril 1564 – mete 23 Abril 1616) metung yang English a watas ampong playwright, maleparan makikilala bilang pekamatenakan a talasulat keng English amanu ampong pekabantug mabilug yatu a dramaturga. Mayayaus ya keraklan bilang pangbangsang watas ning England ampong "Bard of Avon". Ding kayang mabieng makatagan a obra ilapin deng, kayabe no rin deng mapilan a collaborations, 38 plays, 154 sonnets, aduang makabang narrative poem, ampong dakal aliwang kawatasan. Ding kayang palage milikas la kareng alus pun a amanu.

Leo Tolstoy:
I Leo Tolstoy, o kaya Conti Lev Nikolayevich Tolstoy (, ; – ), metung yang Russian talasulat maleparan a makikilala bilang metung kareng pekamatenakan a novelista. Ding kayang obra maestra ilapin deng "Guerra ampong Kapayapan (War and Peace)" ampong "Anna Karenina" ila deng maglarawan keng lalam, lapad, ampong mabieng papakit ing pang19 dilanuang (siglu) bie king Russia ampong panlalawe, ing taluktuk ning realist fiction..
Dagdag pamamasa.
Universal and museum websites on Leo Tolstoy
Leo Tolstoy's biography and critique
E-texts of works by Leo Tolstoy
Leo Tolstoy in the media

Columbia, Missouri:

Djoser:
Ing Netjerikhet o Djoser (Turin King List "Dsr-it"; Manetho "Tosarthros") kebaluan ya bilang pharaoh na ning Pangatlung dynasty ning Egypt. Ding kayang aliwang lagiu kayabe la ding Zoser, Dzoser, Zozer, Dsr, Djeser, Djésèr, Horus-Netjerikhet, ampong Horus-Netjerichet. 

Pasiknangan:
Ing pasiknángan o sport metung yang actividad a panibalan na ning metung a panibalan da reng kapalakaran o patakaran, at pakiabayan maki kacumpetencia o maki kalaban. Keraklan, deng "pasiknangan" actividad la nung nu ing aspetung pisical ning kalaban ing bukud o pekamaulagang sangkan ning pamaniambut o pangasambut, oneng magagamit ya murin ing kataya para kareng actividad anti deng pasiknangan pangkaisipan (metung a maralas magagamit a lagiu kareng mapilang pialung a ipiss ampong board game nung nu ditak mu ing papil ning suerti) ampo reng motor sports nung nu ing isip o deng gamit ilang manimunang elementu. Maralas, ing pasiknangan dirinan deng kabaldugang metung a organisado, miku-competencia, ampong magematan o biasang actividad a pisical a mangailangan pamamie panaun ampong patas a pamamialung. Para kareng mapilan, aliwa ing pasiknangan kareng pialung uling mas matas a uri ing panga-organisa ampong maki papl 8ing tubu (e paneng ing cualta) king pasiknangan. Manyalikut lang exactung kasulatan kareng resulta kareng keraklan kareng pasiknangan kareng pekamatas a level, at mibubulalag la reng mangasambut ampo reng agagawa da o ararapat kareng balita king pasiknangan. 
Deng pasiknangan a magdependi ing karelang resulta king pamalak o opinion ding mamatul aliwa la kareng actividad anti kareng ligligan leguan ("beauty pageants") ampong palageng singkaragul katawan ("bodybuilding shows") uling ketang minuna, atiu ing pansing king "actividad" a daraptan, at e kareng pisical a calidad ning kayabe king ligligan, anti ing tauli (dapot atulan da la kareng aduang ligligan deng "datang" o "presentation" o "presencia"). 
Keraklan, pipialungan la mu deng pasiknangan bang milimbang o milibang, o bang manatili king masanting a kabilian a pisical.
Lipat ning e la paneng magtagumpe keti, asahan dong magpakit mayap a sportsmanship, deng batayan ning pangimut anti ing pangamagalang kareng kalaban ampo reng oficial, ampo ing pamagmananu ("congratulating") kareng masasambut. 

Kastanias:
Ing Kastanias (Castanea), "Chestnut" keng English (deng aliwang specie mayayaus lang "chinkapin o kayachinquapin"') metung yang genus da reng walu o siam a species da reng deciduous pun dutung ampong palungpung keng familiang "Fagaceae", katutubu kareng marimla-rimlang labuad ning Pangulung Kabangal ning Yatu. Ing lagiu makadaleraya ya naman kareng apapangan a mani a apapalual da.

Jaén ((lalawigan)):

Henrietta Lacks:
I Henrietta Lacks (Agosto 18 (?), 1920 – Octubre 4, 1951) ing migkalub, king e na kamalayan, kareng cell ibat king kayang tumor a maki cancer, a me-culture kapamilatan nang George Otto Gey bang panibatan da reng alang kamatayan a uri da reng cell para king pamanialugsug king medisina. Deni deng uri da reng cell a ausan da ngening HeLa cell line.

Lyman Reed Blake:
I Lyman Reed Blake (Agostu 24, 1835 – Octubri 3, 1883) metung yang Americanung menimbentu a peparalanan ne ing metung a makinang panayi para tayan nala deng lalam ning sapatus keng babo ning sapatus. Mibait king South Abington, Massachusetts, Blake megumpisa yang mangawang sapatus bilang kayang kalakal inyang mura ya pa idad, mumuna megobra ya keng kayang kapatad a lalaki i Samuel. Kaibat i Blake megobra ya keng menimbentu i Isaac Singer a cumpania, Singer Corporation, sasalansan no reng makinang panayi kareng fabrica da reng sapatus. Inyang 1856, meging neng kasosiu keng cumpaniang mangawang sapatus at gigisanan ne ing kayang oras keng pamnimbentung makina paa apabilis na ing pamangawang sapatus. 
Kaibat ning aduang banus, inyang Juliu 6, 1858, i Blake mektanggap yang patent ibat keng gubiernu ning United States para keng kayang makinang panayi para asopan neng ipakat ing lalam ning sapatus keng babo. 

Thomas Davenport (menimbentu)):
I Thomas Davenport (Juliu 9, 1802 – Juliu 6, 1851) metung yang pande king Vermont blacksmith a menimbentu keng mumunang Americanung DC electrical motor inyang 1834.
Tinuknang ya king Forest Dale, metung a puruk malapit keng balen ning Brandon.
Inyang mumunang ning 1834, menalkus yang battery-powered electric motor. Ginamit ne iti par paganan ne ing metung a malating-modelung kotsi keng mukayad a dake ning ning rili, na iti ing memie dalan para deng streetcars gumana keng dekurienti.
Kamne ning kayang asawa Emily, ampong colleague king Orange Smalley, Davenport tinggap ne ing mumunang Americanung patent keng makina dekurienti inyang 1837, U. S. Patent No. 132.

Jennings Cox:
I Jennings Cox, metung yang Americanung mining engineer iya ing mituturingan bilang menimbentu keng inum a daiquiri inyangtauli ning pang19 a dilanua. 

Fagaceae:

Mansanas:
Ing mansanas, apple keng English, metung yang pomaceous a bunga ning pun dutung a mansanas, species "Malus domestica" na ning familia rosas a Rosaceae. Iti ing peka gagambulan dang mumungang pun dutung. 
Ing tanaman menibatan ya king Kalibudtarang Asia, nung nu ing kayang pipumpunan mayayakit ya pa angga ngeni. Atin maigit a 7,500 balu rang magagambul a mansanas a papalual a aliwaliwang uri ra. 

Aka-Bo (amanu):
Ing Aka-Bo o Bo metung yang meteng amanung Great Andamanese, a kayabe kareng grupung pangulu ("Northern group"). Sadia yang magagamit king dakeng aslagan ning bebe dayatmalat ("east central coast") ning North Andaman ampo king Islang North Reef kareng Kapuluan a Andaman ("Andaman Islands") king India. Ing "Aka-" king umpisa ning lagiu ning amanu metung yang maralas magagamit a prefix a Great Andamanese par akareng pamalagiu ("noun") a makaugne king dila.
I Boa Sr., ing tauling taung atin pang atatandanan agiang ditak a Bo, mete ya aniang 26 Enero 2010, king edad a manga 85.
Bilang.
Deng bilang manibat 1 anggang 10 ila reng makatuki:

Tsiko:
Ing Tsiko ("Manilkara achras (Fosberg)") metung yang makabang bie pun dutung katutubu king mauling Mexico, Kalibudtarang America ampong keng Albugan Indies. Iti tutubu yang pangmarakalan king India, Mexico ampong dela de at peparakalan king Filipinas inyang manyakup la reng Kastila.

Jean Tijou:
I Jean Tijou metung yang Frances a Huguenot a talapagobra king bakal. Makikilala ya mu king kayang obra king Inglaterra, nung nu ya megobra kareng manimunang gusaling English Baroque. Gewa no reng screen amaponh barandillas ning St. Paul's Cathedral para kang Sir Christopher Wren, at megobra ya kareng baleng bakasiunan ("country houses") anti ing Easton Neston, Burghley ampong Chatsworth. King Chatsworth, kayabe ya kareang obra na ing balustrade ning dake nang babo ning engrandeng eran ampo ing grupu da reng tarangkahan a ausan dang Golden Gates, a mialis king salukuyan dang lugal king pasbul dalan na king pangulu ning parke aniang ka-19 a siglo o dilanua. Linimbag neng Tijou ing kayang "New Book of Drawings" aniang 1693, at sindu na ing kayang pamagobra king Inglaterra anggang 1711.

Max Planck:
I Max Planck (Abril 23, 1858 – Octubri 4, 1947) metung yang Aleman physicist. Makikilala ya bilang mitatag keng quantum theory, ampong metung kareng pekamaulagang physicists na ning pang20 dilanu o siglu. I Planck mirinan yang galal a Nobel Prize keng Physics inyang 1918.

M4 carbine:
Ing M4 carbine metung yang familiang baril nung nu abaligdan me ing kayang penibatan kareng mumunang carbine versions na ning M16, iti menibat la keng orihinal AR-15 a gawa ning ArmaLite. Iti malati ya at mayan yang uangis kesa keng M16A2 assault rifle, a atin kalupang 80% dake na ning M16A2. Ing M4 atin yang pipamilinan akbung kayabe ne ing semi-automatic ampong atlung-durut a lapitpit (kalupa ning M16A2), kabang ing M4A1 atin yang "full auto" a pipimilinan imbes na ing atlung-durut a lapitpit.

Razel torres-adorna:
Para KEKA,
Dintang ka quing biye cu aldong ecu pegdulapan Dintang ka aldong kakung kesayan Makananu keng iugse kekatang pamiyabe Nung balu cung quing pusu cu ika ing tutungge.
Masakit man para cacu ing mengapalyari Ninu mo yacu para keka gumanti Ing lugud a binye cu Lugud manibat quing pusu cu.
Dakal a kutang ing buri cung sambitan Dakal a bage lilibad cacung kaisipan Sanu at nanu pa ing dapat cung gawan Bang akit mu ing canacung gagawan.
Keka,biclat cu laman na ning pusu cu Keka,dinuwang cu kaladua cu Buong pamagtiwala ing queca binye cu Bang aramdaman lugud at tagimpan.
Antimong hangin etamu agyung talnan Antimong danum sabatan mu man pilit mantun dalan Kailangan kang mako mibalik quing aldong likwan Masakit man quing salu cu ninu yacu para pigilan.
Buri cung abalu mu laman na ning kilubluban Buri cung akit mu cacung kabilyan Buri cung pulisan ing luwang tutulo Quing sakit na ning lub cu ninu ing manulu.
Tatakut cung datang aldong pamagpaalam Tatakut kung malakwan ini ing araramdaman Pero makanyan man pangaku cu KEKA PANAYAN DAKA MAGLAMBAT KA MAN.
...yakumu...

Barack Obama:
Y Barack Hussein Obama II (mibait Agostu 4, 1961) kasalungsungan ya at pang44ng Pamuntuk ning Estados Unidos.

Gelo Espiritu:
I Angelito "Gelo" Espíritu metung yang Talalang Panimanman (Visual Artist) megaral yang kalalangan king American Center king Paris, University of Santo Tomas ampo king University of the Philippines. Dakal ne pepalageng Metung-Mu-Katau o iya mu ing lalage ampo mekiabe ya naman kareng maiggit a dinalan a panglupung palage keng Asia, Kalibutnan Aslagan, Paris ampo New York.
Ding kayang minunang atlung decada a kayang carera keng kalalangan, iti mitakda kareng kayang paneng pamanyubuk ampong alang patnang pamanalkus kareng mialiwang media ampong thema. Keng pangalabas ning dilanua o siglu, kaibat nang
Minta keng Banal a Gabun (Holy Land), ing talalalang mipaku ing kayang pamisip keng Banal a Kasulatan bilang iti ing kayang talaga ning kayang pampansikan lub.

Transmission Control Protocol:
Ing Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) metung ya kareng pekabusal a protocol o kaparalanan ("core protocols") ning Internet Protocol Suite. Ing TCP metung ya kareng aduang orihinal a dake ning suite a ita (itang metung ya pin ing Internet Protocol, or IP), ania ing mabilug a suite ausan deng "TCP/IP". Kabang ing IP ing tatalan kareng mababang dakeng pamiugnayan manibat king metung a computer paras king aliwa, kabang susulung ya king Aptas o Internet ing metung a mensahi, gagana king mas matas a dake ing TCP, at maki kaugnayan ya mu kareng aduang sistema king sepu ("end systems"), alimbawa metung a Web browser ampong metung a Web server. Particular, babie yang ayasahan ampong masaleseng pamagdala ning metung a agus da reng byte manibat king metung a program king metung a computer paras king aliwang program king aliwang computer. Bukud king Web, kayabe la kareng aliwa na pang gamit ning TCIP deng e-mail ampong file transfer. Kayabe kareng obra nang pamanibala ("management tasks") ing pamag-control king dagul da reng segment, control ning agus ("flow control"), ampo ing bilis ning pamilibe ning data, ampong "network traffic congestion". 

Hebe Camargo:
I Hebe Maria Camargo (mibait Marsu 8, 1929) metung yang Brazilanang artista. 

Sabat ning talasúlat:
Ing sabat ning talasúlat u blokeyu ning talasúlat ya ing pansamantalang ingkapasidad ning metung a talasúlat a maggawâ da ring obrang kreatíbu.
King kawatásan.
"E Ku Pánenayan…" (2009) ing títulu ning isa karing poema king amánung Kapampángan ning talasúlat a Filipínung i María Teresa Magtuloy Evangelista.
Pamanayus karing salita ilig at tutu kung kapad,
Pilisikan lang arti Dios-mibie liniang de rima sukad,
Peka-suluk na ning yatu miras la sana at mipadpad,
Ban dakal makaganaka kaku king panaung lumimpad.
Antimong mananaman ku butil king lupa na ning yatu,
Dagul la mo sang tiktak katas deting pun apepatubu,
Mamunga la’t apakan ganap ding siudad a e makagyu,
Masagana la pang dakal kabang lalakad ing minutu.
Matulang aumpisan kung agad pangaslag niting abak,
Kabang epa panat o mapipilitan ing kakung utak,
E ku panayan aslag ning aldo pababa na’t paritak,
Uling ing utak ku kanita mepudpud ne at mangaspak. 
Sumulat naku dapat mismu ngeni alang pamagpalag,
Uling nung maantala pa, mekad pupulan ku tiwalag,
E ku na pabukas pa ing malyari kung agawang agad,
Nung ali dakal e magawa, pati ing oras mayagad.
Pantunan ku pa solitaryu neng maralas kapapaltan,
Kanita ne man lumino isip ku at mika kapaldan,
Manigapu ku mu Banua, ibie na kaku marakalan,
Ban kalual ku pasbul dakal adake at apamatulan.
Sumulat na ku ngeni agad kabang ing Dios paintulut,
Anggat ing utak ena pa akuang lalangi at bubuluk,
E ku panayan iting kagiuan misobran pangalulut,
O panenayan manayang angin labulan neng palaut.

Space Invaders:
Ing metung yang arcade video game a diniseniu nang Tomohiro Nishikado, at pepalual da aniang 1978. Minuna neng gewa at pisali ning Taito king Japan, at kaibat milisensia bang magawa king Estados Unidos lalam ning Midway division ning Bally. Ing "Space Invaders" metung ya kareng mumunang pialung a videong barilan at atin yang two-dimensional graphics. Ing sangkan king pialung yapin ing pamaniambut kareng dakal a pakalupung a alien kapamilatan ning ion cannon, at sumambut dakal a puntus. Diniseniu neng Nishikado ing pialung king lalam ning inspirasiun ding sikat a media: ing "Breakout", "The War of the Worlds", ampong "Star Wars". Ba neng arian, migdiseniu yang pasadiang gamit a pamialung ampong kasangkapan a pagdiseniu.
Lipat ning simpli ya cumpara kareng pialung ngeni, iti ing metung kareng penibatan ning modernung pialung a video, at sinaup ya ba yang paragulan ing industria da reng pialung a video manibat king bayung usu paras king pangyatung industria. Aniang minuna yang linual, ing pialung ing meging sangkan ning pamagkulang kareng perang tia-100-yen. Aniang 2007, miras nang US$500 miliun ing penakitan ning Taito kaya. Agpang king "Guinness World Records", ini ing manimunang pialung a pang-arcade. 
Ing pialung ing meging inspirasiun para kareng aliwang pialung a video, mekatapilan de pepalual kareng dakal a plataporma, at dakal ya meging katuki (sequel). Peparakal nong mekatapat (quadruple) ning 1980 Atari 2600 deng pamaniali king pialung, at megi yang mumunang "killer app" para kareng video game console (pipamialungan video game). Binggit de ampong gewang biru ing "Space Invaders" kareng dakal a game show king telebision, at megi ya muring dake da reng exhibition da reng video game ampong pangcultura. Ing maka-pixel a kalaban na megi yang media icon a mangabaldugan kareng video game.

Inglaterra:
Ing Inglaterra o England () metung yang bangsa a dake ning United Kingdom.

Ernesto C. Turla:
I Ernesto Turla y Carlos metung yang wátas a Kapampángan.
Talambie.
Y Ernie C. Turla (Ernesto Carlos Turla) mibait ya Aldo Atlung Ari (Three Kings Day), 1938 qng Plaza Lubao, Pampanga, Philippines, balen nang Presidenti Diosdado Macapagal. Peparagul ne ning magsolu nang Ima, Belen, at ding apu na cang Ima na, Lucio (miembru ding revolucionaryu lalam nang Gen. Maximino Hizon) at Juana, at ning queyang Bapa at atlung Dara, ila ngan talaturu at manuknangan queng metung a pibale-bale. Ing carelang Spanish-style babo't-lalam a bale queta yang cantu lipat-dalan mu manibata queng cagulutan ning lumang pisamban Lubao, at metung mung bale manibat qng Central Elementary School. Quetang casalungsungan ning guerra, metung ya caring mapilan mung bale qng queyang lugal a e ra silaban ding Hapon caibat dang mituran caring canyun. Ngeni, bista man mengalarin ne qng pamanlabas ding banua, makatalacad ya pamurin qng sadia nang lugal, at dinalan a banua katua.
Apat ya pamung banua y Ernie iniang sinacup de ring Hapon ing Pilipinas. Ing pamilya na mig-baquit la queng metung a malaut barrio, Sto. Domingo, at carin na la ginugul ding tutuking atlung alang-kapaindatunan (balisa) a banua ning queyang bie. Banua lang pamamie mitmung peligru. Keilanganan lang magpalipat-lipat queng mialiwang parti ning barrio ban atakasan la ring kasalang, migsala-salicut cadalasan caring culcul, at mipatagmu caring malapitang-encuentru caring labanan ding Hukbu at Hapones. Tutung makatakut-takut, nganang magkuwentu qng queyang asawa at anak, panyatang ning aldo.
Iniang panyatang da ring puwersa nang MacArthur at palayan la ding isla, pitu neng banua edad, sactu mung panaun ban makapag-aral ya qng kabuklat-buklat a escuela qng siping-barrio, San Roque Dau. Ikit ne kanitang mitatas ing banderang Americanu bayu ing banderang Pilipinas, at mikakanta ing Star-Spangled Banner (a minemoria rang micaclasi) istung pamag-tas bandera neng abak at pamag-baba neng gatpanapun. Kelambatan, mibalik lang pamilya queng mengagalut rang lumang bale qng Poblacion at carin ne sindu ing maranun nang pamagaral. Ing paralan ning pamanuru caring sablang gradu, pati na ring egana-ganang libru queng Ingles. Me-accelerated yang makatadua at megyaring secondaria iniang 1953 keng edad a kinse.
Migpalista ya queng metung a local a colegio nung nu ya megyaring BS Education. Pauli ning apasar ne ing exmaniacion queng Civil Service para kareng talaturu iniang 1956 keng edad a disiotsu at cabang segundanyu ya pa queng colegio, mirinan yang permanenti o regular a talaturung pusisyun a e na linabas pa bilang "subsititute". Ing mumuna nang tutuc escuela ya qng Lambike, a barrio qng Pampanga River delta, a e calautan qng Manila Bay. Caibat ning anam a banua, milipat ya qng barrio Sta. Cruz, at canita ne sindu ing cursung A.B in English maki-minor queng History qng pareung colegio qng Guagua. Ing carera nang pamanuru queng escuelang pampublico minatyat labing-aduang banua, meputut mu iniang linipat ne America. Tinuru ya mu namang Ingles qng secondaria sinaguli, dapot keilanganan yang mibalik keng elementaria pauli ning keraklan karing minuna pang-pribadu la. Metanggap yang turu qng Pampanga High School makatadua, dapot makatadua ya mu namang minurung bandang tauli uling ing escuela quen yang pamamalakad ning gubyernung pamprubincia at e ne agyu ing mabawas pa ing suweldu, queng cababa na na, at mapitna pa. Kinanua yang units queng Master's Degree (especialization: ESL) qng Philippine Normal College at nung nu na neya mu sindu qng Pasadena College at qng Northwestern College qng Estados Unidos. Tinuru yang aduang banua qng Jackson School ning Altadena, California caibat neng pesar ing English Proficiency Test (ustung pamangamit mu, keraklan) a binie ning L.A. County School at nung nu ya mecapuntus 148 caring 150. Icua neya murin pangaibat ing California standard teaching credencial na queng pareung banua, iniang 1969.
Ing pekamumuna nang obra qng America yapin ing Caltech (1968). Caibat, bilang mestru qng Pasadena School District (1969-1971). Megobra ya munaman queng Fred Myers at queng Oaks Amusement Park, at qng Midland-Ross Corporation ampo qng Gilmore Steel qng Portland, ing tauli bilang steelworker at bilang maintenance clerk (1972-1976). Pangaibat naman, qng Post Office ning Portland bilang clericu, aduampulut-atlung banua angga na qng pamagretiru na queng Serbisyu Civil iniang Dec. 31, 1999.
Akilala ne ing keyang meging asawa, y Angela Bonifacio ning Masantol, cabang internee ya (Angela) qng Universidad de Sto. Tomas (cucuang Education) mitutuc qng escuela nang pituturuan (Ernie). Miyasawa la iniang Nov 20, 1966. Mig-emigrate la Estados Unidos quetang May 27, 1968. Meging US citizens iniang 1973. 
Ding Kayang Kinudta.

Tan Son Nhat International Airport:
Ing Tan Son Nhat International (DMIA), mayayaus mu rin Sân bay quốc tế Tân Sơn Nhất , iya ing peka airport a masilbi keng makaleleng Ho Chi Minh Lakanbalen at ning makalapit a Dong Nam Bo king Vietnam.
Deng Airlines.
Deng tutuking airlines a susuyu keng Tan Son Nhat Airport (agpang Eneru 2010):

Bunduk Fuji:
Ing Bunduk Fuji ya ing peka-matas a bunduk ning Hapon.

Selena:
I Selena Quintanilla-Pérez (Abril 16, 1971 – Marsu 31, 1995), kebaluan bilang Selena, metung yang Mexicanu Americanu talakanta-talakudtangkanta, talaterak, modelu, talagulis susulud imalan, artista, ampong talapalual plaka, meyaus bilang "Ing Ari (Reina) ning musico Tejano". Ing bungsu anak da reng miasawang Mexicanu-Americanu, i Selena peppalual ne ing kayang mumunang plaka (album) inyang idad yang labingadua. Menyambut ya keng Female Vocalist of the Year king 1987 Tejano Music Awards at dinugpa yang contrata keng EMI kaibat ning mapilan mung ditak a banua. Ing kayang kabantugan meragul iniang mumunang dake ning 1990s, lalu na kareng bangsang magsalitang Español.

Amanung Kroato:
Ing Amanung Kroata o Kroasyano (en-hrvatski) metung yang bersyung Latinisadu ning katutubung lagyu ning Croatia. ISO 639-1=hr/ISO 639-2=hrv/ISO 639-3=hrv.

Nathalia Dill:
I Nathalia Goyannes Dill Orrico (mibait Marsu 24, 1986) metung yang Brazilanang artista. 

Stylistics:

ABBA:

Vladimir Putin:
Y Vladimir Vladimirovisu Putin o Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin (mebait Octubri 7, 1952) a una ning politiku at punong ministru ning bangsang Россия o Russia.

Eat Bulaga!:
Ing Eat Bulaga! metung yang pang-ugtung "vareity show" king Filipinas a produksyon ning Television And Production Exponents Inc. (TAPE) dari Malou Fagar ampong Tony Tuviera. Pálage de makata-anam king paruminggu. Iti ing pekamalwat nang programang pang-ugtu king telebisyon king Filipinas. Atyu ing karelang studio king Broadway Centrum, New Manila, Quezon Lakanbalen.

Marcella Hazan:
I Marcella Hazan, aniang dalaga ya, Marcella Polini, (mibait 1924) metung yang Italianang talasulat dikil king pamaglutu a susulat king Ingles. Deng kayang libru king pamaglutu ing ing migpakilala king Estados Unidos ampong Britania kareng kaparalanan ning tradicional a Ipamaglutung Italianu. Tuturing de reng dakal a matenakan a talapaglutu ampo reng kalupa nang talasulat tungkul king pamangan a metung kareng manimunang autoridad king pamaglutung Italianu.

2007:

2010:

Eddie Panlilio:
I Eduardo Tongol Panlilio (mibait December 6, 1953), u Among Ed, metung yang Kapampangan ampong Pilipinung Catolicung suspendídung pari ampong gobernador ning Pampanga. Mesuspindi ya king kayang pangapari aniang sinabi nang tágal yang gobernador. Miyalal yang gobernador aniang Mayo 2007 king metung a alalan nung nu la mikanlapit mu botu deng tatagal, laban kang gobernador Mark Lapid ampong provincial board member Lilia Pineda. Aniang Febrero 2010, kaibat ning pasibayung pamamilang da reng botu uli ning protesta king alalan, migpalual yang decision ing Comelec a i Lilia Pineda ing alalan ketang 2007 laban kang Panlilio. Mesambut ya king kayang campania para king panga-gobernador aniang alalan ning 2020 i Panlilio. 
Pinili neng "Filipino of the Year" para king banuang 2007 ning Philippine Daily Inquirer.

Ing Alino ning Angin:
Ing Alino ning Angin (The Shadow of the Wind) () metung yang nobelang sinulat na aniang 2001 novel ning talasulat ning Espaniang i Carlos Ruiz Zafón, a metung a bestseller king mabilug a yatu. Liniikas ne king English aniang 2004 Lucia Graves, at maigit lang metung a miliun deng misali king UK mu. Bayu ita, migtagumpe ne king mismung Europa (mainland Europe), at pilan yang domingung mumuna kareng listaan da reng bestseller king Espania. Kaibat nang milikas aniang 2004, linimbag neng pasibayu king Estados Unidos ning Penguin Books ampo king Britania ning Weidenfeld & Nicolson ampo ning Orion Books. 
King kayang sariling ciudad o lakanbalen ning Barcelona, a malinong milarawan king libru, gewa rang pisasabian deng makabalen a Catalan (Catalan nationalists) ing pamangamit nang Ruiz king amanung Castila at ali king Catalan. 
Ing sabik dang tatalukian a katuki ning nobela, metung yang prequel king "Ing Alino ning Angin", a linimbag na king Castila ning Planeta aniang Abril 2008. Ikua na ning Weidenfeld & Nicolson ing katuliran ning pamaglikas, at milimbag ya ing hardback English edition aniang Junio 2009. Maki pamagat yang "The Angel's Game" o "Pialung ning Anghel", at miliari ya king Barcelona kanitang decadang 1920 ampong 1930. Tungkul ya king kayanakan a talasulat a lepitan ning misteriosong tauan at papasulatan neng libru. Linikas ne murin king English Lucia Graves ing "Pialung ning Anghel". 
Suglung palual.
Reviews:

Jejomar Binay:
I Jejomar "Jojo" Cabauatan Binay (mibait Noviembre 11, 1942) ing kalabing lima ampong kasalungsungang Kaduang Pamuntuk ning Filipinas ampong sadiang punbalen ning Makati Lakanbalen, Filipinas. Ya murin ing Pamunuk ning also the United Opposition (UNO), Pamuntuk ning Partido Demokratiko Pilipino-Lakas ng Bayan (PDP-Laban), Talapamuntuk ning Asia-Pacific Region Scout Committee ampong Pamuntuk ning Boy Scouts of the Philippines.

1521:

Francis Pangilinan:
I Francis Nepomuceno Pangilinan (mibait Agosto 24, 1963), a
ausan da mu namang Kiko Pangilinan, metung yang Senador king
Kapamahalan ning Filipinas manibat kanitang 2001. Ya ing Pekapun ning Mayoria king Senado (Senate
Majority Leader) anggang 2008, at elilan neng 
Juan Miguel Zubiri.
Kayanakan.
Mibait ya i Francis Pancratius Nepomuceno Pangilinan aniang Agosto 24,
1963 king Menila kang Donato Pangilinan, metung a inieru ampong
negosianti ibat king Pampanga, ampo kang Emma Nepomuceno, metung
a mestra king iskuelang balen (public school) ibat king Nueva
Ecija ampong Marinduque. Kalima ya kareng siam a mikakapatad.
Deng kayang kapatad, ila pin di Maricel Arenas, Angeli Valenciano,
Nenette Zipperich, Joseph, Anthony, Felichi
Buizon, John Raymund ampong Donna Simpao. Kamaganak ne mu naman i
Carmela Espiritu "Candy" Pangilinan, metung a artistang komedianti.
I Kiko, ing lagiu nung nu re balu deng dakal a memalen, minuna yang
mekilala antimong kayanakan a abogado a mamieng libring serbisiu king
angin (on the air), at tataluki ya kareng casu king programang
telebision a “Hoy Gising!” king ABS-CBN, nung nu ne kayabe yang
magdala (co-anchor) ampong talan king and dake ning programa (segment
host). Tatalan ya mu namang programa king radio, anti ing “Batas”
ampong “Relos Report with Atty. Kiko” king DZMM, a programang maki
kapagnasan a aintindi de reng memalen ing sistemang legal ning
Filipinas kapamilatan ning pamanintindi kareng karelang katuliran
ampong katungkulan lalam ning leyi.
Aniang 1997, linual ya king bangsa at minta king Boston,
Massachusetts Estados Unidos kayabe ya ing kayang asawa, ing
artistang i Sharon Cuneta ampo ing kayang anak ba neng arian ing
kayang Master of Public Administration king Kennedy School of
Government ning Harvard University, nung nu ya meyaring maki
gradung A-.
Kaibat ning kayang labingwalung bulang pangawala king local a media,
mibalik ya kapamilatan ning pamanisip ampong pamanalan king “Barangay
Dos”, metung a pang serbisiung programang telebision a palage ra king
ABS-CBN, a maki kapagnasan a manintun kalutasan kareng
pang-aldo-aldong problema da reng ordinariong memalen.
Mekilala ya king programa antimong matenakan, biasing magsalita,
ampong actibung abogadu, ampong personalidad king media.
Pamagaral.
Miyari yang elementaria king La Salle Greenhills aniang 1977.
Ayari na murin ing kayang secundario (high school) king La Salle
Green Hills kanitang 1981.
Miyari yang colegio king Universidad ning Filipinas king Diliman
king carerang Bachelor of Arts in English, Major in Comparative
Literature.
Migising ing kayang nasionalismo aniang panaun a magaral ya king UP.
Misan a summer, nung nu ya magobra para king tata na king kabundukan
ning Antique, akayarap na ing kakaluluan ampo ing pangainutil ning
kapamahalan bang mamie serbisiu kareng bariu.
Migsilbi yang talapamuntuk ning University of the Philippines
Student Council aniang 1986 lalam ning partidong puliticang
estudianting SAMASA, at migsilbi ya antimong mumunang Student Regent
king UP Board of Regents aniang
1987. Meyalal yang pekakatawan ning Filipinas king Committee on Youth
Cooperation ning Association of South East Asian Nations (ASEAN).
In 1997, he finished his post-graduate studies a Harvard
University, John F. Kennedy School of Government with a degree
of Master of Science in Public Administration with an area of
concentration in Strategic Management.
Aniang 1997, ayari na ing kayang pamagaral kaibat miyari o
post-graduate king Harvard University, John F. Kennedy School of
Government a maki carerang Master of Science in Public
Administration, a makatimid king (area of concentration in)
Pamanibalang Pamamaralan o Strategic Management.
Carera king politica.
Quezon City Councilor (1988-1992).
He believes in active citizenship that is why his involvement in civic
affairs began even as a student in high school. He has over 21 years of civic and public service experience. He
was the youngest elected city councilor of the Quezon City Council
in 1988-1992. During his stint as QC councilor, he saw the need to
unite and develop young legislators committed to strong, principled
leadership among young legislators. He thus founded and established
the National Movement of Young Legislators (NMYL) where he became
founding president.
Maniwala ya king actibung pangamemalen, ania magaral ya pamung secundario (high school), kayabe ne kareng bageng civico. Adua nang pulu't metung a banua ing kayang sibukan (21 years experience) kareng obrang civico ampong kasuyuan pangmalda (public service). Ya ing anak diling meging consejal ning Quezon Lakanbalen aniang 1988-1992. Aniang consejal ya karin, ikit na ing pamangailangan a pisanmetung la ampong sanayan deng talagawang leying kayanakan a mamalakaran para king masikan ampong maki principiong pamanibala. Uli na niti, telakad ne ing National Movement of Young Legislators (NMYL), o Pambangsang Pangimut da reng Kayanakan a Talagawang Leyi, nung nu ya meging pamuntuk a talatátag. 
Sindu na ing panga-actibu kareng grupung multi-sectoral (pekakatawan da reng dakal a sector) a lalaban para king pamagbalik ning pangadisenti, kabiasnan king obra, ampong kapakibatan king kapanibalang pambangsa.
Senador ning Filipinas (2001-salukuyan).
Miyalal ya king Senado i Pangilinan aniang 2001, at kaibat, miyalal yang pasibayu king terminung anam a banua.
Pekapun ning Mayoria king Senado (2004-2008).
Mumuna yang miyalal a Pekapun ning Mayoria king Senado (Senate Majority Leader) kanitang 2004. Aniang Julio 23,
2007, miyalal yang kaduang pamuntuk ning Senado (Senate president pro tempore) i Jinggoy Estrada, kabang pekapun ne ning mayoria i Kiko
Pangilinan (kaibat ning pangalukluk nang Sen. Manuel
Villar pamamuntukan ning kalabing apat a Congreso).
Judicial Executive Legislative Advisory and Consultative Council (JELAC).
Mitikdo ya kanitang 2006 ing Judicial Executive Legislative Advisory and
Consultative Council (JELAC) a aisip nang Pangilinan, at pepamunikala na king Manila Hotel
Summit on Extrajudicial killings and forced disappearances in the
Philippines aniang Julio 16-17, 2007 
Personal a bie.
Asawa ne ing artista ampong personalidad king telebision a i Sharon Cuneta (aniang
Abril 28, 1996) at tata neng Simone Francesca Emmanuelle (Frankie)
ampong Mariel Daniella Sophia (Miel). Ya ing padrastro nang Maria
Kristina Cassandra (KC Concepcion), a legal nang inampun.
Adua kareng kapatad na ing ating kaugnayan king local a pamag-artista (showbiz).
Ing kapatad nang babai, i Angeli Pangilinan, sikat yang manibala kareng maki kagiwan
(talent manager) a asawa ning talacantang i Gary Valenciano. Ing metung na pang kapatad, i 
Anthony, asawa ne ning artista ampong sadiang sinambut ligligan leguan (former beauty queen), i 
Maricel Laxa.
Ding suglung a palual.
Kiko's I-Site Profile]
Senate Bio]

Mindoro:
Maaari king tukuy ning Mindoro:

Andrea Levy:
I Andrea Levy (born 1956) metung yang talasulat a Britanico, a mibait kingLondon kareng pengari ibat Jamaica, a miglayag papunta king Inglaterra o England king "Empire Windrush" aniang 1948.
I Levy keraklan lahi yang Afro-Jamaican. Hudio ya ing ingkung na kang tata na, at ibat ne man Escocia (Scotland) i ingkung na king tud kang ima na..
Migumpisa yang susulat i Levy aniang maigit neng treinta, oneng mepansin yang tambing ing mumuna nang novela, ing semi-autobiographical (mibasi ya king bie na ing metung nang dake) a "Every Light in the House Burnin'. " Sinambut yang Whitbread Book of the Year ing kapat nang novela, ing "Small Island" (2004), Orange Prize for Fiction, ampong Commonwealth Writers' Prize. Mipalage ne antimong drama king telebision, a pepalage ning BBC aniang Diciembre 2009.
Ing kalima nang novela, ing "The Long Song" mibili ya king short-list para king 2010 Man Booker Prize for fiction.

J. M. G. Le Clézio:
I Jean-Marie Gustave Le Clézio (mibait 13 April 1940), a keraklan makikilala king lagiung J. M. G. Le Clézio, metung yang talasulat, propesor, ampong Nobel laureate a Frances.Talasulat de reng maigit apat a pulung libru, at mirinan yang galal a 1963 Prix Renaudot para king kayang novelang "Le Procès-Verbal". Ya ing sinambut king 2008 Nobel Prize in Literature.
Librung sinulat.
"Misulat la at mibulalag king Frances deng anggang obra. Nung ating obrang milikas king Ingles, makabili ya king parenthesis ing kayang pamagat."

Carlos Ruiz Zafón:
I Carlos Ruiz Zafón (mibait king Barcelona, 25 Setiembre 1964) metung yang novelistang ibat Espania a manuknangan king Los Angeles manibat aniang 1993, nung nu ya pilan banuang susulat script kabang magsane ya king kayang carera anting talasulat.
Ing mumuna nang novela, ing "El príncipe de la niebla" ("Ing Principe ning ing Ulap" o "The Prince of Mist", 1993), sinambut ya king galal pangkasulatan a Edebé para kareng obrang pikudtang pangkayanakan a atiu king edad (young adult fiction). Talasulat de murin deng atlu pang novelang pangkayanakang atiu king edad, deng "El palacio de la medianoche" (1994), "Las luces de septiembre" (1995) ampong "Marina" (1999).
Aniang 2001, bilalag ne ing novelang "La sombra del viento" ("Ing Alino ning Angin"), ing mumuna nang novelang pang "matua" o atiu king edad, a miliun-miliun nang copia ing misali king mabilug a yatu, at maigit metung miliun king Britania mû. Manibat aniang mibulalag ya, pinuri de reng critico king mabilug a yatu ing "La sombra del viento", at dakal ya simbut a galal a internacional. Mibulalag na la kareng 45 a bangsa deng obra nang Ruiz Zafón, at milikas na la kareng maigit 30 amanu. Agpang kareng bilang a reti, i Ruiz Zafón ing pekamatagumpeng talasulat a talasulat ning Espania king panaun tamu, kayabe nang Javier Sierra, a mibulalag na kareng apat a pulu't aduang bangsa, ampo i Juan Gómez-Jurado, a mibulalag na kareng apat a pulu't metung a bangsa. 
Mibulalag ya ing kadua nang novelang Ruiz Zafón, ing "El juego del angel", ("Ing Pialung ning Anghel", aniang Abril 2008 Ing edicion a Ingles, ing "The Angel's Game", a linikas nang Lucia Graves, a anak ning poetang i Robert Graves. Prequel ya king "Ing Alino ning Angin", a miliari murin king Barcelona, dapot kanitang decadang 1920 ampong 1930. Tungkul ya kang (at cucuentu neng) David Martin, a metung a kayanakan a talasulat a lepitan ning metung a misteriosong tau bang sumulat libru. Balak neng yabeng Ruiz Zafón king metung a serie da reng apat a libru, kayabe ne ning "Ing Alino ning Angin".
Mibulalag ya ing bersion nang Ingles ning "El príncipe de la niebla" ("The Prince of Mist", 1993) aniang 2010.

Kiran Desai:
I Kiran Desai (mibait aniang 3 Setiembre 1971) 
metung yang talasulat ibat India a memalen ning India ampong permanenting residenti ning Estados Unidos. Sinambut ya ing kayang novelang "The Inheritance of Loss" ("Ing Pamagmana king Pangawala") king 2006 Man Booker Prize ampo king National Book Critics Circle Fiction Award. Anák ne ning pikabaluan a talasulat a i Anita Desai at kapareha neng Orhan Pamuk.

David Mitchell:
I David Stephen Mitchell (mibait aniang 12 January 1969) metung yang novelistang Ingles. Mekasulat neng limang novela, nung nu reng adua me-shortlist la king Booker Prize.

James Ellroy:
I James Ellroy (mibait aniang Marzo 4, 1948) metung yang Americanong talasulat tungkul king crimen ampong talasulat tungkul king salese (essayist). Mekilala ya i Ellroy king amanuan dang "telegraphic" prose style ning kayang pekabayung obra, nung nukarin maralas, pupututan na la deng katayang paniuglung (connecting words) at gagamit ya mung mangakuyad ampong biglang pangamanu (short, staccato sentences) at, lalu na, kareng novelang The Black Dahlia, The Big Nowhere, L.A. Confidential, White Jazz, American Tabloid, The Cold Six Thousand, ampong Blood's a Rover.

Nick Clegg:
I Nicholas William Peter "Nick" Clegg (mibait aniang 7 Enero 1967) metung yang Britanicong politicong Liberal Democrat a Kaduang Pun Ministro ning United Kingdom, Ginung Pamuntuk ning Consejo ampong Minister for Constitutional and Political Reform (Ministro para king Kapanumang Pang-punbatas ampong Pampolitca ning kapamahalang pang-coalicion of Conservative Prime Minister David Cameron. I Clegg ing Pekapun da reng Liberal Democrat ampong Member of Parliament (Kayanib ning Parlamento)(MP) para king Sheffield Hallam. 
Ing mumuna nang katungkulan a miyalal nang Clegg antimong Member of the European Parliament (Kayanib ning Parlamento ning Europa (MEP) para king East Midlands manibat 1999 anggang 2004. Miyalal yang Kayanib ning Parlamento para king Sheffield Hallam king pangkabilugan a alalan ning 2005 general at megi yang became the talapagsalitang pang-Pisasabiang Pangkilub (Liberal Democrat Home Affairs spokesperson) aniang 2006. Simbut neng Clegg i Chris Huhne king alalan a pangkapanibalan ning 2007. Megi yang Kaduang Pun Ministro i Clegg kaibat ning alalang pangkabilugan ning 2010, nung kapilan deng Liberal Democrats minalkus lang kapamahalan a pang-coalicion coalition kayabe da reng Partido Conservativo, a panimunan nang Pun Ministro David Cameron. Bukud king kayang papil king parlamento, sinulat ya muring dakal a folleto ampong libru kareng pisasabian tungkul king politica i Clegg.
Megaral ya i Clegg king Caldicott School king Buckinghamshire ampo king Westminster School king London, at kaibat, king Robinson College king Universidad ning Cambridge, nung nu ya megaral Social Anthropology; kaibat, University of Minnesota ampo king College of Europe king Belgium. Asawa ne i Miriam González Durántez; atin lang atlung anak a lalaki.
Suglung palual.
! colspan="3" style="background:#cfc;" | Order of precedence in Northern Ireland

David Cameron:
I David William Donald Cameron (; mibait aniang 9 Octubre 1966) ing salukuyan a Pun Ministro ning United Kingdom, First Lord of the Treasury, ampong Pekapun ning Partido Conservativo. I Cameron ing pekakatawan ning Witney antimong Kayanib ning Parlamento (MP).
Suglung palual.

Makarov (pistola):
Ing PM ("Pistolet Makarova", ) metung yang deseniu ning pistolang semi-automatic. King lalam ning pamanibala nang Nikolay Fyodorovich Makarov]], megi yang standard military side arm ning Soviet Union aniang panaung 1951-1991.

James Lee Burke:
I James Lee Burke (mibait Diciembre 5, 1936) metung yang Americanung talasulat da reng misterio, a pikabaluan dili king king kayang serieng Dave Robicheaux. Sinambut yang Edgar Award para king "Black Cherry Blues" (1990) ampong "Cimarron Rose" (1998). Mekatadua ne linto king cine ing tauan nang Robicheaux, a mumuna nang legen Alec Baldwin ("Heaven's Prisoners") at kaibat i Tommy Lee Jones ("In the Electric Mist"). Sinulat ya muring pitung aliwang claseng novela ning crimen i Burke, aduang antolohia da reng makuyad a salita ampong apat a libru nung nukarin ya tauan ing metung a bida, ing abugadung ibat Texas, i Billy Bob Holland.
Sinulat.
Aliwa pa.
Hackberry Holland

Freddie Mercury:
I Freddie Mercury (mibait yang Farrokh Bulsara (Gujarati: ફ્રારુક બુલ્સારા), 5 Setiembre 1946 – 24 Noviembre 1991)metung yang musiquerong Britanico, a pikabaluan dili antimong manimunang talacanta (lead vocalist) ampong talasulat canta ning bandang rock a Queen. Mekilala ya antimong makuleng lalage king entablado ampo king kayang mayupayang siuala o bosis a maki lapad (range) a apat a octave. Antimong talasulat canta, dakal ya sinulat a hit para king Queen, kayabe la reng "Bohemian Rhapsody", "Killer Queen", "Somebody to Love", "Don't Stop Me Now", "Crazy Little Thing Called Love" ampong "We Are the Champions". Bukud king obra na kayabe ya ing Queen, maki carrera yang solo, at sinulat ya kareng hits antimong reng "Barcelona", "I Was Born to Love You" ampong "Living on My Own". Pamisan-misan, migsilbi ya muring producer ampong bisitang musiquero o guest musician (piano o vocals) para kareng aliuang lalage.
Mete ya king bronchopneumonia a menibat king AIDS, aniang 24 Noviembre 1991, metung mung aldo kaibat nang pepabalung másakit ya kaniti.
Metung yang Parsi a mibait king Zanzibar i Mercury, at meragul ya karin ampo king India anggang libutad ning kayang panga teen-ager, at sasabian dang ya ing "mumunang Asianong rock star ning Britania". Aniang 2006, pinili ne ning "Time Asia"ng metung kareng peka ma-influenciang Asianong bayani ning milabas a anam a pulung banua, at bobotu re pa murin a metung kareng maragul o mapiang diling talacanta king kasalesayan ning pangmaldang musica o popular music. Aniang 2005, agpang king pamagbotu o poll a tinikdo ning "Blender" ampo ning MTV2 i Mercury ing binotu rang maragul diling lalaking talacanta ning mabilug a panaun. Kanitang 2009, agpang king pamagbotung penibalan ning "Classic Rock" ya ing binotu rang mapiang diling talacantang rock ning mabilug a panaun. Aniang 2008, pinili de reng talapatuntun ning "Rolling Stone", kalabing walu ya (18) king tala o listaan da reng dinalan a pekamapiang talacanta ning mabilug a panaun. Agpang king Allmusic i Mercury ing "one of the most dynamic and charismatic frontmen in rock history."

Diomedes Maturan:
I Diomedes Maturan (1941–2002) metung yang artistang Kapampángan ibat king Negros Occidental a linage king "Botika sa baryo" (1960) ampo king "Tawag ng tanghalan". Mete ya i Maturan aniang Abril 7, 2002 uli ning ataque king pusu king edad a 61.
Sinikat ya uli ning pamaniambut na king sikat a ligligan pamagcantang "Tawag Ng Tanghalan" nung nu ne quinta ing "Rose Tattoo".

Rico J. Puno:
I Enrico de Jesus Puno (mibait aniang Febrero 13, 1953), a mas kilala king lagiung Rico J. Puno, metung yang sikat a Filipinong talacantang pop ampong television host a tuturing dang metung kareng kanita pa manimunang talapagtaguyud ning musicang Filipino. Pepasikat na ing pamangamit king amanung Tagalug king kayang pamagcanta king ibat king Americang "The Way We Were" at aliwa pang cantang ibat kareng aliwang bangsa. Ausan de muring "Rico J." ampong "The Total Entertainer", i Puno is a talacantang sasamutanan nang biru ampong comedy ing kayang pamaglage king entablado. King salukuyan, a ing host ning pang-ugtung palageng variety a ing "Pilipinas Win na Win" kayabe la ri Rey Valera, Marco Sison ampong Nonoy Zuniga. Bukud king pamag host king telebision, ya murin ing Undersecretary of the Department of Interior and Local Government o DILG (Kaduang Kalihim ning Sakdalan ning Pisasabiang Panglub ampong Local a Kapamahalan).
Actibu ya murin king politica i Puno. Aniang 1998, mialal yang Consejal o City Councilor ning Makati Lakanbalen ibat king mumunang distrito anggang miyari ing katlu na ampong tauling termino aniang 2007. Tinagal yang kaduang punbalen o vice mayor ning Makkati Lakanbalen aniang alalan ning 2010, oneng mesambut ya.

Judy Ann Santos:
I Judy Anne Lumagui Santos-Agoncillo (mibait Mayo 11, 1978 king Menila , Filipinas), a kilala king lagiung Judy Ann Santos o Juday/Judai, metung yang artista king pelicula ampong televesion, product endorser, talacanta, ampong producer da reng pelicula.
Migumpisa yang magobra antimong anak a artista (child actor) at linage ne kareng maigit anam a pulung pelicula. at sinambut yang labing atlung galal a Best Actress king Drama, Fantasy, Horror, ampong Comedy. Linage ne murin kareng dakal a serie king television, kayabe ne ing Mara Clara ampong Basta't Kasama Kita.

Helen Gamboa:
I Helen Gamboa-Sotto (mibait 1948) metung yang beteranang Filipinang artista, talacanta, ampong sadiang sinambut king ligligan leguan ("former beauty titlist")..
Personal a bie.
I Gamboa, asawa ne ning artista, comedianti, TV host ampong politicung i Tito Sotto at ima ne ning artista ampong talacantang i Ciara Sotto ampo ing artista ampong talacantang i Gian Sotto.
Dara ne mu naman ning artista, TV host ampong talacantang i Sharon Cuneta. Kapatad ne ing ima nang Sharon, i Elaine Cuneta. Maki daya yang Castila ampong Americanu.
Migkadua ya kang Cynthia Ugalde, king metung mung puntus, king Miss Press Photography of the Philippines aniang 1961.
Mibalik ya king primetime television king Filipinas king Tayong Dalawa king ABS-CBN network aniang 2009, nung nu ya rin linage ing anak nang i Gian .

GMA:
Ing GMA malyari yang mangabaldugang:

Ciara Sotto:
I Ciara Anna Gamboa Sotto-Oconer (mibait Julio 2, 1980 king Makati Lakanbalen, Filipinas) metung yang Filipinang artista and ampong magcanta.
Personal a bie.
Ya ing bungsu nang anak ning artistang i Helen Gamboa ampo ing artista ampong senador Tito Sotto. Pisan neng alang pilatan i Sharon Cuneta (mikapatad la reng ima ra) at pangunakan ne i KC Concepcion. Pisan na la naman di Danica ampong Oyo Boy Sotto. Atlu ya king walung dakeng Cebuano ampong metung yang kawalung dakeng Chino (king dake nang tata na), ampong metung a kapat a Kapampangan, metung a kawalung dakeng Castila, ampong metung a kawalung dakeng Americana (king dake nang ima na).
Aniang anam yang banua, mumuna yang linto king "Eat Bulaga!" i Sotto, at aniang edad 17 ya, megi yang metung kareng regular a host ning palage, manibat 2005 anggang 2007. Bayu ya meging regular a host king "Eat Bulaga", kayabe ya king dramang pang teen-ager a "T.G.I.S.", a poproduce ning Viva Television ampo ning GMA Network. Aniang teen-ager ya, atin yang regular a production number king "Eat Bulaga!" kayabe ya ing pisan nang i Danica Sotto ampo i Jocas de Leon
Aniang atiu king "Eat Bulaga!", kapareha ne ing kayang co-host a i Paolo Ballesteros.
Aniang 2008, Sotto linual ne ing kayang album a maki pamagat a "If You Love Me". Kayabe la king album deng cantang sinulat nang tata na ampo i Joey de Leon kayabe ya i Vic Sotto, nung nukarin i Tito Sotto ing mig-back-up vocals king metung a canta. Ini ing kadua nang album Sotto, at gewa ne ampong pirake (produced and distributed) ning Sony BMG Music. Ayasawa ne i Jojo Oconer, a ali artista..

Julian Assange:
I Julian Paul Assange ( ; mibait 3 Julio 1971) metung yang Australianong periodista, publisher, and Internet activist. Pikabaluan yang dili antimong talapagsalita ampong sugung talapatuntun (editor in chief) ning WikiLeaks, metung a whistleblower website (mamalitang karinan-Aptas). Bayu ya linub king karinan-Aptas, metung yang computer programmer. Mekatuknang ne kareng miayaliwang bangsa, at migsalita neng mekatapilan tungkul king katimawan ning pamipahayag, pamag-censor, ampong mapaniasat a pamipahayag ("investigative journalism").
Tetag neng Assange ing karinan-Aptas o website a WikiLeaks aniang 2006 at magsilbi ya king kayang lupung talapayu (advisory board). Kayabe ya king pamaglimbag tungkul king pamakamateng e dadalan king ukuman (extrajudicial killings) king Kenya, a peniambut nang 2009 Amnesty International Media Award. Miglimbag ya mu naman tungkul king pamanugse makalasun a basura king Africa, deng manual ning Church of Scientology, kaparalanan king Guantanamo Bay, ampo reng bancu anti ing Kaupthing ampong Julius Baer. Aniang 2010, miglimbag yang milihim a detalle tungkul king pangasangkut ning Estados Unidos kareng guerra king Afghanistan ampong Iraq. Kaibat, aniang 28 Noviembre 2010, milimbag yang lihim a cableng diplomaticong Americano.ing Wikileaks ampong reng lima nang ka-socio king media Inaus nong mapanganib ampong mapangangas ning White House deng dapat nang Assange.
Para king obra na king WikiLeaks, tinggap neng Assange ing 2008 Economist Freedom of Expression Award ampo ing 2010 Sam Adams Award. Ing "Utne Reader" inaus neng metung kareng "25 Visionaries Who Are Changing Your World". Aniang 2010, ing "New Statesman" binili ne king ka- 23 kareng "The World's 50 Most Influential Figures".
Aniang 30 Noviembre 2010, agpang king pamaniad ning Public Prosecution Office king Gothenburg, Sweden, Interpol mibili ya i Assange king kayang red notice list of wanted persons; panintunan de kanu bang kutnan tungkul kareng pamaglabag a sexual, at kusa yang minta king London Metropolitan Police aniang 7 Diciembre 2010. Tatanggi nong Assange deng sasangkan da kaya.

WikiLeaks:
Ing WikiLeaks metung yang internacional a agumang bayung media a e para tubu, at aguman a mibubulalag kareng mabibieng documentung ibat kareng e pepakilalang panibatan ning balita ampong leak. Palakad ne ning The Sunshine Press ing kayang karinan-Aptas o website, a Kilub ning pabanua ning kayang pamilauk, atin neng database a maigit 1.2 miliun documentu. Lalarawan ing kayang sarili a tetag de kanu deng sasalungat king kapamahalan ning China, kayabe la reng periodista, ampong start-up company technologist ibat king Estados Unidos, Taiwan, Europa, Australia, ampong South Africa. Lalarawan ne ning pahayagang "The Guardian" i Julian Assange, metung Australianong Internet activist), antimong director.
Sinambut neng mapilang galal ing WikiLeaks, kayabe ya ing 2008 "Economist" magazine New Media Award. Aniang Junio 2009, ing WikiLeaks ampo i Julian Assange sinambut lang Amnesty International UK Media Award (king categoriang "New Media") para king pamibulalag na aniang 2008 ning "Kenya: The Cry of Blood – Extra Judicial Killings and Disappearances", metung a ulat ning Kenya National Commission on Human Rights tungkul kareng pamakamate ning policia king Kenya. Aniang Mayo 2010, linista ne ning "New York Daily News" ing WikiLeaks a mumuna king pamituki-tuki da reng "websites that could totally change the news". Sinuporta ya ing Russia king WikiLeaks ampo ing kayang talatátag a i Julian Assange kapamilatan ning pamipahayag a i dapat yang mirinan Nobel Peace Prize i Assange, king miliari kaibat ning pamikalat da reng United States diplomatic cables leak.
Aniang Abril 2010, miglual yang video ing WikiLeaks ibat king incidenti aniang 2007 nung nu pete dong fuerzang Americanu deng in Iraqi civilians ampong periodista king karinan-Aptas o website a maki lagiung Collateral Murder. Aniang Julio ning banua, pepalual ne ning WikiLeaks ing Afghan War Diary, metung a pamitipun da reng maigit 76,900 documentu tungkul king Guerra king Afghanistan a e sadiang makalual king malda. Aniang Octubre, miglual la ing grupung alus 400,000 documentung ausan dang Iraq War Logs kayantabe la reng mangaragul a agumang pang-mediang pang-negocio. Aniang Noviembre 2010, migumpisa yang maglual U.S. State department diplomatic cables ing WikiLeaks.
Aniang mumuna, metung yang user-editable wiki site ing WikiLeaks, oneng kinimut ya paras king istilong mas tradicional a limbagan, at e ne tatanggap comento o pamagbayu o pamaniusug. Maliari yang akua ing karinan kareng dakal a server ampong miayaliwang domain name kaibat ning mapilang denial-of-service attack ampo ing kayang pamikawani kareng miayaliwang Domain Name System (DNS) provider.

Peter Thiel:
I Peter Andreas Thiel (mibait 1967) metung yang Americanung negosianti, talapanibalang hedge fund, libertarian ampong venture capitalist. Kayabe ya i Elon Musk ampo i Max Levchin, tetag neng Thiel ing PayPal at migsilbi yang CEO. King salukuyan, magsilbi ya antimong pamuntuk ning Clarium Capital, metung a global macro hedge fund a manibala king maigit $2 biliun a assets under management, ampong ka-sosiu ya talapanibala (managing partner) king The Founders Fund, metung a $275 miliun a venture capital fund a inumpisan na kayabe ya i Ken Howery ampo i Luke Nosek aniang 2005. Metung ya kareng minunang memuhunan king Facebook, ing sikat a social-networking site, at makalukluk ya king board of directors ning kumpania. Maki ranggu yang #377 kareng pekamakualta i Thiel king Forbes 400 aniang 2008, a maki salaping US$1.3 biliun. Nanupata, mababa ing pamagtantia na niti king kayang pibandian, uling, agpang king metung a metung a pamamie alaga aniang 2010, US$1.7 billion ing salapi na. Manuknangan ya iPeter Thiel king San Francisco, California.
Pamaglarawan king media.
King pelikuang "The Social Network", ing artistang Wallace Langham lalagen ne i Peter Thiel. Papakit ne ning pelikula maglub $500,000 angel investment king Facebook.

Facebook:
Ing Facebook metung yang social network service ampong karinan-Aptas (website) a milauk o miumpisan aniang Febrero 2004, at palakad ne at banding primadu ning Facebook, Inc. Atin yang maigit 500 miliun a talagamit ing Facebook. Maliari lang gawang personal a aske (personal profile) deng talagamit, mandagdag aliwang talagamit antimong kaluguran, at makilibeng mensahi, kayabe la reng tambing a pamagpabalu ("automatic notifications") neng babayu de o a-update ing karelang aske o "profile". Bukud kaniti, makapakiabe la kareng grupu da reng milulupa ineres o "common interest user groups" deng talagamit, a miagum agpang king pipagobran, pipagaralan, o aliwa pang katangian. Ing lagiu ning serbisiu ibat ya king palayo o aus a karniwan king libru a bibie da kareng magaral keng umpisa ning banuang academico deng manibala king universidad king America ba lang saupan a mikikilala deng magaral. Paintulutan neng makiabe antimong rehistradung talagamit ning Facebook ninumang magpawaga o sasabing maigit neng labing atlung banua.
Ing Facebook tetag neng Mark Zuckerberg ampo reng ka-cuartu na king colegio ampo reng kalupa rang magaral computer science, di Eduardo Saverin, Dustin Moskovitz ampong Chris Hughes. Aniang mumuna, den mung magaral king Harvard deng maliaring makiabe, oneng miragdag la reng aliwang colegio students king lugal ning Boston, ing Ivy League, ampo ing Stanford University. Bagia-bagia, miragdag la reng magaral kareng miyaliwang universidad, bayu la miragdag deng magaral king secundario o matas a pipagaralan ("high school"), at bandang tauli, eganaganang maki edad a labing atlu o maigit.
Agpang king pamanialugsug o pamagaral aniang Enero 2009 ning Compete.com, ing Facebook ing gagamitan dang diling social network a gagamitan da king mabilug a yatu deng actibung, at katuki ne ing MySpace. Bibili ne ning "Entertainment Weekly" king kayang "best-of" list para king kapupusan ning decada, at sasabia'nang, "How on earth did we stalk our exes, remember our co-workers' birthdays, bug our friends, and play a rousing game of Scrabulous before Facebook?"(Makananu ta lang penalukian deng kekatamung sadiang/"dating" tau, tandanan la reng aldo rang kebaitan deng kaupusina tamu, balik-balikan la reng kaluguran tamu, ampong mamialung makapangasdan a pialung ning Scrabulous bayu ing Facebook) Quantcast estimates Facebook has 135.1 million monthly unique U.S. visitors.

Mark Zuckerberg:
Abstact
I Mark Elliot Zuckerberg (mibait Mayo 14, 1984) metung yang Americanong computer scientist, software developer, philanthropist ampong miglalang king social networking site a Facebook. Megawa yang pribadong compania kayabe la reng kaklasi na ampong kayabeng talatátag a di Dustin Moskovitz, Eduardo Saverin, ampong Chris Hughes, kabang magaral la king Harvard University.Aniang 2010, megi yang Time Magazine Person of the Year.
