Tan Ninh, Quang Binh:
Ing Tan Ninh metung yang rural commune ("xã") king Quang Ninh Distritu, Quang Binh Lalawigan, king Vietnam. 1.567 km² ya ing lualas a sasakupan na at atin yang populasiun a 5,116.

Osasco:
]
Ing Osasco metung yang pekamaragul a lakanbalen at Brazil. 
Agpang keng 2009 sensus, atin yang bilang a populasyun a 718,646. 

2011:

Ketchikan, Alaska:
Ing Ketchikan () metung yang lakanbalen king Ketchikan Gateway Borough, Alaska, United States, ing pekamauliing maraguldagul a lakanbalen keng state ning Alaska. Atin yang mga populasiun a 7,368 iniang 2010, iti ing panglimang pekamarakal a poplasiun a lakanbalen keng state.

Sidi Bouzid:
Ing Sidi Bouzid (), a ausan da mu namang "Sidi Bou Zid", metung yang lakanbalen o siudad king Tunisia ampong buntukbalen o kabisera (capital) ning Sidi Bouzid Governorate king libutad ning bangsa. Keti la miliari deng minunang labanán kareng Protesta king Tunisia aniang 2010–2011.
Kaduang Gerang Pangyatu.
Miliari keti ing metung a labanán aniang Febrero 1943, a kayabe king Tunisia Campaign ning Kaduang Gerang Pangyatu. Migumpisa iti aniang Febrero 14, 1943 king Faid Pass malapit keti aniang 10th ampong 21st Panzer Division ning Alemani lisuban do reng elementu ning US 1st Armored Division ampong 168th Infantry. Ining Labanán ning Sidi Bou Zid ing memuklat king meyaus a Labanán ning Kasserine Pass.
Deng Gulu king Sidi Bouzid.
Aniang Diciembre 18, 2010, mika labanán king Sidi Bouzid pilatan da reng residenti ampo reng pulisia kaibat ning pamanyilab na king sariling Mohamed Bouazizi. Mamisali ya king dalan i Bouazizi at magprotesta ya laban king pamaniamsam da reng makiupaya o autoridad kareng kayang tinda. Mete ya kareng kayang kapinsalan aniang Enero 4, 2011.
Aniang umpisa ning Enero 2011, mika karagdagan a labanán kareng pulis king Sidi Bouzid nung nu e la kumulang king aduang pulu (20) deng mete. 

Mohamed Bouazizi:
I Tarek al-Tayyib Muhammad ibn Bouazizi (Marzo 29, 1984 – Enero 4, 2011), a ausan dang Mohamed Bouazizi (, ), metung yang máglaku king dalan ning Tunisia a ing pamanyilab na king sarili aniang Diciembre 17, 2010, antimong protesta king pamaniamsam da reng kayang tinda, yang migumpisa kareng protesta king Tunisia aniang Protesta king Tunisia aniang 2010–2011—a ilang sangkan ba yang kuldas king pamanungkulan ing sadiang pamuntuk a i Zine El Abidine Ben Ali kaibat ning 23 banuang makalukluk.

Najib Mikati:
I Najib Azmi Mikati () (mibait 24 Noviembre 1955) metung yang bilyunaryung Lebanese a magsilbing Pun Ministru ning Lebanon manibat anyang 13 Junio 2011. Manibat kanitang Abril 2005 anggang Julio 2005, ya ing Pun Ministru ning Lebanon king pansamantalang kapamahalan ("caretaker government"). Anyang 25 Enero 2011, mepili ya i Mikating magsilbing Pun Ministru kapamilatan da reng keraklan kareng botu king pamagkunsuluta king parlamentu kaybat ning pangabagsak ning Kapamahalang Lebanese ning Noviembre 2009 anyang 12 Enero. Mibalangkas ya king kapamahalan anyang Junio, kaybat da reng dakal a pangayatrasu.

Rafic Hariri:
I Rafic Baha El Deen Al-Hariri (Noviembre 1, 1944 – February 14, 2005, ), metung yang negosianti ampong Pun Ministru ning Lebanon manibat 1992 anggang 1998, at pasibayu manibat 2000 angga king kayang pamagkalag o pamagdimitir aniang 20 Octobre 2004.

Pablo Virgilio David:
I Pablo Virgilio Siongco David (mibait 2 Marzo 1959) Obispu yang Kasaup ("Auxiliary Bishop") ning San Fernando, Pampanga. Pepawaga na ning Roma ing pamanuldu nang Papa Benedicto XVI kayá aniang Mayo 27, 2006. Ya mu naman ing Kaduang Pamuntuk ning Archdiocesan Media Apostolate Networks Unlimited, Inc. king Arkidiosesis ning San Fernando.
Kayanakan ampong Ordinasion.
Mibait ya i David king Betis, Guagua, Pampanga, kang Pedro Sahagun David ning Betis, ampo kang Bienvenida Sanchez Siongco ning Macabebe. Kapatad na la ri Jesus Randolf (Randy David) (propesor king sociology), Nestor Antonio (arkitektu), Leila Katrina (abogada), Isaac Victoriano (inierung sibil), Dante Leonardo (abogadu), Racquel Ruth (real estate broker), Blas Pedro, Jr. (bangkeru), Francisca Clarissa (medical technologist), Maria Lilia (critical care nurse), Agnes Peidad Joaquina (empleada king gobiernu), Maria Victoria Epifania (dentista) ampong David (economista).
Miyari yang elementaria king Betis Elementary School, sekundaria king Mother of Good Counsel Seminary king San Fernando, ampong kolehio (AB Pre-Divinity) king Ateneo de Manila University. Meordina ya aniang Marzo 12, 1983. 
Pamagaral a Graduadu ampong Responsibilidad antimong Pari.
Sindu nang David ing kayang pamagaral para king MA Theology (Loyola School of Theology), Licentiate in Sacred Theology (Catholic University of Louvain, Belgium), Eleve Titulaire (Ecole Biblique et Archeologique Francaise de Jerualem), ampong Doctorate in Sacred Theology (Catholic University of
Louvain, Belgium). 
Migsilbi yang kasaup a kura paroko (assistant parish priest) king Parokia ning Santa Lucia king Sasmuan, Pampanga kaibat nang meordina aniang 1983. 
Aniang, megi yang Direktor ning Departamentu ning Pilosopia king Mother of Good Counsel Seminary anggang 1986. Kaibat, megi yang Spiritual Director ning Departamentu ning Teolohia karin, at kaibat Director of Formation. 
Miyayaliwa la reng kayang puestu king Arkidiosesis ning San Fernando, antimong Director ning Pastoral Secretariat, Director ning Committee for the Clergy Ongoing Formation, Director ning Archdiocesan Commission on Clergy Affairs, ampong Kaduang Pamuntuk ning Archdiocesan Media Apostolate Networks Unlimited, Inc. Angga ngeni, tatalnan ne pa ing tauli
Kayagnan ning kayang responsibilidad king Arkidiosesis, aktibu ya king akademia antimong propesor. Megi yang Professor of Philosophy ampong Professor of Scriptures king MGC Seminary, ampong Guest Professor of Scriptures king Maryhill School of Theology. Manibat 2003 anggang 2006, Kadua neng Pamuntuk ning Catholic Biblical Association of the Philippines. 
Dalerayan.

http://www.cbcponline.net/bishops/bishops/david.html
http://www.rcam.org/news/2006/new_auxiliary_bishop_for_pampanga.htm

Ursula K. Le Guin:
I Ursula Kroeber Le Guin (; mibait Octubre 21, 1929) talasulat yang Americana. Sinulat neng nobela, poesia, librung anak, salese (essay) ampong makuyad a salita, lalu na king "fantasy" ampong "science fiction". Minuna yang milimbag aniang dekadang 1960, at maglakbe la reng kayang kasulatan kareng temang Taoist, anarchist, ethnographic, feminist, psychological and sociological.

Hosni Mubarak:
I Muhammad Hosni Sayyid Mubarak (, , ; mibait Mayo 4, 1928 - 2020) ing kapat ampong kasalungsungan a kapat ampong kasalungsungan a Pamuntuk ning Ejiptu. Metuldu yang Kaduang Pamuntuk aniang 1975, at meging Pamuntuk ya aniang Octubre 14, 1981, kaibat deng pete i Pamuntuk Anwar El Sadat. Ya ing maluat diling makalukluk a pekapun ning bangsa manibat kang Muhammad Ali Pasha. Bayu ya linub king pulitika, metung yang opisial king Egyptian Air Force, i Mubarak, at migsilbi ya antimong pamuntuk na niti manibat 1972 anggang 1975. Manibat aniang Enero 25, 2011, iniad ning metung a maleparan a pamagalsa ing kayang pamagkalag o pamag-"resign" antimong pamuntuk. Aniang Febrero 5, 2011, belita ning media ning estado king Ejiptung migkalag la king pamanungkulan deng manimunang kayanib ning partidong makalukluk, kayabe ya i Pamuntuk Hosni Mubarak, had resigned from leadership rolls within the party. Kaibat na niti, pepalino rang manatili yang pamuntuk i Mubarak.

Lakanbalen ampong Borough ning Juneau, Alaska:
Ing Lakanbalen ampong Borough ning Juneau () metung yang piabeng municipalidad atiu king Gastineau Channel king panhandle na ning U.S. state ning Alaska. Iti ing kabisera (tungku) ning Alaska manibat 1906, iniang ing gubiernu na ning kanitang-Distritu ning Alaska mialis ya manibat Sitka agpang keng dicta na ning U.S. Congress iniang 1900. Ing municipalidad piabe de iniang 1970 iniang ing lakanbalen ning Juneau miabe ya keng lakanbalen ning Douglas ampo ing makapadurut a Keragulan Juneau Borough para itatag de ing kasalungsungan a municpalidad a manungkulan.
Klima.
Mendenhall Glacier.
A very popular destination is Mendenhall Glacier. A bridge connects Douglas Island with the rest of Juneau, and there are about five places where roads end. Float planes and helicopters offer glacier tours in summer. Dog sled rides are often given to tourists landing on the glaciers or ice caps. Other companies offer boat rides. One of the signature places in Juneau is The Mount Roberts Tramway, an aerial tramway stretching from a station on the cruise ship docks to a point on the southwestern ridge of Mount Roberts.

Prince Rupert, British Columbia:
Ing Prince Rupert metung yang pantalan lakanbalen king lalawigan ning British Columbia, Canada. 

Salt Lake City, Utah:
Ing Salt Lake Lakanbalen iya ing tungku (kabisera) ampo ing pekamarakal diling populasiun a lakanbalen ning state Utah. Ing lagiu ning lakanbalen keraklan pakuyaran deng "Salt Lake" o kaya "SLC". Atin yang mga populasiun a 183,171, ing lakanbalen atiu king Salt Lake City metropolitan area, a atin mga populasiun a 1,130,293. Ing Lakanbalen Salt Lake atiu keng masmaragul a urban area kebaluan bilang Wasatch Front, nung nu atin yang polpulasiun a mga 2,298,915.

Gwyneth Paltrow:
Si Gwyneth Kate Paltrow (mibait Septiembri 27, 1972 king Los Angeles, California, Estados Unidos) ing aktres, at kantahan.

Eau Claire, Wisconsin:
Ing Eau Claire metung yang lakanbalen king Eau Claire County, Wisconsin, king United States. Ing tantia keng kayang populasiun mga 61,704 ya agpang inyang 2000.

Restituto licup guinto:
metung ya kareng talasulat keng kawatasan kapampangan cnulat ne ing palengkera

Heograpiya ning Aprika:
Ing Aprika, metung yang kontinenti ay ating 62 teritoryung pulitikal.

Komersyu:
Ing komersyu, ya ing eganaganang sistema ning ekonomiya a magbuu ning kapaligiran king negosyu.

Concepcion, Chile:
Ing Concepcion metung yang pekamaragul a lakanbalen at mauling Chile. 
Agpang keng 2002 sensus, atin yang bilang a populasyun a 216,061.

Nanomedisina:
Ing Nanomedisina, metung yang medikal ay aplikasyun ning nanoteknolohiya.

Corbin Bleu:
I Corbin Bleu Reivers (Pebreru 21, 1989) metung yang Americanung talakanta, artista, ampong musikeru.

Indigenous Tweets:
Ing Indigenous Tweets metung yang karinan-Aptas o website a magdala kareng tweet ibat kareng amanung minorya o minority language king Twitter ba lang saupang miugnayan deng magsalita kareti at mitipun-tipun la. Tetag ne anyang Marso 2011 Kevin Scannell, a tuturung computational linguistics king Saint Louis University king St. Louis, Missouri, Estados Unidos. Ing sangkan a mitátag ya ing website o karinan-Aptas ya pin ing tipunan la o piugnayan deng magsalita kareng amanu king Aptas o Internet.
Ketang kayang homepage o baleng Aptas, makabili la reng amanung minoryang kayang tinipun. Potang mekapili yang amanu ing talagamit, midala ya king tala o listaan da reng anggang magtweet king amanung ita. Makabili ya king Indigenous Tweets ing letratung aske o profile picture ning balang talagamit ning Twitter, ampo reng datos tungkul king bilang dareng talataluki o follower ning balang tau. Bukud king pamamyeng estadistiko tungkul king dake kareng tweet ning tau king misususulat a yamanu, makabili la reng paksang pisasabyan kareng miyayaliwang amanung minorya.
Amlat.
Anyang mibuklat ya ing karinan-Aptas anyang Marzo 2011, magdala yang 35ng amanu. Ketang Abril 16, 2011, atin yang tweet kareng 76 a amanung minorya. Kanitang Abril 26, 2011, 82 na la deng amanung darala na. Kayabe la reng amanung "esoteric" o mangasákit anti ing Gamilaraay ampo reng "mas kilalang" 
Haitian Creole ampong Basque, a mumuna ampong kadwang pekadakal a Tweeter. Ing Welsh yang katlung pekamaragul king Indigenous Tweets. 
Ing Kapampangan, a yang kapitung pekamaragul anyang tawli nang duminggu ning Abril 2011, ing mumunang amanu ning Filipinas a makabili king karinan.
Data mining.
Ing Indigenous Tweets atin yang simpanan-amanu o "data bank of words and phrases" ibat kareng amanung minorya ba lang paytunan deng taung magsalita kareng amanung deta. Ketang interview anyang Abril 2011 king BBC News, sinabi nang Scannell a walu yang banwang gagawang simpanan o data bank da reng 500 languages kapamilatan ning pamanyuri kareng blog, dyaryu ampong and karinan-Aptas o website.
Manipun yang data ing Indigenous Tweets kapamilatan ning API ning Twitter kapamilata'ning pamanintun king simpanan o data bank da reng amanu ampong phrase ibat kareng amanung minorya . E ne akwa kabaldugan ning karinan-Aptas ing amanu ning metung a tweet king maygit metung a amanu. Bang e malyari ing prublemang anti kanita, ing lulub nang salitang , Scannell ilapin detang atyu mu king amanung ita.

Leap year starting on Saturday:
2000 (MM) was a leap year that started on a Saturday of the common era, in accordance to the Gregorian calendar with any other year. It was the 2000th year of the Common Era or the Anno Domini designation. 2000 was also the last year of the second millennium and of the 20th century. It was also the first century leap year since 1600. The year 2000 was the first year of the 2000s decade. Popular culture holds the year 2000 as the first year of the 21st century and of the 3rd millennium, due to a tendency to group the years according to decimal values, as if year zero were counted. According to the Gregorian Calendar this distinction falls to the year 2001, also because the first century back then was retroactively said to start with year Anno Domini 1. Since the calendar has no year zero, its first millennium spans from years 1 to 1000, inclusively, and its second millennium from years 1001 to 2000. See more at Millennium. The year 2000 was the subject of Y2K concerns, fear that computers could not shift from 1999 to 2000 correctly. However, by the end of 1999, some companies have upgraded to new, or existed their shifting software. Some even obtained Y2K certification. In the actual event, relatively few problems occurred.

Mario Maurer:
I Mario Maurer metung yang artista king Tailandia.

Shamcey Supsup:
I Shamcey Gurrea Supsup (Mayo 06, 1986, Lakanbalen General Santos) megi yang kandidata king Miss Universe 2011 king Sao Paulo, Brasil.

Zhengzhou:
Ing Zhengzhou (Chinese: 郑州; pinyin: Zhèngzhōu;Chinese Postal Map Romanization: Chengchow), metung yang metropolis king pangulung Tsina, at iti ing tungku ning People's Republic of China (PRC). Dati yang kebaluan keng amanung English bilang Zhengzhou.

Steve Jobs:
I Steven Paul "Steve" Jobs (February 24, 1955 - October 5, 2011) metung yang imbentor ampong negosianting Americanu. Metung ya kareng talatátag ning Apple Inc., nung nu ya murin meging talapamuntuk (chairman) ampong pekapun a papalyaring manungkulan (chief executive officer). chairman, and chief executive officer of Apple Inc. Bayu ita, migsilbi ya mu namang pekapun a talapalyari ning Pixar Animation Studios; megi yang kayanib ning lupung da reng manibala (board of directors) ning The Walt Disney Company anyang 2006, kaybat neng asali ning Disney ing Pixar. Kikilalanan deng executive producer ning "Toy Story" (1995).
Anyang tawli nang dake ning dekadang 1970, i Jobs - kayabe da reng talatátag ning Apple, di Steve Wozniak, Mike Markkula at aliwa pa - diniseniu de, inalkus, at pisali de ing metung kareng mumunang personal computer a misaling mayap king merkadu, ing Apple II series. Anyang umpisa ning dekadang 1980, metung ya i Jobs kareng mumunang menakit king malyaring maging sikanan na king merkadu ning Xerox PARC's mouse-driven graphical user interface, which led to the creation of the Macintosh. Kaybat nang mesambut king metung a pamakilaban king upaya (power struggle) king lupung da reng manibala anyang 1985, meko ya king Apple i Jobs at tetag ne ing NeXT, metung a kumpanyang manalkus computer platform development company (computer platform development company) a lalawang makabukud (specializing) kareng merkadung matas a pamagaral (higher-education) ampong negosiu. Anyang seli ne ning Apple ing NeXT anyang 1996, mibalik ya i Jobs king kumpanyang tetag na, at migsilbi ya antimong CEO (pekapun a talapalyaring manungkulan) manibat 1997 anggang 2011.
Anyang 1986, ikwa ne ing computer graphics division ning Lucasfilm Ltd, a meging Pixar Animation Studios. Menatili/mindatila yang CEO ampong manimunang shareholder king edad a 50.1 percent anggang ikwa ne ning The Walt Disney Company anyang 2006. Kaybat, i Jobs ing meging pekamaragul a indibidwal a shareholder ningDisney's largest individual a 7 percent ampong kayanib ning Lupung da reng Talapanibala (Board of Directors) ning Disney. </ref> Anyang Agosto 24, 2011, pepabalu pepabalu nang Jobs ing kayang pamagdimiti o pamagkalag (resignation) antimong CEO ning Apple . 
Mete ya i Jobs king California anyang Octubre 5, 2011, king edad a 56 .

José Rizal:
Y Dr. José Protacio Rizal Mercado y Alonzo Realonda (Juniu 19, 1861 – Disiembri 30, 1896), metung yang Filipinung meging pinuno ning Himagsikang Filipinu laban kareng Castila at metung ya karing mengunang propagandista ning Kilusang Propaganda. Metung yang arkitektu, pintor, talaturu, ekonomista, ethnologist, syentipikung ortelanu, historian, inventor, peryodista, linguist, musician, mythologist, nasyonalista, naturalist, nobelista, siruhanu king mata, poeta, propagandista, eskultor at sociologist. Aswan dang "Pride of the Malay Race" ampong pambasang bayani ning Filipinas y Rizal. Mebyasa yang adwampulu't adwang amanu: Catalan, Chino, Ingles, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Japon, Latin, Malay, Sanskrit, Castila, Tagalug, at aliwang amanung tubu king Filipinas (native languages).
Talambye.
Metung yang Chinese-mestizo y Rizal, mibait ya king balen ning Calamba, Laguna inyang Juniu 19, 1861. Pampito ya karing anak ning Francisco Engracio Rizal Mercado at Teodora Alonzo y Quintos. Ding pipunan na dai lang Malay, Insik, ampong Japon. Megaral ya para king mababang pamagaral king Biñan, Laguna inyang 1869. 
Y Rizal sindu ne ing kayang pamagaral king Menila. Linub ya king Ateneo Municipal de Manila nung nune ayari ing kursung "Bachiller en Artes" o Bachelor of Arts inyang 1877. Megaral ya medicina king University of Santo Tomas inyang 1878 at ayari na ing kursu king Unibersidad Central de Madrid inyang 1884. Megaral ya rin king University of Paris at University of Heidelberg.
Inyang 1886, minta ya Berlin, Alemania at sinulat ne ing nobelang "Noli Me Tangere". Sinulat ne ing "El Filibusterismo" nang minta ya Ghent, Belgium inyang 1891. Ginising no ning Filipinu king kayalang hustisya (katalarwan) ning kapamahalang kolonyal ning Espania, at minyad lang katimawan (independensya). Inyang 1892, telakad ne ing "La Liga Filipina" king Tondo, Menila , at minyad lang katimawan. Dekap de Rizal king Dapitan, Zamboanga del Norte, inyang Juliu 1892, uling king subersyon. 
Ka 30 nang aldo ning Disiembri, 1896, agpang king hatul militar ning pamahala ning Espania king Filipinas, beril de Rizal king Bagumbayan, Menila. Bago ya mete, ayasawa ne y Josephine Bracken king Fort Santiago. Ing tauli nang kawatasan misulat king Amanung Castila, pemalaguan dang "Mi Ultimo Adios", mibaldug ya king Amanung Kapampangan karing mapilan watas. Metung a pekabayu yapin ing gewa nang Renato B. Alzadon.
E miglwat, memakbung ing Rebolusyong Filipinu, a panimunan ning KKK (Kataastaasan at Kagalang-galangang Katipunan ng mga Anak ng Bayan) o "Katipunan", metung a lihim a agumang rebolusyonaryung tinatag nang Andres Bonifacio at kaybat sindu nang Emilio Aguinaldo. Digsu ne mu migtagumpe ing rebolusyon laban kareng Castila anyang 1896.

Unrepresented Nations and Peoples Organization:
Ing Unrepresented Nations and Peoples Organization (UNPO), a mitátag anyang 11 Febrero 1991, king The Hague, metung yang internasyunal a aguman o organisasyon da reng aguman a pampulitika ampong kapamahalan a pekakatawan da reng mibubulalag king sarili rang (self-proclaimed) tubung balayan (indigenous peoples), minorya, ampong estado o teritoryong e makikilala o masasakup. Ing aguman sasanayan no reng grupung ibulalag kareng karelang layun o parasan. Deng aliwang sadyang kayanib, anti ing Armenia, East Timor, Estonia, Latvia ampong Georgia, mika ganap na lang katimawan, at miyabe la kareng Misasanmetung a Bangsa (United Nations). Lipat ning "UN" king kayang acronym o pamikuyad, metung yang NGO ing UNPO at e ne sanga o ahensya ning Misasanmetung a Bangsa o United Nations.
Deng kayanib.
Deng makatuki ila reng limampulung (50) kayanib a makalista king bulung a UNPO "Nations & People", deng aguman a pekakatawan da, ampo reng petsa anyang linub la king UNPO (deng orihinal a kayanib atin lang iro o asul a kagulutan (blue background):
Sadyang kayanib.
Ating aliwang kayanib ning UNPO a linwal uling kinilala no ning Misasanmetung a Bangsa (United Nations), pamikasundu pang-otonomiya (autonomy agreements), o kareng aliwa pang sangkan.

Van, Turkey:
Ing Van (Turkish: "Van", , "Van", ) metung yang lakanbalen king mawli-aslagang (southeastern) Turkey ampong buntukbalen ning lalawigan ning Van, nung nu deng lahing Kurdish ing mayorya , at atyu king aslagang pangpang (eastern shore) ning Lake Van. Ing opisyal a populasyun ning lakanbalen anyang 2010 367,419, oneng mas matas la reng dakal a tantya, alimbawa ing metung anyang 1996, a 500,000, ampo ing sasabyan ning sadyang Mayor a Burhan Yengun a sínabi kanung miras yang 600,000.

Amánung Armeniu:
Ing amánung Armeniu (հայերէն/հայերեն, "hayeren") metung yang pamyalita king Armenia.

Nias:
Ing Nīas (, Amanung Nias: Tanö Niha) metung yang pulu o isla king albugan nang bebe ning Sumatra, Indonesia. Nias (Kepulauan Nias) mu naman ing lagyu ning kapulwan (archipelago), nung nukarin ya ing kapulwang Hinako.
Atin yang lapad a ing Isla o Pulung Nias (kayabe la reng mangalating isla) a keraklan metung a kapatagan a maki kalibudtan a tas king babo dayat (average above sea level) a . Ating 756,762 a manuknanangan king isla o pulu (kayabe la reng mangalating isla) anyang 2010 Census.

Moshchena:
Ing Moshchena metung yang village ning Ukraine. Ing tungku na iyapin ing makakawaning rada, a balen, kilub ning Volyn oblast at atin yang 581 a pakatuknang (agpang inyang 2010).

Paltoga:
Ing Paltoga metung yang "village" ning Russia, atiu pilatan ning Vytegra at Vologda.

¿Por qué no te callas?:

Sandara Park:
I Sandara Park (mekilala ya bilang Dara) metung yang talakanta at talaterak king Mauling Korea. Megi yang artista at talakanta sadya king Pilipinas. Ngeni, metung yang miyembru ning bandang 2NE1.

ΕΤΑ:
Ing ETA (, ), metung a acronym para king Euskadi Ta Askatasuna (; "Balayan ampong Katimawang Vasco o Basque"Homeland and Freedom) metung a armadung separatistang agumang Vasco a makabalen o nasyonalista. Mitátag ya ing grupu anyang 1959, at manibat kanita, migbayu ya manibat king metung a grupung mágtaguyud king mana o tradisyunal a kulturang Vasco paras king grupung mala-militar a maki kapagnasan a manikwang katimawan para king Labwad a Vasco o Basque Country (Pais Vasco king Castila). Ing ETA ing pekamayulagang aguman ning Pangimut a Pangkatimawang Makabalen a Vasco (Basque National Liberation Movement) at ya ing pekamaulagang kayabe king kagulwan a Vasco (Basque conflict). Mibulalag yang pamituknang akbung (ceasefire) ing ETA anyang 1989, 1996, 1998 ampong 2006, oneng lebagan na la. Nanupata, mibulalag yang bayung pamituknang akbung ing ETA anyang 5 Setiembre 2010 at mimiral ya pa murin – bukud kaniti, anyang 20 Octubre 2011, pepawaga ne ning ETA ing "ganap a pamituknang ning kayang aktibidad a armadu" (definitive cessation of its armed activity).
Ing kasebyan na o motto ning ETA, ("Makiyagnan ka kareng adwa") ya, at iti makapatungkul ya kareng adwang pigura a atyu king kayang sagisag, metung a ubingan (a mangabaldugang politika) a makakalikat king palakul (a mangabaldugang armadung pamakipagkal struggle).
Manibat anyang 1968, mekapate neng 829 katau ing ETA, mekapanasakit neng libu-libu, at mekasamsam ne o mekakidnap pilang dosena. Babawal de deng autoridad ning Espania ampong Francia ing grupu antimong aguman a terorista , ampo ing kabilugan ning European Union, ampo ing Estados Unidos. Iting pamangamit tutukyan de reng maragul diling bilang da reng mediang pangkilub ampong panglwal, a ing aus da murin king grupu, "terorista". Maygit lang pitung dalan (700) kareng kayanib ning aguman deng makakulung king Espania, Francia, at aliwang bangsa.

Irrintzi:
Ing Irrintzi metung yang armadung grupung Vasco o Basque a kikimut king Labwad a Vasco king Francia ("Iparralde" king Vasco). Ing katayang "irrintzi" makapatungkul ya king tradisyunal a gulisak a Vasco magpaltong.
Sabotahi ing mumuna nang gewa ning Irrintzi anyang 2006 banda king Bayonne (kayabe ing pamamomba ning baleng bakasyunan ning Ministrung Panglub of the Interior ning Francia, i Michèle Alliot-Marie). Manibat kanita minataki ya ing aguman kareng rilis tren, lugal a pangturista, ampong tanggapang pangkabilugang pampulitika, keraklan kapamilatan ning pamamomba. Keraklan, aryan do reng karelang pamanataki king slogan o kasebyan a "Euskal Herria ez dago salgai" (E ya pisasali ing Labwad a Vasco). Linto ya ing tandang iti kareng maygit atlung pulung (30) ataki laban kareng lugal a pangturista anyang 2007.

Judy Garland:
I Judy Garland (Juniu 10, 1922 - Juniu 22, 1969) metung yang Americanang artista ampong talakanta. 

Forces Libanaises:
Ing Forces Libanaises (FL) (Arabic: القوات اللبنانية "al-quwat al-lubnāniyya", Syriac: ܚܝܠܘܬܐ ܠܒܢܢܝܐ "haylawothe lebnanoye") metung yang partido political king Lebanon a tetag nang Bachir Gemayel. Aniang Guerrang Civil king Lebanon, linaban ya ing pangimut antimong manimunang militia king Front Libanais, a dodominan da reng Cristianu. Kaibat ning guerrang civil, mibayu ya ing pangimut at meging partido political. Kanitang 1994, kabang makasakup ya king Syria ing Lebanon, mibawal ya ing partido, at makasalikut ing actividad da reng kayang kayanib kareng serviciung Lebanese. Mibalik ya antimong legal a partido ing Lebanese Forces kaibat ning Cedar Revolution aniang umpisa ning 2005, a tikian ning pamaglako da reng fuerza ning Syria king Lebanon. I Samir Geagea ing kayang pekapun manibat aniang 1986. 

Yanka Kupala:
I Yanka Kupala (Janka Kupała, ; – Juniu 28, 1942) — iya ing lagiung talapanpan nang Ivan Daminikavich Lutsevich (), metung a Belarusian watas ampong talasulat. I Kupala mabibilang yang metung kareng pekamatenakan a talasulat keng amanung Belarusian keng pan20 dilanua.

Yakub Kolas:
I Yakub Kolas (Jakub Kołas mu naman) (, – Agosto 13, 1956), ing tutung lagiu Kanstantsin Mitskievich (Міцке́віч Канстанці́н Міха́йлавіч) metung yang Belarusian talasulat, Maldang Watas ning Byelorussian SSR (1926), ampong kayanib (1928) ampong kaduang-pamuntuk (manibat 1929) ning Belarusian Academy of Sciences.
Ding kayang obra, i Yakub Kolas kebaluan keng kayang pamakirame kareng maldang Belarusian talapagobra keng gabun. Iti mayayakit king kayang laigun talapanpan a 'Kolas', kabaldugan a 'balugbug ning butil' keng Belarusian. Sinulat yang kasapungul a watas a mikpamagat a "Kanta ning Makakulung"
(1908) ampong "Kantang Lugma" (, 1910), kawatasan "Ing Bayung Gabun" (, 1923) ampong ing "Simon ing Talatugtug" (, 1925), makuyad a salita ampong dramaturgu. 

Kara:
Ing Kara (카라) metung yang grupung talakanta king Mauling Korea.

Josh Duhamel:
I Joshua David "Josh" Duhamel (mibait Nobiembri 14, 1972) metung yang artistang Americanu actor. Bantug ya king kayang genapan a papil keng sineng "Transformers".

Lugo:
Ing Lugo (Galician: Lugo) iya ing pangaduang pekamaragul a lakanbalen king Galicia king pangulungal aalbugan ning Espanya. Ing lakanbalen iya mu rin ing tungku ning Lugo Lalawigan. UNESCO World Heritage.

Gioachino Rossini:
I "Gioachino Antonio Rossini"' ( (Giovacchino Antonio Rossini king baptismal certificate) (29 Febrero 1792 – 13 Noviembre 1868) metung yang kompositor a Italianung sinulat atllung pulu't syam (39) a opera as ampong banal a musika, chamber music, kanta, ampong pyesang para kareng instrumentu ampong pianu. Kayabe la kareng kayang pekakilalang opera ding komediang Italianung "Il barbiere di Siviglia" ("Ing Barberu ning Sevilla") ampo ing "La Cenerentola" ampo reng epiku king amanung Pranses, deng "Moïse et Pharaon" ampong "Guillaume Tell" ("William Tell"). Kapansin-pansin ing kayang kaburyan kareng lawiwi o tonu (melodies) a balamu kanta king kabilugan da reng kayang score, a penibatan ning palayong "Ing Italianung Mozart." ("The Italian Mozart."). Anggang migretiru ya anyang 1829, i Rossini ing pekasikat a kompositor da reng opera king kabilugan ning amlat o kasalesayan (the most popular opera composer in history).
Notes.
Kareng kayang komposisyun, e mikakunung mangopya kareng sarili nang obra i Rossini, metung a bageng maralas dang gagawan deng kompositor anyang panaun a itang masisipit kareng deadline. Ditak la mu kareng kayang operang alang samut a anti kanita, a mibibili kapamilatan da reng aria o overture. Alimbawa, king "Il Barbiere" ating aria para king Konde (a maralas e ra pálage) "Cessa di più resistere", a ginamit nang Rossini (a inalilan nang bagya) king cantatang "Le Nozze di Teti e di Peleo" ampo king "La Cenerentola" (ing cabaletta para king rondo nang Angelina rondo alus e miyalilan). Bukud kaniti, deng apat kareng pekakilala nang overture, ("La cambiale di matrimonio", "Tancredi", "La Cenerentola" ampong "The Barber of Seville"), maki kapareu lang opera bukud karetang pekakilalang makaugne kareti. 
Ing metung a hilig nang gawan Rossini king orchestral scoring, ing makaba ampong bagya-bagyang pamanikdu o pamangimut ning katni (sound) king metung a pigurang ostinato figure, a maglalang bagyu kareng tasang magumpisa king sitsti at mumukiat king bagyung sasabeung ampong kikislap ("tempests in teapots by beginning in a whisper and rising to a flashing, glittering storm,") which earned him the nickname of "Signor Crescendo".
Mindatila/menatili lang sikat king mabilug nang bieng Rossini deng mapilan kareng opera, at taglus-taglus la kasikatan manibat kanita; deng aliwa, mitikdo la manibat king e pamikilala anyang tauli nang dake ning kadwang pulung dilanua o siglu, ketang ausan dang "bel canto revival." 
Agpang king talambye nang Herbert Weinstock a misulat anyang 1968 biography (lon ya king lalam), maki alaga yang 2.5 milyung francs ing kayang pibandyan kamate na anyang 1868, a katumbas ning 1.4 milyung US dollars. Bukud kareng indibidwal a pamana para king asawa na ampong kamaganak, Pepamana ne murin ing kabilugan ning kayang pibandyan king Commune ning Pesaro. Mibili ya o me-invest ing pamana bayang mitátag ing metung a "Liceo Musicale" (Conservatory) king balen. Anyang 1940, nung kapilan mibili king lalam ning kapamahalan ing "Liceo" at megi yang "Conservatorio Statale di Musica "Gioachino Rossini"", ing aguman nung nu miyalis ing pamana nang Rossini, kinwa ne ing lagyung "Fondazione G. Rossini". Aktibu la pa muring papalyari deng parasan na o kapakayan ning institusyon, a saupan la reng gagawan Conservatorio at manimuna king pamanigaral ampong pamikalat ning pangatau ampong obra nang Rossini. Manibat king pamagmula na niti, mekiugnayan ya ing institusyon king Rossini Opera Festival.
Mamye ya murin pondu ing pamana nang Rossini king Prix Rossini, metung a galal o premyu para kareng kayanakan a kompositor ampong susulat libretto o librettist. Mipalyari ya ining probisyon anyang 1878 kamate ning kayang byuda, at bibye ne ining galal ning Académie des Beaux-Arts. Migpalage ya kareng sinambut a obra ing Société des Concerts, Institut de France, manibat 1885 anggang 1911.

Rihawani:
Sa isang kagubatan maraming mansyon sa isang lugar ng Marulu, isang liblib na pook, ang mga naninirahan doon ay may pinaniniwalaang isang diyosa o diwata ng mga puting usa. Ito ang kuwento ng kanilanga mga ninuno na unang nanirahan doon.
Ang Diyos raw na ito ay tinatawag na Rihawani. Kung minsan ay nagpapalit daw ito ng anyo bilang isa ring puting usa. Ang mga naninirahan sa liblib na pook na ito na takot na takot na magawi o maglagalag sa kagubatan pinananahanan ni Rihawani, kahit alam nilang dito sila maraming makukuhang mga bagay-bagay na maari nilang magamit o mapagkakitaan. Mga prutas, mga hayop-gubat, mga halaman gubat, at iba pa.
Sang-ayon sa kanila, may nakasumpong na kay Rihawani. Isa sa mga taong nanirahan din doon. Minsan daw, nang maligaw ito sa pangunguha ng mga kahoy at prutas ay napadako ito sa pook ni Rihawani. Nakita raw at nasumpungan nito ang diyosa. Kahit sa malayo ay kapansinpansin ang angking kagandahan nito, habang nakikipag-usapsa ilang mga usang puti na nasa kaniyang paligid, Nang maglakad ang mga ito sa dakong patungo sa kinaroroonan ng tao ay mabilis na humangos ito sa bahay ay hindi magkumahog sa pagbabalita sa kaniyang nasaksihan. Mula noon ay lalo nang nagging katatakutan ang kagubatang iyon.
Isang araw ay may mga dayuhan na dumating doong na ang pakay ay mangaso o mamaril ng hayopa-gubat. Nagtanonga daw ang mga ito kung sang gubat marami ang mga hayop o ibon na maaring puntahan. Itinuro nila ang gubat ngunitisinalaysay rin ang kasaysayan nito na pinananahan ni Rihawani. Itonagubilin ding huwag pagnasaang puntahan ang pook na iyon. Paara sa ikasisiguro ng lakad ay ipinagsama ng mga ito ang isang tagapaggabay. At lumisan ang mga ito patungo sa gubat na pupuntahan. Pagdating sa paanan ng isang bundok ay napagkasunduan ng mga itong maghiwa-hiwalay at magkita-kita na lamang sa isang lugar sa dakong hapon. Ngunit lingid sa kaalaman ng lahat, ang isa ay nagka-interes na dumako sa gubat na pinananahanan ni Rihawani. Hindi nito pinakinggan ang tagubilin ng nakatatanda sa lugar na iyon. Nang makasapit na ito sa dakong itaas ng bunok ay naglakad-lakad muna at nagsipat-sipat ng mababaril na hayop. Naisip nito ang maputing usa na sinasabi ng matatanda. Nang mapadako ito sa gawing ilang, napansin niya ang isang pangkat ng mapuputing usa. Nang maramdaman ng mga hayop na may tao, nabulabog ang mga ito at nagtakbuhan papalayo. Hinabol nito ang isa at tinangkang barilin, ngunit walang natiyempuhan. Hanggang sa may Makita ito sa dakong kadawagan ng gubat, agad inasinta at binaril. Tinamaan ang putting usa sa binti at hindi na nakatakbo. At nang lalapitan na ng mangangaso ang puting usa may biglang sumulpot sa likuran na isang putting-putting usa na malayo sa hitsura ng nabaril. Lalo itong namangha nang ang usa ay mag-iba ng anyo at nagging isang napakagandang babae. Sinumbatan nito ang mangangaso. Sa ginawang iyon ng dayuhan, umusal ng sumpa ang diwata at ang lalaki ay maging isang putting usa rin at mapabilang na sa mga alagad ni Rihawani. Nang dakong hapon na, hinanap ito ng mga kasamahan. Tinawag nan tinawag ang pangalan nito ngunit wawlang sumasagot. Napaghinuha na lamang ng lahat lalo na ng kasamahan gabayna sinuway nito marahil ang tagubilin, tuloy nabilang sa sumpa ni Rihawani. Mula noon, bundok sa nagging aral na sa mga nandoon ang pangyayaring iyon, ay pinangilagan na ng mga mangangaso ang dakong iyon ng kagubatan.

Azawad:
Ing Azawagh ing pangkabilugan a lagiung e opisial para kareng manimunang dakeng mágsalitang Tamashek king pangulung Mali, pangulung Niger, ampong dake ning mauling Algeria. Bibilugan de reng Sahel ampong desiertong Sahara, a keraklan misnang leparan a kapatagan nung nu la manuknang deng nomad ing Azawagh, nung nu la manuknangan deng nomad a Tuareg. E ne katulid o katumbas ning sanumang metung a labuad a administratibo o pangkapamahalan ning Mali, Niger o Algeria, oneng kayabe la keti deng labuad a Kidal ning Mali ampo reng labuad ning Tahoua ampong Agadez ning Niger, pati na reng as mangaragul a dake ning mauling Algeria. There are also groups of Tuareg peoples in Mauritania, Libya and Burkina Faso.
Atin yang masikan ampong makayaliwang pamikilala ing Azawagh a darala na ning lahing Tuareg a makayaliwa kareng opisial a pamikilala ampong kaurian da reng pangkalibudtan o sentral a kapamahalan da reng Mali, Niger ampong Algeria. Linto ya ing Azawagh antimong pisasabian o issue a geopolitical o pang heograpia politikal uli ning kapagnasan a separatista nung nu ing Mouvement Populaire pour la Libération de l'Azawad ampo ing mas bayung National Movement for the Liberation of Azawad a maki kapagnasan a mitátag magsarili o independienting republikang maki pamikilalang Tuareg. Milyari murin iti uli ning War on Terror.

Pambansang Pangimut para king Pangatimawa ning Azawad:
Ing Pambansang Pangimut para king Pangatimawa ning Azawad ( National Movement for the Liberation of Azawad o Azawad National Liberation Movement) ("tifinagh": , , ; MNLA), sadiang National Movement of Azawad (; MNA) metung yang aguman a pampulitika ampong militar a makabasi king Azawad king Mali. Bibilugan de ing pangimut deng memalen a Tuareg a sadiang linaban para king ukbu ning Libya, anyang gerang sibil ning Libya kanitang 2011. Nanupata, sasabyan ning aguman a mekyabe la deng keraklan kareng karelang talapaglaban king rebolusyon king Libya kontra Gaddafi). Kaybat ning gera, minuli la reng sundalus ba yang umpisan ing karelang pamagalsa. Mitátag ya ing pangimut anyang Octubre 2011. Kayabe la mu naman keti deng aliwang tribu ning Sahara. Sasangkanan ne ning kapamahalan ning Mali ing pangimut a maki kaugnayan king Al-Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb, similarly to other state reactions during the Arab Spring. Nanupata, tatanggi na ning MNLA iti. Anyang Abril 1, ing MLNA, kayabe ya ing Ansar Dine, tatalnan na ne ing alus kabilugan ning pangulung Mali, kayabe la reng atlung pekamaragul a lakanbalen o siudad, deng Kidal, Gao ampong Timbuktu.

Rafael Correa:
Y Rafael Correa, (mibait Abril 6, 1963) iya ing Pamuntuk ning Republika ning Ecuador at iya ing pamuntuk pro tempore da reng Aniban da reng Bangsa king Mauling America. Metung yang economista a megaral king Ecuador, Belgium ampong United States, meyalal yang Pamuntuk iniang tauli ning 2006 ampong linukluk ya iniang Eneru 2007.

QR Code:
QR Code (a pepakuyad da manibat king Quick Response code) ya ing marka o etiketa ning metung a uri ning matrix barcode (o two-dimensional code) a minuna dang dinisenyu para king industria ning pamangawang saken. Mas malapit king panaun tamu, sinikat ya ing sistemang iti king kilwal ning industria uling malagwa yang basan ampong dakal ya daralang impormasiun kumpara kareng karaniwan a UPC barcode. Iting The code bibilugan de reng mangatuling a module (kodradu o parisukad a tuldik) a makasamasan king disenyung kodradu king maputing kagulutan o background. Makabili ing impormasiun kareng apat a standard a uri ("mode") ning data (numeric o bilang, alphanumeric o bilang ampong letra, byte/binary, Kanji), o kapamilatan da reng panuglung o extension a suportadu, a alus nanumang uri ning data.

Rex Stout:
I Rex Todhunter Stout (Diciembre 1, 1886 – Octubre 27, 1975) metung yang talasulat a Amerikanung mekilala king kayang detective fiction. Kilala yang dili i Stout antimong talapaglalang king matenakan a pikudtang detektib a i Nero Wolfe, a linarawan ning talapanyuring (reviewer) i Will Cuppy antimong "that Falstaff of detectives." Sinulat no ning talasaup nang Wolfe, i Archie Goodwin, deng kasu ning henyong detektib manibat 1934 ("Fer-de-Lance") anggang 1975 ("A Family Affair").
Pinili re antimong Masanting Diling Seryeng Pangmisteryu ning Dilanwa/Siglu (Best Mystery Series of the Century) ing kabilugan da reng kasulatang Nero Wolfe (Nero Wolfe corpus) king Bouchercon 2000, ing pekamaragul a pamitipun king yatu dikil kareng misteryu o mystery, at i Rex Stout ing mepiling Manimunang Talasulat da reng Misteryu ning Dilanwa/Siglu o Best Mystery Writer of the Century.

Nívea Stelmann:
I Nívea Stelmann Leôncio (mibait Abril 6, 1974) metung yang Brazilanang artista.

Jeremy Renner:
I Jeremy Lee Renner (mibait Eneru 7, 1971) metung yang artistang Americanu actor. Bantug ya king kayang genapan a papil keng sineng "The Avengers".

FC Barcelona:
Ing Futbol Club Barcelona (), a ausan da muring Barcelona at antimong palayo, Barça, metung yang propesional a football club, a makabasi king Barcelona, Catalonia, Espania.
Tetag ne kanitang 1899 ning metung a grupu da reng talapamyalung football a Swiss, Ingles ampong Catalan a panimunan nang Joan Gamper, ing club. Iti megi neng sagisag ning kulturang Catalan ampo ning Catalanismo, anya kasebyan ne o motto 'ing '"Més que un club"" (E mu kabud metung a club). Ing opisyal a dalit ning Barcelona, yapin ing "Cant del Barça" a sinulat nang Jaume Picas ampo i Josep Maria Espinàs. E anti kareng keraklan kareng dakal a football club, deng talasuporta ing makibandi ampong mánibala king Barcelona. Ya ing kadwang pekamakwaltang football club king yatu agpang king Deloitte Football Money League. a maki banwa-banwang pánakitan a €398 million. Malambat na neng karibal ning club ing Real Madrid. Awsan dong "El Clásico" deng pyalung da reng adwang club.
Ing Barcelona ing kasalukuyan a kampyun king football king Europa, at sinambut neng adwang pulu't metung (21) a La Liga, adwang pulu't limang (25) Copa del Rey, apulung (10) Supercopa de España, ampong atlung (3) Copa Eva Duarte. Kinilala ne mu ampong inorganisa ning RFEF ing Copa Eva Duarte manibat 1947 anggang 1953 lalam ning lagyung ita, anya e kayabe king pamamilang ing pamanyambut ning Barcelona king "Copa de Oro Argentina" anyang 1945 e kayabe king pamamilang, at den mung trophy kareng banwang 1948, 1952 ampong 1953 ing kayabe. King internasyonal a laban da reng club, sinambut yang apat a UEFA Champions League ing Barcelona, record a apat a UEFA Cup Winners' Cup, apat a UEFA Super Cup, ampong record a atlung Inter-Cities Fairs Cup ampong record a adwang FIFA Club World Cup trophy.
Ing Barcelona murin ing bukud a club king Europang memyalung continental football balang panaun (season) manibat anyang 1955, at metung ya kareng atlu mung club a e milako king La Liga, kayabe ya ing Athletic Bilbao ampo ing Real Madrid. Anyang 2009, ing Barcelona ing meging mumuang club ning Espaniang sinambut king Treble (association football)treble a bibilugan da reng La Liga, Copa del Rey, ampo ing Champions League. Anyang banwang ita, megi ya mu namang mumunang football club a sinambut anam kareng anam a kompetisyon kilub ning pabanwa, anya akumpletu ne ing sextuple, a bibilugan da reng minunang mebanggit a atlu ampo reng Spanish Super Cup, UEFA Super Cup ampong FIFA Club World Cup.

Yigael Yadin:
I Yigael Yadin (, a mibait a Yigael Sukenik (Hebreo: יגאל סוקניק) anyang 21 Marzo 1917, mete 28 June 1984) metung yang Israeli arkeologo, pulitiku, ampo ing kadwang Pekapun daring Matas a Manungkulan (Chief of Staff) ning Sikanan para king Pamamingwa ning Israel (Israel Defense Forces)
Obra.

Abdelaziz Bouteflika:
I Abdelaziz Bouteflika (; ) (mibait 2 Marzo 1937) metung yang pulitikung Algerian a pamuntuk ning Algeria manibat anyang 1999. Ya ing manibala anyang kayari ning marayang Gerang Sibil ning Algeria anyang 2002, at inari na ing pamanibalang pangpanaun ning kagipitan (emergency rule) anyang Febrero 2011 panaun ning kagulwan king labwad, ing Kasibul a Arabu o Arab Spring.
Migsilbi ya mu naman a pamuntuk ning Pangkabilugang Kapulungan da ring Misasanmetung a Bangsa (United Nations General Assembly).

Nicholas Negroponte:
I Nicholas Negroponte (mibait Diciembre 1, 1943) metung yang Americanung arkitektung pekakilala antimong talatátag ampong Chairman Emeritus ning Massachusetts Institute of Technology Media Lab, ampo ing talatátag ning One Laptop per Child Association (OLPC).

Asugi:
Ing asugi ("mercury") king Ingles metung yang elementung
kemikal a maki sagisag a Hg ampong bilang atomikung 80.
Mayayaus ya mu namang quicksilver o hydrargyrum (ibat king
"" "danum" ampong
"" "pilak"). Metung yang mabayat
ampong malapilak a d-block a elementu ing mercury. Iti mu kabud
ing metal a likidu kareng karaniwan a kabilyan para king temperatura
ampong prisyun (standard conditions for temperature and pressure); ing
bukud mung elementung likidu kareng kabilyan a reti ya pin ing
bromine, dapot deng mapilan a metals antimo ing caesium,
francium, gallium, ampong rubidium malalaso la king
temperaturang matas mung bagya kesa king karaniwan a temperatura (room
temperature). Uli ning kayang puntu ning pamagyelu (freezing
point) a −38.83 °C ampong puntu ning pamamukal (boiling
point) a 356.73 °C, metung ya kareng pekamakitid a lapad ning
estadung likidu ning sanu mang metal.
Atyu ing asugi kareng depositu king keraklan king yatu antimong
cinnabar (mercuric sulfide). Ing malutung panguleng (red
pigment( a vermilion gagawan de kapamilatan ning pamag-reduce o
reduction ibat king cinnabar. Matalik makalasun ing cinnabar
kapamilatan ning pamamangan kaniti o pamanyingut king alikabuk.
Malyari mu namang malasun kapamilatan ning miririnan uri ning asuging
malalaso king danum (antimo king mercuric chloride o
methylmercury), pamanyingut king asuk ning asugi (mercury vapor),
o pamamangan asan danum ibat dayat malat a maki asugi (eating seafood
contaminated with mercury).
Magagamit ing asugi kareng pang-garadu o termometro (thermometer),
barometro, manometer, sphygmomanometer, float valve,
mercury switch, at aliwa pang kasangkapan, dapot uling king
kapigaganakan king pangalasun ning asugi, alilan danala deng
pang-garadu ampong sphygmomanometers, at alis danalang instrumentung
mitmung alcohol o , o kaya digital, o makabasi king
thermistor. Magagamit ya pa murin king pamangamit pamanyalugsug a
siyentipiku (scientific research applications) ampo king amalgam a sangkap para king pamagpasta da reng dentista.
Magagamit ya para kareng sulu: ing elektrisidad a dadalan king asuk
asugi o mercury vapor king tubong phosphor maglalang yang short-wave
salang ultraviolet (ultraviolet light), at iti maging sangkan bang
ing phosphor mag-fluoresce, at panibatan na niti ing mayayakit a
sala o "visible light".
Ding suglung palual.
