R. Garcia y Robertson:
I Rodrigo Garcia y Robertson (mibait anyang 1949) metung yang Americanung talasulat ning pangkasalesayan a ampong pantasyang pikudta (historical and fantasy fiction). Atin yang Ph.D king amlat (history) at tinuru ya king UCLA ampo king Villanova University bayu ing pamaniulat ing megi nang manimunang propesion. Bukud kareng walu nang nobela, dakal ya makuyad a salita (short story) a milimbag kareng pamitipun o anthology king pantasya ampong pikudtang syensya (science fiction). Manuknangan ya king Mount Vernon, Washington.
Bibliography.
More detailed bibliographies can be found at "Locus" Magazine's index to science fiction, 1984-1998, accessed April 23, 2010 and at the Internet Speculative Fiction Database, accessed April 23, 2010.

Donna Summer:
I LaDonna Adrian Gaines (Diciembre 31, 1948 – Mayo 17, 2012), a mas kilala keng kayang stage name a Donna Summer, metung yang Americanang talakanta ampong talasulat kantang sinikat anyang kapanaunan ning disco anyang dekadang 1970. Maki siwala yang mezzo-soprano, at mekatalima ya sinambut king Grammy Award. I Summer ing mumunang talakantang mika atlung mitutuking double album a miras pekamatas (number one) king US "Billboard" chart, at mika apat yang number-one single king Estados Unidos kilub ning labing atlung bulan.
Mete ya i Summer anyang Mayo 17, 2012. Inulat ning Associated Press a mete ya anyang abak king kayang bale king Key West, Florida king edad a 63 kaybat nang mekilaban king kanser.Agpang king Bradenton Herald, sasabyan da reng kasulatan da reng "Sarasota County records" manuknangan ya king Englewood, Florida anyang mate ya. E makabili ing lugal nung nu ya mete.

Robin Gibb:
I Robin Hugh Gibb, CBE (22
Diciembre 1949 – 20 Mayi 2012) metung yang talakanta ampong
talasulat kantang tau Britania. Kilala yang dili antimong kayanib ning
Bee Gees, a tetag na kayabe ning kayang kakambal a i Maurice ampo i koya nang i Barry. Atin ya
muring wali, i Andy Gibb, a sikat mu namang talakantang solo.
Mibait ya king Isle of Man kareng pengaring Ingles. Kaybat,
minalis ya king Manchester ing pamilya bayu la menuknangan king
Brisbane, Australia. Inumpisan nang Gibb ing kayang karera
antimong kayanib ning pampamilyang trio, at anyang minuna yang
migtagumpe ing grupu, mibalik la king United Kingdom nung nu la
sinikat king mabilug a yatu. Anyang 2004, tinggap de reng Gees
received ing karelang CBEs king
Prince of Wales king Buckingham
Palace para king karelang for their "ambag king musika"
("contribution to music"). Uling king karelang apisaling maygit king 200 million
units, tuturing do reng Bee Gees a metung kareng matagumpeng diling
grupung pop king musika king pangkabilugan a panaun.
Kaybat ning karerang miras anam a dekada, tawli yang linage king
entabladu i Gibb anyang
Febrero 2012 a susuporta kareng mengasugat a sundalus ning Britania
king metung a charity concert king London Palladium. Anyang 20 ya ing May 2012, mete ya i Gibb
kaybat ning malambat a laban king colorectal cancer.
Suglung palwal.
"Magnet" by Joseph Brennan
Promo Video, My Lover's Prayer]

Glória Pires:
I Glória Maria Cláudia Pires de Morais (mibait Agostu 23, 1963) metung yang Brazilanang artista. 

Ashley Judd:
I Ashley Judd (mibait yang Ashley Tyler Ciminella; Abril 19, 1968) Americana yang artista king telebisyon ampo king pelikula, humanitarian, aktibista king politika, magdisenyu king moda (fashion designer), modelu ampong pilantropu (philanthropist).
Meragul ya i Judd king pamilya da reng masanting kabilyan a artista, antimong anak ning talakantang country music, i Naomi Judd ampong kapatad nang Wynonna Judd. Lipat ning pekakilala ya king kayang karera antimong artista kilub da reng adwang dekada, mági yang mas aktibu king pamanyaup king mabilug a yatu ampo king aktibismung politikal. Megi yang manimunang lalage i Judd kareng pelikulang antimo ing "Ruby in Paradise," "Kiss the Girls", "Double Jeopardy", "Where the Heart Is" ampong "High Crimes".
Ya murin ing bidang i Rebecca Winstone king serieng pangtelebisyon a "Missing" anyang 2012.
Asawa ne ing kampeo king IndyCar ampong makatatlu king Indianapolis 500 a i Dario Franchitti.

Michael Haneke:
I Michael Haneke (; mibait 23 Marzo 1942) metung yang direkor pelikula ampong talasulat script a Austrian. Papalto no kareng kayang pelikula deng prublema ampong kakulangan king makabayung sosyedad. Megobra ne king telebisyon, teatro ampong pelikula i Haneke. Kilala ya murin king pamagdiskursu tungkul kareng pisasabyang pangsosyedad king kayang obra. Besides working as filmmaker he also teaches directing at the Filmacademy Vienna. 
Anyang 2009 Cannes Film Festival, simbut ne ning pelikula nang "The White Ribbon" ing Palme d'Or para king pekamayap a pelikula (best film), at king 67th Golden Globe Awards sinambut yang Golden Globe Award for Best Foreign Language Film. King banwang 2012, minuna reng pepalage ing kayang pelikulang "Love", a mekipagkumpitensya ya iti king 2012 Cannes Film Festival. Ikwa nang sinambut Palme d'Or niting pelikula, a meging kadwa nang pamanyambut king matas a uring galal a iti kilub ning atlung banwa, at uli na niti, mibili ya king makabukud a kategorya a bibilugan da reng pitu mû, kayabe la reng kalupa nang Francis Ford Coppola. Ginawa neng pelikula kareng amanung Frances, Aleman ampong Ingles.

Renato Corona:
I Renato C. Corona (mibait Octubre 15, 1948) ing kadwang pulu't atlung (23rd) Pun Mahistradu ning Kakataskatasan a Pamuntuk da ding Mahistradu ning Kakataskatasan a Ukuman ning Filipinas. Migsilbi yang Mahistradu ning Kakataskatasan a Ukuman kaybat neng tildung He served as an Associate Justice after being appointed by Pamuntuk Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo anyang Abril 9, 2002 at kaybat antimong Pun Mahistradu anyang Mayo 12, 2010 karetiru nang Pun Mahistradu Reynato Puno.
Metung yang propesor king leyi, pribadung pribadung abugadu o talapaglwalu, ampong kayanib ning Gabineti lalam da reng adwang Pamuntuk, i Fidel V. Ramos ampo i Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo, bayu ya mituldu king matas a ukuman. 
Anyang Diciembre, 12, 2011, me-impeach ya king Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan. Anyang Mayo 29, 2012, inatul neng mikasala ning he was charged guilty by the Senado kareng Artikulo II kareng Articles of Impeachment a miyarap kaya dikil king kayang a pamaglwal king malda king kareng kayang pamiyapag king kayang pibandyan, kautangan, ampong alagang (statement of assets, liabilities, and net worth).

Katatagan Mozilla:
Ing Katatagan Mozilla o Mozilla Foundation metung yang aguman a e magtubu (non-profit organization) a mitikdo ba yang sopan ampong tayran ing open source a proyektung Mozilla. Ing aguman ing mitutuldu kareng patakaran a manibala king pamipalusuk o panyulung, papalakad kareng manimunang balangkas, at tatalan kareng The organization sets the policies that govern development, operates key infrastructure and controls marka (trademarks) at aliwa pang pibandyang pangkaisipan (intellectual property). Atin yang taxable subsidiary: ing Mozilla Corporation, a mag-empleu kareng dakal a developer ning Mozilla ampong manibala king pamagpalwal ning Mozilla Firefox web browser ampo ing Mozilla Thunderbird email client. Ining subsidiary bandi neng lubusan (100%) ning pengaring kumpanya, anya tutukyan no murin deng kayang prinsipyung e pamagtubu. Tetag ne ning Mozilla Organization, a kaugne ning Netscape, at opisyal yang migumpisa anyang Julio 15, 2003. King salukuyan, makabasi ya ing aguman king Mountain View, California, Estados Unidos, a lakanbalen o ciudad king Silicon Valley.
Lalarawan ne ning Katatagan Mozilla ing sarili na antimong "aguman a e magtubung magtaguyud king pamibuklat, bayung kaisipan ampong kaparalanan, ampong timawang pamakyabe king Aptas." ("a non-profit organization that promotes openness, innovation and participation on the Internet."). Ing magsilbing daklat o giya ning Katatagan Mozilla yapin ing Mozilla Manifesto, a maglistang kareng apulung prinsipyung king palage ning Mozilla, "misnang ulaga ba nang asundu ning Aptas ing kayang pamisulung king kayapang pangmalda ampo reng aspetung pangnegosyu ampong pangkapanintunan king bye." Milikas ne kareng atlung pulung (30) amanu ing Manifesto.

Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan ning Filipinas:
Ing Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan ning Filipinas (Ingles, "House of Representatives of the Philippines", Tagalug: "Kapulungan ng mga Kinatawan ng Pilipinas"; a kilala murin king lagyu nang Castila, "Camara de Representantes de Filipinas") ing mababang kapulungan ning Kongreso ning Filipinas. Ing Senado ing matas a kapulungan. Maralas, "Kongreso" ing aus da king Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan. Deng kayanib na niti, ausan dong "Congressmen" ("deng pekakatawan" o "kongresista"), at ing titulu da, "Representative". Yalal da la deng pekakatawan king terminung atlung banwa, at malyari lang miyalal pasibayu (reelected), oneng e la malyaring luluk makatatlung tuki-tuking terminu. Manga walumpulung porsyentu (80%) da reng congressmen, pekakatawan la kareng karelang distritu, magsilbing representanti ning partikular a lugal. Ating 229 (adwang dalan adwang pulu't syam) a distritung pang-alalan king bangsa, nung nu ing balang metung bibilugan de reng 250,000 (adwang dalan ampong limampulung libung) tau. Atin muring pekakatawan a sektoral a miyayalal kapamilatan ning sistemang party-list, a bibilug king e migit king adwang pulung porsyentu (20%) ning kabilugan a bilang da reng Pekakatawan.
Bukud king kayang pamananggap o pamag-apruba king balang munikalang leyi o bill ba yang ipasar at papirma king
pamuntuk bayu ya maging leyi o batas, atin yang upaya ing Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan a mag-impeach kareng mapilang opisyal, at deng eganaganang munikalang leying maki kaugnayan king pisalapyan o kwalta kaylangan lang manibat king mababang kapulungan.
Panibalan ne ning Talapagsalita, katungkulan a kasalukuyan nang tatalnan Feliciano Belmonte, Jr. ning Quezon Lakanbalen. Ing opisyal a tanggapan ning Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan atyu king "Batasang Pambansa" a atyu king Batasan Hills king Quezon Lakanbalen king Metro Manila. Maralas, "Batasan" ing aus da king gusali; ing kataya mengabaldugan ne mu namang Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan.

Senado ning Filipinas:
Ing Senado ning Filipinas (Ingles: "Senate of the Philippines", Tagalug: "Senado ng Pilipinas")
ing matas a kapulungan ning lehislaturang adwa kapulungan o kamara ning Filipinas, ing Kongreso; ing Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan ing mababang kapulungan. Bibilugan de reng adwang pulu't apat (24) a senador a miyayalal king kabilugan ning Filipinas nung nu magsilbi yang metung a distritu ing kabilugan ning republika king sistemang plurality-at-large voting.
Mágsilbi la reng senador kilub ning terminung anam (6) a banwa, nung nu reng kapitna magsilbi lang titlung (3) banwa, bang siguradung taglus-taglus yang lalakad ing Senado. Anyang sibli ne ning Punbatas ning 1987 ing Senado, migsilbi la anggang 1992 deng senador a miyalal anyang 1987. Anyang 1992, deng labing adwang (12) kandidatung menikwang pekamatas a botu migsilbi la anggang 1998, kabang deng tutuking labing adwa migsilbi la anggang 1995. Kaybat, ing balang senador a miyayalal magsilbi ya king kabilugan ning anam (6) a banwa. 
Bukud king mamayun o mag-apruba king balang munikalang leyi o leying pipagtibe bayu ya ibye iti king pamuntuk ba neng pirman, ing Senado mu kabud ing kapulungan a makapag-apruba kareng tratado (treaties), at magsilbing ukum kareng kasung impeachment da reng opisyal. Ing manibala king Senado ya pin ing Presiding over the Senate is the Pamuntuk ning Senado, nung nu ing kasalukuyan a makalukluk ya pin i Juan Ponce Enrile.

Miriam Defensor Santiago:
I Miriam Defensor Santiago (mibait Miriam Palma Defensor anyang Junio 15, 1945) metung yang mepiling Ukum ning International Criminal Court ampong kayanib ning Senado ning Filipinas. Metung yang abogada, sadyang ukum, ampong propesor ning leying pang-punbatas ampong leying internasional (constitutional law and international law). Migsilbi yang Komisyonado ning Pamaglipat ampong Pamagpalwal (Commissioner of the Bureau of Immigration and Deportation) anyang 1988, ampong Kalihim ning Repormang Agraryo manibat and the Secretary of the Philippines' Sakdalan ning Repormang Agraryo manibat 1989 anggang 1991. Ya ing talatátag ampong kasalukuyang pekapun ning panglibutad-wanan a People's Reform Party a ka-alyadu ning sadyang pamuntuk Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo, at metung yang Laureado ning Ramon Magsaysay Award para king serbisyong pangkapamahalan.
Tinagal ya para king katungkulan a Pamunuk ning Filipinas anyang 1992 i Defensor Santiago;ya ing mumuna king pamamilang kareng botu kareng mumunang limang aldo, oneng bandang tawli mesambut ya king pilatan a ala pang metung a milyung botu kareng atlung pulu't anam a milyung (36,000,000) a botu. Sasabyan dang mika maleparan a pirait king kampanya, at mika kapansin-pansin a blackout king kuryenti kaybat da reng mumunang limang aldo. Minapag yang protesta, dapot tebili re ini uli ning teknikalidad anyang tinagal ya at sinambut para king pwestu king Senado.
Maralas deng babalita i Miriam kareng internasional a pahayagan uli ning kayang charisma, makuleng pangatau ampong kasebyan a nakaugne kaya, anya gad neng lalapitan ning balita.Anyang 1997, pinili ne ning metung a magasin king Australia antimong metung kareng mayupayang diling bábai king yatu (one of "The 100 Most Powerful Women in the World"). Kareng tawling banwa, Mas bayu kaniti, megi yang manimunang talapagsalita (keynote speaker) ning kapulungang internasional laban king korupsyon king Sydney, Australia. Antimong senador, ya ing migdala ampong minantabe king pangapasar na king Senado ning Filipinas ning UN Convention Against Corruption.

Universidad ning Pilipinas:
Ing Unibersidad ning Pilipinas ("University of the Philippines" king Ingles at "Unibersidad ng Pilipinas" king Filipino, a keraklan dang papakuyad king U.P.) ing magdili-diling pambangsang unibersidad king Filipinas .
Mitátag ya kanitang 1908 kapamilatan ning leyi ning Philippine Legislature. Miyayampang yang pamagaral king katlung lebel (tertiary level) king halus balang larangan, manibat king agrikultura, medisina, ampong kabulasang pangmalda (public health) ampong leyi (law) angga king natural ampong pang-sosiedad a siensia, engineering, makudtang pamanyulat (creative writing) ampong alit. 
Matas ing pamikilala king unibersidad antimong pipagaralan kareng lebel a kolehiyu, graduadu ampong post-graduate. Uling ibat king kapamahalan ing metung a dake ning kayang pondu, pekamababa ing kayang bayad kareng unibersidad a kapante nang uri king mabilug a bangsa. Uli na niti, masikan ing kumpitisiun o pamiligligan kareng lulub keti. Anyang 2006, miras lang pitung pulung libu (70,000) deng minta kareng campus ning UP ampong test center king mabilug a Filipinas bang kuma king UP College Admission Test (UPCAT) para kareng lulub kolehiyu, ing pekamaragul angga kanita.
Makikilala ya ing unibersidad kareng magaral a matenakan at aktibu kareng bageng tatagkil kareng pisasabian a tatagkil king bangsa ampo king pulitika. Ibat la king U.P. deng pikabaluan diling pekapun king pulitika ampong sosiedad, ekonomista, abugadu, doktor ning medisina, talatuki ring makudtang alit (creative artists), ampong negosianti. Megaral la keti deng pilan kareng Pamuntuk ning Filipinas, king kolehiyu man o postgraduate. Samantala, makaugne la king unibersidad deng atlung pulu (30) da reng limang pulung (50) National Artist, ampo reng aduang pulu't walu (28) kareng aduang pulu't siyam (29) a National Scientist. Ing U.P. ing maki maragul diling bilang da reng Sentrung Pambangsa ning Kabiasnan ampong Pamanalkus (National Centers of Excellence and Development) kareng institusion ning matas a pamagaral king bangsa at metung ya kareng atlu mung pipagaralan king Asia a tinanggap galal antimong institusion lalam ding Ramon Magsaysay Awards.
Ing Oblation ing manimuna nang sagisag ning U.P. Iti istatua ne ning metung a taung lubas, makauniat/makayatiat la reng kayang takdeng antimong ating abutan, at makalawe ya king babo. Makabasi ya king kadua nang telatag ning "Mi Ultimo Adios" nang Jose Rizal, a dakal a babanggitan tungkul king e makasariling pamiyampang king bangsa.
Ausan da lang ""Iskolar ng Bayan"" (""Iskolar ning Balen"") deng magaral ampong miyari king U.P. 
Amlat.
Mitátag ya ing Unibersidad ning Filipinas kanitang 1908 antimong American University of the Philippines kapamilatan ning First Philippine Legislature Act No. 1870, a mayayaus muring University Charter. Kapagnasan na niting miyampang matas a uring pamituru king malagung panyulat (literature), pilosopiya, siensia, at alit (arts), at munie pamagsaneng propesional ampong teknikal. Migumpisa ya ing Unibersidad kareng College of Fine Arts, College of Liberal Arts, ampong College of Medicine and Surgery kareng gusaling atyu king Padre Faura (distritu ning Ermita) ampong R. Hidalgo (distritu ning Quiapo) king Menila, ampo ing School of Agriculture king Los Baños, Laguna. Mengailangan nong dagdagan ning U.P. deng kayang kursu at dagdagan la reng kayang pasilidad. Mebisa ya ing Board of Regents king munikalang manintun mas maragul a lugal, at menikua yang loting maki leparan a 493 ektarea king Diliman, a sakup ning Rizal kanitang panaun a ita. Migumpisa ing obra king pamangawa king bayung campus kanitang 1939. 
Anyang w:World War II sera no ning U.P. deng keraklan kareng kayang kolehiu liban king College of Medicine, Pharmacy, ampong Engineering. Samantala ginamit do reng Hapon deng aduang gusali king Diliman: ing College of Liberal Arts Building (ing Benitez Hall ngeni) ampo ing Colleges of Law and Business Administration Building (ing Malcolm Hall ngeni). Kaibat ning gera, mengasira la reng gusali king Diliman. Minyad yang pondung labing atlung miliung pesos (Php13 million) ibat king 
US-Philippines War Damage Commission ing Pamuntuk ning U.P., i Bienvenido Gonzales. Mika maragul a proyektu ning pamaniamasan ampong pamitikdo king unibersidad. King mumunang pamikatagun, mika maleparan a pangkabilugang planu (master plan) ampong mapa para king Diliman campus. Makabili la king mapa deng buri rang lunto king pamiparagul ning Diliman. Miragdagan la reng gusali mitikdo king campus ning Diliman: deng University Library o Aklatan ning Unibersidad (Gonzalez Hall), ing College of Engineering (Melchor Hall), Women's Residence Hall o Tuknangan da reng Kebabainan (a ngeni Kamia Residence Hall), ing Conservatory of Music (Abelardo Hall), ing Administration Building o Gusaling Kapanibalan (Quezon Hall), ampo ing U.P. President's Residence o Tuknangan ning Pamuntuk ning U.P. Pansamantala lang pakasaut kareng kubu ampong salilungan a gawa king sawali ampong sim (galvanized iron) deng kolehiu ampong opisinang administratibu. 
Aniang kapat a pulung (40) anibersariu ning U.P. kanitang Febrero ning 1949, miyalis la reng miyalis la reng upisina ning sentral a kapanibalan (central administration) ning U.P. manibat Menila papunta king Diliman, kayabe ne ing pamanalis ning Oblation. Mibili la ngan king campus king Diliman deng upisina dang administratibu ning U.P. ampo reng unit na kareng rehiyon king Menila, Los Baños, Baguio Lakanbalen, ampong Cebu. Merapat murin king Diliman ing seremonias ning pangayari (commencement exercises) king mumunang pamikatagun kanitang 1949. 
Kanitang dekadang 1950, elilan na ning U.P. ing kayang paralan king pamagaral a katlung lebel o kolehiyu kapamilatan ning pamitátag kareng bayung departamentu o unit ampong payung programa. Mika bayung kapanumanan o reporma kanitang 1959, ing programa ning Pangkabilugan a Pamagaral (General Education Program). Ing G.E. program megi yang serie o pamituki-tuki da reng core courses (kursung pang-pundasiun) para kareng eganaganang magaral king lebel a kolehiyu o undergraduate. Miyayampang la reng keraklan kareng kursung deti king lumang a College of Liberal Arts. Uli na niti, pepalyari nang Pamuntuk Vicente Sinco ing pamibayu ning kolehiyu king metung a University College a miyampang kareng core subject king mumunang aduang banua ning kolehiyu. Samantala, miyampang ne mang major course humanidades, natural a siensia ampong siensiang pang-sosiedad king College of Arts and Sciences ampo king Graduate School of Arts and Sciences. Mitátag la kanitang terminu nang Pamuntuk Sinco deng karagdagang kolehiyu ampong instituto. Kayabe la kareti deng Institute of Public Administration (1952), Statistical Center (1953), Labor Education Center (ing salukuyan a School of Labor and Industrial Relations, a mitátag kanitang 1954), Asian Studies Institute (ing salukuyan a Asian Center, a mitátag kanitang 1955), Institute of Library Science (1961), ampo ing College of Home Economics (1961).
King lalam ning pamanibala nang Carlos P. Romulo, mitátag la reng Population Institute, Law Center ampo ing Applied Geodesy and Photogrammetry Training Center kanitang 1964, Institute of Mass Communications, College of Business Administration, ampo ing Institute of Planning kanitang 1965, Computer Center, Institute for Small-Scale Industries kanitang 1966, Institute of Social Work ampo ing Community Development kanitang 1967 ampo ing Asian Center kanitang 1968. 
Aniang panaun ning leyi militar (martial law), sibukan ning kapanibalan ning U.P. ing pamanatili kareng bageng dirinan nang ulaga (priorities) king pamagaral, ampo ing kayang pamagsarili antimong metung a institusion. Aniang panaun a masikan ing aktibismu king unibersidad, tikian ning Pamuntuk ning U.P., i Salvado P. Lopez, ing metung a sistema ning demokratikung pamaniad usuk (democratic consultation), nung nu maki papil la king pamagpasiya kareng pamanuldu (apppointment) ampong pamagtas ranggu (promotion) deng talaturu ampong empleadung administratibu. Kanitang Noviembre 1972, minuna yang mibulalag a dakeng magsarili o autonomous unit lalam ning chancellor ing campus ning Los Baños. Mirinan yang Php150 million a grant ibat king pondung pambangsa ing Infrastructure Development Program ning U.P. Menibat ya king pondung iti ing ginamit da king pamanikdo kareng bayung gusali kareng College of Business Administration ampong Zoology, Institute of Small-Scale Industries, Transport Training Center, ampo ing Coral Laboratory ning Marine Sciences Institute. Mitikdo la murin deng Kalayaan Residence Hall ampo reng tuknangan da reng empleadung mababa sueldu.
Aniang panaun nang Onofre D. Corpuz, mibulalag yang autonomous unit ing U.P. Manila, a ausan dang Health Sciences Center kanita, ampo ing U.P. Visayas. Mitátag ya murin ketang panaun a ita ing Asian Institute of Tourism (AIT) uli ning pamamie ulaga king turismo antimong industria ning bangsa. Mitátag la murin deng bayung sentru ning pamanyaliksik ampong unit a magkalub titulu antimo ing Third World Studies Center (1977), Creative Writing Center, National Engineering Center (1978), U.P. Extension Program king San Fernando, Pampanga (1979), a atyu na ngeni king Clark Field, Angeles Lakanbalen, Institute of Islamic Studies (1973), ampong U.P. Film Center, National Center for Transportation Studies (1976). Pigmasusian ne ning U.P. ing kayang kapitumpulu’t limang (75) banua kanitang 1983.
Lalam ning Diamond Jubilee project nang Edgardo Angara, mekatipun yang walumpulung miliung pesus (P80 million) ing unibersidad, at megamit iti king pamaglalang kareng bayung professorial chair ampong pamagkalub kareng talaturu (faculty grants). Tetag no murin deng Management Review Committee (MRC) ampong Committee to Review Academic Programs (CRAP) bang sumuri ampong magmunikala dikil king pamipalakad ning unibersidad. Uli ning ulat ning MRC, mika maleparan a pamagbayu o pamag-reorganisa ning U.P. System, ing karagdagang decentralizatin o pamirake king pamanibala ning U.P., ampo ing pamibulalag ning U.P. Diliman antimong autonomous campus kanitang Marzo 23, 1983. Mibili ya ing U.P. Baguio lalam ning pamanibala ning U.P. Diliman. Samantala, mika reorganisasiun ning College of Arts and Sciences, a mepitna karing atlung bayung kolehiyu: ing College of Science, College of Arts and Letters, ampo ing College of Social Sciences and Philosophy.
Antimong manimunang unibersidad (flagship university), manimuna ya ing U.P. Diliman king degulan. Kanitang Abril 26, 1982, pormal yang mekilala antimong metung a unibersidad a kayanib (constituent university), alus metung a dekada kaibat ning pamagbayu king pamamalakad (reorganization).
Lipat ning pangasentru na ning pamanibala/administrasiun ning U.P. king Diliman, e ya tambing mitatag kaibat ning 1972, dapot panibalan de iti, kayabe da reng unit king Menila bayu ing pamiyagum da reti king Health Sciences Center, antimong unibersidad a "de facto".
Inumpisan neng Pamuntuk Jose Abueva ing Socialized Tuition Fee Assistance Program (STFAP) kanitang 1987. Gewa ne muring pormal Abueva ing patakaran ning pamangamit king Filipino king unibersidad. I Pamuntuk Emil Javier naman, tetag ne ing U.P. Mindanao king Silicon Gulf, Mauling Mindanao, ampo ing U.P. Open University kanitang 1995. Kayabe no man kareng pamana nang Pamuntuk Francisco Nemenzo ing Revitalized General Education Program (RGEP) ampo ing pamiyabe king patakaran ning unibersidad ing pamangilala kareng ambag da king pamanyaliksik (research) ampong pamangudta (creative achievements) deng talaturu ning U.P. I Pamuntuk Emerlinda Roman naman, manimuna ya king Centennial Campaign Fund a balak dang manyulung kareng serbisiu na ampong pasilidad ning unibersidad kaugne ning kadinala’nang banua ning U.P. ngening 2008. 
Deng Kayagum a Unibersidad.
King salukuyan, bibilugan deng pitung Kayagum a Unibersidad o Constituent Universities (a keraklan dang papakuyad antimong C.U.) ing University of the Philippines System, a mayayakit kareng maigit apulung campus king mabilug a Filipinas. 
Ing U.P. Diliman ing manimunang campus (flagship campus) ning unibersidad, at dakal yang dili yampang a kursu. Makipanayus ya murin ing Unibersidad king kapamahalan ning Makati Lakanbalen para king pamangamit ning University of Makati.
Panibalan ne ning chancellor ing balang kayagum a unibersidad ning U.P. Yalal ne ning Board of Regents king terminung atlung banua. E anti king pamuntuk a maki terminung anam a banuang alang pamanulit, malyari yang miyayal king metung pang terminung atlung banua ing chancellor, agpang king pamagpasiya da reng kayanib ning Board of Regents.
Pangabalangkas (Organization).
Deng Pamuntuk ning Unibersidad ning Filipinas.
Miyayalal ya ing Pamuntuk ning Unibersidad ning Filipinas king metung a terminung anam a banua kapamilata’ning Board of Regents a maki labing aduang kayanib. Aniang 2005, adua nong Americanu ampong labing pitung Filipinu deng sinuyu (migsilbi) antimong Pamuntuk ning Unibersidad ning Filipinas. 
Ing salukuyan a pamuntuk ning U.P. yapin i Dr. Emerlinda R. Román, metung a propesor ning business administration a migsilbing chancellor ning U.P. Diliman bayu ya miyalal antimong pamuntuk. I Roman ing mumunang babaing pamuntuk ning Unibersidad ning Filipinas. Ya ing manibala king unibersidad king pamagmasusi king kadinala’nang banua (sentenial) king 2008.
Lupung da reng Rehenti (Board of Regents).
Ing Board of Regents ("Lupung da reng Rehenti" king Kapampangan, "Lupon ng mga Rehente" king Filipino at keraklan dang papakuyad a B.O.R.) ing matas diling lupung a magpasiya ning Unibersidad ning Pilipinas. Bibilugan de reng labing aduang (12) galame o kayanib. Yutus ning charter ning Unibersidad ing pamitátag king Lupung, a yang bukud a maki upaya king pamipairal ning upaya ning Unibersidad da panglupung ampong pang-kapanibalan (corporate and administrative powers).
Ing Talapamuntuk ning Commission on Higher Education ing magsilbi antimong salukuyan a Talapamuntuk (acting Chairperson), kabang Kaduang Talapamuntuk (Vice Chairperson) ing Pamuntuk ning Unibersidad ning Filipinas. Kayanib la king Lupung da reng Rehenti ning UP deng Talapamuntuk da reng Komite ning Matas a Pamagaral ning Senadu ampo ning Kamara da reng Pekakatawan kaugne ning karelang obra antimong talapamuntuk ning karelang komite.
Tutuldu lang Rehenting Magaral o Student Regent deng magaral ning UP, kapamilata’ning General Assembly of Student Councils (Pangkabilugan a Kapulungan da reng Sanggunian da reng Magaral). Atin la muring Rehenting Talaturu deng talatur ning mabilug a unibersidad. Itang pekakatawan da reng miyari (alumni) ya pin ing Pamuntuk ning U.P. Alumni Association. Deng aliwang galame ning Lupung da reng Rehenti, tutulduan no ning pamuntuk ning Filipinas. 
Aniang 2007, deng makatuki ilang galame ning Lupung da reng Rehenti o Board of Regents:
Ing Kalihim ing Unibersidad (Secretary of the University) ampo ning Lupung da reng Rehenti yapin i Dr. Loudes E. Abadingo, propesor ning Political Science king Department of Social Sciences, U.P. Manila.
Atin yang pamikasundu king Boston University School of Public Health king Boston, MA, USA ing School of Public Health king UP Manila. Paintulutan nong gawang course work king UP Manila kilub ning metung a semestri ampong international field practicum king Filipinas deng mapilang magaral ibat king Boston University.
Programang Akademiku.
Miyayampang yang aduang dalan apat a pulu’t anam (246) a kursung king kolehiyu ing unibersidad, at atlung dalan anam a pulu’t aduang (362) kursung graduadu, ing maragul dili karen ngang unibersidad ning bangsa.
Ing sentrung campus king Diliman ing dakal dili programang akademiku, kabang kilala no man kareng partikular a kursu o programa o kursu. 
Atin yang limampulu’t pitung (57) unit a magkalub titulu (degree-granting unit) king mabilug a sistema ing Unibersidad. Malyari yang maging kolehiyu (college), eskuela (school) o instituto (institute) iti a miyayampang kursung pang-kolehiyu o graduadu. King campus ning Los Baños, ating makakawaning Graduate School para kareng programang pang-graduadu king agriculture, forestry, basic sciences, mathematics ampong statistics, development economics and management, agrarian studies ampong human ecology. 
The University has 4,135 faculty, trained locally and abroad with 75% having graduate degrees. 
Atin yang apat a libu, dinalan atlung pulu’t limang (4,135) a talaturu ing Unibersidad, a mituru king Filipinas at kilual na niti, at 75% kareti, maki titulung graduadu (graduate degrees) . Metung ya kareng aduang unibersidad king Filipinas a kayanib king ASEAN University Network, at ya kabud a unibersidad king Filipinas a makaugne king ASEAN-European University Network ampo king Association of Pacific Rim Universities. 
Maki ranggu yang pang aduang dalan siyam a pulu’t siyam (299) ing Unibersidad king Times Higher Education Supplement Rankings kanitang 2006, at pang apat a pulu’t walu (48) king Asiaweek's Best Universities in Asia a taulingmilimbag kanitang 2000, at uli na niti, maliaring sabiang iti ing matas dili ranggu kareng unibersidad ning Filipinas kareng aduang talaan, dapot mababa ya ranggu karas king pamanyaliksik ampo king pibandian a pinansial (financial resources) . Pepabalu ning Unibersidad, kapamilatan nang Pamuntuk Emerlinda Román, a e na kaburian ing makiabe king THES Ranking.

Universidad ning Pilipinas, Los Baños:
Ing University of the Philippines Los Baños (a mayayaus muring UPLB, UP Los Baños, ampong Elbi) metung yang pangmaldang unibersidad a atyu kareng balen ning Los Baños ampong Bay king lalawigan ning Laguna, manga 64 kilometru king mauli aslagan ning Menila. Mágbalik ing kayang penibatan king a tetag na anyang 1909 ning bang itaguyud ing pamanigaral ampong pamanyalugsug king agrikultura ("agricultural education and research") king Filipinas. Ing botanistang Americanung i Edwin Copeland ing migsilbing mumunang dekano. Pormal yang mitátag ing UPLB kanitang 1972 kaybat ning pamisanmetung ning UPCA ampo reng apat a unit a makabasi king Los Baños ampong Diliman ning Universidad ning Pilipinas (UP) units.
Maragul ing mega nang papil ning unibersidad king agrikultura ampong bioteknolohiya uling king kayang pamanimunang pamagaral king pamaglahing tanaman (plant breeding) ampong bioengineering, partikular king pamanalkus o development da reng tanaman a matas a pupul (high-yielding) ampong maki resistensya kareng pesti (pest-resistant). Antimong pamangilala king kayang obra, mirinan yang galal a Ramon Magsaysay Award para king Pamikaintindi da reng Bangsa ("International Understanding") anyang 1977. Syam kareng kayang sentru ning pamanyalugsug ("research centers") ing makikilalang Sentru ning Kabyasnan ("Centers of Excellence") kapamilatan da reng kautusang pampamuntuk o "presidential decree". UPLB hosts a number of local and international research centers, including the International Rice Research Institute (IRRI), ASEAN Center for Biodiversity, World Agroforestry Centre, and the Southeast Asian Regional Center for Graduate Study and Research in Agriculture (SEARCA).
Miyayampang yang maygit dinalan (100) a programang magkalub titulu ("degree programs") ing UPLB kareng miyayaliwang sanga ning kabyasnan kapamilatan da reng kayang syam a kolehiyo ampong adwang eskwela ("schools"). Anyang Octbre 2010, walu kareng kayang yunit a akademiku deng kinilala ning Commission on Higher Education (CHED) antimong Sentru ning Kabyasnan ("Centers of Excellence"), ampong adwang Sentru ning Pamanalkus '('Centers of Development"), anya ing UPLB ing dakal dili Sentru ning Kabyasnan (miyayabe la reng yunit a akademiko ampong pang-pamanyalugsugresearch) kareng unibersidad king mabilug a Filipinas.
Makikilala la reng kareng miyayaliwang sanga ning kabyasnan. Kayabe la keti labing atlung (13) siyentistang mirinan galal a National Scientist of the Philippines, kayabe kareng sinambut king UN IPCC (winner of the 2007 Nobel Peace Prize), Palanca Award, ampong talapanibala king pulitika ampong negosyu.
Kasalesayan.
Lon ya ing University of the Philippines System history
Centers of Excellence.
"Pakilawe ya ing bayu ye i-edit ini."
Ketang Octubre 2006, pinili ne ning Commission on Higher Education ing UPLB antimong Centrung Manimuna (Center of Excellence) king Biologia, Quimica, Comunicaciun, Matematica, Agricultura, Ingenieria Agricultural, Pamiturung Panggubat (Forestry Education) at Pamiturung Pamanulung Animal (Veterinary Education). Metung ya muring Centru ning Pamanalkus (Center of Development) king Fisica, Information Technology ampong Estadistica ing Universidad. . Pinili ne murin ning Comision ing UPLB antimong Centru ning Pamanyaliksik a Panglabuad para kareng Labuad a IV at V (Zonal Research Center for Regions IV and V) .
Anam lang research institute ning UPLB deng mekilalang Centrung Manimuna kapamilatan ning Presidential Decree uli ning karelang maulagang inambag king pambansang panyulung. Deti ila pin ding Institute of Plant Breeding, Institute of Food Science and Technology, National Crop Protection Center, National Institute of Molecular Biology and Biotechnology (BIOTECH-UPLB/UP-BIOTECH), Institute of Animal Science, and the Farming Systems and Soil Resources Institute. King pangkabilugan, atin yang atlung pulu’t atlung (33) centru ning pamanyaliksik at pamanyane (research and training centers) ing Universidad, a kilala king labuad (region) uling king pamanigaral da king ciencia at tecnologia. .
Pamangilala da reng Aliwang Bangsa.
Metung ya mu ing UPLB kareng atlung pipagaralan king Asiang tinanggap pamangilala antimong institucion kareng Ramon Magsaysay Award. Tinanggap yang galal ing Colegiu ning Agricultura kanitang 1977 para king kayang misnang ulagang papil king panyulung ning continenti king pamanyaliksik at pamiturung pang-agricultura. Iti murin ing karinan ning magdili-diling pahayagan a kikilalanan ning Thomson Scientific/Institute for Scientific Information (ISI), ing The Philippine Agriculturist. journal
Kayantabe no ning Universidad king pamanyaliksik at programang pamakilibe deng Asian Development Bank, Cornell University, Yale University, Purdue Universityat Michigan State University,
bukud pa kareng aliwa.
Ing UPLB ing centru ning pamanyaliksik at pamagaral ning biotechnology king Mawli-Aslagang Asia (Southeast Asia). Keti la makabasi deng e kumulang king apat a centru ning pamanyaliksik at extension – deng International Rice Research Institute (IRRI), APEC Center for Technology Exchange and Training for Small and Medium Enterprises (ACTETSME), Southeast Asian Regional Center for Graduate Study and Research in Agriculture (SEAMEO-SEARCA), ampo ing bayu pamung mibusning Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) Center for Biodiversity.
Deng Institucion ning Pamanyalugsug ning Filipinas.
Makabasi la king UPLB deng local a institucion antimo reng buro (bureau) ning Departamentu ning Ciencia at Techologia ampo ing Departamentu ning Agricultura. Maki tanggapan ya murin keti ing Philippine Rice Research Institute ampo ing Philippine Carabao Center
Pipagaralan a Sekundaryo.
Agyang e ya kayabe king UPLB, atyu ing Philippine High School for the Arts/National Arts Center king lugal a panibalan ning UPLB.
Lon la murin deti.
Other Ramon Magsaysay Awardees:

Viswanathan Anand:
I V. Anand or Anand Viswanathan, a keraklang ausan dang Viswanathan Anand (, ; mibait 11 Dicembre 1969) metung yang Grandmaster a Indian king chess ampong kasalukuyang Kampeon ning Yatu king Chess. Mekatalima neng sinambut i Anand king World Chess Championship (2000, 2007, 2008, 2010, 2012), at ya ing alang salungat a Kampeon ning Yatu manibat kanitang 2007. 
Ya ing tinalan king FIDE World Chess Championship manibat 2000 anggang 2002, anyang panaun e mepitna la king titulung pangyatu. Ya ing meging alang sasalungat a Kampeon ning Yatu anyang 2007 at pemingwa ne ing kayang titulu laban kang Vladimir Kramnik anyang 2008. Kaybat, matagumpe neng pemingwa ing kayang titulu king World Chess Championship 2010 laban kang Veselin Topalov ampo king World Chess Championship 2012 laban kang Boris Gelfand. Antimong makalukluk a kampeon, arapan ne ing sumambut king datang a Candidates Tournament king World Chess Championship 2013.
Metung ya kareng anam a talapamyalung king kasalesayan a mekabalbal king markang 2800 i Anand king listaan a FIDE rating, at anyang Abril 2007 king edad a 37, ya ing meging manimuna king yatu king mumunang pamikatagun. Mekatalima ya kareng anam a pamikatagun king babo ning pamagranggung pangyatu, manibat Abril 2007 anggang Julio 2008, at telan ne ing mumunang ranggu king kabilugan kareng labing limang (15). Anyang Octubre 2008, milwal ya king ranggung mumunang atlu king mumunang pamikatagun manibat anyang Julio 1996. Ikwa neng pasibayung Anand ing mumunang ranggu king yatu anyang 1 Noviembre 2010, anyang simbut ne ing kasalukuyan a mumuna king yatung i Magnus Carlsen king Bilbao Masters, oneng sibli ne kang Carlsen ing posisyon a iti anyang Julio 2011.
I Anand ing meging mumunang grandmaster ning India anyang 1988. Ya murin ing mumunang tinanggap king Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna Award anyang 1991–92, ing pekamatas a dangalan ning India king pasiknangan. Anyang 2007, tinggap ne ing kadwang pekamatas a galal ning India para kareng sibilan,ing Padma Vibhushan, at uli na nita, ya ing mumunang tau king pasiknangan ing tinanggap king dangalan a ita king amlat ning India. 
Linarawan neng Lubomir Kavalek i Anand a pekamaleparan belwan a kampeon ning yatu king kabilugan ning panaun ("the most versatile world champion ever"), uling bukud mung i Anand kareng sablang talapamyalung ing sinambut king kampeonatong pangyatu kareng dakal a format, kayabe ya ing Tournament, Match, Rapid, ampong Knockout chess.

François Hollande:
I François Gérard Georges Nicolas Hollande (; mibait 12 Agosto 1954) ing ka-24 (kadwang pulu't apat) a Pamuntuk ning Francia, ampo ing "ex officio" Co-Prince ning Andorra. Bayu iti, migsilbi yang Mumunang Kalihim ning (First Secretary) French Socialist Party manibat 1997 anggang 2008 and ampong metung a Diputado ning Kapulungang Pambangsa ning Francia (National Assembly of France) para king Corrèze's 1st Constituency manibat 1988 anggang 1993, at pasibayu manibat 1997 anggang 2012. Migsilbi ya naman antimong Alkalde ning Tulle manibat 2001 anggang 2008 ampong Pamuntuk ning Pangkabilugan a Konseho ning Corrèze manibat 2008 anggang 2012. 
Miyalal yang Pamuntuk ning France anyang 6 Mayo 2012, anyang simbut ne ing makalukluk a i Nicolas Sarkozy, at pormal yang linukluk anyang 15 Mayo. Ya ing kadwang Socialistang Pamuntuk ning Kalimang Republica ning Francia, kaybat nang François Mitterrand a migsilbi manibat 1981 anggang 1995.

Kolehiyong Dominikano ning Tarlac:
Ing Dominican College of Tarlac metung yang Katolikong eskwelang tetag nang Padre Mariano Sablay anyang 1947 king Capas, Tarlac, Filipinas.
Mitátag ya antimong San Nicolas Academy, a maki 35 (atlung pulu't limang) magaral. Ngeni, king lalam ning lagyung Dominican College of Tarlac (DCT), atin neng maygit 2000 (adwang libung) magaral, at maygit king 100 (dinalan) a empleadu. 
I Santo Domingo, ing talatátag ning Order of Preachers(O.P.), ing patron ning DCT.
Amlat.
Mitátag ya ing San Nicolas Academy anyang Febrero 14, 1947. Atlung pulu't lima (35) la reng magaral a migpalista para kareng klasi para king mumuna ampong kadwang banwa (first and second year classes), a megawa king kumbintu ning lumang parokya. Merapat ing mumunang pangayari o graduation anyang 1950, nung kapilan labi lang apat deng meyari. Anyang 1960, deng Madreng Dominican ing tinalan kng pamanibala ning akademya, at i Sr. Rosalina Mirabueno, O.P., ing Principal. 
Anyang 1967, miyalilan ya king Dominican College ing lagyu ning pipagaralan, pamamye galang kang Santo Domingo.
March 1973 saw the last commencement exercises under the Religious Missionaries of St. Dominic. From then on, Daughters of St. Dominic took over the reigns of the school with Bishop Jesus J. Sison at the helm.
Anyang Marzo 1973, milyari ing tawling pangayari king lalam da reng Religious Missionaries of St. Dominic. Manibat kanita, deng Daughters of St. Dominic ing tinalan king eskwela, king lalam nang Obispo Jesus J. Sison. 
Kanitang 1980, migpasya ya ing Principal Sr. Carmen Tiamzon, O.P. a lalu yang makapagsilbi king komunidad ning Capas ing eskwela kapamilatan ning pamiyampang kursung bukud king elementarya ampong sekundaryo. Ing migumpisa antimong kursu king pamagmakinilya o pamag-type, meging maleparan, at sinaklo king Associate in Computer Secretarial (ACS), Bachelor of Arts (AB), Bachelor of Elementary Education (BEEd), and Bachelor of Secondary Education (BSEd). Mirinan lang pamangilala ning kapamahalan deng mebanggit a kursu anyang 1985, 1997 ampong 1999.
Anyang 2005, mirinan yang kapaintulutan ing DCT bang miyampang aliwang kursu antimon reng Hotel and Restaurant Management, Practical Nursing ampong Contact Center Training Course. Kaybat ning pabanwa, miragdag ya ing Bartending (200 oras) ampo ing Housekeeping (400 oras), at anyang Marzo 19, 2007, miyabe ya ing kursung Finishing Course for Call Center Agents (100 oras). Taglus-taglus ing pamandagdag ning DCT kareng yampang nang kursu ampong programa.
Kapatad a Pipagaralan.

Siena School of Naga, Naga City, Cebu <br>
Holy Rosary School of Pardo, Pardo, Cebu City, Cebu <br>
San Pedro College, Davao City <br>
Sta. Catalina College of Legarda, Sampaloc, Manila <br>
Camiling Catholic School, Camiling, Tarlac

College of the Holy Spirit Manila:
Ing College of the Holy Spirit Manila, o kabud namu CHSM, metung yang kolehiyong co-educational king Menila, Filipinas. Metung ya kareng pekamatwang kolehiyong pambabai king bangsa anggang 2005, ing banwa nung kapilan tinanggap yang lalaki para king departamentong sekundaryo o high school. Anyang banwang 2006, tinanggap la muring lálaki king departamentong kolehiyo. 

Don Honorio Ventura Technological State University:
Ing Don Honorio Ventura Technological State University a sadyang Don Honorio Ventura College of Arts and Trades metung yang universidad a pang-estado king a State University in the Filipinas. Ing manimuna nang campus atyu king Bacolor, Pampanga. Awsan deng "Oldest Vocational School in Far East Asia" (Pekamumunang Pipagaralan a Bokasyonal king Marayung Aslagan ning Asia), at mitátag ya anyang 1861.
Kursung Yampang.
Bacolor Campus.
