Mexico Campus.
Amlat.
The DHVTSU MEXICO CAMPUS minuna yang mitátag antimong extension campus anyang terminu nang sadyang Pamuntuk Ernesto T. Nicdao, panaun nung kapilan makabili ya pa murin king panganib king lahar ing manimunang campus king Bacolor.
Migumpisa ing operasyon ning campus anyang banwang akademiko 1997-1998, at atin 231 estudyante. Deng mumunang kursu ila pin deng Bachelor of Science in Industrial Education, Bachelor of Science in Industrial Technology, Bachelor of Science in Civil, Electrical ampong Mechanical Engineering, ampong programang tidwa ampong titlung banwa king technological education.
Miyampang la mu deng Baccalaureate program anyang banwang akademikong 1997-2004. Sindu do retang kursung tidwa ampong titlu banwa angga king kadwang semestre ning 2007.
Apulu neng banwang makabuklat ing eskwela, oneng uling mebawas la bilang deng lulub anyang banwang akademikong 2007-2008, nung kapilan miras la mung 107 deng magaral, pansamantala dang tiknang ing operasyon ning campus.
Uling king masipit a kaburyan ampong pakisabi da reng memalen, sindu ning eskwela ing kayang serbisyu anyang banwang akademiko 2008-2009 kapamilatan ning pamagpursigi nang Cong. Aurelio D. Gonzales Jr., pekakatawan ning katlung distrito ning Pampanga, i Aurelio D. Gonzales Jr., ampo ing Pamuntuk ning DHVTSU, i Dr. Enrique G. Baking.
Anyang Junio 2008, pormal yang mibuklat pasibayu ing campus antimong satellite campus. Miyampang la ngan deng kursu king manimunang campus. Maki bilang lang apat a ralan limang pulu't apat deng minunang migpalista (454). I Dr. Nemesio Y. Tiongson, a ya pa muring makalukluk, ing mituldung mumunang Campus Director anyang Agosto 2007.

Pundasyong Universidad ning Angeles:
Ing Pundasyong Universidad ning Angeles (Angeles University Foundation) (a papakuyad da king AUF), metung yang pribadung Romano Katolikong universidad king Angeles Lakanbalen, Filipinas. Metung yang pipagaralan a alang stock ampong alang tubu a mitátag anyang Mayo 25, 1962 kapamilatan nang G. Agustin P. Angeles, Dr. Barbara Y. Angeles ampo ing familia ra. Kaybat ning kulang king siam a banwa ning pangatikdo, mirinan yang kabilyan a universidad ing institusyon anyang Abril 16, 1971 king upaya ning Sakdalan ning Pamagaral, Kultura ampong Pasiknangan (Department of Education, Culture and Sports). 
Metung ya kareng ditak mung universidad king Filipinas a maki kabilyan a magsarili o autonomous, at mapilan kareng kayang programa ing kikilalanan nang Sentru ning Kabyasnan ampong Sentru ning Panyulung (Centers of Excellence and Centers of Development) ning Commission on Higher Education.
Ngeni, ing AUF ing maki pekamatas a dake da reng talaturung maki ayaring gradwadu (graduate degree) king rehiyon ning Kalibudtang Luzon (Central Luzon), at metung karing pekamatas king region, Filipinas. Deting kwalipikasyon ing migsilbing asyas ning kayang matas a uri ning pamanuru ampong pamanyalugsug, antimo reng: Kabilyan a Magsarili (Autonomous Status) manibat anyang 2003; Institutional Quality Assurance Monitoring and Evaluation (IQUAME) certification ibat king Commission on Higher Education (CHED); Pamangilala ibat king Philippine Accrediting Association of Schools, Colleges and Universities (PAASCU); ISO 9001-2000 Certification by TUV-SUD; Sentru ning Kabyasnan )Center of Excellence) king Teknolohiyang Impormasyon (Information Technology) ampong Pamagsane kareng Talaturu (Teacher Education) a kinilala ning Komisyon ning Matas a Pamagaral (Commission on Higher Education); ampong Sentru ning Panyulung (Center of Development) king Inhinenyeriang Pangkomputer (Computer Engineering) ampong Nursing ibat king pareung sanga ning kapamahalan. Ngening kalimampulung banwa ning kayang pamitikdo, atin ne king pangkabilugan anam a pulu't atlung (63) programang akademikong mirarake kareng walung kolehiyo, bukud pa kareng eskwela ning Medisina ampong Leyi (medical and law school).

School of the Holy Spirit:
Ing School of the Holy Spirit of Quezon City o SHSQC metung yang pribadong pipagaralan a Katolikong bukud mung pambabai (private all-girls Catholic school) king BF Homes, Quezon Lakanbalen, Filipinas. Palakad de reng Missionary Sisters, Servants of the Holy Spirit, metung a kongregasyon a tetag ning santong Aleman, i Arnold Janssen.

Arnold Janssen:
I San Arnold Janssen, S.V.D., (Noviembre 5, 1837 – Enero 15, 1909) metung yang Katolikong pari ampong misyonero, a kikilalanang metung a santo. Kilala yang dili uli ning kayang pamitátag ning Society of the Divine Word, metung a kongregasyon a misyonero ning Iglesia Katolika, balu ra murin king lagyung "Divine Word Missionaries", bukud pa kareng kongregasyon para kareng bábai. 

Ray Bradbury:
I Ray Douglas Bradbury (Agosto 22, 1920 – Junio 5, 2012) metung yang Americanung talasulat king fantasy, horror, science fiction, ampong mysterio writer. Pekakilala ya king kayang nobelang dystopian a "Fahrenheit 451" (1953), ampo reng kayang makuyad a salitang (short stories) science fiction mitipun king "The Martian Chronicles" (1950) ampo king "The Illustrated Man" (1951). I Bradbury ing metung kareng pekasikat ampong matas kabilyan a talasulat a Americanu ning science fiction ampong aliwang uri ning speculative fiction anyang kadwang pulung siglu. Dakal kareng obra na ing miyalis king telebisyon ampong pelikula.

Joey Santiago:
I Joseph Alberto "Joey" Santiago (mibait Junio 10, 1965) metung yang Filipino-American a gitarista ampong kompositor. Aktibu ya manibat 1986 i Santiago, a pekakilala antimong manimunang manimunang gitarista (lead guitarist) ning Americanung bandang alternative rock a Pixies. Kaybat nang mikawa-kawani ning banda anyang 1993, ginawa yang musical score i Santiago para kareng dokumentaryung pelikula ampong telebisyon, at tetag ne ing The Martinis kayabe ya ing kayang asawa, i Linda Mallari. Minambag ya mu naman kareng album nang Charles Douglas ampo ing sadyang kabanda king Pixies, i Frank Black. Sindu na ing kayang papil antimong manimunang gitaristang Santiago anyang miabe-abe lang pasibayu deng Pixies anyang 2004.

The Martinis:
Deng The Martinis metung lang bandang a mitátag king Los Angeles, California anyang 1993. Deng kayanib king banda ila pin di Joey Santiago ampo ing kayang asawang i Linda Mallari. Migpalwal nong metung a album lalam ning markang Cooking Vinyl, Artist Direct, ampong Distracted/BMG. Ing karelang kantang "Free" mibili ya king pelikulang Empire Records, at atyu king soundtrack album ning pelikula.

Aarau:
Ing Aarau (, locally ing buntuk balen (capital, cabecera o capitolio) ning canton ning Aargau king Pangulung Switzerland. Ing lakanbalen o ciudad murin ing buntuk balen ning distrito ning Aarau. Mágsalita yang Aleman o German, at keraklan Protestanti ya. Atyu ing Aarau king Swiss plateau, king lambak ning Aar, king wanan nang pampang ning ilug, ampo king mauling kabitisan da reng kabundukan ning Jura, at atyu king albugan ning Zurich. Makalele ya ing munisipalidad king Canton ning Solothurn king albugan.Iti ing kadwang pekamaragul a lakanbalen o ciudad king Aargau kaybat ning Wettingen. Anyang umpisa ning 2010, ing Rohr megi neng karulun (suburb) ning Aarau.

Maria Sharapova:
I Maria Yuryevna Sharapova ( ; mibait April 19, 1987) metung yang Russian a propesyonal a talapamyalung tennis player. Anyang Junio 11, 2012 maki ranggu yang world no. 1. Metung yang residenti ning Estados Unidos manibat anyang 1994 i Sharapova, a sinambut 27 (adwang pulu't pitung) titulung WTA single, kayabe la reng apat a titulung Grand Slam single. Sinambut ya mu naman king WTA Tour Championships in 2004 king mapupus ning banwa. Dininan neng ranggu ning Women's Tennis Association i Sharapovang Mumuna king yatu (World No. 1) king singles kareng limang mikakawaning pamikatagun. Megi yang mumuna king yatu (world no. 1) king mumunang pamikatagun anyang Agosto 22, 2005, at ikwa ne king kalimang pamikatagun anyang Junio 11, 2012. Mekatapitu neng kayabe kareng Grand Slam finals, at maki record yang 4–3. 
Minuna yang sinikat anting propesyonal i Sharapova kanitang 2004 king edad a 17, nung kapilan simbut ne ing mekatadwang kampeon ampong pekapapaboran (top seed) a i Serena Williams king 2004 Wimbledon final para king kayang mumunang titulung Grand Slam singles. Anyang sinambut ya, linub ya king top 10 king WTA Rankings. Kaybat na nita, sinambut yang manimunang titulu king 2006 US Open ampong 2008 Australian Open, bayu ya apulung bulan a mengapilitang tuknang mamyalung uli ning balik-balik a kapinsalan king pago, a bandang tawli mengaylangan operasyun anyang Octubre 2008. Migbalik ya i Sharapova anyang Mayo 2009, a maki ranggung no. 126 uling king malwat nang pangawala. Manibat anyang pamagbalik na, sinambut yang walung titulung singles i Sharapova (anya miras lang 27 deng pangkabilugan king karera na), kayabe ya ing kapat nang titulung grand slam king 2012 French Open, a mengumpletung king pangkarerang grand slam, at mibalik ya king ranggung manimuna o no. 1 ranking.
Migsilbi neng modelu i Sharapova, kayabe ne ing kayang pangayabe king "Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue". Linage ne kareng dakal a advertisement, kayabe no ring Nike, Prince ampong Canon, at ya ing modelu da reng mapilang fashion house, at kayabe ya kareng manimuna ing Cole Haan. I Sharapova ing maralas dang diling panintunan a atleta o "most searched-for athlete" king Yahoo! anyang 2005 ampong 2008. Manibat anyang Febrero 2007, metung yang United Nations Development Programme Goodwill Ambassador, a makatutuk keraklan king Chernobyl Recovery and Development Programme. Anyang Junio 2011, mepili yang metung kareng "30 Legends of Women's Tennis: Past, Present and Future" kapamilatan ning "Time", at anyang Marzo 2012, mepili yang metung kareng "100 Greatest of All Time" king Tennis Channel.

Lamao:
Ing Lamao metung yang primeru klasing barangay king balen ning Limay, Bataan, king Filipinas.
Bariu.
Ing Lamao atin yang 14 barangay.

Rafael Nadal:
I Rafael "Rafa" Nadal Parera (; ) (mibait 3 Junio 1986) metung yang Espanyol a mamyalung tenis a propesyonal ampong sadyang mumuna king yatu. , ya kadwa agpang king Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP). Tuturing deng metung kareng mapyang diling talapamyalung king mabilug a panaun; ing kayang tagumpe king clay dela na kaya ing palayong "The King of Clay", at meging sangkan kareng dakal a expertung ituring yang mapyang diling talapamyalung king clay court king kasalesayan.
Sinambut yang labing metung a titulung Grand Slam singles, i Nadal, kayabe la reng pitung titulung French Open, ing 2008 Olympic gold medal king singles, metung a record a 21 ATP World Tour Masters 1000 tournament, at kayabe ya king Spain Davis Cup team a sinambut king 2004, 2008, 2009 ampong 2011. Akumpletu ne ing Career Grand Slam kapamilatan ning pamanyambut king 2010 US Open, ing kapitu king kasalesayan, ampo ing pekayanak king Open Era, a manikwa kaniti. Ya ing kadwang talapamyalung a lalaking makakumpletu king Career Golden Slam (sinambut apat a Grand Slam ampong Olympic gold medal) kaybat nang Andre Agassi. Atin yang e kumulang king adwang Grand Slam king balang surface i Rafael Nadal, a yang kadwa mung talapamyalung kaybat nang Mats Wilander a manikwa king tagumpeng iti. Ya murin ing kadwang talapamyalung a lalaking sumambut king sanumang Grand Slam makatapitung besis o ukdu, at mekapante kareng pitu nang titulung Pete Sampras king Wimbledon.
Mekata-32 ya sinambut i Nadal anyang 2008, manibat king 2008 Masters Series Hamburg paras king 2008 Western & Southern Financial Group Masters and Women's Open, kayabe ing Hamburg, ing French Open (nung nu ala yang tebiling set), ing Queen's Club, ing mumuna nang titulu king Wimbledon, ampo ing Rogers Cup. Anyang 2012, king pamanyambut na king Monte-Carlo Masters, megi yang magdili-diling talapamyalung a sinambut makatawalung tukituking ukdu o besis edisyon king sanumang tournament king kasalesayan ning tennis, at ing kadwang talapamyalung a sinambut metung a tournament makatawalung ukdu king Open Era. I Nadal ing mumunang talapamyalung king kasalesayan ning tennis a agnan-agnan a tinalan Grand Slams king clay, dikut ampong hardcourt. Ya murin ing mumunang (ampong magdilidiling talapamyalung angga king salukuyan) a sinambut atlung tuki-tuking titulung Grand Slam kareng atlung miyayaliwang surface. I Nadal ing kadwa king ranggu king yatu, kaybat nang Roger Federer, kareng record a 160ng tuki-tuking duminggu, bayu ne ikwa ing manimunang ranggu, a telan na manibat 18 Agosto 2008 anggang 5 Julio 2009. He regained the world No.1 ranking on 7 June 2010, after winning his fifth French Open title. Telan ne anggang 3 Julio 2011, anyang elilan neng Novak Djokovic antimong manimuna king yatu. I Nadal ing atyu king kadwang ranggu king yatu para king ATP record a 238 a duminggu (anyang 11 Junio 2012).

Martin Cruz Smith:
I Martin Cruz Smith (mibait Noviembre 3, 1942) metung yang Americanung nobelistang misteryu. 

Internet Movie Database:
Ing Internet Movie Database (IMDb) metung yang database ning impormasyon tungkul kareng pelikula, programang telebisyon, tauan king produksyon, pyalung a video ampong pikudta o piksyonal a tauan kareng akakit o biswal a mediang libangan o entertainment a online o atyu king Aptas o Internet. Metung ya kareng pekasikat a karing pekasikat a pupuntalan king Aptas a maki kaugnayan king libangan o entertainment, a maki maygit dinalan a milyung (100,000,000) a makabukud o "unique" a pamagbisita balang bulan, at metung a masikan ampong daragul a presensya kareng mobile o cellphone. Mibuklat ya ing IMDb anyang Octobre 17, 1990, at anyang 1998 ikwa ne ning Amazon.com.

Roger Federer:
I Roger Federer () (mibat 8 Agosto 1981) metung yang Swiss a mamyalung a propesyonal a ATP mumuna king yatu para king record a 237 duminggu manibat 2 Febrero 2004 anggang 18 Agosto 2008. Telanan neng Federer ing ranggung pekamumuna (#1) kilub ding 285 a duminggu king kabilugan, paruminggung mas makuyad king record a 286 a duminggung ikwa nang Pete Sampras. Anyang 18 Junio 2012, ya ing katlu king yatu (World No. 3). Sinambut neng record a labing anam (16) a titulung Grand Slam singles i Federer. Metung ya kareng pitung mamyalung a lálaking sinambut king career Grand Slam ampong metung kareng atlu (kayabe ya i Andre Agassi ampo i Rafael Nadal) a sumambut kaniti kareng atlung miyayaliwang babo o surface (clay, dikut, ampong hard court). Ya kabud lalaking mamyalung king kasalesayan ning tennis a míras king laban pang-titulu (title match) ning balang Grand Slam tournament e kukulang king limang ukdu o besis ampo king final ning balang metung kareng syam a ATP Masters 1000 tournaments. Agpang kareng dakal a mag-analisa king pasiknangan (sports analyst), kritiko king tennis (tennis critic) ampong sadya ampong kasalukuyang mamyalung, i Federer ing mapyang diling mamyalung tennis king kabilugan ning panaun.
King kayang karera, linaban ne i Federer kareng e milagpusan a adwang pulu't atlung (30) Grand Slam tournament final, kayabe ya ing record a apulung tuki-tuki, at atyu kareng labing walu (18) kareng labing syam (19) a final manibat ketang 2005 Wimbledon Championship angga king 2010 Australian Open, ing magdili-dili mung pamibukud ya pin ing 2008 Australian Open. Ya ing tatalan king record a miras yang semifinals o mas matas pa kareng adwang pulu't atlung (23) tuki-tuking Grand Slam tournament kilub ning lima ampong kapitnang banwa, manibat anyang 2004 Wimbledon Championships angga king 2010 Australian Open. At the 2012 French Open, he reached a record 31st Grand Slam semifinal (tied with Jimmy Connors) and a record 32nd consecutive Grand Slam quarterfinal. He also holds the record for most match wins in Grand Slam tournaments (237).
Sinambut ya i Federer kareng record a anam a ATP World Tour Finals ampong adwang pulung (27) ATP World Tour Masters 1000 tournament. Simbut ne murin ing gintung medalya king Olympics king kayabe ya ing kabalen nang i Stanislas Wawrinka king 2008 Summer Olympic Games. Walu yang banwang taglus-taglus (2003–2010) kadwang pekamatas (top 2) king ranggu king mapupus ning banwa ampong syam (2003–2011) king katlung pekamatas (Top 3), metung muring record kareng mamyalung a lálaki. Ing panga mikaribal da di Rafael Nadal ampong Novak Djokovic ing tuturing dang mapyang dili king kabilugan ning panaun king pyalung a tennis, at tuturing da pang maki "Trivalry" kareng atlu. Maragul ing pamangalang da reng fans kang Federer, at iti makalto king kayang pamanyambut king "ATPWorldTour.com" Fans' Favorite Award king record a syam a besis o ukdu (2003–2011) ampo ing Stefan Edberg Sportsmanship Award (nung nu deng mismung mamyalung ing magbotu) king record a pitung ukdu (2004–2009, 2011). Simbut ne muring Federer ing Arthur Ashe Humanitarian of the Year Award anyang 2006. Kanitang 2011, miyalal yang kadwang pekapagtiwalan ampong gagalangan a tau king yatu, kadwa mu kang Nelson Mandela.
Uling kareng tagumpe nang Federer king karera na king tennis, mepili yang Laureus World Sportsman of the Year kareng apat a tuki-tuking banwa (2005–2008) at anyang 2012 linwal yang pekamatas kareng |100 greatest tennis players of all time]]" (lalaki o babai) agpang king Tennis Channel. Maralas, awsan deng Federer Express o pepakuyad king Fed Express, o FedEx, the Swiss Maestro, o kabud na mû Maestro.

Chris Pine:
I Chris Pine (mibait Agostu 26, 1980) metung yang Americanung artista. Bantug ya king kayang genapan a papil keng sineng "Star Trek".

Alan Turing:
I Alan Mathison Turing, OBE, FRS ( ; 23 Junio 1912 – 7 Junio 1954), metung yang Ingles a matematiku, logician, cryptanalyst ampong computer scientist. Maragul ya impluwensiya king pamanalkus ning computer science, at minye yang pormalisasyon ning konseptuo ning "algorithm" ampong "computation" kapamilatan ning Turing machine, a maragul papil king pamaglalang ning modernung computer. Dakal la reng sasabing i Turing ing ibpa ning computer science ampo ning artificial intelligence.
Anyang Kadwang Gerang Pangkabilugan, megobra ya i Turing para king Government Code and Cypher School (GCCS) king Bletchley Park, Britain's ing sentru na para king codebreaking ning Britania. Mika panaun a yang meging pamuntuk ning Hut 8, ing sangang manibala king naval cryptanalysis a Aleman. Mekapaglalang yang manilan a paralan ba lang lutasan deng cipher a Aleman, kayabe ya ing kaparalanan ning bombe, metung a makinang electromechanical a makapanintun pamituldu (setting) para king Enigma machine.
fat boy jim ning gera, megobra ya king National Physical Laboratory, nung nu ne lelang ing metung kareng mumunang disenyu para king stored-program computer, ing ACE. Anyang 1948, megobra ya i Turing king Max Newman's Computing Laboratory king Manchester University, nung nu ya sinaup king pamanalkus da reng Manchester computers at megi yang interesadu king mathematical biology. Sinulat yang artikulu tungkul king batayan nang kemikal ning morphogenesis, at inula ("predicted") ne ing tungkul kareng oscillating chemical reactionantimo ing Belousov–Zhabotinsky reaction, a mumuna rang inobserban anyang dekadang 1960.
Uli ning pangabinabai nang Turing, midalum ya anyang 1952, panuan nung kapilan bawal la pa deng dapat a homosexual king Britania. Tinggap na ing pamanulu kapamilatan da reng hormone a pambabai (chemical castration) antimong alternatibu ning pangasukul. Mete ya anyang 1954, maygit mu king adwang duminggu bayu ing kayang pang apat a pulu't adwang aldo kebaitan, uli ning pangalasun ibat king cyanide. Agpang king pamagsyasat, migpakamate ya; para king kayang ima ampo reng aliwa, aksidenti ing kayang pangamate. Anyang 10 Setiembre 2009, kaybat ning kampanya king Aptas (Internet campaign), ing Pun Ministro ning Britania, i Gordon Brown, ginawa yang opisyal a pamanyad dispensa kapamilatan ning kapamahalan ning Britania para king pamagtratu kang Turing kaybat ning gera.

Taylor Lautner:
I Chris Pine (mibait Pebreru 11, 1992) metung yang Americanung artista. Bantug ya king kayang genapan a papil keng sineng "Twilight".

Mohamed Morsi:
I Muhammad Morsi Isa' al-Ayyat (, , mibait 20 Agosto 1951) metung yang politiku ning Ejiptu ampo ing miyalal a pamuntuk ning Ejiptu.
Manibat anyang Abril 30, 2011, ya ing Talapamuntuk (Chairman) ning Freedom and Justice Party (FJP), metung a partido politikal a tetag ning Muslim Brotherhood kaybat ning rebolusyon king Ejiptu anyang 2011. Manibat 2000 anggang 2005, Kayanib ne ning Parlamento. Tinagall ya antimong kandidatu ning FJP king alalan para king pamuntuk anyang Mayo anggang Junio 2012.
Anyang Junio 24, 2012, pepawagi ning komisyonadu para king alalan ning Ejiptung i Morsi ing sinambut king presidential runoff ning bangsa. Ditak mu ing lamang nang Morsi kang Ahmed Shafiq, ing tawling pun ministro lalam ning milako king upayang sadyang pamuntuk a i Hosni Mubarak. Sinabi ning komisyon a i Morsi menkwa yang 51.7 ning botu, kontra king 48.3 para kang Shafiq.
Kaybat neng pansamantalang dininan Morsi ing sarili nang alang anggang upaya ba neng "pamingwa" ("protect") ing bangsa anyang tauli nang dake ning Noviembre 2012, ampo ing upayang gawang leyi o batas ("legislate") a e ra susurian deng ukuman, pilan lang dalan deng migprotesta laban kaya anyang 2012. Kanitang 8 Diciembre 2012, binawi neng Morsi ing kayang kautusan a migparagul king upaya nang pang-pamuntuk ("presidential authority") at leko na ing pamanyuri da reng ukuman kareng kayang dekretu, nga na ning opisyal a Islamiku, oneng miral pa murin ing epektu na ning pamibulalag o deklarasyun. Sinabi nang George Isaac ning Constitution Party a ala yang yampang a bayu ing deklarasyun nang Morsi, tinggyan ne ning National Salvation Front a pamanyubuk a manos gamat, at agpang king 6 April Movement ampo kang Gamal Fahmi ning Egyptian Journalists Syndicate, migkulang ya king pamanarap king pekamaulagang ("fundamental") problema ning kapulungan a manigobra ba yang sumulat king punbatas o konstitusyon.
Anyang 30 Junio 2013, mikalat la king Ejiptu deng mangaragul a protestang manyad king pamagdimitir ning Pamuntuk. Iti mitukyan ya king bala ning ukbung nung e la mipakibatan deng adwan da reng magprotesta, lungub ya at mitikdong planu para king bangsa, kabang sasabyan nang e ne buring palakad ing bangsa. Some took this to mean a military coup, but the next day the army denied that they were referring to a possible military coup. Kayabe king planu ning militar ing pamagsuspindi king punbatas, ing pamaglako king parlamentu, ampo ing pamitatag king bayung administrasyun a panibalan ning pamuntuk da ding mahistradu ("chief justice").
Milako ya i Morsi anyang 3 Julio 2013 kapamilatan ning konsehung bibilugan ning ministru ning pamamingwa by a council consisting of ("defence minister"), i Abdul Fatah al-Sisi, i Mohamed ElBaradei, ing Grand Imam ning Al Azhar, i Ahmed el-Tayeb, ampo i Coptic a Papa Tawadros II.

Geochelone nigra abingdoni:
Ing Chelonoidis nigra abingdoni, a awsan da mu namang Abingdon Island tortoise, Abingdon Island giant tortoise, Pinta giant tortoise ampong Pinta Island tortoise metung yang subspecies ning paung Galápagos a katutubu king Ecuador a malyaring mewala na. Ing tawling balu rang indibidwal ning subspecies lalaki yang awsan dang Lonesome George (), who died on 24 June 2012. Anyang tawli nang banwa, balu re antimong pekamalagad a lelangan king yatu. Migsilbi yang masikan a sagisag i George ning pamagpursigi king pamanyagip king Galápagos ampo king mabilug a yatu.
Mumuna yang meyakit i George king isla ning Pinta anyang 1 Deciembre 1971 kapamilatan ning Hungarian a malacologist a i József Vágvölgyi. Mengasira la reng tanaman ning isla uling kareng mengabulus a kambing a melyap, at metung ne mu ing mitagan king katutubung "C. n. abingdoni". Isipan dang pekilagyu de king tauan a legeng ning artistang Americanung i George Gobel. Miyalis ya para king kaligtasan king Charles Darwin Research Station, i George, a kilung dang kayabe da reng bábaing ibat king aliwang subspecies. Lipat ning menebun la reti, alang miyapsa. Miyatulan yang functionally extinct o mituring a mewala na ing paû uling makakuling ya i George. Anyang 24 Junio 2012, mete ya i Lonesome George uling king e malinong sangkan. Paniwalan dang maygit neng dinalan (100) a banwa, at maki timbang yang 200 lbs. Mapalyaring king kayang pangamate, laganas neng mewala o megisan ing kayang subspecies. Ing sangkan ning kayalan kasiguradwan, mapalyaring atin pang metung o adwang kayabe king subspecies a mabibyeng makakulung king isla o king aliwang isla ning Galápagos.

Hokusai:
I metung yang Hapon a artist, pintor ukiyo-e, ampong gágawang print, ning panaun a panauan a Edo. Meimpluwensiya ya kareng pintor antimo i Sesshu, at aliwang uri ning pamaminturang Isik. Mibait ya king Edo (ngeni Tokyo), i Hokusai, a pekakilala antimong ginawa king serye da reng woodblock print a nung nu ya kayabe ing kikilalanan king mabilug a yatung limbag a "Ing Maragul a Alun Bandang Kanagawa", (The Great Wave off Kanagawa) a melalang anyang dekadang 1820.
Lelangan neng Hokusai ing "Atlung pulu't anam a bista" antimong pakibat king pangasikat ning pamaglakbe o turismong lokal, ampong metung a personal a matimid a hilig king Bunduk Fuji. Yapin ing seryeng iti, lalu na ing limbag a "Ing Maragul a Alun" ampo ing "Fuji in Clear Weather", a ganap a migpasikat kang Hokusai king Hapon ampo kareng aliwang bangsa. Anti ing sinabing ning talasulat amlat o historian a i Richard Lane, "Tutu pin, nung ating metung a obrang ginawa king lagyu nang Hokusai, king Hapon man o king kilwal na niti, ya pin iting mapyang serye da reng limbag...".<, "Indeed, if there is one work that made Hokusai's name, both in Japan and abroad, it must be this monumental print-series...". Kabang maulaga ing obra nang Hokusai bayu ing seryeng iti, e menikwang maleparan a pamangilala ampong miglakwan pangmalwatan a pamana king yatu ning arte o kalalangan anggang e linwal iti.' Yapin muring ing "Ing Maragul a Alun" a tinanggap, at tatanggap pa muring papuri ampong kasikatan king labwad ning Albugan. 

Rembrandt:
I Rembrandt Harmenszoon van Rijn (, 15 Julio 1606 – 4 Octubre 1669) metung yang Olandes o Dutch a talapinta ampong taladukit (etcher). Tuturing de reng dakal a metung kareng mapyang diling talapinta ampong talalimbag (printer) king kasalesayan ning arte o kalalangan king Europa, ampong maulagang dili king amlat o kasalesayan ning Netherlands. Miras king arte ing kayang ambag king metung a panaun ning mitmung kayamanan o pibandian ampong tagumpe king kultura a awsan da reng talasulat amlat o historian a Ginintuang Panaun a Olandes o Dutch Golden Age, nung kapilan dakal ya ayambag ing Ginintuang Panaun a Olandes king pamamintura, a king dakal a paralan kakontra ning istilong Baroque a makababo king Europa kanita, dakal ya ayambag a obra ampong kaparalanan. 
Kaybat nang anak pamung migtagumpe antimong talapintang larawan (portrait), mebakas ing trahedya ampong personal a kasakitan kareng tawli nang banwang Rembrandt. Nanupata, king mabilug nang bye, sikat la reng kayang limbag iampong pinintura, menatiling matas ing kayang kabilyan antimong talapinta, at kilub ning adwang pulung banwa, dakal ya tirung maulagang talapintang Olandes. Ing mapyang diling tagumpe nang Rembrandt ila pin deng kayang larawan da reng kayang kapanaun, sariling larawan ampong pamaglarawan kareng eksena ibat king Biblia. Metung lang alang kalupa ampong personal a talambye deng kayang sariling larawan, nung nu ne lalon ing kayang sariling alang pamagmaragul ampong mitmung linis pilubluban o sinseridad.
Kareng kayang pinintura ampong limbag, pepakit na ing kayang belwan king klasikong iconography o pamaglarawan kareng sagradung tauan, a binage na king pamangaylangan ning kayang karanasan; uli na niti, king kayang pamaglarawan king metung a eksena ibat king Biblia, makatatak ing belwan nang Rembrandt king partikular a tekstu, ing kayang pamangamit king klasikong pamiugnayan o komposisyon, ampo reng kayang pamagumasid o obserbasyon kareng Judio ning Amsterdam. Uling king kayang pamakiugnayan king kabilyan da reng tau ampo ning meto ketawan, inaus deng metung kareng "metung kareng mapyang propeta ning sibilisasyon" ("one of the great prophets of civilization").

Ashton Eaton:
I Ashton James Eaton (mibait Enero 21, 1988) metung yang Americanung decathlete, a makilaban king Oregon Track Club Elite team a makabasi king Eugene, Oregon. 
Anyang kolehiyo ya, linaban ya i Eaton para king University of Oregon, nung nu ya mekatalimang meging kampeon king NCAA, at simbut ne ing galal a The Bowerman anyang 2010. Ya ing tatalan king record a pangyatu kareng pangapalyaring (event) decathlon ampong heptathlon, at kadwa ya mung decathlete (kaybat nang Roman Šebrle) a makabalbal king 9,000-point barrier, kareng 9,039 puntus. Mekatadwa ya mika medalya (metung a gintu, metung a pilak) king World Championships. Migtagumpe yang maging pekakatawan ning Estados Unidos king decathlon king 2012 Summer Olympics king London.

Peter Paul Rubens:
I Sir Peter Paul Rubens (; 28 Junio 1577 – 30 Mayo 1640), metung yang talapintang Flemish Baroque, ampong talataguyud ning metung a "gastarul" ("extravagant") a istilong Baroque a mititimid king kimut, kule, ampong sensualidad. Kilala ya kareng Counter-Reformation a altarpiece, larawan, landscape, ampong larawan ning amlat (history painting) da reng paksang ibat king mitolohiya ampong alegorya. 
Bukud king pamanibala king maragul a studio king Antwerp a maglalang pininturang sikat kareng aristokrata (nobility) ampo kareng pamitipun ning arte o kalalangan king mabilug a Europa, menigaral ya king klasika i Rubens a iskolar a humanista, talatipun arte, ampong diplomatikung gewa rang kabalyero o suging Felipe IV, Ari ning Espanya, ampong Charles I, Ari ning Inglaterra.

Palimpsest:
Ing palimpsest () metung yang manuskritung bulung o bilungan(page) ibat king pergamino (scroll) o libru nung nu mekalis ing sulat, at malyari yang gamitang pasibayu. from which the text has been scraped off and which can be used again. Ing katayang "palimpsest" ibat ya king Latin a ' ibat king Matwang Griego ' ("palímpsestos", “megasgas o mekalis pasibayu”) a sadyang mituglung ibat king ' ("palin", “pasibayu”) ampong ' ("psao", “I kalisan”) a mangabaldugang literal a “mekalis at melinis, at megamit pasibayu”. Deng Romano sinulat la kareng tablang mitakpan pagkit (wax-coated tablets) a malyaring pakinisan ampong linisan, at gamitan pasibayu, at ing pamangamit na ning katayang iti, ing "palimpsest" agpang kang Cicero mapalyaring tungkul ya king dapat a iti.
Magagamit ne murin kareng aliwang bage ing katayang iti, lalu na king architectural archaeology.

Mewalang obra:
Ing mewalang obra ("lost work") metung yang dokumentu o obra ning malagung panyulat (literary work) a melalang kanitang milabas at ala nang mitatagan a kopya. Malyari lang mawala deng obra king kasalesayan kapamilatan ning pangasira ning orihinal a manuskritu o king pangawala da reng kpya na ning obra. Ing sasaryan a pamanyira awsan dang krimen a pangkasulatan (literary crime o literary vandalism). Kareng aliwang kasu, ating mitatagan a metung a dake da reng obra, uli ning arkeolohiya, o uling magagamit la reti antimong dake ning libru (bookbinding materials), o uling mababanggit ya ing dake da reti kareng aliwang obra. Ing pangatuklas na anyang 1822 ning metung a dake ning "De re publica" nang Cicero ing metung kareng mumunang pangatuklas pasibayu ning matwang kasulatan ibat king palimpsest, kabang ing pikabalwan diling bayung alimbawa ya pin ing pangatuklas ning Archimedes palimpsest (a makasalikut king misna ka-bayung libru da reng pangadi). Mababanggit la reng keraklan kareng mawawalang obra kareng obra o pamitipun o compilation a atyu pa, alimbawa ing "Naturalis Historia" nang Pliny the Elder o ing "De Architectura" nang Vitruvius. Neng kayi, deng talasulat a maki buring siran do reng sarili dang obra, magpasira kareng aliwa kareti kaybat ning karelang kamatayan; iti, e melaus kareng mapilang kasung pikabalwan, alimbawa king kasu ning "Aeneid" nang Virgil a linigtas nang Augustus ampo deng nobela nang Kafkang linigtas nang Max Brod. Dakal lang obra deng isipan dang mengawala anyang mesilab ya ing Aklatan ning Alexandria anyang panaun da reng Romano, o mapalyaring kaybat na nita. Bayu ing panaun ning pamaglimbag, pakasulat lang gamat deng manuskritu, anya ditak la mu deng kopya, at iti ing sangkan nung bakit asnang karakal ing mengawala. Deng obrang e ra babanggitan deng aliwa, syempre, e ta la balu, anya laganas nong mekalingwan. 
Keraklan, ing terminung iti gagamitan de kareng obra ibat king kapanaunan a klasikal, dapot maralas da neng gagamitan kareng mas makabayung obra. 

Agatón (papa):
I San Agatón metung yang Cristianong papa manibat anyang 26 Junio 678 to 10 Enero 681 ampong metung a santo kareng pisamban a Romano Catolico ampong Eastern Orthodox churches.

Mimar Sinan:
I Koca Mi'mâr Sinân Âğâ (Ottoman Turkish:; Modern Turkish: Mimar Sinan, ) (c. 1489/1490 – Julio 17, 1588 ing pekapun a arkitektong Ottoman (Turkish: "Mimar") ampong inyerong sibil para kareng sultan a Suleiman the Magnificent, Selim II, ampong Murad III. Ya ing manibala king pamanikdo kareng maygit atlung dalan a istruktura ampong mas malating proyekto, anti reng Islamic a pipagaralan a primerong eskuwela o pipagararan ("sibyan mekteb"). Kaybat na niti, deng magsane kaya (apprentice) idisenyu de ing Sultan Ahmed Mosque king Istanbul, at sumaup la king pamagdisenyu king Taj Mahal king Imperyong Mughal.
Anak ne ning kateru o mason, a menigaral a teknikal, at meging inyerung militar. Mabilis yang mitas ranggu, at mumuna, megi yang opisyal king militar at kaybat metung a komandante o pekapun a Janissary, a maki titulung ağa. Digdagan na ing kayang kasanayan king arkitektura ampong inhenyerya kabang mangitalakad miyayaliwang klasing kuta, ampong proyektung impraskukturang militar antimong dalan, tete, ampong aqueduct o istrukturang daralanan danum. Anyang manga edad yang singkwenta, mituldu yang pekapun a arkitektu ning imperyu, pusisyun nung nu no agamit deng gelingan nang teknikal a iwa na king militar king pamanikdong At about the age of fifty, he was appointed as chief royal architect, applying the technical skills he had acquired in the army to the "pamanikdo kareng mangasanting a gusaling relihyosa" ampong eganaganang klasing istrukturang sibiko. Halus lima yang pulung banwa king pwestung iti. 
Ing obra maestra na yapin ing Selimiye Mosque king Edirne, dapot ing pekasikat nang obra ya pin ing Suleiman Mosque king Istanbul. Ya ing manibala king maleparan a sakdalan o departamentu ning kapamahalan, at dakal ya senayan a kasaup a king kapanaunan da, peparangalan da ing sarili da, kayabe ya i Sedefkar Mehmed Agha, ing arkitektu ning Sultan Ahmed Mosque. Tuturing deng pekamapyang arkitektu ning panaun a klasikal ning arkitekturang Ottoman , at kinumpara de kang Michelangelo, a kapanaun na king Albugan. Balu reng balu king Istanbul i Michelangelo ampo reng kayang planu para king St. Peter's Basilica king Roma, uling i Leonardo da Vinci meimbita ya anyang 1502 among 1505 ning Sublime Porte a magsumiting planu para king tete king Golden Horn.

Diego Velázquez:
I Diego Rodríguez de Silva y Velázquez (; Junio 6, 1599 – Agosto 6, 1660) metung yang talapintang Espanyol a yang manimunang artist ning kotyi nang Aring Felipe IV. Metung yang indibidwalistang talapinta ning kapanaunan a Baroque, a maulaga antimong talapintang larawan (portrait artist). Bukud kareng dakal nang pininturang eksenang maulaga king amlat o kasalesayan ampong kultura, memintura yang marakal a larawan ning pamilya ning ari ning Espanya, deng aliwang importanting tau king Europa, ampo reng karaniwang tau (commoner), a ing pekamaulga ya pin ing pamamintura ning kayang obra maestra, ing "Las Meninas" (1656).
Manibat anyang mumunang kapat a dake ning kalabing syam a siglu o dilanwa, migsilbi yang ulma o modelu ing obra nang Velázquez para kareng talapintang realist ampong impressionist, partikular i Édouard Manet. Manibat kanita, mas dakal kareng makabayung talapinta, kayabe ya i Pablo Picasso ampo i Salvador Dalí, ampo ing talapintang Anglo-Irish a i Francis Bacon, peparangalan de i Velázquez kapamilatan ning pamaninturang pasibayu kareng mapilan kareng lalung sikat kareng obra na. 

Andy Warhol:
I Andy Warhol (Agosto 6, 1928 – Febrero 22, 1987) metung yang Americanung artist a manimunang kayanib ning pangimut king visual art a awsan dang pop art. Sisyasatan da reng kayang obra ing pamiyugnayan ning pamagbandu king arte (artistic expression), kultura da reng sikat o celebrity, ampong patalastas o advertisement, a mibababo na anyang dekadang 1960. Kaybat ning matagumpeng karera antimong talapaglarawan pangkalakal (commercial illustrator), megi yang artist a sikat at neng kayi kontrobersyal i Warhol. Ing The Andy Warhol Museum king kayang tubung lakanbalen, ing Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, atin yang maleparan a permanenting koleksyon da reng kayang obra ampong archives. Iti ing pekamaragul a museo king Estados Unidos a makaparikil king metung mung artist. 

Frank Lloyd Wright:
I Frank Lloyd Wright (mibait Frank Lincoln Wright, Junio 8, 1867 – Abril 9, 1959) metung yang Americanung arkitektu, interior designer, talasulat ampong talaturu, a migdisenyung maygit libung (1,000) istruktura ampong mekayaring limang dalan (500) a obra. Maniwala ya i Wright king pamagdisenyung istrukturang makabage king meto ketawan ampo king kapatulugan o kapaligiran, metung a pilosopiyang awsan nang organic architecture. Pekamasalese yang linto ing pilosopiyang iti king kayang disenyu para king Fallingwater (1935), a awsan dang "pekamasanting a obra king kabilugan ning panaun king arkitekturang Americanu". ("the best all-time work of American architecture"). Pekapun ya i Wright king pangimut a Prairie School king arkitektura at inalkus ne ing konseptu ning tuknangan a Usonian, ing kayang alang kawangis a panimanman para king pamagplanung pang lakanbalen (urban planning) king Estados Unidos. 
Kayabe la kareng obra na deng orihinal ampong bayung uring (innovative) alimbawa da reng miyayaliwang klasi da reng gusali, kayabe la reng tanggapan, pisamban, pipagaralan, skyscraper, otel ampong museo. Dinisenyu na la namang Wright deng dakal kareng elementu king kilub da reng kayang gusali, alimbawa deng muebles ampong stained glass. Sinulat yang adwang pulung (20) libru ampng dakal a artikulu i Wright, at sikat yang talapagsalitang babye lecture king Estados Unidos ampong Europa. Maralas, mibibili king balita ing kayang makuleng personal a bye, lalu na itang maki kaugnayan king silab ampong pamakamate tau king kayang Taliesin studio. Lipat ning kasikatan na kanitang mabye ya pa, mirinan yang galal i Wright anyang 1991 ibat king American Institute of Architects as "mapyang diling Americanung arkitektu king kabilugan ning panaun." ("the greatest American architect of all time").<ref name="autogenerated1" 

Nora Ephron:
I Nora Ephron (Mayo 19, 1941 – Junio 26, 2012) metung yang Americanang talagawang pelikula, director, producer, screenwriter, nobelista, talasulat drama, peryodista, talasulat ampong blogger.
Kilala yang dili uling kareng kayang romantic comedy, at mekatatlu ya mimunikala para king Academy Award for Best Writing (Original Screenplay) kareng atlung pelikula: "Silkwood", "When Harry Met Sally..." ampong "Sleepless in Seattle". Neng kayi, sinulat ya kayabe ya ing kayang kapatad, i Delia Ephron. Ing tauli nang pelikula, ya pin "Julie & Julia." Kayabe ya murin kareng talasulat ning produksyon a sinambut Drama Desk Award, ing "Love, Loss, and What I Wore".

Andrés Manuel López Obrador:
I Andrés Manuel López Obrador (mibait November 13, 1953), a awsan da muring AMLO or El Peje, metung yang Mexicanong pulitikung tinalan king pwestung Head of Government of the Federal District (a katumbas ning Alkalde ning Mexico Lakanbalen) manibat 2000 anggang 2005, bayu ya migdimiti o tinabili anyang Julio 2005 bang lumaban king Alalan para king pamuntuk ning 2006, a pekakatawan ning Coalition for the Good of All, metung a koalisyon a panimunan ning PRD nung nu kayabe la mu naman deng partidung Convergence ampong Labor Party. Ya ing pekapun ning "MORENA" (National Regeneration Movement) king Mexico, at ya ing kandidatu para king Alalan para king pamuntuk ning 2012, a pekakatawan ning koalisyon ning Party of the Democratic Revolution, ing Partidong Talapagobra (Labor Party) ampo ing Partido "Movimiento Ciudadano".
Karagdagang babasan.
Unless otherwise noted, in Spanish and published in Mexico.

Abu Nuwas:
I Abu-Nuwas al-Hasan ben Hani al-Hakami (756–814),a a kilala murin king lagyung Abū-Nuwās (; , "Abu Novas"), metung ya kareng mapyang diling klasikong Arabung poeta o watas, a sinulat muring poesyang Persian kareng aliwang pamikatagun. Mibait ya king lakanbalen o ciudad ning Ahvaz king Persia, king tatang a Arabu ampong imang Persian, megi yang matenakan kareng eganaganang uri ning poesyang Arabu. Linub ne i Abu Nuwas king tradisyong folkloric, at linto yang mapilang ukdu o besis king "Aklat da reng Libu ampong Metung a Bengi".(The Book of One Thousand and One Nights).

Sistemang immune:
Ing sistemang immune o sistemang panyagka metung yang sistema da reng dake ampong prosesu king kilub organismung magsilbing proteksyun king sakit. Ba yang gumanang masalese, kaylangan ning sistemang immune a makapayntun kareng miyayaliwang ahenti, manibat kareng birus angga kareng parasitikung bulati, at ibukud la reti o kilalanang aliwa king sarili nang tisyu na niti. 
Deng pathogen o ahenti ning sakit malagwa lang magbayu ampong bumage ba rang lisyan ing pangatuklas da ampong pangasira ning sistemang immune o panyagka. Uli na niti, dakal la muring lintong kaparalanan ning pamagdepensa o pamamingwa king sistemang immune. Agyang deng simpling organismung tunggal selula, antimong deng bacteria, atin lang pangpundasyun o simpling sistema, kapamilatan da reng enzyme a mamingwa o magprotekta kareng impeksyon da reng bacteriophage. Deng aliwang pangpundasyun a kaparalanan a minalkus kareng eukaryote at atyu pa murin kareng karelang makabayung palipi, antimo kareng tanaman ampong insektu. Kayabe la kareng mekanismung deti deng phagocytosis, antimicrobial peptides a awsan dang defensin, ampo ing complement system. Deng vertebrate a maki panga, kayabe la reng tau, lalu yang komplikadu ing kaparalanan da king pamamingwa o pamagdepensa, kayabe ya ing mas mayap o magelingan a paralan ning pamangilala king pangalabas ning panaun kareng partikular a pathogen o magdalang sakit kaybat ning mumunang pamitupa kaniti. Ing adaptive (o meyakwang) immunity maglalang yang immunological memory kaybat ning mumunang pakibat king partikular a pathogen, a magdalang mas pepasikan a pakibat kareng tutuking engkwentro o pamisagana king pareung pathogen. Ining prosesu ning acquired immunity ya ing basi ning pamagbakuna vaccination o vaccination.

Abba Eban:
I Abba Eban (, mibait Abba Solomon Meir; kaybat kinwa ne ing lagyung Aubrey Solomon Eban; 2 Febrero 1915 – 17 Noviembre 2002) metung yang diplomatiko ampong politikung Israeli.
King kayang karera, megi yang Ministrung Panglwal, Ministru ning Edukasyon, Kadwang Pun Ministru, ampong embahador king Estados Unidos ampong kareng Misasanmetung a Bangsa (United Nations). Megi ya muring Kadwang Pamuntuk ning Pangkabilugang Kapulungan da reng Misasanmetung a Bangsa (United Nations General Assembly) ampong Pamuntuk ning Weizmann Institute of Science.

Matsuo Bashō:
I , mibait yang , kaybat , ing pekasikat a poeta o watas ning Kapanaunang Edo king Hapon. Anyang mabye ya pa, kinilala re i Bashō kareng obra na king saup-saup (collaborative) a pormang "haikai no renga"; ngeni, kaybat da reng pilang siglu o dilanwa ning komentaryu, kikilalanan deng panginwan o misnang gelingan king makuyad ampong malinong haiku. Sikat ya king mabilug a yatu ing kayang poesya o kawatasan, at king Hapon, makabili la reng dakal kayang kawatasan kareng monumentu ampong tradisyonal a lugal. Lipat ning karapatdapat deng kikilalanan king Albugan i Bashō king kayang hokku, ya mismu, paniwalan nang ing pekamasanting nang obra atyu king kayang pamanimuna ampong pamakyabe king renku. Babanggit dang sinabi na, “Dakal kareng talatuki ku, kasinggaling kong sumulat hokku. Papakit ku ing belwan ku kapamilatan ning pamituglung-tuglung kareng bersung haikai.”
Anak ya pamu i Bashō, mipakilala na kaya ing poesiya, at kaybat nang milub king eksenang intelektuwal ning Edo (a ngeni Tokyo), gad yang sinikat king mabilug a Hapon. Menintunan ya antimong talaturu, dapot pepainggulutan na ing byeng sosyal ampong urban (panglakanbalen) da reng sirkulo o pamiabe-abeng pangliteratura, at maburi yang lumibut king marangle ampong ilang, papunta king albugan, aslagan, ampo king kakewan ning pangulu, bang mika inspirasyun para king kayang panyulat. Makalto kareng kayang kawatasan ing daretsu nang denasan king yatung makapadurut kaya, at maralas, ararakap ne ing kapanamdaman ning metung a eksena o milyari kilub da reng ditak a simpling sangkap. 

Enrique Peña Nieto:
I Enrique Peña Nieto () (mibait July 20, 1966) metung yang politikung Mexicanu ampong kayanib ning Institutional Revolutionary Party ("Partido Revolucionario Institucional", PRI). Migsilbi yang gobernador ning Estado ning Mexico manibat 2005 anggang 2011. Anyang Setiembre 19, 2011, pepawaga na ing kayang pamangandidatu para king pamuntuk king 2012 Alalan a pangpamuntuk king Mexico ba yang alilan i Felipe Calderón, at pormal yang migrehistru antimong kandidatu anyang Noviembre 27, 2011.
Anyang Julio 2, pepawaga nang ya ing sinambut king alalang pang-pamuntuk, at menikwa yang pilatan ning 37% ampong 38% da reng botuTinggap nang Pamuntuk Felipe Calderon a ya ing sinambut.[4

Jorge Luis Borges:
I Jorge Francisco Isidoro Luis Borges Acevedo (24 Agosto 1899 – 14 Junio 1986), a awsan dang Jorge Luis Borges (), metung yang Argentinong talasulat makuyad a salita (short-story writer), talasulat salese (essayist), poeta ampong talalikas (translator) a mibait king Buenos Aires. Masasaklo king kayang obra ing "kauryan ning e katutwan king kabilugan ning malagung panyulat" ("character of unreality in all literature"). Deng pikabaluan nang diling libru, ing "Ficciones" (1944) ampo ing "The Aleph" (1949), pitipun-tipun lang makuyad a salitang pituglung-tuglung da reng tema o paksang mag-ugne kareti, alimbawa paninap, laberinto (labyrinths), aklatan, salamin, animal, talasulat ning piksyon, relihyon, ampong Dios. Minambag la reng kayang obra king uri ning literaturang science ampong magic realism, metung a uri ning panyulat a sinalungat king realismo/naturalismo ning kalabingsyam a siglo o dilanwa (nineteenth century). Ing katutwan, ing kritikong i Angel Flores, a yang minunang ginamit king terminu, binili ne ing umpisa o pamagmula ning pangimut king makuyad nang salitang Borges a "Historia universal de la infamia (A Universal History of Infamy)" (1935). Pepamunikala da murin deng iskolar a ing taglus-taglus a pangabulag nang Borges sinaup ya ba yang maglalang sagisag a pangliteratura o pangpanyulat kapamilatan ning imahinasyon. Kareng tauli nang poesya, miki pamakisabi o dialogo kareng tauan a pangkultura antimo i Spinoza, Camões, ampo i Virgil.
Meging ganap ing kasikatan nang internasyonal anyang dekadang 1960, king saup ning "Latin American Boom" ampo ing tagumpe ning "Cien Años de Soledad" ("Dinalan a Banwa ning Pamagdilidili") nang Gabriel García Márquez. Sinabi na tungkul kaya ning talasulat ampong talagawang saleseng (writer and essayist) i J. M. Coetzee: "Ya, migit kenuman, binayu ne ing amanu ning piksyon at biklat ne ing daralanan ning makapagmulalang henerasyon da reng nobelistang Hispanoamericano." ("He, more than anyone, renovated the language of fiction and thus opened the way to a remarkable generation of Spanish American novelists."

Abdullah II ning Jordan:
I Abdullah II bin Al-Hussein (, "al-Malik ʿAbdullāh aṯ-ṯānī bin al-Ḥusayn"; mibait 30 Enero 1962) ing makalukluk a Ari ning Hashemite a Kayarian ning Jordan. Megi yang ari anyang 7 Febrero 1999 kamate nang tata na, i Aring Hussein. Kayabe ya i Aring Abdullah, a anak nang Prinsesa Muna al-Hussein, king pamilyang Hashemite. Manibat kanitang 1993, asawa neng Abdullah i Reyna Rania ning Jordan.
