Pisamban ning Natividad:
Ing Pisamban ning Natividad king Bethlehem ing metung kareng pekamatwang taglus-taglus a magagamit a pisamban king yatu. Makatikdo ya ing istruktura king babo ning lukib o kwebang agpang king tradisyon a lugal nang kebaytan Jesus ning Nazareth at tuturing dang banal, e mu kareng Cristiano, nun e pati kareng Muslim. Iti ing mumunang Lugal a Pamana ning Yatung makalista king lalam ning Palestine. Mibili ya naman king Listahan ning Pamana ning Yatung atyu king Panganib.

Knights of Columbus:
Deng Knights of Columbus ila reng pekamaragul a Catholicu fraternal service organization keti yatu. Mitatag ya iti king United States iniang 1882, mipalagiu bilang galang kang Christopher Columbus at susuyu la kareng pakakalulu, kareng maranup, at nd is dedicated to charitable service to the poor, the hungry, itaguyud ing Catholicung pamagaral ampong bilang kambilan keng kareng miyaliwang bangsa.
Atin maiggit a 1.8 yuta (million) a kayanib kareng 15,000 councilu, at deng mga 200 councilu kareng college kampus. Deng maliaring makiabe keng aniban deta mung ausan dang "practical Catholic" tau. aged 18 or older.
Iniang banuang 2010 pangfiscal, Ing Orden memie yang US$154 million diretsu keng kapaglunusan (charity) (maiggit $1.406 billion keng kapaglunusan a ambag ampong 653 million tau-oras king milabasan a 10 banua) ampong ginanap a maiggit 70 million man-hour a kusang lub a pamagsilbi. Maiggit a 413,000 pintu a daya ing meambag. Para keng saup na keng pisamban ampo kareng communidad panglocal, anti mu rin kareng saup philantropu, ing Orden mayayaus ya naman bilang "masikan a gamat wanan ning Pisamban". though Standard & Poor's downgraded the program to AA+ in August 2011 along with the United States government.

Ansar Dine:
Ing Ansar Dine (, a misusulat muring Ançar Dine, Ançar Deen o Ansar ad-Din; mangabaldugan "Talapamingwa ning Kasalpantayan" o "Defenders of Faith.") metung yang grupung Islamist a panimunan nang Iyad Ag Ghaly. I Ag Ghaly, metung kareng pekamaulagang tauan king pamagalsang Tuareg anyang dekadang 1990, sasabyan deng maki kaugnayan king Al-Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb ampo reng aliwang grupung Islamist, metung yang grupung kinawaning ("splinter group") panibalan ning pisan nang i Hamada Ag Hama. Kapagnasan ning Ansar Dine ing pamaniral ning maigpit a leying Sharia king kabilugan ning Mali. Ing mumuna nang kimut ning grupu milyari anyang Marzo 2012.

Jesus:
I Jesus (; , 7-2 BC/BCE to 30–36 AD/CE), a ausan da muring Jesucristo or kabud namu Cristo (i.e. Mesias), ing sentrung katauan king Kristianismo, sasamban da reng keraklan a denominasyon a Cristianos antimong Dios Anak Incarnation (Christianity)a meging tau.
Deng keraklan kareng makabayung talasulat amlat ("historians") mikakasundu lang i Jesus mebye ya at metung yang Hudyong talaturu ibat king Galilea king Judeang Romana , a bininyag nang Juan Bautista, at mipaku king krus king Jerusalem king utus ning Romanung Prefect, i Poncio Pilato.
Carson (1992) et al., pp. 50–56.
Crossan (1993), pp. xi–xiii.
Fredriksen (1999), .
Meier (1991), .
Meier (1994), pp. 12–13.
Vermes (1973), p. 37.
</ref> Miyayaliwa la pamaglarawan kang Jesus deng iskolar, a neng kayi, mikakasundu o mitutugma, antimo metung a rabbi, manulung masikan kareng tau, pekapun ning metung a apocalyptic a pangimut, metung a maglarawan king sarili na antimong Mesias, metung a matenakan ("sage") ampong talaturung pilosopiya, ampong magreporma king sosyedad o ketawan a manaral tungkul king "Kayarian ning Dios" antimong paralan para king pamagbayu ning sarili o indibidwal ampo ning sosyedad o ketawan para king pamipante-pante. Inugne do reng iskolar deng makasulat king Bayung Tipan kareng kasulatan king amlat ("historical records") bang miras king pamituki-tuki king panaun o chronology ning bie nang Jesus.

Benazir Bhutto:
I Benazīr Bhuṭṭo (; , ; 21 Junio 1953 – 27 Diciembre 2007) metung yang Pakistani democratiko sosyalistang migsilbing 11th Pun Mininstru ning Pakistan kareng adwang e mitutuking terminu 1988 anggang 1990 ampong 1993 anggang 1996. Anak neng Zulfikar Ali Bhutto, a migsilbing pun ministru ning Pakistan ampo ing talatátag ning Pakistan People's Party (PPP), a penibalan na. 
Anyang 1982, king idad a 29, megi yang talapamuntuk i Benazir Bhutto ning PPP — metung a democratiko sosyalista, libutad-kayling partidu, at uli na niti megi yang mumunang babai king Pakistan a menibala king manimunang partido politikal. Anyang 1988, megi yang mumunang babaing mumunang babaing manimuna king estadong Muslim at ya mu namang mumunang babaing pun ministru ning Pakistan (at king kasalukuyan, ya kabud) a babaing pun ministru. Pikabalwan ya king kayang upayang karismatiku ("charismatic authority") ampong kabyasnan king pulitika i Benazir Bhutto, a menibala kareng pamagbayu para king ekonomiya ning Pakistan ampong pambangsang kapanatagan, at pepalyari na la deng patakaran a social capitalist para king panyulung ning industriya ampong panyulung.
Anyang 1993, miyalal yang pasibayu i Benazir Bhutto para king kadwang terminu kaybat ning alalan para king parlamentu ning 1993. Alampusan ne ing tangkang pamaglugmuk ning kapamahalan ("coup d'état") anyang 1995, at uli ning masyas nang patakaran kareng unyon ampong masikan nang pamakibat kareng kalaban na king pulitika ampo king kasiping ning bangsa nang ing India, ikwa ne ing palayong "Iron Lady"; magalang de muring awsang B.B. Anyang 1996, deng uling kareng sangkan a korupsyon laban king kayang kapamahalan migdala la king pamaglako ning kayang kapamahalan ibat kang Pamuntuk President Farooq Leghari. Tinggap nang Benazir Bhutto ing pangasambut king alalan king parlamento ning 1997 at kusa yang linwal king bangsa, papunta king Dubai, United Arab Emirates anyang 1998.
Kaybat da reng syam a banwa ning pamalako king bangsa, mibalik ya king Pakistan anyang 18 Octubre 2007, kaybat nang mekipagkasundu kang Military President General Pervez Musharraf, a minye kayang amnistiya, at minurung kareng pamanyakdal para king korupsyon. Pete re i Benazir Bhutto kapamilatan ning pamamomba anyang 27 Diciembre 2007, kaybat neng likwan ing tawli nang rally ning PPP king lakanbalen o ciudad ning Rawalpindi, adwang duminggu bayu ing makatuldung Pangkabilugan a alalan ning Pakistan, 2008 nung nukarin ya ing manimunang kandidatu ning oposisyon. Anyang tutuking banwa, metung ya kareng pitung sinambut king United Nations Prize in the Field of Human Rights.

Norman Solomon:
I Norman Solomon (mibait 1951) metung yang Americanung peryodista, kritiko ning media, aktibista kontra gera, ampong kasalukuyan a kandidatu para king United States House of Representatives. Malambat neng kaugne ning grupung magbante king mediang Fairness & Accuracy In Reporting (FAIR). Anyang 1997, tetag ne ing Institute for Public Accuracy, a manigobra bang mamyeng alternatibung pikukwanan balita para kareng peryodista, at migsilbi yang direktor a talapagpaganap anggang 2010. Makabili ya king pambansang syndication ing kolum nang lulwal balang duminggu, ing "Media Beat", manibat 1992-2009. Mas bayu kaniti, makabili ing pansin nang Solomon king kayang kampanya king banwang 2012 para king Kongreso o Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan, para king kanam a distritung pangkapulungan ning California (California's 6th congressional district).

C. S. Lewis:
I Clive Staples Lewis (29 Noviembre 189822 Noviembre 1963), a keraklan awsan dang C. S. Lewis ampong, kareng kakaluguran na ampong pamilya, "Jack", metung yang nobelista, poeta, akademiko, medievalist, kritiko king panyulat, laikong teologo ("lay theologian") ampong Christian apologist ibat king Belfast, Ireland. Pikabalwan ya king kayang kasulatan a piksyon, lalu na deng "The Screwtape Letters", "The Chronicles of Narnia" ampong "The Space Trilogy", ampo reng kasulatan nang e piksyon, alimbawa ding "Mere Christianity", "Miracles" ampong "The Problem of Pain".
Matalik lang mikaluguran di Lewis ampo ing kalupa nang nobelista, i J. R. R. Tolkien. Pareu lang kayabe king pakultad ning English faculty king Universidad ning Oxford University, at pareu lang aktibu king e pormal a grupung pangkasulatan o pangliteraturang awsan dang the "Inklings". Agpang king kayang sariling talambye, ing "Surprised by Joy", mebinyag ya i Lewis king Church of Ireland (kayabe king Anglican Communion) kabait na, dapot midayu ya king kayang kasalpantayanan anyang kayanakan. Uli ning impluwensiya nang Tolkien ampo reng aliwa nang kakaluguran, king idad a 32, mibalik ya i Lewis king Anglican Communion, at megi yang "karaniwan a laiko ning Church of England" (becoming "a very ordinary layman of the Church of England"). Malalam ing epektu ning kayang kasalpantayanan king kayang obra, at sinikat ya kareng kayang pamagsalita king radio tungkul king Kristiyanismu. 
Anyang 1956, miyasawa la ning talasulat a Americanang i Joy Davidman, a mas anak kayang labing pitung (17) banwa, a mete kaybat ning apat a banwa uli ning kanser king idad a 45. Mete ya i Lewis atlung banwa kaybat ning asawa na, uli ning pamagpalya ning batu (renal failure) Mete ya paruminggu bayu ing kanam a pulu't limang banwang aldo kebaytan. Ditak mu ing pamagtutuk ning media king kayang pangamate; mete ya anyang 22 Noviembre 1963—ing aldong mebaril ya i Presidente John F. Kennedy ning Estados Unidos, at ita muring aldong mete ya naman ing metung pang sikat a talasulat, i Aldous Huxley.
Milikas la kareng maygit atlung pulung (30) deng obra nang Lewis. Ing masaling dili, ila pin deng librung bibilug king "The Chronicles of Narnia" at mibili la reti king entabladu, telebisyon, radio among pelikula. 

Andrew Garfield:
I Andrew Garfield (mibait Agostu 20, 1983) metung yang Americanung artista. Bantug ya king kayang genapan a papil keng sineng The Amazing Spider-Man.

Sun Myung Moon:
I Sun Myung Moon (Koreanu 문선명; mibait Mun Yong-myeong; 25 Febrero 1920-3 Setiembre 2012) metung yang Mauling Koreanung pekapun king relihyun, a pikabalwan dili antimong talatátag ning Unification Church, ampo king kayang bandung ("claim") metung yang mesias. 
Metung ya muring media mogul ampong aktibista. Atin yang lima anggang pitung milyung kayanib o miembru king mabilug a yatu ing pisamban, at maralas yang mibibili king media uling king blessing ceremony, tsa-rakal a pamagkasal ("mass wedding") o marriage rededication ceremony (a keraklan ing manibala i Moon ampo ing asawa na, i Hak Ja Han) a neng kayi maki libu-libung makayabe. Metung neng bilyun-bilyung dolyar a imperyu ing tatalnan na ning pisamban a pibandyan a pangyatu. ampo ing Tongil Group, metung kareng pekamaragul a grupung pangnegosyu o chaebol a maki negosyu king mabilug a yatu. Ing pisamban ing pekamaragul a makibandi kareng restoran a sushi king Estados Unidos, at king labwad a Kodiak king Alaska, iti ing pekamaragul a babye obra. Ing pisamban ing makibandi king makabukud a plantang saken king Pangulung Korea, ing Pyeonghwa Motors, at iti ing pekamaragul a maglwal ("exporter") da reng produktung Koreanu. Deng atlu kareng NGO, nang Moon, deng Universal Peace Federation, Women's Federation for World Peace ampong Service for Peace, maki kabilyan lang konsultatibu United Nations Economic and Social Council.
Pamilya.
I Moon ampo ing asawa na, i Hak Ja Han Moon, atin lang labing apat a anak, at atin lang papil king pamanibala deng aliwa kareng kayang ának.

Republika ning Cebu:
Ing Republika ning Cebu metung yang idea ning pamangawani ning lalawigan ning Cebu kareng aliwang dake ning Filipinas, at iti metung a reaksyon a pangkultura deng Cebuano king akakit dang pamagbabo ning amanung Tagalug king pamanuru king Sakdalan ning Edukasyon (Department of Education). 

Shard London Bridge:
Ing Shard London Bridge o The Shard (a sadya dang awsang London Bridge Tower o Shard of Glass) metung yang skyscraper king Southwark, London. Maki katas yang babo ning gabun, at yang pekamatas a gusali king Europa anyang Julio 2012. Iti murin ing kadang pekamatas a istruktura king in United Kingdom, katuki ning toreng kongkretu king Emley Moor transmitting station.
Elilan ne ning The Shard ing Southwark Towers, metung a 24-pisu o palapag a gusaling pang-upisina king katatalakaran na a mitikdo anyang 1975. I Renzo Piano, ing arkitektu ning the Shard's architect, megobra ya king kumpanyang pang inhenyeria ("engineering firm") a ing Broadway Malyan anyang panaun ning pamagplanu. Atin yang 72 pisu o palapag a malyaring gamitan ing tori, ampong viewing gallery at makabuklat a observation deck – ing pekamatas king UK – king ka-72ng pisu, king katas a . Midisenyu ya ing The Shard king tabas o ubug a irregular a pramide ("pyramid") manibat king pundasyun angga king babo, at laganas yang mibabalut king salamin. Miyari ya ing kayang istruktura anyang Abril 2012, at mibuklat ya king publiku anyang 5 Julio 2012.

Timbuktu:
Ing Timbuktu (; ; Koyra Chiini: "Tumbutu"), sadya mu namang misusulat a Timbuctoo ampong Timbuktoo, metung yang balen king bansa king Albugang Africa ning Mali a atyu king pangulu ning Ilug Niger king mauling gilid ning Sahara Desert. Ing balen ing buntuk balen o kapitolyu ning Labwad Timbuktu, metung kareng walung labwad a administratibu ning Mali. Maki populasyun yang 54,453 anyang 2009 census.
Migumpisa ya antimong pana-panaun a tutuknangan ing Timbuktu, a meging permanenting balayan anyang mumuna nang dake ning ka-12 a dilanwa. Kaybat dang minaliwa deng ruta ning kalakal ("trading routes"), misaplala ya ing uli ning negosyu king asin, gintu, garing ("ivory") ampong alipan, at megi yang dake ning Imperyu ning Mali anyang mumuna nang dake ning ka-13 a dilanwa. Anyang mumuna nang dake ning ka-15 a dilanwa, telan de reng tribung Tuareg king saguling panaun, bayu ne ikwa ning daragul a Imperyu ning Songhay anyang 1468. Simbut ne ning ukbung Moroccan ing Songhay anyang 1591, at gewa neng balwarti ing Timbuktu, lipat ning Gao. Ginawa lang bayung uring makababo deng sinakup, deng arma, a kaybat ning 1612 meging timawa king Morocco. Nanupata, yari na ing ginintuan a panaun ning lakanbalen, at linub ya king malambat a panaun ning pamagbaba kabilyan. Dakal lang tribu deng menibala kaniti, anggang dinatang la reng Frances anyang 1893, at makanyan ing kabilyan anggang iti megi yang dake ning kasalukuyan a Republica ning Mali anyang 1960. King salukuyan, kalulu ya ing Timbuktu, magi yang desyertu. Panigobran dong samasan kabilyan deng makasalesayan a manuskritung makasinup pa murin king lakanbalen. Samantala, maragul yang dake nign panakitan ning lugal ing turismu. 
Anyang Ginintuan a Panaun, mika maulagang kalakal kareng libru uling kareng dakal a manigaral king Islam ampong maleparan a pamiugnayan king kalakal: kayabe kareng kampus ning Sankore Madrasah, metung a universidad a Muslim, mitikdo ya ing Timbuktu antimong sentru ning pamanigaral king Africa. Dakal la reng talasulat king kasalesayan, alimbawa i 
Shabeni ampo i Leo Africanus, a miglarawan king Timbuktu. Deti mengising lang pamangutang king Europa, nung nu minalis ing paglalawe da king lakanbalen maninat king lugal a misnang mabandi, king lugal a misteryosu. Ini ing paglalaweng mibabo king makabayung panaun, anya king kultura ning Albugan, ing lagyu na mengabaldugan yang lugal a masyadung malaut o aliwang dili.
Anyang 1 Abril 2012, metung a aldo kaybat ning pangakwa king Gao, asakup de king militar ning Mali ing Timbuktu deng rebelding Tuareg ning MNLA ampong Ansar Dine. Five days later, the MNLA declared the region independent of Mali as the nation of Azawad.
E ne kikilalanan ning sanumang bangsa o ning komunidad a internasyunal ing bayung deklarang lugal kabilyan a pampulitika.

Wikisource:
Ing Wikisource metung yang digital library king Aptas o online ning libri kalamnan (free content) a kasulatan king wiki, a palakad ning operated by the Katatagan Wikimedia (Wikimedia Foundation). Kapagnasan nang magdalang eganaganang uri ning libring kasulatan, kareng dakal a amanu, ampong likas. Anyang mumuna, binalak deng maging simpanan ("archive") da reng kasulatan a magamitan o pangkasalesayan, at meragul ya bang maging aklatan a pangkabilugan ("general-content library"). Opisyal yang migumpisa anyang Noviembre 24, 2003 ing proyekto lalam ning lagyung Project Sourceberg. Anyang banwang ita, kinwa re ing lagyung Wikisource, at tinggap ne ing sarili nang domain name kaybat ning pitung bulan. Mika puna ya ing proyektu uling kulang ya kanu king masyadung apagkatiwalan, dapot pinuri de murin deng aguman anti king National Archives and Records Administration.
Daralan no ning proyektu deng obrang atyu king banding pangmalda ("public domain") o libring makalisensy ("freely licenced"); deng obrang milimbag king paralang propesyonal o dokumentung pangkasalesayan, at e aliwa reng vanity products; at malyari lang suryan nung tutu la. Anyang mumuna, ing pamagpatutu gagawan king Aptas ("online"), o kapamilatan ning pamagtiwala king reputasyun da reng digital library. Ngeni, deng obra suportadu do reng online scan kapamilatan ning ProofReadPage extension, a manyiguradung apaniwalan la deng kasulatan ning proyektu. Ngeni, deng aliwang Wikisource paintulutan da la mu deng obrang maki suportang scan. Lipat ning kasulatan la o text deng keraklan kareng koleksyon ning proyektu, magdala ya muring kalamnan ing Wikisource ibat kareng aliwang media, antimo deng comics, pelikula ampong librung audio o siwala. Deng bukud mung obrang orihinal a malyari king Wikisource ila pin deng likas ampo reng annotation.
Suglung palwal.
Wikisource:
About Wikisource:

Ernest Borgnine:
I Ernest Borgnine (mibait Ermes Effron Borgnino, Enero 24, 1917 – Julio 8, 2012) metung yang Americanung artista king pelikula ampong telebisyon a maki karerang miglambat maygit anam a dekada. Metung yang e karaniwang uring ("unconventional") bida kareng dakal a pelikula kanitang dekada 1950, at sinambut yang Oscar anyang 1955 para king "Marty". King telebisyon, linage yang Quinton McHale ketang seryeng 1962–1966 a "McHale's Navy", at kadwa yang bida ("co-star") king seryeng dekada1980 a "Airwolf", bukud kareng miyayaliwang uring papil. Kilala ya murin i Borgnine king papil na king Mermaid Man king animated television series a "SpongeBob SquarePants". Menikwa yang pamagmunikala ("nomination") king Emmy Award para king obra na king seryeng "ER".

Makikatni:
King ponetika, ing makikatni ("consonant") metung yang katni king pamagsalita ("speech sound") a agkas a makasara ya o makasara yang bagya ing sistemang bokal. Deng alimbawa kareti, deng , a ágkas kareng labi; , a ágkas king arap ning dila; , a ágkas king gulut ning dila; , a ágkas king akmulan; ampong , a ágkas kapamilatan ning pamagpalub king angin king makitid a daralanan (fricative); ampong ampong , nung nu dadalan ing angin king arung (nasal). Deng makikatni kukumpara la o pakiyaliwa kareng kakatni. ("vowel"). 
Uling ing bilang dareng katni king sanumang alpabetu, deng linguist miglalalng lang sistema o kaparalanan antimo ing (IPA) bang mituldung alang kalupa ampong malinong symbolo king balang makikatning makikilala. Ing tutu, king alIn fact, the alpabetung Ingles mas ditak ya letrang makikatni kesa kareng makikatning katni ("consonant sounds"), anya pin gagamit yang digraph antimo ing "ch", "sh", "th", ampong "zh" ba yang pakaban ing alpabetu, at ating letra o digraph a maygit manalakaran king maygit metung a makikatni ("represent more than one consonant"). Alimbawa, ing katning tatalakaran ning "th" king "this" aliwa yang makikatni king katni king "thin". (king IPA misusulat la reting ampong .) Nung "consonant" ya king amanung Ingles ing katayang iti, "consonante" ne man king amanung Castila.

Kakatni:
King ponetika, ing kakatni ("vowel") metung yang katni ("sound") king metung a amanung gagamitan king pamagsalita, antimo king Ingles a "ah!" o "oh!" , a ágkas a makabusni ya ing sistemang bokal, anya pin e mititipun ing angin king sanumang lugal king babo ning glotis. Iti aliwa ya kareng makikatni, ("consonant"),antimo ing Ingles a "sh!" , nung nu ating pamagtálik o pamanyara king metung a lugal king sistemang bokal. Malino muring deng kakatni, bibilug lang silaba: ing katugma dang katning ("sound") a e silaba o "non-syllabic" mayayaus yang semivowel. Nung "vowel" ya king amanung Ingles ing katayang iti, "vocal" ne man king amanung Castila.

James Joyce:
I James Augustine Aloysius Joyce (2 Febrero 1882 – 13 Enero 1941) metung yang nobelista Irlandes o Irish a tuturing dang metung kareng maimpluwensiyang diling talasulat a modernist avant-garde king mumunang dake ning ka-20ng dilanwa (kadwang pulung dilanwa o siglu). Pikabalwan yang dili i Joyce king "Ulysses" (1922), metung a makabaldugan a obra nung nu deng dake ning bye ning "Odyssey" nang Homer atin lang katulid a miyayaliwang uring istilung pangpanyulat o pang-literatura, nung nu ing kapansin-pansin dili ing sistemang stream of consciousness ya ing minalkus. Deng aliwang manimunang obrang gewa na ila pin deng "Dubliners" (1914), ampo reng nobelang "A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man" (1916) ampong "Finnegans Wake" (1939). Kayabe la king kayang kumpletung pangkabilugan a obra deng atlung librung kawatasan o poesia, metung a drama, pamisan-misan a artikulung pangpahayagan, ampo reng kayang sulat a milimbag. 
Mibait ya i Joyce king pamilyang kasantingan kabilyan king Dublin, nung nu ya mibabo antimong magaral kareng eskuwalang Jesuita ning Clongowes ampong Belvedere, at kaybat king University College Dublin. Anyang maygit yang beynti anyus, minalis yang permanenti king kontinenti ning Europa, at menuknangan ya king Trieste, Paris ampong Zurich. Lipat ning menuknangan ya king kilwal king keraklan king bye na, e lulwalm king Dublin, ing sikluban ning kayang panyulat, at deng tauan keti keraklan kalupa do reng kayabe king kayang pamilya, kalaban ampong kaluguran manibat king panaun a atyu karin; ing "Ulysses" lalu na, eksaktu ya pangabili kareng dalan na ampong eskinita ning kayang ciudad o lakanbalen. Anyang makuyad a panaun kaybat nang mibulalag ning "Ulysses", pepalinawan na ining kayang akaugalian, kareng amanung "Para kaku, pane kung susulat tungkul king Dublin, uling nung aluban ke ing pusu ning Dublin aluban ke ing pusu da reng anggang lakanbalen king yatu. King partikular o makabukud, makapalub ing pangsikluban." ("For myself, I always write about Dublin, because if I can get to the heart of Dublin I can get to the heart of all the cities of the world. In the particular is contained the universal.")

The National Archives (United Kingdom):
The National Archives (TNA) metung yang Sakdalan a pangkapamahalan ning UK ("UK government department") ampong ahensyang talapaganap ("executive agency") ning Kalihim ning Estado king Katuliran ("Secretary of State for Justice"). Iti ing "opisyal a simpanan ning kapamahalan ning UK, a magdala king metung a libung banwa ning kasalesayan" ("the UK government's official archive, containing 1,000 years of history"). Ating makakawaning simpanan kareng dakeng mirinan pamagsarili ning United Kingdom: ing National Archives of Scotland tatalan yang dokumentung pangkapamahalan ampong pribadung makaugne king Scotland at ing Public Record Office of Northern Ireland tatalan yang kasulatan para king Northern Ireland.

Kakataskatasan a Ukuman ning Filipinas:
Ing Kakataskatasan a Ukuman ning Filipinas ("Supreme Court of the Philippines") ing pekamatas a ukuman o korti king Filipinas. Bibilugan de reng labing apat (14) a Associate Justice ampong metung a Chief Justice. Agpang king Punbtas, ing Kakataskatasan a Ukuman atin yang "pamanibalang administratibu kareng sablang ukuman ampo reng tauan da reti". (""administrative supervision over all courts and the personnel thereof""). 

Salman Khan (edukador):
I Salman Amin 'Sal' Khan (; mibait 1976) edukador yang Bangladeshi American ampong a talatátag king Khan Academy, metung a libring platform king Aptas ("online") king pamanuru ampong aguman a e pangtubu ("nonprofit"). Manibat king metung a malating upisina king bale na, mekalalang neng atlung libung (3000) video o alben a magpalino kareng paksang academiku, keraklan king matematika ampong syensya. Anyang Julio 2012, miras nong 355,000 deng "subscriber" o talataluki ning Khan Academy channel king YouTube. Anyang 2012, pinili ne ning magasin a Americanung "Time" i Salman Khan ketang kayang banwa-banwang listahan da reng dinalan a maimpluwensiyang diling tau king yatu ("100 most influential people in the world"): Time 100.

Meka:

Scotland:

Serena Williams:
I Serena Jameka Williams (mibait Setiembre 26, 1981) metung yang Americanang mamyalung tennis a propesyonal. Dininan neng ranggung mumuna o no. 1 ning Women's Tennis Association kareng limang kawa-kawaning pamikatagun. Purmeru ya meging mumuna o no. 1 anyang Julio 8, 2002 at ikwa ne ining ranggung king kalimang pamikatagun anyang Noviembre 2, 2009.
Ya kabud babaing talapamyalung a sinambut $35 milyun king premyu.
Uling kareng kayang adwang pulu't syam (29) a titulung Grand Slam, kasyam ya king listahan a pangkabang panaun ("all-time list"): 14 king singles, 13 king women's doubles, ampong adwa (2) king mixed doubles. Ya ing pekabayung talapamyalung, lalaki o babaing agnan-agnan tinalan kareng apat a titulung Grand Slam singles, at kalima ya mung babaing tinalan kaniti. Ya murin kabud a babai, kayabe ing kayang atsing i Venus Williams, a agnan-agnan tinalan kareng anggang apat a titulung Grand Slam doubles manibat kang Martina Hingis anyang 1998. Deng ikwa nang labing apat (14) a titulung Grand Slam singles, kanam ya king listahan pangkabang panaun ("all-time list"). Kapat ya i Williams kareng titulung Grand Slam women's singles titles a simbut anyang open era, kaybat nang Steffi Graf (22ng titulu) ampong Chris Evert ampong Martina Navratilova (tsa-18 a titulu). Kareng aktibung talapamyalung, lalaki o babai, ya ing dakal dili titulung Major titles king singles, doubles, ampong mixed doubles. 
Sinambut yang adwang gintung medalyang Olympic king women's doubles. Mas dakal ya simbut a premyu king kayang karera kesa king ninumang babaing atleta king amlat ning tennis. Akalaban neng Serena ing atsi nang i Venus kareng 23 pyalung a propesyonal manibat anyang 1998, nung nu i Serena ing sinambut kareng 13 kareti. Milaban la kareng walung Grand Slam finals, nung nu sinambut yang makatanam ("six times") i Serena. Manibat anyang 2002 French Open, makatapat la milaban kareng tuki-tuking Grand Slam singles finals, ing mumunang pamikatagun anyang open era a deng adwang talapamyalung milaban la kareng tuki-tuking Grand Slam finals. Sinambut lang labing atlung (13) titulung Grand Slam doubles deng paris. Ya ing mumunang talapamyalung, lalaki o babai, a sinambut limang (5) titulung Australian Open singles anyang open era. Ya ing kasalukuyan a kampeon king singles ampong doubles king Wimbledon. Anyang 2012, kaybat nang sinambut king titulung Wimbledon singles, sinabi nang sadyang mumuna king yatung ("former world no. 1") i John McEnroe i Williams ing mapyang diling babaing talapamyalung a memyalung king tennis king kabilugan ning panaun.

Leung Chun-ying:
I Leung Chun-ying GBM, GBS, JP (mibait 12 Agosto 1954), a keraklan awsang dang CY Leung, ing Pekapun Talapaganap ("Chief Executive") ampong Pamuntuk ning Sanggunian Talapaganap ("President of the Executive Council") ning Hong Kong. Milukluk ya anyang 1 Julio 2012.
Kayanib ya king grupung pro-Beijing king pulitikang Hong Kong i Leung, a Convenor ning Sanggunian Talapaganap ("Executive Council") angga king kayang pamagtabili o pamagdimitir o pamakalag anyang Setiembre 2011.

Cicero:

François Villon:
François Villon (king makabayung Frances, ágkas yang ; king Frances ning kalabing limang siglu/dilanwa, ) (c. 1431 – kaybat ning 5 Enero 1463) metung yang Frances a poeta o watas, manako, ampong taung libut-libut ("vagabond"). Mapalyaring pikabalwan yang dili king kayang "Testaments" ampo ing "Ballade des Pendus", a misulat kabang makasukul ya. Ing kutang a ""Mais où sont les neiges d'antan?"", a mekwa king "Ballade des dames du temps jadis" at linikas nang Dante Gabriel Rossetti antimong "Where are the snows of yesteryear?", ("Nukarin la reng nyebe dareng milabas a panaun?", metung ya kareng kilalang diling linya ning poesiang milikas king yatung magsalitang Ingles ("one of the most famous lines of translated secular poetry in the English-speaking world").

Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma:
I Nkosazana Clarice Dlamini-Zuma (mibait 27 Enero 1949) metung yang pulitikung South African politician ampong actibistang linaban king apartheid. Migsilbi yang Ministru ning Kabulasan ("Minister of Health") ning South Africa manibat 1994 anggang 1999, lalam nang Pamuntuk Nelson Mandela, at kaybat, Ministru ning Ugnayang Panglwal manibat 17 Junio 1999 anggang 10 Mayo 2009, lalam da reng Pamuntuk a di Thabo Mbeki ampong Kgalema Molanthe. Miyalis ya king Ministerio ding Pisasabyang Panglub She was moved to the position of Minister of Home Affairs Minister of Home Affairs king Gabineti nang Jacob Zuma, ing sadya nang asawa, anyang 10 Mayo 2009.
Anyang 15 Julio 2012, miyalal yang talapamuntuk ("chairperson") i Dlamini-Zuma king African Union Commission, at megi yang mumunang babaing menibala king aguman, pati ing elilan na niti, ing Organisation of African Unity).

Nagarakretagama:
Ing Nagarakretagama o Nagarakrtagama, a ausan da mu namang Desawarnana, metung yang patungkul king Matwang Amanung Java kang Hayam Wuruk, metung a aring tau Java ampong emperador ning Imperyong Majapahit. Sinulat neng Mpu Prapanca anyang 1365 (or 1287 banwang Saka). Atin yang detalyadung pamilarawan ing "Nagarakretagama" ning Imperyung Majapahit anyang pekamaleparan ya iti. Patuwan na ning kawatasan ing ulaga ning Hindu–Buddhismu king Imperyung Majapahit kapamilatan ning pamaglarawan kareng templu ampong palasyu, ampo mapilan a seremonyas.

Alapaap:
Ing Alapaap, iti ing ala nung nu manatili pilatan da reng mangatawan keng banua, nung nu kayabe ya ing yatu. Eneman taganang ala ya laman, dapot atin ya naman a ausan dang masias a makasipsip (hard vacuum) a miki atin a mababang kasiksikan da reng particles: lalu na deng plasma da reng hydrogen ampong helium, at makanian mu rin kareng electromagnetic radiation, magnetic field ampo reng neutrinos. Keng pamagmasid ampong theoria a uusuk na iti atin ya naman madalumdum a bage (dark matter) ampong madalumdum a energia (dark energy). 

Mahmoud Jibril:
I Mahmoud Jibril el-Warfally (), a misusulat murin a "Jabril" o "Jebril" o "Gebril", (mibait 28 Mayo 1952) metung yang Libyan a pulitikung migsilbing pansamantalang Pun Ministru ning Libya kilub ning pitu ampong kapitnang bulan kanitang Gerang Sibil a Libyan, at migsilbi yang talapamuntuk ning National Transitional Council manibat 5 Marzo anggang 23 Octubre 2011. Migsilbi ya namang Pekapun para kareng Pisasabyan a Internasyonal.
Anyang Julio 2012, i Jabril ing pekapun ning metung kareng pekamaragul a partidu king Libya, ing National Forces Alliance.
Anyang mayayari na ing kagulwan, maralas deng ausan deng kapamahalan a dayung pansamantalang pun ministru ning Libya i Jibril, lipat ning pekapun ning sanggunian talapaganap ("executive board"), ing titulung maglarawan kaya king karin-Aptas o website ning NTC's website, dapot e malino nung opisyal yang titulu iti o lalarawan ne mu ing kayang kabilyan antimong manimuntuk king kapamahalan ning pansamantalang konseho. Kikilalanan de antimong "magdili-diling legal a pekakatawan" ("sole legitimate representative") ning Libya da reng keraklan kareng kayanib ning Misasanmetung a Bangsa (majority of UN states) kayabe ya ing ing Francia, Turkey, United Kingdom, Estados Unidos, Iran ampong Qatar.

Polandball:
Ing Polandball, a awsan da mu namang countryball, metung yang user-generated internet meme a migumpisa king /int/ board ning Aleman o German imageboard a Krautchan.net anyang kadwa nang dake ning 2009. Makalto ya ing meme kareng dakal a online comics, nung nu ra la papakit deng bangsa antimong mangabilug a tauan a makisabi, maralas king e matulid a Ingles, at kaylyan do reng pambangsang stereotypes ampo ing pamiugnayan da reng bangsa. Ing istilung iti, awsan deng Polandball (agyang e kayabe ing Poland kareng tauan a cartoon) ampong countryball (o, nung dakal la, countryballs).

John Atta Mills:
I John Evans Fifii Atta Mills, a kilala murin king lagyung The Prof, (21 Julio 1944 – 24 July 2012) metung yang pulitikung Ghanaian a Pamuntuk ning Ghana manibat 2009 angga king kamatayan na anyang 2012. Sinumpa ya anyang 7 Enero 2009, kaybat neng simbut ing kandidatu ning partidung atyu king upaya, i Nana Akufo-Addo king alalan ning 2008. Ya ing Kadwang Pamuntuk manibat 1997 anggang 2001 lalam nang Pamuntuk Jerry Rawlings, at tinagal ya, oneng mesambut, anyang 2000 ampong Alalang pangpamuntuk ning 2004 antimong kandidatu ning National Democratic Congress (NDC). Mete ya anyang 24 Julio 2012 king Military Hospital king Accra. Ya ing mumunang Pamuntuk ning estadu ning Ghanang mete kabang makalukluk.

John Dramani Mahama:
I John Dramani Mahama (mibait 29 Noviembre 1958) metung yang Ghanaian a pulitikung Pamuntuk ning Ghana manibat anyang 2012. Megi yang Kadwang Pamuntuk ning Ghana manibat 2009 anggang 2012, at linukluk ya antimong Pamuntuk anyang 24 Julio 2012 kamate ning kayang elilan, i Pamuntuk John Atta Mills. Miyalal yang magsilbi king kayang mumunang terminu antimong pamuntuk anyang Diciembre 2012 kaybat ning taimik a alalan. Metung yang ekspertu king komunikasyon, matenakan king amlat ("historian"), ampong talasulat. Migsilbi yang Kayanib ning Parlamento ("Member of Parliament") manibat 1997 anggang 2009; megi ya namang Ministru ning Komunikasyon manibat 1998 anggang 2001. 

Pranab Mukherjee:
I Pranab Kumar Mukherjee (; mibait 11 Diciembre 1935) metung yang Indian a pulitikung politician who has been the 13th Pamuntuk ning India manibat anyang Julio 2012. King karera king pulitikang miras anam a dekada, migsilbi yang matas a pekapun ning Indian National Congress i Mukherjee, at tinalan yang mapilan a pusisyun king Kapamahalan ning India. Bayu ing kayang pangayalal antimong Pamuntuk anyang Julio 2012, migsilbi yang Ministru ning Pisalapyan a Pang-Union, ampong manimunang talapanyalese ("top troubleshooter") ning partidung Congress.

Gustav Klimt:
I Gustav Klimt (Julio 14, 1862 – Febrero 6, 1918) metung yang Austrian a pintor a symbolist, a metung kareng pikabalwan diling kayanib ning pangimut a Vienna Secession. Kilala ya i Klimt kareng kayang pinintura, mural, sketch, ampong aliwang pikudtang pang-arte. Ing katawan ning babai ing manimuna nang paksang Klimt'; mababakas kareng kayang obra ing prangkang erotisismu.

Yukio Mishima:

Traian Băsescu:
I Traian Băsescu (; mibait 4 Noviembre 1951) ing pamuntuk ning Romania, a magsilbi manibat anyang 2004 oneng kasalungsungan a makasuspindi. Megi yang alkaldi ning Bucharest manibat 2000 anggang 2004, at miyalal yang pamuntuk anyang 2004, at mesuspindi ya kanitang 2007 oneng mekumpirma yang pasibayu kaybat ning pabulan kapamilatan ning plebisitu. Miyalal yang pamuntuk para king kadwang terminung limang banwa anyang 2009, lipat da reng balita ning pamamirait king alalan a nigse na bandang tauli ning Ukuman a Pang-Punbatas ning Romania ("Constitutional Court of Romania"). Anyang 6 Julio 2012, me-suspindi yang pasibayu king kayang katungkulan at mika-referendum king kayang pangalako anyang 29 Julio, oneng e ya meging balidu ing referendum uling ditak la mu deng migbotu.

Marguerite de Angeli:
I Marguerite de Angeli (Marzo 14, 1889 – Junio 16, 1987) metung yang bestselling a talasulat libru ampong talagulis ("illustrator") da reng librung pang-ának, kayabe ne ing "The Door in the Wall", a sinambut Newbery Award anyang 1950. Sinulat yang adwang pulu't walung libru, a kaya muring dininan ilustrasyun o pamangulis, at ginulis ya para kareng maygit atlung dusenang aliwa pang libru, dakal a salita o kwentu para kareng magasin, ampong artikulu para kareng aliwang talasulat. 

Gore Vidal:
I Eugene Luther Gore Vidal (; Octubre 3, 1925 – Julio 31, 2012) metung yang Americanung talasulat, dramaturgo, talasulat salese ("essayist"), screenwriter, ampong aktibistang pulitikal. Mikalabkab ing kamwa da reng kritikong konserbatibo king kayang katlung nobela, ing "The City and the Pillar" (1948), a mumunang maragul a nobelang Americanung malinong magpalto king homosekswalid. Makatadwa yang tinagal ya para king pusisyun king kapamahalan, at malambat yang meging kritikung pulitikal. 

Michael Phelps:
I Michael Fred Phelps II (mibait Junio 30, 1985) metung yang Americanung kakawe ampong Olympian a dakal dili medalya king kabilugan ning panaun a maki adwang pulung (20) medalya. I Phelps murin ing tatalan kareng record para king pangkabilugan panaun para kareng medalyang gintu (16), medalyang gintu kareng tunggal a event (10), medalyang Olympic a pang-indibidwal para king lalaki (12, tabla), ampong gintung medalya king pareung event a indibidwal kareng mitutuking event para king lalaking kakawe (3). King pamanyambut nang walung gintung medalya king 2008 Beijing Games, i Phelps ing menikwa king record para king dakal diling mumunang miyari king sanumang tunggal a Pyalung a Olympic. Deng lima kareng pamanyambut a reti, karen lang indibidwal a event, a tatabla king tunggal a record kareng Pyalung. King 2012 Summer Olympics king London, sinambut yang adwang medalyang pilak ampong adwang gintu i Phelps anggang Agsto 2.
I Phelps ing tatalan king record king yatu king long course a 100 metres butterfly, 200 metres butterfly ampong 400 metres individual medley ampo ing sadyang tatalan king record king yatu king long course king 200 metres freestyle ampong 200 metres individual medley. King kabilugan, sinambut yang anam a pulu't anam (66) a medalya kareng manimunang kompetisyun a internasyunal, kayabe ya ing Olympics, ing World, ampo ing Pan Pacific Championships. Uling kareng kayang titulung internasyunal, mekatanam ya sinambut World Swimmer of the Year Award i Phelps, ampong mekatawalu ya meging American Swimmer of the Year Award. Uling king kayang tagumpe king Olympics ning 2008, simbut Phelps ing galal a "Sports Illustrated" Sportsman of the Year. Agpang king magasin a ita, ya ing "kikilalanan ning yatung mapyang diling kakawe king kasalesayan" ("universally recognized as the greatest swimmer in history").
Kaybat ning 2008 Summer Olympics, tetag neng Phelps ing Katatagang Michael Phelps ("Michael Phelps Foundation"), a makatutuk king pamagpalaganap king pasiknangan ning pamangawe ampo ing pamanagyag king pamibyebyeng mas mabulas ("promoting healthier lifestyles"). Mamasa yang isundu ing kayang obra king kayang katatagan kaybat ning 2012 Olympics, a sasabyan nang yang tawli nang pakyabayan. 

Wikimedia Commons:
Ing Wikimedia Commons (o kabud na mu Commons) metung yang
simpanan-Aptas ("online repository") da reng timawa pamangamit
ampong aliwang simpan ("files") a media .
Proyektu ne ning Katatagan Wikimedia ini.
Malyari lang gamitan kareng eganaganang proyektung Wikimedia deng
simpan ibat king Wikimedia Commons, in all
languages, kayabe la reng Wikipedia, Wikibooks,
Wikisource, ampong Wikinews, o ikuldas ("downloaded") ba
lang gamitan king kilwal ning Aptas ("for offsite use"). Maygit la
king labing atlung milyung simpan a media ("over 13 million media
files") deng makalulan king simpanan ("repository").
Lon la murin.
reng lisensya ampong
direktoryu da reng obrang gagamit kareti
koleksyon da reng kasulatan o dokumentu (kayabe la reng libru ampong
pyesang musika ["sheet music"])
Wikimedia Commons
Dalerayan.

Project – kapagnasan nang lalung samasan ing pamaglulan multimedia ("multimedia uploading") king Wikimedia Commons

Katatagan Wikimedia:
Ing Katatagan Wikimedia, Inc. (Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.), metung yang aguman a paniaup a alang tubu ("nonprofit") a maki pun tanggapan king San Francisco, California, Estados Unidos, at mitátag lalam da reng leyi ning estadu ning Florida, nung nu ya makabasi aniang mumuna. Magpalakad ya kareng mapilang mapilang proyektung wiking saup-saup ("collaborative"), kayabe no reng Wikipedia, Wiktionary, Wikiquote, Wikibooks, Wikisource, Wikimedia Commons, Wikispecies, Wikinews, Wikiversity, Wikimedia Incubator, ampong Meta-Wiki, at bandi ne ing mewala nang Nupedia. Ing kayang manimunang proyectu, ing English-language Wikipedia, metung ya kareng apulung pupuntalan dang diling karinan king Aptas king mabilug a yatu ("among the top ten most-visited websites worldwide"). 
Oficial a mibulalag ing pangalalang ning katatagan aniang Junio 20, 2003 kapamilatan ning metung kareng talatátag, i Jimmy Wales, a magpalakad king Wikipedia lalam ning pamanantabe ning kayang cumpania, ing Bomis.

Mustafa Kemal Atatürk:
Y Mustafa Kemal Atatürk (mayayagkas ceˈmäl ätäˈtyɾc; 19 Mayu 1881 (Conventional)–10 Nobiembri 1938) metung yang Ottoman ampong opisyal keng hukbung Turkey, revolutionariung estadista, talasulat, ampong mumunang Pamuntuk ning Turkey. Mebilang yang mitatag keng Republica ning Turkey.

Riyad Farid Hijab:
I Riyad Farid Hijab (), a
mibait anyang 1956, metung yang Syrian a pulitiku. Migsilbi
yang Pun Ministru ning Syria manibat kanitang Junio anggang Agosto
2012, at migsilbi lalam nang Pamuntuk Bashar
al-Assad. Manibat 2011 anggang 2012, megi yang Ministru of
Agrikultura. Anyang 6 Agosto 2012, sinabi ning kayang talapagsalita
ampo reng aliwang aguman a magbalita his spokesman and several ("news
organizations") a migdimitir ya at minalis king sumangid a panig king
Gerang Sibil a Syrian, dapot agpang kareng atyu king panig ning
kapamahalan ning Syria, mesisanti ya.
Dalerayan.
Quick Reply

Tala da reng Menikuang Dakal a Gintung Medalia keng Olympics:
Ing bulung a ini lislista na la deng taung meniambut atlu o maiggit pang gintung medalia keng Olympics.
Tala da reng atin pekamarakal a Olympic gintung medalia kilub ning karelang karera.
Iti dake de reng tala da reng miki marakal a medaliang gintung pang Olympic, lislista na la deng taung meniambut atlu o maiggit pang Olympic gintung medalia. 
Dakal la reng medaliang keysa kareng aliwang mengapaliari (events), deng bilang da reng mengapaliari, menaliwa na la kareng mengalabasan a a panaun.

Basilio Augustín:
Y Basilio Augustín y Dávila sinuyu ya bilang Kastilang Gobernador-Heneral ning Filipinas inyang 1898. 

Curiosity rover:
Ing "Curiosity" rover metung yang robot a talalibut ("rover") a kasindagul kotsi a lilibut king maglawe ampong tutuklas king Gale Crater king Mars. Ing Curiosity a talalibut Mars rover ("Mars rover") magdala yang laboratoryung siyentipikung adadala radioisotope-powered ("mobile scientific laboratory") a paganan ning Radioisotope thermoelectric generator, at kayabe ya king misyun a Mars Science Laboratory (MSL) ning NASA king Estados Unidos. 
Pepasulagpo de ing "Curiosity" manibat king Cape Canaveral anyang Noviembre 26, 2011 king oras a 10:02 EST, at makasake ya king MSL spacecraft, at matagumpe yang dinugpa king Aeolis Palus king Gale Crater anyang Agosto 6, 2012, 05:17:57.3 UTC. Ala ya pang ing talalibut manibat keng kayang mituldu o mepiling pidugpan kaybat ning byahing.
Kayabe kareng parasan ning talalibut ing pamagsyasat king klima ampong geology ning Mars, ampong nung sinuporta ya king bye ing Maras, kayabe ya ing pamagsyasat king papil ning danum ampong nung agyu deng tuknangan deng tau ing planeta, ampo ing pamagsadya king pamaglibut ampong pamagtuklas da reng tau. 

Usain Bolt:
I Usain St. Leo Bolt, OJ, C.D. (; a mibait anyang 21 Agosto 1986), metung yang Jamaican a talapulaying tuturing da reng keraklan a pekamabilis a tau king kasalesayan. 
Ya ing mumunang lalaking tinalan kareng titulu king 100 metres ampong 200 metres a record ning yatu manibat anyang inumpisan da ing pamanyukad ning oras a laganas a otomatiku ("fully automatic time measurements").
Kayabe la reng kayabe na king koponan, gewa ne murin ing record a pangyatu king 4×100 metres relay. Ya ing makalukluk a kampeon king Olympics kareng atlung pangapalyaring ("event") deti, ing mumunang taung sumambut anam a gintung medalya king sprinting, ampong mekatalimang kampeon king yatu ("five-time World champion"). Ya ing mumunang taung míka "double double" kapamilatan ning pamanyambut na king 100 m and 200 m titles kareng mitutuking Olympics (2008 ampong 2012), at ligpusan ne ini king mumunang "double triple" (kayabe ya ing 4x100m relays). 
Ing kayang lamang a mekabalbal record anyang 2009 king 100 m, manibat 9.69 (manibat king sadya nang record a pangyatu) anggang 9.58, ing pekamatas manibat anyang ning pamanyukad oras a lubusang otomatiku. 
Uling kareng kayang tagumpe king sprinting, meyaus yang "Lightning Bolt", ampong galal kayabe ya ing IAAF World Athlete of the Year, Track & Field Athlete of the Year, ampong Laureus Sportsman of the Year (makatadwa).
Ya ing pekamatas panakitan a atleta king track and field.
Inaus de muring "world’s most marketable athlete" 
ampong "the greatest athlete ever".

Jesse Robredo:
I Jesse Manalastas Robredo (Mayo 27, 1958 – Agosto 18, 2012) metung yang pulitikung Filipinong migsilbing Kalihim ning Panglub ampng Lokal a Kapamahalan king administrasiun nang Pamuntuk Benigno Aquino III manibat 2010 angga king kamatayan na anyang 2012. Kayanib ya i Robredo king Partido Liberal.
Manibat kanitang 1988, anam yang terminung migsilbi i Robredo antimong Alkaldi ning Naga Lakanbalen king Camarines Sur. Antimong pamangilala da reng kayang agawa antimng alkaldi ning Naga Lakanbalen, mirinan yang galal a Ramon Magsaysay Award for Government Service anyang 2000, ing mumunang alkalding Filipinong mika anti kaniting dangalan. Mituldu ya king Gabineti nang Pamuntuk Aquino anyang Julio 2010. 
Anyang Agosto 18, 2012 (PHT), ing eruplanung Piper PA-34-200 Seneca I (mirihistrung RP-C4431) a magdala kang Kalihim Robredo mibagsakya lagpus king lele dayatmalat ning Masbate Lakanbalen. Muli ya sana ba nang alben ing kumpitisiun na king pamangawe ning anak nang babai king Naga Lakanbalen. Agpang king Department of Interior and Local Government, migparala yang "distress call" ing pilotu king pisulagpon ning Masbate a makisabing "emergency landing". E na ikuang miras king pisulagpon ning eruplanu, at mibagsak ya king dayatmalat. Ikwa de ing kayang katawan kaybat ning atlung aldo, anyang Agosto 21, 800 metru manibat king lele dayatmalat at 180 pieng lalam. 

Meles Zenawi:
I Meles Zenawi Asres (Ge'ez: መለስ ዜናዊ አስረስ "Mäläs Zenawi Äsräs"; 8 Mayo 1955 – 20 August 2012) ing meging Pun Ministru ning Ethiopia manibat 1995 angga king kamatayan na anyang 2012. Manibat 1985, talapamuntuk ("chairman") ne ning Tigrayan Peoples' Liberation Front (TPLF), ampong pekapun ne ning makalukluk a Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front (EPRDF). Migsilbi yang Pamuntuk ning Ethiopia manibat 1991 anggang 1995, at megi yang Pun Ministru ning Ethiopia anyang 1995 kaybat ning pangkabilugan a alalan ning banuang ita. Mepuri ya ing kayang kapamahalan kareng reporma o kapanumanan anti ing sistemang pampulitika da reng dakal a partidu ("multi-party political system") king Ethiopia, ing pamagumpisa da reng pribadung pahayagan, ampo ing pangabawas da reng anak a mangamate, sasangkanan de murin ing kayang kapamahalan king pamangabát a pampulitika introduction of private press in Ethiopia and decreased child mortality rates, his government was also accused of ("political repression") ampong miayaliwang pamanabusu king karapatang pantau. Metung ya kareng pikabaluan a masikan pamanalan king upaya ("strongmen") king Africa, at metung ya kareng ka-aliadu ning Estados Unidos king kayang war on terror.

Richard DeVos:
I Richard DeVos, Sr. (mibait Marzo 4, 1926, Grand Rapids, Michigan) metung yang negosianting Americanu, a mitátag king Amway kayabe ya i Jay Van Andel (mibayu ya pangabalangkas ing kumpanya at mipalagyuan yang Alticor anyang 2000), ampong makibandi ning koponang basketball a Orlando Magic NBA. Anyang 2012, linista ne ning magasin a "Forbes" antimong ka-60ng pekamakualtang tau king Estados Unidos, ampong ka-205ng pekamakualta king yatu, a maki pibandyan a tatantyan dang USD$ 5 billion. (Misan, miyabe ya kareng apulung pekamakualtang Americanu).
Megaral ya i DeVos king Calvin College, ampong kayanib ya king Sigma Phi Epsilon Fraternity. Migsilbi ya king militar anyang Kadwang Gerang Pangyatu king United States Army Air Corps.

Jay Van Andel:
I Jay Van Andel (Junio 3, 1924 – Diciembre 7, 2004) metung yang negosianting Americanung businessman pikabaluan dili antimong metung kareng talatátag ning Amway Corporation, kayabe ya i Richard DeVos. Migsilbi ya mu namang Talapamuntuk ("Chairman") ning U.S. Chamber of Commerce manibat 1979–1980 at kaybat, antimong kayanib ning Senior Council na niti manibat 1980-1985.
Mekilala ya mu naman king kayang pamagpondu kareng mision a relihioso ampong konserbatibung parasan king pulitika, kayabe ne ing Republican Party.

Khan Academy:
Ing Khan Academy metung yang e magtubung aguman a pang-edukasyon a tetag na anyang 2006 ning edukador a Bengali-Americanung i Salman Khan, a miyari king MIT ampo king Harvard Business School. Ing kayang damla o misyon, yapin ing "magkalub matas a uri ning pamagaral kenuman, nukarinman" ("providing a high quality education to anyone, anywhere"), babie yang libring koleksyon king Aptas o online ing karinan-Aptas ("website") da reng maygit 3,300 micro lectures kapamilatan da reng video tutorial a makasimpan king YouTube a tuturung matematika, amlat, pamaningat kabulasan ("healthcare") ampong medisina, pisalapyan ("finance"), pisika, kimika, biolohiya, astronomia, economics, cosmology, organikong kimka, American sibikang Americanu, amlat ning arte, macroeconomics, microeconomics, ampong computer science.

Paul Zane Pilzer:
I Paul Zane Pilzer (mibait Enero 17, 1954) metung yang ekonomistang Americanu, talasulat bestseller king "New York Times" ampong social entrepreneur. Mekasulat neng siam a libru, migsilbi ne kareng administrasyun da reng adwang pamuntuk o presidenti ning Estados Unidos, talatátag de reng anam a kumpanya, at mibili ne king mumunang bulung ("front page") ning "The Wall Street Journal".

George Armstrong Custer:
I George Armstrong Custer (Diciembre 5, 1839 – Junio 25, 1876) metung yang manungkulan militar ("officer") Ukbu ning Estados Unidos (United States Army) ampong komander a cavalry king Gerang Sibil a Americanu (American Civil War) ampo reng Gerang Indian. Meragul ya king Michigan ampong Ohio, i Custer, a mekalub king West Point anyang 1858, nung nu tauli ya king kayang klasi anyang miyari ya. Nanupata, anyang mikalabkab ing Gerang Sibil, kailangan la reng malyaring maging manungkulan o opisyal, at mituldu yang magsilbi king Ukbung Union.
Masanting ing meging reputasyun nang Custer king Gerang Sibil. Linaban ya king mumunang manimunang laban, ing Mumunang laban ning Bull Run. Misulung ya ing kayang karera uling king kayang pamiyabe kareng mangatas a manungkulan, pati na ing kayang tagumpe antimong taganang matalab o epektibung komander o talapanibala da reng makakabayu ("highly effective cavalry commander"). Bandang tauli, mitas ya ranggu king pansamantalang ranggung (brevet) of major general i Custer. (Kayari ning gera, mibalik ya king kayang permanenting ranggu ning kapitan.) Kaybat ning Appomattox Campaign, nung nu maragul ampong maulaga king kelualan ning laban i Custer ampo reng kayang sundalus, atsu i Custer bang tanggap king pamanyuku nang Heneral Robert E. Lee.
Kaybat ning Gerang Sibil, miparla ya i Custer king albugan bang lumaban king Gerang Indian. Mengatakpan la king mituran kalamidad a tawling nang laban deng kayang meging tagumpe. Mete ya i Custer ampo reng eganagana nang tauan king Laban ning Little Bighorn ("Battle of the Little Bighorn") anyang 1876, king metung a laban king aliansa da reng tribung natibung Americanu a sinikat lagyu king amlat a Americanu antimong "Custer's Last Stand".

Find a Grave:
Ing Find A Grave metung yang komersyal o pangnegosyung karinan-Aptas ("website") a babieng libring pamaglub king metung a online o atsu-Aptas a database da reng kasulatan da reng sementeryu o kutkutan. Mitátag ya anyang 1998 antimong DBA at merehistru kanitang 2000.

Superbrands:
Ing aguman or organisasyon a Superbrands organization timawa yang talapamilatan ("independent arbiter") kareng etiketa o marka ("brands"). . Kapamilatan da reng kayang programa king pamakyanib Its ("membership programs") kikilalanan no reng manimunang etiketa ning yatu, agpang king pamamili da reng ekspertu ampong konsumidor ("consumers"). Maglimbag ya mu namang serye da reng libru ampong publikasyon a makatutuk kareng etiketa. Bukud kaniti, migsadya yang sarili nang programa kareng manimunang merkado ning yatu, at atin yang publikasyon kareng 86 a bangsa.

Marcel Knobil:
I Marcel Knobil metung yang talasulat, talapatuntun ("editor"), talalimbag, ampong consultant kareng etiketa. Ya mu naman ing talatátag king Brand Council (UK) ampong Superbrands. Ing Brand Council timawa yang aguman a mitataguyud king branding ampong babie galal kareng makababo o pekamasanting a etiketa. Panibalan no murin deng programang Superbrands, at atin atyu kareng 55ng bangsa. 
Linto ne i Marcel king BBC, Sky Television ampong CNN, at pati king radio, kayabe ya ing regular a dake king programang radio king BBC London radio. Magsalita ya murin tungkul king branding, at susulat ya o minambag neng artikulu kareng publikasyun. Miyabe ne i Marcel kareng lupung da reng talasuri ("judges") para kareng miayaliwang galal ("awards") king industria.

Patricia Highsmith:
I Patricia Highsmith (Enero 19, 1921 – Febrero 4, 1995) metung yang Americanang nobelista ampong talasulat makuyad a salita ("short story writer") a pikabaluan dili kareng kayang psychological thrillers, nung nu deng maigit adwang dusena la reng megawang pelikula. Ing mumuna nang nobela, ing "Strangers on a Train", dakal neng ukdu o besis mibage ne king entabladu ampong sine, at karapatdapat banggitan a metung ya kareti ing kang Alfred Hitchcock anyang 1951. Bukud kareng kayang pupurian dang serie tungkul king makamate taung i Tom Ripley, dakal ya sinulat a makuyad a salita, she wrote many short stories, often ("macabre"), satirika, o maralas, tatagkilan ning kapitutulan tungkul king kamatayan ("black humor"). Lipat ning sinulat ya partikular king uring pikudtang krimen ("crime fiction"), pupurian do reng kayang libru deng miayaliwang talasulat ampong kritiku uli kanung artistiku la ampong malalam, a malyari lang itulid king king tatalukyan o a literatura o panyulat ("mainstream literature"). Nga nang Michael Dirda, "Parangalan de deng Europeo antimong sikolohikal a nobelista, a kayabe king tradisyong existentialist, nung nu ding pekakatawan deng kayang paboritung talasulat, partikular di Dostoevsky, Conrad, Kafka, Gide, ampong Camus." ("Europeans honored her as a psychological novelist, part of an existentialist tradition represented by her own favorite writers, in particular Dostoevsky, Conrad, Kafka, Gide, and Camus.")

Lance Armstrong:
I Lance Edward Armstrong (mibait Lance Edward Gunderson, Setiembre 18, 1971) metung yang Americanung sadiang propesyonal a siklista a sinambut king Tour de France king record a makatapitung tuki-tuking ukdu o besis kaibat nang kinabie kaibat nang mika testicular cancer. Ya mu naman ing talatátag ampong talapamuntuk ("chairman") ning Lance Armstrong Foundation para king suporta kareng mika kanser. Tauli yang sinake para king UCI ProTeam , koponan a tetag na. Singkanan deng gagawang doping deng mangatas kabilyan a siklista, periodista, anti-doping agencies ampo reng talapanusig ning Estados Unidos ("U.S. prosecutors"), at iti miras king pamagdeklara ning United States Anti-Doping Agency a ala lang pangatalab ("void") la reng resulta manibat Agosto 1998. Minyad yang maki katuliran a desisyun ("reasoned decision") ing Union Cycliste Internationale bayu ya kimut, kabang ing World Anti-Doping Agency pepabalu na ing suporta na king USADA ing kayang katuliran a parusang kilalanan da reng eganaganang bangsang WADA code king yatu.
Anyang Octubre 1996, mesyasat ya ampong mipasyag yang maki testicular cancer a maki tumor]] a mikalat king kayang utak ampong baga. Kayabe kareng pamanulu king kayang kanser ing pamanopera king utak ampong bayag, ampong maleparan a chemotherapy, at anyang mumuna, e masanting ing kareng atul. Anyang 1999, mirinan yang galal a ABC Wide World of Sports Athlete of the Year. Anyang 2000, simbut ne ing Prince of Asturias Award in Sports. Kanitang 2002, pinili neng Sportsman of the Year ning magasin a "Sports Illustrated". Megi ya muring Associated Press Male Athlete of the Year kareng banuang 2002–2005. Tinggap ne ing ESPN ESPY Award for Best Male Athlete kareng banuang 2003, 2004, 2005, ampong 2006, at simbut ne ing BBC Sports Personality of the Year Overseas Personality Award anyang 2003. pepawaga nang Armstrong ing kayang pamagretiru king pamagkarera anyang Julio 24, 2005, kayari ning 2005 Tour de France, oneng migbalik ya king karera king pamagbisikleta anyang Enero 2009, at katlu yang meyari king 2009 Tour de France. Kinumpirma na ing kayang katataulyan a pamagretiru king pamagkarera king pamagbisikleta anyang Febrero 16, 2011.
Kanitang Junio 2012, pemalsananan ne ning U.S. Anti-Doping Agency (USADA) i Armstrong a gagamit bawal a performance enhancing drugs, basi kareng sample ning daya manibat 2009 ampong 2010, ampo ing testimonya da reng aliwang siklista. Anyang mumuna, sibukan nang kontran Armstrong iti king Kakataskatasan a Ukuman ning Texas ("Texas Supreme Court") ]], uling agpang kaya, melabag ya ing kayang katuliran king "due process", at e ne sakup ning USADA ing kasu. Anyang Agosto 20, 2012, pepayalang alaga neng US District Judge Sam Sparks ing kasu. On August 23, 2012, Armstrong announced that he would not be fighting the USADA's charges. Ita muring aldong ita, kinumpirma ning USADAng mibawal yang pangkabangbie i Armstrong at e malyaring makyabe king sanumang resulta ning kumpetisyun keng at kaybat ning Agosto 1, 1998, kayabe ya ing pamamawi kareng medalya, titulu, simbut , pangayari ("finishes"), puntus ampong premyu. Tinutul ya i Armstrong king upaya nang legal ning USADA a papalyari ya ing karelang pasiya. E pa miglual nanumang pamagbawal ("ban") ing UCI, oneng peksabi nang munye yang desisyun a maki pamangabaldugan ("reasoned decision") a babye pamipalino king karelang aksyon .Anyang Octubre 22, 2012, sinegundwan ne ning Union Cycliste Internationale (UCI), ing grupung manibala king sport, ing pasya ning USADA, at kinumpirma ne ing pangkabangbyeng pamagbawal ("lifetime ban") ampo ing pamaglako kareng titulu.

Maria Montessori:
I Maria Montessori (Agosto 31, 1870 – Mayo 6, 1952) metung yang Italianang talapanulu o doktor ampong edukador, a pikabaluan a mapaniaup kareng tau o humanitarian ampong debotung Catolicong kilalang dili king pilosopiya ning pamanurung magdala king lagyu na. Magagamit ya kareng pipagaralan o eskwelang pribadu ampong publiku o pangmalda king mabilug a yatu ing kayang paralan ning pamanuru.

Aptas:
Ing Aptas ("Internet") metung yang pangyatung sistema da reng mituglung-tuglung a computer networks a gagamit king standard Internet protocol suite (a maralas dang ausan TCP/IP, dapot e deng eganagana gagamit king TCP) ba lang pagsilbian deng bilyun-bilyung talagamit king mabilug a yatu. Metung yang "network da reng network" a bibilugan da reng milyun-milyung pribadu, publiku/ pangmalda, pangpipagaralan o akademiku, pangnegosyu ampong pangkapamahalan a network, a maki saklong panglokal o pangyatu, a mituglung-tuglung kapamilatan ning maleparan a ayus da reng teknolohiyang elektroniku, alang-kawad ("wireless") ampong optical a teknolohiyang pang-network. Ing Aptas magdala yang maleparan a sukad o saklo da reng kasangkapan ampong serbisyu o kasuyuan, alimbawa deng tuglung-tuglung a dokumetu o kasulatan a hypertext ning World Wide Web (WWW) ampo ing information infrastructure a susuporta king e-mail.
Deng keraklan kareng tradisyunal a media, kayabe ya ing teleponu, musika, pelikula, ampong telebisyon alilan no balangkas o mibabayu la kapamlatan ning Aptas, at iti panibatan da reng bayung serbisyu antimo ing Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) ampong Internet Protocol Television (IPTV). Deng pahayagan o diariu, libru ampong aliwang limbagan makibage la kig teknolohiyang pang-Web site, o magi lang blogging ampong web feed. Gewa nong maliari o posibli ning Aptas deng bayung uri da reng pamiugnayan da reng tau kapamilatan na ning instant messaging, porum a pang-Aptas, ampong social networking. Meragul e me nanu ing pamanyali king Aptas (online shopping) kareng mangaragul a pipanyalwan ampo reng mangalating artisan ampong negosyanti. Deng serbisyung pangpisalapyan ampong ugnayan da reng negosyu king Aptas makayapektu la kareng supply chain a sasaklo kareng kabilugan da reng industria.
Miraras ing pamagmula o umpisa ning Aptas king dekada ning 1960, nung kapilan pepatikdo ne ning kapamahalan ning Estados Unidos kasaup la reng grupung pribadu ampong pang-negosyu bang gawang masikan a computer network a magpaintulut-pamagkamali ampong pirakeng computer network ("robust, fault-tolerant, and distributed computer networks") . Ing pamagpondu ning metung a bayung Galudgud-Aptas ("Internet backbone") ning National Science Foundation anyang dekadang 1980, ampo ing pribadung pamagpondu kareng aliwang galudgud a pangnegosyu, migdala king pangyatung pamakkyabe king pamanalkus ("development") da reng teknolohiyang pang-networking, ampo ing pamiugne da reng dakal a network. Uli ning komersyalisasyun ning metung a ugnayang pangyatu na anyang dekadang 1990 ("international network"), migbunga king kayang pangasikat ampong pamaglub king alus balang aspetung ning makabayung bie ning tau. Anyang 2011, maigit na king 2.2 bilyung tau – alus metung a katlu ning populasyun ning yatu — ing gagamit kareng serbisyu ning Aptas.
Ala yang sentral a pamanibala ing Aptas king pamagpalyari na man ning teknolohiya o kareng patakaran ning pamanabut ampong pamangamit ("access and usage"); ing balang network atin yang sariling standard. Bukud mung deng makasaklong kabaldugan ("overreaching definitions") da reng adwang manimunang name space king Aptas, ing espasyung Internet Protocol address ampo ing Domain Name System, panibalan na la ning organisasyun a magmantini, ing Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN). Ing teknikal a pangabalangkas The ("technical underpinning") ampong standardization da reng sistemang pangbusal of the ("core protocols") a (IPv4 ampong IPv6) obra ne ning Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF), metung a aguman a e magtubu ("non-profit organization") da reng malubak pamiugneng kayanib nung nu ya malyaring makiugnayan ing ninuman kapamilatan ning pamanambag kabiasnan a teknikal ("technical expertise") .
Ding suglung palual.

Carlo Maria Martini:
I Carlo Maria Martini, SJ (15 Febrero 1927 - 31 Agosto 2012) metung yang waItalianung cardinal ning Iglesia Catolica. Ya ing Arzobispo ning Milan manibat 1980 anggang 2002, at mitas ya king panga-cardinal anyang 1983.

Chéri Samba:
I Chéri Samba o Samba wa Mbimba N’zingo Nuni Masi Ndo Mbasi (mibait Diciembre 30, 1956 king Kinto M’Vuila) metung yang pintor ibat king Democratic Republic of Congo. Metung ya kareng pekasikat a kasalukuyan a artist ibat king Africa, at at makayabe la reng kayang obra kareng koleksyon ning Centre Georges Pompidou king Paris, ampo king Museum of Modern Art king New York. Atyu la murin king The Contemporary African Art Collection (CAAC) nang Jean Pigozzi deng dakal kareng pinintura na. Meimbita yang makyabe king 2007 Venice Biennale. Alus eganagana kareng kayang pinintura, atin lang sulat kareng amanung Frances ampong ampong Lingala, a magkomentu tungkul king bie king Africa ampon king makabayung yatu ("modern world"). Manuknangan ya i Chéri Samba king Kinshasa ampo king Paris.

Juan Rulfo:
I Juan Rulfo () (16 Mayo1917 – 7 Enero 1986) metung yang Mexicanung talasulat, screenwriter ampong letratista o talakuang larawan. Metung ya kareng tatalangan dang diling talasulat king Latin America i Rulfo, at ing kayang reputasyon makasandal ya kareng adwang mangaimpis a libru, ing nobelang "Pedro Páramo" (1955), ampo ing "El Llano en llamas" (1953), metung a koleksyon da reng makuyad a salita. Milikas la king Ingles deng labing lima (15) kareng labing pitung (17) kuwentung deti, at mibulalag la king pamagat a "The Burning Plain and Other Stories"). Atyu king koleksyon a iti ing pupurian nang kuwentu, ing "¡Diles que no me maten!" ("Sabian Mu Karelang E Raku!"). Ya ampo i Jorge Luis Borges ing mepiling importanting diling talasulat king Castila king kaduang pulung dilanwa ("20th century").
Ating maigit anam a libung ( 6,000) negative da reng kayang letratu king Katatagan Juan Rulfo ("Juan Rulfo Foundation").
Karagdagang babasan.

Choi Siwon:
I Choi Shi-won (Koreanu: 최시원, Hanja: 崔始源), a mas mekilala ya bilang Siwon, metung yang talakanta ampo talaterak king Mauling Korea.

The Garden of Cosmic Speculation:
Ing Garden of Cosmic Speculation ("Múla ning Pamibule king Sikluban") atyu king Portrack House, malapit king Dumfries king Mauli Albugang Scotland. Metung yang pribadung mula o hardin a lelangan nang Charles Jencks.

Charles Jencks:
I Charles Alexander Jencks (mibait 21 Junio 1939) metung yang Americanung teorista king arkitektura, landscape architect ampong taladisenyu. Maleparan ing darasan da reng kayang kayang libru king amlat ampong kritisismu ning Modernismu ampong Postmodernism kareng lupung a maki beluan king arkitektura. Manuknangan ne ngeni i Jencks king Scotland, nung nu ya magdisenyu yang landscape sculpture ampong susulat tungkul king cosmogenic art.

P. D. James:
I Phyllis Dorothy James, Baroness James of Holland Park, OBE, FRSA, FRSL (mibait 3 Agosto 1920), a keraklan dang ausan P. D. James, metung yang Ingles a talasulat krimen ampong Conservative life peer king House of Lords, a pikabaluan dili king serie da reng nobelang detektib nung nu deng manimunang tauan pulis la, ampo ing poetang i Adam Dalgliesh.

Oscar Pistorius:
I Oscar Leonard Carl Pistorius (; mibait 22 Noviembre 1986) metung yang South African a talapulaying sprint. I Pistorius, a mekatadwa da pinutut bitis king lalam ning tud ("double below-knee amputation"), lalaban ya kareng pangapalyaring T44 (single below knee amputees) lipat ning kayabe yang tagana king T43 (double below knee amputee). Ya ing tatalan record pangyatu king T44 para king 400 meters, at ya ing sadyang tatalan king record a pangyatu kareng pangapalyaring 100 ampong 200 metres.
Lipat ning malyari yang makiabe king 2008 Summer Olympic Games king Beijing, e limput i Pistorius para king koponan ning South Africa. King pamanyubuk nang lungub king 400 meters, ya ing katlu ("third place") a maki personal a pekamabilis a oras a 46.25 seconds king Lucerne, Switzerland, anyang 16 Julio 2008, a kulang king oras a kwalipikadu king Olympics a 45.55 segundu. E ne murin pinili ning South African Olympic Committee for the 4 × 400 metres relay team; mas masanting la oras deng apat a aliwang talapulayi. Ketang 2008 Summer Paralympics, simbut ne ing gintugn medalyas king 100, 200 ampong 400 metres (T44) sprints.
Uli ning kayang 400 meters a oras a 45.07 segundu anyang 19 Julio 2011, ikwa ne ing "A" qualifying standard para king 2011 World Championships ampo king 2012 Summer Olympics. King kampeonato, mikyabe ya king 400 meters sprint ampo king 4 × 400 meters relay. Milako ("eliminated") ya king semifinal ning 400 meters sprint (a tauling miyaring maki oras a 46.19 seconds), oneng, antimong kayabe king relay team a sinambut medalyang pilak para king South Africa, ya ing mumunang meputut bitis ("amputee") a sinambut medalyang track para king pangapalyari da reng alang kapansanan ("able-bodied world track medal"), lipat ning e mepili para king final.
King 2012 Summer Olympics king London, i Pistorius ing mumunang meputut aduang bitis ("double leg amputee") a makyabe king Olympics anyang liban na ing kumpitisyun a men's 400 metres at kayabe ya king koponan ning South Africa king 4 × 400 metres relay. Kayabe ya murin king 2012 Summer Paralympics, nung nu ya mekilaban kareng kumpitisyun a men's 100 metres, 200 metres ampong 400 metres king T44 classification, ampo king T42–T46 4 × 100 metres relay. Sinambut yang gintung medalya king panglalaking He 400 meter race at menikwa yang record a oras para king Paralympic a 46.68 segundu ampong 4 × 100 meters relay king record a pangyatung oras a 41.78 segundu. Menikwa ya muring pilak a medalya king 200 meters race, at mekagawang record a pangyatung 21.30 segundu king semifinal.

Ishi:
I Ishi (manga 1860 – Marzo 25, 1916) ing tauling miembru ning lahing Yahi, ing tauling grupu da reng lahing Yana ning estadu ning California king Estados Unidos. Sikat ya aniang panaun na antimong "tauling maliap Indian" ("last wild Indian") king America i Ishi, a keraklan king bie na makalwal yang laganas king kulturang Europeu Americanu. King edad a manga 49, anyang 1911, linwal ya ibat king ilang king Oroville, California, at likwan ne ing labuad da reng kayang pipumpunan, ing ngeni Tehama County, malapit kareng kabitisan a talimunduk ("foothills") ning Talimunduk a Lassen ("Lassen Peak"), a ausan nang Ishing "Wa ganu p'a".
"Tau" ing kabaldugan ning "Ishi" king amanung Yana. Agpang king antropologong i Alfred Kroeber, binie ne ing lagyung ini kaya uling e masanting ikutang ing lagyu ning tau king kulturang Yahi. Anyang kitnan de lagyu, ing pakibat na, "Ala kung lagyu, uling alang taung minye lagyu kaku" ("I have none, because there were no people to name me.") a mangabaldugang alang Yahing sinabi king lagyu na. Tiki de reng antropologo king University of California, Berkeley, a menigaral kaya ampong dininan neng obra antimong kasaup king pamanyalugsug ("research assistant"). Kareng mitagan a limang banwa ning kayang bie, keraklan menuknangan ya king gusali ning unibersidad king San Francisco.

Leying Godwin:
Ing Leying Godwin (a king Ingles ausan dang "Godwin's law", "Godwin's Rule of Nazi Analogies" o "Godwin's Law of Nazi Analogies") metung yang argumentu o pamangaintuliran a gewa nang Mike Godwin anyang 1990 a megi nang kasebyan king Aptas ("Internet adage") . Sasabian nang "Kuntoru kakaba ing pisasabyan, alus siguradung daragul ing posibilidad a pakiyanti ya iti o ikumpara kareng Nazi o kang Hitler." ("As an online discussion grows longer, the probability of a comparison involving Nazis or Hitler approaches 1.") King makuyad a salita, apansinan na apagumasdan Godwin a, nung mika ustung panaun, sanumang pamisabi-sabi o diskusyun king Aptas panibatan ne ning pamiyanti o pamagkumpara kang Hitler ampo kareng Nazi.
Maralas, gagamitan de ing Leying Godwin antimong pamagpigil kareng argumentu king maleparan a pormang "Reductio ad Hitlerum". Ing "Reductio ad Hitlerum" pagtangkan neng sambutan ing argumentu uling iti ginamit ne o dela neng Hitler. Ala yang sasabyan ing patakaran o leyi nung bage ya ing pangabanggit o pamagkumpara kang Adolf Hitler o deng Nazi, sasabyan na mung malyaring marapat iti, king lambatan ning diskusyun, bage ya man o ali. Uli na niti, sasabyan nang Godwin a kailangang lisyan ing pamanabusu o sobrang pamangamit kareng pamagkumparang deti kareng Nazi o kang Hitler, uling lalako na da ing epektu da reng makatud o matulid a pamagkumpara o pamiyanti.
Lipat ning king metung kareng mumuna nang uri o porma ning leying Godwin makaturu yang partikular kareng diskusyun kareng Usenet newsgroup, ref name="Godwin 1991"></ref> gagamitan de ngeni ing leyi king sanumang threaded online discussion, kayabe la reng kareng forum, chat room ampong blog comment thread, at mababanggit ya king e bageng pamagkumpara o pamiyanting Nazi kareng artikulu o talumpati o speech.

Clara Schumann:
I Clara Schumann ("née" Clara Josephine Wieck; 13 Setiembre 1819 – 20 Mayo 1896) metung yang musikera ampong kompositor a Aleman ("German") a tuturing dang metung kareng makabukud diling pianista ning panaun a Romantic. Ginamit na ing kayang impluwensiya kilub ning karerang 61 (anam a pulu't metung) a banwa king pamagkonsiyerto, at elilan ne ing format na ampong kalamnan ning piano recital ampo ing panlasa ning publikung makiramdam. 
Asawa ne ing kompositor a i Robert Schumann. Pepesikanan de pilubluban ning kayang asawa i Johannes Brahms, at ya ing mumunang pianistang tinigtig king publiku kareng obra nang Brahms, lalu na ing Variations and Fugue on a Theme by Handel. .

Lucas Papademos:
I Lucas Demetrios Papademos (; mibait 11 Octubre 1947) metung yang Griegong ("Greek") ekonomistang meging Pun Ministru ning Greece manibat 2011 anggang 2012, at menimuna king metung a kapamahalan ning pamisanmetung ning bangsa ("government of national unity") kaibat ning krisis king utang ning Grecia.
Bayu iti, ya ing Governor of the Bank of Greece manibat 1994 anggang 2002, bayu ya meging Vice President of the European Central Bank manibat 2002 anggang 2010. Megi ya muring Visiting Professor of Public Policy king Kennedy School of Government king Harvard University at metung yang Senior Fellow king Center for Financial Studies king University of Frankfurt.

Panagiotis Pikrammenos:
I Panagiotis Pikrammenos (, ) (mibait 1945) metung yang ukum a Griegong migsilbing pansamantalang Pun Ministru ning Greece kanitang Mayo–Junio 2012 kaybat ning legislative election ning May 2012 anyang iti penibatan ning kayalan ning mayoria.

Antonis Samaras:
I Antonis Samaras (, ; mibait 23 Mayo 1951) metung yang Griegong ekonomista ampong pulitikung magsilbing who hPun Ministru ning Greece manibat 20 Junio 2012. Ya ing pekapun ning New Democracy, ing manimunang konserbatibu king Greece, manibat anyang 2009. Bayu ita, migsilbi yang Ministru ning Pisalapyan ("Minister of Finance") anyang 1989, at kaibat, antimong Ministrung of Panglual manibat Minister of ("Foreign Affairs") manibat 1989 anggang 1990, at pasibayu manibat 1990 anggang 1992. Kaibat na nita, ya ing Ministru ning Kultura ("Minister of Culture") anyang 2009.
Mekilala ya i Samaras uli ning kontrobersya anyang 1993 controversy nung nu ya ing meging sangkan ning pangabagsak ning kapamahalan a New Democracy, nung nu ya kayabe. Lipat na niti, migbalik ya king partidu anyang 2004 at miyalal yang pekapun na niti king masipit a alalan kilub ning partidu anyang tauli nang dake ning 2009. Ya ing kapitung pekapun ning partidu manibat anyang mitátag ya anyang 1974.

Novak Djokovic:
I Novak "Nole" Djokovic (Serbian:abbreviated as Новак Ђоковић / Novak Đoković) (mibait 22 Mayu 1987) metung yang Serbian a mamyalung tenis a propesyonal ampong sadyang mumuna king yatu. , ya kadwa agpang king Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP). Tuturing deng metung kareng mapyang diling talapamyalung king mabilug a panaun; ing kayang tagumpe king hard dela na kaya ing palayong "The King of Hardcourt", at meging sangkan kareng dakal a expertung ituring yang mapyang diling talapamyalung king hard court king kasalesayan.
Sinambut yang labing metung a titulung Grand Slam singles, i Djokovic, metung a 13 ATP World Tour Masters 1000 tournament, at kayabe ya king Serbia Davis Cup team a sinambut king 2010. 
I Djokovic ing kadwa king ranggu king yatu, kaybat nang Rafael Nadal, a telan na manibat 4 Julio 2011 anggang 8 Julio 2012. Telan ne anggang 9 Julio 2012, anyang elilan neng Roger Federer antimong manimuna king yatu.
Ing panga mikaribal da di Roger Federer ampong Rafael Nadal ing tuturing dang mapyang dili king kabilugan ning panaun king pyalung a tennis, at tuturing da pang maki "Trivalry" kareng atlu.

Da Nang International Airport:
Ing Da Nang International Airport (DMIA), mayayaus mu rin Sân bay quốc tế Đà Nẵng , iya ing peka airport a masilbi keng makaleleng Da Nang at ning makalapit a South Central Coast king Vietnam.
Deng Airlines.

Cam Ranh International Airport:
Ing Cam Ranh International Airport (DMIA), mayayaus mu rin Sân bay quốc tế Cam Ranh , iya ing peka airport a masilbi keng makaleleng Nha Trang at ning makalapit a South Central Coast king Vietnam.
