Liwalu:
Ing liwalu (), liyalu o yalu, a ausan dang climbing perch king Ingles, metung yang uri da reng asan a perciform ibat king familiang .
Listaan da reng species a tatanggapan dang king salukuyan:

Likauk:
Ing likauk o lukauk, ("Leiopotherapon plumbeus"), a ausan dang silver perch king Ingles, metung yang malating asan a kule-pilak a maulaga king king negosyu king Filipinas. Keraklan, daragul yang anggang 15 sentimetru. Pikabaluan ya king kayang malasang laman, at metung ya kareng pekamal diling asan king bangsa. Mayayakit la reng keraklan kareng species king Laguna de Bay ampong Taal Lake. King pangkabilugan, mas maragul la reng babai kesa kareng lalaki. Ing likauk metung yang asan a omnivorous, o pareu yang mamangan laman o karni da reng animal ampong tanaman, alimbawa deng plankton, mangalating paro, puga da reng aliwang asan, lumut, tanamang danum ampong mangalating insektu.

Lamu:
Ing lamu o balsa metung yang bageng patag a gagamitan king pamaglakbe o suporta king danum. Iti ing pekasimpling disenyu ning bangka, nung nukarin alang kabangkaan. Lipat ning ating uri da reng bangkang pisamut a disenyu ("crossover boat types") anya lalabug ya ining depinisyun o pangabaldug/pamaglarawan, deng keraklan kareng lamu gagato la kapamilatan da reng materyalis a gagato antimo king dutung, makasarang barilis, o lebulan a lulanan a maki at keraklan, e la gagamit makina ba lang galo. 

Niels Bohr:
I Niels Henrik David Bohr (; 7 Octubre 1885 – 18 Noviembre 1962) metung yang physicist ibat Denmark a minambag king pamitátag ning pangabalangkas ning atomo ampo king pamanintindi king pangabalangkas ning atomo ampo king quantum mechanics, at para kaniti, tinggap ne ing Nobel Prize in Physics anyang 1922. Ayalkus ("developed") ne ing modelu ning atomo nung nu ing nucleus atyu king libutad at dudurut la reng electron king orbit padurut kaniti, a kinumpara na kareng planetang dudurut king aldo. Penigobran ne ing idea king quantum mechanics a deng electron mumukyat la manibat king metung a energy level paras keng tutuki kareng malinong takbang to another in ("discrete steps") at e taglus-taglus o alang angganan king pilatan. , not ("continuously"). Tiru nalang Bohr, at mekiugnayan ya kareng dakal kareng manimunang physicist ning dilanwa/siglu king kayang institute king Copenhagen. Kayabe ya king grupu da reng British physicist a manigobra king Manhattan Project. Pepakasalan neng Bohr i Margrethe Nørlund kanitang 1912, at ing metung kareng karelang ának, i Aage Bohr, physicist ya naman, at anyang 1975 tinggap ne ing Nobel Prize. 

Paulo Coelho:
I Paulo Coelho (; mibait Agosto 24, 1947) metung yang Brazilian a talasulat amanu ning kanta ("lyricist") ampong nobelista. Megi neng metung kareng babasan dang diling talasulat king yatu ngeni. Tinanggap yang dakal a sikat a galal a internasional, kayen ne ing Crystal Award ning World Economic Forum ampo ing Légion d'honneur ning Pransya.

Hugo Chávez:
I Hugo Rafael Chávez Frías (; mibait 28 Julio 1954 - 5 Marzo 2013) ing kasalungsungan a Pamuntuk ning
Venezuela, at makalukluk king pusisyun a iti manibat kanitang 1999. Sadya neng pekapun ning partido politikal a Fifth Republic Movement manibat king kayang pamitátag anyang 1997 angga kanitang 2007, nung kapilan ya meging pekapun ning United Socialist Party of Venezuela (PSUV). Dikil king kayang ideolohiyang pampulitika ning Bolivarianism ampong "Sosyalismu para king Kadwang Pulu't Metung a Dilanwa/Siglu", titukan na ing pamipalyari kareng kapanumanan o repormang sosyalista king bangsa antimong dake ning proyektung pang-sosyedad a ausan nang Rebolusyon a Bolivarian, nung nu merapat ing pamipalyari ning bayung punbatas, konseho o lupung king participatory democratic ampo ing nasyonalisasyun da reng mapilan a manimunang industria.
Mibait ya king metung a pamilyang uring talapagobra king Sabaneta, Barinas, i Chávez, a meging opisyal king militar, at kaybat nang e mekuntentu king sistemang politikal ning 
Venezuela, tetag ne ing masikretung Revolutionary Bolivarian Movement-200 (MBR-200) anyang mumunang dake ning dekadang 1980 ba yang ilako iti. Penimunan neng Chávez ing MBR-200 king e migtagumpeng coup d'état laban king kapamahalan nang Democratic Action ning Pamuntuk Carlos Andrés Pérez anyang 1992, at mesukul ya uli na niti. Anyang mebulus ya kaybat ning adwang banwa, tetag ne ing metung a partido politikal a social democratic ing Fifth Republic Movement, at anyang and was miyalal yang pamuntuk ning Venezuela anyang 1998. Kaybat, pepalyari ne ing bayung punbatas o konstitusyon a migdagdag kareng karapatan da reng grupung mikalilwa ("marginalised groups") at elilan ne ing pangabalangkas na o istruktura ning kapamahalan ning Venezuela, at anyang miyalal yang pasibayu anyang 2000. Ketang kadwa nang terminung pangpamuntuk, linúb ne ing sistema da reng Bolivarian Missions, Communal Councils ampong kooperatibang panibalan da reng talapagobra, ampong programa ning reporma king gabun, kabang bibili no king kapanibalan ning kapamahalan deng miayaliwang manimunang industria. 
Lalarawan nong Chávez deng kayang polisiya antimong laban king imperialismo, at metung yang masikan a kritiku ning neoliberalism at king kabilugan ning kapitalismu, at metung yang manimunang kalaban ning polisiya nang panglual ning Estados Unidos.
Metung yang malapit a ka-alyadu da reng kapamahalan a komunista nang Fidel at kaybat Raúl Castro king Cuba ampo reng kapamahalan a sosyalista nang Evo Morales king Bolivia, Rafael Correa king Ecuador ampong Daniel Ortega king Nicaragua, at ing kayang pangapamuntuk, akakit de antimong kayabe king sosyalistang "pink tide" a mikakalat king Latin America. Metung yang talasuporta ning pamisaup-saup a Latin American ampong Caribbean at maragul ya papil king pamitátag king pangkabilugang rehiyon a Union of South American Nations, ing Bolivarian Alliance for the Americas, ing Bank of the South, ampo ing rehiyonal a television network a TeleSur. Metung yang kontrobersyal a taung magdalang pamipitna-pitna i Chávez king bangsa na ampo king kilwal na niti.
Anyang 7 Octubre 2012, sinambut ya i Chávez king alalan nang pampamuntuk ning kayang bangsa king katlung pamikatagun, at simbut ne i Henrique Capriles. Magsilbi yang anam pang banwa. 

Deepak Chopra:
I Deepak Chopra (; mibait Octubre 22, 1946) metung yang Americanung talapanulu ampong talasulat a mibait India. Tinuru ya i Chopra kareng eskuelang medikal ning Tufts University, Boston University ampong Harvard University. Megi yang Chief of Staff ning New England Memorial Hospital (NEMH) king Massachusetts, bayu ya minta king pribadung pamanulu ("private practice"). Anyang 1985, mikit ya i Chopra ampo i Maharishi Mahesh Yogi, at inagkat ne i Choprang manigaral king Ayurveda. Likwan neng Chopra ing pusisyun na king NEMH at megi yang a pamuntuk ning American Association of Ayurvedic Medicine, at kaybat medical director ning Maharishi Ayurveda Health Center. 
Kanitang 1996, tetag neng Chopra ampo ing neurologist a i David Simon ing Chopra Center for Wellbeing, nung nu makayanib ing Ayurveda king kayang kaparalanan, at atyu king La Jolla, California. Babye lang kreditu para king taglus-taglus a pamagaral king pamanulu ("continuing medical education") deng University of California, San Diego, School of Medicine ampong American Medical Association para kareng aliwang programang yampang da kareng talapanulu ("physicians") king Chopra Center. Anyang 2002, inalis neng Chopra ampong Simon ing the Chopra Center king lugal ning La Costa Resort and Spa king Carlsbad, California. Kanitang 2009, tetag neng Chopra ing Chopra Foundation ba yang isulung ing pangimut ning pamanulung pangkaisipan ampong pangkatawan, pamagaral, ampong pamanyalugsug to advance the cause of mind/body spiritual healing, education, and ("research") kapamilatan ning pamangalap pondu para kareng mepiling proyektu.
Mekasulat neng maygit 65 books a libru i Chopra, at 19 la reng "New York Times" bestseller. Milikas no kareng 35 a amanu deng kayang libru, at maygit nong 20 milyun deng misali king mabilug a yatu. Tinanggap neng dakal a galal i Chopra, kayabe ya ing Oceana Award (2009), ing Cinequest Life of a Maverick Award (2010), Humanitarian Starlite Award (2010), and the GOI Peace Award (2010). Agpang kareng aliwa, ya ing "metung ya kareng manimunang pekapun ning pangimut a kaisipan-katawan-espiritu" ("He is thought by some to be "one of the pre-eminent leaders of the mind-body-spirit movement").

Evo Morales:
I Juan Evo Morales Ayma (mibait Octubre 26, 1959), a sikat king lagyung Evo (), metung yang pulitiku ampong aktibistang Bolivian, a magsilbi antimong Pamuntuk ning Bolivia, pusisyun a tatalnan na manibat kanitang 2006. Pekapun ne mu naman ning Pangimut para king Sosyalismu Movement for Socialism – Political Instrument for the Sovereignty of the Peoples (MAS) ampo ing unyong "Cocalero". King kayang pulitika, metung yang pekapun a sosyalista, at ing pundasyun ning kayang pangapamuntuk ("presidency") ya pin ing pamanutuk king pangapalyari king pangsa da reng bayung polisiya, ing ing pamipakilala ning metung a bayung punbatas o konstitusyon, reporma king gabun, ing pamanalis da reng miayaliwang manimunang industria king upaya ning kapamahalan, ing pamaglaban king papil ning Estados Unidos king pulitika ning bangsa, ampo ing pamagbawas king kakalulwan.
Mibait ya king uring talapagobrang pamilyang Aymara king Isallawi, Orinoca Canton, at meragul ya i Evo a sasaup kareng kayang pengari anting metung a ortelanu. E miyari king sekundarya o high school. Migsane ya i Morales king militar lalam ning sapilitang pamagsilbing militar kilub ning pabanwa anggang 1978, at mibalik ya king propesyon ning kayang pamilya, ing pamanasik, at minalis ya kayabe ra king Chapare Lalawigan. Miras ya king pamananam coca, at megi yang aktibu king unyon da reng talatanam coca, ing pangimut a "cocalero". Megi yang pikabalwan a aktibista kareng campesino (talapagobra king baryu), at mekilala ya king pamanibala king pamaglaban king tangka ning Estados Unidos a patuknangan ing pamagpatubung coca para king pamangawang cocaine antimong dake ning karelang mas maleparan a "Gera kareng Droga ("War on Drugs"). 
Miras king larangan ning pulitika ing kayang aktibismu. Megi yang pekapun ning MAS, at kapamilatan na niti, miabe ya kareng protesta sosyal antimo ing laban king gas ampo deng Protesta king Cochabamba ning 2000. Parasan ning MAS ing mamye karagdagang upaya kareng komunidad a katutubu ampong pakakalulu ning bangsa kapamilatan ning reporma king gabun ampong pamirake ning pibandyan king gas, at bagya-bagyang meragul ing suporta na kareng alalan. 
Miyalal yang Pamuntuk ning Bolivia i Morales anyang Diciembre 18, 2005, kapamilatan ning 53.7% ning botu. Kaybat da reng adwa ampong kapitnang banwa, meragul yang mayap ing kayang mayoria; king recall referendum anyang Agosto 14, 2008, maygit adwang katlu da reng botanti ing migbotung mandatila/manatili ya king pusisyun. Sinambut ne naman i Morales king alalang pang-pamuntuk anyang Diciembre 2009 kapamilatan ning 63% ning botu, at sindu na ing kayang kadwang terminu antimong pamuntuk.
Kritiku ne ning polisiya nang panglual ning Estados Unidos ampo ing papil da reng kumpanyang 
transnational king Latin America, at metung yang masikan a ka-alyadu da reng kapamahalan a sosyalista nang Hugo Chávez king Venezuela ampong Fidel Castro king Cuba. Anyang Octubre 2009, mepili yang "Pangyatung Bayani ning Indung Yatu" ("World Hero of Mother Earth") i Morales king Pangkabilugang Kapulungan da reng Misasanmetung a Bangsa.

Felix Baumgartner:
I Felix Baumgartner (; mibait 20 Abril 1969) metung yang Austrian a skydiver ampong BASE jumper. Ginawa yang record a pangyatu para king skydiving kapamilatan ning pamaglundag king tatantyan dang , at disan na ing bilis a tatantyan dang , o Mach 1.24, anyang Octubre 14, 2012. Pikabaluan ya mu naman king mapanganib a uri da reng stunt a gagawan na king kayang karera. Mikyabe ya i Baumgartner king militar ning Austria, nung nu ya migsane king pamaglundag ibat kareng parachute, kayabe ya ing pamagsaneng dugpa kareng mangalating target zone.
Ing pekabayu nang proyektung Baumgartner ya pin ing Red Bull Stratos, nung nu ya linuksu papunta king Yatu ibat king lobung helium king stratosphere anyang 14 Octubre 2012. Metung nang dake ning proyektu ing pamanabut king record king kátas ("altitude record") para king pamanyulagpo ning lobung maki tau ("manned balloon flight").

Leon Uris:
I Leon Marcus Uris (Agosto 3, 1924 – Junio 21, 2003) metung yuang Americanung nobelistang mekilala king piksyong pangkasalesayan ampo ing malalam nang pamanyalugsug a mibugnus kareng kayang nobela. Deng adua nang librung pekamasali ("bestselling") ila pin ding "Exodus" (milimbag anyang 1958) ampo ing "Trinity" (milimbag anyang 1976).

Mo Yan:
I Guan Moye (; mibait 17 Febrero 1955), a mas kilala king talipampan ("pen name") a Mo Yan (), metung yang Isik a nobelista ampong talasulat makuyad a salita ("short story writer"), a agpang kang Donald Morrison king magasin pambalita ("news magazine") ning Estados Unidos a "TIME", "metung kareng pikabalwan dili, maralas babawal] ampong paneng mapipiratang talasulat a Isik"("one of the most famous, oft-banned and widely pirated of all Chinese writers"). Sasabyan dang ya ing pakibat ning China kang Franz Kafka o Joseph Heller. at pikabaluan yang dili kareng talabasa king Albugan uling kareng kayang nobelang "Red Sorghum" ampong "Sorghum Wine," a kaybat megawang pelikula, ing "Red Sorghum". Anyang 2012, Mirinan yang galal i Mo kapamilatan ning pamananggap king Nobel Prize in Literature uling king kayang obra antimong talasulat a "kapamilatan ning hallucinatory realism piyayanib na la deng kuwentung pangmalda ("folk tale"), ing amlat ampo ing kasalungsungan a panaun ("the contemporary")". ("who with hallucinatory realism merges folk tales, history and the contemporary").

Kansasaga:
Ing kansasaga ("Abrus precatorius"), a ausan dang "jequirity, Crab's eye, rosary pea, John Crow Bead, precatory bean, Indian licorice, Akar Saga, gidee gidee "o" Jumbie bead "king Ingles,(ing tauli king Trinidad & Tobago) metung yang payat ampong pilmihan ("perennial") a baging a kukulate kareng dutung, palungpung ampong bakud a palungpung ("hedge"). Metung yang legume a maki makabang bulung a maki tela-pakpak ("pinnate") a bulung-bulungan ("leaflets").
Pikabalwan yang dili ing tanaman kareng kayang butul o binî, a gagamitan da antimong butil (ning rosaryu o kwintas), at kareng instrumentung "percussion" o papalwan o pupulpukan. Mákalasun ya iti uling king abrin. Katutubu ya king Indonesia ining tanaman, at tutubu ya kareng lugal a mapali o "tropical" o mapaling bagya o "subtropical" ning yatu nung nu ya mídala. Maralas, mági yang dikut ("weed") at matalik yang kumalat kareng lugal nung nu ya midala. 

Katunggal:
Ing katunggal o San Jose ("Proiphys amboinensis", syn. "Eurycles amboinensis") pekilagyu de king isla ning was Amboina, a ngeni Ambon, king Indonesia. Kayabe la kareng karaniwan nang lagyu king Ingles deng "Cardwell Lily" ampong "Northern Christmas Lily" (uling keraklan manga Pasku karin ya manyampaga). Mayayakit ya king Mauli-Aslagang Asia, king Indonesia, ampo king Australia manibat king Cape York angga king Kalibudtang Queensland.
Kapad na ing kakewan, gubat o pulu a makabuklat ampong masalilung bagya. Mabilis yang tutubu karatang ning kauran, at mikaka bulung yang alus mangabilug, at deti, mitutukyan lang mangasanting a sampagang maputi ampong mabanglu, at maki dilong batal ("throats"). Maygit lang 25 cm kaba deng mangaragul nang bulung, a maki sanga lang bulung ("leaf stem") a miraras 46 cm king kaba. Manga 5 cm la lapad deng kayang purung mangaputing sampaga, at angga lang 18 deng abe-abe kareng sanga nang miraras 46 cm king kaba. Keraklan, malilyari ing pamanyampaga da neng Kapaskuan, at iti tutukyan na ning pamaglual da reng "capsule" a berdi anggang manuling-nuling ("blackish") a maki lapad a 25–30 mm. Malalanat la reng bulung neng kaleldo. 

Norodom Sihanouk:
I Norodom Sihanouk (Khmer: នរោត្តម សីហនុ; 31 Octubre 192215 October 2012) ing meging Ari ning Cambodia manibat 1941 anggang 1955, at pasibayu manibat 1993 anggang 2004. Ya ing tatalan upaya king Cambodia manibat 1953 anggang 1970. Kaibat ning kadwa nang pamanabili king tronu anyang 2004, meyaus yang Ing Ari-Ibpa ning Cambodia ("The King-Father of Cambodia", Khmer: "Preahmâhaviraksat"), metung a pusisyun nung nu mendatila/menatili la kaya deng dakal kareng kapakibatan o resposibilidad na antimong konstitusyonal a ari. 
Anak neng Ari Norodom Suramarit ampong Reyna Sisowath Kossamak, i Sihanouk, at makanyan la karakal deng pusisyun a telan na manibat kanitang 1941, a agpang king Guinness Book of World Records, ya ing pulitikung dakal dili tatalnan a puestu king pulitika.}} </ref> Kayabe la kareti deng adwa antimong ari, adwa antimong mayupayang prinsipi ("sovereign prince"), metung antimong pamuntuk/presidenti, adwa antimong pun ministru, ampong dakal a pusisyun antimong pekapun da reng miayaliwang governments-in-exile. Migsilbi yang tutang He served as ("puppet") a pekapun ning estadu ("puppet head of state") ning kapamahalang Khmer Rouge anyang 1975–1976.
Pang-dangalan (" honorific") la mû deng keraklan kareng pusisyun a reti, kayabe ne ing tauli antimong konstitusyonal a ari ning Cambodia. Ing taganang panaun ning epektibung pangalukluk nang Sihanouk king Cambodia milyari manibat anyang 9 Noviembre 1953, nung kapilan ne pigkalub ning Pransiya ing katimawan king Cambodia, angga kanitang 18 Marzo 1970, nung kapilan leko neng Heneral Lon Nol ampo ing Kapulungang Pambangsa and the ("National Assembly") i Sihanouk.

Galumbang:
Ing galumbang ("Jatropha curcas" L.) metung yang species ning tanaman a manyampaga king familiang spurge, Euphorbiaceae, a katutubu kareng lugal a tropical o mapali king Pangulung America, malyaring Mexico ampong Kalibudtang America. Tatanam de kareng labwad a tropical ampong subtropical king mabilug a yatu, at darakal ne anti kareng tanamang katutubu kareng aliwang lugal. Minuna neng ing lagyu ning species, ing ""curcas"", ning Portugues a doktor, i Garcia de Orta, maygit nang 400 (apat a ralan) a banwa ing milabas, at e siguradu nung nukarin ya ibat. Kayabe la kareng lagyu nang karaniwan king Ingles deng "Barbados Nut", "Purging Nut", "Physic Nut", o "JCL" (pamikuyad ning "Jatropha curcas" Linnaeus).
Ing galumbang metung yang makalasun a palungpung o malating pun dutung, a miraras king kátas a 6 m (20 pie). Agyu na ing malanging klima, anya mabibie ya kareng desiertu. 
Atin lang 27-40% laru (average: 34.4% ) deng butul o biní a malyaring iprosesu bang gawang matas a uring panangab o "fuel" a biodiesel, a malyaring gamitan king karaniwan a makinang diesel. Atin la muring misnang mákalasun a toxalbumin, ing curcin, deng butul.

Aksibal a mabie:
Ing aksibal a mabie ("Tradescantia spathacea" Sw.) metung yang tanaman a katutubu king Mexico a maki malaman a "rhizome". Atin yang bulung a makintab a balamu espadang makapadurut king libutdad anti king rosas. Makintab la reng kayang bulung, a madalumdum anggang mala-metal a panga aluntyan/berdi, a aluntyan ("dark to metallic green") king babo, at makintab a kulul ubi king lalam. Miraras lang 1 a pie (30 cm) kaba deti at 3 pulgada (7.5 cm) lapad. Mangasanting lang tanaman hardin a miraras 1 a pie (30 cm) king kátas.

Adonidia:
Ing Adonidia metung yang monotypic a genus da reng manyampagang tanaman king familia Arecaceae family. Metung ya mu species, ing luyus sungsung o Manila palm (Adonidia merrillii, synonyms : "Normanbya merrillii" Becc. and "Veitchia merrillii"(Becc.) H.E.Moore). King Ingles, maralas deng ausang "Christmas Palm" uling magi lang malutu deng kayang bunga neng panaun a ita, ing panaun ning karimlan. Keraklan, malati ya ampong payat ing palmeras a ini, at keraklan ing kayang kátas manga 15-25 pie, dapot miraras yang 36 pie kareng "greenhouse".
Natural ya mung tutubu iti king Filipinas. Diritak no reng tanaman a anti kaniti uling mawawala no reng lugal nung nukarin la natural a tutubu. 
Sumangid na niti, maleparan ing pamananam kaniti, at tutubu yang masalese kareng lugal a tropical o mapali, antimo ing Hawaii ampo ing mauling Florida king Estados Unidos. 

Luyus:
Ing luyus ("Areca catechu" L.) metung yang species ning palmang tutubu king keraklan kareng mapali o tropical a dake ning Pacifico, Asia, ampong mapilang dake ning aslagang Africa. Paniwalan dang menibat ya ing palma king Filipinas o Malaysia. Ibat ya ing katayang "Areca" king kayang lagyung siyentipiku king lokal a lagyung magagamit king Malabar Coast ning India, ati ing "catechu" ibat ya king aliwa pang lagyung Malay para kaniting palm, 'ing 'caccu".

Robert Clive:
I Major-General Robert Clive, 1st Baron Clive, KB MP FRS (29 Setiembre 1725 – 22 Noviembre 1774), a ausan da mu namang Clive of India, metung yang British a opisyal a mitikdo king pamibabo king militar ampong pulitika ning East India Company king Bengal. Ya ing tuturing dang makirapat king pamitatag ning upaya ning India para king korona ning Britania. Kayabe ya i Warren Hastings, metung ya kareng mumunang tauan king pamaglalang king British India. Megi ya mu namang Tory Pekakatawan king Parlamento da reng Tory king Inglaterra (England).

Paù:
Ing paù ("Mangifera altissima") metung yang species ning pun dutung king familiang Anacardiaceae . Mayayakit ya king Indonesia, Malaysia, Papua New Guinea, Filipinas, ampong Solomon Islands. Diritak no reng tanaman uling mawawala la kareng lugal nung nukarin la sadyang mayayakit. 

Ebus:
Ing ebus, ("Corypha umbraculifera" L.), "talipot palm" king Ingles, metung yang species ning palmang katutubu king mauling India (Malabar Coast) ampong Sri Lanka.
Metung ya kareng maragul diling palma king yatu; ating tanaman a miraras king 25 m, at deng karelang pun, miraras lang anggang 1.3 m king kapal. Metung yang fan palm (Arecaceae tribu Corypheae), a maki bulung a mangaragul a at mala-palmang palmate miraras 5 m king kapal, a maki petiole a miraras 4 m, at maki anggang 130 a bulung-bulungan ("leaflet"). 
Pekamaragul ya kumpul da reng sampaga king sanumang tanaman ing ebus, a maki kabang 6-8 m, a maki metung anggang pilang milyung mangalating sampaga, a makabili king tangkeng maki sangang lalto king babo ning pun (ing titan arum, "Amorphophallus titanum", king familia Araceae, maki maragul yang diling kumpul da reng sampagang e magsanga, anti ing species a "Rafflesia arnoldii" ing maki pekamaragul a magdiliding sampaga). Monocarpic, ya ing ebus, misan ya mu manyampaga, potang maki edad yang 30 anggang 80 banua. Kailangan ning prutas o bungang pabanua ba yang lulut, at ing tanaman mikaka libu-libu yang bungang mabilug ampong maki kuleng dilo-aluntyan a 3-4 cm king dagul, at maki tunggal lang butul o binî. Mamamate ya ing tanaman kaybat nang memunga. 

Pugung katipo:
Ing pugung katipo ("Turnix suscitator") metung yang ayup a kayabe king metung a malating familiang kawangis da, oneng e ro kamaganak, deng tutung pugu. Ing species a iti mayayakit ya manibat king India angga king malisangan o tripical a Asia angga king mauling China, Indonesia ampo king Filipinas.

Wissam al-Hassan:
I Wissam Adnan al-Hassan ( "Wissām ‘Adnān al-Ḥassan"; 11 Abril 1965 – 19 Octubre 2012) metung yang brigadier general king Lebanese Internal Security Forces (ISF) ampong pekapun ning Information Branch. Lalon de antimong manimunang personalidad a Sunni king Lebanon, at metung yang manimunang kayanib king oposisyun a alang pwestung pampulitika.

Lu Xun:
I Lu Xun () o kaya Lu Hsün (Wade-Giles), iti ing talipampan lagiu ng Zhou Shuren () (Septiembri 25, 1881 – Octubri 19, 1936), a talasulat a Isik ning pang20 dilanua. Mabibilang ya kareng dakal bilang manimunung aske ning makabayung literaturang pangIsik, a sinulat na king "baihua" (白話) (keng katutubung amanu) at makanian mu rin keng classicong Isik. I Lu Xun metung yang talasulat a makuyad a salita, editor, talalikas amanu, criticu, talasanese ampong watas. Iniang 1930s meging yang pamuntuk pangtitular na ning Liga da reng Maka-Kailing Talasulat (League of the Left-Wing Writers) king Shanghai.

Ian Fleming:
I Ian Lancaster Fleming (28 Mayo 1908 – 12 Agosto 1964) metung yang Ingles a talasulat, peryodista ampong naval intelligence officer, a kilalang dili ketang kayang serie da reng nobelang ispiyang James Bond. series of spy novels. Ibat ya i Fleming king makwaltang pamilyang maki kaugnayan king bangkung pangkomersyung ("merchant bank") Robert Fleming & Co., at Myembru ne ning Parlamento i tata nang pekakatawan ning Henley manibat 1910 angga king kayang kamatayan king Western Front anyang 1917. Megaral ya king Eton, Sandhurst ampo deng unibersidad ning Munich ampong Geneva, i Fleming, a dinalan kareng mapilang obra bayu ya migumpisang sumulat. 
Kabang magobra ya king 
British naval intelligence anyang Kadwang Gerang Pangyatu, miugne ya i Fleming king pamagplanu ning Operation Mincemeat ampo ning Operation Golden Eye. Miugne ya mu naman king pamagplanu ampong pamaglawe He was also involved in the planning and ("oversight") da reng adwang "intelligence unit", ing 30 Assault Unit ampo ing T-Force. Ibat king kayang serbisyu ampo karera antimong peryodista ing minye "kagulutan" ("background"), detalye ampong lalam kareng nobelang James Bond. 
Sinulat neng Fleming ing mumuna nang nobela, ing "Casino Royale", anyang 1952. Metung yang tagumpe, a mekatatlu milimbag It was a success, with ("three print runs") a mekumisyun bang pakibatan ing pamangaylangan kaniti. Labi lang metung deng nobela ampong koleksyon da reng makuyad a salitang being commissioned to cope with the demand. Eleven Bond novels and two {"short-story collections") tinuki kaniti, pilatan ning 1953 ampong 1966. Dudurut la reng nobela kang James Bond, metung a opisyal king Secret Intelligence Service, a keraklan awsan dang MI6. Mayayaus ya mu naman i Bond king kayang code number a 007, at commander ya king Royal Naval Reserve. Kayabe la reng kuwentung Bond kareng pekamasaling librung piksyon king kabilugan ning panaun, uling misali no reng 100 milyung kopya king mabilug a yatu. Sinulat ne mu namang Fleming ing kuwentung pang-anák a "Chitty-Chitty-Bang-Bang" ampong adwang obra ning e piksyon and two works of ("non-fiction"). Anyang 2008, binili ne ning "The Times" i Fleming king ranggung ka-labing apat ("fourteenth") king kayang listaan da reng "The 50 greatest British writers since 1945" (limampulung mapyang diling talasulat a Britaniko manibat anyang 1945).
Asawa ne i Ann Charteris, a midiborsyu king kadwang Viscount Rothermere uli ning kayang pamakiugnayan kang Fleming. Atin lang anak di Fleming ampong Charteris, i Caspar. Matalik yang sindi ampong minum i Fleming, a maki sakit king pusu; mete ya anyang 1964 king idad a 56, king ataki king pusu. Adwa la reng librung James Bond a milimbag kaybat nang mete, at bukud kaniti, lima lang aliwa pang talasulat deng ginawang nobelang Bond. Adwang pulu't apat neng ukdu o besis mipalage kareng pelikula ing tauan nang Fleming, at pitu lang artista deng linage kaniti. 

William S. Baring-Gould:
I William Stuart Baring-Gould (1913–1967) metung yang gagalangan a iskolar tungkul kang Sherlock Holmes, a pikabalwan dili antimong talasulat ning maimpluwensiyang talambyeng piksyon a misulat kanitang 1962, ing "Sherlock Holmes of Baker Street: A life of the world's first consulting detective".

Siraj ud-Daulah:
I Mirza Muhammad Siraj ud-Daulah (, Bengali: নবাব সিরাজদৌল্লা), a mas maralas dang awsang "Siraj ud-Daulah" (1733 – Julio 2, 1757), ing tawling timawang Nawab ning Bengal. Ing wakas ning kayang pamanungkulan ing meging umpisa ning pamanibala ning British East India Company king Bengal, at kaybat, king alus mabilug a Mauling Asia. Neng kayi, awsan deng ""Sir Roger Dowler"" o ""Sir Roger Dowlah"" deng mapilan kareng kapanaun nang Britaniko o British, at ""Sau Raja Dowla"" agpang kang John Holwell. Nanupata, deng aus a reti, kayabe ne ing ""Sepoy"", sikwil do reng talasulat a mas tawli at keylyan. 

Emperador Wu ning Han:
Ing Emperador Wu ning Han (; 156–87 BC), taganang lagiu Liu Che (劉徹), iya ing pang pitung emperador na ning {Dynasty] ning Tsina, menungkulan manibat 141 BC anggang 87 BC. I Emperor Wu mayayalala ya bilang kareng mangalapad nang asakup a gabun iniang yang manungkulan, at makanian mu rin keng masikan ampong makapalibutad Confucian state a kayang tetag, keng amlat Isik bilang pekamasikan a emperador na ning Han dynasty ampong metung kareng pekamasikan a emperador agpang keng amlat ning Tsina. King kapamilatan ng Emperador Wung masusing pamangubiernu ing Han Dynasty meging yang metung kareng pekamasikan mabilug a yatu.

Mani:
Ing mani (Arachis hypogaea) metung yang species king familiang legume o "kamangyang" familia (Fabaceae). Mapalyaring minuna yang mitanam ing mani kareng lambak ning Paraguay. Metung yang banwahan ("annual") a tanaman a yerba a miraras kátas. Misusumangid ("opposite") la reng bulung, a malapakpak ("pinnate") a maki apat a bulung-bulungan ("leaflets") (adwang misusumangid a pari, ala king sepu), at ing balang bulung-bulungan maki kabang 1 anggang 7 cm (⅜ to 2¾ in) ampong 1 anggang 3 cm (⅜ anggang 1 pulgada) pulgada king lapad.

Tagan ginu:
Ing tagan ginu o tagan birhen ("Solea humilis") metung yang species ning asan ning familia Soleidae king orden Pleuronectiformes.
Lugal nung nu ya makayakit.
Mayayakit ya kareng bebe dayatmalat ning Madras (India) angga king Filipinas, China ampong Indonesia.

Colegio de la Inmaculada Concepcion de la Concordia:
Ing Colegio de la Inmaculada Concepcion de la Concordia, o kabud na mu Concordia College metung yang Katolikung pipagaralan a pribadung atsu king Pedro Gil, Paco, Menila, king Filipinas. Mitátag ya ing kolehiyo anyang 1868 at palakad de deng Daughters of Charity of Saint Vincent de Paul. Minasensu ya ing Concordia College anyang bandang wakas ning kalabingsyam a dilanwa o siglu, at merakal la reng lulub keti. Kayabe la kareng pikabalwan deng magaral di Saturmina, Soledad ampong Olympia, deng kapatad nang babai ning Pambangsang Bayani ning Filipinas, i Jose Rizal, ampo reng adwa nang kalugurán, di - Segunda Katigbak ampong Leonor Rivera - at itang kadwa, mitatak ya king kasalesayan kapamilatan da reng kayang nobela antimo i Maria Clara.

Salé:
Ing salé ("Cymbopogon citratus" (DC.) Stapf), a lemon grass o oil grass king Ingles ampong "tanglad" king Tagalug, metung yang tanaman kareng lugal a mapali o is a "tropical" ibat king Mauli-aslagang Asia ("Southeast Asia"). 
Gamit king pamaglutu.
King Filipinas, gagamitan de ing sale king pamaglutu, lalu na king "lechon" ampong ningnang a manuk.

Mutâ:
Ing mutâ ("Cyperus rotundus"), a mayayaus "coco-grass", "purple nut sedge" o "red nut sedge", king Ingles metung yang species ning sedge (Cyperaceae) a katutubu king Africa, mauli ampong kalibudtang Europa (bandang pangulu king Pransiya ampong Austria), ampong mauling Asia. 
Metung yang tanamang pilmihan ("perennial") ing mutâ, a miraras king kátas a anggang 140 cm (55 pulgada). 
Anti kareng aliwang kayabe king familia Cyperaceae, mányuli la reng bulung kareng daneng titlu ("in ranks of three") manibat king pun o lalam ning tanaman, manga 5–20 cm a kaba. Trianggulu ya ing dakeng cross-section ning tangke ning sampaga. Bisexual (maki dakeng lalaki ampong babali) ing sampaga, a maki atlung stamen ampong carpel a maki atlung stigma. Maki atlu yang anggulung achene ing bunga o prutas.
Keng purmeru, manalkus ya o magpormang maputi ampong malaman a rhizome ing pamibalangkas da reng yamut ning tanaman, a miras 25 mm king dagul, a pakakadena. Tutubu lang patas deng aliwang rhizome, kaybat, manalkus lang mala-bombilyang istruktura nung nu la tutubu deng bayung suli ampong yamut, at manibat kareng yamut, tutubu la reng bayung rhizome. Deng aliwang rhizome tutubu lang pakera s grow ("horizontally") o pababa, at manalkus lang maralumdum a malutu-lutung komangging ("dark reddish-brown") tuber, o kadena o tuglung-tuglung a tuber o lamang-gabun. 
Malangi ing buri nang gabun, oneng malyari ya kareng mamasa-masang gabun, at tutubu ya kareng asikan ampong masukal o mengapaburen a gabun ("wastelands").

Uladulad:
Ing uladulad ("Heliotropium indicum"), a ausan dang "Indian heliotrope" king Ingles, metung yang tanaman a banwahan is an ("annual") mabwak ("hirsute") a maralas akakit a dikut kareng lugal a masukal o tutuknangan dang tau plant that is a common weed in waste places and ("settled") . Katutubu ya king Asia.

Bawebawe:
Ing bawébáwe ("Quisqualis indica"), a mayayáus "Chinese honeysuckle" ampong "Rangoon Creeper" king Ingles ampong "niyog-niyogan" king Tagalug, métung yang baging a maki malútung sampágang pákakumpul, at mayayákit ya king Asia. Mayayákit ya múrin karéng dakal a dáke ning yátu antimóng tanáman a pampasanting ("ornamental") o kabúd né mu tútúbû. Déng 
áliwang lagyú ning tanáman, ila pin déng quiscual (Castila), madhu malti or madhumalti ( Hindi), akar dani (Malay) ampóng radha manoharam (Telugu). Ing lagyú ning genus, Latin ya para king "Nánu ya yan?".
Dalerayan.
Magamitan la reng butul para king pamanulu kareng bulati king atsan (Roundworm ampong Pinworm). Makalasun ya king bulati at papaten na la king bituka.

Baugin:
Ing baugin ("Bambusa blumeana"), a mayayaus "bayog" king Tagalug, metung yang species ning kwayan a mayayakit king Tropical Asia. ]].

Isip (pun dutung):
Ing isip ("Antidesma bunius") metung yang species ning pun dutung a mamunga ("fruit tree") king familia Phyllanthaceae. Katutubu ya king Mauli-aslagang Asia ampong pangulung Australia. Ausan deng "bignay" king Tagalug ampong "Chinese-laurel", "Herbert River-cherry", "Queensland-cherry", "salamander-tree", "wild cherry", ampong "currant tree" king Ingles. Metung yang tanaman a aliwa-liwa itsura ("variable plant") a malyaring mababa ampong mala-palungpung ("shrubby") o matas ampong matulid, a miraras 30 metru king kátas. Atin yang mangaragul a bulung a tabas tulungkaba ("oval shaped") a "evergreen" (e mababaldug) at maki kabang anggang 20 cm ampong 7 cm king lapad. Makatuglung la reti kareng sanga ning pun dutung a maki mangakuyad a petiole, at gagawa lang makapal ampong masalilung a takap. 
Ating lalaki ampong babaing tanaman, at tutubu la kareng mikakawaning tanaman deng lalaki ampong babaing tanaman. Masikan la ampong e makaing masanting a bau deng sampaga. Makaayus la kareng mangalating kumpul deng lalaking (staminate) a sampaga, kabang deng babai o pistillate a sampaga tutubu la kareng mangakabang raceme a potang kayi máging mangakabang sangang maki bunga. Mangabilug la reng bunga, a kulang king metung a sentimetru king lapad, a pakasabit tunggal tunggal o paris-paris kareng mangakaba ampong mangabayat a piling. Maputi la neng bubut la, at bagya-bagya lang maging malutu at kaybat, matuling.
E la agnan-agnan lululut deng bunga king metung a kumpul, anya miayaliwa la kule deng bunga king metung a kumpul. Malutu ya katas ing balat ning bunga, kabang ala yang kule ing maputing laman. Maputi ya kule ing butul. Maslam ya ing bungang anting cranberry neng bubut ya, at maslam-aslam yang mayumu-yumu potang malulut ya. Tatanam de ing pun dutung king kabilugan ning lugal nung nu ya katutubu, at maralas dong gagawan jam deng prutas. Maralas deng tatanam kareng mula king Java.

Parusparus:
Ing parusparus ("Corbicula fluminea"), a awsan dang "tulya" king Tagalug, "alibwag" king Bikol, "dukyang" king Pangasinan, "kaykay" king Cebuano, ampang "bebe" king Waray, metung yang species ning freshwater clam, metung a bivalve (adwa kapsa o "shell") a mollusk (grupu da reng susu, talaba, sulib, parusparus, atlwp.) bivalve king familia Corbiculidae. Agpang kang Morton, 1979) ing C. fluminea ya mu namang species king Corbicula manilensis (Philippi, 1844), ing kilalang lagyung siyentipiku o "scientific name" ning parusparus."
Menibat ya ing species king Asia, anya king Ingles, neng kayi ausan deng "Asian clam" or "Asiatic clam". King negosyung aquarium ampong and koi, maralas, ing aus da, "Golden Clam" o "Golden Freshwater Clam". King mauli-aslagang Asia, ausan deng "prosperity clam" o "good luck clam".
Midala ne ing species kareng dakal a dake ning yatu, antimo king Pangulung America ampong Europa.
Ing manimuna dang kakanan, deng phytoplankton (algae), a sasalakan da manibat king lalam da reng sapa, dayatan o kanal.

Kabasi:
Ing kabasi ("Anodontostoma chacunda" F. Hamilton, 1822), a "Chacunda gizzard shad" king Ingles, metung yang species da reng asan a kayabe king familia Clupeidae.

Anodontostoma:
Ing Anodontostoma metung yang malating genus da reng "gizzard shad" king labuad a Indo-Pacific. King salukuyan, kayabe la reng makatuking species, nung nu kayabe ya ing "Anodontostoma chacunda", a maki lagyung kabasi king Kapampangan. Atin yang atlung milarawan a species ngeni.

Bagukbagukan:
Ing bagukbagukan ("Ageratum conyzoides") a "billygoat-weed", "chick weed", "goatweed", ampong "whiteweed" king Ingles, katutubu ya king mapali o tropical nang dake ning Mauling America, lalu na king Brazil. Metung yang yerbang 0.5–1 m. kátas, a maki bulung a tulungkaba, a 2–6 cm kaba, ampong sampagang maputi anggang mauve.

Bagawak:
Ing bagawak ("Monochoria vaginalis") metung yang uri ning tanaman a manyampagang kayabe king familia Pontederiaceae ("water hyacinth family"). Iti ausan deng "heartleaf false pickerelweed" ampong "oval-leafed pondweed" king Ingles, ampong "gabing uwak" king Tagalug. Katutubu ya king maragul a dake ning Asia ampong kareng dakal a isla ning Pacifico, at balu re kareng dakal a aliwang lugal antimong species a midala karin, at keraklan metung a makaperwisyung dikut. Metung yang tanaman king danum, at maralas, sasakupan no reng asikan ampong aliwang lugal a natural a maki danum. Metung yang yerbang ("herb") a banwahan ("annual") o pilmihan ("perennial") a tutubu king danum manibat king malating rhizome. Miyayaliwa ya itsura o pamibalangkas. ("morphology") Miraras lang anggang 12 sentimetru kaba deng makintab nang bulung, a 10 sentimetru lapad, at makabili la kareng alang laman kilub a petiole. Maki atlu la anggang 25 sampagang alus agnan-agnan mibubukadkad king lalam danum. Ing balang metung atin yang kule ubi-iro/asul a tepal a maygit metung a sentimetru kaba at maki dakal a butul a mangalati ampong maki pakpak. Ing balang bunga metung yang capsule a metung a sentimetru kaba at maki dakal a mangalating butul a maki pakpak. 

Ilib:
Ing ilib ("Imperata cylindrica"), a karaniwang mayayaus king Ingles "blady grass", "cogon grass" (), "kunai grass" (), o "Japanese bloodgrass", metung yang species ning grass king genus "Imperata". Makabili ya king subfamily Panicoideae, supertribe Andropogonodae, tribu Andropogoneae. 
Metung yang pilmihan ("perennial") a rhizomatous a dikut a katutubu king aslagan ampong mauli-aslagang Asia, India, Micronesia, Australia, ampong aslagan ampong mauling Africa. Daragul yang manibat 0.6–3 m (2–10 pie) kátas. Maki lapad lang manga 2 cm malapit king pun ning tanaman, at kikitid anggang matilus ya karas king babo; mapinu lang tabas ipan deng lele ning bulung, at maki matilus lang kristal a silica. Ing manimunang uyat mas maputla ya kesa king aliwa nang dake ning bulung, at mas malapit ya king metung a talindiking ning bulung. Mabwak ya ing babo ning bulung malapit king pun, kabang itang lalam keraklan ala yang bwak. Miraras lang anggang 1.2 metru lalam deng kayang uyat o yamut, oneng keraklan 0.4 m la mu king gabun a mabalas. 
Lokal a lagyu.
Local a lagyung Ingles:
Lagyu kareng aliwang amanu:

Palat:
Ing palat ("Saccharum spontaneum") metung yang dikut a katutubu king Mauling Asia. Metung yang dikut a pilmihan ("perennial"), a miraras anggang atlung metru kátas, at maki yamut a ibat king rhizome. 
Uli ning kayang kagiwan a mabilis sumakup king gabun a metagin, megi yang species o uring tanaman a mapanyakup, at luluban no reng gabun a tatamnan ampong pastulan. 

Ange:
Ing ange ("Curcuma longa") metung yang tanaman a pilmihan ("perennial") a yerbang maki rhizome ning familiang laya, ing Zingiberaceae. Katutubu ya king mapali o tropical a dake ning Mauling Asia at mangaylangan yang temperaturang atsu king pilatan ning 20 °C ampong 30 °C (68 °F ampong 86 °F) at marakal dakal a uran kilub ning pabanwa ba yang dagul masalese. Titipunan do banwa-banwa deng tanaman para kareng karelang rhizome, at parakalan da la manibat kareti para keng tutuking panaun ning pamananam. 
Nung e la sagiwa, pilan dong oras deng rhizome at kaybat, palangyan do kareng mapaling ornu, at kaybat, dadaldakan da la anggang magi lang polbung kule malalam a dalandan-dilo a maralas dang gagamitang sangkap kareng curry ampo reng aliwang lutu king Mauling Asia ampong Kalibudtang Aslagan ('"Middle East"), para kareng tina o pangule, o antimong pamye kule king Ing aktibu nang sangkap, yapin ing curcumin, a maki lasang mamait-mait, mamaras-maras, lalasang gabun, at babaung mustard. 

Anó:
Ing anó o luyung ("Saribus rotundifolius") metung yang palmerang "fountain palm" a maki mabilug a bulung at mayayakit king Mauli-aslagang Asia. Kayabe ya king genus a "Saribus". Awsan deng "footstool palm" king Ingles, ampong "anahaw" king Tagalug ampong Cebuanu. Ya ing e opisyal a pambangsang bulung ning Filipinas. 
Maralas deng gagamitan a tanaman a pag-landscape. Tutubu ya kareng klimang sub-tropical ampong mapali o "tropical" at "humid". 
Gagamit dong para bubungan deng bulung, ampo king pamalut pamangan. Ing sobrang pamamupul kareng bulung da reng tanaman king pulû/gubat ampong ilang. Mabilis lang daragul deng bulung kapupul oneng mas malati la. 
Anyang Setiembre 2011, kaybat ning pamanyalugsug king DNA, meging opisyal ing pamanalis ning pamanalis ning tanaman manibat king genus a "Livistona" papunta king misubling genus a "Saribus".

Apalit:
Ing apalit ("Pterocarpus indicus") metung yang species ning "Pterocarpus" a katutubu king mauli-aslagang Asia, pangulung Australasia, deng isla ning albugang Pacific Kadayatmalatan , king Cambodia, peka mauling dake ning China, East Timor, Indonesia, Malaysia, Papua New Guinea, ing Philippines, ding Ryukyu Islands, ding Solomon Islands, Thailand, ampo ing Vietnam. Deng aliwang lagyu para kaniti, "Narra" (Tagalug king Filipinas), "Sonokembang" (Indonesia), "Angsana" o "Sena" (Indonesia, Malaysia ampong Singapore), "Tnug" (Cambodia). 

Sabungsabungan:
Ing sabungsabungan, parangis sabungan o burat asu ("Eleusine indica") (king Ingles, Indian goosegrass, wiregrass o crowfootgrass) metung yang mapanyakup a species ("invasive species") king familiang Poaceae. Metung yang banwahan a dikut a makakalat king mabilug a mas malisangan a dake ning yatu angga king manga 50 degrees latitude. 

Pakayungkung kastila:
Ing pakayungkung kastila ("Senna alata"), a awsan dang "Candle Bush", "Candelabra Bush", "Empress Candle Plant", "Ringworm Tree" o "candletree" king Ingles, ampong "akapulko" king Tagalug, metung yang maulagang tanaman a panulu ampong tanaman a manyampaga king subfamily Caesalpinioideae. Metung yang species ning "Senna" a neng kayi, kakawani da king sarili nang genus, ing "Herpetica".
Katutubu ya king Mexico, ing pakayungkung kastila, at malyari yang akit kareng miayaliwang lugal. Kareng lugal a malisangan o tropics, miraras ya kareng lugal a 1,200 metru kátas. Metung yang species a mapanyakup o "invasive species" king Austronesia. 
Manga 3–4 m ya kátas iting palungpung, at deng bulung na 50–80 cm la kaba. Lupa yang dilong kandila ing kumpul da reng sampaga na. Ing bunga na, anti yang matulid a pod a miraras yang 25 cm kátas. Mikakalat la reng kayang bini kapamilatan na ning danum o deng animal. Misasara la reng bulung neng dadalumdum. 

Pasípasí:
Ing pasípasí ("Hyptis suaveolens") ), a "chan" king Ingles, metung yang tanaman a pseudo-cereal king Latin America a manga 2 metru kátas, a maki sanga ampong mangakaba at mabwak a tangke. Maputi la o kule ubi deng kayang sampaga, tulungkaba la reng kayang bulung, at matilus la ampong kulubut, kulurut o kalumpis ("wrinkled") deti. Katutubu ya king kontinenti na ning (Pangulu ampong Mauling) America, kareng labwad a mapali o mapaling bagya. 

Palepalayan:
Ing Palepalayan ("Echinochloa crus-galli") metung yang uri ning dikut iláng ("wild grass") a ibat king malisangan o tropical Asia a sadya rang tuturing uri ning dikut a panicum. Maralas, awsan de king Ingles "Cockspur" (o "Cockspur Grass"), "Common Barnyard Grass", o kabud na mu "barnyard grass" (a malyari dang gamitan king sanumang species ning "Echinochloa" o king mabilug a genus). Daragul ya ing tanaman anggang 60 pulgada (1.5 m) king kátas, at atin yang mangakaba ampong pitpit a bulung a maralas, kule lang bagyang ubi king bandang pun. Keraklan, matulid la reng kayang tangke, oneng deng aliwa mikakalat la king gabun. Pitpit la king bandang pun deng tangke. Aliwa la itsura deng buntuk da reng butul, at keraklan kule ubi la deti, at maki mangaragul lang butul a balamu "millet" kareng siksakan a malataring mangalati ("spikelet").
Tuturing deng metung kareng makasirang diling dikut ("weed") king yatu, at babawasan na ing pupul kareng tanam at papaten no reng dikut a papakan kareng animal ("forage crop") kapamilatan ning pamaglako king anggang 80% ning nitrogen king gabun. Makalasun ya kareng seseng animal uling king matas a nitrates a mititipun kaya. Magi yang santungan da reng miayaliwang sakit a mosaic virus. Malyaring lang maging sabagal deng mangalabung a tanaman king pamamupul a gagamit makina. 

Banilak:
Ing banilak o almendras ("Terminalia catappa"), metung yang maragul a pun dutung kareng lugal a tropical o malisangan a kayabe king familia Combretaceae, a katutubu kareng malisangan a labwad king Asia, Africa, ampong Australia. Awsan de kareng lagyung "Ketapang" (Indonesian), "Bengal almond", "Singapore almond", "Ebelebo", "Malabar almond", "Indian almond", "Tropical almond", "Sea almond", "Beach Almond", "Talisay tree", "Umbrella tree", "Abrofo Nkatie" (Ghana), "Tavola" (Fiji), "Castanhola" (Northeastern Brazil), "Zanmande" (creole) ampong "" (Marshallese).

Kalibudtang Aslagan:
Ing Kalibudtang Aslagan (Arabic الشرق الأوسط Persian خاورمیانه Turkish Orta Doğu) metung yang labwad a sasaklo king Albugang Asia ampong ing kabilugan o dake ning Pangulung Africa, dependi king kontekstu. Tuturing deng Eurocentric o makasentru king Europa ing terminu, at gagamitan deng katumbas ning Malapit a Aslagan ("Near East"), antimong kasumangid ning Marayung Aslagan ("Far East"). Deng pekamaragul a lahi king Kalibudtang Aslagan ila pin deng Arabu.
Teritoryu ampong labwad.
Peparagul a Kalibudtang Aslagan.
Notes:
1 Maralas, tuturing deng dake ning Kalibudtang Asia ing Afghanistan
2Ing internasyonal a kikilalanan a sakup ning Morocco
Lon la murin.
