Organizations, programs, and media

Iking pusa:
Ing iking pusa ("Acalypha hispida"), a Chenille plant king Ingles, metung yang palungpung a manyampagang kayabe king familia Euphorbiaceae, ing subfamily Acalyphinae, ampo ing genus "Acalypha". Ing "Acalypha" ing kapat a pekamaragul a genus king familia Euphorbiaceae, at dakal ya tanaman a katutubu king Hawaii ampong Oceania. Ining tanaman mayayaus ya mu namang Philippines Medusa, red hot cat's tail ampong fox tail king English, "pokok ekor kucing" king Malay, "Rabo de Gato" king Portugues ampong "Tai tượng đuôi chồn" king Vietnamese. Tatanam de ing iking pusa antimong tanamang bale ("house plant") uling masanting ya ampong uling kareng sampaga nang masanting ampong mabwak. 

Mark Cuban:
I Mark Cuban (mibait Julio 31, 1958) metung yang business magnate a Americanu. Ya ing makibandi king Dallas Mavericks king National Basketball Association ampo king Landmark Theatres, ampong Magnolia Pictures, at saka ya ing talapamuntuk ("chairman") ning HDTV cable network AXS TV. Metung ya mu namang "shark" mamuhunan king seryeng pangtelebisyong "Shark Tank". Anyang 2011, sínulat yang e-book i Cuban, ing "How to Win at the Sport of Business", nung nu na kinwentu ing kayang karanasan king bye na king negosyu ampo king pasiknangan ("sports").

Kalyus:
Ing kalyus ("Streblus asper") metung yang pun dutung a maki miayaliwang lagyu, kayabe la reng Siamese rough bush, khoi, serut, ampong toothbrush tree. Metung yang pun dutung a kasantingan dagul a katutubu kareng mangalanging labwad king Thailand, India, Malaysia, ampong Vietnam.
King Filipinas ausan deng bogta-e, bogtalay, kalyos, kalios ampong aludig, bukud king kalyus. 
Suglung palwal.
anti diabetic activity

Larang dapu:
Ing larang dapu ("Sphenoclea zeylanica") metung ya kareng adwang species ning genus a "Sphenoclea". Metung yang yerbang miraras 150 cm. Makabili ya king orden a Solanales, kayabe ya ing kamatis ampo ing "nightshade". Menibat yang tagana king Africa, oneng merakal ne kareng aliwang dake ning yatu. Uling kalupa ne ning kayang lugal a paintunan ing pale, magi yang manimunang dikut kareng asikan, at magi yang sabagal king pamanubu da reng pale. Neng kayi, gagawan deng gule. 

Malapasi:
Ing malapasi ("Chromolaena odorata"), a maki lagyung Siam weed, Christmas bush, and common floss flower king Ingles, metung yang species ning palungpung a manyampaga king familiang sunflower ing Asteraceae. Katutubu ya king Pangulung America, manibatFlorida ampong Texas angga king Mexico ampo ing Caribbean, at midala ya king malisangan o tropical a dake ning Asia, albugang Africa, ampong pilang dake ning Australia. Neng kayi, tatanam de antimong tanaman a panulu ("medicinal plant") ampong tanaman a pampasanting ("ornamental plant"). Gagamitan de antimong tradisyonal a panulu king Indonesia. Dadaldakan do reng murang bulung, at gagamitan yang panulu kareng sugat ing makukwang katas. 
Sadya reng yabe king klasipikasyun lalam ning genus "Eupatorium", oneng tuturing deng mas malapit kaugnayan kareng aliwang genus king tribung Eupatorieae.
Tuturing deng species a mapanyakup ("invasive species") a dikut da reng tanaman a tatanam kareng asikan king lugal nung nu ya midala |invasive]] weed of field crops in its ("introduced range"), at sasabyan dang iti ing pekamaragul a problema kareng species a mapanyakup kareng pulung ingatan ("protected rainforests") king Africa.

Biyang kwayan:
Ing biyang kwayan ("Oxyurichthys microlepis") (Herre and Umali, 1948), a king Ingles long-tailed goby, small-scaled goby, o maned goby (Oxyurichthys microlepis, Bleeker, 1849) metung yang asan a kayabe king "Gobionellinae" ning familia "Gobiidae" king orden Perciformes. Darakpan de iti king komersyal a pamanasan ampo king industriyang aquarium.
Karaniwang lagyu.
King Bangladesh, ausan deng "nuna baila" (Bengali). King South Africa, ing aus da "maahaar-dikkop" (Afrikaans). King Filipinas, bukud king Kapampangan, awsan deng "talimusak", "talimosak", o "bia" king Tagalug; "ganiya", "maloog", o "tambasukan" king Bikul; ampong "dapa-dapa" king Kuyunon. King Indonesia, king Javanese, ausan deng "beloso", "Ploso", o "Puntang" (pareu ya ing tauli king Malay). King Mandarin, ing aus da, 小鱗溝鰕虎魚 (traditional) o 小鳞沟鰕虎鱼 (simplified). King Thailand naman, ing lagyu na, บู่เกล็ดเล็ก o "bukletlek". King Vietnam naman, ausan deng cá bống chấm mắt, cá bống vảy nhỏ, o cá bong xê vay nho.

Galamus pusa:
Ing galamus pusa ("Mimosa diplotricha"), a ausan dang "giant sensitive plant" king Ingles, metung yang species king familia Fabaceae.
Katutubu ya king Brazil, at misna ya kapanyakup ("extremely invasive") king Pacific Kadayatmalatan, nung nu ya miras na kareng anggang grupu da reng isla, liban king (king kasalukuyan) Tonga. Midala ya king Niuē anyang manga 2000, oneng alus mepuksa no reng tanaman karin manibat anyang mika taglus-taglus a kampanya ning pamaglipul. 
Nung paburen yang dagul, miras yang aduang metru ing tanaman, at máragul ing bibie nang perwisyu uling kareng mangaragul ampong mangatilus nang suksuk. 

Malapalitpit:
Ing malapalitpit ("Sapindus saponaria") metung yang malati anggang kasantingan dagul a pun dutung a deciduous. native to the Americas. Kayabe la kareng karaniwan nang lagyu deng wingleaf soapberry, western soapberry, jaboncillo, ampong mānele (Hawaiian). Ing lagyu ning kayang genus, ing ""Sapindus"", ibat ya king katayang Latin a mangabaldugang sabun a Indian, at ing lagyu ning kayang species mangabaldugan yang "masabun." 

Talampune:
Ing talampune, salampune o salumpune ("Datura metel") metung yang yerbang pilmihan ("perennial") a balamu palungpung a maki karaniwang lagyu king Ingles a angel's trumpet, devil's trumpet, ampong metel. 
Tutubu ya king ilang ing talampune kareng anggang malisangan a dake ning yatu, at tatanam de king mabilug a yatu uling kareng kayang propiedad o katangian antimong sangkap ("chemical property") ampong antimong tanaman a pampasanting o "ornamental". Minuna yang milarawan kapamilatan nang Linnaeus anyang 1753. E siguradu nung nukarin ing orihinal nang karinan o lugal.
Ing tanaman metung yang banwahan ("annual") a yerbang miraras king anggang 3 ft. kátas. Mabwak yang bagya, at maki maralumdum a kule ubing suli ampong bulung a malapad a tulungkaba ("oval") a maralumdum muring ubi king kule. Mabanglu la reng sampagang 6-8 in. a miyayaliwa itsura, at malyaring lang tunggal ("single") o dobli. Deng kule manibat la king maputi angga king "cream", dilo, malutu ampong kule ubi. Ing The "seed capsule" mitatakpan yang dakal a bukul a katabas apa is covered with numerous ("conical") ampong ditak a suksuk. Kawangis ne ning "D. inoxia", oneng ing "D. metel" maki bulung yang alus makinis, ampong bungang bukul-bukul has almost glabrous leaves and fruits that are ("knobby"), oneng e masuksuk. Ing "D. inoxia" laganas yang mitatakpan yang malambut ampong makinis a bwak, at maki bunga yang masuksuk. 
Suglung palwal.
<BR>

Kamakamangyang:
Ing kamakamangyang ("Stachytarpheta jamaicensis") metung yang species ning tanaman king familia Verbenaceae. Katutubu ya king mabilug a Caribbean, at awsan deng blue porterweed o Jamaica vervain king Ingles. Mayayakit ya king kabilugan ning dake ning yatung malisangan o tropical, at mayayakit ya king Indian Subcontinent, Mauli-aslagang Asia ampong Albugang Tropical Africa, nung nu re awsang Indian snakeweed ampong nettle-leaved vervain, a sadya dang isipan a aliwang species ("Stachytarpheta indica"). Keraklan mayayakit ya king lele dalan kareng baryu, at tutubu ya kareng lugal a mibayu o pikyalaman ning tau. Metung yang species a mapanyakup ("invasive species") kareng aliwang lugal. 

Timbu:
Ing timbu metung yang maragul a pilmihan ("perennial") a dikut a mayayakit kareng mabasang labwad (wetlands) kareng anggang lugal a kasantingan pali ("temperate") ampong maliangan ("malisangan") king mabilug a yatu. Neng kayi, tuturing deng magdili-diling species ning genus ing "Phragmites australis", dapot deng aliwang botanist pipitnan de ing "Phragmites australis" kareng atlu o apat a species. Partikular, ing South Asian Khagra Reed – "Phragmites karka" – tuturing deng aliwang species.

Mabalacat:
Ing Mabalacat metung yang primeru klasing lakanbalen ing pangulung dake ning lalawigan ning Pampanga, Filipinas. Ing dating balen meging yang lakanbalen kaibat dong kitnan deng memalen iniang Juliu 21 2012 at meging yang pangatlung lakanbalen kaibat ning Lakanbalen Angeles ampong Lakanbalen San Fernando. Agpang keng ning sensus, atin yang populasyun a a katau kareng a pamimalemale.
Ing lagiu ning lakanbalen meyakua ya keng tanaman a "balacat" nung nu la dakal karin.
Ing kasalungsungan a lakanbalen pamuntuk ya pin y Gng Marino "Boking" Morales a pangapat na ng manungkulan at ing kaduang pamuntuk ya pin y Gng. Chris Garbo.
Deng Barangay.
Ing Mabalacat atin yang 27 barangay.
Imnu ning Mabalácat.
Balen a mayap a amlat
Balen ding mayap a dapat
Misaup-saup keng gunyat
Keng panyulung mung masampat
Eke paysupil king keynan
Tikdo king mitmung tetagan
Ipok daka king dangalan
O balen ming pakamalan
Mabalacat mal ming balen
Dangal mu kekeng banten
Mabalacat mal ming balen
Luguran daka at sesen
Lalam ning banwang makule
Masaplala ing kekeng biye
Kareng marangal ming pake
Makatiman ing tagumpe (2x)
Mabalacat! Mabalacat!

Kamantigi:
Ing kamantigi ("Impatiens balsamina"), a garden balsam, rose balsam, ampong touch me not king Ingles, metung yang species ning "Impatiens" a katutubu king mauling Asia king India ampong Myanmar.
Metung yang tanaman a banwahan ("annual plant") a miraras 20–75 cm king kátas, at maki tangke yang makapal oneng malambut. Balikudkud la pangaayus deng bulung, a 2.5–9 cm kakaba ampong 1–2.5 cm lapad, a tabas ipan a malalam king lele. Maki kule lang malutu, rosas, kule ubi ampong maputi deng kayang sampaga, a 2.5–5 cm king kapal.

Papa Theodoros II ning Alexandria:
I Papa Theodoros II (Coptic: (Papa Tawadros II) ing meging ka-118ng Coptic Papa ning Alexandria ampong Patriarca ning Sede nang San Marcos anyang linukluk ya kanitang 18 Noviembre 2012, adwang duminggu kaybat nang mepili.

Bram Stoker:
I Abraham "Bram" Stoker (8 Noviembre 1847 – 20 Abril 1912) metung yang Irish a nobelista ampong talasulat makuyad a salita ("short story writer") a pikabalwan dili ngeni king kayang pamanyulat king nobelang Gothic ning 1897 a "Dracula". Anyang mabye ya, mas kilala re antimong personal a kasaup ("personal assistant") ning artistang i Sir Henry Irving ampo ing mánibalang pangkalakal ("business manager") ning Lyceum Theatre king London, a bandi nang Irving .

Mesoplodon traversii:
Ing "Mesoplodon traversii" metung yang species ning beaked whale a ditak la mu reng makakilala, at metung kareng pekamalagad.Minuna yang miulat uli ning pangatuklas ning dake ning panga king Pitt Island (New Zealand) anyang 1872, at miulat ya ampong ginulis larawan anyang 1873 neng James Hector, at dininan deng pamanalese/pamaglarawan John Edward Gray, at pekilagyu ne kang Henry Hammersley Travers, ing menikwa. Kaybat, mibilang ya king strap-toothed whale, manibat 1878 (Hector 1878,
who never considered the specimen to be specifically distinct). Ing metung a dake ning bungu ("calvaria") a meyakit anyang dekada 1950 king White Island (a atsu murin 
New Zealand) e re alarawan anyang mumuna, dapot kaybat peniwalan deng mabibilang king ginkgo-toothed beaked whale.
Anyang 1986, meyakit ya ing maki sirang calvaria king Robinson Crusoe
Island (Chile), at milarawan ya antimong bayung species, ing "Mesoplodon
bahamondi" o Bahamonde's beaked whale.
Kanitang Diciembre 2010, meyakit la reng adwang animal, metung a gaindu ampong metung a biseru, a mikalat king Opape Beach, Bay of Plenty, New Zealand. Anyang mumuna, kinilala da lang Gray's beaked whale, oneng kaybat, agpang king pamag-analisang genetic, mebalung ila ing mumunang kumpletung alimbawa ning 
spade-toothed whale o "Mesoplodon traversii". Following this find,
a report describing the spade-toothed whale and an analysis of their
DNA later appeared in the 6 November 2012 issue of the journal
"Current Biology".
Agpang kareng resulta da reng atlung atuklasan, kayabe la ngan deti king pareung species, at uli na niti ituring da lang "M. traversii". Milarawan ya mu ing pangkilwal a itsura anyang 2012, anya mapalyaring ini ing pekaditak impormasyun king maragul a mammal ning panaun a makabayu.
Suglung palwal.
CMS]
of Understanding for the Conservation of Cetaceans and Their Habitats
in the Pacific Islands Region]
World’s rarest whale seen for first time: Spade-toothed whale]

Kuse:
Ing kuse ("Allium tuberosum"), a garlic chives o green nira grass king Ingles) ampong kuntsay king Tagalug ampong Cebuanu, metung yang guleng kamaganak ning sibuyas. Aliwa ya pamandagul ing tanaman, a maki makayaliwang bulung a katabas sinturun, a e ra kalupa deng bulung ning sibuyas o bawang, at maki matulid yang payat a tangkeng maputi, a taganang matas kesa kareng bulung. Mas malapit ya lasa king bawang. Tutubu ya kareng kumpul a bagya-bagyang lalapad, oneng gad ya muring tutubu ibat kareng butul.

Balanak:
Deng balanak asan lang kayabe king familia Mugilidae ampong orden da reng asan a kapalikpik pagi ("ray-finned fish") a mayayakit king mabilug a yatu kareng danuman a atyu bebe dayatmalat a malisangan ampong kasantingan temperatura/pali ("coastal temperate and tropical waters"), at neng kayi, kareng danuman a tabang. Maulaga lang pamangan king Europang Mediterraneo kanita pang panaun da reng Romanu. Atin yang manga 80 species kareng 17 genera ing familia, dapot manga kapitna kareng species mabibilang la karen mung adwang genus ("Liza" ampong "Mugil").
Makikilala la lareng balanak kareng adwang mikakawaning palikpik a pang-gulut ("dorsal fins"), mangalating asbuk a trianggulu, ampo ing kayalan ning organung gulis a pang-gilid ("lateral line organ") . Mamangan lang pira-pirasung laman ("detritus"), at deng keraklan a species, masikan la kalamnan deng karelang atsan, at maki komplikadu lang akmulan ("pharynx") a sasaup king pamaglaso pamangan.

Trigu (dikut):
Ing trigu (dikut) ("Cyperus iria"), a awsan dang rice flat sedge ampong rice flatsedge king Ingles, metung yang dikut a ibat king familia Cyperaceae a makinis ampong makibungkus ("tufted"), at mayayakit la king mabilug a yatu. Madilo-dilo lang malutu-lutu deng yamut, at matiban ("fibrous") la reti. Maralas, tutubu ya ing tanaman kareng asikan, nung nu ya mituturing metung a marok a dikut ("weed").

Harlem Désir:
I Jean-Philippe Désir, a marlas awsan dang Harlem Désir (mibait 25 Noviembre 1959 king Paris) metung yang Pranses a pulitiku ampong Kayanib ning Parlamento Europeo para king Île-de-France manibat anyang 1999. King salukuyan, ya ing talapamuntuk ("chair") ning French Socialist Party (PS).

Shintarō Ishihara:
I metung yang Hapon a talasulat ampong pulitiku. Migsilbi yang is a Japanese author and politician. He served as Govebanador ning Tokyo manibat anyang Abril 1999 anggang Octubre 2012.

Justin Welby:
I Justin Portal Welby (Mibait 6 Enero 1956) metung yang obispo king Church of England. King salukuyan, ya ing Obispo ning Durham at mekumpirma yang kayalili nang Rowan Williams antimong Arsobispo ning Canterbury. 
Kaybat nang megaral king St Peter's School, Seaford, Eton College ampo king Trinity College, Cambridge, minuna yang megobra i Welby king industria ning laru. Anyang 1989, megaral ya para king ordinasyon king St John's College, Durham. Kaybat da reng pilang pusisyun king parokya, megi yang Dekano ning Liverpool at mituldu yang Obispo ning Durham anyang 2011.
Agpang kareng ulat, ing teolohiya nang Welby manalakaran ya king tradisyon a evangelical king Anglicanism. tatarukan da reng aliwa nang obrang milimbag ing ugnayan ning pisalapyan ("finance") ampo ning relihiyon, at antimong kayanib ning Kapulungan ding Panginwan ("House of Lords"), makalukluk ya king lupung he sits on the ("panel") ning Komisyong Pang-Parlamento kareng Batayang Pamagbangku ning 2012 ("2012 Parliamentary Commission on Banking Standards").
Anyang 9 Noviembre 2012, pepawaga ("announced") ning Tanggapan ning Pun Ministru ning Britania ("British Prime Minister's Office") ing pamanuldu nang Welby antiong tutuking Arsobispo ning Canterbury. Asahan deng lukluk king pwestu keng Marzo 2013 kaybat ning pamagretiru ning kasalukuyan a arsobispo, i Rowan Williams. Milyari ing opisyal a pawaga kaybat ning dakal a pamanisip manibat anyang pamikit ning Crown Nominations Commission anyang Setiembre 2012 ba ralang pisabyan deng milalaban king pwestu.

Juan Luna:
I Juan Luna y Novicio (Octubre 23, 1857 — Diciembre 7, 1899) metung yang Ilukanu ampong Filipinung talapinta, eskultor, ampong aktibistang pampulitika ning Rebolusyong Filipino anyang tawli nang dake ning ka-19 a labingsyam a siglu o dilanwa. Metung ya kareng mumunang mekilalang artist ning Filipinas. 
Uli ning pamanyambut na king medalyang gintu king 1884 Madrid Exposition of Fine Arts, ampo ing medalyang pilak ning kalupa nang talapintang Filipinong i Félix Resurrección Hidalgo, mika selebrasyun a manimunang dangka kareng panalala da reng kayanib king Pangimut a Propaganda ("Propaganda Movement"), kayabe da reng kayang kalupang "Ilustradong" magparangal king mayap dang kabulasan deng adwang talapinta ampo ing pamikakapatad ning Espanya ampo ning Filipinas. 
Miparangalan ya king pamagobrang kalupa da reng akademyang Espanyol ampong Pranses ning kayang panaun i Luna, a memintura kareng eksenang pangliteratura ampong pangkasalesayan, neng kayi maki makasalikut a komentaryung pampulitika. 

Srinivasa Ramanujan:
ISrinivasa Ramanujan FRS () (22 Desiembri 1887 – 26 Abril 1920) metung yang Indian mathematicu ampong autodidact nung nu, agiang eya megaral kareng escuela keng pamagsane keng purung mathematicu, mekaambag yang maragul keng mathematicung pamanyuri, numerung theoria, infinite series, ampong continued fractions. Makatuknang ya king India at eya kayanib kareng mangaragul a anibankalibutnan atiu king Europa iniang panaun a ita, i Ramanujan memanalkus yang sariling pamanyalugsug keng mathematicu king kayang pamagdilidili. Ing bunga na nita neng misan atuklasan na la ding balu da nang theorem, dagdag na pa niti karing bayu na gawa. I Ramanujan mebilang yang metung a atin kabiasnan a natural ngana ning English mathematicuG.H. Hardy, at kapante no ri Euler ampo i Gauss.

EXO (banda):
Ing EXO metung yang bandang talakantang Tsinu-Mauling Koreanu king Mauling Korea. 

Wonder Girls:
Ing Wonders Girls (원더걸스) metung yang grupung talakanta king Mauling Korea.

Oscar Niemeyer:
I Oscar Ribeiro de Almeida Niemeyer Soares Filho (Diciembre 15, 1907 – Diciembre 5, 2012), a ausan dang Oscar Niemeyer , metung yang Brazilian a akitektung tuturing dang metung kareng manimunang tauan king pamanalkus ning makabayung arkitektura. Pikabalwan yang dili i Niemeyer king kayang pamagdisenyu kareng gusaling sibiku para king for Brasília, metung a lakanbalen a miplanu a ("planned city") a meging tungku o buntukbalen which became Brazil's ("capital")l ning Brazil anyang 1960, ampong ing kayang pamakyabe kareng aliwang arkitektu king pamagdisenyu king Pun Tanggapan da areng Misasanmetung a Bangsa ("United Nations Headquarters") king New York City. Maragul ing impluwensya ning kayang pamanuklas kareng malyaring gawan king sementung pepasikan ("reinforced concrete") king arkitektura ning tawling dake ning kadwang pulung dilanwa/siglu ampo ing mumunang dake ning kadwang pulu't metung a dilanwa ("late 20th and early 21st centuries").
Mibait ya king Rio de Janeiro i Niemeyer, a megaral king Escola Nacional de Belas Artes king kayang lakanbalen, at kayari na, megobra ya king negosyu nang tata na king typography, at antimong delinyanti ("draftsman") para kareng lokal a kumpanyang pang-arkitektura. In the 1930s, he interned with Lúcio Costa, with the pair collaborating on the design for the Palácio Gustavo Capanema in Rio de Janeiro. Ing mumuna nang maragul a proyektu yapin ing pamagdisenyu ning metung a serye da reng gusali para king Niemeyer's first major project was the design of a series of buildings for Pampulha, metung a planadung karulun ("planned suburb") king pangulu ning karulun ning Belo Horizonte. Pinuri de reng kritiku ing kayang obra, lalu na ing Church of Saint Francis of Assisi, a apansinan de kareng aliwang bangsa. received critical acclaim, and drew Niemeyer international attention. Anyang dekadang 1940s ampong 1950s, megi yang metung kareng abalang diling arkitektu king Brazil i Niemeyer, at migdisenyu yang miyayaliwang gusali king bangsa na ampo king kilwal. 
Anyang 1956, inagkat ne ning bayung pamuntuk o presidenti ning Brazil i Niemeyer a magdisenyu kareng gusaling pangsibiku ning bayu nang tungku o buntuk balen ("capital") ning Brazil, a mitikdo king libutad ning bangsa, a marayu kareng lakanbalen o ciudad a atsu na. Anti la mong experimental deng kayang disenyu para king His designs for the Pambangsang Kongresu ning Brazil, ing ("National Congress of Brazil"), ing Katedral ning Brasília Cathedral of Brasília, ing Sentrung Pangkultura ning Republika ("Cultural Complex of the Republic"), ing Palácio da Alvorada, ing Palácio do Planalto, and the Kakataskatasan a Ukuman a Pederal, a miyari ngan kanitang 1960, at miugne-ugne kapamilatan da reng milulupang dake o elementu ning disenyu. Uli na niting obra, mituldu ya antimong mumunang pekapun ning arkitektura king Universidad ning Brasília, ampong pangdangalan a pamiyanib king American Institute of Architects. Uli ning kayang ideolohiyang maka-kayli, ampong pamiugne king Partido Komunista ning Brazil ("Brazilian Communist Party") (PCB), meko ya king bangsa i Niemeyer kaybat ning 1964 military coup, at kaybat memusni yang upisina king Paris. Mibalik ya king Brazil anyang 1985, at mibye ya kaya ing prestihyosung galal a Pritzker Architecture Prize kanitang 1988. Metung yang sosyalista ampong ateista manibat king kayang kayanakan i Niemeyer, a menuknangan king Cuba ampong Soviet Union anyang makalwal ya king bangsa na, at kabalik na, migsilbi yang pamuntuk ning PCB manibat 1992 anggang 1996. Taglus-taglus ya pa muring magobra i Niemeyer angga king wakas ning kadwang pulung dilanwa ampo ing mumunang dake ning kadwang pulu't metung a dilanwa, continued working at the ("end of the 20th and early 21st century"), at ya ing migdisenyu king Niterói Contemporary Art Museum (1996) ampo ing Novo Museu (2002). Mete ya king Rio de Janeiro anyang Diciembre 5, 2012, king edad a 104.

Borut Pahor:
I Borut Pahor (mibait 2 Noviembre 1963) metung yang pulitikung Slovenian a migsilbing Pun Ministru ning Slovenia manibat 2008 anggang 2012. Miyalal yang Pamuntuk ning Slovenia anyang Diciembre 2012. 
Malambat neng pamuntuk ning partidung Social Democrats i Pahor, a migsilbing pilang terminu antimong kayanib ning Pambangsang Kapulungan ("National Assembly") at megi yang talapamuntuk and was its ("chairman") manibat 2000 anggang 2004. Anyang 2004, miyalal yang kayanib ning Parlamentong Europeo ("European Parliament") i Pahor. Anyang sinambut la reng Social Democrat king 2008 parliamentary election, mituldu yang Pun Ministru i Pahor. 
Anyang September 2011, mesambut ya ing kapamahalan nang Pahor king botu ning kayalang kumpyansa 's government lost a ("no confidence vote") libutad ning krisis king ekonomiya ampong gulung pampulitika. Migsilbi ya pa muring pansamantalang ("pro tempore") Pun Ministru anggang elilan neng Janez Janša anyang Febrero 2012. Kanitang Junio 2012, sinabi nang tagal ya king upisinang alus ceremonial a Pamuntuk ning Slovenia. Sinambut ya king alalan at simbut ne i Pamuntuk Danilo Türk king kadwang durut ning alalan in ("second round of voting") a merapat anyang 2 Diciembre 2012; menikwa yang manga adwang katlu ("two-thirds") da reng botu.

Patrick Moore:
I Sir Patrick Alfred Caldwell-Moore, CBE, FRS, FRAS (4 Marzo 1923 – 9 Diciembre 2012) metung yang Ingles a amateur astronomer a sinikat king larangan a ita antimong talasulat, talapanyalugsug ("researcher"), komentarista king radyu, ampong talapanapag king telebisyon ("television presenter").
Megi yang pamuntuk ning Moore was a former president of the British Astronomical Association i Moore, metung kareng talatátag ampong meging pamuntuk ning Society for Popular Astronomy (SPA), talasulat da reng maygit 70 (pitung pulung) libru tungkul king astronomy, ampong talapanapag king pekamalambat dang palageng serye king telebisyon a maki orihinal a talapanapag, ing and presenter of the world's longest-running television series with the same original presenter, the BBC's "The Sky at Night" ning BBC. Antimong amateur astronomer, megi yang espesyalista king pamagumasid king Bulan ampo king pamaglalang king Caldwell catalogue. 

PSY:
I Park Jae-sang (; mibait Diciembre 31, 1977), a mas kilala king kayang talipampan a PSY (, ; ), metung yang Mauling Koreanung magkanta, talasulat kanta, rapper, talaterak, ampong record producer. Pikabalwan yang dili i PSY kareng kayang makatulang video ampong lage king entabladu ("stage performances"), ampo king kayang internasyunal a "hit single", ing "Gangnam Style", nung nu ing "refrain", ing ""Oppan Gangnam Style"" mibili ya king "The Yale Book of Quotations" antimong metung kareng pekasikat a kasebyan ("one of the most famous quotes") ning 2012.
Anyang Octubre 23, 2012, mikit ya i PSY ampo i ing Pangkabilugan a Kalihim ("Secretary General") ning Misasanmetung a Bangsa ("United Nations"), i Ban Ki-moon king at the Pun Tanggapan ning Misasanmetung a Bangsa ("United Nations Headquarters") nung nu na pepabalung Ban ing kayang kapagnasan a magobra kayabe ya ing magkanta uli ning kayang alang angganan a ayayabut king yatu ("unlimited global reach"). Kaybat dareng mapilan a duminggu, ing Gangnam Style ing video o alben king videong dakal dili manalbe king YouTube king kabilugan ning panaun ("most accessed YouTube video of all time"), alus metung lang bilyun deng menalbe, at kaybat, mekilala ya i PSY a "Ari ning YouTube" ("King of YouTube").

Ravi Shankar:
I Ravi Shankar (; mibait Robindro Shaunkor Chowdhury, 7 Abril 192011 Diciembre 2012), a maralas dang awsan king kayang titulung Pandit, metung yang Indianung musikeru ampong kompositor a titigtig king sitar, metung a instrumentung kakalbitan kwerdas. Sasabyan dang ya ing pikabalwab diling musikerong Indianu king salukuyan.
Mibait ya i Shankar king Varanasi, at anyang kayang kayanakan, miglakbe ya king Europa ampong India kayabe ya ing grupung talaterak ning kapatad nang lalaking i Uday Shankar. Tinuknang yang teterak anyang 1938 ba yang manigaral king pamanigtig "sitar", at tinigtig ya antimong kasaup ning musikerong pang-korting i Allauddin Khan. Kayari ning kayang pamagaral anyang 1944, megobra ya i Shankar antimong kompositor, at lelangan na ing musika para king "Apu Trilogy" nang Satyajit Ray, at ya ing direktor king musika ning All India Radio, New Delhi, manibat 1949 anggang 1956.
Anyang 1956, miglakbe ya king Europa ampo reng America a titigtig king musikang klasikung Indianu ("Indian classical music") at pepasikat ne iti karin anyang dekadang 1960 kapamilatan ning pamanuru, pamanigtig, ampo king kayang pamiugnayan king biolinistang i Yehudi Menuhin ampo ing musikerung rock i George Harrison ning The Beatles. Miugne ya i Shankar king musika ning Albugan kapamilatan ning pamanyulat concerti para king for "sitar" ampo king orkesta, at mig-tour ya king yatu anyang dekadang 1970 ampong 1980. Manibat 1986 anggang 1992, migsilbi ya antimong menominang kayanib ning matas nang kapulungan ning Parlamentu ning India. Mibye ya kang Shankar ing pekamatas nang galal a sibilyan ning India, ing Bharat Ratna, anyang 1999, at tinanggapp yang atlung Grammy Award. Sindu na ing pamanigtig king publiku kaybat ning banwang 2000, maralas kayabe ya ing kayang mas anak a anak a babai, i Anoushka.

Coral Castle:
Ing Coral Castle metung yang batung istrukturang lelangan ning Latvian American eccentric a i Edward Leedskalnin (1887-1951) king pangulu ning lakanbalen o syudad ning Homestead, Florida king Miami-Dade County king salapungan-dalan ("intersection") ning South Dixie Highway (U.S. 1) ampong SW 157th Avenue. Bibilugan deng batung megalithic (keraklan planas ("limestone") a meyalkus ibat king coral)), a balang metung maki bayat a pilang tonelada. King salukuyan, metung yang tourist attraction king pribadung pamipalakad. Pikabalwan ya ing Coral Castle tungkul king kayang pamitikdo, at agpang kareti, tinikdo neng dili nang Leedskalnin a gagamit king magnetismu o kagiwan supernatural. 

Basalaganas (elementung klasiku):
Agpang king syensang laun ampong pang-Edad Media ("ancient and medieval science"), ing basalaganas ("aether" o "ether" king Ingles) (Griego "aithēr"), ing sangkap nung nu ya sapak o katmu ing labwad o lugal ning sikluban ("universe") babo ning kabilugan ning mabilug ning yatu ("terrestrial sphere").

Jerzy Popiełuszko:
I Jerzy Popiełuszko (; Setiembre 14, 1947 – Octubre 19, 1984) metung yang Romano Catolicong pari ibat king Poland, a kaugne king union a Solidarity. Pete de reng atlung ahenti ning panglub a intelihensyang ahensyang komunistang Polaco ("Polish communist internal intelligence agency"), ing Służba Bezpieczeństwa, (Ingles: Security Service of the Ministry of Internal Affairs) a militis kaybat at miparusan para king pamakamate. Kinilala neng martir ning Iglesia Catolica, at megawa yang beato anyang Junio 6, 2010.

Shinzō Abe:
I metung yang Hapon a pulitiku ampong kasalungsungan a Pamuntuk ning Liberal Democratic Party (LDP). I Abe ing ka-90ng Pun Ministru ning Hapon, a miyalal king espesyal a sesyon ning Pambangsang Diet anyang 26 Setiembre 2006. Ya ing anak diling pun ministru ning Hapon kaibat ning Kadwang Gerang Pangyatu, ampo ing mumunang mibait kaybat ning gera. Ala yang pabanwang migsilbi, at migdimitir ya anyang 12 Setiembre 2007. Elilan neng Yasuo Fukuda, a elilan da reng tuki-tuking Pun Ministrung e miras pabanwa. Anyang 26 Septiembre 2012, simbut neng Abe ing sadyang Ministru ning Pamamingwa ("Minister of Defense"), i Shigeru Ishiba king alalan a run-off, at simbut ne ing alalang pang-pamuntuk ning LDP ("LDP presidential election"). Megi yang Pun Ministrung pasibayu i Abe kaybat ning maragul a pamanyambut ning LDP king pangkabilugan a alalan ning 2012.

Nagato, Yamaguchi:
Ing metung yang lakanbalen o syudad a atsu king Yamaguchi, Hapon.
Mitátag ya ing lakanbalen anyang Marzo 31, 1954.
Ing Nagato bibilugan da reng limang mas mangalating balen a ikwa na kareng mengalabasan a mapilang banwa. Deng balen ila pin deng Fukawa, Senzaki, Yuya, Heki ampong Misumi. Sakup ne mu naman ning Nagato ing isla ning Omijima island ampo ing balen ning and the ("township") ning Kayoi.

Alangan:
Ing Alangan metung yang primeru klasing barangay king balen ning Limay, Bataan, king Filipinas.

Duale:
Ing Duale metung yang 2 klasing barangay king balen ning Limay, Bataan, king Filipinas.
Bariu.
Ing Duale atin yang 6 bariu.

Munting Mapino:
Ing Munting Mapino metung yang 2nd district ning barangay king balen ning Naic, Cavite, king Filipinas.
Bariu.
Ing Munting Mapino atin yang 8 bariu.

Landing (Limay):
Ing Landing (Alemán: "Landung") metung yang 1 klasing barangay king balen ning Limay, Bataan, king Filipinas.

Magnus Carlsen:
I Sven Magnus Øen Carlsen (; mibait 30 Noviembre 1990) metung yang Noruego o Norwegian a chess grandmaster a yang kasalungsungan a Kampeon ning Yatu king Ahedres o Chess ampong Mumuna king ranggu king yatu. Ing pekamatas nang rating 2872 ya, ing pekamatas king kasalesayan.
Anyang 26 April 2004, megi yang Carlsen Grandmaster king idad a i Carlsen, at uli na niti, ya ing meging kadwang pekayanak a Grandmaster king kasalesayan, oneng manibat kanita, megi neng katlung pekayanak. Kanitang Noviembre 2009 FIDE rating list ning Noviembre 2009, atin yang Elo rating a 2801 i Carlsen, at megi yang kalimang talapamyalung a mika rating a maygit king 2800; atin yang idad a kanita, at yang pekayanak a menikwa king rating a ita. Anyang 1 Enero 2010, king idad a , megi yang pekayanak a talapamyalung chess king kasalesayan a mikaranggung mumuna king yatu, anya ligpusan ne ing record a tatalnan nang Vladimir Kramnik, ampo ing kapitung talapamyalung king kasalesayan a mikaranggung mumuna king yatu agpang king pamagranggu ning FIDE. Kanitang FIDE rating list ning Enero 2013, miras yang Elo rating a 2861 i Carlsen, at uli na niti, ligpusan ne ing rating record nang Garry Kasparov a 2851 (a milyari anyang Julio 1999).
King listaan da reng ranggu anyang Enero 2013 ning FIDE, menikwa yang Elo rating a 2861 i Carlsen, at ita ing pekamatas king kasalesayan kanita. Anyang Noviembre 2013, simbut neng Carlsen i Viswanathan Anand king World Chess Championship 2013, anya megi yang bayung kampeon ning yatu king ahedres o chess.

William Rees-Mogg:
I William Rees-Mogg, Baron Rees-Mogg (14 Julio 192829 Diciembre 2012) metung yang peryodistang Ingles, talapatuntun ("editor") ning "The Times" (1967-81), talapamuntuk ("chairman") ning Arts Council of Great Britain, ampong kadwang talapamuntuk ("vice-chairman") ning BBC.

Kim Kardashian:
I Kimberly Noel "Kim" Kardashian (mibait Octubre 21, 1980) metung yang Americanang socialite, personalidad king telebisyon, negosyanti, fashion designer, modelu, talasulat, ampong artista. Anyang 2006, mika marok yang publisidad uling mibili ya king sex tape a migbunga king pamanyambut nang $5 milyun. Anyang 2007, sinikat ya ampo ing pamilya na ketang karelang seryeng pang-telebisyon a reality, king E!, ing "Keeping Up with the Kardashians" ampo reng kayang supling, kayabe ya ing ing "Kourtney and Kim Take New York" ampo ing "Kourtney and Kim Take Miami". Anyang 2010, i Kardashian ing reality star a maragul dili panakitan, a menakitan manga $6 milyun.
Kayabe la reng kapatad nang di Kourtney ampong Khloé, bandi neng Kardashian ing fashion boutique chain a D-A-S-H. Kayabe ya king pamaglalang miayaliwang markang imalan ampong pabanglu. Anyang Agosto 2011, ayasawa neng Kardashian ing mamyalung basketball a i Kris Humphries king seremonyang maragul a publisidad. Ita muring Octubre, minyad yang diborshu i Kardashian kaybat ning 72 aldo ning pamiyasawa. Masikan ing reaksyon ning media laban king milyari, a minaus kaniting "publicity stunt".

Kanye West:
I Kanye Omari West (; mibait Junio 8, 1977) metung yang Americanung musikeru, direktor pelikula, ampong fashion designer. Minuna yang sinikat i West antimong producer ning Roc-A-Fella Records, nung nu ya mekilala kaybat para king kayang obra king album nangJay-Z ing "The Blueprint", ampo reng aliwang single da reng musikerung antimo di Alicia Keys, Ludacris, ampong Janet Jackson. Anyang mumuna, gagamit yang pitched-up vocal samples ibat kareng kantang soul kayabe la reng kayang sariling tambul ampong instrumentu. Nanupata, kareng tutuking produksyon, mikalat ing kayang pamanigtig at linto ing impluwensiya da reng '70s R&B, baroque pop, trip hop, arena rock, folk, alternative, electronica, synthpop, ampong musikang pang-klasika.

Yunho:
I Jung Yunho (mibait Pebreru 6, 1986), mas mekilala ya bilang U-Know Yunho, metung yang talakanta king Mauling Korea.

Changmin:
I Shim Changmin, mas mekilala ya bilang Max Changmin, metung yang talakanta, talaterak, kompositor, at modelu king Mauling Korea.

4Minute:
Ing 4Minute (포미닛), metung yang banda king Mauling Korea.

Park Bom:
I Park Bom (박봄), metung yang talakanta king Mauling Korea. Metung yang miyembru ning grupung 2NE1.

Pearl S. Buck:
I Pearl Sydenstricker Buck (Junio 26, 1892 – Marzo 6, 1973), a kilala murin king kayang lagyung Isik, Sai Zhenzhu (), metung yang talasulat a Americanang keraklan menuknangan king China anggang 1934. Pekamasali yang librung piksyon ("best-selling fiction book") ing kayang nobelang "The Good Earth" king Estados Unidos anyang banwang 1931 ampong 1932, at sinambut yang Pulitzer Prize anyang 1932. Kanitang 1938, mirinan yang galal a pamanyambut king Nobel Prize in Literature, "king kayang mabandi ampong tutung mapyang pamilarawan ning bye da reng ortilano king China, ampo reng kayang obra maestrang talambye." ("for her rich and truly epic descriptions of peasant life in China and for her biographical masterpieces.")
Museo ampong makasalesayan a bale.
Manigobra la reng mapilan a lugal a makasalesayan ba la lang isinup ampong pakit deng gamit ibat king bye nang Pearl Buck a malalam a miugne kareng miayaliwang kultura:

Ayahuasca:
Ing ayahuasca (ayawaska ágkas yang king Quechua (amanu) ) metung yang inuman a ibat kareng miayaliwang sangkap psychoactive a katas o pepabukal a dake ibat king baging a "Banisteriopsis caapi". Keraklan, sasamut ya kareng bulung da reng palungpung a maki dimethyltryptamine (DMT) ibat king genus a "Psychotria". Mumuna yang milarawan para king akademya anyang umpisa ning dekadang 1950 kapamilatan ning ethnobotanist ning Harvard a i ethnobotanist Richard Evans Schultes, at agpang king kayang pamagaral, gagamit de para king pamanula ampong pamanulu deng katutubung tau ning Amazonian Peru, at makikilala ya kareng miayaliwang lagyu (lon ya ing king lalam). Miulat a deng aliwang epektu malyari lang akwa kapamilatan na mu ning pamamangan king baging a caapi, oneng deng tanaman a maki DMT (antimo ing "Psychotria") e la aktibu nung mainum la nung alang pikwanan monoamine oxidase inhibitor (MAOI) antimo ing "B. caapi". E malino nung makananu dong atuklasan deng katutubung tau deng epektu da reng tanaman. Lipat ning sasabyan da reng tau ibat king Amazon a diretsu lang mánikwang kaparalanan king pamanyangkap kareng tanaman ampo reng ispiritu da reng tanaman, atin lang alternatibung teorya deng talapanyalugsug ("researchers") para king pamanuklas kaniti.

José Raúl Capablanca:
I José Raúl Capablanca y Graupera (19 Noviembre 1888 – 8 Marzo 1942) metung yang was a Cubanung talapamyalung chess a meging kampeon king chess ning yatu manibat 1921 anggang 1927. Metung ya kareng mapyang diling talapamyalung king kabilugan ning panaun, pikabalwan ya king kayang kabyasnan king e karaniwan a pangayari king pyalung ("endgame") ampo king kayang bilis a pamamyalung. Uling kareng kayang tagumpe king yatu ning chess, tenakan king pamamyalung ampong simpling istilu kumpara kareng aliwa, mibansagan yang "Human Chess Machine". Tuturing deng pekanatural talentung talapamyalung chess king kasalesayan ("the most naturally talented chess player in history"). 

Bashar al-Assad:
I Bashar Hafez al-Assad ( "", Levantine a pangayagkas: ; mibait 11 Setiembre 1965) ing kasalungsungan a President ning Syria ampong Kalihim Panglabwad ("Regional Secretary") ning Sangang panimunan ning Syria ning Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party. Ing tata na, i Hafez al-Assad, ing tinalan king Syria kilub ning 29 banwa angga king kayang kamatayan anyang 2000.
Miyari ya king pipagaralan a pangmedisina ("medical school") king University of Damascus anyang 1988, at megumpisa yang magobra antimong doktor king ukbu ("army"). Kaybat ning apat a banwa, megaral yang pamagaral a postgraduate king Western Eye Hospital, king London, at megi yang espesyalista king ophthalmology. Anyang 1994, nung kapilan ya mete king aksidenti king sapungan kotsi ing koya nang i Bassel, ing talapagmana nang tata ra, mabilis deng pepayaus i Bashar bang manalili king pwestu nang Bassel. Linub ya king akademyang militar, at menibala ya king Pamanyakup ning Syria king Lebanon anyang 1998. Kanitang Diciembre 2000, mikasal ya i Assad kang Asma Assad, a maki pilidung Akhras anyang dalaga ya. Miyalal yang Al-Assad was elected as Pamuntuk ning Syria i Al-Assad anyang 2000 ampong 2007, at pareu yang alang kalaban.
Anyang mumuna, akakit de king bangsa na ampo kareng aliwang bangsa antimong repormista o magdalang kapanumanan, at mika palayo yang "The Hope" ("Ing Kapanayan"), oneng anting mebigu iti kaybat ning milyari king Gerang sibil king Syria. Kaybat na nita, inyad na ning Oposisyun king Syria ampo ing maragul a dake ning komunidad a internasyunal ing kayang pamitabili king upaya o pamagdimitir ("resignation").

Fouad Siniora:
I Fuad Siniora "(alternatibung pamisulat: Fouad Sanyoura, Fuad Sinyora, Fouad Sanioura, Fouad Seniora, Fouad Siniora)" (, Fu'ād as-Sanyūrah) (mibait 14 Abril 1943) metung yang pulitikung Lebanese, sadyang Pun Ministru ning Lebanon, metung a pusisyun a telan na manibat 19 Julio 2005 anggang 25 Mayo 2008; mepili ne namang talan king pwestu anyang 28 Mayo 2008 at telan ne ing pwestung Pansamantalang Pamuntuk ("Acting President") pilatan da reng petsang deta. Migdimitir ya anyang 9 Noviembre 2009 para kang Saad Hariri, ing anak ning meangu bye Rafiq Hariri. King salukuyan, kayanib ne ning Parlamento a pekakatawan ning Saida at kayanib ne ning Club of Madrid, metung a aguman da reng sadyang pekapun da reng bangsang demokratikung maki kapagnasan a magpasikan king pamanibalang demokratiku.

Awak:
Deng awak ("crow" king Ingles) bibilug la king genus Corvus king familia Corvidae. Manibat ing dagul da king alus kasindagul patipating jackdaw (Eurasian ampong Daurian) angga king Common Raven ning labwad a Holarctic ampo ing Thick-billed Raven da reng lugal matas ning Ethiopia. Deng 40 o maygit pang kayabe king genus a iti mayayakit la kareng anggang kontinenti kasantingan pali ("temperate") liban king continents except for Mauling America, ampong mapilan a isla. King Europa, magagamit ya ing katayang "crow" para king Carrion Crow o king Hooded Crow, kabang king Pangulung America, magagamit ya king American Crow o king Northwestern Crow.
Ing genus da reng awak, bibilugan de ing metung a katlu da reng species king familiang Corvidae. Balamu, milyari ing ebolusyon da reng awak king Asia king lahing corvid, a menibat king Australia. 
Agpang king bayung pamanyalugsug ("recent research"), agyu da reng awak e mu ing pamangamit kasangkapan nun e ing pamaglalang kaniti ("tool construction"). Tuturing da nong metung kareng pekaintelihenting animal king yatu. Deng Jackdaw ampong European Magpie atin lang nidopallium a manga kasindagul na kumpara king katawan ning katumbas na papil a neocortex kareng chimpanzee ampong tau, at makabaldugan a maygit kesa ketang king gibbon.

James B. Reuter:
I James Bertram Reuter, S.J. (Mayo 21, 1916 – Diciembre 31, 2012) metung yang akademiku, talasulat king teatro, direktor ampong producer king Filipinas a maki ministerio king teatro, radio, limbagan ampo pelikula. Migretiru ya i Padre Reuter king Xavier House king Santa Ana, Menila, bayu ya minalis king Our Lady of Peace Hospital king Parañaque Lakanbalen, nung nu ya menatili angga mete ya anyang Diciembre 31, 2012.

Saresa (disambiguation):
Ing Saresa metung yang pun dutung a maki bungang apapangan king genus a "Muntingia". 
Ing "Saresa"' malyari ya mu namang mangabaldugang aratilis na ibat king salitang griyego na "area telesa"

Kāma:
Ing kāma (Sanskritu: काम) burî nang sabian "awa" u "burî". King Budismu at Induismu, saklo ning "kāma" la ring burî pára king nánumang pámagsayâng sensoriu u atraksiong emosional u estetiku, alimbáwâ ing kalalangan, terak, músika, drámang relasional u pámangan.
King kawatásan.
Ing "Saresa" (2005) metung yang poema ning talasúlat a Filipínung i Renato Alzadón tungkul karing seresa.
Dakal nong tikman kung maniaman a bunga
Karing tanaman na ning kekaming mula;
Ing pekamaniaman king kakung panlasa
Yapin ing malulut a bungang Saresa.
Sakdal ya kayumu! Sakdal ya kasampat
Dalaga ya waring irugan mung tapat;
King bameng akamtan ing tangu nang ingat
King keang kamalan mangangas kang mukiat.
Nung bisa kang mupul king mayumung bunga
King pamanukyat mu maingat ka sana;
Nung bugasuk ka mu kapaklian kang sanga
Uling yang Saresa matbud yang talaga.
Karetang mumukiat a pabisu-bisu
Dakal nong melagpak king gabun menabu;
Uling yang Saresa eme apatangu
King kabugasukan at pamagpalalu.
Yang kabugasukan at gawang sapala
E mamungang mayap keti king masala;
Ugaling sapulyut at pabigla-bigla
Ing kararasan na mapait yang kalma.
Karetang makatua kanaku yang dimdam
Diparan yang payul king diwa mitanam;
Yang kanung bugasuk a kasuklam-suklam
Potang masuksuk ya at mu na kalalam.
O' ining Saresa king pakiwari ku
Tin yang babie aral kareng baintau;
Nung bisa kang magtal keng bungang mayumu
E ka magbugasuk king pamanukyat mu.

Ing Propeta (libru):
Ing Ing Propeta ("The Prophet") metung yang libru da reng 26 a saleseng ("essay") prosang kawatasan ("prose poetry") a sinulat na king Ingles ning artist, filosofo ampong talasulat a Lebanese a i Khalil Gibran. Minuna neng linimbag kanitang 1923 ning Alfred A. Knopf. Iti ing pekamasanting nang obra. Milikas ne kareng maygit apat a pulung (40) amanu ing "Ing Propeta" at e pa milako king pangalimbag ("never been out of print").

Prosang kawatasan:
Ing Prosang kawatasan ("Prose poetry" king Ingles) kawatasan ya o poesiang misulat king prosa at e king bersu oneng manatili la reng kalidad a pang-poesia antimo reng pepatingkad a pamilarawan ampong epektu o kararasan a emosyonal o panamdaman. 

Pamangaluku ning yatu:
Ing Pamangaluku ning yatu ("Global warming" king Ingles) ya pin ing pamagtas ning karaniwan temperatura ning angin ampong dayatmalat king Yatu manibat anyang tawling dake ning ka19 a dilanwa o siglu ("late 19th century") ampo ing palage dang pamitaglus na niti king paintungulan. Manibat anyang mumuna nang dake ning ka20ng dilanwa, ing mitatas , ing "mean" a temperatura king babo o balat ning yatu, at milyari ing metung a katlu ning pamagtas manibat kanitang 1980. Alang duda o kapikakunwan a malino ing pamangaluku o pangapali ning sistema ning klima, at maygit lang 90% a siguradu deng siyentipikung ing manimunang magdala kaniti ya pin ing daragul a konsentrasyun da reng greenhouse gas a ibat kareng aktibidad ning tau, alimbawa ing pamanyilab kareng fossil a panangab ("fossil fuels") ampo ing pamanyira kareng kakewan o kagubatan. Kikilalanan da la reng pamanigaral a reti deng pambangsang akademya ning syensya da reng anggang manimunang bangsang industrialisadu.
Misampulung ("summarized") la reng pamagtantsa king ulma ning klima ("climate model") king 2007 Fourth Assessment Report (AR4) ning Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC). Agpang kaniti, lalu pang mitas ing temperatura king babo ning yatung para king pekamababang emissions scenario ampong para king karelang pekamatas. Ibat pamiyaliwa da reng tantsang deti king pamangamit kareng pamiyaliwa king pamangamit kareng ulma o modelung miayaliwa panga-sensitibu king sukad da reng greenhouse gas.
Agpang king AR4, maging aliwa-liwa ing pamagtas temperatura o pamangaluku ampo reng aliwang pamagbayu king kareng balang labwad king mabilug a yatu. Kayabe la kareng epektu king pamagtas ning temperatura deng pamagtas ning pamipatag o lebel ning dayatmalat, ampo ing pamagbayu ning sukad ampong pamirake ning uran at aliwang uri ning presipitasyu, at mapalyaring ing pamaglapad da reng subtropical a desyertu.

Jared Diamond:
I Jared Mason Diamond (mibait Setiembre 10, 1937) metung yang Americanung siyentipiku ampong talasulat librung pikabalwan dili kareng libru nang popular science a ding "The Third Chimpanzee" (1991), "Guns, Germs, and Steel" (1997), ampong "" (2005). Minuna yang migsane king physiology i Diamond, at maki maki bakas la king kayang obra deng miayaliwang sanga ning belwan, at king salukuyan, Propesor ne ningGeograpiya king University of California, Los Angeles. Milarawan ya antimong "kilalang diling geograpiku ning America." ("America’s best-known geographer").

Lionel Messi:
I Lionel Andrés "Leo" Messi Cuccittini (, mibait 24 Junio 1987) metung yang Argentinung talapamyalung football a mamyalung antimong forward para king club a Ligue 1 Paris Saint-Germain ampo king koponang pambangsa ning Argentina. Mágsilbi yang kapitan ning koponan nang football ning kayang bangsa. King idad a 21, tinggap nong Messi deng nominasyun a Ballon d'Or ampong FIFA World Player of the Year. Anyang tutuking banwa, 2009, simbut ne ing mumuna nang galal a Ballon d'Or ampong FIFA World Player of the Year. Katuki na niti, simbut ne ing pamuklat ("inaugural") a FIFA Ballon d'Or in 2010, at kaybat ing 2011, and 2012. Simbut ne mu naman ing 2010–11 UEFA Best Player in Europe Award. King idad a 24, megi yang pekamatas "score" king kabilugan ning panaun king Barcelona kareng anggang opisyal a kompetisyun ning club i Messi.
E manaliwa ing pamanuring da reng komentarista, coach ampong kayabeng talapamyalung kaya antimong byasang diling talapamyalung football king yatu at metung kareng mapyang diling talapamyalung football king kasalesayan ning pyalung, I Messi ing mumunang talapamyalung football king kasalesayan a sumambut apat a Ballons d'Or, a tuki-tuki nang simbut. Lima ne simbut a La Liga i Messi, adwang Copas del Rey, limang Supercopas de España, atlung Champions Leagues, adwang Super Cup ampong adwang Club World Cup. Anyang Marzo 2012, miglakwan yang bakas king kasalesayan i Messi king UEFA Champions League kapamilatan ning pamaging mumunang talapamyalung a gawang limang goal king metung a pyalung, at ikwa ne ining tagumpe king pyalung nung nu ya sinambut ing kayang koponan a 7–1 laban king Bayer Leverkusen. Apanten ne mu naman ing record nang José Altafini a 14 a goals king metung a Champions League season. I Messi ing meging mumunang talapamyalung a mika matas dili score kareng apat a tuki-tuking kampanyang Champions League campaigns. Gewa ne ing record a Europeo para king dakal diling goal king metung a season anyang 2011–12 season, nung nu ya mika 73 goal. King season muring ita, gewa ne ing kasalungsungan a goalscoring record king metung a La Liga season, at migpalub yang 50 goal.

Apang psyllium:
Deng Apang psyllium (psyllium seed husks), a awsan da mu namang ispaghula, isabgol, o psyllium, dake da la o parting apá, deng butul o bini ning tanaman a "Plantago ovata", (genus "Plantago"), a katutubu king India. Deti hygroscopic la, at kakapal la lalbag at maging malasipun. Rerekomenda ning Ayurveda ing pamangamit kaniti para king pamaglinis king bituka ampo king regular a pamagbawas ampo king mas masanting a sirkulasyun ning daya. 
E malalaso king katawan ing kakanan a apang psyllium, at iti malyaring pikwanan tiban king kakanan ("dietary fiber"). Gagamitan iti bang munye kapasnawan king masyas a pamagbawas, iritabling pamagbawas, ampong pamagbulus. Gagamitan ya mu namang pandagdag king kakanan ("dietary supplement") bang saupan ampong panatilyan ing regular a pamagdalan king sistemang gastrointestinal (ing daralanan ning kakanan). Ing e malalasong sangkap ning keraklan king king apa babye yang e manaliwang solidung sangkap nanu la man deng aliwang aspetu ning kakanan o sakit ning bituka. Agpang king bayung pamanyalugsug ("recent research") masanting ing epektu ra king pamagpababa king cholesterol ampo king pamag-kontrol king diabetes.
Kayabe kareng aliwa nang gamit ing pamag-ornung alang gluten ("gluten-free baking"), nung nu ra kukwanan o sisipsipan deng apang psyllium ing danum o mabasa, at sasaup iti bang e gad misasalbag o matatagtag ing tinape. 
Magagamit la reng apa king natural dang kabilyan, o palangyan da la ampong dadaldakan at gagawan da lang polbu, ba lang mas malagwang kanan. King sanu man kareng pormang deti, kakanan la kapamilatan ning pamanyamut king danum o aliwang likidu. 
Malyari la muring inuman antimong capsule. Deng masasali king bitukang pampalambut pamagbawas, ampo reng "fiber supplement", antimo reng Metamucil, Colon Cleanse, Serutan, Fybogel, Bonvit, ampong Effersyllium, atin lang apang psyllium antimong pekamaulagang sangkap. 
Malyari la mu namang isamut deng apang deti kareng aliwang sangkap. Alimbawa, neng kayi, sasamut da ing pulut a Blackstrap ("Blackstrap molasses") kareti uli ning kayang matas a laman a mineral ampong bitamina, bukud king masanting yang talapagdala. Ing karaniwan a dosis kaniti, metung anggang atlung kutsarita balang basu ning danum. Malyari lang gamitan deng butul psyllium, oneng mas mura la. Ing standard a dosis, 3.5gm a linaso king 250 ml a danum. 
Agpang king U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA), maki malinong pakinabang ing pamamangan king apang psyllium at babawasa na ing panganib ning sakit king pusung coronary ("coronary heart disease" o CHD). Uli na niti, malyari nang bawasan ning psyllium ing panganib ning CHD.

Psyllium:
Ing Psyllium , o Ispaghula, ing karaniwang lagyu kareng mapilang kayabe king genus da reng tanaman a "Plantago", a deng kayang butul magagamit la at pisasali para king pamangawang mucilage.

Mucilage:
Ing mucilage marayuput ya ampong balamu pamekat o "glue"ng sangkap o laman a gagawan da o lalalangan deng halus eganaganang tanaman ampong mapilan a mikroorganismu o mikrobyu/ krobyus. Metung yang polar a glycoprotein ampong exopolysaccharide. Ing mucilage kareng tanaman maki papil ya king pamanyinup king danum ampong pamangan, king pamanubu da reng bini, ampo ing pamangapal da reng membrane. Maulaga lang pikukwanan mucilage deng kaktus (ampong aliwang masabong tanaman o other "succulent") ampong bining lino o flax.

FIFA Ballon d'Or:
Ing FIFA Ballon d'Or metung yang galal king "association football" a bibye ra banwa-banwa king talapamyalung a tuturing dang masanting dili pamamyalung anyang milabasan a season. Bibye re agpang kareng botu da reng coach ampo reng kapitan da reng koponan a internasyunal, ampo reng peryodista king mabilug a yatu. given annually to the player who is considered to have performed the best in the previous season. 
Migumpisa ya ing galal anyang 2010 kaybat ning pamisanib da reng galal a "France Football" Ballon d'Or ampo ing panglalaking FIFA World Player of the Year. I Lionel Messi ing sinambut king pamuklat a 2010 FIFA Ballon d'Or, a simbut nang pasibayu anyang tutuking banwa. (Kaybat ning pamisanib, megi yang pambabaing galal ing FIFA World Player of the Year award.)

Tukud pari:
Ing tukud pari ("Cordyline fruticosa") metung yang evergreen a tanaman a manyampaga ("flowering plant") king familia ning Asparagus, ing Asparagaceae, a balu ra kareng miayaliwang karaniwang lagyu, alimbawa Cabbage Palm, Good Luck Plant, Palm Lily, Ti Plant, Kī, La'i (Hawaiian), Tī Pore (Māori), Sī (Tongan), Lauti (Samoan), ampong Autī (Tahitian) .
Sadya yang makabili kareng familiang Agavaceae ampong Laxmanniaceae (a pareu nang subfamilia ning Asparagaceae king sistemang APG III system). Metung yang tanaman a madutung ("woody plant") a miraras king katas, a maki bulung a (rarely ) kaba ampong lapad king babo ning tangkeng madutung ("woody stem"). Manyampaga yang kabang panicle da reng mangalating mabanglung manilo-nilo anggang malutung sampagang maging malutung bungang berry.
Katutubu ya king tropical o malisangan a mauli-aslagang Asia, Papua New Guinea, Melanesia, pangulu-aslagang Australia, ing Indian Ocean, ampong dake ning Polynesia. E ya katutubu king Hawaii o New Zealand, nun e dela re deng Polynesian a minalis karin.

Ibayo Silangan:
Ing Ibayo Silangan metung yang first district ning barangay king balen ning Naic, Cavite, king Filipinas.

Petron:
Ing Kurporasiun ning Petron (PCOR) metung pinamalaking refining ning gasolina at marketing company king Filipinas.

San José (Balanga):
Ing San José metung yang first district ning barangay king Balanga Lakanbalen, Bataan, king Filipinas.

Maurice Sendak:
I Maurice Bernard Sendak (; Junio 10, 1928 – Mayo 8, 2012) metung yang Americanung talasulat ampong ilustrador ning panyulat a pang-anak. Pikabalwan yang dili uli ning kayang libru, ing "Where the Wild Things Are", a milimbag anyang 1963.

Sakine Cansiz:
I Sakine Cansiz (1958 – 10 Enero 2013) metung ya kareng talatátag ning Partidung Talapagobra ning Kurdistan ("Kurdistan Workers' Party;") (PKK). Metung yang aktibistang Kurdish kanitang dekadang 1980, a dekap da at penasakit deng pulis a Turkish. Metung yang malapit a katiwala nang Abdullah Öcalan, at ikit deng mete uli ning pamamaril king Paris, France, anyang 10 Enero 2013, kayabe da reng adwang aliwang aktibistang Kurdish. Kinilala de reng opisyal ning Estados Unidos i Cansiz antimong metung kareng manimunang mágpondu king PKK king Europa, at sibukan deng dakpan anyang 2007.

Abdullah Öcalan:
I Abdullah Öcalan (mibait 4 Abril 1948) metung yang kayanib a talatátag ning Partidung Talapagobra ning Kurdistan (PKK).
Dekap de reng pwersang pangseguridad a Turkish king Nairobi i Öcalan at dela de king Turkey, nung nu ya mesentensya king kamatayan lalam ning Artikulo 125 ning Kodigo Penal ning Turkey, a makaparikil king pamagormang gang. Miyalis ya ing sentensya king pepabayat a pang-kabangbyeng pamanyukul ("aggravated life imprisonment") anyang leko ne ning Turkey ing parusang kamatayan king kapagnasan nang miyanib king European Union. Manibat 1999 anggang 2009, ya kabud ing presung makasukul king isla ning İmralı, king Sea of Marmara. Inamin nang Öcalan ing pangabayolenti ning PKK, oneng yari na ing panaun ning armadung pamaglaban, at kaylangan yang bilugan ing pampulitikang kalutasan king pisasabyan Kurdish. Miras 40,000 a bye deng mewala king labanan ning Turkey ampo ing PKK, kayabe la reng kayabe la reng kayanib ning PKK, ing militar a Turkish, ampo reng sibilyan, Kurdish man o Turkish.
Manibat king sukulan, mekapaglimbang yang mapilang libru, at ing pekabayu linwal ya anyang 2011.
Dalerayan.

Centro Federal de Educação Tecnológica Celso Suckow da Fonseca:
Ing Centro Federal de Educação Tecnológica Celso Suckow da Fonseca (pamikuyad: Cefet-RJ) metung yang universidad king Brasil.
Mitatag ya kanitang 1917.

Centro Federal de Educação Tecnológica de Minas Gerais:
Ing Centro Federal de Educação Tecnológica de Minas Gerais (pamikuyad: Cefet-MG) metung yang universidad king Brasil.
Mitatag ya kanitang 1910.

Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais:
Ing Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais (pamikuyad: UFMG) metung yang universidad king Brasil.
Mitatag ya kanitang 1927.

Universidade Estadual de Feira de Santana:
Ing Universidade Estadual de Feira de Santana (pamikuyad: UEFS) metung yang universidad king Brasil.
Mitatag ya kanitang 1976.

Universidade Federal da Bahia:
Ing Universidade Federal da Bahia (pamikuyad: UFBA) metung yang universidad king Brasil.
Mitatag ya kanitang 1946.

Kurdistan:
Ing Kurdistan ( "Labwad da reng Kurd"; a ausan da mu namang "Curdistan" kanita; laun a lagyu: "Corduene") metung yang e makaing malino pamigulis a labwad nung nu deng Kurds ing manimunang mayorya ning populasyun, at nung nu la makabasi deng Kurdish a kultura, amanu, ampong pamikilalang pambangsa king kasalesayan.
King kasalungsungan a pamangamit, ing Kurdistan mangabaldugan yang deng mapilan a dake ning albugang Turkey (Turkish Kurdistan), pangulung Iraq (Iraqi Kurdistan), pangulu albugang Iran (Iranian Kurdistan) ampong Syria (Western Kurdistan) nung nu deng Kurd ing manimunang manuknangan.
Halus katulid ne ning Kurdistan ing labwad a bibilugan da rengpangulu albugan ning kabundukan a Zagros ampong aslagan ning kabundukan a Taurus mountain ranges, at miraras ya kareng dake ning Armenia.
Minuna yang mika kabilyan a "autonomous" (maki sariling pamanibala) king pamikasundu anyang 1970 king kapamahalan a Iraqi, at mekumpirma yang pasibayu ing kayang kabilyan antimong labwad a autonomous kilub ning pederal a republikang Iraqi anyang 2005. Ating lalawigan a maki lagyung "Kurdistan" king Iran; ala yang sariling pamanibala. 
Asakup de reng Kurd a lalaban king Gerang sibil king Syria ing maragul a dake ning pangulu aslagan ning Syria kabang minurung la reng pwersang kakampi nang al-Assad ba lang lumaban kareng aliwang lugal. Uling atátag de ing sarili rang kapamahalan, minyad lang autonomia king demokratikung Syria deng aliwang Kurd; den namang aliwa, kapagnasan dang mitátag magsarili o independienting Kurdistan.
Bisa lang mitikdong mágsariling bangsang estadung ("nation state") Kurdistan deng aliwang agumang nasyonalistang Kurdish, a bibilugan da reng aliwa o ing sablang lugal a keraklan Kurdish, kabang deng aliwa naman, mangampanya la para king karagdagang autonomiyang Kurdish kilub da reng kasalukuyang angganan da reng bangsa.

Partidung Talapagobra ning Kurdistan:
Ing Partidung Talapagobra ning Kurdistan ( o پارتی کار که‌رانی کوردستان Parti Karkerani Kurdistan) ("Kurdistan Workers' Party"), a karaniwan dang awsang PKK, a awsan da mu namang KGK ampong sadya, KADEK (Freedom and Democracy Congress of Kurdistan) o KONGRA-GEL (Kurdistan People's Congress), metung yang Kurdish a aguman a manibat kanitang 1984 lalabang armadung pamakilaban king estadung Turkish para king autonomous a Kurdistan ampong katulirang pangkultura ampong pampulitik da reng Kurd king Turkey. Mitátag ya ing grupu anyang 27 Noviembre 1978 king nayun ning Fis, malapit king Lice at penibalan neng Abdullah Öcalan. Anyang mumuna, ing ideolohiya ning PKK pamisanib ne ning rebolusyonaryung sosyalismu ampong Nasyonalismung Kurdish — dapot manibat anyang mesukul ya, likwan na nang Ocalan ing orthodox a Marxismu. Makabili ya ing ing PKK king listaan da reng organisasyung terorista king internasyunal pikimutan deng miayaliwang estadu ampong organisasyun, kayabe ya ing Misasanmetung a Bangsa, NATO, ing Estados ampo ing European Union.<ref> 

Bangsang estadu:
Ing bangsang estadu ("nation state") metung yang estadung mangilala king sarili nang kukwa king kayang pangalehitimung pampulitika king kayang pamagsilbi antimong magsariling talapagdala ning bangsa antimong magsariling labwad. Ing estadu metung yang pampulitika ampong pang-geopolitical a bage; ing bangsa metung yang pangkultura ampong/o panglahing bage. Ing katayang "bangsang estadu" mangabaldugan yang mitutulid la reng adwa king metung a lugal mitatabnu la reng aliwa king metung a lugal. Milyari ing pamanalkus da reng bangsang estadu kareng miayaliwang panaun kareng miayaliwang dake ning yatu, oneng megi yang makababo o dominanting uri ning pamag-organisa ning estadu. 
Malyari yang ikumpara o pakiyanti, ampong piyaliwa, ing konseptu na ampo ing tutu nang kabilyan ning bangsang estadu kareng multinational state (‘’multinational state’’), city state (‘’lakanbalen a estadu’’),
The concept and actuality of the nation state can be compared and contrasted with that of the multinational state, city state, imperyu (‘’empire’’), pamiugnayan (‘’confederation’’) , ampong aliwa pang porma o alkus ning estadu, a malyaring misanib. Ing pekamaulagang pamiyaliwa kareng aliwang alkus, ya pin ing pamangilala ning forms with which it may overlap. The key distinction from the other forms is the identification of a people (‘’people’’) king metung a polity (estadu o dake na niti).

Camilo de Lellis:
I San Camilo de Lellis, M.I., (25 Mayo 1550 – 14 Julio 1614) metung yang Italianung paring mitátag relihyosung orden a makaparikil king pamaningat kareng másakit. 

Swami Vivekananda:
I Swami Vivekananda (Pangayagkas a Bengali: ): ) (12 Enero 1863–4 Julio 1902), mibait 'a "Narendra Nath Datta"' (), metung yang Indian a Hindu monk. Manimuna yang tauan king pamipakilala da reng pilosopiyang Indian ning "Vedanta" ampong "Yoga" king albugan ning yatu ("western world") at ya ing sasabyan dang pepalaganap king belwan tungkul kareng miayaliwang relihun, at tinas ne ing kabilyan ning Hinduismu antimong manimunang relihyun ning yatu anyang tawli nang dake ning ka-19 a dilanwa o siglu. Maragul yang pwersa king pangimut para king pasibayung pasibayung pamibangun ning Hinduismu king India ampo ing ampo ing pamangilala king nasyonalismu king mesakup a India. Ya ing manimuna nang disipulus ning ka-19 a dilanwang santung i Ramakrishna ampo ing talatátag ning Ramakrishna Math ampo ing Ramakrishna Mission. Mapalyaring kilala yang dili king kayang makabye diwang pamagsalitang magumpisa king makabye nang diwang pamagsalitang magumpisa king "Kapatad ku king America," ("Sisters and Brothers of America,") ing pamipakilala na king Hinduismu king Parliament of the World's Religions king Chicago anyang 1893.
Mibait ya king aristokratikung pamilyang Bengali ning Calcutta i Vivekananda, a migpakit hilig king ispiritwal. Meimpluwensya ya king kayang guru, i Ramakrishna nung kenu na abalung deng anggang mabye pamikatawan na la ning banal a sarili, at uli na niti, ing pamagsilbi king Dios malyaring daptan kapamilatan ning pamagsilbi king meto ketawan ("mankind"). Kaybat nang mete ning kayang guru, maleparan yang miglakbe i Vivekananda king Indian subcontinent at mika diretsu yang belwan tungkul king kabilyan ning British India. Kaybat, miglakbe ya king Estados Unidos bang maging pekakatawan ning India antimong delegadu ning 1893 Parliament of World Religions. Pilang dalan ing gewa nang pamagsalita, publiku man o pribadu, at bilalag no reng prinsipyu ning pilosopiyang Hindu king Estados Unidos, Inglaterra ampong Europa. King India, tuturing deng santung makabalen ("patriotic saint") i Vivekananda, at pagmasusyan de ing kayang aldo kebaytan antimong Pambangsang Aldo ring Kayanakan ("National Youth Day").

Aaron Swartz:
I Aaron H. Swartz (Noviembre 8, 1986 – Enero 11, 2013) metung yang Americanung computer programmer, talasulat, talapanyimpan ("archivist"), mag-organisang pampulitika, ampong aktibistang Aptas ("Internet activist") .
Kayanib ya i Swartz king RSS-DEV Working Group misaup-saup king "RSS 1.0" specification ning RSS, at tinikdo ne ing Web site framework web.py ampo ing arkitektura para king Open Library. Gewa ne murin ing Infogami, metung a kumpanyang misanib king Reddit anyang minuna, at megi yang kapanteng makibandi ("equal owner") ning misanib a kumpanya. Makatutuk ya i Swartz king also focused on sociology, civic awareness and aktibismu. Anyang 2010, kayanib ya king Harvard University Center for Ethics. Metung ya kareng talatátag ning grupung Aptas ("online group") a Demand Progress (a mekilala uli ning kumpanya na laban king SOPA) at kaybat megobra ya para king grupung aktibistang Estados Unidos ampong internasyunal a Rootstrikers ampong Avaaz.
Anyang Enero 6, 2011, merakap y a i Swartz kaugne ning sistematikung pamanguldas ("systematic downloading") da reng artikulung pahayagang akademiku ("academic journal") king JSTOR, a meging paksa ning imbestigasyun a pederal. E na buring Swartz ing manyingil ya ing JSTOR, oneng imbes na babayaranan no reng talasulat, deng talapaglimbag ("publishers") ilang babayaranan na. Uli ning pamanyingil ning JSTOR, meging limitadu ing pamikalat da reng obrang ibat kareng koloniyu ampong unibersidad ning America.
Anyang Enero 11, 2013, ikit deng mete i Swartz king apartment king kayang apartment king Crown Heights, Brooklyn, nung nu lintong binite ne ing sarili na.

Pahiwatig:
Ing pahiwatig (metaphor king Ingles) metung yang amanung piguratibang ("figure of speech") maglarawan king paksa kapamilata'ning pamanyabing, agpang king metung a puntu ning pamiyanti o pamagkumpara, kalupa ne ing aliwang bageng king aliwang banda, ala namang kaugnayan o pamilupa kaya. Ing pahiwatig metung yang uri ning pamilupa ("analogy"), at atin yang kaugnayan kareng aliwang amanung piguratiba king retorika, a manikwa king karelang kapagnasan kapamilata'ning pamiugne, pamiyanti, o pamilupa, kayabe la reng allegory, kapalalwan ("hyperbole"), ampong pami-abas ("simile").

Lin Yutang:
I Lin Yutang (Oktubri 10, 1895 – Marsu 26, 1976) metung yang Isik a talasulat ampong manimbentu ("inventor"). Uli ning kayang istilung e pormal dapot mapinu istilu king Tsino ampong Ingles, metung ya kareng pekamaimpluwensiyang talasulat ning kayang dai o henerasyun, at "bestseller" la king Albugan deng kayang likas king Ingles da reng kasulatan a kasulatan a klasiku ning Tsina.

Pitsunpitsunan:
Ing pitsunpitsunan o kantataba ("Trianthema portulacastrum") metung yang uri ning tanaman a manyampaga king familia Aizoaceae, a awsan dang desert horse purslane king Ingles. Katutubu ya kareng mapilan a kontinenti, kayabe ya ing Africa ampong Pangulu ampong Mauling America, at metung yang species a midala kareng dakal pang lugal. Tutubu ya kareng miayaliwang uri ning karinan, at malagwa yang misingit kareng gabun a mengadistorbu ampong mitatamnan, antimong marok a dikut ("weed"). 
Metung yang yerbang banwahan ("annual herb") a magpormang dase o kumpul, nung nu la miraras metung a metru deng tangke. Maki kule yang aluntyan o berdi anggang malutu, at ala yang bwak bukud kareng mapilan a gulis a mangalating bwak malapit kareng bulung, at malaman ya. Malati la ampong mabilug o tulungkaba deng bulung a maki kabang anggang 4 sentimeterung makabili kareng mangakuyad a petiole. Ating magdilidiling sampaga kareng axil da reng bulung. Ala yang talulut ing sampaga, oneng atin yang kulul ubing ("purple") sepal a balumu talulut. Ing bunga o prutas metung yang baluktut ampong tabas silindrung ("cylindrical") kapsulang lulwal king tangke. Maki kaba yang kapitnang sentimetru, at atin yang adwang masyas ampong matilus a pakpak king babo, nung nu ya bubusni ing kapsula. 

Benjamin Netanyahu:
I Benjamin "Bibi" Netanyahu (, , "Binyyameen Netanyahu"; mibait 21 Octubre 1949) metung yang pekapun a Israeli ampong kasalungsungan a Pun Ministru ning Israel. Magsilbi ya mu namang Talapamuntuk ("Chairman") ning Partidu Likud, antimong kayanib ning Knesset, ampong Ministru ning Kabulasan ("Health Minister of Israel"), antimong Pisasabyang Pang-magpension ning Israel ("Pensioner Affairs Minister of Israel") ampong Ministrung Pang-estratehiyang Ekonomiku ning Israel ("Economic Strategy Minister of Israel").

Mahinda Rajapaksa:
I Percy Mahendra "Mahinda" Rajapaksa (, , ; mibait 18 Noviembre 1945) ing ka-6 a Pamuntuk ning Sri Lanka ampo ing Pekapun a Komandanti of the Ukbung Makiarmas ning Sri Lankan. Metung a abugadu agpang king propesyon i A lawyer by profession, Rajapaksa, a mumunang miyalal king Parlamento ning Sri Lanka anyang 1970, at migsilbi yang Pun Ministru manibat 6 Abril 2004 anggang sumambut ya king Alalang pang-pamuntuk ning 2005 . Sinumps ys para king anam a banwang terminu antimong pamuntuk anyang 19 Noviembre 2005. Miyalal ya para king kadwang terminu anyang 27 Enero 2010.

Rebecca Wells:
I Rebecca Wells (Lousiana, 1952) metung yang Americanang talasulat ampong direktor king teatro, a sinulat king serye da reng librung "Ya-Ya Sisterhood", kayabe la reng "Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood", "Little Altars Everywhere", ampong "Ya-Yas in Bloom".

Miloš Zeman:
I Miloš Zeman (; mibait 28 Setiembre 1944) metung yang Czech a pulitikung miyalal a katlung Pamuntuk ning Republika ning Tseka anyang 2013. Ya ing mumunang miyalal Pamuntuk king kasalesayan a Czech a miyalal king kabilugan ning bangsa. Bayu iti, migsilbi yang Pun Ministru ning Republika ning Tseka manibat 1998 anggang 2002. Antimong pekapun ning Czech Social Democratic Party anyang dekadang 1990, binayu ne ing partidu at gewa neng metung kareng manimunang partidu ning bangsa. Migsilbi yang Talapamuntuk ning Kamara ding Diputadu ning Republika ning Tseka, ing mababang kapulungan ning parlamentong Czech, manibat 1996 anggang 1998.

Libatu:
Ing libatu, ("Basella alba"), , a awsan dang Malabar spinach, Malabar nightshade, 
phooi leaf, red vine spinach, creeping spinach, climbing spinach, Indian spinach, Philippine Spinach, ampong Asian Spinach king Ingles, libato king Tagalug ampong alugbati king Cebuano ampong Hiligaynon, , metung yang baging a pilmihan ("perennial") a tutubu king tropiku o kareng malisangan a lugal, nung nung ya gule, a kakanan da bulung.

Victoria Azarenka:
I Victoria Azarenka ( , ; mibait 31 Julio 1989) metung yang Belarusian a propesyonal a mamyalung tennis ampo ing Mumuna king Yatu king banwang 2013.
Sinambut neng adwang titulung singles king Australian Open, (2012 ampong 2013), at megi yang mumunang mamyalung a Belarusian a sinambut Grand Slam king singles. Kayabe la kareng aliwa nang tagumpe deng pamanyambut king medalyang tangsu king 2012 Summer Olympics king London, adwang titulung mixed doubles king Grand Slam —ing 2007 US Open kayabe ya i Max Mirnyi, ing 2008 French Open kayabe ya i Bob Bryan—ampo ing gintung medalya king mixed doubles king 2012 London Olympics kayabe ya i Max Mirnyi.

Anne Rice:
I Anne Rice (mibait Howard Allen Frances O'Brien; Octubre 4, 1941) metung yang Americanang talasulat ning gothic fiction, kasulatang Cristianu, ampong erotica. Mapalyaring pikabalwan yang dili ing kayang sikat ampong maimpluwensyang serye da reng nobela, ing "The Vampire Chronicles", a dudurut king manimunang tauan, i Lestat. Gewa ra nong pelikula deng adwang libru king "The Vampire Chronicles", ing "" anyang 1994, ampo ing "Queen of the Damned" in 2002.
Meragul ya king New Orleans i Rice, nung nu ya menuknangan anyang kayang kayanakan, bayu ya minalis king Texas, at kaybat king San Francisco. Meragul ya king metung a relihyosung pamilyang Katoliku, oneng megi yang ateista anyang kayanakan yang atsu king idad. Migumpisa ing kayang karerang propesyonal king pamanyulat anyang milimbag ya ing "Interview with the Vampire" anyang 1976, kabang manuknangan ya king California, at megumpisa yang sinulat katuglung na niti anyang dekadang 1980s. Kanitang kalibudtang ning 2000s, kaybat ning kayang pikabalwan a pamanyubli king Katolisismu, linimbag nong Rice deng nobelang ' ampong ', kwentung gewang piksyon da reng insidenti king bye nang Jesus. Pilang banwa kaybat, dinistansya ya king organisadung Kristyanismu, uling king e na pamanayun king pusisyun ning Pisamban kareng isyung pang-sosyedad, oneng pangaku nang makasentru ya pa murin ing kayang bye king kasalpantayanan king Dios. 
Maygit nong 100 milyung kopya da reng libru nang Rice ing misali, at uli na niti, metung ya kareng pekasikat a talasulat a Americanu king bayung kasalesayang Americanu. Lipat ning misamut ing reaksyun kareng mumuna nang obra, sinikat ya kareng kayang kritiku anyang dekadang 1980s. Malalam dong inanalisa deng istilu nang pamanyulat ampo ing kalamnan nang pangliteratura deng obra na deng komentarista king literatura. Asawa ne kilub ning 41 banwa ing poeta ampong pintor a i Stan Rice manibat 1961 anggang mete ya king kanser king utak anyang 2002 king idad a 60. Adwa la anak Stan, i Michele, a mete king leukemia king idad a limang banwa, ampo i Christopher, a metung mu namang talasulat.
Bukud kareng nobela nang tungkul kareng bampira, sinulat ya mu naman aliwang libru i Rice anti ing "The Feast of All Saints" (mipalage king telebisyun anyang 2001) ampo ing "Servant of the Bones", nung nu ya mibasi ing 2011 a seryeng pangkomiks. Megawa la mu namang komiks deng mapilang libru ning "The Vampire Chronicles" kapamilatan da reng aliwang talalimbag. Sinulat ya mu namang erotic fiction i Rice lalam ning talipampan a Anne Rampling ampong A. N. Roquelaure, kayabe ya ing "Exit to Eden", a megawang pelikula ing pelikulang 1994.

Tony Hillerman:
I Tony Hillerman (Mayo 27, 1925 – Octubre 26, 2008) metung yang mirinan-galal ("award-winning") a Americanung talasulat da reng nobelang detektib ampong obrang e-piksyun ("non-fiction") a pikabalwan dili kareng kayang nobelang misteryung Navajo Tribal Police. Megawa lang pelikulang pang-sine ampong pang-telebisyun deng mapilan kareng obra na. 
Suglung palwal.
Bold text

Miyagapeng pamanisip:
Ing miyagapeng pamanisip (parallel thinking) metung yang kataya o terminung lelangan na ampong ginamit Edward de Bono. Lalarawan de ing miyagapeng pamanisip antimong metung a konstruktibung alternatiba king pasalungat a pamanisip ("adversarial thinking"), dibati ampong keraklan ing paralan a yang balu tamung yang pipilinan ning GG3 (Greek gang of three). Keraklan, ing miyagapeng pamanisip, metung yang lalu pang pamanalkus kareng mas kilalang patalindking a prosesu ning pamanisip ("lateral thinking processes"), at lalung tututuk kareng pamaglakbe ("focusing even more on explorations")—ing pamanintun king "nung nanu ing malyaring maging" ("what can be") kesa king "nung nanu ing atyu" ("what is") .

Stephen Harper:
I Stephen Joseph Harper (mibait Abril 30, 1959) ing kadwang pulu't adwa ampong Pun Ministru ning Canada ampo ing pekapun ning Conservative Party. Megi yang pun ministru i Harper anyang mibalangkas yang kapamahalang minorya ("minority government") kaybat ning alalang pederal ning 2006. Ya ing mumunang pun ministru ibat king mibayung Conservative Party, kaybat ning pamisanib da reng partidung Progressive Conservative ampong Canadian Alliance.

Gibran Tueni:
I Gebran Ghassan Tueni (; 15 Setiembre 1957 – 12 Diciembre 2005) metung yang pulitikung Libano (Lebanese) ampong meging talapatuntun ("editor") ampong talapaglimbag ("publisher") ning pang-aldo-aldong pahayagang "An Nahar", a tetag ning kayang ingkung, a maki lagyu mu namang Gebran Tueni, anyang 1933.

Aluntyang gulis (Lebanon):
Ing Green Line (The Green Line) ing gulis a magsilbing angganan king Beirut, Lebanon anyang Gerang Sibil king Lebanon manibat 1975 anggang 1990. Kakawani no reng paksyong Muslim king Albugang in Beirut king Kristyanung Lebanese Front king Aslagang Beirut. Ibat ya ing lagyu king kule da reng bulung da reng tanaman a tinubu uling alang taung makatuknang king lugal. Dakal kareng gusali king Aluntyang Gulis ing mengasira o mengalasak anyang gera. Manibat anyang meyari ing labanan, mitikdo lang pasibayu deng dakal kareng gusali kaugne ning proyektu ning pamagbayung urban ("urban renewal") ning Solidere king Beirut Central District.

Francesco Totti:
I Francesco Totti (mibait 27 Septiembri 1976) metung yang Italianung talapamyalung football a mamyalung antimong forward para king club a Serie A Roma.

Serzh Sargsyan:
I Serzh Azati Sargsyan (, mibait June 30, 1954) ing katlu ampong kasalungsungan a Pamuntuk ning Armenia. Sinambut ya king Alalang pang-pamuntuk ning Febrero 2008 a maki suporta ning konserbatibung Republican Party of Armenia, metung a partidu nung nu ya talapamuntuk ("chairman"), and took office in April 2008. Anyang Febrero 18, 2013, miyalal yang pasibayung Pamuntuk. 

Minecraft:
Ing Minecraft metung yang pyalung a sandbox indieng minunang lelangan ning programmer a Swedish a i Markus "Notch" Persson, at kaybat inalkus na ampong linimbag ning Mojang. Mipalwal ya para king malda para king PC anyang Mayo 17, 2009, antimong bersyong alpha at, kaybat da reng ditak-ditak a pamagbayu, milimbag ya antimong ganap a bersyong ganap pamagpalwal ("full release version") anyang Noviembre 18, 2011. Pabulan bayu ita, mipalwal ya ing metung a bersyon para king Android anyang Octubre 7, at mipalwal ya ing metung a bersyong para king iOS anyang Noviembre 17, 2011. Kanitang Mayo 9, 2012, pepalwal de ing pyalung para king Xbox 360 antimong pyalung a Xbox Live Arcade, a miyalkus kayabe ya ing 4J Studios. Atin lang pamagbayu andat kayi deng anggang bersyon ning "Minecraft". 
Kapamilatan da reng aspetu nang makudta ampong pang-pamanikdo ("creative and building aspects") ning "Minecraft", makapanikdo la reng mamyalung a manikdo manibat kareng medukit a kubo ("textured cubes") king yatung 3D ampong procedurally generated. Kayabe kareng aliwang malyaring gawan king pyalung ing pamaglakbe, pamanipun bandi ("gathering resources"), pamaglalang ampong pamakilaban. Ketang pangapalwal o "release" nang komersyal, adwa la reng kaparalanan o "modes": survival, nung nu la mangaylangang manipun bandi deng mamyalung at magmantini king karelang kabulasan ("health") ampong danup; ampong makudta o "creative", nung nu alang angga ing mibibye kareng mamyalung a bandi, atin lang kagiwan a sulagpo, at ala lang prublema king kabulasan o danup. Ating katlung kaparalanan o "mode" a pareu king "survival", at aliwa mu kaniti king sákit; makakana ya king pekamasákit a "setting" o pangabili at e malyari ing pamanganak o it is set to hardest setting and "respawning", anya mapipilitan la reng mamyalung a ilako la reng karelang yatu o "world" kamate da. 
Mirinan yang limang galal ing "Minecraft" anyang 2011 Game Developers Conference: mika galal yang Innovation Award, Best Downloadable Game Award, ampong Best Debut Game Award ibat king Game Developers Choice Awards; ampo ing Audience Award, pati na ing Seumas McNally Grand Prize, ibat king Independent Games Festival anyang 2011. Kanitang 2012, mika galal yang Golden Joystick Award ing "Minecraft" king kategoryang Best Downloadable Game. Anyang Enero 22, 2013, maygit nong syam a milyung kopya ning pyalung ing misali kng PC ampong maygit 20 (adwang pulung) milyun kareng aliwang plataporma.

Nicos Anastasiades:
