I Nicos Anastasiades ( "Nikos Anastasiadis"; mibait 27 Setiembre 1946) metung yang pulitikung Greek Cypriot a pekapun ning DISY (Democratic Rally) ampo ing miyalal a pamuntuk ning Sipre. 
Anyang alalang pang-parlamentung anyang 22 Mayo 2011, menikwa yang 20 pwestu ("seats"), a maygit king sanumang partidu, oneng e mayorya king Kapulungan ding Pekakatawan ("House of Representatives") a maki 56 a kayanib. Opisyal yang kandidatu king Alalang pang-pamuntuk ning 2013. Ketang alalang pang-pamuntuk ("presidential elections") anyang 24 Febrero 2013, menikwa yang 57.48% da reng botu i Nicos Anastasiades.

Marcel Lefebvre:
I Marcel François Marie Joseph Lefebvre (29 Noviembre 1905 – 25 Marzo 1991) metung yang Pranses a Romano Katolikung arsobispu. Kaybat ning metung a karera antimong Delegadu Apostoliku para king Mauling Africa ampong Superior General da reng Holy Ghost Fathers, menimuna ya king pamangontra kareng pamagbayu king Pisamban kaugne ning Second Vatican Council.
Anyang 1970, tetag neng Lefebvre ing Society of St. Pius X (SSPX). Kanitang 1988, salungat king pamagbawal nang nang Papa Juan Pablo II, kinonsagra no reng apat a obispu bang isundu ing kayang obra king SSPX. Kabud, bilalag /dineklara ning Santa Sedeng ("Holy See") tambing lang eskomulgadu di Lefebvre ampo reng aliwang obispung kayabe king seremonya lalam ning leying canon ("canon law") a Katoliku.

Aguman nang San Pio X:
Ing Aguman nang San Pio X (Society of Saint Pius X o SSPX) metung yang internasyunal a tradisyunalistang Katolikung organisasyun a tetag na anyang 1970 ning Pranses a arsobispung i Marcel Lefebvre. Ing opisyal nang lagyu ning aguman, Fraternitas Sacerdotalis Sancti Pii X, a mangabaldugang "Pangparing Pamikakapatad nang Pio X" ("Priestly Society of Saint Pius X"). Masikan yang talapamingwa o taladepensa Misa Tridentino ing aguman, bukud kareng debosyun, paniwala, kostumbri ampong disiplinang pangrelihyun a maralas miyuyugne king panaun bayu ing Kadwang Konsehung Vaticano, a king paniwala ning aguman, mágtaguyud kareng pamanurung e ustu.
Dineklara nang Papa Benedicto XVI a para kareng sangkan a pangdoktrina at e uling king pamagdisiplina, ala yang kabilyan a pangkanonika king Pisambang Katolika ing SSPX, at uli na niting keyalan kabilyan a pangkanoniku, e la legal king Pisamban deng ministeryu da reng kayang ministru. Nanupata, sinabi ning superior general ning aguman a agpang king dapat na, babye yang pamikilala ing Santa Sede king legal ampong balidung pangayatsu ampong ministeryu da reng pari ning Aguman.
Meging pekamabayat ing tensyon kapamilatan ning aguman ampo ning Santa Sede ("Holy See") kanitang 1988, anyang migkonsagra yang apat a obispu i Arsobispu Lefebvre laban king kautusan nang Papa Juan Pablo II, at uli na niti, medeklara lang eskomulgadu deng obispung migkonsagra o mekonsagra, metung a eskomunyon a mibawi karetang mabye pa anyang Enero 2009 kayabe ning mebanggit a kapanayan a magbalik la reng kayanib king ganap a komunyon o pamiugnayan ("full communion").
Mika pormal a diskusyun kapamilatan ning Santa Sede ampo ning aguman anyang 2009 at miras king kritikal a dake anyang 2012. Kanitang 6 Setiembre, minyad yang karagdagang panaun ing aguman ba neng isadya ing opisyal nang pakibat kareng munikalang miyapag anyang 13 Junio. Agpang king Pontifical Commission a "Ecclesia Dei", ""Kaybat da reng atlung pulung banwa ning pamikawani, malyaring intindyan a kaylangan ing panaun ba lang ataluse kabaldugan deng bayung milyari. Uling kapagnasan nang Papa Benedicto XVI ing isundu ya ampong panatilyan ing pamisanmetung ning Pisamban kapamilatan ning pangatupad ning malwat nang panayang pamagbalik ning Pangparing Pamikakapatad nang San Pio X king Sede nang Pedro – metung a makabye pansing a alimbawa ning pamirapat ning "munus Petrinum" in action – kaylangan ing pamibabata, kataimikan pilubluban, tyaga ampong tiwala."" (""After thirty years of separation, it is understandable that time is needed to absorb the significance of these recent developments. As Our Holy Father Pope Benedict XVI seeks to foster and preserve the unity of the Church by realizing the long hoped-for reconciliation of the Priestly Fraternity of St. Pius X with the See of Peter – a dramatic manifestation of the "munus Petrinum" in action – patience, serenity, perseverance and trust are needed."")

Banal a Sede:
Ing Banal a Sede (; ; ; ), ing awtoridad a episkopal ning Pisambang Katoliku o Iglesia Catolica king Roma. Uli ning pamibabo o pamanimuna ("primacy") ning Roma, ing kayang obispu ning pekapun ning pangyatung pisamban o iglesia, at iti keraklan mayayaus yang Papa ("Pope"). Uling ing Roma ing pekamatas nang sedeng episkopal o tungkung pang-obispu ning Pisamban o Iglesia, iti ing karinan ning kapamahalang sentral o pangkalibudtan ning pisamban, kayabe no deng miyayaliwang ahensyang kaylangan king pamanibala. King diplomasya, ing Sante Sede ing kikimut ampong magsalita para king mabilug a Pisambang Katolika o Iglesia Catolica. Kikilalanan de mu naman deng aliwang sakup ning leying internasyunal o "international law" antimong bageng magsarili o soberanung karinan, a panibalan ning Papa, at malyaring mika ugnayang diplomatiku ("diplomatic relations") kaniti.
Maralas, mayayaus ya iting "ing Vaticano", dapot e pareung bage ing Santa Sede king Estadung Vatican Lakabalen, a linto mu anyang 
1929; ing Santa Sede, ing diosesis o sede episkopal ning Roma, manibat ya pa kanitang mumuna nang dake ning panaung Cristiano. Deng embahador makadestinu la e king Estadung Vatican Lakanbalen ("Vatican City State"), nun e king "Santa Sede", ("the Holy See"), at deng pekakatawan ning papa kikilalanan da lang pekakatawan ning Santa Sede, at e ning Estadung Vatican Lakanbalen.
Lipat ning mituturing la ngang "banal" ("holy") deng anggang diosesis o sede episkopal, ing terminung "Santa Sede" (a ala nang kayabe) normal yang magagamit king ugnayang internasyunal ampo king leying canon ning Pisambang Katoliku o Iglesia Catolica. 

Miriam Makeba:
I Miriam Makeba (4 Marzo 1932 – 9 Noviembre 2008), a maki palayong Mama Africa, metung yang magkanta ampong aktibistang pang katulirang sibil ("civil rights activist") ibat Mauling Aprikang mirinan Grammy Award. 
Anyang dekadang 1960s, ya ing mumunang magkantang ibat Africang magpasikat king musikang Aprikanu king Estados Unidos ampo king mabiliug a yatu. Pikabalwan yang dili para king kantang "Pata Pata", a mumuna rang gewang plaka anyang 1957 at mipalwang king Estados Unidos anyang 1967. Ginawa yang plaka ampong mig-tour kayabe la reng aliwang sikat a magkanta, antimo i Harry Belafonte, Paul Simon, ampo ing sadya nang asawang i Hugh Masekela. 
Aktibu yang mengampanya laban king sistema ning Mauling Aprikang apartheid. Uli na niti, binawi ne ning kapamahalan ning Mauling Aprika ing kayang panga-memalen ("citizenship") ampo ing katuliran nang mibalik ("right of return"). Kaybat nang milako ning apartheid, minuli ya. Mete ya kaybat ning ataki king pusu anyang 9 Noviembre 2008 kaybat nang linage king konsyertu ba neng suportan ing talasulat a i Roberto Saviano ketang laban na king Camorra, metung a organisasyun o aguman a kalupa ning mafia at lokal king labuad o rehiyon ning Campania.

Papa Francisco:
I Papa Francisco (mibait yang Jorge Mario Bergoglio anyang 17 Diciembre 1936) ing ka-266 ampong kasalungsungan a papa ning Iglesia Catolica, a inalal ning Papal conclave anyang 13 ya ing Marzo 2013.
Metung yang katutubu ning Buenos Aires, Argentina, at meordina yang pari kanitang 1969. Anyang 1998, megi yang Arsobispu ning Buenos Aires, at anyang 2001, metung a kardinal. Miyalal yang papa kaybat ning pamagdimitir ning papang minuna kaya, i Papa Benedicto XVI anyang 28 Febrero 2013. Pinili neng Bergoglio ing lagyung "Francisco" (ing minunang pamikatagun a kinwa ne ning papa ing lagyung iti) a kinwa na antimong pamangalang kang San Francisco de Asis. Ya ing mumunang Jesuitang papa ampo ing mumunang papang ibat king Americas. Ya mu naman ing mumunang paring ibat king kilwal ning Europa manibat kang Gregorio III anyang ka-walung dilanwa o siglu. 

Chinua Achebe:
I Chinua Achebe (, a mibait a Albert Chinualumogu Achebe, 16 Noviembre 1930 – 21 Marzo 2013) metung yang Nigerian a nobelista, poeta, propesor, ampong kritiku. Pikabalwan yang dili king kayang mumunang nobela ampong obra maestra, ing "Things Fall Apart" ("Misasalbag la reng Sabla") (1958), a yang babasan dang diling libru king makabayung literaturang Aprikanu.
Peparagul de reng kayang pengari king balen a Igbo ning Ogidi king mauli-aslagang Nigeria, i Achebe, a mengibabo king kayang pamagaral at meging iskolar king kolehiyu. Mika interes ya kareng relihyun ning yatu, at sinulat yang makuyad a salita anyang estudyanti ya king unibersidad. Kayari na, megobra ya king Nigerian Broadcasting Service (NBS) at kaybat, minalis y aking lakanbalen ning Lagos. Sinikat ya king mabilug a yatu uli ning "Things Fall Apart" anyang tawli nang dake ning dekadang 1950s; kayabe la kareng nobela nang tinuki kaniti "No Longer at Ease" (1960), "Arrow of God" (1964), "A Man of the People" (1966), ampong "Anthills of the Savannah" (1987). King Ingles ya sinulat i Achebe, at pemingwa na ing pamangamit na king Ingles, metung a wrote his novels in English and defended the use of English, a "amanu da reng kolonyalista" ("language of colonisers") king panyulat a Aprikanu. Kanitang 1975, pepaturanan ne king kayang pamiturung ("lecture") "An Image of Africa: Racism in Conrad's "Heart of Darkness"" i Joseph Conrad antimong metung a "bloody racist"; kaybat, milimbag ya iting maki kontrobersya.
Anyang kinawani ya ing labwad o rehyon ning Biafra king Nigeria anyang 1967, megi ya talasuporta i Achebe ning pamagsarili ning Biafra at migsilbi yang embahador para kareng memalen ning bayung bangsa. Memagkasakit la reng tau king gera, at anyang melalam ing epektu ning danup ampong biyolensya, mekisabi ya kareng memalen ning Europa ampo reng America para king saup. Anyang ikwa neng pasibayu ning kapamahalan ning Nigeria ing labwad anyang 1970, mikyabe ya kareng partidung politikal oneng e miglwat, migdimitir ya uling mebigu ya king korupsyon ampong elitismung asaksyan na. Pilan yang banwang menuknangan king Estados Unidos anyang dekadang 1970s, at migbalik ya king Estados Unidos anyang 1990 kaybat nang mika kapansanan kaybat ning aksidenti king kotsi.
Makatutuk la reng nobela nang Achebe kareng tradisyon ning sosyedad a Igbo, ing epektu da reng impluwensyang Cristiano, ampo ing pamisalungat da reng pamipaulagang ("values") a Aprikanu anyang panaun a kolonyal at kaybat na niti. Mamasa ya ing kayang istilu king tradisyong oral a Igbo, at piyayabe na ing deretsung pamagkwentu kareng alimbawa o pamikatawan da reng salitang malda balen oral tradition, and combines straightforward narration with representations of ("folk stories"), kasebyan, ampong pamagdiskursu ("oratory"). Milimbag ya mu namang mapilang makuyad a salita ("short stories"), librung anak, ampong koleksyon da reng salese ("essay collections"). Manibat 2009 angga king kayang kamatayan, migsilbi yang propesor king Brown University king Estados Unidos.

Oras ning Yatu:
Ing Oras ning Yatu (Earth Hour) metung yang pangyatung pamikatagun o okasyun a inorganisa ning World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF) at malilyari bandang wakas ning Marzo banwa-banwa, a managyag kareng pibale-bale ampong negosyung mamatda kareng e makaing kaylangang sulung de kuryenti kilub ning metung a oras bang mangising king kamalayan tungkul king pamangaylangan a kimut dikil king pamangaluku ning yatu. Iting pamikatagun, a aisip ning WWF ampo i "Leo Burnett", minunang milyari anyang 2007, nung kapilan deng 2.2ng milyung manuknangan king Sydney mikyabe la kapamilatan ning pamamatda kareng e kaylangang-kaylangan a sulu. Katuki ning Sydney, dakal lang lakanbalen king yatung migmasusi king pamikatagun anyang 2008. Marapat ing Oras ning Yatu 2013 keng Marzo 23, 2013 manibat 8:30 p.m. anggang 9:30 p.m. king oras dang lokal deng makayabe.

Niccolò Cusano University:
Ing Niccolò Cusano University (UNICUSANO) (Università degli Studi Niccolò Cusano) metung yang universidad a privadu king Rome, Italia. Mitatag ya kanitang 2006. 

Hezbollah:
Ing Hezbollah ( ', literal a kabaldugan, "Partidu nang Allah" o "Partidu ning Dios") — malyari mu namang transliterated Hizbullah, Hizballah, etc. — metung yang grupung militanting Muslim a Shi'a ampong partidung pulitikal a makabasi king Lebanon. Tatanggap yang saup a pampulitika ampong pinansyal king Iran ampong Syria, at ing dake nang paramilitary tuturing deng pangimut a pangresistensyaking mabilug a yatung Arabu ampong Muslim. Para kareng kapamahalan ning Estados Unidos, ing Netherlands, Bahrain, France, U.K., Australia, Canada, ampong Israel, metung yang aguman o organisasyun a terorista ing Hezbollah, king kabilugan o metung a dake na niti.
Aisipan deng itikdo deng paring Muslim, at pinonduan ne ning Iran kaybat ning pamanyakup ning Israel king Lebanon anyang 1982, at mitátag ya bayu ing sabla bang lumaban king pamanyakup ning Israel. Kinangwa lang inspirasyun deng kayang pekapun kang Ayatollah Khomeini, at senayan nala at inorganisa ning metung a tropa da reng Iranian Revolutionary Guards. 

Mauling Sudan:
Ing Mauling Sudan (South Sudan), a maki opisyal a titulung ( or ), Republica ning Mauling Sudan (Republic of South Sudan) at bayu ita, ausan dang Southern Sudan, metung yang bangsang makakulung-gabun ("landlocked") king aslagan-kalibudtang Africa a kayabe king United Nations subregion ning Aslagang Africa (Eastern Africa). Ing Juba ing kasalungsungan nang tungku (buntuk balen, kapitolyu o cabesera/kabisera), a ya mu namang pekamaragul nang lakanbalen o ciudad. Balak deng yalis ing tungku nang lakanbalen ("capital city") king mas makalibutad a lugal, ing Ramciel, king paintungulan. Padurutan de ing Mauling Sudan ning Ethiopia king aslagan, Kenya king mauli-aslagan, Uganda king mauli, ing Democratic Republic of the Congo king mauli-albugan, ing Central African Republic king albugan ampo ing Sudan king pangulu. Kayabe ya keti ing maleparan a labuad a pinak ning ning Sudd, a lelangan ning White Nile at mayayaus keting a "Bahr al Jabal".
Dake na lang ning Ejiptu deng teritoryu ning Mauling Sudan ampong Sudan lalam ning Muhammad Ali Dynasty, at kaybat penibalan da lang antimong Anglo-Egyptian condominium o miyayabeng pamanibala ning Inglaterra o England ampong Ejiptu, anggang mitimawa ya o migsarili ing Sudasn anyang 1956. Kaybat ning Mumunang Gerang Sibil ning Sudan ("First Sudanese Civil War"), meyalkus ya o meporma ing Southern Sudan Autonomous Region anyang 1972 at mindatila ya o menatili anggang 1983. Kaybat, milyari ing kadwang gerang sibil ning Sudan, at meyari iti king Pangkabilugan a Pamikasundung Pangkaratunan ("Comprehensive Peace Agreement") ning of 2005. Mas tawli anyang banwang ita, misubli ing otonomiya o sariling pamanibala ning mauli, anyang mebilug ya ing Autonomous Government of Southern Sudan.
Megi yang timawang estadu ing Mauling Sudan anyang 9 Julio 2011, kaybat ning metung a reperendum a mipasar kapamilatan ning 98.83% da reng botu. Metung yang estadung kayanib da reng Misasanmetung a Bangsa ("United Nations member state"), kayanib ning African Union, ampong estadung kayanib ning Intergovernmental Authority on Development. Anyang Julio 2012, pinirma ya ing Mauling Sudan kareng Geneva Conventions.

Willem-Alexander ning Holanda:
I Willem-Alexander (; Willem-Alexander Claus George Ferdinand; mibait 27 Abril 1967) ing Ari ning Kaarian ning Holanda, a bibilugan da reng bangsang Holanda, Curaçao, Aruba, ampong Sint Maarten. Ya ing pekapun ning Dutch royal house ampo ning House of Amsberg. I Willem-Alexander ing mumunang lalaking monarko ning Holanda manibat anyang pangamate nang William III kanitang 1890, ampo ing anak dili kareng kasalungsungan a pekapun a maki korona king Europa. 
Mibait ya i Willem-Alexander king Utrecht, at pangane neng anak Prinsesa Beatrix ampong Claus von Amsberg. Megi yang Prinsipe ning Orange ampong magmana king tronu ning Holanda kanitang 30 Abril 1980, anyang megi ing ima na megi yang queen regnant, at linukluk ya king tronu kanitang 30 Abril 2013, anyang tebili neng ima na ing tronu, o mig-"abdicate" ya. 

Kaarian ning Holanda:
Ing Kaarian ning Holanda ( ; ), a karaniwang mayayaus Holanda, metung yang soberaniang estadu ampong kaarian a konstitusyonal ("constitutional monarchy") a maki teritoryu king Albugang Europa ampo king Caribbean. Deng apat a dake ning Kaarian Aruba, Curaçao, Holanda, ampong Sint Maartenausan dong bangsa at miugnayan la antimong pante-panteng dake ning Kaarian. Nanupata, king pangkaraniwan a palakad, panibalan no ning Holanda (a bibilug king manga 98% ning leparan gabun ampong populasyun ning Kaarian) para king kabilugan ning Kaarian, nung nu deng Aruba, Curaçao, ampong Sint Maarten magdependi la king Holanda.
Ing misnang keragulan nang dake ning bangsa ning Holanda atyu king Europa, liban kareng atlung espesial a munisipalidad (Bonaire, Sint Eustatius, ampong Saba) a atyu king Caribbean. Deng bangsang Aruba, Curaçao, ampong Sint Maarten atyu la mu naman king Caribbean.

Malvino Salvador:
Malvino Ramos Salvador (mibait Eneru 31, 1976) metung yang Brazilanang artista. 

Eriberto Leão:
Eriberto de Castro Leão Monteiro (mibait Juniu 11, 1972) metung yang Brazilanang artista. 

Aguman da reng Bangsa king Mauli Aslagang Asia:
Ing Aguman da reng Bangsa king Mauli Aslagang Asia (ASEAN , rarely ) metung yang aguman a geo-political ampong ekonomiku da reng apulung bangsang atyu king and economic organization of ten countries located in Mauli Aslagang Asia , a mitátag anyang 8 Agosto 1967 kapamilata'ning Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipinas, Singapore ampong Thailand. Manibat kanita, miragdagan la reng kayanib, at miyabe la ya ing Brunei, Burma (Myanmar), Cambodia, Laos, ampong Vietnam. Kayabe la kareng kayang parasan deng pangasaplala ning ekonomiya ("economic growth"), panyulung ning sosyedad o ketawan ("social progress"), pangayalkus ning kultura da reng kayang kayanib ("cultural development among its members"), pamaningat king karatunan ampong katatagan ning labuad ("protection of regional peace and stability"), ampong pamikatagun da reng bangsang kayanib a pisabyan la reng karelang e pamikasundu king taimik a paralan ("opportunities for member countries to discuss differences peacefully").
Maki lapad yang 4.46 million km² ing ASEAN, a 3% ning gabun nang leparan ning Yatu, ampong populasyun a manga 600 milyun, a 8.8% ning populasyun ning yatu. Maygit yang makatatlu ing leparan ning dayatmalat ning ASEAN kesa king leparan ning kayang gabun. Anyang 2011, ing piaben-abayan nang nominal GDP miras maygit US$ 2 trillion. If ASEAN were a single entity, it would rank as the eighth largest economy in the world.

Joel Rosario:
I Joel Rosario (mibait Enero 14, 1985) metung yang hineteng Dominicanu king Americanung pamangarerang Thoroughbred. Kilub ning limang duminggu anyang 2013, ya ing sinake kareng sinambut king Dubai World Cup ampong Kentucky Derby.

Saul Bass:
I Saul Bass (Mayo 8, 1920 – Abril 25, 1996) metung yang Americanung graphic designer ampong talagawang pelikulang sinambut Oscar, a pikabalwan dili king kayang disenyu da reng "title sequence" ampong poster da reng pelikula, ampo deng logo da reng kumpanya. 
Kilub ning karera nang apat a pulung (40) banwa, megobra ya i Bass para kareng mapilan kareng pekasikat a talagawang pelikula ning Hollywood, antimo di Alfred Hitchcock, Otto Preminger, Billy Wilder, Stanley Kubrick ampong Martin Scorsese. Kayabe ya kareng pekasikat nang title sequence ing kikimut a ginupit a papil ("animated paper cut-out") ning takde ning adik king heroin para king pelikula nang Preminger a "The Man with the Golden Arm", nung nu deng credit pupulayi la ketang kaybat maging matas pangakwa ("high-angle shot") ning skyscraper king "North by Northwest" nang Hitchcock, ampo ing sulat a e tuglung-tuglung ("disjointed text") a pupulaying abe-abe ampong mikakawani king "Psycho".
Dinisenyu nong Bass deng kapansin-pansin logo da reng kumpanya king Pangulung America, kayabe ne ing kampana ("bell") a logo ning AT&T anyang 1969, ampo ing "globe" logo ning AT&T anyang 1983 kaybat nang misalbag ning Bell System after the kaybat nang misalbag ning Bell System. Migdisenyu ya mu namang "jetstream" logo para king Continental Airlines anyang 1968 ampong "tulip" logo para king United Airlines anyang 1974, a meging metung kareng pekakilalang logo ning industria da reng airline king panaun a ita. Dininan neng dangalan ning Google i Saul Bass kapamilatan ning pamamili kaya king Google Doodle anyang Mayo 8, 2013. 

Amanung Sweku:
Ing Amanung Sweku ("Svenska", Ingles: "Swedish", Espanyol: "Sueco") metung ya kareng pamyalita king Europa.

Dave Brubeck:
I David Warren "Dave" Brubeck (Diciembre 6, 1920 – Diciembre 5, 2012) metung yang Americanung jazz pianist ampong kompositor, a tuturing dang metung kareng manimunang talataguyud ning cool jazz. Sinulat yang mapilang jazz standard, antimo ing "In Your Own Sweet Way" ampo ing "The Duke". Pupulayi ing istilu nang Brubeck manibat king mapinu ("refined") angga king masigla o "mayangin" ("bombastic"), at masasalamin keti ing pamanyubuk nang ima nang papagaral yang musikang klasiku ("classical") ampo ing kayang widu ("improvisation"). Kilala ing kayang musika king pamangamit e karaniwan a "time signature", ampo ing kayang pamitumpak-tumpak kareng misasalungat o miyayaliwang ritmo, sukad ampong "tonality". Ing malambat nang meging kapareha king musika ("musical partner"), ing alto saxophonist a i Paul Desmond, ing sinulat king tonu o lawiwing pang-saxophone ("saxophone melody") ning atatandanan dang diling pyesa ning Dave Brubeck Quartet, ing "Take Five", a 5/4 "time" at menatiling "jazz classic" king metung kareng pekamasaling "jazz album", ing "Time Out". Mig-eksperimentu ya i Brubeck king time signature king kabilugan ning kayang karera, at rinekord ne ing "Pick Up Sticks" king 6/4, ing "Unsquare Dance" king 7/4, ing "World's Fair" king 13/4, ampo ing "Blue Rondo à la Turk" king 9/8. Metung ya muring gagalangan a kompositor ning musikang pang-orkesta ampong pang-psamban ("sacred music"), at sinulat yang "soundtrack" para king telebisyun antimo ing "Mr. Broadway" ampo ing kikimut o "cartoons" ("animated") a miniseries, ing "This Is America, Charlie Brown".

Satyajit Ray:
I Satyajit Ray (, ; 2 Mayo 1921 – 23 Abril 1992) metung yang talagawang pelikulang Indian a tuturing dang metung kareng pekamapyang auteur ("greatest auteurs") ning yatu ning pelikula. Mibait ya i Ray king lakanbalen o syudad ning Calcutta king pamilyang Bengaling sikat king yatu ning arte ampong literatura. Inumpisan na ing kayang karera antimong "commercial artist" i Ray, a milub king pamangawang timawang pelikula ("independent film") i Ray kaybat dang mikit ning talagawang pelikulang Pranses a i Jean Renoir, at ayalben ne ing pelikula nang Vittorio De Sicang Italian neorealist anyang 1948 a "Bicycle Thieves" anyang binisita ya king London.
Migdirek yang 36 a pelikula i Ray, kayabe la reng "feature film", documentary ampong short. Metung ya muring talasulat pisyon He was also a ("fiction writer"), talalimbag ("publisher"), talagulis ("illustrator"), "calligrapher", "graphic designer" ampong kritikung pangpelikula. Sinulat yang mapilan a makuyad a salita He authored several ("short stories") ampong nobela, a keraklan makatutuk kareng anak ampng kayanakan. I Feluda, ing detektib, ampo ing the sleuth, ampo i Professor Shonku, ing siyentista, sikat lang tauan king piksyon a lelangan na. 
Sinambut yang labing metung a galal a internasyunal ing mumuna nang pelikulang Ray, ing "Pather Panchali" (1955), kayabe ya ing "Best Human Documentary" king Film Festival]. Ining pelikula, ing "Aparajito" (1956) ampo ing "Apur Sansar" (1959) bibilugan de ing "The Apu Trilogy". I Ray ing ginawa king scripting, casting, scoring, ampong editing, at ya ing migdisenyu king sarili nang "credit title" ampong publisidad. Dakal ya tinggap a manimunang galal i Ray king kayang karera, kayabe la reng 32 Indian National Film Awards, pilang galal kareng internasyunal a "film festival" ampong seremonyang pamamye galal, ampong Academy Award anyang 1992. Peparangalan ne nng Kapamahalan ning India kapamilatan ning Bharat Ratna anyang 1992.

Talipampan:
Ing talipampan, pseudonym o nom de plume, lagyu yang gagamitan ning metung a talasulat bukud king kayang tutung lagyu, o lipat ning kayang tutung lagyu. Mapalyaring ing talalimbag o talabulalag ("publisher") mû ing makibalu king tutu nang lagyu, o malyaring balu da ne deng keraklan. 

Harry Turtledove:
I Harry Norman Turtledove (mibait Junio 14, 1949) metung yang Americanung nobelista, a pikabaluan dili king obra na kareng mapilan a paksa o genre, kayabe la reng alternate history, historical fiction, fantasy, ampong science fiction.

Salman Rushdie:
I Sir Ahmed Salman Rushdie ( (Devanagari), (Nastaʿlīq); ; mibait 19 Junio 1947) metung yang British Indian a nobelista ampong talasulat salese o sanese ("essayist"). Sinambut yang Booker Prize anyang 1981 ing kadwa nang nobela, ing "Midnight's Children" (1981). Tungkul king Indian subcontinent ing keraklan king sinulat nang piksyon. Sasabyan dang piyayabe na ing magical realism ampo ing pangkasalesayan a piksyon; makapatungkul ing kayang obra kareng dakal a pamituglung-tuglung, kaguluan, ampong pamanalis o pamaglipat pilatan ning Aslagan ampo ning Albugan.
Megi yang sentru ning kontrobersya ing kapat nang nobela, ing "The Satanic Verses" (1988), a memupul protesta ibat kareng Muslim kareng mapilang bangsa, kayabe no deng bayolenting reaksyon. Mika bala o kapiadyan laban king kayang bye, kayabe ya ing "fatwā"ng pepalwal nang Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini, ing Kakataskatasan a Pekapun ning Iran ("Supreme Leader of Iran"), anyang 14 Febrero 1989.
Mituldu yang Commandeur de l'Ordre des Arts et des Lettres king Pransiya i Rushdie anyang Enero 1999. Kanitang Junio 2007, gewa neng kabalyerung ("knighted") Reina Elizabeth II i Rushdie uling king kayang kasuyuan o serbisyu king malagung panyulat o literatura. Anyang 2008, binili ne ning "The Times" king kalabing atlu ("13th") king kayang listaan da reng limampulung mapyang diling Briton manibat anyang 1945.
Manibat kanitang 2000, king Estados Unidos ne makatuknang i Rushdie, at magobra ya king Emory University; miyalal yang miabe king American Academy of Arts and Letters. Ing pekabayu nang libru ya pin ing "", a tungkul king kayang bye manibat anyang kontrobersya tungkul king "The Satanic Verses".

Horacio Cartes:
I Horacio Manuel Cartes Jara (mibait 5 Julio 1956) metung yang negosyanting Paraguayan ampong mialal a pamuntuk ning Paraguay anyang alalan ning Abril 2013. Kayanib ya king Partido Colorado at makatuldu yang lukluk keng 15 Agosto.
Ating yang adwang dusenang negosyu i Cartes king kayang Grupo Cartes a sasaklo king tabaku, di boti ("soft drinks"), produksyon ning karni, ampong pamagbangku. Manibat anyang 2001, ya ing pamuntuk ning Club Libertad "football club" .

Roberto Azevêdo:
Roberto Carvalho de Azevêdo (mibait 3 Octubre 1957) metung yang Brazilianung diplomatiku ampong pekakatawan ning Brazil king Agumang Pangyatu king Kalakal ("World Trade Organization") manibat anyang 2008. Kanitang Mayo 2013, miyalal yang Direktor-Heneral ning Agumang Pangyatu king Kalakal ("Director-General of the World Trade Organization"), kayalili nang Pascal Lamy kaybat ning 1 Setiembre 2013.

Bam Aquino:
I Paolo Benigno “Bam” Aguirre Aquino IV (mibait Mayo 7, 1977) metung yang Filipinong negosyanting pang-ketawan ("social entrepreneur") ampong talasuyung malda ("public servant"). Sadya yang "TV host", ampong talapamuntuk ("chairman") ning Pambangsang Komisyong Pangkayanakan (Filipinas) [("National Youth Commission (Philippines)") ]. King salukuyan, ya ing Pamuntuk ning MicroVentures, Inc., a bangkung mamuhunan ("investment bank") kareng negosyung magumpisa for ("start-up businesses") a magpalakad king The Hapinoy Program, a negosyung pang-ketawan ("social enterprise"). Metung ya kareng Ten Outstanding Young Persons para king 2012. Kayanib ya mu naman king Lupung ("Board Member") ning Rags2Riches, Venture for Fundraising, ampo ning Katatagang Coca-Cola ("Coca-Cola Foundation").
Miproklama yang miyalal a senador i anyang Mayo 17, anya ya kabud ibat kareng kandidatu ning Partido Liberal (Filipinas) a linub king Magic 12 king alalan king kalibudtan ning 2013. King idad a 36, ya kabud negosyanting pang-ketawan i Bam Aquino a linub king Senadu, ampo ing tutuking pekayanak, kaybat ning bapa nang i Ninoy, a 34 anyang miyalal yang senador (ampo i Antonio Trillanes, a miyalal king idad a 35). Asawa neng Bam i Mary Fatima Gomez.

Boyko Borisov:
I Boyko Metodiev Borisov (, ; mibait 13 Junio 1959) metung yang pulitikung Bulgarian a migsilbing Pun Ministru ning Bulgaria manibat 2009 anggang 2013. Megi yang Alkaldi ning Sofia manibat 8 Noviembre 2005 anggang mituldu yang Pun Ministru.

Kulitan:
Ing Kulitan ("Súlat Kapampangán": ) 
métung ya karéng myayaliwang tindûk o úri ning pámanyúlat king Pilipinas. Panyúlat dé itî king Kapampángan (amánu), a amánung gagamítan da king Pampánga, Tarlac, Bataan ampong Nueva Ecija.
Ing Kulitan métung yang Abugída o kaparalánan ning pámanyúlat a Alphasyllabary sistéma ning pámanyúlat nung nókarin ing déng súlat para karéng makikatni ("consonant") tambing nong maki katning para king kákatni ("vowel") ("possess a default vowel sound") a malyáring míyalilan kapamilátan da réng garlit ("diacritical marks"). Kalúpa dé réng áliwang súlat king Mauli-Aslagang Ásya, king India ya ménibat ing Kulitan.
Ing Kulitan mu ing ating istílu ning pámanyúlat kéng pilipinas a makasúlat mula kéng wanan patawling kaili, patalakad ménibat kéng bábo angga palálam kalúpa na ning kaugalian insik. Kéng tradisyúnal, susúlat ya ing kulitan karéng kawáyan, bulúng-tanáman, batú ampo papil at márakal pa.

Nawaz Sharif:
I Mian Muhammad Nawaz Sharif (Urdu/, ; mibait 25 Diciembre 1949) metung yang pulitiku ampong negosyanting Pakistani, a kaybat ning pamanyambut ning kayang partidu ketang alalan anyang 11 Mayo 2013, asahan deng magsilbi antimong tutuking Pun Ministru ning Pakistan, a migsilbi na antimong kalabing adwa (12th) ampong kalabing apat (14th) a Pun Ministru kareng adwang a mitutuking terminu manibat Noviembre 1990 anggang Julio 1993, at manibat Febrero 1997 anggang Octubre 1999. I Sharif ing Pamuntuk ning Pakistan Muslim League-N, metung kareng pekamaragul king Pakistan. 's largest political parties. Antimong makibandi ning Ittefaq Group, metung a manimunang business conglomerate, metung ya mu naman kareng pekamakwaltang tau king Pakistan.

Abugida:
Ing abugida (ibat king Ge‘ez አቡጊዳ "’äbugida"), a ausan da mu namang alphasyllabary, metung yang segmental a sistema ning pamanyulat nung nu deng pamituki-tuking makikatni-kakatni ("consonant–vowel sequences") misusulat la antimong metung a yunit: ing balang yunit makabasi ya king makikatning ("consonant") letra, at ing simbulu da reng kakatni ("vowel notation") pakaladwa ne mû. Iti makayaliwa ya king ganap a alpabetu, nung nu This contrasts with a full alpabetu, nung nu maki kabilyan la reng kakatning kapante da reng 
deng kakatni in which vowels have status equal to kakatni, at atin namang abjad, nung nu deng simbulu o pamagmarka kareng kakatni ala o malyaring ilako. (kareng kontekstu o kabilyan a e masyadung pormal, malyari lang awsang alpabetu deng atlung uri da reng sulat.) Kayabe ya kareng abugidas ing maleparan a Brahmic a pamilya da reng sulat king Mauli ampong Mauli Aslagang Asia.

Viktor Vasnetsov:
I Viktor Mikhaylovich Vasnetsov (; Lop'jal near Vyatka, Mayo 15 (N.S.), 1848 — Moscow, Julio 23, 1926) metung yang Rusung pintor a makatutuk kareng paksang kaugne king mitolohiya ampong amlat artist who ("specialized in mythological and historical subjects"). Tuturing deng metung kareng mitátag king pamaminturang Rusung modernistang poklorista ampong romantiku ampong ampong metung a manimunang tauan king pangimut a revivalist.

Rufa Mae Quinto:
I Rufa Mae Quinto (a maralas pagkamalyan dang susulat a Ruffa Mae Quinto) (mibait Mayo 28, 1978) metung yang Filipinang artista, komedyanti, ampong television host. 
Sinambut neng apat a PMPC Star Award i Quinto, a metung kareng artistang masikan diling magpalub panakitan ("bankable") king industria, a maki maragul a "hit" a pelikula antimo ing Apat-Dapat, Dapat-Apat, Pasukob, Desperadas, Manay Po 2, I.T.A.L.Y. ampong Desperadas 2. Pikabalwan ya i Quinto kareng kayang makatulang ekspresyon antimo ing "Ok, fine", "`Todo Na 'To!", "Pasensiya Na", "Para sa Bayan", "Move on", "GO GO GO!!!" ampong "To the highest level!!". Lipat ning artista ya king GMA Network i Quinto, metung ya kareng ditak a artistang tatalnan nang Boy Abunda, metung a personalidad king karibal a istasyung telebisyon a ABS-CBN.
Migumpisa ya king pamag-artista i Quinto kaybat nang miabe king "That's Entertainment" (1996). Pekamaragul neng "break" ing Gloria, Gloria Labandera (1997). Sinikat ya i Quinto king pamaglage na king tauan a "Booba" ampong "Boobita Rose" kareng pelikulang menakitan o "hit". 

Jamby Madrigal:
I María Ana Consuelo Madrigal Valade (mibait yang María Ana Consuelo Abad Santos Madrigal anyang Abril 26, 1958), a mas kilala king lagyung Jamby Madrigal, metung yang pulitiku king Filipinas. Miyalal ya anyang pangkabilugang alalan ning 2004 antimong Senador. Tinagal yang pamuntuk o presidenti anyang alalang pang-pamuntuk ning 2010 ("2010 presidential elections") oneng mesambut ya.

Edward Bernays:
I Edward Louis Bernays (Noviembre 22, 1891 – Marzo 9, 1995) metung yang Austrianu-Americanung talapamuklat-dalan ("pioneer") king larangan ning ugnayang pangmalda ("public relations") ampong propaganda, a meyaus ketang kayang obituariung "ibpa ning uganayang pangmalda" (""the father of public relations""). Piyanib no deng paglalawe da ri Gustave Le Bon ampong Wilfred Trotter king crowd psychology kareng palage nang psychoanalytical ning kayang bapa, i Sigmund Freud.

Ugnayang pangmalda:
Ing Ugnayang pangmalda (Public relations o PR) ing dapat a pamanibala king pamikalat ning impormasyun pilatan ning indibidwal o between an individual or aguman o organisasyun ampo ing malda o publiku ("public"). Malyaring iyabe king ugnayang pangmalda ing aguman o individual a miraras king malda kapamilatan ning pamangamit kareng paksang pangpublikung interes ampong balitang e mangaylangang diretsung pamamayad. Ing parasan o kapagnasan ning ugnayang pangmalda ya pin ing pamagkumbinsi king malda o publiku, deng mamuhunan ("investors"), kasosyu ("partners"), empleadyu, ampong reng aliwang sektor a maki interes keting mika partikular a pamalak o paglalawe tungkul kaniti, deng kayang manibala, produktu, o desisyung pampulitika. Kayabe la kareng aktibidad a makaugne keti deng pamagsalita kareng kumperensya, pamanyambut galal king industria, pamakiugnayan kareng pahayagan, ampong komunikasyun kareng empleyadu.

Juba:
Ing Juba ing tungku (kapitolyu, kabisera/cabecera o buntuk balen) ampong pekamaragul a lakanbalen o syudad/ciudad ning is the capital and largest city of the Republica ning Mauling Sudan. Magsilbi ya mu namang tungku ning Central Equatoria, ing pekamalati kareng apulung estadu ning Mauling Sudan. Atyu ing lakanbalen king White Nile at magsilbi yang kapitolyu ampong metropolis ning Juba County.

São Paulo:
Ing São Paulo (; ; "Saint Paul") ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen king Brazil, ing pekamaragul a kabalenan ning lakanbalen "city proper") king mauling hemisperiu ("southern hemisphere" ampong Americas ampo ing kawalung pekaragul a lakanbalen king yatu agpang king populasyun kawalung pekaragul a lakanbalen king populasyun. Ing metropolis ing peka-angkla ning Keragulang São Paulo, a maki ranggung kadwang pekamaragul populasyun a metropolitan area king Americas ampo ing metung kareng apulung pekamaragul a metropolitan area king planeta. Ing São Paulo ing tungku o kapitolyu (kabisera o cabecera) ning estadu ning São Paulo, ing pekamaragul nang estadu ning Brazil king populasyun. Maragul ya impluwensya king kayang karinan o rehiyon king negosyu, pisalapyan, arte ampong "entertainment, at masikan ya impluwensyang internasyunal. The name of the city honors Saint Paul of Tarsus.
Ing São Paulo atin yang pekamaragul a ekonomiya, agpang king GDP, kareng lakanbalen ning Latin American ampong Brazil. Ing kayang GDP "per capita" kawalu yang pekamatas kareng mangaragul a lakanbalen ning Latin America, ampo ing kadwang pekamatas king Brazil, kaybat ning Brasília.

Rio De Janeiro:
Ing Rio de Janeiro ( o ; , "Ilug ning Enero January"), a keraklan ausan da mung Rio, ing lakanbalen a tungku o syudad a kapitolyu/kabisera ("capital city") Estadu ning Rio de Janeiro, ing kadwang pekamaragul a lakanbalen o syudad ning Brazil, ampo ing katlung pekamaragul a karinan a metropolitan ampong agglomeration king Mauling America, a maki boasting approximately 6.3 milyung tau king kabalenan ning lakanbalen, at uli na niti yang ka-6 a pekamaragul king Americas, ampo ing ka26 king yatu. Ing Rio de Janeiro karinan ne ning World Heritage Site a maki lagyung ""Rio de Janeiro: Carioca Landscapes between the Mountain and the Sea"", as granted by UNESCO on 1 July 2012 in the category Cultural Landscape.
Adwa yang dilanwa o siglung tungku o kapitolyu/kabisera Brazil, manibat 1763 anggang 1815 anyang panaun a kolonyal a Portugues, at 1815 anggang 1821 antimong tungku ning a Kaarian ning [Misanmetung a Kaarian ning Portugal, Brazil ampong Algarves|Misanmetung a Kaarian ning Portugal, Brazil ampong Algarves], ampong 1822 anggang 1960 antimong timawang bangsa. Ing Rio maki palayo ya o bansag a "Cidade Maravilhosa" o "Marvelous City" ("Makapagmulalang Lakanbalen").

Brasília:
Ing Brasília () ing pederal a tungku ("federal capital") ning Brazil ampo ing sentru ning kapamahalan ning Distrito Federal. King pamanibala, atyu ing lakanbalen king Distrito Federal a atyu king Central-West Region. King pisikal a lokasyun, atyu king Brazilian Highlands. Maki populasyun yang manga 2,562,963 (3,716,996 king karinan a metropolitan) anyang 2008 IBGE a tantya, anya ya ing kapat a pekamaragul a lakanbalen king Brazill ("fourth largest city in Brazil"). Nanupata, antimong karinan a metropolitan, mas mababa ya ranggu, kanam king populasyun. Ing Brasília ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen king yatung ala pa anyang umpisa ning ka20ng dilanwa o siglu ("largest city in the world that did not exist at the beginning of the 20th century").

Ramciel:
Ing Ramciel, a misusulat mu namang Ramchiel o Ramshiel, metung yang lokasyun king Lakes, metung a estadu king South Sudan, a magsilbing pangbangsang tungku o kapitolyu/kabisera ("future site of the national capital"). Tuturing deng sentru nang heograpikal lning bangsa at tatagkil ya king estadu ning Jonglei king albugan. Malapit yang malapit king lugal nung la mitatagkil deng angganan da reng Central Equatoria, Jonglei, ampong Lakes, at uli na niti, deng pangkasalesayan a lalawigan ("historical provinces") ning Equatoria, Greater Upper Nile, ampong Bahr el Ghazal.ref name="search"/> Buri ne kanung ibiling John Garang, ing pamuntuk ning Mauling Sudan, ing tungkung pambangsa king Ramciel anyang terminu na, oneng mete ya bayu ya mitimawa o meging independienti ing Mauling Sudan, at lipat na, ing pekamaragul nang lakanbalen a ing Juba yang meging tungku. 

John Garang:
I John Garang de Mabior (Junio 23, 1945 – Julio 30, 2005) pulitiku ya ampong pekapun a Sudanese. Manibat 1983 anggang 2005, ya ing tinalan king Sudan People's Liberation Army anyang Kadwang Gerang Sibil a Sudanese, at kaybat ning pamikasundung pangkaratunan ("peace agreement") sinagli yang migsilbing Mumunang Kadwang Pamuntuk ning Sudan ("First Vice President of Sudan") manibat 9 Julio 2005 anggang mete ya king pangabagsak ning helicopter anyang 30 Julio 2005.

Bulba:
Ing bulba (ibat king Latin a "vulva", plural "vulvae", lon ya ing etymology) bibilugan da reng panglwal a organung henital ning babaing mammal. Tungkul ya king bulba ning tau ing artikulung ini, oneng kawangis no niti deng istruktura o pangabalangkas deng kareng aliwang mammal. 
Dakal ya mangaragul ampong mangalating istrukturang pang-anatomiya ing bulba, kayabe la reng The vulva has many major and minor anatomical structures, including the lambi lambi, tinggil, at aliwa pa. Malilyari ing kayang pamanalkus ("development") kareng miyayaliwang kapanaunan, at keraklan kareti mararapat neng pamandagul ning pungul, at king pamagdalaga ning babai. Antimong dake nang kilwal ning labia minora, clitoris, bulb of vestibule, vulval vestibule, greater and lesser vestibular glands, and the opening of the vagina. Its development occurs during several phases, chiefly during the fetal and pubertal periods of time. As the outer portal of the human uterus ("uterus") o matris, kakambilan ne o poprotektan iti kapamilatan ning dobling pasbul, ing lambi lambi, o labia majora (maragul a labi) ampo ing labia minora (malating labi). Ing vagina metung yang organung maglinis king sarili na, at maningat yang sarili nang mikroorganismung mamagus manibat king kilub palwal, at mangaylangan ya mung simpling pamanos ba yang mabulas o masanting kabilyan, a e mangaylangan pamaglinis king kilub. 
Ating yang gamit king seksualidad ing bulba; dening pangkilwal a organu dakal la nerves o nerbiyos a magdalang manyaman a kapanamdaman neng ustu ing "pamangising" karela. Kareng miyayaliwang sanga da reng arte, papakit de ing bulba antimong organung "mamyeng bye" (a keraklan miyuyugne king palanakan), at babye "sexual pleasure" kareng tau.
Atyu murin king bulba ing pilwalan ning urethra ning babai, oneng bukud kaniti, ditak mu ing kuneksyun na king pamani. 

María Mazzarello:
I Santa María Mazzarello o Madre Mazzarello (Mayo 9, 1837 – Mayo 14, 1881) ing Italianang kayabe nang Don Boscong mitátag kareng Salesian Sisters, a mayayaus muring ""salesianas"". 
Mibait yang Maria Domenica Mazzarello king Mornese, a atyu king ngeni lalawigan ning Alessandria, king pangulung Italia, king kalulung pamilyang magobra antimong talapagobra neng aldo ("day laborers"). I Madre Mazzarello, a lagyu nung nu ne mas kilala ning yatu, ing mumunang Superiora General ning kayang orden manibat 29 Marzo ning 1872 angga king kayang maranun a pangamate anyang 1881. 
Uling king kayang misnang pangasimpli ampo ing kayang pamiparikil ("dedication") king kayang bye king pamitátag ning bersyong pambabai ning sistema ning pamisapul ("preventive system") nang Don Bosco, mibuklat kaya ing pasbul ning kabanalan, a kinilala ning Iglesia Catolica anyang 1951. Ing pamitátag da reng salesiana ing pakibat neng pastoral Don Bosco king pamangailangan da reng dakal a kayanakan a talapagobra a mabibye king bunga ning Reboslusyong Industrial king Piedmont o Piamonete king Italia anyang kalabingsyam a dilanwa o siglu ("19th century"), at king parasan a iti, inampang nang Madre Mazzarello ing mitmu nang pagal ampong pamagpursigi. 

Laura Vicuña:
I Beata Laura Vicuña (Abril 5, 1891 – Enero 22, 1904) metung yang Chilean a beata king Iglesia Catolica Romana. Ya ing patrona da reng biktima ning abusu, ning insestu, deng ulila, ampo deng martir ning Chile ampong Argentina. 

Bas-Saint-Laurent:
Ing Bas-Saint-Laurent metung yang labwad a administratiba king lalawigan ning Quebec king Canada. Atyu king angganan ning Ilug Saint Lawrence king Quebec. Bibiugan de reng walung (8) panglabwad a munisipyung pangkondadu ("regional county municipalities") ampong 114 a munisipalidad. 

Chongqing:
Ing Chongqing () manimuna yang lakanbalen (syudad o ciudad, "city") king mauli aslagang China, at metung kareng limang pambangsang pangkalibudtan a lakanbalen five national central cities ("five national central cities") king Maldang Republika ning Tsina (PRC). King pamanibala, metung ya kareng apat a diretsu pangatalan a munisipalidad ("direct-controlled municipalities") (deng aliwa ila pin deng Beijing, Shanghai ampong Tianjin), at ya kabud a anti kanitang munisipalidad dake nang kilub nang dake (e makabebe king dayatmalat o "coastal") ning Tsina.

Francisco de Sales:
I San Francisco de Sales, C.O., T.O.M., A.O.F.M. Cap. () (21 Agosto 156728 Diciembre 1622) metung yang Obispo ning Geneva a santo king Iglesia Catolica. Mekilala ya king kayang malalam a kasalpantayanan ampo king kayang malumeng pamanarap kareng pamipitna-pitnang relihyosung dela ning Protestant Reformation. Pikabalwan ya murin kareng kayang kasulatan king paksa ning direksyong espiritwal ampong pamanalkus a espiritwal He is known also for his writings on the topic of spiritual direction and ("spiritual formation"), partikular king "Introduction to the Devout Life" ampo ing "Treatise on the Love of God".

Dominique Venner:
I Dominique Venner (; Abril 16, 1935 – Mayo 21, 2013) metung yang Pranses a historiador, periodista ampong talasulat sanese o salese ("essayist"). Kayanib ya i Venner king Organisation de l'armée secrète at kaybat, megi yang nasyonalista o makabalen a Europeo bayu ya meko king pulitika ba nang tutukan ing kang karera antimong historiador. Megi yang espesyalista king amlat ning militar ampong pulitika nationalist before withdrawing from politics to focus on a career as a historian. He specialized in ("military and political history"). Anyang mate ya, ya ing talapatuntun ("editor") ning "La Nouvelle Revue d'Histoire", magasin ning amlat a balang adwang bulan lulual. Anyang Mayo 21, 2013, migpakamate ya i Venner king kilub ning katedral ning Notre Dame de Paris.

Gran Britania:
Ing Gran Britania (, , , ) o "Great Britan" king Ingles, a mayayaus muring Britania, metung yang isla king pangulu aslagan ning kontinenti ning Europa. Iti ing kasiyam a pekamaragul a isla king yatu, ing pekamaragul a isla king Europa, ampo ing pekamaragul kareng Islang Britanico ("British Isles"). Bibilugan de reng Inglaterra ("England"), Escocia ("Scotland") ampong Gales ("Wales"). Ya ing katlung pekamaragul populasyun a isla king yatu, kaybat ning Java ampong Honshū. Padurutan de reng 1,000 a mas malati pang isla.

Wikidata:
Ing Wikidata metung yang saup-saup panga-edit ("collaboratively edited") a pikuanan beluan ("knowledge base") a pálakad ning Katatagan Wikimedia ("Wikimedia Foundation"). Ing parasan na niti, ya pin ing pamamye abe-abeng pikuanan para kareng partikular a uri ning datos (alimbawa, deng aldo beitan) a malyaring gamitan kareng proyektu ning Wikimedia, antimo ing Wikipedia. Kawangis na niti ing paralan nung makananung ing Wikimedia Commons magsilbi yang pisinupan para kareng simpan ("files") a media at paparas no reti kareng anggang proyektung Wikimedia.

Shanghai:
Ing Shanghai ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen o syudad/ciudad king populasyun king Maldang Republika ning Tsina (PRC) at ing kabalenan ning lakanbalen y ing pekamaragul agpang king populasyun king yatu ("largest city proper]] by population in the world"). Metung ya kareng munisipalidad a katumbas o kapante ning lalawigan king Tsina, at ing kabilugan nang populasyun maygit king adwang pulu't atlung (23) milyun . Maimpluwensya ya king negosyu, kultura, pisalapyan It is a global city, with influence in commerce, culture, ("finance"), media, moda ("fashion"), teknolohiya ampong palimpatan ("transport") king mabilug a yatu. Manimuna yang sentru ning pisalapyan, at ya ing manimunang daungan panglulanang-karga king yatu ("busiest container port in the world").
Atyu king Yangtze River Delta king Aslagang Tsina ing Shanghai, a atyu king lugal nung nu ya bubugnus king dayatmalat ing Ilug Yangtze king libutad nang dake ning bebe dayatmalat ning Tsina. Mitatagkil ya ing munisipalidad kareng lalawigan ning Jiangsu ampong Zhejiang king pangulu, mauli ampong albugan, at kalele ne king aslagan ing East China Sea.

Tianjin:
Ing Tianjin (; ; Tianjinese: ; Postal map spelling: Tientsin) metung yang metropolis king mauling Tsina ampo ing metung kareng in northern China and one of the five national central cities ("five national central cities") ning Maldang Republika ning Tsina (PRC). Panibalan de antimong metung kareng apat a It is governed as one of the four diretsu pangatalan a munisipalidad ("direct-controlled municipalities") ning PRC, at uli na niti, deretsu ing pamanibala ning kapamahalang sentral. Mitatagkil ya ing Tianjin king Hebei Lalawigan ampo king Beijing Munisipalidad, at bebeben ne king aslagan ning dake nang Bohai Gulf ning Dayatmalat a Dilo ("Yellow Sea"). Kayabe ya king Bohai Economic Rim, at ya ing pekamaragul a lakanbalen king bebe dayatmalat king pangulung Tsina.

Macau:
Ing Macau (), a misusulat muring Macao (), metung ya kareng adwang special administratibung labuad ("special administrative regions") ning Maldang Republika ning Tsina (PRC), bukud king Hong Kong. Atyu ing Macau king gilid nang albugan ("western side") ning Pearl River Delta katulid ning Hong Kong king aslagan, at kalele ne ning lalawigan ning Guangdong king pangulu, at makayarap king Dayatmalat ning Mauling Tsina ("South China Sea") king aslagan ampong mauli. Mamasa yang maragul ing ekonomiya ning teritoryu king sugal ampong turismu, oneng atin muring sektor a industrial. 

Anqing:
Ing Anqing (, a misusulat muring Anking, sadyang Hwaining) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauli albugan a dake ninglalawigan ning Anhui, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Makalele ya king Lu'an king pangulu, Hefei ampong Wuhu king pangulu aslagan, Tongling king aslagan, Chizhou king mauli aslagan, ampo reng lalawigan ning Jiangxi ampong Hubei, king mauli, ampong albugan, a pakatulid ("respectively").

Bengbu:
Ing Bengbu () metung yang lakanbalen a is a lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture-level city ("prefecture-level city") a maki populasyun a 3,164,467 anyang tawling sensus (kayabe la reng residenting rural) king pangulu ning Lalawigan, ning Anhui king Tsina. Mangabaldugan yang "Daungan a Talaba" ("Oyster Wharf") ing kayang lagyu king Isik, a bakas ning sadya nang reputasyun antimong sentrung pikukwanan perlas a tabang o in Chinese, echoing its former reputation as a ("freshwater pearl fishery").
Ing dake nang urbanisadu tutuknangan de reng residenting mikakalat kareng apat a distritung urban. Malapit neng miabe keti deng ing county ning Huaiyuan king Bengbu ampo ing Fengyang county king munisipalidad ning Chuzhou municipality a e maglambat maging pamiabe-abe o aglomerasyun a maki populasyun a 2,609,820.

Bozhou:
Ing Bozhou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king pangulu albugang dake ning lalawigang Anhui, province, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kasiping ne ing Huaibei king pangulu aslagan, ing Bengbu king mauli aslagan, ing Huainan king mauli, ing Fuyang king mauli albugan, ampo ing lalawigan ning Henan king pangulu.

Chaohu:
Ing Chaohu () sadya yang lakanbalen a kadane prefecture ("prefecture-level city"), at ngeni and is now a lakanbalen a kadane kondadu ("county-level city") king kalibudtang dake ning lalawigan ning Anhui, king province, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Dake ne ing Lake Chao, nung nu re pekilagyu ing lakanbalen, at makalele ya ing Chaohu king tungku (kapitolyu o kabisera) ning Hefei king pangulu albugan, ing Lu'an king albugan, ing Anqing king mauli albugan, ing Tongling king mauli, ing Wuhu king mauli aslagan, ampo ing Ma'anshan ampo ing lalawigan ning Jiangsu king aslagan. 
Anyang Agosto 22, 2011, miglwal yang kontrobersyal a desisyun ing kapamahalan ning lalawigan ning Anhui nung nu pitnan deng atlu ing Chaohu, inakmul de reng kasiping nang lakanbalen. Ing Juchao Distritu miyalilan ya lagyu king Chaohu antimong lakanbalen a kadane kondadu as a ("county-level city") lalam ning pamanibala ning Hefei.

Chizhou:
Ing Chizhou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadane prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king lalawiganAnhui, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kalele ne ing Anqing king pangulu albugan, ding Tongling ampong Wuhu pangulu aslagan, ing Xuancheng king aslagan, ing Huangshan king mauli aslagan, ampo ing lalawigan ning Jiangxi king mauli albugan. 

Chuzhou:
Ing Chuzhou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king aslagan ning Lalawigang Anhui, Province, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kalele ne ing tungku ning lalawigan It borders the ("provincial capital") ning Hefei king mauli albugan, ing Huainan king albugan, ing Bengbu king pangulu albugan, ing Chaohu king mauli, ampo ing lalawigan ning Jiangsu king aslagan. Agpang king 2010 Census, maki rehistradu yang populasyun a 4,533,540 ing lakanbalen ning Chuzhou, dapot 7,260,240 la katau deng mideklarang permanenting residenti.

Fuyang:
Ing () is a metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king pangulu aslagang dake ning llalawigan ning Anhui, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Makalele ya king Bozhou king pangulu aslagan, Huainan king mauli aslagan, Lu'an king mauli, ampo ing lalawigan ning to the south, and the Henan kareng mitagan a dake. 

Hefei:
Ing Hefei (, p "Héféi", w "Ho-fei") ing tungkul o kabisera, kapitolyu o buntuk balen ("capital") ampong pekamaragul o lakanbalen o syudad/ciudad ning Lalawigan ning Anhui king Aslagang Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city"), at sentru neng pampulitika, pang-ekonomiya ampong pangkultura ning Anhui. Atyu king kalibudtan nang dake ning lalawigan, at kalele ne ing Huainan king pangulu, ing Chuzhou king pangulu aslagan, ing Chaohu king mauli aslagan ampo ing Lu'an king albugan. 

Huaibei:
Ing Huaibei () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king pangulu ning Lalawigang Anhui, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kalele ne ing Suzhou king aslagan, ing Bengbu king mauli, ing Bozhou king albugan, ampo ing lalawigan ning Henan king pangulu. Maki populasyun yang 2,114,276 anyang 2010 census, nung nu deng 1,113,321 manuknangan la king dakeng urbanisadu, a bibilugan da reng atlung (3) urban a distritu. 

Huainan:
Ing Huainan () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") a maki populasyun a 2,334,000 king kalibudtan ning Lalawigang Anhui, 
Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kasiping ne ing tungkung lalawigan ning Hefei king mauli, ing Lu’an king mauli albugan, ing Fuyang king albugan, ing Bozhou king pangulu albugan, ing Bengbu king pangulu aslagan ampo ing Chuzhou king aslagan. Maki populasyun yang 1,899,740 ing lugal nang urbanisadu anyang 2010 a mikakalat kareng apat (4) a distritu (Tianjia'an, Datong, Xiejiaji, Bagongshan ampong metung (1) a kondadu ("county"), ing Fengtai, a ngeni pianib da na ("in agglomeration").

Huangshan:
Ing Huangshan (), metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauling Anhui, Maldang Republika ning Tsina . Ing Huangshan mangabaldugan yang "Dilong Bunduk" king Isik at pekilagyu re kareng sikat ampong mangasanting a Yellow Mountains a bibilug king maragul nang dake ning maleparan nang sakup. Maki apat yang urbanisadung distritu ampong apat a kondadu ("counties") ing lakanbalen a prefecture ning Huangshan. Ing urbanisadu nang sentru ning Huangshan maki lagyu yang Tunxi anyang minuna, at ngeni mayayaus yang Tunxi Distritu. Locals still call the city Tunxi pa murin ing aus da reng taga karin ba yang iyaliwa ing libutad a urbanisadu kareng aliwa nang dake ning Huangshan.

Jieshou:
Ing Jieshou () lakanbalen ("city") ya king dake nang pangulu albugan ning lalawigan ning Anhui, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") lalam ning pamanibala ning Lakanbalen ning Fuyang City ("Fuyang City") at maki maki populasyun yang maygit 140,000.

Lu'an:
Ing Lu'an (), metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king albugan ning Anhui Lalawigan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, a maki populasyun a 5,612,590 anyang 2010 census. Ing urbanisadu nang dake maki populasyun yang 1,482,729 a manuknangan kareng adwang (2) urban a distritu. Kasiping ne ing tungkung lakanbalen ("capital city") ning lalawigan, ing Hefei, king aslagan, ing Huainan king pangulu aslagan, ing Fuyang king pangulu, ing Chaohu Lakanbalen king mauli aslagan, ing Anqing king mauli, ampo ing lalawigan ning Henan king albugan.
Lipat ning ing karakter a "六" (literal a kabaldugan: "anam") keraklan agkas yang "Liù", keti miayalis ya king "Lù" uling king lokal a dialektu. 
E dapat apilibe king Luan County ("Luan County") a kondadu king Hebei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina 

Ma'anshan:
Ing Ma'anshan (), a misusulat muring Maanshan, metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king aslagan ning lalawigang Anhui king aslagan ning Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Metung yang lakanbalen a industrialisadung tataglus king sumangid ning Ilug Yangtze ing Ma'anshan, a kalele ning Hefei king albugan, ning Wuhu king mauli albugan, ampo ning Nanjing king aslagan. Metung yang sentrung lakanbalen ("core city") ning Nanjing Metropolitan Circle.

Mingguang:
Ing Mingguang (), sadyang Jiashan Kondadu (Jiashan County) (), metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ning Lalawigan ning Anhui, Tsina. Makalalam ya king pamanibala ning lakanbalen ning Chuzhou.

Ningguo:
Ing Ningguo () metung yang is a lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king lalawigan ning Anhui，Maldang Republika ning Tsina, lalam ning pamanibala ning Xuancheng Lakanbalen. Maki populasyun yang 380,000 ampong lapad a .

Suzhou, Anhui:
Ing Suzhou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king pangulu ning lalawigan ning Anhui king Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kalele no reng lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") ning Huaibei ampong Bengbu king mauli albugan ampong mauli, mitutulid ("respectively"), ing lalawigan ning Jiangsu king aslagan ampong pangulu, ampo ing Henan king pangulu albugan. Maki populasyun yang 3,152,924 katau anyang 2010 census, nung nu deng 1,647,642 manuknangan la king dakeng urbanisadu (o metro) king Distritung urban ning Yongqiao.

Tianchang:
Ing Tianchang metung yang distritung lakanbalen is a ("city district") ning of Anhui Lalawigan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king lalam ning pamanibala ing lakanbalen ning Chuzhou.

Tongcheng, Anhui:
Ing Tongcheng Lakanbalen (; pinyin: Tóngchéng) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king Anhui lalam ning pamanibala ning Anqing Lakanbalen. Maki populasyun yang 744,000, at maki lapad yang 1571 kilometru kwadradu. Pikabalwan ya ing Tongcheng king kayang kultura ampong amlat. 

Tongling:
Ing Tongling (; sadyang lagyu: Tunglinghsien, Tungkwanshan; literal a kabaldugan "Tangsung Bundukbundukan") metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauling dake ning lalawigan ning Anhui, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Metung yang daungan king ilug king Ilug Yangtze. Kasiping ne ing Wuhu king aslagan, ing Chizhou king mauli albugan ampo ing Anqing king albugan.
Pekilagyu de ing asteroid 12418 Tongling king lakanbalen. 

Wuhu:
Ing Wuhu (; literal a kabaldugan, "Marikut a Dayatan" o "Weedy Lake") metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauli aslagang dake ning Ilug Yangtze. Kasiping ne ning Wuhu ing Xuancheng king mauli aslagan, ing Chizhou ampong Tongling king mauli albugan, ing Hefei king pangulu albugan, ing Ma'anshan king pangulu aslagan, ampo ing lalawigan ning Jiangsu king aslagan. Maki dayu ya o distansyang manga king mauli albugan ning Nanjing. 
Maki populasyun yang 3,545,067 anyang 2010 census, nung nu deng 1,264,539 manuknangan la king dakeng urbanisadu (or metro) a bibilugan da reng atlu (3) kareng apat (4) a urbanisadung distritu ("Jinghu, Jiujiang ampong Yijiang").

Xuancheng:
Ing Xuancheng () metung yang manimunang lakanbalen ("city") king dake nang mauli aslagan ning lalawigan ning Anhui king aslagang Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atsu king pababa nang dake ning Ilug Yangtze. Kalele ne ing Wuhu king pangulu albugan, ing Chizhou king albugan, ing Huangshan king mauli albugan, ampo reng lalawigan ning Zhejiang ampong Jiangsu king mauli aslagan ampong pangulu aslagan, mitutulid ("respectively"). 

Changle:
Ing (, Foochow Romanized: Diòng-lŏ̤h) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Ating aliwang Changle (昌乐市) king lalawigan ning Shandong . Panibalan ne ning dministered by Fuzhou Lakanbalen City, at maki lapad ya ing kayang gabun .

Fu'an:
Ing (; Foochow Romanized: Hók-ăng-chê; sometimes "Fu An") metung yang 
lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king [a king tungku ning lalawigan away from the ("provincial capital"), ing Fuzhou.

Fuding:
Ing () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king pangulu aslagan nang dake ning lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") ning Ningde king angganan ning Fujian king lalawigan ning Zhejiang.

Fuzhou:
Ing (, ; Cantonese: "Foochow", Fuzhou dialect: "Hók-ciŭ") ing tungku ("capital") ampong metung kareng pekamaragul a lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king Lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kayabe da reng dakal a kondadu ("counties") ning Ningde, deng king Fuzhou tuturing dong bibilug king labuad a pang-amanu ampong pangkultura ning Mindong (闽东, literal a kabaldugan, Aslagan ning Fujian).

Jian'ou:
Ing Jian'ou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ning Nanping king pangulu ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Jianyang, Fujian:
Ing Jianyang () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king prefecture ning Nanping king pangulu nang dake ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina .

Jinjiang, Fujian:
Ing Jinjiang Lakanbalen () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king Lakanbalen ning Quanzhou, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king mauli aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan, king wanan o mauli nang dake ning Ilug Jin, kayarap ning distritu nang urbanisadu ning Fengze. Maki lapad yang ampong populasyun a 1,986,447 anyang 2010.

Nico Rosberg:
I Nico Erik Rosberg (mibait 27 Junio 1985) metung yang German-Finnish a racing driver para king koponan a Mercedes AMG PETRONAS Formula One. Kakarera ya lalam ning banderang Aleman king Formula One, at sinagli ya muring linaban para king Finland anyang umpisa ning kayang karera. Maki dual nationality ya kareting adwang bangsa.
Sinambut ya i Rosberg king 2005 GP2 Series para king koponan a ART, at bayu ita, mengarera ya king Formula 3 Euro Series para king organisasyun nang pangkarera ning tata nang i Keke Rosberg, ing Team Rosberg.
Para king 2010 Formula One season, mikyabe ya i Rosberg ketang miyalilan lagyu o re-branded a koponan a Mercedes, a meyalkus kapamilatan ning pamanyaklo ning formed Mercedes kareng kampeon ning 2009, deng Brawn GP.

Longhai Lakanbalen:
Ing Longhai () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") kilub ning lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") ning Zhangzhou, king ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Sakup ning Longhai ing teritoryu kareng misusumangid nang pangpang ning pababa nang dake ning Ilug Jiulong, oneng keraklan king kayang leparan, atyu king dane wanan, king pangpang a mauli. Mamatras ya king Xiamen ing bayu ya miras king dayatmalat ing kayli nang pangpang, kabang ing wanan a pangpang, magi neng mauling pangpang ning Xiamen Bay, at karinan ne ning Zhangzhou Gang tariff-free industrial export zone, king Gangwei Balen ning Longhai. 
Maki populasyun yang 801,100 ing Longhai.

Longyan:
Ing Longyan (; Hakka language: Liùng-ngàm) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauli albugan ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, a makalele kareng lalawigan ning Guangdong king ampong Jiangxi king albugan.

Nan'an, Fujian:
Ing Nan'an () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king mauli albugan
mauling dake ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king lalam ning pamanibala ning Lakanbalen ning province, People's Republic of China. It is under the administration of Quanzhou City ("Quanzhou City"), at anyang 2010, maki populasyun yang 1,500,000. Maygit lang 3,000,000 deng deng Isik sumangid dayatmalat ("overseas Chinese") a menibatan king Nan'an.

Nanping:
Ing Nanping () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king pangulu albugan nang dake ning |lalawigan]] ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kalele ne ing Lakanbalen ning Ningde king aslagan, ing Lakanbalen ning Sanming king mauli, ampo reng lakanbalen ning Zhejiang ampong Jiangxi king pangulu ampong albugan, mitutuki to the north and west ("respectively"). Atyu king prefecture a ini ing metung a dake da reng sikat a ning Wuyi Mountains] ("Wuyi Mountains"). 

Ningde:
Ing Ningde (; Foochow Romanized: Nìng-dáik), a mayayaus muring Mindong (; Foochow Romanized: Mìng-dĕ̤ng; literal a kabaldugan: Aslagan ning Fujian), metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") a atyu king pangulu aslagan nang bebe dayatmalat ("northeastern coast") ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kasiping ne ing Fuzhou king mauli, ing Lakanbalen ning Wenzhou ampo ing lalawigan ning Zhejiang king pangulu, ampo ing Lakanbalen ning Nanping king albugan.

James Patterson:
I James B. Patterson (mibait Marzo 22, 1947) metung yang is an Americanung talasulat da reng nobelanng thriller, a kilalang dili uling king kayang serie tungkul king piksyonal a psikologong i Alex Cross, king "Alex Cross series". Sinulat no muring Patterson deng serieng Michael Bennett, "Women's Murder Club", "Maximum Ride", "Daniel X", ampo ing serieng "Witch and Wizard", ampong dakal a thriller a e kayabe king serie, ampo kareng librung e piksyon ("nonfiction") ampong nobelang romance.
Maygit nang 270 milyung kopya da reng kayang libru ing misali. 

Putian:
Ing Putian () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king aslagan ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kalele ne ing Lakanbalen ning Fuzhou king pangulu, ing Lakanbalen ning Quanzhou king mauli, ampo ing Taiwan Strait king aslagan.

Quanzhou:
Ing Quanzhou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauling dake ning lalawigan ning Fujian province, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Maki angganan ya kareng eganaganang akanbalen a kadaneng prefecture king Fujian liban kareng adwa (Ningde ampong Nanping) at makayarap ya king Taiwan Strait. Kareng matwang libru king Ingles, malyaring lunto ya ing lagyu na antimong Chinchew, Chinchu, o Zayton.
Suglung palwal.
No. 5, March 2006 - review of several books on Quanzhou archaeology; discussion of Muslim and Christian archaeological monuments

Sanming:
Ing Sanming (; Foochow Romanized: Săng-mìng)) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kalele ne ing Lakanbalen ning Nanping king pangulu, ing Lakanbalen ning Fuzhou king aslagan, ing Lakanbalen ning Quanzhou king mauli aslagan, ing Lakanbalen ning Longyan king mauli, ampo ing lalawigan ning Jiangxi king albugan. Atyu ing Sanming king pilatan da reng kabundukan a Wuyi ampong Daiyun.

Shaowu:
Ing Shaowu () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king pangulu albugan ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, king kalibudtan nang dake ning province, People's Republic of China, located in the central part of the Kabundukan ning Wuyi. Maki populasyun yang maygit 100,000 katau. Pisasamut no ning lokal a dialektu deng elementu ning Min Nan ampong Gan Chinese.

Shishi, Fujian:
Ing Shishi () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") ning Quanzhou, king mauli ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.
Ing lakanbalen maki lapad yang }.

Wuyishan, Fujian:
Ing Wuyishan Lakanbalen () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") ning Nanping, king pangulu aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina .

Xiamen:
Ing Xiamen (), a mayayaus muring Amoy , metung yang manimunang lakanbalen king mauli aslagan a bebe dayatmalat king Taiwan Strait ning Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Panibalan de antimong sub-provincial city ning lalawigan ning Fujian a maki lapad a ampong populasyun a 3.67 milyun. Maki leparan yang urbanisadung ngeni mas maragul kesa ketang urban a isla at sasakup kareng anggang anam a distritu ning (Huli, Siming, Jimei, Tong'an, Haicang at bayu-bayu pamu, ing Xiang'an). Kalele ne ing Quanzhou king pangulu ampo ing Zhangzhou, at uli na niti bibilug yang leparan a urbanisadung maki maygit limang milyung katau. Ala la mang karayu deng islang Jinmen (Kinmen) a panibalan ning Republika ning Tsina (Taiwan). 

Yong'an:
Ing Yong'an () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king albugan kalibudtang dake ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king Ilug Sha, a mamagus king Ilug Min.
Atyu king Lakanbalen ning Sanming ing Yong'an, a maki dayung manga king albugan ning Fuzhou, ing tungku ning lalawigan the ("provincial capital"). Ing populasyun ning lakanbalen, 319,000 (2003–2004).

Zhangzhou:
Ing Zhangzhou (; sadyang Lung-ch'i) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauling dake ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king pangpang ning Ilug Jiulong (Beixi), ing Zhangzhou, a kasiping da reng lakanbalen ning Xiamen ampong Quanzhou king pangulu aslagan, ing Longyan king pangulu albugan, ampo ing lalawigan ning Guangdong (Lakanbalen ning Shantou) king mauli albugan.

Zhangping:
Ing Zhangping () metung yang lakanbalen king mauli albugan ning lalawigan ning Fujian, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king lalam ning pamanibala ning Lakanbalen ning Longyan.

Baiyin:
Ing Baiyin () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king lalaiwgan ning Gansu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Dingxi:
Ing Dingxi () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauli aslagan ning lalawigan ning Gansu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Dunhuang:
Ing (, a ausan da muring anyang minunang panaun, mangabaldugan yang 'Milalablab a Sulu' o 'Blazing Beacon') metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") (pop. 187,578 (2000)) king pangulu albugan a dake ning lalawigan ning Gansu, albugang Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Metung yang manimunang tutuknangan king Silk Road kanitang minuna. Balu de murin king lagyung Shāzhōu (沙州) o 'Lakanbalen ning Balas' o 'City of Sands', "o Dukhan anti ing aus da reng Turkis." Pikabalwan yang dili uling kareng Lukib a Dunhuang Caves ("Dunhuang Caves") a malapit keti.

Hezuo:
Ing Zoi Lakanbalen o Hezuo Lakanbalen (; ) ("Zoi City" or "Hezuo City") ing tungkung administratibu ning Gannan Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture king mauling dake ning lalawigan ning Gansu king albugang Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Mayayakit ya keti ing Monasteryung Hezuo ampo ing Toring Milarepa, ing Templung Langshangmaio, ampong metung a moski. Ating uring babi Temple, and a mosque. There is a ("breed of pig") ibat keti, ing Hezuo Swine. 

Jiayuguan Lakanbalen:
Ing () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king Gansu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, a maki populasyung 231,853 anyang 2010. Pikabalwan yang dili uling king malapit a Jiayu Pass, ing pekamaragul ampong masaleseng diling dake ning Great Wall of China.

Jinchang:
Ing Jīnchāng (simplified Chinese: 金昌) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king lalawigan ning Gansu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. 

Jiuquan:
Ing Jiuquan () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king pekaalbugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Gansu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Maki kaba yang ing kabilugan ning lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture, a metung a lugal a bibilugan da reng kondadu ("county") - a katumbas ning tradisyonal a prefecture); anyang 2002 maki populasyun yang 962,000.

Lanzhou:
Ing Lánzhōu (; Postal map spelling: Lanchow) ing tungku ("capital") ampong pekamaragul a lakanbalen ("largest city") ning lalawigan ning Gansu, king pangulu albugang dake ning Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city"), at maulaga yang sentru ning palimpatan king kayang labuad ("key regional transportation hub"), a papalyari king pamagmantini da reng lugal a mas marayu pa king albugan kareng karelang kuneksyun king dake nang aslagan ning bangsa. 
Maki populasyun yang 3,616,163 katau ing Lanzhou anyang 2010 census, ampong 2,177,130 king lugal a urbanisadung maki lapad a .

Linxia Lakanbalen:
Ing Linxia Lakanbalen (), a sadyang mayayaus a Hezhou (), metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king lalawigan ning Gansu king Maldang Republika ning Tsina, ampo ing tungku ("capital") ning miyayaliwa lahing Linxia Hui Autonomous Prefecture. Atyu king lambak ning Ilug Daxia (ing wanan a mamagus king Huanghe), 150 km (king dalan) mauli albugan ning tungku ning lalawigan, ing Lanzhou.

Longnan:
Ing Longnan () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauli aslagan ning lalawigan ning Gansu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Pingliang:
Ing Pingliang () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king aslagan ning lalawigan ning Gansu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kalele ne ing lalawigan ning Shaanxi king mauli ampong aslagan ampo ing Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region king pangulu. 

Qingyang:
Ing Qìngyáng () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king lalawigan ning Gansu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Tianshui:
Ing Tianshui () ing kadwang pekamaragul a lakanbalen is the ("second largest city") king lalawigan ning Gansu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Maki populasyun yang manga 3,500,000.

Wuwei, Gansu:
Ing Wuwei () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king pangulu albugan kalibudtarang ("northwest central") dake ning lalawigan ning Gansu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. King pangulu, kasiping ne ing Inner Mongolia, at king mauli albugan, ing Qinghai. Uling king makalibutad nang kabilyan king pilatan da reng atlung tungku ("capitals") ning albugan, deng Lanzhou, Xining, ampong Yinchuan, metung yang maulagang sentru king labuad na. At uli ning kayang pusisyun king Hexi Corridor, a king kasalesayan yáng magdilidiling ruta manibat king kalibudtang Tsina ("central China") paras king albugang Tsina ampo reng aliwang dake ning Kalibudtang Asia ("Central Asia"), dakal lang rilis tren ampong pambangsang "highway" a dadalan king Wuwei.

Yumen Lakanbalen:
Ing Yumen (, literal a kabaldugan, "Jade Gate,") metung yang lakanbalen king albugan ning lalawigan ning Gansu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") a maki populasyun a 116,194 (2000), at kayabe ya king lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") ning Jiuquan (metung a pamidakeng administratibung bibilugan da reng kondadu ("county"). Atyu king Silk Road at pikabalwan yang dili king kayang produksyon ning laru.

Zhangye:
Ing Zhangye () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king pangulu albugan kalibudtang ("northwest-central") dake ning lalawigan ning Gansu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kalele ne ing Inner Mongolia king pangulu ampo ing Qinghai king mauli.

Chaozhou:
Ing Chaozhou (); a misusulat muring Chiuchow, a misulat manibat king Cantonese nang pangayagkas; kilala murin king kayang Postal map spelling Teochew), metung yang lakanbalen ("city") king aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Guangdong king Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kasiping ne ing Shantou king mauli, Jieyang king mauli albugan, Meizhou king pangulu albugan, ing lalawigan ning Fujian king aslagan, ampo ing South China Sea king albugan
mauli aslagan. Panibalan de antimong lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") at maki sakup yang leparan ("jurisdiction area") a ampong kabilugan a populasyun a 2,669,844.
Kayabe ing Chaozhou king labuad ning Chaoshan.

Conghua:
Ing Conghua metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ning kalibudtang ("central") dake ning lalawigan ning Guangdong, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king lalam ning pamanibala ning Lakanbalen ning Guangzhou. Ing Conghua maulaga yang lugal a mitutuglung king Pearl River Delta ampong ing mabunduk a lugal king pangulu ning Lalawigan ning Guangdong. 

Dongguan:
Ing Dōngguǎn (), metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king kalibudtang ("central") dake ning lalawigan ning Guangdong, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.
Metung yang maulagang industrialisadung lakanbalen king Pearl River Delta ing Dongguan, a kalele ning tungkung panlalawigan ("provincial capital") ning Guangzhou king pangulu, Huizhou king pangulu aslagan, Shenzhen king mauli, ampo ing Pearl River king albugan.

Julius Richard Petri:
I Julius Richard Petri (Mayo 31, 1852 – Diciembre 20, 1921) metung yang bakteriologung Aleman a tuturing da reng keraklan a menimbentu king Petri dish kabang magobra antimong assistant nang Robert Koch.
Minuna yang megaral medisina i Petri king Kaiser-Wilhelm-Academy for Military Physicians (1871–1875) at tinanggap yang titulu king medisina anyang ("medical degree") anyang 1876. Sindu na ing kayang pamagaral king Charité Hospital king Berlin at atyu king aktibung serbisyu antimong doktor a militar anggang 1882, at kaybat, sindu na iti antimong reserbista. 
Manibat 1877 anggang 1879, mituldu ya king Imperial Health Office () king Berlin, nung nu ne meging assistant Robert Koch. King usuk o abisu nang Angelina Hesse, ing asawa ning aliwang assistant a mibait New York, i Walther Hesse, inumpisan ning laboratoryung Koch ing pamagpatubung bacteria kareng agar plate. Kaybat, inimbentu neng Petri ing "standard culture dish", o Petri plate, at lalu ne pang inalkus ("further developed") ing kaparalanan ning pamagpatubu king agar culture ba lang gawang puru at parakalan deng kolonyang bacteria a ibat kareng magdili-diling selula ("single cells"). Uli na ning panyulung a iti, meging posibling kilalanan la king masusing peralan deng bacteriang panibatan da reng sakit.

Enping:
Ing Enping (Chinese Postal Map Romanisation: Yanping;, a misusulat mu namang Yanping, metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king lalawigan ning Guangdong, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, at kayabe ya king Lakanbalen ning Jiangmen.
Ing lakanbalen ning Enping atyu king mauli albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Guangdong, king labuad a Pearl River Delta. Kasiping ne ing Kaiping king pangulu aslagan ampo ing Yangjing king mauli albugan, at makalele ya king South China Sea; maki dayu lang ampong deng Hong Kong ampong Macau. Metung ya kareng limang kondadu ning Guangdong ("five counties in Guangdong") (a awsan dang Sze Yup, liban king Heshan).

Foshan:
Ing Fóshān (), metung yang lakanbalen ("city") king kalibudtang in ("central") dake ning lalawigan ning Guangdong king mauling Tsina. Ing sakup nang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") maki lapad yang manga 3,840 km².
Ngeni, dakal lang dake ning Foshan deng tutuknangan da reng dayu ibat kareng miayaliwang dake ning Tsina, at Mandarin mu ing balu dang amanu, kabang ing katutubung amanu ning lugal, metung yang uring Foshan ning Cantonese.

Gaoyao:
