Ing Xinzheng () metung yang malating lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king mauli nang dake ning lalawigan ning Henan king kalibudtan ning Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Maki lapad yang ing lakanbalen.

Xuchang:
Ing Xuchang (; Postal map spelling: Hsuchang) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king kalibudtan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Henan king kalibudtang Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kalele ne ing tungkung panlalawigan ning Zhengzhou king pangulung albugan, ing Kaifeng king pangulung aslagan, ing Zhoukou king aslagan, ing Luohe king mauling aslagan, ampo ing Pingdingshan king mauling albugan.
Maki populasyun yang 4,307,199 king 2010 census, nung nu deng 1,139,644 manuknangan la king lugal a urbanisadu (distritu ning "Weidu ampo ing kondadu ning Xuchang")

Yanshi:
Ing Yanshi () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadung ("county-level city") panibalan ning lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") ning Luoyang king albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Henan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu ing Yanshi king Ilug Luo. Mediskubri ya king lugal ing manimunang karinan ("main site") ning Kulturang Erlitou (1900–1500 BC) anyang 1959.

Yima, Henan:
Ing Yima () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king lalawigan ning Henan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king lalam ning pamanibala ning Lakanbalen ning Sanmenxia. Anyang 2007, maki populasyun yang 141,532. Atyu ing Lakanbalen ning Yima king albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Henan, king Xiaoshan letter Trail, North Yangshao peak, south balcony Loewe. 

Yongcheng:
Ing Yongcheng () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king Shangqiu, lalawigan ning Henan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. 

Yuzhou, Henan:
Ing Yuzhou (Simplified Chinese: 禹州; pinyin: Yǔzhōu) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king Xuchang, kalibudtang dake ning lalawigan ning Henan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Iti ing karinan ning Yangzhai, ing tungku ("capital") ning Han (estadu)|Estadu ning Han]] kanitang Panaun da ring Milalabang Estadu ("Warring States Period"). Maki populasyun yang 1,131,819 katau anyang 2010 census a manuknangan kareng 1472 km², oneng malati ya mung dake ing lugal a urbanisadu (o metro).

Zhoukou:
Ing Zhoukou (; Postal map spelling: Chowkow) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Henan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kalele ne ing Zhumadian king mauling aslagan, ding Xuchang ampong Luohe king albugan, ing Kaifeng king pangulung albugan, ing Shangqiu king pangulung aslagan, ampo ing lalawigan ning Anhui kareng aliwa pang dane. 

Zhumadian:
Ing Zhumadian (; Postal map spelling: Chumatien) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauli nang dake ning lalawigan ning Henan. Kalele ne ing Xinyang king mauli, ing Nanyang king albugan, ing Pingdingshan king pangulung albugan, ing Luohe king pangulu, ing Zhoukou king pangulung aslagan, ampo ing lalawigan ning Anhui king aslagan.
Maki populasyun yang 7,230,744 anyang 2010 census, nung nu deng 721,678 manuknangan la king karinan a urbanisadu o metrong bibilugan ning Distritu ning Yicheng.

Anlu:
Ing Anlu () metung yang lakanbalen king aslagan-kalibudtang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Anyang 1999, maki populasyun yang 112,529 ing lakanbalen. King pamanibala, metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ning Xiaogan.

Chibi Lakanbalen:
Ing Chibi City () metung yang lakanbalen king mauling aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Anyang mumuna, maki lagyu yang Puqi (蒲圻) ing lakanbalen anggang 11 Junio 1998, nung kapilan migdisisyun ya ing State Council a alilan ya king "Chibi" ing lagyu na ba yang ikunekta ing lakanbalen king pikabalwan a Battle of Chibi ("Battle of Chibi"). King administrasyun, metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ning Lakanbalen ning Xianning.

Dangyang:
Ing Dangyang () metung yang lakanbalen king albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei Maldang Republika ning Tsina, a maki dayung king aslagan ning Gezhouba Dam king Ilug Yangtze. Anyang Albugang Han Dynasty (206-24 BC) ing Emperador Jing of Han mitikdo yang administrasyun king Dangyang king lapad . Kanitang 1988 tinas ne ning State Council of the People's Republic of China iti manibat king elevated this from a kondadu paras king lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city"), at king salukuyan, panibalan ne ning Lakanbalen ning Yichang.

Danjiangkou:
Ing Danjiangkou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king pangulung albugan nang dake ning Lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king lalam ning pamanibala ning Lakanbalen ning Shiyan.

Labanus:
Labanus, keng English Daikon, mooli, o kaya white radish ("Raphanus sativus" var. "longipinnatus", mayayaus mu rin kareng aliwang lagiu) bagia lasa, maragul, ampong maputi at gagamitan da kareng miyaliwang lutu. Ing peka marals dang gamit iyapin ing pamulug keng sigang.

Lara:
Ing lara keng English chili pepper (mayayaus mu rin chile pepper o kaya chilli pepper, ibat Nahuatl "chīlli" ) metung yang bunga na ning tanaman a genus "Capsicum", kayanib keng nightshade family, Solanaceae. 
Deng lara menibatan la king America. Kaibat ning Columbian Exchange, dakal kareng matatanam a lara mikalat la mabilug a yatu, magagamit keng pamangan ampong panulu.
Ing India iya ing pekamarakal a papalual, gagamit ampong magexport kareng lara. Among which the city of Guntur in Andhra Pradesh produces 30% of all the chilies produced in India, and the state of Andhra Pradesh contributes to 75% of all the chilli exports from India.

Gordon Bell:
I C. Gordon Bell (mibait Agosto 19, 1934) metung yang Americanung inhenyerung elektrikal ("electrical engineer") ampong talapanibala ("manager"). Metung yang minunang empleadu ning Digital Equipment Corporation (DEC) 1960–1966, i Bell, a migdisenyu kareng pilan kareng karelang makinang PDP at kaybat meging Vice President of Engineering 1972-1983, a manibala king pamanalkus overseeing the ("development") ning karelang VAX. 
Kayabe king mas tawli nang karerang Bell ing entrepreneur, talatátag a Kadwang Direktor ning Computing and Information Science and Engineering Directorate 1986-1987, ampong talapanyalugsug ("researcher") king Microsoft Research, 1995–salukuyan.

Jean-Claude Juncker:
I Jean-Claude Juncker (; mibait 9 Diciembre 1954) metung yang Luxembourger a pulitikung migsilbing ka-23ng Pun Ministru ning Luxembourg manibat kanitang 20 Enero 1995. Ya ing pekamalambat magsilbing pekapun ning kapamahalan ning sanu mang bangsa king European Union, ampo king pekamalambat magsilbing pekapun ning sanumang kapamahalan a demokratiku king yatu. Migsilbi yang Pamuntuk ning Eurogroup manibat king pamaglalang ning semi-permanenting puestu manibat 2005 anggang 2013.
Miyalal ya king Kamara ding Deputadu para king Christian Social People's Party anyang 1984 i Juncker, a tambing mitas puestu king gabineti nang Jacques Santer antimong Ministru para king Obra ("Minister for Work"). Migsilbi yang Ministru ning Pisalapyan ("Minister for Finances") ning Luxembourg maninbat 1989 anggang 2009, at megi yang Pun Ministru anyang megi yang Pamuntuk ning European Commission i Santer anyang 1995. King puestu na antimong Pun Ministru, migsilbi ya mu namang adwang terming tya-anam a bulan antimong Pamuntuk ning European Council, anyang 1997 ampong 2005.

Daye, Hubei:
Ing Daye () metung yang lakanbalen ning aslagang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. King administrasyun, metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ning Lakanbalen ning Huangshi.

Enshi Lakanbalen:
Ing Enshi () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ampo ing tungku ("seat") ning Enshi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture, king in albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atilu keti deng tungku da reng dake nang lehislatibu, ehekutibu ampong hudikatura ning prefecture, ampo ing kayang Partido Komunista ampong Buro o Sakdalan ning Seguridad a Pangmalda. 
Maki lapad yang ing mabilug a lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu.

Ezhou:
Ing Ezhou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Jingmen:
Ing Jingmen () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king kalibudtang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu ing Jingmen king lugal nung nu la mitatanam deng bulak ampong tanaman a pikukwanan laru. Maki populasyun yang 2,873,687 ing prefecture (2010 population census). Megi yang anti kaniti ing lagyu nang Jingmen uling kanitang minuna, iti ing daralanan papunta king Jingzhou, metung kareng Syam a Lalawigan, at mangabaldugan yang "Pasbul dalan king Jingzhou" ("Gateway to Jingzhou").

Marjorie Estiano:
I Marjorie Dias de Oliveira (mibait Marsu 8, 1982) metung yang Brazilanang artista. 

Instituto Federal da Bahia:
Ing Instituto Federal da Bahia (pamikuyad: IFBA) metung yang universidad king Brasil.
Mitatag ya kanitang 1910.

Guangshui:
Ing Guangshui () metung yang lakanbalen king pangulung aslagan a dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, malapit king angganan ning lalawigan ning Henan. King administrasyun, metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ning Lakanbalen ning Suizhou.

Hanchuan:
Ing Hanchuan () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king aslagan-kalibudtang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king lalam ning pamanibala ning Lakanbalen ning Xiaogan.
Atyu king kayli nang pampang ning Ilug Yangtze ing dake nang urbanisadu ning lakanbalen. Nanupata, atin ya muring gabun a sakup ing lakanbalen king wanan nang pampang ning ilug.

Honghu:
Ing Honghu (洪湖) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king labuad a munisipal ning Jingzhou, king mauli nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu ing lakanbalen king pangulung albugan (kayli)ng pampang ning Ilug Yangtze, katulid ning Lalawigan ning Hunan ampo ning Xianning, Hubei. Pekilagyu de king kasiping nang Laug Hong ("Hong Lake"), a kanitang minuna, pana-panaun a lalbug (洪, "hong"). 
Anyang 2000, ing Lakanbalen ning Honghu City maki populasyun yang 335,618 o maygit pang tau.

Huanggang:
Ing Lakanbalen ning Huanggang () metung yang manimunang munisipalidad (a mayayaus muring Prefecture) king aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king pangulu ning dake nang libutad ning Ilug Yangtze, at kalele ne king pangulu ing kabundukang Dabie Shan.

Huangshi:
Ing Huangshi () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauling aslagan ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Philippe ning Belgika:
I Philippe (, ; mibait 15 Abril 1960) ing kasalungsungan a Ari ding Belgian, kaybat nang linukluk king tronu anyang 21 Julio 2013. Ya ing pangane nang anak Aring Albert II, a elilan ne kaybat ning pamagtabili nang Albert uling king sangkan a kabulasan 's abdication ("due to health reasons"), ampo i Queen Paola. Ayasawa ne i Kondesa Mathilde d'Udekem d'Acoz (a ngeni Reina Mathilde), at atin lang apat a anak. Ing mas matwa nang anak a babaing Aring Philippe, i Prinsesa Elisabeth, ing tutuking manalili king tronu.

Jingzhou:
Ing Jingzhou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauli ang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, king wanan nang pampangan ning Ilug Yangtze. Anyang 2010 census, maki populasyun yang 5,691,707, nung nu deng 1,154,086 manuknangan la king dakeng urbanisadung maki atlung (3) urban districts.
Jingzhou's central urban area has grown out of a city that was historically known as Shashi. These days, this name is preserved in the name of Shashi District, which includes this city's historical center, as well as in the names of a number of local facilities, such as the Shashi Airport and a railway freight station.

Laohekou:
Ing Laohekou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king pangulung albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king Ilug Han (Hanshui), malapit king angganan ning Henan.
Maki lapad yang ing mabilug a lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ampong populasyun a 490,000 (2002). Sakup ne ning Lakanbalen ning Xiangyang. Kayabe ya keti ing kabalenan ning Laohekou, a maki lapad a .

Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky:
I Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky (; Russian: Пётр Ильи́ч Чайко́вский; tr. "Pyotr Ilyich Chaykovsky"; 7 May 1840 – 6 November 1893), me-Inglis antimong Peter Ilyich Tchaikovsky , metung yang kompositor a Ruso, a maki miyayaliwang obra antimo reng symphony, concerto, opera, ballet, chamber music, ampong choral setting ning Russian Orthodox Divine Liturgy. Kayabe la reng mapilan kareti kareng pekasikat a tigtigan a pang-teatru king musikang classical. Ya ing mumunang kompositor a Rusong malalam a bakas king musikang internasyunal, a pepasikan na king kayang panga bisitang konduktor ("guest conductor") king bandang tauling dake ning kayang karera king Europa ampo king Estados Unidos. Metung kareting pamitagun keta yang konsyertung pamamuklat One of these appearances was at the later in his career in Europe and the United States("inaugural concert") ning Carnegie Hall king New York Lakanbalen anyang 1891. Pigkalubanan neng galal Emperador Alexander III i Tchaikovsky anyang 1884, at dininan neng pension a pangkabang-bye anyang tawli nang dake ning dekadang 1880.

Lichuan, Hubei:
Ing Lichuan () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ning Enshi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture, king mauling albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, a maki dayung king albugan ning Enshi Lakanbalen, ing tungku ning prefecture. 

Macheng:
Ing Macheng () lakanbalen ya king pangulung aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, a makalele kareng lalawigan ning Henan king pangulu ampo ning Anhui king pangulung aslagan. Metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king lalam ning pamanibala ning Lakanbalen ning Huanggang at tatagkil king mauli rang dake ding Kabundukan ning Dabie. Maki sakup yang manga ing lakanbalen, nung nu kayabe la ring 700 a nayun ampong malating balen. Ing kabilugan nang populasyun, 1.2 milyun anyang tauling census.

Qianjiang, Hubei:
Ing Qianjiang () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng sub-prefecture ("sub-prefecture-level city") king mauli-kalibudtan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Shishou:
Ing Shishou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king lalam ning pamanibala ning lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") ning Jingzhou, king mauli nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Shiyan:
Ing Shiyan () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king pangulung albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Chris Froome:
I Christopher Froome (mibait 20 Mayo 1985) metung yang Britanicong mibait Kenyang propesyonal a siklistang kakarera para king UCI ProTeam . Mibait ya king Kenya at meragul ya king Mauling Africa, at manibat anyang 2008 kakarera ya king lalam ning lisensyang Britanico basi king kayang pasaporti ampo reng bangsang beitan da reng kayang tata ampong ápu.

Phil Mickelson:
I Philip Alfred "Phil" Mickelson (mibait Junio 16, 1970) Americanu yang propesyonal a mamyalung golf. Sinambut neng 42 events king PGA Tour, kayabe la reng limang manimunang kampeonato ("major championships"): atlung titulung Masters (2004, 2006, 2010), metung a PGA Championship (2005), ampong metung a Open Championship (2013). Ngeni, tuturing da neng metung kareng 15 a Pekamapyang Diling Mamyalung Golf ning kabilugan ning panaun (15 Greatest Golfers of all time"). 
Melambat yang 700 a duminggu i Mickelson king apulung pekamatas ranggu ("top-10") ning Official World Golf Rankings ("Official World Golf Rankings"), at miras yang pekamatas king karera nang ranggung pangyatung kadwang pekamatas king pilang pamikatagun, at atin yang pangkabang byeng exemption king PGA Tour. Mekatanam yang kadwa ("runner-up") king U.S. Open, metung a record. Mirinan yang palayong "Lefty" i Mickelson uling kaliweti ya king kayang swing, dapot kareng aliwang bage wanan ing gagamitan na. Miabe ya king World Golf Hall of Fame anyang Mayo 2012.

Edgar Rice Burroughs:
I Edgar Rice Burroughs (Setiembre 1, 1875 – Marzo 19, 1950) metung yang Americanung talasulat, a pikabaluan dili king kayang lelangan a tauan a bayaning kakewan o kagubatan a i Tarzan ampo ing bayaning Mars adventurer a i John Carter, oneng ginawa yang obra kareng dakal a uri ning panyulat, kayabe ne ing tauan king komiks a i Ant Man.

Rosalind Franklin:
I Rosalind Elsie Franklin (25 Julio 1920 – 16 Abril 1958) metung yang biophysicist ampong X-ray crystallographer ibat Britaniang minye maulagang kontribusyon king pamanintindi ning mapinung pangabalangkas a molecular ning DNA, RNA, viruses, uling batu ("coal"), ampong graphite. Sinikat yang dili ing obra na king DNA uling maki maulaga yang papil ing DNA (deoxyribonucleic acid) king metabolismu ning selula ampo king genetics, at ing pangatuklas ning kayang pangabalangkas o istruktura sinaup king pamanintindi nung makananung mipapasa ing impormasyung genetic manibat kareng pengari paras kareng ának.

Santiago de Compostela:
Ing Santiago de Compostela (, ) ing tungku is the [[Capital (political)|("capital") ning komunidad autonoma ning Galicia king pangulung albugan ning Espanya.
Migumpisa ya ing lakanbalen king banal a lugal a makaparikil kang Apostol Santiago, a ngeni katedral ning lakanbalen, ampong metung kareng lugal a pupuntalan king Way of St. James ("Way of St. James"), manimunang peregrinasyon o pilgrimage a Catolicung migumpisa anyang ka-9 a dilanwa o siglu. Anyang, mibulalalag yang UNESCO Karinan a Pamana king Yatu ("World Heritage Site") ing Matwa nang Balen ning lakanbalen.

Zhongxiang:
Ing Zhongxiang () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ning Jingmen, kalibudtang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Pikabalwan yang lakanbalen ning kasalesayan ampong kultura king Tsina ing Zhongxiang.

Changde:
Ing Changde () lakanbalen ya king pangulu ning lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, a maki populasyun a 5,717,218 katau anyang inhabitants at the 2010 census, nung nu deng 1,232,182 atyu la king dakeng urbanisadung bibilugan da reng adwang (2) distritung urban (Dingcheng ampong Wuling).

Changning, Hunan:
Ing metung yang distritung lakanbalen ("city district") king lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king lalam ning pamanibala ning Lakabalen ning Hengyang.

Changsha:
Ing Changsha () ing lakanbalen a tungku ("capital city") ning lalawigan ning Hunan, king mauling kalibudtan nang dake ning Tsina ("south-central China"), king mababa nang dake ning Ilug Xiang, a sanga ning Ilug Yangtze. Maki lapad yang ing kayang munisipalidad, at agpang king 2010 Census, maki populasyun yang 7,044,118 inhabitants.

Prinsipe George ning Cambridge:
I Prinsipe George ning Cambridge (George Alexander Louis; mibait 22 Julio 2013) ing anak nang Prinsipe William, Duke ning Cambridge, ampo ning kayang asawang i Catherine, Dukesa ning Cambridge, ampo ing bukud a apu nang Charles, Principe ning Gales, ampo ning kayang mumunang asawa, i Diana, Princesa ning Gales. Ya ing katlung makatuking magmana king tronu ning kayang apu king tud, i Elizabeth II, kaibat ning kayang ingkung ampong tata.

Paramore:
Deng Paramore metung lang pop ampong rock a grupu ibat Franklin, Tennessee, United States mitatag inyang 2000. Keraklan di Hayley Williams (bosis), Jeremy Davis (bau guitara), Zac Farro (tambul), Taylor York (guitara), ampong Josh Farro (guitar) ila reng kayanib king karelang buung carera.

Mohamed Brahmi:
I Mohamed Brahmi (; 15 Mayo 1955 – 25 Julio 2013) metung yang pulitikung Tunisian politician. I ing talatátag ampong sadyang pekapun ning People's Movement, a, king lalam ning kayang pamanibala, sinambut adwang pwestu king alalang pang-konstitwensya ning 2011.

William Ward (pari):
I William Ward (tutung lagyu Webster) (mibait king Thornby king Westmoreland, manga 1560; mebite king Tyburn, 26 Julio 1641) metung yang Ingles a Romano Catolicong pari. Metung yang martir a Catolico, a meging beato anyang 1929.

Suizhou:
Ing Suizhou (), sadyang Sui Kondadu (), metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king pangulu ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, kalele ning lalawigan ning Henan king pangulu ampo king aslagan.

Songzi:
Ing Songzi () metung yang lakanbalen king mauling albugan nang dake ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, king kalibudtan nang dake ampong mauling pampang ning Ilug Yangtze. Metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") lalam ning pamanibala ning Jingzhou, a 896,800 (agpang king Songzi Statistic Yearbook 2000). 

Tianmen:
Ing Tianmen () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng sub- prefecture ("sub-prefecture-level city") king kalibudtan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.
Atyu king albugan ning Wuhan ampo king aslagan ning Jingzhou. Formerly known as Jingling (竟陵) ing sadya nang lagyu, oneng mialilan ya king Tianmen (天门) kanitang 1726 anyang Qing Dynasty. Ibat ya ing lagyung Tianmen kareng bunduk a Tianmen king pangulung albugan ning lakanbalen. 

Wuhan:
Ing Wuhan ( ) ing tungku is the ("capital") ning lalawigan ning Hubei province, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, ampo lakanbalen a dakal dili tau king kalibudtang Tsina. Atyu king aslagan ning Kapatagan ning Jianghan Plain ("Jianghan Plain"), ampo ing salapungan da reng ilug a Yangtze ampong Han. 

Wuxue:
Ing Wuxue (), sadyang formerly Guangji County (广济县), (Guangji County ), metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king pangulu nang pampang ning Ilug Yangtze king aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Ing Wuxue atyu lalam ning pamanibalan ning Munispalidad ning Huanggang (黃冈).

Xiangyang:
Ing Xiangyang () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city")pangulung albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Menibat ya kareng adwang matwang lakanbalen, ing Xiangyang ampo ing Fancheng. It was known as Xiangfan () ing lagyu na anggang Diciembre 2, 2010. Pipitnan ne ning Ilug Han ing Xiangyang. Lalabas ya ing ilug king libutad ning lakanbalen, at pipitnan ne iti king pangulu ampong mauli. Ing mismung lakanbalen metung yang pamianib da reng adwang matwa, at sadyang mikakawaning lakanbalen: ing Fancheng ampo ing Xiangzhou. Ing mitatagan king matwang Xianyang atyu king mauli ning Ilug Han at karake ne ing metung kareng pekamatwang mitatagan a makatikdo pang kuta ning lakanbalen king Tsina, kabang ing Fancheng atyu king pangulu ning Ilug Han. Pareu lang maulaga deng adwang lakanbalen king amlat ning Tsina, kanitang minuna man o king panaun bayu ing kasalungsungan (pre-modern). Ngeni, ing lakanbalen king kadwang pekamaragul, kaybat ning tungku ("capital"), ing Wuhan, at makapusisyun ya king libutad ning Wuhan ampo ning Xi'an.

Xianning:
Ing Xianning () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauling aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, kalele ning lalawigan ning Jiangxi mauling aslagan ampo ning lalawigan ning Hunan king mauling albugan. Kilala ya antimong "Lakanbalen ning Osmanthus".

Xiantao:
Ing Xiantao () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng sub- prefecture ("sub-prefecture-level city") king aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king Kapatagan ning Jianghan king libutad ning lalawigan ning Hubei, at maki lokasyun yang 112°55'—113°49' aslagan a longitude ampong 30°04'—30°32' pangulung latitude, ing Lakanbalen ning Xiantao, a maki lapad a 2538 kilometro kwadrado. 

Michel Gondry:
I Michel Gondry (mibait Mayo 8, 1963 king Versailles, Pransya) metung yang talagawang pelikulang sinambut Academy Award a Pranses, a direktor a pangkomersyu ("commercial director"), direktor music video, ampong talsulat senaryu ("screenwriter"). Pikabalwan ya king kayang makudtang istilu biswal ampo king kayang pamagmanipula niing king mise en scène.

Mamnoon Hussain:
I Mamnoon Hussain ( (mibait 23 Dicembre 1940) metung yang negosyanting tela ampong pulitikung Pakistaning miyalal Pamuntuk ning Pakistan anyang 2013.
Migsilbi yang sinagli i Hussain antimong Gobernador ning Sindh anyang 1999; meputut ing kayang pamanungkulan antimong Gobernador uli ning kudetang militar anyang Octubre 1999. Miyalal yang ka-12ng Pamuntuk ning Pakistan anyang 30 Julio 2013, at magumpisa ing kayang terminu keng 8 Setiembre 2013, nung kapilan ne alilan i Asif Ali Zardari, a ali tinagal pasibayu. Pareu lang kayanib king [[Pakistan Muslim League (N)|Pakistan Muslim League di Mamnoon Hussain ampo i Pun Ministru Nawaz Sharif. Sinambut ya i Mamnoon Hussain king alalang pang-pamuntuk kapamilatan da reng 432 botu, kabang ing kayang kalaban, i Wajihuddin Ahmed, sinambut yang 77 botu.

Robert Mugabe:
I Robert Gabriel Mugabe ( ; ; mibait 21 Febrero 1924) ing kadwa ampong kasalungsungang Pamuntuk ning Zimbabwe. Antimong metung kareng pekapun da reng pangimut a gerilya laban king pamanibalang ning minoryang maputi, miyalal ya king upaya at menibala anyang 1980. Migsilbi yang Pun Ministru manibat 1980 anggang 1987, at antimo ing mumunang ehekutibung pekapun ning estadu manibat 1987 at 2017.

Enele Sopoaga:
I Enele Sosene Sopoaga (mibait 10 Febrero 1956) metung yang diplomatiku ampong pulitikung Tuvaluan a miyalal king Parlamento king pangkabilugan a alalan ning 2010. Migsilbi yang kadwang pun ministru ("deputy prime minister") ampong Ministru ning Pisasabyang Panglual and ("Minister for Foreign Affairs"), Kapatulugan ("Environment") ampong Obra ("Labour") sinaglung kapamahalan nang Pun Ministru Maatia Toafa manibat Setiembre to Diciembre 2010. Kaibat ning e migtagumpeng tangkang maging pun ministru anyang Diciembre 2010 (a maki suporta nang Toafa), megi yang pekapun ning Oposisyun king kapamahalan nang Pun Ministru Willy Telavi. Megi yang pansamantalang Pun Ministru anyang 1 Agosto 2013 kaibat ning pangalako nang Telavi kapamilatan nang Gobernador Heneral, uli ning krisis pampulitika. Metung a yaldo kaibat na niti, anyang 2 Agosto 2013, binotu neng ilako ning oposisyun ing kapamahalan nang Telavi king no confidence vote. Kaibat na niti, mika alalan para king bayung pun ministru ning Tuvalu, at i Sopoaga ing sinambut a maki 8 botu laban kareng 4. Sinumpa ya anyang 5 Agosto 2013, at lelangan ne ing kayang ministry ita muring aldong ita.

Jeff Bezos:
I Jeffrey Preston "Jeff" Bezos (; mibait Enero 12, 1964) metung yang Americanung negosyanti king Aptas o Internet ("internet entrepreneur") ampong mamuhunan. Metung yang negosyanting pang-teknolohiya ("technology entrepreneur") a manimuna papil king pamandagul ning e-commerce antimong talatátag ampong CEO ning Amazon.com, metung a negosyanti king Aptas ("online merchant") a mamisaling librung ampong dakal a miayaliwang produktu. King lalam ning kayang pamang-giya, megi yang pekamaragul a mamisaling "retailer" king World Wide Web at manimunang apusan o modelu king pamamisali king Aptas. Anyang 2013, seli neng Bezos ing dyaryung "The Washington Post".

Mike Connors:
I Mike Connors (mibait a Krekor Ohanian anyang Agosto 15, 1925 - 26 january 2017) metung yang artistang Americanung pikabalwan dili antimong linage king detektib a Joe Mannix king seryeng pang-telebisyung CBS "Mannix". Anyang 1959–1960 television season, linage yang imbestigador a lalaban king krimen a ausan da mung "Nick" king aliwang seryeng CBS, ing "Tightrope".

Julia Child:
I Julia Carolyn Child (née McWilliams; Agosto 15, 1912 – Agosto 13, 2004) metung yang Americanang chef, talasulat libru ampong personalidad a pang-telebisyon. Pikabaluan ya king pamagdala king French cuisine king maldang to the Americanu kapamilatan ning kayang cookbook, ing "Mastering the Art of French Cooking", ampo reng kayang programang telebisyon a katuki na niti, lalu na ing "The French Chef", a migumpisa anyang 1963.

Jimmy Webb:
I James Layne "Jimmy" Webb (mibait Agosto 15, 1946) metung yang Americanung talasulat kanta, kompositor ampong magkanta. Sinulat neng klasikung menikwang platinum, kayabe ya la reng "Up, Up and Away", "By the Time I Get to Phoenix", "Wichita Lineman", "Galveston", "The Worst That Could Happen", "All I Know", ampong "MacArthur Park". Kinanta da no reng sikat a kasalungsungang magkanta deng kayang kanta, antimo di Glen Campbell, The 5th Dimension, Thelma Houston, The Supremes, Richard Harris, Johnny Maestro, Frank Sinatra, Elvis Presley, Isaac Hayes, Art Garfunkel, Amy Grant, America, Linda Ronstadt, R.E.M., Michael Feinstein, Donna Summer, Barbra Streisand, Sammy Davis Jr.,and Carly Simon. Agpang king BMI, ing kayang kantang "By the Time I Get to Phoenix" ing katlung maralas diling papatigtig a kanta kilub da reng limampulung banwa pilatan ning 1940 ampong 1990. Webb is the only artist ever to have received Grammy Awards for music, lyrics, and orchestration.

Bobby Helms:
I Robert Lee Helms (Agosto 15, 1933 - Junio 19, 1997), a kilala king kayang lagyung propesyonal a Bobby Helms metung yang Americanung magkantang country music a miras king taluktuk ning kasikatan anyang 1957 kapamilatan ning kayang seasonal hit a ing "Jingle Bell Rock". Kayabe la kareng aliwa nang hit deng "Fraulein" ampong "My Special Angel".

Museo Sursock:
Ing Museo Sursock, modernu yang museo ning arte king Beirut, Lebanon a kanita panibalan ning kolektor ning arteng maki lagyung Ibrahim M. Beyhum. Atyu king makasalesayang dalang awsan dang Rue Sursock king distritung Achrafieh ning Beirut. Mayayakit la king dalan deng aliwang mansion a tinikdo da kanitang ka-18ng dilanwa o siglu da reng pekamapyang pamilya ning Beirut antimo deng Sursock ampo deng Bustros. Dininan neng ranggung #7 kareng 112ng bageng gawan king Beirut ning Lonely Planet travelers.

Brillante Mendoza:
I Brillante Mendoza (mibait Julio 30, 1960) metung yang Filipinong direktor pelikula. Mibait ya ampong meragul king San Fernando, Pampanga. Kinangwa yang Advertising Arts king kanita College of Architecture and Fine Arts ning University of Santo Tomas.
Mig-direktor ne kareng labing-anam a pelikula manibat anyang 2005. Simbut ne ing galal a Best Director para king pelikulang "Kinatay" king 62nd Cannes Film Festival. Ing pelikula na kanitang 2009, ing "Lola" sinambut yang galal a Best Film king 6th Dubai International Film Festival. Ing pelikula na anyang 2012, ing "Captive", pepalage de king kumpetisyun king 62nd Berlin International Film Festival anyang Febrero 2012.

Xiaogan:
Ing Xiaogan () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king aslagan-kalibudtang is a prefecture-level city in ("east-central") dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, a maki dayung king pangulung albugan ning tungkung lalawigan ("provincial capital") ning Wuhan. 

Yichang:
Ing Yichang () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina
Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Iti ing kadwang pekamaragul a lakanbalen king lalawigan, kaybat ning tungku ("capital"), ing Wuhan. Atyu king kayang sakup ing Three Gorges Dam, king Yiling Distritu.

Yingcheng:
Ing Yingcheng () metung yang lakanbalen king aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Zaoyang:
Ing Zaoyang () metung yang lakanbalen king pangulu nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, malapit king angganan ning lalawigan ning Henan. King administrasyun, metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") lalam ning pamanibala ning Xiangyang.

Zhijiang, Hubei:
I Zhijiang () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ning Lakanbalen ning Yichang, king albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hubei, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Angga kanitang dekadang 1990, metung yang kondadu ("county") ing Zhijiang. Atyu king (pangulung) pampang ning Ilug Yangtze, pababa king agus manibat king kabalenan ning Yichang. 

Chenzhou:
Ing Chenzhou () metung yang lakanbalen king mauli nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Miraras yang 9.2% ning lapad ning lalawigan ing kayang sakup, o , at ing kabilugan nang populasyun miras 4,559,600 anyang 2001, at 26% da reti manuknangan kareng lugal a urbanisadu, at 74% kareng lugal a rural.

Hengyang:
Ing Hengyang () ing kadwang pekamaragul a lakanbalen king lalawigan ning Hunan Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Dadalakit ya king Ilug Xiang manga king mauli ning tungkung panlalawigan ("provincial capital") ning Changsha.

Hongjiang:
Ing Hongjiang (Chinese: 洪江; Pinyin: Hóngjiāng), sadyang Qianyang Kondadu (黔阳县) ("Qianyang County") , metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king Huaihua, lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Huaihua:
Ing Huaihua () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Richard Francis Burton:
I Captain Sir Richard Francis Burton KCMG FRGS (19 Marzo 1821 – 20 Octubre 1890) metung yang Ingles a heograpu ("geographer"), talapaglakbe, talapaglikas ("translator"), talasulat, sundalus, orientalista, kartograpu ("cartographer"), etnologu ("ethnologist"), ispiya, linguista, poeta, talapag-espada ampong diplomatiku. Pikabaluan ya kareng kayang pamaglakbe king Asia, Africa ampo reng Americas, ampo ing kayang e karaniwan a beluan kareng amanu ampong kultura. agpang king metung a pamamilang, byasa yang magsalitang 29 (adwang pulu't syam) a amanung Europeu, Asianu ampong Aprikanu.

Jishou:
Ing Jishou (simplified Chinese: 吉首; pinyin: Jíshǒu) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ampo ing tungku ("seat") ning Xiangxi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture king lalawigan ning Hunan king Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Leiyang:
Ing Leiyang (Chinese: 耒阳) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king Hengyang, lalawigan ning Hunan, king Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Mibait ya ampong menukhangnan king Leiyang i Cai Lun, a agpang king tradisyon, yang menimbentu king papil. 

Lengshuijiang:
Ing Lengshuijiang (; pinyin: Lěngshǔijiāng) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Dakal ya antimony, at atyu keni ing pekamaragul a minang antimony king yatu (maygit 50% ning prodkusyun ning yatu king antimony).
Lengshuijiang Normal School is an institution of higher education in Lengshuijiang, which has no university.

Lianyuan:
Ing Lianyuan (Chinese: 涟源) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, a panibalan ning lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") ning Loudi. Agpang king 2010 Census, maki populasyun yang 995,712 katau ing Lianyuan.

Liling:
Ing Liling (醴陵) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hunan king Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Maki dayu yang manibat king lalawigan ning Jiangxi ing Liling, a atyu king mauli ning tungku ("capital") ning lalawigan, ing Changsha. Ing Liling maki lapad yang .

Linxiang, Hunan:
Ing Lakanbalen ning Linxiang metung yang distritung lakanbalen ("city district") ning lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king lalam ning pamanibala ning lakanbalen ning Yueyang.

Liuyang:
Ing Liuyang () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king Changsha, ing tungku ("capital") ning lalawigan ning Hunan king Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Pikabaluan ya ing uling king kayang industria da reng fuegos artificiales o fireworks. Maki lapad yang 5,008 kilometru kwadradu ampong populasyun a 1,278,928 anyang 2010.

Loudi:
Ing Loudi () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king kalibudtan ("central") nang dake ning lalawigan Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Maki dayu king mauli albugan ning tungkung panlalawigan ("provincial capital") ning Changsha. Agpang king 2010 Census, maki populasyun yang 3,785,627 katau king lapad a .

Kevin Smith:
I Kevin Patrick Smith (mibait Agosto 2, 1970) metung yang Americanung talasulat senaryo, artista, producer pelikula, ampong direktor, at saka sikat a talasulat komiks, autor, komedyanti ampong podcaster. 

Paul Weitz (gagawang pelikula):
I Paul John Weitz (mibait Noviembre 19, 1965) metung yang Americanung producer pelikula, talasulat senaryo, artista, ampong direktor pelikula. Kapatad ne ning gagawang pelikulang i Chris Weitz.

Chris Weitz (gagawang pelikula):
I Christopher John "Chris" Weitz (mibait Noviembre 30, 1969) metung yang Americanung producer, talasulat, direktor pelikula ampong artista. Pikabaluan yang dili king obra na kayabe ya ing kayang kapatad, i Paul Weitz, kareng pelikulang comedyng "American Pie" ampong "About a Boy", ampo ing pamagdirek king adaptasyon ning nobelang "The Golden Compass" ampo ning ning "New Moon" ibat king seryeng librung "Twilight". Ing pekabayu nang pelikula ya pin ing "A Better Life".

Doug Liman:
I Douglas Eric "Doug" Liman (mibait July 24, 1965) metung yang Americanung direktor pelikula ampong producer a pikabaluan dili king "Swingers" (1996), "The Bourne Identity" (2002), "Mr. & Mrs. Smith" (2005), "Jumper" (2008), ampong "Fair Game" (2010).

Neil LaBute:
I Neil N. LaBute (mibait Marzo 19, 1963) metung yang Americanung direktor pelikula, talasulat senaryo ampong dramaturgo.

Brett Ratner:
I Brett Ratner (mibait Marzo 28, 1969) metung yang Americanung direktor pelikula, producer, ampong direktor music video. Kilala ya uling king pamagdirek king "Rush Hour" a seryeng , "The Family Man", "Red Dragon", "", ampong "Tower Heist". Ya murin ing producer ning seryeng dramang Fox a "Prison Break".

Todd Phillips:
I Todd Phillips (mibait a Todd Bunzl anyang Diciembre 20, 1970) metung yang Americanung direktor pelikula, talasulat senaryo, ("screenwriter"), producer, ampong artista. Pikabaluan yang dili king pamanylat ampong pamagdirek kareng "Road Trip", "Old School", "The Hangover" trilogy, ampong "Due Date". Ya murin ing producer ning pelikulang 2012 a black comedy, ing "Project X".

Jon Favreau:
I Jonathan Kolia "Jon" Favreau
(; mibait Octubre 19, 1966) metung yang Americanung artista, direktor, talasulat senaryo ("screenwriter"), voice artist, ampong komedyanti. Antimong artista, pikabaluan yang dili uling kareng papil na king "Rudy", "Swingers" (a sinulat na mu naman), "Very Bad Things", ampong "The Break-Up". Kayabe la kareng makabaldugan nang diling obra antimong direktor deng "Elf", "Iron Man", "Iron Man 2", ampong "Cowboys & Aliens". Migsilbi ya mu namang executive producer king "The Avengers" at mas bayu pa, king "Iron Man 3". Ing pekamaragul nang papil king telebisyun, ya pin ing lageng Pete Becker, ing tau nang Monica Geller anyang season three ning sitcom a pang-telebisyung "Friends".

Patty Jenkins:
I Patricia Lea "Patty" Jenkins (mibait Julio 24, 1971) metung yang Americanang direktor pelikula ampong talasulat. Meragul ya kareng miayaliwang dake ning yatu, at megaral ya king AFI Conservatory. Miyari ya king The Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art anyang 1993. Ing pekasikat a pelikulang dinirek na, yapin ing "Monster", metung a docudrama tungkul kang Aileen Wuornos. Anyang Julio 14, 2011, tinanggapap yang nominasyun king Emmy para king Outstanding Directing for a Drama Series para king pilot of "The Killing". Menikwa yang adwang nominasyun para king 2012 DGA Awards for Outstanding Directorial Achievement, metung para king "Outstanding Directorial Achievement in Dramatic Series" para king "The Killing" ampong "Outstanding Directorial Achievement in Movies for Television/Mini-Series" for "Five". Kanitang Enero January 28, 2012, simbut ne ing DGA award for Outstanding Directorial Achievement for a Dramatic Series para king pilot ning "The Killing".

Ethan Zuckerman:
I Ethan Zuckerman metung yang Americanung media scholar, blogger, ampong aktibista king Aptas ("Internet activist"). Ya ing direktor ning MIT Center for Civic Media ampo ing talasulat ning "."

Miluo Lakanbalen:
Ing Miluo (Chinese: 汨罗; Pinyin: Mìluó) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king Lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king lalam ning pamanibala ning lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") ning Yueyang . Maki populasyun yang 658,867 ing lugal (Chinese census November 1999) 90,700 la ring manuknangan king kabalenan.

Shaoshan:
Ing Shaoshan () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king Xiangtan, lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, a pikabaluan antimong kebaitan nang Mao Zedong, ing talatátag ning Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Maulaga yang basi ing Shaoshan anyang Rebolusyong Komunista ning Tsina.

Shaoyang:
Ing Shaoyang () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauli albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, kalele ning Guangxi king mauli. Maki amlat yang 2500 banwa ing Shaoyang, at maulaga ya king negosyu ampong palimpatan o transportasyun king Hunan. 

Wugang, Hunan:
Ing Wugang () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") lalam ning pamanibala ning Shaoyang, king mauli albugan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Xiangtan:
Ing Xiangtan () metung yang lakanbalen king lalawigan ning Hunan king Maldang Republika ning Tsina, king bandang baba nang dake ning Ilug Xiang. Ati lu king Xiangtan Municipal District deng balen dang kebaitan da reng mapilang pekapun a talatátag ning Partidu Komunista ning Tsina, kayabe ya i Mao Zedong, Liu Shaoqi, ampo i Peng Dehuai, ampo pa deng balen dang kebaitan di Qi Baishi a pintor ning Qing Dynasty, ampo i scholar-general Zeng Guofan.

Xiangxiang:
Ing Xiangxiang () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king Xiangtan, lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.
Maki lapad yang 2011 kilometru kwadradu ampong populasyun a 900,000.

Yiyang:
Ing Yiyang () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king Ilug Zi king lalawigan ning Hunan, a tatalete king Lake Dongting at kelele ning Hubei king pangulu. Agpang king 2010 Census, maki populasyun yang 4,313,084 katau ing Yiyang, a manuknangan king lapad a . Merapat ing minunang census anyang 2000, nung kapilan maki 4,309,143 katau.

Elmore Leonard:
I Elmore John Leonard, Jr. (Octubre 11, 1925 – Agosto 20, 2013) metung yang Americanung nobelista ampong talasulat senaryo ("screenwriter"). Western la reng minuna nang milimbag a nobela, oneng kalabas ning panaun megi nong espesyalisasyun Leonard deng crime fiction ampong suspense thriller, at dakal kareti, megawang pelikula.
Kayabe la kareng pikabaluan nang diling obra deng "Get Shorty", "Out of Sight", "Hombre", "Mr. Majestyk", ampong "Rum Punch" (a mibage king pelikula king "Jackie Brown"). Kayabe la kareng makuyad a salita nang Leonard deng megawang pelikulang "3:10 to Yuma" ampong "The Tall T", ampo ing kasalungsungan dang FX a seryeng telebisyon "Justified".

One Direction:
Ing One Direction metung yang English-Irish pop boy band a makabasi king London, at bibilugan da ri Niall Horan, Zayn Malik, Liam Payne, Harry Styles ampong Louis Tomlinson. Pinirma la king marka nang plakang ("record label") Simon Cowell a Syco Records kaybat dang melalang at miyaring katlu king seventh series ning palage da king Britaniang ligligan pamagkantang ("singing competition") "The X Factor" anyang 2010. Mika tagumpe lang internasyunal kapamilata'ning social media, deng adwa nang album ning One Direction's, deng "Up All Night" ampong "Take Me Home", a linwal anyang 2011 ampong 2012, memalbal lang pilang rekord, megi lang pekamatas kareng keraklan kareng manimunang merkadu, at miglalang lang hit single, kayabe la reng "What Makes You Beautiful" ampong "Live While We're Young".

Yongzhou:
Ing Yongzhou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauli nang dake ning lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, king mauli nang pampang ning Ilug Xiang, a meporma king pamianib da reng Ilug Xiao ampong Xiang, at kalele ning Guangdong king mauling aslagan ampong Guangxi king mauling albugan. Maki amlat yang 2000 banwa ing Yongzhou, a metung kareng apat a minunang kondadu ning Hunan. Maki lapad yang 

Yuanjiang, Hunan:
Lakanbalen ning Yuanjiang (沅江, pinyin: Yuánjiāng) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") ning Yiyang, lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Claude Debussy:
I Achille-Claude Debussy (; 22 Agosto 1862 – 25 Marzo 1918) metung yang kompositor a Pranses. Kayabe nang Maurice Ravel, metung ya kareng pikabaluan diling tauan a makaugne king Impresionistang musika, oneng ya mismu tutu neng e buri ing terminu nung yugne de king kareng kayang komposisyun. King Pransya, megawa yang Chevalier ning Legion of Honour anyang 1903. Metung yang maulagang tauan king pamanalis king kapanaunan a modernu king musikang Albuganan ("Western music").

'N Sync:
Ing N Sync (neng kai, maki istilu yang misusulat antimong N) metung yang Americanung boy band a miagum king Orlando, Florida anyang 1995 at mibulalag king Alemania kapamilata'ning BMG Ariola Munich. Ing N Sync bibilugan de ri Justin Timberlake, JC Chasez, Chris Kirkpatrick, Joey Fatone, ampong Lance Bass. Kaibat ning mitmung publisidad a laban king leyi After heavily publicized ("legal battles") king sadya dang talapanibala ("manager"), i Lou Pearlman ampo ing sadya dang markang plaka ("former record label"), ing Sony BMG, ing kadwa nang album ning grupu, ing "No Strings Attached", mekapisali yang maygit metung a milyung kopya kilub ning metung a yaldo, at 2.42 milyung kopya kilub ning paruminggu. Bukud king dakal a nominasyun para king Grammy Award, linage ne ing N Sync king World Series, Super Bowl ampong Olympic Games, at migkanta na la o mig-rekord kayabe la ri Elton John, Left Eye, Aerosmith, Mary J. Blige, Britney Spears, Nelly, Michael Jackson, Phil Collins, Stevie Wonder, Celine Dion, ampong Gloria Estefan.

Yueyang:
Ing Yueyang (; Postal map spelling: Yochow) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king pangulung aslagan nang suluk ning lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, kareng mauli nang pampang ning Laug Dongting ("Dongting Lake").

Zhangjiajie:
Ing Zhangjiajie () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king dake nang pangulung albugan ning lalawigan ning Hunan. Kayabe ne ing distritu ning Yongding ampo reng kondadu ning Cili ampong Sangzhi. Mayayakit ya keti ing Wulingyuan Scenic Area a mituldung UNESCO World Heritage Site anyang 1992, ampong AAAAA scenic area kapamilata'ning China National Tourism Administration.

Zhuzhou:
Ing Zhuzhou (), sadyang Jianning, metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") ning Lalawigan ning Hunan Province, Maldang Republika ning Tsina, banda king mauling aslagan ning Changsha at kalele ning Jiangxi king aslagan. Kayabe ya king "ChangZhuTan Golden Triangle" (a bibilugan da reng lakanbalen ning Changsha, Zhuzhou ampong Xiangtan). Sakup no ning lakanbalen deng maygit limang kondadu ("counties") (Yanling, Chaling, Youxian, Liling, Zhuzhou) ampong apat a distritu (Hetang, Lusong, Shifeng ampong Tianyuan, metung a high-tech industrial development zone), at maki lapad yang .

Zixing:
Ing Zixing (Chinese: 资兴; Pinyin: Zīxīng) metung yang lakanbalen king Chenzhou, lalawigan ning Hunan, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. 

Puntuk a sakurut:
Ing puntuk a sakurut o acute accent ( ´ ) metung yang garlit garlit ("diacritic") a magagamit kareng dakal a makabayu o modernung amanung gagamit alpabetung makabasi kareng kasulatan a Latin, Cyrillic, ampong Griegu.

Puntuk a manene:
Ing puntuk a manene o grave accent king Ingles, ( ` ) ( or ) metung yang is a diacritical ("diacritic") a magagamit kareng dakal a amanu, kayabe la reng Breton, Catalan, Corsican, Holandes, Pranses, Griego (anggang 1982; lon ya ing polytonic orthography), Italianu, Macedonian, Mohawk, Norwegian, Occitan, Portugues, Ligurian, Scottish Gaelic, Vietnamese, Welsh, Romansh, Yoruba ampong Kapampangan at aliwang amanu king Filipinas.

Puntuk a peka turung:
Ing puntuk a peka turung o circumflex king Ingles, metung yang is a garlit ("diacritic") kareng kasulatan a Latino, Griego ampong Cyrillic a magagamit king pamisulat da reng dakal a amanu ampo kareng sistema o kaparalanang romanization ampong transcription. 
Magagamit ya murin ing garlit a iti king matematika, nung nu king Ingles mayayaus yang hat o roof.

Cameron Diaz:
I Cameron Michelle Diaz (mibait Agosto 30, 1972) metung yang artista ampong sadyang modelung Americana. Sinikat ya anayng dekadang 1990s king papil na kareng pelikulang "The Mask", "My Best Friend's Wedding" ampong "There's Something About Mary". Kayabe la kareng aliwa nang pikabaluan a lage deng kareng adwang pelikulang "Charlie's Angels", ing siwala ning tauan a Princess Fiona king seryeng "Shrek", "Knight and Day", "The Holiday", "The Green Hornet" ampong "Bad Teacher". Tinanggap yang nominasyun i Diaz king galal a Golden Globe para king papil na kareng pelikulang "There's Something About Mary", "Being John Malkovich", "Vanilla Sky", ampong "Gangs of New York".

Queen:
Deng Queen metung lang pop ampong rock a grupu ibat London, England mitatag inyang 1970. Keraklan di Freddie Mercury (guitar,piano, bosis), John Deacon (bau guitara), Brian Harold May (guitara, bosis), ampong Roger Meddows Taylor (tambul, bosis. 

Putrajaya:
Ing Putrajaya metung yang lakanbalen a planadu ("planned city"), a maki dayung 25 km king mauli ning Kuala Lumpur, a magsilbing sentrung pangkapanibalan a pederal ning that serves as the ("federal administrative center") ning Malasya. Miyalis ya ing tungku ning kapamahalan ("seat of government") anyang 1999 manibat king Kuala Lumpur papunta king Putrajaya, uling masyadu neng siksakan ing Kuala Lumpur. Nanupata, ing Kuala Lumpur pa murin ing mumunang tungkung pambangsa ("national capital") ning Malaysia, uli ya ing tungku ning Ari ampo ning Parlamentu, ampo ing sentru ning negosyu o kalakal ampong pisalapyan ning bangsa. Ing Putrajaya bunga neng isip Tun Dr Mahathir Mohammad. Anyang 2001, megi neng katlung Putrajaya became Malaysia 's third Federal Territory Malaysia ing Putrajaya kaybat ning Kuala Lumpur ampo ning Labuan.
Pekilagyu de king mumunang Pun Ministru ning Malaysia, i Tunku Abdul Rahman Putra ing lakanbalen, a atyu king kilub ning Multimedia Super Corridor, kalele ning bayung alkus ("newly developed") muring Cyberjaya. King amanung Malay/Sanskritu, deng katayang "putra" o "putera" mangabaldugan lang "prinsipe" o "anak a lalaki" (ing "anak a babai" mayayaus yang "Putri" king Sanskritu), at ing "jaya" mangabaldugan yang "tagumpe" o "pamanyambut". Migumpisa ing pamanikdo ning Putrajaya anyang umpisa ning dekadang 1990, at ngeni, miyari no reng manimunang istruktura, at asahan deng dagul ing kayang populasyun.

Kuala Lumpur:
Ing Kuala Lumpur (), a nung misan kukuyad da king K.L., ing tungkung pederal ("federal capital") ampong lakanbalen a maki pekamaragul populasyun ("most populous city") king Malaysia. Maki lapad yang ing lakanbalen at tatantyan dang maki populasyun yang 1.6 milyun anyang 2012. Ing Greater Kuala Lumpur ("Greater Kuala Lumpur"), metung yang pamibuklud a urban a maki populasyun a 5.7 milyun anyang 2010. Metung ya kareng masikan diling dagul a labuad a metropolitan king bangsa, king populasyun ampong ekonomiya.

Changzhou:
Ing Changzhou () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king mauli nang dake ning lalawigan ning Jiangsu king Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Sadya ing lagyu na Yanling, Lanling, Jinling, ampong Wujin. Atyu king mauli nang pampang ning Ilug Yangtze ing Changzhou, a kalele ning tungkung panlalawigan ning ("provincial capital") ning Nanjing king albugan, Zhenjiang king pangulung albugan, Wuxi king aslagan, ampo ing lalawigan ning Zhejiang king mauli. Atyu ing lakanbalen king mabandi o makwaltang Yangtze Delta ning Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Dafeng:
Ing Dafeng (Chinese 大丰) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") a sakup ning Yancheng, a metung kareng labing atlung (13) lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king lalawigan ning Jiangsu. Atyu king Pangulung Kapatagang Jiangsu ing Dafeng, at maki bebe dayatmalat yang 112 km. King kayang kasalesayan, ing Dafeng ing metung kareng pekaragul a lugal a gagawang asin, at pikabaluan ne ngeni king kayang mayap pamandatila kalikasan ampo kareng dakal nang national conservation park. Atyu king lakanbalen ing pekamaragul national nature reserve para king malagad a uri ning usa, ing Père David's Deer o Milu (麋鹿) king Isik.
Dalerayan.
[http://www.jiangsu.net/city/city.php?name=dafeng]

Danyang, Jiangsu:
Ing Danyang (Simplified Chinese: 丹阳市; Traditional Chinese: 丹陽市; pinyin: Dānyáng Shì) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") a sakup ning Zhenjiang king lalawigan ning Jiangsu Province king Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Nanupata, atyu king pilatan ning Zhenjiang ampong Changzhou, at pareu ya daya kareng adwang deti, at mas malagwa yang dasan manibat king Changzhou kesa king Zhenjiang. 
Anyang Southern Dynasties, tubu reng balen ding dakal a pamilyang ari ning Southern Qi ampong Liang Dynasties. Uli na niti, milibing la keti deng emperador ampong prinsipi da reng pamilyang aring deti kareng mapanagaulang misnang penagaulang libingan. Ngeni, mas pikabaluan ya king pamangawang lenting para salamin ampong sunglass. 
Anyang 2012, mika bayu yang rutang tren ing Danyang, ing North Station (Bei Zhan), king Shanghai to Beijing high-speed railway line, anya malyari nang maglakbe manibat king Danyang angga king Istasyung Hongqiao ning Shanghai kilub na mu ning metung a oras ampong apulung minutu. Atin muring bayung istasyung tren para king byahi papunta king sentru ning lakanbalen. 
Maki pangkabilugan yang lapad a 1,059 km2 ing Danyang. Magsalita lang dayalektu ning Wu deng memalen ning Danyang, at atyu ing lakanbalen king angganan ning Wu ampo ning Jianghuai Mandarin.

Dongtai:
Ing Dongtai () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") a sakup ning Yancheng, pangulung dake ning lalawigan ning Jiangsu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Maki populasyun yang manga 1,170,000 anyang 2007. King pangkabilugan a populasyun a iti, manga 260,000 la reng manuknangan king Dongtai urban core, at makakalat la reng aliwa kareng adwang pulu't atlung (23) karulun a balen ("suburban towns") ampong rural a labuad. Kayabe la kareng pikabaluan a balen deng Touzao, Anfeng, Qingdong, Sancang, Qianggang, Fu'an, Tangyang, at aliwa pa.

Gaoyou:
Ing Gaoyou (, a mayayaus mu namang Qinyou (); "Qín post stop") metung yang makulturang lakanbalen a makasalesayan king libutad ning lalawigan ning Jiangsu, king Yangtze River Delta king pangulu nang dane ning Ilug Yangtze, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Anyang 2000, maki populasyun yang 830,000 a manuknangan king lapad a .

Haimen:
Ing Haimen (; Qihai dialect: , Shanghai: ) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king mauling aslagan nang dake ning lalawigan ning Jiangsu king Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king sumangid ning Ilug Yangtze king Shanghai. Ing Teteng Chonghai ing tutuglung king lakanbalen king Chongming Kondadu ("Chongming County"). Ing Haimen ing tungku ("seat") ning Catolicong ning Diosesis ning Haimen. E dapat pilibe ing lakanbalen king baryung makanyan murin lagyu king lalawigan ning Guangdong.

Indu ning Kapaldanan:
Ing Indu ning Kapaldanan, o Virgen de los Remedios king Castila, ing titulu ning Birhen Maria a inalkus ning Orden Trinitaria o Trinitarian Order, a mitátag anyang tauling dake ning kalabing-adwang dilanwa o siglu. Miugne ya ing debosyon king Reconquista ning Espanya, a mapali pa kanita. Anyang tutuking dilanwa, mikalat ya kareng aliwang dake ning Europa. Anyang miglakbe ya ing Espanya king Americas at sinakup kaniti, megi yang manimunang debosyon da reng Castilang conquistador. Metung ya pa muring maleparan a debosyon king Espanya. 
King Kapampangan.
Anyang banwang 1952, mag-alsa la reng ortelanu ning Pampanga king lalam da reng Huk, at sisikan ing sosyalismu ampong komunismu. Mikakalat ing kagulwan ampo ing aliwang ideolohiya king lalawigan a baluarti ning Pisambang Catolicu. 
King panaun a ita, tinalanga la reng Catolico ampo reng pekapun ning Pisamban king Indu ning Dios. Tetag ne ning bayung tátag a Obispo ning San Fernando, i Cesar Ma. Guerrero, ing Cruzada ning Pamanisi at Lugud, at bilalag neng Patrona ning Pampanga ing Indu ning Kapaldanan o Virgen de los Remedios. Indam ne ing imahe ning Birhen king Baliti, San Fernando, a opisyal a imahe ning Cruzada kareng prusisyun. 
Anyang, Setiembre 8, 1956, king plasa king arap ning kapitolyu, milyari ing Kanonikong Koronasyun ning Patrona ning Kapampangan, Ing Indu ning Kapaldanan. King arap da reng 70,000 Catolicu, pepasulud ne ning Apostolic Nuncio king Filipinas, i Most Rev. Egido Vagnozzi, kasaup ya i Gobernador Rafael Lazatin, king Birhen ing korona. Tinagun la reng mangatas katungkulan a Kapampangan antimo ri Arsobispu Pedro Santos, Senador Gil Puyat ampong Representate Diosdado Macapagal. 

Wilson Kipsang Kiprotich:
I Wilson Kipsang Kiprotich (mibait 15 Marzo 1982) atleta yang Kenyan a makatutuk king long-distance running, at makilaban kareng karerang manibat king 10 km paras king marathon. Sinambut yang medalyang tangsu king marathon king 2012 Summer Olympics. Ya ing kasalungsungang tatalan king record a pangyatu king marathon king oras a 2:03:23, a ikwa na king 2013 Berlin Marathon. Milayi neng 2 oras 5 minutu king marathon kareng apat a kawa-kawaning pamikatagun.
Mekatadwa ya sinambut i Kipsang king Frankfurt Marathon (2010 ampong 2011) at sinambut ne murin king London ampong Berlin Marathon. Ya ing tatalan king kalabing-adwang pekamasanting a oras para king distansyang half marathon (58:59 minutu).

Huai'an:
Ing Huai'an (), a mayayaus Huaiyin () anggang 2001, metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") king kalibudtang dake ning lalawigan ning Jiangsu king Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Kalele ne ing Lianyungang ampo ing Suqian king pangulu, ing Yancheng king pangulung aslagan, ing Yangzhou king mauling aslagan, ampo ing Nanjing ampong Chuzhou king mauling albugan.
Anyang 2010 census, maki populasyun yang 4,799,889 ing munisipalidad, nung nu deng 2,494,013 manuknangan la kareng apat a distritung urban.

Tom Clancy:
I Thomas Leo "Tom" Clancy, Jr. (Abril 12, 1947 – Octubre1, 2013) metung yang Americanung talasulat a pikabaluan dili uling kareng kayang teknikal a detalyadung kwentu kareng paksang pamag-ispiya ampong syensyang militar a makapanauan anyang malilyari ya at kayari ning Cold War, bukud kareng pyalung a video a magdala king lagyu na para king pamag-lisensya ampong promotion. Labingpitu kareng nobela ing best-seller, a maki 100 milyun a makalimbag. Metung ya muring marka ing kayang libru para kareng scripts pelikula a susulat da reng ghost writer ampo kareng dakal a seryeng librung e-piksyun kareng paksang militar ampo reng miyanib a talambye da reng manimunang pekapun. Ya ing Kadwang Talapamuntuk para kareng Aktibidad a Pang-komunidad ampong Pisasabyang Pangmalda ("Vice Chairman of Community Activities and Public Affairs"), ampong metung kareng makibandi king Baltimore Orioles.

Danielle Steel:
I Danielle Steel (mibait Agosto 14, 1947) metung yang Americanang nobelistang king salukuyan masaling diling talasulat librung mabye, at kapat a masaling diling talasulat libru king mabilug a panaun, a maki 800 milyung kopyang misali.
Makabasi ya king California king keraklan king kayang karera i Steel, pilang libru susulat kilub ning pabanwa, at neng kayi, agnan-agnan la reng limang proyektu. Bestseller la ngan deng kayang nobela, angga reng linwal a hardback. E la makaing dadayu king pormula deng kayang nobela, a maralas tungkul kareng mangakwaltang pamilang mamarap krisis, at maki panganib ibat king pangasukul, pamamirait, blackmail ampong pamagpakamate. Linimbag ne muring librung pang-anak ampong poesia i Steel, bukud king pamangalap pondu para king sakit king kaisipan. Milikas no kareng adwang pulu't walung (28) amanu, at adwang pulu't adwa la reng mibage para king telebisyon, kayabe la reng adwang mika nominasyun para king galal a Golden Globe.

Jeffrey Archer:
I Jeffrey Howard Archer, Baron Archer of Weston-super-Mare (mibait 15 Abril 1940) metung yang Ingles a talasulat libru ampong sadyang pulitiku. Bayu ya meging talasulat, metung yang Miembru ning Parlamentu (1969–74), oneng migdimitir ya uli ning iskandalu king pisalapyan nung nu alus mengalugi ya. Kaybat, migbaligtad ing kayang kalma uling kareng royalty da reng kayang best-selling a nobela, at megi yang kadwang talapamuntuk ("deputy chairman") ning Conservative Party (1985–86) bayu ya migdimitir kaybat ning metung pang iskandalu, a meging sangkan ning pangayari ning kayang karera antimong miyalal a opisyal. Melalang yang life peer anyang 1992. Miyari ing kayang karerang pampulitika king kayang pangasakdal ampong pangasukul (2001–03) para king perjury ampong pamanyabat king hustisya ("perverting the course of justice"), a merapat katuki ning kayang kadwang pamagdimitir. Maygit nang 250 milyung kopya da reng kayang libru ing mipisali king mabilug a yatu.

Ban Ki-moon:
I Ban Ki-moon (; mibait 13 Junio 1944) ing kawalu ampong kasalungsungang Pangkabilugang Kalihim ning Misasanmetung a Bangsa, kaybat neng elilan i Kofi Annan anyang 2007. Bayu ya meging Pangkabilugang Kalihim, metung yang kareristang diplomatikung king Ministeriu ning Pisasabyang Panglwal ampo king Misasanmetung a Bangsa. Linub ya king serbisyung diplomatiku anyang banwang miyari ya king unibersidad, at tinggap ne ing mumuna nang puestu king New Delhi, India. King ministeryung panglwal, miglakwan yang reputasyun ning kababan lub ampong beluan king obra.

Misasanmetung a Bangsa:
Ing Misasanmetung a Bangsa (UN; French: "Organisation des Nations Unies", "ONU") o United Nations king Ingles, metung yang aguman da reng bangsa, nung nu kayabe kareng kayang makasulat a parasan ing pamipasulung king pamisaup-saup king leying internasyunal ("international law"), seguridad a internasyunal ("international security"), panyulung a ekonomiku ("economic development"), panyulung a pangketawan ("social progress"), katulirang pantau ("human rights"), katulirang sibil ("civil rights"), katimawang sibil ("katimawang pampulitika"), demokrasya ("democracy"), ampo ing pangmalwatan a karatunang pangyatu ("world peace"). Mitátag ya ing Misasanmetung a Bangsa anyang 1945 kaybat ning Kadwang Gerang Pangyatu ba yang alilan ing after World War II to replace the Liga ding Bangsa ("League of Nations"), bang mayari ing gera da reng bangsa, at bang magsilbing plataporma ning pamisabi-sabi. Dakal ya susuportang aguman o organisasyun ba lang papalyari deng kayang misyon.

Jiangyin:
Ing Jiangyin (; Jiangyin dialect: ) metung yang lakanbalen king lalawigan ning Jiangsu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king king Ilug Yangtze at panibalan ne ning Wuxi. Maki populasyun yang 1.2 milyun anyang 2009. Ing Jiangyin ing metung kareng pekamaulagang sentru ning palimpatan o transportasyun king Ilug Yangtze. King aslagan ning lakanbalen atyu ing Huaxi Village, ing pekamakwalta kanung nayun king Tsina.

Jingjiang:
Ing Jingjiang (Chinese: 靖江; pinyin: Jìngjiāng) metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") king lalawigan ning Jiangsu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina. Atyu king pangulu nang pampang ning Ilug Yangtze. Sadya neng sakup ning lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ("prefecture-level city") ning Yangzhou ing Jingjiang, oneng miyalis ya king lakanbalen a kadaneng prefecture ning Taizhou anyang 1996. Maki lapad yang 673 kilometru kuadradu.

Jintan:
Ing Jintan () metung yang lakanbalen a kadaneng kondadu ("county-level city") kilub ning Changzhou king lalawigan ning Jiangsu, Maldang Republika ning Tsina.

Steven Spielberg:
I Steven Allan Spielberg (mibait Diciembre 18, 1946) metung yang Americanung direktor pelikula, talasulat senaryo, prodyuser, ampong maragul a negosyanti. King kayang karerang maygit apat a dekada, dakal na la asaklong tema ampong uri ning pelikula deng kayang obra. Deng minuna nang pelikulang science-fiction ampong adventure tuturing dong menimuna kareng modernung Hollywood blockbuster. Kareng mas tauling banwa, linub ya kareng isyung anti king Holocaust, ing kalakal kareng lipat ning Atlanticu ("transatlantic slave trade"), gera, ampong terorismu. TUturing deng metung kareng pekasikat ampong pekamaimpluwensyang gagawang pelikula king amlat ning pelikula. Metung ya murin kareng mitátag king DreamWorks movie studio.
Simbut neng Spielberg ing Academy Award for Best Director para king "Schindler's List" (1993) ampong "Saving Private Ryan" (1998). Deng atlu kareng pelikula nang Spielberg films—"Jaws" (1975), "E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial" (1982), ampong "Jurassic Park" (1993)—menikwa lang box office record, at balang metung meging pekaragaul penakitan anyang panaun a ita. Ngeni, ing e milikas o mekumberting pangkabilugan a penakitan da reng anggang pelikulang dinirek nang Spielberg, maygit king $8.5 bilyun king mabilug a yatu. Tatantyan ne ning Forbes ing alaga ning bandi nang Spielberg a $3.2 bilyun.

George Lucas:
I George Walton Lucas, Jr. (mibait Mayo 14, 1944) metung yang Americanung prodyuser pelikula, talasulat senaryo, direktor ampong negosyanti. Tetag ne ing Lucasfilm Limited at penibalan ne ing kumpanya antimong talapamuntuk and led the company as ("chairman") ampong pekapun a ehekutibu ("chief executive") bayu ne pisali iti king The Walt Disney Company anyang Octubre 30, 2012. Pikabaluan yang dili antimong miglalang king prangkisang space operang "Star Wars" ampo ing tauan a archaeologist adventurer a i Indiana Jones. I Lucas ing metung kareng pekamatagumpe king pisalapyan a gagawang pelikulang Americanu.

Venus Williams:
I Venus Ebony Starr Williams (mibait Junio 17, 1980) metung yang Americanang propesyonal a mamyalung tennis a sadyang Pangyatung pekamatas ranggu at king salukuyan maki ranggung Pangyatung No. 36 king singles anyang Julio 29, 2013. Mekatatlu ya mikaranggung Pangyatung No. 1 king singles king Women's Tennis Association kareng atlung mikakawaning pamitagun. Megi yang Pangyatung No. 1 king mumunang pamitagun anyang Febrero 25, 2002, at anyang milyari ita, ya ing meging mumunang matuling a babaing manikwa king dangalan a iti king Open Era. Sasabyan dang ya ing minalili king pamamyalung da reng babai at migdalang pamagbayung panaun king propesyonal a tour a pambabai, a maki upaya ampong atletisismu. Ya ing tuturing dang byasang diling mamyalung king dikut king kayang henerasyun, at metung kareng pangkabang panaun a mapya king tennis da reng bábai.

Eminem:
I Marshall Bruce Mathers III (mibait Octubre 17, 1972), a mas kilala king kayang talipampan a Eminem ampo ing kayang alter egong Slim Shady, Americany yang rapper, record producer, talasulat kanta ampong artista. Bukud king kayang solung karera, kayanib ya i Eminem king kayang grupung D12, ampong kapitna king hip hop duong Bad Meets Evil, kayabe ya i Royce da 5'9". I Eminem ing metung kareng best-selling a musikeru at ya ing masaling diling musikeru ning 2000s. Milista neng metung kareng mapyang diling artist king kabilugan ning panaun deng dakal a magasin, kayabe ya ing "Rolling Stone" a migbili kaya king ka-82 king listaan nang The 100 Greatest Artists of All Time. Inaus ne muring The King of Hip Hop ning magasin a iti. Nung iyabe ya ing obra na kayabe ya ing D12 ampo ing Bad Meets Evil, Eminem menikwa neng apulung number-one album king "Billboard" 200. Antimong solung musikeru, mekapisali neng maygit 100 milyung album king mabilug a yatu. King Estados Unidos, mekapisali neng 49.1 milyung album ampong 42 milyung track.

Jay-Z:
I Shawn Corey Carter (mibait Diciembre 4, 1969), a mas kilala king kayang talipampan a Jay-Z (a neng kayi misusulat a JAY Z), metung yang rapper, record producer, ampong negosyanti. Metung ya kareng pekamatagumpeng hip-hop artist ampong negosyanti king pisalapyan king America. Anyang 2012, tinantya ne ning "Forbes" ing pibandyan nang Carter a alus $500 million. Mekapisali neng manga 50 milyung album king mabilug a yatu, at tinanggap 17 Grammy Award para king kayang obra king musika, bukud kareng dakal a nominasyun. E mamako king listaan da reng pekamapyang rapper king king kabilugan ning panaun, at tinuring ne ning MTVng mumuna king karelang listaan a "The Greatest MCs of All-Time" anyang 2006. Mituring lang kayabe deng atlu kareng kayang album, "Reasonable Doubt" (1996), "The Blueprint" (2001), ampong "The Black Album" (2003), kareng makabaldugan dili king uri ning musikang iti, at mibili la king listaan ning "Rolling Stone" a 500 greatest albums of all time.

Beyoncé Knowles:
I Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter, ausan de mung Beyoncé ( ; mibait Setiembre 4, 1981), metung yang Americanang magkanta, talasulat kanta ampong artista. Mibait ya ampong meragul king Houston, Texas, at mekyabe ya kareng miyayaliwang ligligan king pamagkanta ampong pamanerak anyang anak ya, at sinikat ya anyang tauling dake ning dekadang 1990 antimong manimunang magkanta as ("lead singer") ning R&B girl-group a Destiny's Child. Panibalan ne ning tata na, i Mathew Knowles ing grupu, a meging metung kareng masaling diling grupung babai king kabilugan ning panaun. Anyang pepaynawa la, linwal ya ing mumuna nang album Knowles a "Dangerously in Love" (2003), a migpaltong ing magkanta malyari yang mibulalag king mabilug a yatu ; mipisali la reng 11 milyung kopya, menikwa yang limang Grammy Award, at kayabe no reng "Billboard" number one single a "Crazy in Love" ampong "Baby Boy".

Alvin Toffler:
I Alvin Toffler (mibait October 4, 1928) metung yang Americanung talasulat ampong futurist, a pikabaluan kareng kayang obrang dikil king digital revolution, rebolusyon king komunikasyun ampong technological singularity.
I Toffler sadya yang kadwang talapatuntun ("former associate editor") ning magasin a "Fortune". Kareng mumuna nang obra, makatutuk ya king teknolohiya ampo reng kayang epektu antimo ing information overload. Minalis ya king pamanyuri king reaksyon kareng pamagbayu king ketawan o sosiedad ("changes in society"). Ing mas tauli nang obra, tungkul king daragul a upaya da reng kasangkapang militar ning ka-21ng dilanwa ("increasing power of 21st-century military hardware"), ing pamikalat da reng bayung teknolohiya, ampo ing kapitalismu.
Bibliography.
Sinulat nong Alvin Toffler deng libru na kayabe ya ing kayang asawa, i Heidi. Kayabe la kareng pikabaluan dang obra deng makatuki:

Susan Sarandon:
I Susan Abigail Sarandon (mibait a Tomalin; mibait Octubre 4, 1946) metung yang Americanang artista. Megobra ne kareng pelikula ampong telebisyon manibat 1969, at sinambut yang Academy Award for Best Actress para king lage na king pelikulang "Dead Man Walking" anyang 1995. Menikwa ne muring nominasyun para king gagal para kareng apat a pelikula bayu ita at mekatanggap neng aliwa pang pamangilala king kayang obra. Pikabaluan ya king kayang aktibismung pangketawan o sosyal ampong pampulitika kareng miyayaliwang sangkan a liberal.

Alicia Silverstone:
I Alicia Silverstone (; mibait Octubre 4, 1976) metung yang Americanang artista, prodyuser da reng pelikula ampong telebisyon, talasulat libru ampong aktibista para king katulirang animal rights ("animal rights") ampong pang-kapatulugan ("environmental"). Minuna yang linage kareng pelikula i Silverstone king "The Crush", at uli na niti, sinambut yang 1994 MTV Movie Award for Best Breakthrough Performance, at lalu ya pang sinikat antimong teen idol anyang linage ya kareng atlung music video ning bandang Aerosmith. Ya ing bida king 1995 sleeper hit a "Clueless" (at uli na niti menikwa yang kontratang multi-million-dollar king Columbia) at king matas budget a pelikula anyang 1997 a "Batman & Robin" nung nu ya linageng Batgirl. Lalage ya pa murin king pelikula, telebisyon ampong teatro.
Metung yang vegan i Silverstone, a susuporta kareng aktibidad ning PETA, at milimbag yang librung maki pamagat a "The Kind Diet."

David Beckham:
I David Robert Joseph Beckham , OBE (mibait 2 Mayo 1975) metung yang Ingles a sadyang mamyalung football. Memyalung ya para king Manchester United, Preston North End, Real Madrid, Milan, Los Angeles Galaxy, Paris Saint-Germain, ampong England national team nung nu atin yang "appearance record" para king outfield player. Ya ing mumunang mamyalung a Ingles a sinambut titulu king liga para kareng apat a bangsa. Pepabalu na ing kayang balak a magretiru kayari ning 2012–13 Ligue 1 season kanitang 16 May 2013 at, anyang Mayo 18, 2013, memyalung ya king tawli nang pyalung ning kayang makasalesayang karerang adwang pulung (20).

Indu ning Alang Anggang Saup:
Ing Indu ning Alang Anggang Saup (), a Our Mother of Perpetual Help, Our Lady of Perpetual Help, o Our Lady of Perpetual Succour) king Ingles, metung yang Catolicung titulung binye nang Papa Pio IX. Makaugne ya king pikabaluan a imaheng Bizantinong pareu lagyung ibat kanitang ka-15ng dilanwa o siglu.
Atyu ne king Roma manibat anyang 1499, at permanenti yang makabili king pisamban nang Sant'Alfonso di Liguori king Talimunduk a Esquiline . King Pisambang Aslagang Orthodox, ing aus da king imaheng iti, "Virgin of the Passion" o "Theotokos of the Passion" uling kareng arkanghel a makapadurut king imahe. 

Vo Nguyen Giap:
I Võ Nguyên Giáp (25 Agosto 1911 – 4 Octubre 2013) metung yang Heneral ning Vietnam People's Army ampong pulitiku. Metung yang manimunang kumander i Giáp kareng adwang gera: ing Mumunang Gerang Indochina (1946–1954) ampo ing Vietnam War (1960–1975). Mikyabe ya kareng adwang gerang makabaldugan king kasalesayan: Lạng Sơn (1950); Hòa Bình (1951–1952); Điện Biên Phủ (1954); ing Tết Offensive (1968); ing Easter Offensive (1972); ampo ing tawling Kampanyang Hồ Chí Minh (1975).
Metung ya ring peryodista ampong ministrung panglub ("interior minister") king kapamahalan nang Pamuntuk Ho Chi Minh a Việt Minh i Giáp , kumander neng pang-militar ning Việt Minh, kumander ning Vietnam People's Army (PAVN), ampong ministru ning pamamingwa o depensa ("defense minister"). Sinuyu ya murin antimong kayanib ning Politburo ning Partidung Talapagobra ning Vietnam ("Vietnam Workers' Party"), a anyang 1976 meging Partidu Komunista ning Vietnam ("Communist Party of Vietnam").
Ya ing pikabaluan diling kumander a militar bukud kang Ho Chi Minh anyang Gerang Vietnam, at ya ing maki kapakibatan kareng manimunang operasyun ampong pamanibala anggang miyari ing gera.

Lampedusa:
Ing Lampedusa (; ; Ancient Greek "Lopadoussa", Λοπαδούσσα) ing pekamaragul a isla king Kapuluan a Pelagie ning Italia king Mediterraneo Dayat Malat. Kayabe ya ing comune ning Lampedusa e Linosa king lalawigan ning Agrigento king Sicily, a sasakup murin kareng mas malating isla ning Linosa ampong Lampione. Iti ing pekamauling dake ning Italia. Ing Tunisia, a manibat keti, ing pekamalapit a labuad kareng isla. Mas marayu ya ing Sicily, a maki distansyang .

Boko Haram:
Ing Pamitipun ding Malda ning Tradisyun para king Pamangumberti ampo king Jihad () o king Ingles, Congregation of the People of Tradition for Proselytism and Jihad — a mas kilala king kayang lagyu nang Hausang Boko Haram (, Makasalanan" ing pamagaral a pang-"Albugan Western education is sinful" o king Ingles, "Western education is sinful" — metung yang Muslim a aguman a militanting jihadist a makabasi king pangulu aslagang Nigeria, pangulung Cameroon ampong Niger. Tetag neng Mohammed Yusuf anyang 2001 ing aguman o organisasyun, a maki kapagnasan a mitikdong "tibubus" o "puru"ng estadung Muslim o Islamicung nung nu ing makababo ya pin ing leying sharia ("sharia law"), ampong tuknangan ing tuturing nang pamanalis king Albugan o "Westernization." Pikabaluan ya ing grupu king kayang pamanataki kareng Cristianu ampo king kapamahalan, pamamomba kareng pisamban, pamanataki kareng eskwela ampong istasyun pulis, oneng makamate ya mu naman kareng kayanib ning kapanibalan o establesimyentung Muslim o Islamicu. Uling kareng insidenting bayolenting maki kaugnayan king Boko Haram, tatantyan dang manga 10,000 no reng mete pilatan ning 2001 ampong 2013 ampong manga 3,600 a mete, kayabe la reng 1,600 sibilyan pilatan ning 2009 ampong 2013. 

Tripoli:
Ing Tripoli ( ) ing is the capital city ("capital city") ampong pekamaragul a lakanbalen ning Libya. Anyang 2011, ing dake nang metropolitanu ning Tripoli (lugal ning distritu) maki populasyun yang 2.2 milyung katau. Atyu ing lakanbalen king pangulung albugang dake ning Libya king sepu ning desyertu, king karinan ning gabung mabatung padurutan ning Mediterranean at bibilug o popormang lauk ("bay").

Gujba:
Ing Gujba metung yang Local Government Area king Yobe Estadu, Nigeria. Atyu ing kayang pun tanggapan ("headquarters") king balen ning Buni Yadi king papunta king mauli ning lugal; atyu ing kalagyu nang balen a Gujba king pangulu ning lugal.

Ovadia Yosef:
I Rabbi Ovadia Yosef, () a mibait a Abdullah Youssef king kayang sariling amanu, () (1918 o Setiembre 23, 1920 – Octubre 7, 2013) ing sadwang Pekapun a Rabbi ning Israel ("Chief Rabbi of Israel"), metung a kikilalanan a iskolar ning Talmud ampong manimunang autoridad king leying Hudyo.
Migsilbi yang pekapun a ispiritual ning partido politikal a Shas king Parlamentung Israeli. Matas ing paglalawe king kayang halakhic a responsa kareng grupung Hudyong Orthodox, at tuturing dong maki tauling upaya ("binding") kareng komunidad a Mizrahi, a ing paglalawe kaya, a ing paglalawe kaya kanitang mabye ya, "ing pekamaulagang autoridad a halachic a mabye." ("the most important living halachic authority.)"

Shas:
Ing Shas (, metung a acronym para king "Shomrei Sfarad", lit. "Bante nang Sfarad (ning Torah)") metung yang ultra-orthodox a partidu pulitikal a relihyosu king Israel. Mitátag ya kanitang 1984 king lalam ning pamanibala nang Rabbi Ovadia Yosef, a sadyang Sephardic a pekapun a rabbi ("Sephardi chief rabbi"), a menatiling ispiritual nang pekapun angga king kayang kamatayan anyang Octubre 2013. Keraklan, magsilbi yang pekakatawan no reng relihyosung Hudyung Sephardic ampong Mizrahi.
Anyang mumuna, malati yang grupung pulitikal a makabasi king lahi o kabilyan a etniku, ing Shas, a king salukuyan yang kapat a pekamaragul a partidu king Knesset o Parlamentu ning Israel, at, agpang king "The Jewish Daily Forward", "the unchallenged kingmaker of Israeli politics". Manibat kanitang 1984, pane yang kayabe king manibalang koalisyon, ing Labor man o ing Likud ing makalukluk a partidu. King salukuyun, 2013, atilu king oposisyun deng kayanib ning Shas, kayabe ya ing Labor uling king e pamikasundu kareng aliwang partidung maka-wanan king koalisyon nang Netanyahu tungkul king pamag-serbisyu da reng ultra-Orthodox king militar.

Radio Studio 54 Network:
Ing '"Radio Studio 54 Network" istasyun yang radyu king Locri, Italia.
