Tukud banwa (Araceae):
Ing tukud banwa ("Amorphophallus paeoniifolius"), a awsan dang elephant foot yam, whitespot giant arum [http://www.itis.gov/servlet/SingleRpt/SingleRpt?search_topic=TSN&search_value=506752][http://plants.usda.gov/java/profile?symbol=AMPA13] o stink lily king Ingles ampong pungapung king Tagalug, metung yang tanaman a pang-tropiko o klimang malisangan. Kakanan de yamut at gagawan dang gule kareng bangsang tropiku, at metung yang "cash crop" o maragul panakitan a tanam uli ning masikan nang gamit king produksyon ampong pamangamit antimong gule kareng miyayaliwang lutu. 
Menibat ya ing tukud banwa king Mauli-aslagang Asia, nung nu re tatanam. Tutubu yang dili na king Sri Lanka, Philippines, Malaysia, Indonesia, ampo reng aliwang bangsa ning Mauli-aslagang Asia. King India, tatanam de keraklan king West Bengal, Kerala, Andhra Pradesh, Maharashtra ampong Orissa. King India, awsan deng "suran" o "jimikand" king Hindi, "senai kizhangu" king Tamil, "suvarna gedde" king Kannada, "ol" king Bengali, "chena" (ചേന) king Malayalam, "oluo" king Oriya, ampong "kanda gadda" king Telugu.
Nanupata, king Tonga, ing teve pekamababang uri ning pamangan, a kakanan da mu nong ala nang aliwa. 

Tukud banwa (Ophiogossaceae):
Ing tukud banwa ("Helminthostachys zeylanica") metung yang tanaman king gabun a yerba, ampong lupang pakû king mauli aslagang Asia ampong Australia. Anti kareng aliwang kayabe king kayang familia, atin yang kumpul-kumpul a sporangium kareng tangke da reng bulung a anting mala-ngungut. 
Gagapang ya king lalam gabun ing kayang rhizome na niting tanaman a banuahan, at mataba ya. Malyari yang mika metung a bulung a malangungut (frond) o mapilan kareti. Katabas lang tandus ("lanceolate") a gilit-gilitan deng kayang bulung, laganas o kareng pilang dake. 

Nagorno-Karabakh:

Amanung Asturyanu:
Ing Amanung Asturyanu ("asturianu, bable") metung ya kareng pamyalita king Espanya.

Amanung Estremenyu:
Ing Amanung Estremenyu ("estremeñu") metung ya kareng pamyalita king Espanya.

Ing Amanung Aragones ("aragonés") metung ya kareng pamyalita king Espanya.

Galiegu:
Ing Galiegu ("galego") metung ya kareng pamyalita king Espanya. Metung iting dialektu na ning Portuges.

Amanung Basku:
Ing Amanung Basku ("euskera, euskara, eusquera, vascuence, vasco, éuscaro o vascongado"), Euskaru, Baskuwensi o Baskonggadu ("Basque" king Ingles), metung ya kareng pamyalita king Espanya.

Amanung Griyegu:
Ing Amanung Griyegu o Griegu (ελληνικά, "elliniká", "Griyegu"; ελληνική γλώσσα, "ellinikí glóssa", "Amanung Griyegu") metung yang pamyalita king Gresya.

Song Jae-rim:
I Song Jae-rim (Hangul: 송재림) metung yang artista king Mauling Korea.

Amanung Katalan:
Ing amánung Katalan ("català") metung ya karing pamialítâ king Espania, Fransia at Italia.

Amanung Pranses:
Ing Amanung Pranses ("français"; French king Ingles at Francés king Espanyol) metung yang pamyalitang Romanse.

Amanung Italyanu:
Ing Amanung Italyanu atu Italianu ("Italiano") pambangsang amanu ning Italya.

Dikut-maria:
Ing dikut-maria("Artemisia vulgaris") metung ya kareng mapilang species king genus "Artemisia". Ausan deng felon herb, chrysanthemum weed, wild wormwood, old Uncle Henry, sailor's tobacco, naughty man, old man o St. John's plant king Inglis. Gagamitan de anitmong tanaman a panulu ampo king pamaglutu.

Aspeaspe:
Ing aspeaspe ("Sansevieria zeylanica") metung yang tanaman king genus "Sansevieria" ampo king familiang Asparagaceae. Ing lagyu ning species a "zeylanica" ibat ya king Ceylon, a sadya nang lagyu ning Sri Lanka.

Kupang:
Ing Kupang ("Parkia javanica" Lam., syn. "Parkia roxburghii" G. Don.) metung yang tanaman king genus "Parkia" a kayanib king familia Fabaceae.
Maulaga yang tanaman a panulu king Indonesia, at keraklan ing butul yang gagamitan. Bukud kaniti, gagamitan da la munaman deng kayang balat dutung ("bark"), bulung, ampong yamut. Ing didinan dang diling ulagang gamit na yapin ing kayang panga matalab king pamangontra kareng bacteria, at magagamit ya king tradicional a pamanulu para kareng infeccion ampo king sakit king atian. 

D.O.:
I Do Kyung-soo (Hangul: 도경수; mibait ), mas mekilala ya bilang D.O. metung yang talakanta at artista king Mauling Korea.

Eric Nam:
I Nam Yoon-do (mibait Nobyembri 17, 1988 king Atlanta, Georgia), mas mekilala ya bilang Eric Nam, metung yang talakanta king Mauling Korea.

Ing Amanung Atayal ("Tayal") metung ya kareng pamyalita king Taiwan.

Amanung Kanakanabu:
Ing Amanung Kanakanabu o Kanakanavu metung ya kareng pamyalita king Taiwan.

Amanung Saaroa:
Ing Amanung Saaroa o Hla'alua metung ya kareng pamyalita king Taiwan.

Amanung Yami:
Ing Amanung Yami o Tao ("Cizingcizing/Ciringciring No Tao") metung ya kareng pamyalita king Taiwan.

Amanung Puyuma:
Ing Amanung Puyuma o Pinuyumayan metung ya kareng pamyalita king Taiwan.

Carlos López García-Picos:
I Carlos López García-Picos (19 Oktubri 1922 – 23 Disyembri 2009), metung yang kompositor a ibat Espanya.

JB:
I Im Jae-bum (Hangul: 임재범, Hanja: 林在範), o king kayang palayong JB, metung yang talakanta king Mauling Korea.

Jr.:
I Park Jin-young (Hangul: 박진영, Hanja: 朴珍榮), o king kayang palayong Jr., metung yang talakanta king Mauling Korea. Metung yang miyembru ning GOT7.

Amanung Ajië:
Ing Amanung Ajië ("Houailou", "Wailu", "Wai", and "A’jie") metung ya kareng pamyalita king Bayung Kaledonya.

Amanung Arhâ:
Ing Amanung Arhâ metung ya kareng pamyalita king Bayung Kaledonya.

Amanung Cebuanu:
Ing Amanung Cebuanu ("Cebuano", "Sebwanu", "Bisaya", "Sugbuanon", "Sinugbuanon", "Sinugbuanong Bisaya"), metung ya kareng pamyalita king Pilipinas. Sásálítâ ya bílang amánung sísuan ning pekaragul a porsentáhi da ring táu king bangsâ, kayábe ding e Sebuánu king Kabisayan (i.e., ding Boolánu, ding Negrensi) at Mindano (e.g., ding Bikolánu, ding Kapampángan).

Amanung Waray:
Ing Amanung Waray o Ware ("Waray-Waray", "Waraynon", "Samarenyo", "Samarenyu"), metung ya kareng pamyalita king Pilipinas.

Amanung Tagalug:
Ing amanung Tagalug ("wikang Tagalog") metung ya kareng pamyalita king Pilipinas.

Amanung Remun:
Ing Amanung Remun ("Milikin") metung ya kareng pamyalita king Borneo.

Amanung Tagol:
Ing Amanung Tagol-Murut o Tagal-Murut metung ya kareng pamyalita king Borneo.

Tangan-tangan:
Ing tangan-tangan ("Ricinus communis"), a castor oil plant king Ingles, metung yang species ning tanaman a manyampaga king familiang Euphorbiaceae. Ya kabud a species king genus, Ricinus, ampo king subtribe Ricininae. 
Katutubu ya ing tangan-tangan king mauli-aslagang Mediterranean Basin, Aslagang Africa, ampong India, oneng maleparan ing lugal nung nu ya mayayakit kareng labuad a malisangan o tropical, at tatanam de kareng aliwang lugal antimong tanaman a ornamental.
Ing tangan-tangan ing panibatan ning castor oil, a dakal a gamit . Maki manibat 40% ampong 60% yang laru ing butul, a dakal triglycerides, keraklan ricinolein. Atin ya muring ricin ing butul, metung a lasun a malalaso king danum, a mayayakit murin dapot mas ditak kareng aliwang dake ning tanaman.

Joker P. Arroyo:
I Joker Paz Arroyo (Enero 5, 1927 - Octubre 5, 2015) metung yang Filipinong talapanibala ampong manimunang tauan king EDSA People Power Revolution ning 1986 a miglako kang Ferdinand Marcos antimong pamuntuk. Migsilbi yang pekakatawan o congresista para king Makati manibat 1992 anggang 2001 ampong Senador manibat 2001 anggang 2013. Dakal ya tinggap a galal i Arroyo para king makabaldugan nang ambag king propesiong legal ampo king pamanyuyu king malda received various awards and commendations for his significant contributions to the law profession and ("public service"). Kayabe ya kareti ing Most Distinguished Award for Justice ning Philippine Bar Association "alang panginuan nune ing kayang bangsa" (“man beholden to no one except to his country”), ampo ing Senate Resolution No. 100 a mipasar anyang kawalung Congreso a pupuri kaya para kareng maulaga nang suyu o servicio king maldang Filipino.

Mulhacén:
Ing Mulhacén () ing pekamatas a bunduk king Espanya.

Dominic Ho:
I Dominic Ho (何浩文, Ho Hou Man) metung yang artista, modelu ampon talakanta king Hong Kong.

Chiu King Ho:
I King Chiu King Ho (趙勁皓, Chiu King Ho), metung yang artista ampo modelu king Hong Kong.

Mansanilia:
Ing mansanilia ("Anthemis") metung yang genus da reng tanaman a manyampaga king familia Asteraceae, a malapit a kamaganak ning "Chamaemelum". Katutubu ya king labuad Mediterranean region ampong mauli albugang Asia pa-aslagan king Iran. Deng aliwang species, mibage no king Gran Britania ampo reng aliwang dake ning yatu.
Deng "Anthemis" kakanan do reng ulad a larvae deng mapilang species ning Lepidoptera, antimo ing "Orthonama obstipata" (The Gem) ampong "Bucculatrix anthemidella" .

Barbie Hsu:
I Barbie Hsu (Tsinu: 徐熙媛, Pinyin: Xú Xīyuán, mibait Oktubri 6, 1976 king Taipei, Taiwan) metung yang artista ampong talakanta king Taiwan.

Mickael Carreira:
I Mickael Carreira (mibait Abril 3, 1986 king Douran, Pransya), king lagyung artistikung Mickael Antunes, metung yang kompositor ampong talakanta king Portugal.

Seventeen (banda):

After School:
Ing AFTERSCHOOL (Hangul: 애프터스쿨) metung yang banda da reng babaying talakanta king Mauling Korea.

Ricky Martin:

Ariana Grande:

Kuomintang:
Ang Kuomintang ning Tsina ( or ; Akronimu: KMT; Tsinu: 中國國民黨, Pinyin: "Zhōngguó Guómín Dǎng"), iya pin ing partidu politikal na ning Republika ning Tsina (Taiwan).

Jo Jung-suk:
I Jo Jung-suk (Hangul: 조정석; mibait Disiembri 26, 1980), metung yang artista ampo modelu king Mauling Korea. Mas mekilala ya kareng papel na king You're the Best, Lee Soon-shin at Oh My Ghostess.

Pangbangsang Awtoridad a Palestinu:
Ing Pangbangsang Awtoridad a Palestinu (PA or PNA; "", "Palestinian National Authority") mitatag ya bang mamunu king "Gaza Strip" ampong lugal A at B ning "West Bank", agpang king Akwerdus ning Oslu anyang 1993.

Syngman Rhee:

Amanung Yakan:

Sam Tsui:

Amanung Kankanaey:
Ing Amanung Kankanaey (Kankana-ey; Kankanay o Kankanai king Sagada), metung ya kareng pamyalita king Cordillera, Pangulung Luzon, Pilipinas.

Amanung Danes:
Ing Amanung Danes ("Dansk", paminagkas 
] ; Ingles: "Danish") metung ya kareng pamyalita king Europa.

Karayatmalatan:
Ing Karayatmalatan (Ingles: "Ocean", Tagalug: "Karagatan"), o Kadayatmalatan, metung yang katáwan ning danum king yatu. Ating limang karayatmalatan: Pasipiku ("Pacific"), Atlantiku ("Atlantic"), Indiku ("Indian"), Kemaulian ("Southern") at Artiku ("Arctic").

Amanung Portuges:
Ing Amanung Portuges ("português"; "lingua portuguesa"; "Portuguese") metung ya kareng pamyalita king Europa.

Carly Rae Jepsen:
I Carly Rae Jepsen (mibait Nobyembri 21, 1985 king Mission, British Columbia) metung yang talakanta ampong kompositora king Kanada.

Momoko Kōchi:
I (Marsu 7, 1932-Nobiembri 5, 1998) metung yang artista ning Hapon.

Pinanari:
Ing pinanari o pinangari (Ingles: "Rainbow", Tagalug: "Bahaghari", "bahagsubay" o "balangaw"), metung yang penomenung mayakit king banwa kaibat ning uran. Atin yang pitung kulul patse mebuo ya: malutu, kulyawan, mapapas, aluntiang, iro, tayum at malaubi.

Kulyawan:
Ing kulyawan, kuliawan o culiauan (Ingles: "orange", Tagalug: "kahel", "narangha") metung yang tinduk ning kulul o kule (diwa).

Kim Tae-hee:
I Kim Tae-hee (Hangul: 김태희) metung yang artista ampo modelu king Mauling Korea. Mekilala ya kareng papel na kareng palwal a "Stairway to Heaven", "Love Story in Harvard", "Iris", "My Princess", "Jang Ok-jung, Living by Love" at "Yong-pal".

Takahiro Moriuchi:
I (mibait Abril 17, 1988 king Tokyo), kebaluan ya king lagyung Taka metung yang bokalista ning ONE OK ROCK king Hapon.

Pia Wurtzbach:

Azpilkueta:
Ing Azpilkueta o Azpilcueta metung yang lugal king Navarra king Espanya.

Masahiro Higashide:
I Masahiro Higashide (東出 昌大 "Higashide Masahiro", mibait Pebreru 1, 1988 king Prepektura ning Saitama, Hapon) metung yang artista ampong modelu king Hapon.

Maine Mendoza:
Nicomaine Dei Capili Mendoza, mas mekilala yang Maine Mendoza o Yaya Dub, metung yang artista, komedianti, product endorser, talakanta at talaterak king Filipinas.

Amanung Korsu:
Ing amanung Korsu ("corsu", "lingua corsa"; "Corsican" king Ingles) metung ya kareng pamyalita ning Korsega (Italya) king Europa.

Jodi Sta. Maria:
I Jodi Chrissie Garcia Santamaria (mibait Hunyu 16, 1982), kebalwan ya king lagyung Jodi Sta. Maria ("Jodi Santamaria", "Jodie Santamaria" at "Jodi Santa Maria") metung yang artista king Pilipinas.

Kenny Kwan:
I Kenny Kwan Chi-Bun (mibait Disyembri 30, 1980) metung yang talakanta, artista, ampong modelu king Hong Kong. Mibait ya king Pilipinas peru meragul ya karin Hong Kong.

Vince Lee:
I Vince Lee (ipinanganak Oktubre 22, 1985 king Hsinchu) metung yang modelu king Taiwan king lalam ning EeLin.
Anyang ka-17 ning Oktubri 2010, 5 aldo bayu ya ing keyang ka-25 kayaldawan, mete ya king sakit a kanser king ate.

Alba Ribas:
I Alba Ribas Benaiges (ipinanganak Enero 05, 1988), kebalwan ya king lagyung Alba Ribas metung yang artista king Katalunya, Espanya.

The Corpse of Anna Fritz:
Ing The Corpse of Anna Fritz (Kastelyanu at Katalan: "El Cadáver de Anna Fritz", Kapampangan: "Ing Meteng Katáwan nang Anna Fritz") metung yang pelikulang Espanyol king direksyun nang Hèctor Hernández Vicens.

Amanung Koreanu:
Ing amanung Koreanu ya pin ing amanu opisyal king Republika ning Korea at Demokratikung Pangmaldang Republika ning Korea.

Kabulasan:
Ing kabulasan (Ingles: "health", Tagalug: "kalusugan") ing antas ning punsyonal o kayayapang metaboliku da reng mangabiyeng linalang u organismu.

Pietro Boselli:
I Pietro Boselli (mibait ya king Negrar, Italya) metung yang modelu ampong talapagturu king Londres, Inglatera.

Ryu Jun-yeol:
I Ryu Jun-yeol (Hangul: 조정석, mibait Septiembri 25, 1986), metung yang artista ampo modelu king Mauling Korea. Mas mekilala ya kareng papel na king Reply 1988.

Wenn V. Deramas:
I Edwin Villanes Deramas (Mayu 11, 1968 - Pebreru 29, 2016), kebaluan ya anti mung Direk Wenn, metung yang talasulat ("scriptwriter") ampong direktor king telebisyun at pelikula king Pilipinas.

Danum:
Ing Danum (pormula kemikal: H2O) metung yang pluwidung bubuwu kareng ilug, karayatmalatan ampong uran king yatu, at iya pin ing pun laman da reng pluwidu kareng lalang (organismu). Maki 71% ning danum king babo ning yatu.

Amanung Tuwali:
Ing amanung Tuwali metung yang amanung tubu king Kiangan.

Lawo:
Ing lawo, lauo, o lawu (Ingles: "lunar eclipse"; lawu bulan, pamaglawu bulan) mapalyari ya patse dadalan ya direkta ing bulan king "umbra" (alino) ning yatu king gulut niti. Mapalyari ya mu ini patse eksaktu la makapante (king ""syzygy"") ring aldo, ing yatu, ampong bulan, o alus malapit. Makadepende ya ing tinduk at kaba ning lawo king mismung lugal ning bulan agpang king "orbital nodes" nita.

Ngeung:
Ing ngeung o ngewung (Ingles: "meow" o "miao") ya pin ing paralang pamagsiwala da reng pusa.

Daliwawat:
Ing daliwawat, daliuauat o daliyawat (Ingles: "pimple") metung yang tinduk ning pekas at metung ya kareng resulta ning sinobrang langis ("oil") a makapirmi kareng "pores" ning balat king lupa.

Donna Cruz:
I Donna Cruz Yrastorza-Larrazabal (mibait Pebreru 14, 1977), kebalwan ya anti mung Donna Cruz, metung yang artista ampong talakanta king Pilipinas. Metaguri yang pekamaragul a "multimedia superstar" anyang 1990, a migtagumpe anti mung aktres, talakanta, endorser da reng produktu ampong "host" king telebisyon.
Agpang king Viva Entertainment, iya pin ing pekamatagumpeng babaying talakanta ning OPM ning dekada '90.

Lawu aldo:
Ing lawu aldo o lawo aldo (Ingles: "solar eclipse"), anti akit ibat yatu, metung yang tinduk ng pamaglawu ("eclipse") a malilyari patse dadalan ya ing bulan kapilatan ning aldo ampong yatu, at alus o buwu ya makasagkan ing bulan king aldo.

Dapu:
Ing dápu (Ingles: "crocodile", Tagalug: "buwaya", "dapi") metung yang tinduk ning reptilya king lalam ning pamilyang Crocodylidae (makatinduk ya minsan anti mung subpamilya Crocodylinae). Awusan do muring dapu reng ati orden ning Crocodylia, anti makipamilya Alligatoridae ("alligator" ampo "cayman" o "caiman") at pamilya Gavialidae ("gharial").
Deng dapu mangaragul la reptilyang makatuknang kareng lugal a madanum, king maragul a parti ning labuwad Tropikal ning Asya, Aprika, deng Amerika at Awstralya.

Sulib:
Ing sulib ("Perna Viridis"; Ingles: "Asian green mussel", Tagalug: "tahong") metung yang tinduk o espesye da reng mangalating moluska at makiyating kabibe.
Tubu ya king labuwad Asya-Pasipiku, peru mipakalat ne ing mismung espesye king Karibe, ampo kareng lugal king Hapon, Pangulung Amerika at Mawling Amerika.

Kawung:
Ing kawung o caung, metung yang tinduk ning pamagsiwala da reng asu.

Elisha Cuthbert:
I Elisha Cuthbert (mibait Nobiembri 30, 1982) metung yang artista king Canada.

Lexa:
I Lexa (mibayit Léa Cristina Lexa Araújo,) metung yang talakanta ampong artista king Brasil.

Jason Bateman:
I Jason Bateman (mibait Eneru 14, 1969) metung yang artistang Americanu actor.

Choi Min-ho:
I Choi Min-ho (Hangul: 최민호, Hanja: 崔珉豪; mibait Disyembri 9, 1991 king Incheon), kebaluan ya murin anti mung Minho, metung yang talakanta, talaterak, artista ampong modelu king Mauling Korea. Iya pin ing pun "rapper" ning bandang SHINee.

Kang Ha-neul:
I Kang Ha-neul (Hangul: 강하늘; mibait Pebreru 21, 1990) metung yang artista king Mauling Korea.

Charlotte Rampling:
Charlotte Rampling (Pebreru 5, 1946) metung yang Britanico artista ampong modelu. Metung ya kareng pekasikat a artista king pelikula aniang dekadang 1960, 1970 ampong 1980.

Helen Mirren:
I Helen Mirren (mibait a Helen Lydia Mironoff; Juliu 26, 1945) metung yang Britanico artista. Metung ya kareng pekasikat a artista king pelikula aniang dekadang 1960, 1970, 1980, 1990, 2000 ampong 2010.

Amanung Monggol:
Ing amanung Monggol o Mongol (king pamagsulat Monggol: , '; king sirilikung Monggol: , '; Espanyol: "idioma mongol", Ingles: "Mongolian language") metung yang pamyalita king Monggolya at iya pin ing pekamaragul a mekilalang kasapi ning pamilya da reng amanung Monggoliku.

Park Yong-ha:
I Park Yong Ha (Agosto 12, 1977 – Hunyo 30, 2010) metung yang artista ampong talakanta king Mauling Korea.

Song Joong-ki:
I Song Joong-ki (Hangul: 송중기, mibait Septiembri 19, 1985), metung yang artista ampo modelu king Mauling Korea. Mas mekilala ya kareng papel na king Sungkyunkwan Scandal at Descendants of the Sun.

Min Nan:
Ing Min Nan o Mauling Min (Tradisyonal: 閩南語; Pepapayak: 闽南语; Pinyin: "Mǐnnányǔ"; Pe̍h-ōe-jī: "Bân-lâm-gí/Bân-lâm-gú"), metung yang tinduk ning Tsinung Min a gagamitan king Mauling Fujian, Aslagang Guandong, Hainan, mauling Zhejiang at Taiwan.

So Ji-sub:
I So Ji-sub (mibait Nobyembri 4, 1977) metung yang artista king Mauling Korea.

Christina Grimmie:
I Christina Victoria Grimmie (Marsu 12, 1994Hunyu 11, 2016), kebaluan ya murin anti mung Christina Grimmie, metung yang talakanta ampong kompositora king Estadus Unidus.

Chun Jung-myung:
I Chun Jung-myung (Hangul: 천정명, Hanja: 宋仲基; mibait Nobiembri 29, 1980), metung yang artista ampo modelu king Mauling Korea. Mas mekilala ya kareng papel na king Cinderella's Sister at Glory Jane.

Richard Juan:
I Richard Ching Juan (Tsinu: Fan Hong Zhi; mibait Agostu 2), kebaluan ya murin anti mung Richard Juan at Richard Hwan, metung yang personalidad king telebisyon ampong modelu king Pilipinas.

Elie Wiesel:
I Eliezer "Elie" Wiesel KBE (; September 30, 1928 – July 2, 2016) metung yang Americanung Judiung talasalulat, propesor, activistang political, sinambut Premiong Nobel ampong miligtas king Holocaust. Ya ing talasulat da reng 57 a libru, a keraklan misulat king Ingles ampong Frances, kayabe ya ing "Bengi", obrang mibasi king denasan na anting metung a presu king Auschwitz ampong Buchenwald concentration camp. 
Bukud king pamanyulat, metung yang profesor ning humanidades king Boston University, a mitátag king Elie Wiesel Center for Jewish Studies ba yang parangalan. Mikyabe ya kareng parasan a Judio, at sinaup ya king pamitátag ning United States Holocaust Memorial Museum king Washington, D.C. Kareng kayang actividad a political, mengampania ya para kareng victima ning pamanalipit kareng lugal antimo ing Mauling Africa, Nicaragua ampong Sudan. Kinondena ne ing 1915 Armenian genocide, at mindatila yang talapamingwa ning katulirang pantau king kabilugan ning kayang bye. Inaus neng "pekamaulagang Judio king America” ning "Los Angeles Times".
Mirinan yang galal a Nobel Peace Prize i Wiesel anyang 1986, nung kapilan inaus ne ning Norwegian Nobel Committee a "mensajero ning meto ketawan" ("messenger mankind"), at inisplica nang kapamilata’ning kayang pamagpilit a atanggap na ing kayang "ing kayang densan a lubus a pamagpakarine ampong misnang kamuran para king pangataung linto kareng campu ning kamataya’nang Hitler", ("his own personal experience of total humiliation and of the utter contempt for humanity shown in Hitler's death camps") ampo ing kayang "practical a pamanigobra king kamatayan para king kapayapan", ("practical 's death work in the cause of peace "), at i Wiesel migdala yang mensaje ning "kapayapan, pamagsisi, ampong dignidad a pantau" ("of peace, atonement and human dignity") king meto ketawan. url=http://www.laht.com/article.asp?ArticleId=2414947&CategoryId=10717 | title=Human Rights Foundation Lauds OAS Discussion on Venezuela | work=Latin American Herald Tribune | accessdate=July 3, 2016}}</ref>

Sulundagis:
Ing Sulundagis o Sulundaguis (lit. "rat's lamp" king Ingles), kebaluan ya murin anti mung Venus, iya pin ing kadwang planeta ning sistemang solar, manibat king Aldo. Gawa ya king batu, at atin yang makapal a atmosperang carbon dioxide a makapadurut kaniti. Uli ning "greenhouse effect", ini ing mapaling diling planeta king Solar System. Atin yang mangakapal a biga, anya e ta ya akakit ing kayang balat nung e tamu gumamit radar. 
Ibat ya kang Venus, ing diosa ning sinta at legwan da reng Romanu, ing lagyu ning planeta. 
Ing Venus ing masalang diling bage king banwa kaybat ning Aldo ampo ning Bulan. Neng kai, awsan deng "Morning Star" (tala ning abak) o "Evening Star" (tala ning sisilim).

DVD-R:
ng bulung a iti, sumulat ka king kahun king lalam (lon me ing help page para king karagdagang impormasiun). Nung migkamali kang minta Ing DVD, a ausan da muring Digital Versatile Disc o Digital Video Disc, metung yang format o paralan king pamanyinup o pamagsimpan ning data ning uring media king optical disc, a mitátag aniang 1995. Keraklan, magagamit ya king video ampong pamagsimpan data. Pareu la dagul deng DVD ampo reng compact disc (CD), oneng mas dakal a makatanam kesa kareti ing agiu rang isimpan a data.
Deng pamiyaliwa ning terminu o katayang DVD lalarawan da ing paralan ning pamagsimpan king data kareng disc. Ing DVD-ROM (read only memory), atin yang datang maliari mung basan dapot e maliaring isulat; ing DVD-R ampo ing DVD+R (recordable) misan la mu makasimpan o maka-record data, at kaibat, gumanang anti mong DVD-ROM; deng DVD-RW (re-writable), DVD+RW, ampong DVD-RAM (random access memory) dakal lang ukdu/besis makapagsimpan la ampong makapamurang dakal a ukdu. Ing wavelength da reng standard DVD laser, 650 nm; ya, ania malutu ya ing kayang sulu.
Deng DVD-Video ampong DVD-Audio disc mangabaldugan lang laman a video (alben) ampong audio (katni o sound) a a ustu panga-format ampong pangabalangkas. Deng aliwang uring DVD, kayabe no retang maki laman a video, ausan dong DVD Data disc.

I Mauro Emanuel Icardi (mibait 19 Pebreru 1993) metung yang futbolistang Argentinu. Kapitan ning Football Club Internazionale Milano ampo king koponang pambangsa ning Argentina.

Rudy Fernandez (actor):
Rodolfo Valentino "Rudy" Padilla Fernandez, screen name Rudy Fernandez (born Rodolfo Padilla Fernandez; March 3, 1952 – June 7, 2008) also known as Daboy, was a multi-awarded Filipino actor and producer. He came to prominence as an action star in the Philippine cinema during the 1980s up to the early 1990s.
Career.
Fernandez was born at 8:36 PM on March 3, 1952 at Mary Johnston Hospital in Tondo, Manila, He Is Eldest the son of the late film director Gregorio Fernandez. Both his parents were from Lubao, Pampanga, which he considered his hometown. He made his film debut at the age of three, appearing in "Luksang Tagumpay" (1956), which was directed by his father. He also appeared in another film of his father's, "Emily" (1960).
Fernandez started his active film career while a student at the University of Santo Tomas, when he was signed to a contract by Sampaguita Pictures in 1970. He was first featured by Sampaguita Pictures in "For Your Mama" (1970), then paired with Connie Angeles in "Sweet Matutina" (1970). Fernandez spent the next few years in teenage parts until he made his breakthrough as an action star with "Bitayin si Baby Ama" (1976). His viability as an action star was further enhanced with the box-office success of "Ang Leon, Ang Tigre at ang Alamid" (1979).
Beginning with "..Baby Ama", a biopic of a well-known Filipino criminal, Fernandez specialized in portraying true-to-life characters. One of his notable action films is "Markang Bungo" (Skull Mark), a film based on a true story, where he portrayed the well-known Baguio City police officer Bobby Ortega, was released in 1992. From this film came a signature line of Fernandez's, ""Walang personalan, trabaho lang"" ("Strictly business, nothing personal"), which has since been cited as among the most memorable quotes in Philippine cinema by QTV's "Ang Pinaka" television program. "Iligpit si Bobby Ortega, Markang Bungo 2" (Execute Bobby Ortega, Skull Mark 2) is a sequel that was released in 1995. Aside for portraying a real police officer, he was cast in the lead roles for the biopics of Filipino politicians Alfredo Lim, Vincent Crisologo, and Ping Lacson. In the film "Lagalag: The Eddie Fernandez Story", he starred as Eddie Fernandez, a Filipino actor during the 1970s and the father of Pops Fernandez.
With the decline of production of Filipino action films during the 2000s, Fernandez turned to television roles. In the short-lived GMA Network sitcom "Da Boy, en Da Girl", he starred opposite Rosanna Roces. He also played as a supporting role in other TV series in GMA like "Twin Hearts" and "Atlantika". He was also the host of the docu-drama "Kasangga".
Awards.
Fernandez has won two FAMAS Best Actor awards for the action films "Batuigas...Pasukuin si Waway" (Batuigas...Make Waway to Surrender) (1984) and "Operation: Get Victor Corpuz, The Rebel Soldier" (1988). In addition to these wins, FAMAS has also nominated Rudy Fernandez an additional 13 times from 1976 to 1998. He also won two FAP Best Actor awards for "Batuigas..." and for Birador (1998).
The Philippine Movie Press Club (PMPC) bestowed the 2008 Ulirang Artista Lifetime Achievement Award to Rudy Fernandez, at the 24th Star Awards for Movies. He was also the recipient of the Film Academy of the Philippines FPJ Lifetime Achievement Award.
In 2007, FAMAS awarded him the Fernando Poe, Jr. Memorial Award.
Personal life.
Fernandez hometown is Lubao, Pampanga. He came from famous Padilla showbiz clan in his maternal side. Robin Padilla, Rustom Padilla, Gino Padilla, are his cousins and Zsa Zsa Padilla is a niece . He has one son, Mark Anthony Fernandez, with former partner Alma Moreno and two sons, Raphael and Renz Marion Fernandez with Lorna Tolentino, his wife. his grandson Grae (son of Mark Anthony) joined showbiz 
Politics.
During the 2001 elections, Fernandez ran for mayor of Quezon City under the banner of the Puwersa ng Masa. Although he garnered most of the votes in District 2 where the voters were composed mostly of indigent citizens, he lost in the remaining three districts and was defeated by then-House Speaker Sonny Belmonte of the People Power Coalition.
Illness and death.
In 2007, it was revealed by Lorna Tolentino on "Startalk" that her husband had been diagnosed with periampullary cancer. Fernandez underwent treatment in Tokyo, Japan. After a healing Mass on May 10, 2008 by several friends at the Christ the King Church, Quezon City, he was rushed to a San Juan City hospital for back pains. The "Sun Star" reported that Fernandez was actually suffering from pancreatic cancer, instead.
Fernandez died from periampullary cancer at his home in Quezon City on the morning of June 7, 2008.

Siabukut:
Ing siabukut ("Centropus bengalensis"), a lesser coucal king Inglis, metung yang species king familia Cuculidae. MaIeparan ya ing lugal nung nu ya mayayakit, at kareng aliwang lugal a reti, mayayakit la mu naman deng aliwang species a kamaganak na. Lati o bana ing lugal nung nu ya mabibye, a maki dikut ampong pun dutung. Cumpara kareng species a kamaganak na, mas malati ya, e masiadung maragul ing kayang tuktuk, at maputla la reng gulis kareng bulbul ning kayang buntuk ampong gulut. Mas makaba ya kuku king gulut, at makayaliwa ya katni o siuk. Metung ya kareng mapilan mung coucal a manaliwa kule depending king panaun ning banwa, oneng anti kareng aliwang coucal, e la makikilala deng lalaki ampong babai king kilual. 

Basshunter:
I Basshunter, Jonas Erik Altberg (mibait Disiembri 22 1984 king Halmstad) metung yang talakanta, producer ampong DJ king Sweden.

Silingsilingan:
Ing silingsilingan, a Philippine pied fantail king Inglis ("Rhipidura nigritorquis") metung yang species ning ayup ibat king familia Rhipiduridae. Sadya, tuturing deng kapareung species ning Malaysian pied fantail.
Manuknangan ya kareng gubat o kakewan.

Salaksak:
Ing salaksak, o collared kingfisher king Inglis ("Todiramphus chloris") metung yang piscarul a kasantingan dagul at kayabe king subfamilia Halcyoninae, ding tree kingfishers. Mayayakit ya king maleparan a lugal, manibat king It has a wide range extending from the Dayatmalat a Malutu kasumangid king mauling Asia, at angga king Polynesia. Ating mapilan a subspecies at grupu da reng subspecies a kewani da king species a ini, kayabe ya ing Pacific kingfisher, islet kingfisher, Torresian kingfisher, Mariana kingfisher ampong the Melanesian kingfisher.

Uis:
Ing uis, a little grebe o dabchick king Inglis ("Tachybaptus ruficollis"), a kayabe king familiang grebe da reng ayup king danuman. Ibat ya ing lagyu ning genus king minunang Griegung "takhus" "mabilis" ampong "bapto" "lumbug king lalam". Ing lagyu ning species, a "ruficollis" ibat ya king Latin a "rufus" "malutu" ampong Modernung Latin a "-collis", "-maki batal a", itself ibat king Latin a "collum" "batal".
Taxonomy.
Anam la reng makikilalang subspecies king salukuyan, a pikakawani da keraklan king degulan ampong kule.

Pampanga High School:
Ing Pampanga (National) High School (Kapampangan: Pangbansang Pipagaralang Pangadwa ning Pampanga) metung yang iskwela keti king San Fernandu Lakanbalen, Pampanga.
Dati yang mekilala na king lagyng Jose Abad Santos High School (Kapampangan: Pipagaralang Pangadwa ng Jose Abad Santos). Ing kasalikuyang mainmunang ___ ng Pampanga High School meyari yang megawa ning 1935. Makisabe ya king "Standard Plan No. 20 of Gabaldon schoolhouses" na kasalukuyang maaayus na abe ning "Heritage Schoolhouse Restoration Program of the Department of Education." Metung karing meyari keti i Diosdado P. Macapagal.

Pamagsalsal:
Ing salsal o ing pamanyalsal yapin ya ing pamangimut king butu angga king kalualan ya ing metung a lalaki. Ating mialiwang paralan bang magsalsal ya ing metung a lalaki. Maliari neng sakmalan ing butu na at kimutan ne iti king kapamilatan na ning mabilis a pamangimut ning gamat. Nung namang malati ya pa ing butu na ning lalaki, maliari neng tukupan ing butu na at kimutan neng mabilis angga king kalwalan ya.

Filmografía nang Mary Tyler Moore:

Bideografía nang Selena Gomez:
An Amerikanang parakanta asin aktress na si Selena Gomez nagluwas sa mga music video, pelikula, asin programa sa telebisyon. Poon sa saiyang debut album kaiba an saiyang bandang Selena Gomez & the Scene na nagpaluwas kan "Kiss & Tell" (2009), laog kaini an saiyang mga music video para sa mga solong kantang "Falling Down" asin "Naturally". An ikaduwang album kan saiyang banda, an "A Year Without Rain" (2010), ipinaluwas an music video para sa "Round & Round" asin "eponymous single". An ikatulong album kan banda, na "When the Sun Goes Down" (2011), ipinaluwas an music video para sa "Who Says", "Love You like a Love Song", na ipinag-nominate para sa Best Female Video sa 2012 MTV Video Music Awards, asin "Hit the Lights". Kaamayi kan 2012, si Gomez nag-anunsyar na an banda mapahingalo sa paggibo nin kanta mantang matotok si Gomez saiyang karera sa pag-arte. Kan 2013, saiyang kinompirma na mapaluwas siya kan saiyang solong album, asin bakong saro pang album kaiba an saiyang banda.
